input_text: I have oil, process cheese, onion, milk, elbow macaroni, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Crock-Pot Macaroni And Cheese with 8 oz. elbow macaroni, 1 tsp. salt, 2 Tbsp. oil, 3 c. shredded process cheese, 1 (13 oz.) can evaporated milk, 1/4 c. melted butter, 1 1/2 c. milk, 2 Tbsp. onion, minced. Here's the instruction: Cook and drain macaroni. Toss in oil. Mix remaining ingredients and add to lightly greased crock-pot. Cover and cook on low 3 to 4 hours.

input_text: I have oleo, sugar, vanilla, eggs, vanilla wafers, pecans, coconut, milk. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Vanilla Wafer Cake with 1 c. sugar, 1 stick oleo, softened, 3 eggs, 1/2 c. milk, 1 tsp. vanilla, 2 c. crushed vanilla wafers, 1 c. chopped pecans, 1 can coconut. Here's the instruction: Cream sugar and oleo. Beat eggs and add alternately with the milk. Add vanilla wafers, vanilla, coconut and pecans. Bake in shallow pan for about 1 hour at 325°.

input_text: I have black pepper, eggs, cheddar cheese, egg whites, cooking spray, parsley, paprika, garlic, red onion, baking potatoes, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Potato Frittata with 3/4 pound baking potatoes, peeled, halved lengthwise, and thinly sliced, Cooking spray, 1 1/2 cups vertically sliced red onion, 1/2 teaspoon salt, divided, 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley, 1/4 teaspoon paprika, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, 4 large egg whites, 3 large eggs, 1 garlic clove, minced, 1/2 cup (2 ounces) shredded reduced-fat cheddar cheese. Here's the instruction: Place potatoes in a saucepan, and cover with water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer 8 minutes or until tender; drain and set aside. Place a nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add the onion, and cook 20 minutes or until deep golden brown, stirring frequently. Remove onion from pan, and recoat pan with cooking spray. Return onion to pan; stir in potatoes and 1/4 teaspoon salt. Preheat broiler. Combine 1/4 teaspoon salt, parsley, and next 5 ingredients (parsley through garlic) in a bowl, stirring well with a whisk. Pour over onion mixture; sprinkle with cheese. Cook over medium heat 2 minutes or until slightly set. Wrap handle of skillet with foil; broil 3 minutes or until eggs are set and cheese is melted. Gently slide frittata onto a platter, and cut into 8 wedges.

input_text: I have baby spinach, tomatoes, goat cheese, sauce, capers, butter, fresh parsley, water, veal loin, lemon juice, cornflour, basil, olive oil, yellow peppers, salt, bacon, pepper, instant chicken, shallots, garlic. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Stuffed Veal Loin with 800 g veal loin, 2 medium yellow peppers, roasted, 150 g boursin garlic & herb spreadable cheese, at room temperature, 150 g soft fresh goat cheese, at room temperature, 20 baby spinach leaves, 12 basil leaves, pepper, salt, garlic, 4 large sun-dried tomatoes, drained, 6 slices bacon, olive oil, Sauce, olive oil, 2 shallots, chopped finely, 1 1/2 cups water, 1 1/2 teaspoons instant chicken bouillon granules, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 2 tablespoons capers, 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, finely chopped, 1/4 cup butter, 40-50g approx, pepper, 2 teaspoons cornflour. Here's the instruction: Roast peppers in 200c oven, flesh side down, until skin blisters and blackens. Allow to cool peel skin off and slice into thin strips, set to one side. Stir the boursin and goats cheese until well combined, set to one side. Slice veal down the middle, length ways, being careful not to cut all the way through. Open out and with a meat mallet pound until is of equal thickness and a rough rectangle shape. Season with pepper, salt and garlic powder. Place spinach leaves down the centre of the veal to form about a 2 inch wide strip, lay peppers on top of spinach, arrange sun-dried tomatoes on pepper. Set aside about 1/4 cup of cheese mixture for the sauce. Spoon remaining cheese mixture in an even log over the tomatoes, finally arrange basil leaves on the top of the cheese. Fold veal over filling,and roll up, secure by tying kitchen string at several intervals down the length, also wrap the string once lengthwise around the veal to secure ends. Cover ends of veal with aluminum foil to enclose filling completely. Cover veal and reserved cheese separately and chill for at least 6 hours. This can prepared a day ahead of time. Melt the butter and olive oil in a large fryimg pan over medium high heat. Remove foil from ends of veal, keep to put back on. Brown veal on all sides, turning frequently, about 10 Min's. Remove from pan, replace foil on ends and drape bacon across the veal and tuck ends under. Place veal in a roasting pan and roast in pre-heated oven 180c-190c depending on oven temps for 50 Min's, Remove and transfer to a chopping board and allow to rest 10 Min's before slicing. Sauce. Heat a small amount of oil in a pan and add shallots, cook until shallots soften. Add water and stock granules, bring to the boil, reduce to a simmer, for a few minutes. Whisk in lemon juice, capers and parsley, over a low heat gradually whisk in butter and 1/4 cup reserved cheese mixture. Season with pepper. Mix a little water with cornflour, add to sauce, turn the heat up slightly and cook, stirring, until mixture thickens. To Serve: Remove foil, bacon and string from veal, slice into even slices, arrange on a plate and drizzle sauce over. I served mine with dilled carrots. So serve with your favourite veg and mash if desired. I served this for three and it was perfect but I did not serve any starchy carbs with, so it may work for 4, but I would suggest upping veal to 1kg for 4.

input_text: I have graham cracker crust, milk, lemon juice, frozen lemonade, red. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lemonade Pie with 1 small can frozen lemonade, thawed, 9 oz. Cool Whip, 1 can Eagle Brand milk, red or yellow food coloring, 1 Tbsp. lemon juice, graham cracker crust. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients except crust. Pour into graham cracker crust and chill.

input_text: I have condensed milk, chocolate cake, caramel, candy bars, cream. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chocolate-Caramel Poke And Pour Cake with 1 pkg. German chocolate cake mix, 1 can sweetened condensed milk, 1 pt. jar (2 c.) caramel or butterscotch ice cream topping mix, 1 (8 oz.) carton whipped cream, 2 or 3 Heath candy bars, crushed. Here's the instruction: Prepare cake as directed on package and bake in a 9 x 13-inch pan in 350° oven for 30 minutes. Remove from oven and poke holes in cake with a wooden spoon. Pour sweetened condensed milk into holes. Pour ice cream topping over the milk. Frost with whipped topping. Sprinkle crushed candy over top. Refrigerate, then enjoy.

input_text: I have pepper, onion, tomato soup, celery, catsup, ground beef, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make French Fry - Burger Pie with 1 lb ground beef, 1 cup chopped celery, 3/4 cup chopped onion, 1 (10 ounce) can condensed tomato soup, 1/3 cup catsup, 3/4 teaspoon salt, pepper, to taste, 1 (9 ounce) package frozen french fries. Here's the instruction: Cook meat, celery and onion in skillet, drain off the grease. Stir in the soup, catsup, salt and pepper. Turn into a greased (sprayed with Pam) 8x8x2 inch baking dish. Arrange the potatoes over the top. Bake at 425*F for 25 minutes.

input_text: I have white sugar, gumdrops, crisco, brown sugar, eggs, soda, nuts, milk, cream of tartar. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Peppernuts with 3/4 c. Crisco, 1/2 c. brown sugar, 1/2 c. milk, 3/4 tsp. soda, 1 c. nuts, ground, 1 1/2 c. white sugar, 3 eggs, 3/4 tsp. cream of tartar, 1 c. gumdrops. Here's the instruction: You can use all white sugar in this recipe. Mix the ingredients and roll into ropes. Cut into 1/2-inch pieces and bake 7 minutes in 400° oven.

input_text: I have nutella, pistachios, powdered sugar, butter, honey nut, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sea Salt Nutella Pistachio Puppy Chow with 1/2 cups Unsalted Butter, 1- 1/4 cup Nutella, 3/4 teaspoons Sea Salt, 1 cup Shelled Pistachios (dry Roasted And Salted), 8 cups Honey Nut Corn Chex Cereal (a 13.8 Oz Box Is Roughly 8 Cups), 2- 1/2 cups Powdered Sugar. Here's the instruction: In a medium-sized saucepan over medium-low heat, melt the butter and Nutella. Stir constantly until smooth and no clumps remain. Remove from heat and stir in salt. Pour the pistachios and cereal into a large bowl. Pour the warm Nutella mixture just around the outside of the bowl and gently fold until each piece of cereal is coated. Pouring the Nutella around the outside of the bowl will prevent the Nutella from clumping together in big globs, and instead evenly coat the cereal and pistachios. Add the powdered sugar to the bowl and toss to coat. Add more or less powdered sugar depending on your preference. Pour onto a large baking sheet and let it sit for about 15 minutes so that chocolate and the powdered sugar have time to set. Enjoy! Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 2 weeks.

input_text: I have bisquick, sugar, vanilla, nutmeg, eggs, coconut, milk, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Blender Coconut Custard Pie Recipe with 1/2 c. sugar, 4 Large eggs, 1/2 stick butter, 1/2 c. Bisquick, 2 c. lowfat milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 c. coconut, Dash of nutmeg. Here's the instruction: Mix all in blender. Pour into greased pie pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 min.

input_text: I have sesame seed hamburger, tomatoes, pepper, steak sauce, beef patties, leaf lettuce leaves. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Caliente Burger with 24 each beef patties (1/3 lb. each), 24 slices pepper Jack cheese, cut into 1-oz. slices, 24 each sesame seed hamburger buns, 24 each leaf lettuce leaves, 24 slices tomatoes, sliced King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09, 96 slices pickled jalapeno pepper slices, 3 cups A.1. Thick & Hearty Steak Sauce. Here's the instruction: For each serving: Grill 1 beef patty to desired doneness. Top with 1 cheese slice; broil until melted. Fill 1 bun with 1 lettuce leaf, cheeseburger, 1 tomato slice, 4 jalapeno slices and 2 Tbsp. steak sauce.

input_text: I have red onion, carrots. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make German Style Dip  with 1/4 CUP FINELY CHOPPED RED ONION, 1 TBSP OLIVE OIL, 1 8 OZ SOFTENED CREAM CREAM CHEESE, 2/3 CUP SOUR CREAM, 3 TBSP COARSE GRAIN MUSTARD, 1/4 TSP COARSELY GROUND PEPPER, DIPPERS: PEELED FRESH BABY CARROTS, RED CABBAGE LEAVES, PRETZELS. Here's the instruction: IN A SMALL SAUCEPAN, COOK ONION IN HOT OIL 4 APPROXIMATELY 4 MINUTES, COOL FOR 15 MINUTES, IN A MED. BOWL, BEAT CREAM CHEESE W/ ELECTRIC MIXER ON MED. SPEED UNTIL SMOOTH, ADD SOUR CREAM, MUSTARD & PEPPER, BEAT UNTIL COMBINED, STIR IN OINION, SERVE W/ DIPPERS

input_text: I have sugar, marshmallows, unsalted butter, eggs, light brown sugar, frosting, pecans, flour, chocolate chips, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Rocky Road Brownies with 1/2 cups Unsalted Butter, Cut Up, 1 bag Semisweet Chocolate Chips (12 Ounces), 1/2 cups Sugar, 1/2 cups Light Brown Sugar, 1/2 teaspoons Salt, 2 whole Large Eggs, 3/4 cups Flour, 1 cup Mini Marshmallows, 1/2 cups Chopped Pecans, 1 container Duncan Hines Creamy Frosting (12 Ounces), 1 cup Mini Marshmallows, 1/2 cups Chopped Pecans. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°. Spray an 8" square pan with cooking spray. In a heatproof bowl set over (not in) a saucepan of simmering water, combine butter and 1 cup chocolate chips. Heat, stirring occasionally, just until melted, about 3-5 minutes. Remove mixture from heat, stir in sugars and salt, then eggs and finally flour, stirring just until combined. Add marshmallows and pecans and gently fold into batter. Bake until toothpick inserted into center comes out fairly clean, 24-30 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool completely. Mix the remaining 1 cup of marshmallows and 1/2 cup of pecans into your can of frosting, spread generously on cooled brownies. Enjoy!

input_text: I have oil, sour milk, sugar, vanilla, baking powder, eggs, cinnamon, cloves, soda, flour, cocoa, margarine, zucchini. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chocolate Zucchini Cake with 1/2 c. margarine, 1/2 c. oil, 1 1/2 c. sugar, 2 eggs, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1/2 c. sour milk (1 c. milk with 1 tsp. vinegar, 2 1/2 c. flour, 4 Tbsp. cocoa, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. cinnamon, 1/2 tsp. cloves, 1 tsp. soda, 2 c. grated zucchini. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients together. Pour into a greased 13 x 9-inch pan. Top	with chocolate bits.	Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.

input_text: I have sugar, shortening, brown sugar, eggs, baking soda, cinnamon, water, flour, pumpkin, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pumpkin Bread with 3/4 c. sugar, 3/4 c. brown sugar, 1/3 c. shortening, 2 eggs, 1 2/3 c. flour, 1/4 tsp. baking soda, 3/4 tsp. salt, 1 Tbsp. cinnamon, 1/3 c. water, 1 c. pumpkin. Here's the instruction: Cream the sugars and shortening. Add 1 egg at a time to sugar mixture. Stir in dry ingredients. Stir in pumpkin and water. Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until toothpick comes out clean.

input_text: I have chopped meat, pepper, horseradish, swiss cheese, green onion, carrot, salad dressing, mustard. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Meat Salad with 1 c. chopped meat (beef, ham, etc.), 3/4 c. shredded carrot or cabbage, 1/2 c. shredded Swiss cheese, 1/8 tsp. pepper, 2 Tbsp. green onion, 5 Tbsp. salad dressing, 1/4 tsp. horseradish, 1/4 tsp. prepared mustard. Here's the instruction: Mix and fill pita or sandwich

input_text: I have vanilla bean, heavy cream, brown sugar, milk, strawberry sauce, egg yolks. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Easy Vanilla Bean Ice Cream with 1/3 cups Milk (at Least 6% Fat), 1 Vanilla Bean, 4 Egg Yolks, 1/2 cups Brown Sugar, 1-3/4 cup Heavy Cream, Strawberry Sauce, To Serve (optional, See Blog Post). Here's the instruction: In a saucepan or small pot, boil the milk and let it cool. Cut the vanilla bean lengthwise and scrape the seeds with a knife or a teaspoon. Stir the seeds, vanilla bean, egg yolks and sugar into the cooled milk. Cook over low heat for about 15 minutes or until thickened, stirring occasionally and let cool. Remove the vanilla bean from the mixture. Whip the cream and stir it gently into the vanilla mixture.Transfer into a bowl of your ice cream maker and start the churning (make sure you froze the bowl of your ice cream maker for at least 8 hours in advance or according to the instructions). After 30 minutes of churning, check your ice cream every couple of minutes to see weather it's ready. It should be thick but not firm. Transfer the ice cream into a container and freeze for about 2 hours. Serve with strawberry sauce (optional). Enjoy! Makes a little under 1 quart.

input_text: I have goat cheese, almonds, red pepper. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Spicy-Sweet Goat Cheese Bites with 2 ounces goat cheese, 1/2 cup red pepper jelly, 3 tablespoons chopped roasted salted almonds. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°. Arrange Flaky Tartlet Shells on a baking sheet. Cut goat cheese into 24 very small pieces. Spoon 1/4 rounded teaspoonful red pepper jelly into each shell; top with cheese. Sprinkle evenly with almonds. Bake tartlets at 350° for 5 to 6 minutes or until cheese is melted.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, graham cracker crumbs, granulated sugar, heavy cream, eggs, passion fruit concentrate, cream cheese, kosher salt, cornstarch, orange juice, milk, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Ricotta Cheesecake with Passion Fruit Recipe with 1 1/4 cups graham cracker crumbs, 1/4 cup granulated sugar, 6 tablespoons unsalted butter (3/4 stick), melted, plus more to coat the baking pan, 1 (8-ounce) package cream cheese, cut into pieces, 8 ounces whole-milk ricotta, drained 30 minutes in a fine sieve to rid it of excess moisture, 3/4 cup granulated sugar, 2/3 cup heavy cream, 4 large eggs, separated, 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/3 cup passion fruit concentrate, 1/2 cup passion fruit concentrate, 2 tablespoons orange juice, 1 tablespoon cornstarch. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and arrange a rack in the middle. Coat the bottom and sides of a 9-inch springform pan with butter. In a bowl, stir together the graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and melted butter until the crumbs are evenly moistened. Pour into the prepared pan and press evenly onto the bottom and about 1 inch up the sides. Bake until set, about 8 minutes. Let the crust cool on a wire rack. Reduce the oven temperature to 300 degrees F. To make the filling, in the bowl of a food processor, process the cream cheese until smooth. Add the ricotta, sugar, cream, egg yolks, vanilla, and salt and process until smooth, about 2 minutes; scrape down the sides of the bowl and process again. Add the passion fruit concentrate and pulse just to mix. Pour the mixture into a large bowl. In another bowl, beat the egg whites to medium-stiff peaks (a hand-held electric mixer makes this a breeze). Using a rubber spatula, fold about one-third of the whites into the cheese mixture. Then gently fold in the remaining whites. Pour into the crust and spread evenly. Bake for 30 minutes, then increase the oven temperature to 325 degrees F. Continue baking until the surface is golden and the center still jiggles slightly when gently shaken, about 30 minutes longer. Turn off the oven and let the cake cool in the oven for 1 hour. Remove the cheesecake from the oven and let it cool on a rack for about 30 minutes. In a small saucepan, whisk together the passion fruit concentrate, orange juice, and cornstarch. Cook over medium heat, whisking constantly, until thickened and glossy. Let cool for 5 minutes. Spoon the glaze over the top of the cheesecake, spreading evenly. Let the cheesecake cool completely. Cover and refrigerate the cheesecake until well chilled, at least 2 hours or preferably overnight. Remove the pan sides and run a long, thin knife between the pan bottom and the crust, then slide the cake onto a serving plate and serve.

input_text: I have soy sauce, water chestnuts, turkey breast, onion, celery, cold water, cornstarch, chicken broth, bean sprouts, rice, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Turkey Chop Suey with 1 small onion, sliced, 2 celery ribs, sliced, 1 tablespoon butter, 2 cups cubed cooked turkey breast, 1 can (8 ounces) sliced water chestnuts, drained, 1-1/4 cups reduced-sodium chicken broth, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, 1/4 cup cold water, 3 tablespoons reduced-sodium soy sauce, 1 can (14 ounces) bean sprouts, drained, Hot cooked rice. Here's the instruction: In a large skillet, saute onion and celery in butter until tender. Add the turkey, water chestnuts and broth; bring to a boil. Reduce heat. In a small bowl, combine the cornstarch, water and soy sauce until smooth; add to turkey mixture. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Add bean sprouts. Serve with rice.

input_text: I have sour cream, dill weed, tabasco sauce, onion, mayonnaise, parsley, worcestershire sauce, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Vegetable Dip with 1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise, 1 c. sour cream, 1 1/2 Tbsp. dry onion flakes, 1 1/2 Tbsp. parsley, 1/2 tsp. Lawry's seasoning salt, 1/2 tsp. dill weed, 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce, 4 drops Tabasco sauce. Here's the instruction: Mix together and serve with fresh vegetables.

input_text: I have potato, dill, carrot, sauerkraut, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sauerkraut with 1 (1 lb.) can Vlasic sauerkraut, pinch of salt, 2 pinches dill seed, 1 medium size carrot, grated, 1 medium size potato, grated. Here's the instruction: Cook for several hours, then add 3 slices cooked bacon, crumbled. Add 2 tablespoons of bacon fat.

input_text: I have curry powder, brown sugar, cherries, peaches, butter, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Hot Fruit Compote with 1 (17 oz.) can apricots (halves), 1 (29 oz.) can sliced peaches, 2 (20 oz.) cans chunk pineapple, 1 (10 oz.) can dark pitted cherries, 1 c. brown sugar, 1 tsp. curry powder, 1/2 stick butter. Here's the instruction: Drain fruit and put in casserole. Combine brown sugar and curry powder. Sprinkle over top of fruit.	Dot with butter. Cover and bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

input_text: I have _____, sugar, powdered sugar, all-purpose, shortbread, mixed berries, orange juice, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Triple Berry Orange Glazed Shortbread with FOR THE SHORTBREAD:, 1/8 cups Granulated Sugar, 2 teaspoons Finely Grated Orange Zest, 1-1/4 cup All-purpose Flour, 1/2 cups Butter, 1/2 cups Dried Mixed Berries, Cut Into Pieces, _____, FOR THE GLAZE:, 1/2 cups Powdered Sugar, 1 Tablespoon Orange Juice. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 325F. In a small bowl combine the sugar and orange zest, rubbing the zest into the sugar with your fingers. Set aside. In a medium bowl, combine the flour and the sugar mixture. Cut in the butter with a fork until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs and starts to cling. Stir in the chopped berries. Using your hands, shape the mixture into a ball, kneading until smooth. Don't worry if it looks like a crumbly mess at first, the longer you work it, it will form into a smooth ball. On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough until it is 1/2 inch thick. Use a 1 1/2 inch round cookie cutter to cut the dough into circles. Re-roll the dough scraps as necessary. Place the cookies 1 inch apart on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the bottoms just begin to brown. Transfer to a wire rack to cool. In a small bowl, combine powdered sugar and orange juice to make glaze. Drizzle over the cooled cookies. Eat and enjoy!

input_text: I have light karo syrup, corn, brown sugar, baking soda, nuts, margarine, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bagged Caramel Corn with 1 stick margarine, 1 c. brown sugar, 1/4 c. light Karo syrup, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. baking soda, 4 qt. popped corn, 1 to 2 c. nuts. Here's the instruction: Cook in microwave: margarine, brown sugar, syrup and salt. Boil 2 minutes. Put popcorn in brown grocery bag. Pour syrup over top. Fold shut; shake. Microwave 1 1/2 minutes; shake. Microwave 1 1/2 minutes; shake. Repeat one more time! Cut open bag and let mixture cool on bag or cookie sheet.

input_text: I have vinegar, fresh ground pepper, lemon juice, yellow mustard, brown sugar, stalks celery, onion, water, catsup, cheap beef, carrots, worcestershire sauce, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Stringy Barbecue with 1 large cheap beef roast (stew beef will work), 1 large onion, chopped, 2 stalks celery, chopped, 2 large shredded carrots, 2 tablespoons vinegar, 1 cup catsup, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 1 tablespoon yellow mustard, 12 cup water, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 1 teaspoon salt, fresh ground pepper. Here's the instruction: mix all ingredients except roast in a bowl and whisk together. place roast in large roaster pan. pour sauce over top. bake at 325 degrees for 4-6 hours--cook till meat shreds. remove from oven, cool slightly. remove meat from pan and pull apart into shreds. discard fat and add meat back into sauce. stir well. serve on hamburger buns with cheddar cheese.

input_text: I have black beans, egg, corn, garlic, red pepper, cooking spray, corn muffin, milk, yellow peppers, vegetable oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Black Bean Corn Muffins with cooking spray, 1 egg, 1/3 cup milk, 1/2 cup diced roasted red pepper, 1/2 cup diced roasted yellow peppers or 1/2 cup roasted orange bell pepper, 1/2 cup corn, 1/2 cup black beans, 1/2 teaspoon granulated garlic, 1 (8 1/2 ounce) box Jiffy corn muffin mix, 1 teaspoon vegetable oil. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Spray a mini-muffin tin with pan spray. In a large bowl, beat together the egg and milk. Add all remaining ingredients and mix well. Fill the mini-muffin tins to three-quarters full and bake at 400 degrees F for 15-18 minutes until lightly browned. Turn out and serve immediately or let cool on rack or towel. Good with Cajun dishes, chili, fish, and even for breakfast!

input_text: I have wild arugula, sugar, chicken breasts, soy sauce, fresh ginger, serrano, cilantro, rice vinegar, flour, sesame oil, lime juice, garlic, grapeseed oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Soy-Ginger Chicken With Asian Greens or Arugula with 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1/2 teaspoon sugar, 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice, 1 tablespoon seasoned rice vinegar, Salt to taste, 1 garlic clove, minced or pureed, 2 teaspoons minced fresh ginger, 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons grapeseed oil or sunflower oil, 1 tablespoon dark sesame oil, 1 to 2 serrano or Thai green chiles, minced (to taste), or 1/8 to 1/4 teaspoon cayenne, 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts (most weigh 8 to 10 ounces), Salt and freshly ground pepper, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour or a gluten-free flour such as rice flour or corn flour, 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro, 4 cups wild arugula or Asian salad mix, rinsed and spun dry. Here's the instruction: In a small bowl or measuring cup, whisk together the soy sauce, sugar, 1 tablespoon of the lime juice, the vinegar, salt, garlic, ginger, 1/4 cup of the grapeseed or sunflower oil and the sesame oil. Pour half of this mixture into a bowl large enough to accommodate the chicken breasts and add the remaining tablespoon of lime juice and the chiles or cayenne to the bowl. Cut each chicken breast into 2 equal pieces (3 if 12 ounces or more) and place in the bowl. Stir together and refrigerate for 15 to 30 minutes. Remove chicken from marinade and pat dry with paper towels (discard marinade). Place two sheets of plastic wrap (1 large sheet if you have extra-wide wrap) on your work surface, overlapping slightly, to make 1 wide sheet, and brush lightly with olive oil. Place a piece of chicken in the middle of plastic sheet and brush lightly with oil. Cover the chicken with another wide layer of plastic wrap. Working from the center to the outside, pound chicken breast with the flat side of a meat tenderizer until about 1/4 inch thick. (Dont pound too hard or youll tear the meat. If that happens it wont be the end of the world, youll just have a few pieces to cook.) Repeat with the remaining chicken breast pieces. Season the pounded chicken breasts with salt and pepper on one side only. Dredge lightly in the flour (you will not use all of it) and tap breasts to remove excess. Turn oven on low. . Heat a wide, heavy skillet over high heat and add oil. When oil is hot, place one or two pieces of chicken in the pan however many will fit without crowding. Cook for 1 1/2 minutes, until bottom is browned is spots. Turn over and brown on the other side, about 1 1/2 minutes. (Do not overcook or chicken will be dry.) Transfer to a platter or sheet pan and sprinkle cilantro over the top. Keep warm in the oven. Place arugula or Asian mix in a bowl and toss with the remaining dressing. Distribute among plates or arrange on a platter and serve with the chicken.

input_text: I have almond, sugar, vanilla, lemon juice, eggs, lemon zest, cream cheese, cornstarch, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Killer Cheesecake  with 3 (8 oz)packages cream cheese, softened, 1 stick (4 oz) butter, softened, 1 cup sugar, 2 teaspoons lemon zest, 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1/2 teaspoon almond extract, 3 tablespoons cornstarch, 6 eggs. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°F. Spray a 10-inch springform pan with cooking spray, then line with parchment paper cut into a 10-inch round and a 28- by 4-inch strip; Cover outside of pan with foil to waterproof. Beat together cream cheese, butter, & sugar until light. Combine lemon juice, zest, extracts & cornstarch in a small bowl; mix until smooth. Add to cream cheese mixture & continue beating. Add eggs one at a time, until thoroughly combined. Pour batter into lined springform pan. Bake approximately 1 hour & 15 minutes in a water bath until center is just set. Cool in springform pan on a rack 30 minutes; To serve within an hour, remove base & cake to freezer; Or allow to chill completely in refrigerator, about 4 hours.

input_text: I have orange jello, mandarin oranges, sour cream, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Orange Salad with 1 small container Cool Whip, 1 small pkg. orange jello, 1 container sour cream, 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained, 1 can mandarin oranges, drained. Here's the instruction: Mix Cool Whip, sour cream and jello until well blended. Add pineapple and oranges; mix well. Pour into dish and chill.

input_text: I have vinegar, sugar, mustard, white sauce, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make White Mustard Sauce with 1 pt. white sauce, mustard, salt to taste, little vinegar, pinch of sugar. Here's the instruction: Season the white sauce with mustard, salt, vinegar and sugar.

input_text: I have red seedless grapes, green onions, crisp bacon, celery, broccoli, cauliflower, almonds, sunflower seeds. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Broccoli Salad with 1/2 lb. crisp bacon, chopped, 1/2 head cauliflower, 1/2 bunch broccoli, 1/2 c. diced celery, 1 small bunch green onions (with tips), sliced thin, 2 c. red seedless grapes, 1/2 c. slivered almonds, 1/2 c. sunflower seeds (optional). Here's the instruction: Cut broccoli and cauliflower into small florets; cut grapes in half if large. Put all ingredients into mixing bowl.

input_text: I have oleo, pimiento, bell pepper, pepper, accent, eggs, cheddar cheese, celery, onions, eggplant, milk, sage, bread crumbs, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Baked Eggplant with 1 whole eggplant, peeled (about 1 lb.), 1/2 lb. (1 c.) dried bread crumbs, 1 small can evaporated milk (5.33 oz.), 1/4 c. whole milk, 1/4 c. finely chopped onions, 1/4 c. finely chopped bell pepper, 1/4 c. finely chopped celery, 1/2 stick oleo, salt to taste, 2 eggs, slightly beaten, dash of pepper, dash of sage, 1 Tbsp. chopped pimiento, 2 oz. grated Cheddar cheese, dash of Accent. Here's the instruction: Peel and soak eggplant in salt water for 6 to 12 hours, overnight if possible. Soak bread crumbs in milk. Saute onions, celery and bell pepper in oleo for 15 minutes. Place eggplant in a large pan to boil covered with water and cook until almost done.	Mix bread crumbs, sauteed ingredients, and eggplant together. Add eggs, pimiento and seasonings. Blend well. Place in a baking dish and top with grated Cheddar cheese. Bake in a 350°	oven until golden brown. Serve at once or keep in	a warm oven until ready to serve, not too long. Yields 6 to 8 servings.

input_text: I have horseradish, chili sauce, cream cheese. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Crab Dip Plate(Very Simple Recipe)   with 1 (8 oz.) pkg. softened cream cheese, 6.5 to 7.5 oz. white crab meat, 1 bottle chili sauce, 1 to 3 Tbsp. horseradish. Here's the instruction: On a large plate, layer the cream cheese and crab meat.

input_text: I have black, flour, sage, white wine, cognac, chicken, cream, garlic, butter, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken With Creamy Dijon Mustard Sauce with 8 chicken thighs, 12 garlic cloves with skin on, 10 sage leaves, 2 tablespoons butter, 3 tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 2 tablespoons Dijon Classic Mustard, 1/2 cup White wine, 1/3 cup Cognac, 1 cup Chicken stock or water if you don't have stock, 1/2 cup cream, 1 tablespoon all purpose flour, salt, black and white pepper. Here's the instruction: In a large enough pan, add the butter and the olive oil, the sage leaves and the garlics with the skin on them. When the butter starts to sizzle add the chicken thighs skin side down and let them get golden brown over medium low heat. Turn them with a spatula without damaging the chicken and brown the other side. They will be cooking later so you just want to get the nice gold brown colour now. Heat the chicken stock. Remove the chicken from the pan, add the white wine and the cognac and deglaze the pan, scraping any pieces of meet stuck on the bottom. Let the alcohol evaporate completely, then add the mustard and dissolve in the sauce with a whisk. Add the chicken thighs to the pan, add the hot chicken stock to 2/3 of the hight of the chicken thighs. Season with salt and freshly ground white and black pepper and let simmer over low heat, covered, for 20 minutes. Remove the cooked chicken thighs and keep warm. Let the sauce simmer over low heat to reduce to as much as you will need for the 8 thighs. Squeeze the garlics and sage in the pan with the back of a wooden spoon or spatula to release more flavour, then discard them. Sift the flour and dissolve it in 3 tablespoons of cream using a whisk. Add the remaining cream and whisk. Now add a bit of hot sauce, whisk together very well and slowly pour in the pan, whisking well with all the sauce, over very low heat. Keep whisking so the sauce doesn't stick to the bottom. Let the sauce reduce again to the amount you need, always stirring. You will need about a cup of sauce to serve with the 8 chicken thighs. Pour the hot sauce over the chicken thighs and serve immediately with some potato mash.

input_text: I have loaves italian bread, sunday, sunday gravy. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pitti Boop Sandwich with 2 -(18 inch) loaves Italian bread, 1/2 cup Sunday Gravy, 1 cup pieces of various meats from Sunday Gravy (sausage, meatballs, braciole). Here's the instruction: Split the Italian loaf in half lengthwise leaving one side hinged. Remove some of the inner crumb. Spoon or pour the gravy over both sides of the open loaves and layer the meats on each loaf. Add salt and pepper to taste. Fold the 2 halves of the loaves together and cut into 6-inch slices.

input_text: I have potatoes, oregano, lemon juice, green onion, parsley, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Greek Potato Salad with 4 md. potatoes, 1/4 cup olive oil, 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice, 1/4 cup green onion, finely chopped, 1 tbsp. parsley, minced, 1/2 tsp. oregano, dried, Salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: Boil potatoes in their skins until tender, Drain, peel and quarter. Cut into slices. While still warm, pour olive oil, and lemon juice over potatoes. Toss to coat each slice. Add onion, parsley, oregano and salt and pepper to taste, and toss again. Chill before serving.

input_text: I have bass, egg whites, thyme, kosher salt, lemon. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Whole Roasted Fish In A Salt Coffin with 1 lemon, sliced, 2 sprigs lemon thyme, 1 (4 pound) striped bass, cleaned and scaled, 4 pounds kosher salt, 2 egg whites. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C). Insert lemon and lemon thyme into the cavity of the fish. Mix salt and egg whites together in a large bowl. Spread 1/2 the salt mixture on a large baking sheet. Lay fish on top. Pour remaining salt mixture on top. Pack down tightly so fish is sealed in salt. Reduce oven temperature to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Bake fish in the preheated oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted through the salt and into the fish reads 120 degrees F (49 degrees C), 15 to 20 minutes. Cool fish for 2 minutes. Crack the salt coffin with a wooden spoon. Peel away the salt and discard. Transfer fish to a serving dish using 2 spatulas.

input_text: I have egg substitute, sugar, vanilla, baking soda, flour, margarine, pineapple, low-fat yogurt, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Low-Fat Pound Cake with 2 1/2 c. flour, 3/4 c. sugar, 1/3 tsp. salt, 1 1/2 tsp. baking soda, 1/2 c. egg substitute or 3 egg whites, 1 1/2 c. low-fat yogurt, 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla, 1/3 c. margarine, 1 1/2 c. pineapple chunks, 1/3 c. pineapple or orange juice, 1/3 c. sugar. Here's the instruction: Grease a 10-inch tube pan lightly with margarine (do not flour). In a small bowl, mix flour, baking soda and salt. Set aside.

input_text: I have sugar, marshmallows, crackers, eggs, margarine, coconut. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make New York Delight with 2 eggs, 1/2 cup margarine, 3/4 cup sugar, 1/2 cup coconut, 12 graham crackers, 24 marshmallows. Here's the instruction: Boil margarine, sugar,eggs and coconut for 1 minute. Add marshmallows and crushed graham wafers. Put in 8" square pan to set. When cold, cut in bars, and roll in crushed wafer crumbs.

input_text: I have buttermilk, corn, sugar, baking powder, cornmeal yellow, baking soda, eggs, flour, corn oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Corny Mini-Muffins with 3/4 cup cornmeal yellow, 3/4 cup flour, all-purpose, 2 tablespoons sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 each eggs lightly beaten, 1 cup buttermilk, 1/4 cup corn oil or light vegetable oil, 3/4 cup corn whole kernal. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven 425, grease three mini-muffin tins. In med bowl combine cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt; stir to blend. Make well in center, set aside. In small bowl, beat egg, buttermilk and oil, pour into well, add corn and other mixture. Bake.

input_text: I have green onions, mushrooms, flour, white wine, light cream, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Clam And Mushroom Sauce with 2 tablespoons butter, 1 cup sliced mushrooms, 2 tablespoons chopped green onions, 2 tablespoons flour, 1 (5 ounce) can clams, undrained, 1 cup light cream, 1/4 cup white wine, salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: in a 4-cup measure (microwavable) microwave butter for 30 seconds or until melted. Stir in mushroom and green onions. Microwave HIGH uncovered 2-3 minutes or until softened stirring once. Stir in flour. Drain clams, reserving 1/3 cup of the juice. Gradually stir clam juice, cream and wine into mushroom mixture. Microwave HIGH uncovered 2-4 minutes or until mixture comes to a boil and thickens, stirring once. Stir in clams, microwave on high 1 minute or until heated through. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

input_text: I have ginger, fresh red chiles, pork shoulder, sherry, garlic, olive oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Slow-Roasted Aromatic Shoulder of Pork with 1 pork shoulder, skin scored (approximately 12 to 14 pounds), 6 garlic cloves, 1/2 -inch piece fresh ginger, 2 fresh red chiles or 1 teaspoon dried red pepper flakes, 3 tablespoons olive oil (not extra-virgin), 4 tablespoons sherry or rice vinegar. Here's the instruction: The pork takes 24 hours to cook, which is no cause for alarm, because for about 23 hours and 55 minutes you are ignoring it absolutely. And it makes your house smell like a home should. So, if you're planning to eat this for Sunday lunch, at about Saturday lunchtime, preheat your (clean) oven to the hottest it will go. Sit the pork skin-side-up on a rack over a roasting pan. I like to use a mortar and pestle to make my paste but you could just grate the garlic and ginger (one of my beloved, and often mentions, a microplane grater is the tool for the job) and stir in chiles, a tablespoonful of oil and 2 of vinegar if you want. Otherwise, pound together the peeled chopped ginger and peeled cloves with the fresh chiles, adding a tablespoonful of oil and 2 of vinegar when they're squished and paste-like. Using your fingers, rub this paste over the scored skin, pushing bits into the cut lines of the rind. Stagger across to the oven and put in the tray, leaving it for 30 minutes. Meanwhile, into the bowl in which you mixed the paste, pour the 2 remaining tablespoons each of oil and vinegar. When the pork's had its half an hour, remove it from the oven, and turn the temperature down to 225 degrees F. Now turn the pork over: I find it easiest to lift it by hand wearing oven mitts. It makes them dirty, ok, but there is the washing machine. . . Pour the oil and vinegar over the underside (which is now uppermost on the rack) and put the pork back in the low oven, leaving it there for 23 hours. (Actually, you could leave it longer. One of the joys of this is that it cannot overcook.) Anyway, after 23 hours, or 30 to 40 minutes before you actually want to eat, turn the oven back to the highest it will go, remove the pork and turn it back crackling side up. Put it back in the oven for 30 minutes, in which time it will get hot and crisp, though you can give it another 10 if you feel it needs it. Remove, slice off the crackling in a horizontal swipe of the knife and break it into manageable pieces, then start carving or pulling at the tender meat.

input_text: I have southern comfort, gin, orange juice, almonds. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sydney Slammer Drink with ice, 1/2 oz (14 grm). each Southern Comfort, vodka, and amaretto, orange juice and float, 1/2 oz (14 grm) sloe gin, shaved almonds. Here's the instruction: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add Southern Comfort, vodka and amaretto Top with orange juice. Float sloe gin on top. Garnish with shaved almonds.

input_text: I have sweet milk, bisquick, eggs, cheddar cheese, onion, celery, broccoli, chicken, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Impossible Chicken Broccoli Pie with 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, 3 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, 2/3 c. chopped onion, celery (optional), 3/4 c. Bisquick, 3 eggs, 1 1/2 c. boiled chicken, cut up, 1 1/3 c. sweet milk, salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400°. Grease 2 aluminum 1 1/2-inch deep pie plates. Rinse frozen broccoli with cold water to thaw. Mix broccoli, 2 cups cheese, chicken and onion. Put in pie plate. Beat eggs, milk, Bisquick, salt and pepper until smooth. Pour over mixture in pie plate. Bake until test middle comes out clean, about 20 to 30 minutes. Take out and put remaining cheese on top and place back in oven until cheese melts. Let cool a little bit before serving.

input_text: I have tomatoes, black pepper, flour tortillas, cilantro, peppers, white balsamic vinegar, shredded lettuce, cheddar cheese, cooking spray, chicken breast tenders, low-fat sour cream, vegetable oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Spicy Chicken Tacos with 1 cup packed fresh cilantro leaves, 1/2 cup white balsamic vinegar, 1/3 cup vegetable oil, 1/4 cup sliced pickled jalapeno peppers, drained, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1 1/2 pounds chicken breast tenders (about 14 pieces), Cooking spray, 8 (8-inch) 98%-fat-free flour tortillas, 1 cup shredded lettuce, 1 cup chopped tomatoes, 1/2 cup (2 ounces) reduced-fat shredded extra-sharp Cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup low-fat sour cream. Here's the instruction: Combine first 6 ingredients in a blender or food processor; process until blended. Place cilantro mixture and chicken pieces in a large zip-top plastic bag. Seal bag, and shake to coat chicken. Marinate in refrigerator 8 hours. Prepare grill. Remove chicken from marinade, discarding marinade. Place chicken on grill rack coated with cooking spray; grill 2 to 3 minutes on each side or until done. Chop chicken and divide chicken evenly among tortillas. Top each with 2 tablespoons shredded lettuce, 2 tablespoons chopped tomatoes, 1 tablespoon cheese, and 1 tablespoon sour cream. Fold bottom half of each tortilla over filling.

input_text: I have peanut butter, chocolate chips. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make chocolate peanut butter shell with 2 tbsp peanut butter, 1/3 cup chocolate chips. Here's the instruction: microwave on med. until just melted, stirring once, about 1 min. pour over ice cream & wait 1 min. for shell to form.

input_text: I have cabbage, sugar, lemon juice, packets, water, celery, onion flakes, green beans, tomato juice. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lo-Cal Soup with 5 c. water, 5 packets or cubes beef bouillon, 5 c. cabbage, chopped, 2 tsp. onion flakes, 2 c. chopped celery, 5 c. tomato juice or canned whole tomatoes, 2 Tbsp. lemon juice, 4 Tbsp. lo-cal sugar, 2 c. green beans, thawed. Here's the instruction: Combine first 5 ingredients. Cook until semi-soft, about 20 minutes. Add tomatoes, lemon and sugar. Simmer for 10 minutes. Add green beans. Cook for 10 minutes. This soup keeps well for a week or can be put in containers and frozen.

input_text: I have pistachio pudding, brown sugar, flour, coconut, milk, almonds, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Green Salad with 1 stick melted butter, 1 c. plain flour, 1/4 c. brown sugar, 1 (3 oz.) can coconut, 1 c. slivered almonds, 2 boxes pistachio pudding mix, 2 2/3 c. milk, 10 to 12 oz. Cool Whip. Here's the instruction: Mix pudding mix with milk. Fold in Cool Whip. Pour mixture into bowl. Top with the crumbs.

input_text: I have bouillon, steak, soy sauce, onion, worcestershire sauce, garlic, green pepper, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pepper Steak with 2 lb. round steak, 2 cubes bouillon, dissolved in 2 c. water, garlic salt, 2 Tbsp. soy sauce, 1 tsp. salt, sliced green pepper, sliced onion, Worcestershire sauce. Here's the instruction: Cut steak into pieces; brown in skillet 2 minutes. Add bouillon, garlic, soy sauce and salt. Cover and cook 5 minutes. Stir in pepper and onion; cook an additional 2 minutes. Yields 4 to 6 servings.

input_text: I have potatoes, eggs, lamb cooked, flour, onions, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lamb Hash and Poached Eggs with 2 tablespoons butter, 2 each celery stalks finely diced, 1 medium onions finely diced, 2 tablespoons flour, all-purpose, 1 cup lamb cooked, 2 medium potatoes, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 12 large eggs poached. Here's the instruction: MELT 2 TABLESPOONS BUTTER in a small saucepan over medium heat, add the celery and onion and cook, stirring often, for 5 minutes. Sprinkle with flour, and cook, stirring constantly, another minute. Remove from heat and scrape mixture into a mixing bowl to cool. Add the lamb. Wash the potatoes but don't peel them. Shred them on the shredding blade of a food processor, or coarsely grate them by hand. Add the potatoes to the bowl and mix well. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Melt 1 teaspoon of butter in a 6-inch non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add about 3/4 to 1-cup of the hash mixture, or about a 2-inch thickness. Cook without stirring or moving the hash for 3 minutes. Flip the hash, which will have formed into a patty. Reduce heat to low and continue to cook another 5 minutes. Repeat with the remaining mixture. As each hash patty is done, transfer to the oven and keep warm. To serve the hash, place 2 poached eggs on each serving.

input_text: I have sugar, ginger, nutmeg, baking soda, cinnamon, ground cloves, eggs, flour, pumpkin, margarine, walnuts, chocolate chips, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Harvest Loaf with 1 3/4 c. flour, 1 tsp. baking soda, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. nutmeg, 1/2 tsp. ginger, 1/4 tsp. ground cloves, 1/2 c. margarine or butter, 1 c. sugar, 2 eggs, 3/4 c. pumpkin, 3/4 c. chocolate chips, 3/4 c. walnuts, finely chopped. Here's the instruction: Combine dry ingredients and mix well. Cream margarine; add sugar gradually. Blend eggs in creamed mixture and mix well. Add dry ingredients and pumpkin. Stir in morsels and walnuts. Bake at 350° for 65 to 75 minutes. Grease and flour loaf pan.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, eggs, pecans, white corn syrup, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Best Pecan Pie with 3 eggs, 1 c. sugar, 1 c. white corn syrup, 1 c. pecans, dash of salt, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Beat eggs slightly. Add remaining ingredients. Add nuts last. Pour in unbaked pie shell. Cook at 450° for 10 minutes. Reduce temperature to 350° and continue baking for 25 minutes.

input_text: I have oil, pepper, lemon juice, flour, ketchup, mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cube Steak With Hasty Tasty Sauce Recipe with 4 cube steaks, 3 tbsp. flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon dry mustard, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 3 tbsp. ketchup, 2 tbsp. lemon juice, 3 tbsp. veg. oil. Here's the instruction: Mix flour, salt and pepper together. Flour steaks on both sides. Heat oil in a skillet. Brown steaks on both sides and remove from the skillet. Add in dry mustard, Worcestershire sauce, ketchup, lemon juice to skillet, heat until boiling. Spoon over steaks.

input_text: I have zucchini, pepper, leeks, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, thyme, olive oil, garlic, yellow squash, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Summer Vegetable Gratin with 2 large leeks, sliced 1/4-inch thick (1 cup), 1 medium zucchini, sliced 1/4-inch thick (1&1/4 cups), 1 medium yellow squash, sliced 1/4-inch thick (1&1/4 cups), 2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, pepper, 2 tablespoons fine dry breadcrumbs, 2 tablespoons finely grated parmesan cheese, 2 teaspoons fresh thyme (please use fresh, it makes all the difference), 1 minced garlic clove. Here's the instruction: Coat a shallow 2 quart baking dish with non stick cooking spray; set aside. Rinse,trim and slice leeks; pat dry with paper towel. In a medium bowl, combine leeks, zucchini, yellow squash and 1 tablespoon of the oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Transfer vegetables to prepared baking dish. In a small bowl, stir together bread crumbs, cheese, thyme, garlic and remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil. Sprinkle crumb mixture evenly over vegetables. Bake at 425°F for 20-25 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

input_text: I have chinkiang vinegar, dressing, soy sauce, cucumbers, cilantro, chinese sesame oil, century eggs, handful, salad, long strips, carrot, garlic, ginger totaling, green pepper, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chinese Tiger Salad with Salad, 1 small carrot, peeled and finely julienned in ~5cm long strips, 2 cucumbers, finely julienned in ~5cm long strips, 1/2 a leek, finely julienned in ~5cm long strips, 12 sprigs of cilantro, cut to ~5cm long strips, 1 pointed green pepper or half a green bell pepper, finely julienned in ~5cm long strips, 75 grams firm smoked tofu, finely julienned in ~5cm long strips, Slim slices of ginger totaling 5g, finely julienned in ~5cm long strips, 2 century eggs, peeled and sliced into 8 wedges (optional), A small handful of toasted red-skinned peanuts (optional), Dressing, 2 fresh bird's eye chillies, finely sliced, 2 cloves of garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon light soy sauce, 3 teaspoons Chinkiang vinegar, 3 teaspoons Chinese sesame oil, a pinch more salt, to taste. Here's the instruction: Easy, tiger: Combine all your julienned vegetables, herbs and tofu in your serving bowl; you might like to separate them, neatly lined up on a long rectangular plate like rainbow stripes on a tiger's back. This can be wrapped and refrigerated for up to 6 hours before serving. Add the extra century egg or peanuts if you wish. Then mix the dressing ingredients together in a bowl. Dress the salad right before serving, toss it up with chopsticks (little known as the world's most perfect salad-eating utensils), and eat immediately and bravely. Suggested leafy greens pairings (make double the quantity of dressing): Frisee, ultra finely shredded round cabbage, shredded Savoy cabbage, baby spinach.

input_text: I have egg, baking powder, vanilla, ginger, brown sugar, baking soda, bananas, whole wheat flour, rolled oats, ground cinnamon, vegetable oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Emily'S Famous Banana Oat Muffins with 3 ripe bananas, mashed, 1 cup brown sugar, 1 egg, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 2 cups whole wheat flour, 1 cup rolled oats, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon ginger, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a 12 cup muffin pan with paper liners or coat with cooking spray. In a large bowl, stir together the bananas, brown sugar, egg, vanilla and oil. Combine the whole wheat flour, oats, cinnamon, ginger, baking powder and baking soda; stir into the banana mixture until blended. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin cups. Bake in the preheated oven until the tops spring back when lightly pressed, about 25 minutes. Cool for a few minutes in the pan before attempting to remove them.

input_text: I have sugar, lemon juice, milk, light cream, frozen grape juice concentrate. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Grape Ice Cream with 1 (12 ounce) can frozen grape juice concentrate, thawed, 2 1/2 cups sugar, 1/2 cup fresh lemon juice, 1 (12 ounce) can evaporated milk, 1 pint light cream or 1 pint half-and-half, 2 cups milk. Here's the instruction: Dissolve sugar in grape juice. Add lemon juice. Combine cream, evaporated milk, and milk. Pour mixture into a 1 gallon ice cream freezer and churn according to manufactorer's directions.

input_text: I have buttermilk, sour cream, cayenne pepper, onion, worcestershire sauce, clove garlic, ground white pepper, lime juice, dill, kosher salt, loose packed fresh italian, fresh cracked black pepper. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Spicy Ranch Dressing with 1 clove garlic, 1 1/2 teaspoons kosher salt, divided, 1 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup buttermilk, 1/4 cup loose packed fresh Italian flat-leaf parsley, 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, 1 teaspoon fresh cracked black pepper, 1 teaspoon dried dill, 1 teaspoon dehydrated onion flakes, 2 drops Worcestershire sauce, Pinch cayenne pepper, Pinch ground white pepper. Here's the instruction: Mince the garlic and then add 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt and mash with the edge of the knife until a paste is formed. Add this to a blender with the remaining ingredients. Puree and taste to adjust seasoning. Remove and place in a small bowl and refrigerate for 1 hour.

input_text: I have cumin, corn, milk, salt, pepper, cilantro, parmesan, chicken broth, fresh mozzarella, white wine, arborio rice, garlic, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mexican Cheesy Corn Risotto With Cilantro with 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 teaspoon cumin, 1 cup arborio rice, 1/4 cup white wine, 29 ounces chicken broth, 10 ounces frozen corn, thawed, 1/3 cup whole milk, 2 tablespoons freshly grated parmesan, 4 ounces fresh mozzarella, diced, 1/4 cup cilantro, minced, 1 pinch salt, to taste, 1 pinch pepper, to taste. Here's the instruction: In a heavy sauce pan melt butter over medium heat and add garlic and cumin, saute for 1 minute. Stir in rice and cook just until almost golden, stirring constantly about 3 to 5 minutes. Begin adding broth a ladle at a time, stirring constantly and allowing rice to almost dry out in between broth additions. This should take about 20 minutes. Add corn, reduce heat and cook another few minutes. Stir in whole milk, parmesan, mozzarella, cilantro, salt and pepper. Let warm through a few minutes and serve immediately.

input_text: I have eggplants, oil, onion, juice, lime, chilli. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Brinjal Sambol with 4 eggplants, 7 1/2 tablespoons onion, 1 chilli Fresh, 1 cup oil, 1/2 teaspoon juice, 1 lime. Here's the instruction: Wash the eggplant, then cut into fairly small dice. Chop the onion and chilli. Heat the oil and fry the eggplant until browned. Remove and drain. Place in a dish, add the onion, chilli, salt and lime juice and mix well.

input_text: I have lettuce leaves, apple cider, gelatin powder, apples, parsley, black walnuts, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Walnut Salad with 2 pkg. gelatin powder (unflavored), 2 c. apple cider, 1/4 tsp. salt, 2 c. apples, diced, 1/4 c. black walnuts, chopped, 1 Tbsp. chopped parsley, lettuce leaves. Here's the instruction: Put 1/2 cup cold water into a small bowl. Sprinkle two envelopes of unflavored gelatin on water. Let stand 5 to 10 minutes to soften. Heat 2 cups apple cider until very hot; add salt. Remove from heat and immediately add softened gelatin. Stir until gelatin is completely dissolved. Have a 1-quart mold lightly greased with cooking oil. Do not use olive oil. Spoon about 1/2 cup of gelatin mixture into mold and place in refrigerator. Chill remaining mixture until slightly thickened. Dice apples and chop walnuts and parsley. Add this to the gelatin and place into the mold which already has thin bottom layer of gelatin. Chill until set. Unmold onto serving plate which has been decorated with lettuce leaves. Yield: 6 servings. Carbohydrate 40.7 g, protein 2.6 g, fat .9 g, calories 174.6.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, nutella ganache, nutella, heavy cream, cream cheese, cookie crumbs, butter, cocoa powder. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make No Bake Nutella Cheesecake with 2 cups Oreo cookie crumbs (leave filling in Oreos), 4 tablespoons butter, melted, 24 ounces cream cheese, room temperature, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 1/2 cups nutella, 3 tablespoons cocoa powder, 8 ounces Cool Whip, nutella ganache, 1/2 cup nutella, 1/4 cup heavy cream. Here's the instruction: Combine Oreo crumbs with melted butter. Press crumbs into the bottom and halfway up the sides of a 9 inch pie pan. Set in refrigerator to firm. Beat cream cheese, sugar, vanilla extract, Nutella and cocoa powder together in a large bowl until smooth and well combined. Gently stir in the Cool Whip. Pour filling into crust and smooth the top. Refrigerate for about 4-6 hours or until firm. Remove cheesecake from springform pan and place on cake plate. To make the ganache, place the nutella into a medium bowl. Bring the cream to a boil in the microwave, then pour over the nutella. Whisk until smooth. Let the ganache to cool slightly and thicken before pouring over cheesecake. Sprinkle chopped Ferrero Rocher over the top of the cheesecake. Refrigerate until serving.

input_text: I have freshly ground salt, rosemary, thyme, couple, olive oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Joe'S Succulent Lamb Chump Steaks - (Need A Grill Of Some Sort)  with 2 x thick 300g/10 Oz Lamb Chump Steaks, Sprig of fresh Rosemary, Sprig of fresh Thyme, Couple of cloves of Garlic (2 per steak), Good quality Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Freshly ground Salt and Pepper. Here's the instruction: Finely chop the leaves from a couple of big twigs of the Rosemary, nice and minced.  Do the same with the Thyme.  Crush the Garlic, ideally run it through twice, to a pulp.  Scoop all into a small bowl and add a good few turns of the Pepper Mill, and add a couple of turns on the Salt Mill. Mix all together so you have a paste that's not too thick, add more Olive Oil if need be.  Rub the mixture over the steaks and leave for about an hour, overnight covered in the fridge would be great.  Heat up the Grillit/Grill/Barbeque - you want it really hot!  Press the steaks down and cook on each side for about 3-5 minutes per side, depending on how thick they are and how you like them done - A good tip is to use your thumb to test:- If the meat is soft and doesn't bounce back: it's rare, springy = medium, not springy = well done.  Once cooked to however you desire, remove to one side and leave to rest on a rack over a plate covered with foil for about 3-5 mins so that the juices can re-circulate and make to succulent lamb nice and tender and juicy.  Serve with any juice that has collected in plate, spooned over, some New Potatoes, and some Fresh Greens and a light bottle of good Red Wine, like a Pinot Noir.  Enjoy!

input_text: I have artichokes, tomatoes, lemon juice, fusilli pasta, thyme, capers, white wine, red onions, garlic, fresh basil, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fusilli with Artichokes, Capers and Sun-Dried Tomatoes with 1 lb. fusilli pasta, 3 Tbs. olive oil, 3 small red onions, thinly sliced, Salt and pepper to taste, 1 15-oz. can artichokes, rinsed well, drained and sliced, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1 Tbs. lemon juice, 3/4 cup white wine, 12 sun-dried tomatoes, rehydrated and sliced, 3 Tbs. rinsed capers, 2 Tbs. chopped fresh thyme, 6 Tbs. chopped fresh basil. Here's the instruction: Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, heat 2 Tbs. oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, salt and pepper; saute 2 minutes. Add artichokes, garlic and lemon juice; cook 5 minutes more. Add wine; cook until pan is almost dry, 5 to 7 minutes. Scoop out 1/4 cup pasta water; add to skillet along with sun-dried tomatoes, capers, remaining 1 Tbs. oil, thyme and basil. Cook until tomatoes are warmed through, about 3 minutes. Drain pasta, add to skillet and toss. Serve.

input_text: I have peanut dressing, sugar, mixed, soy sauce, green beans. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Green Beans With Peanut Dressing with 1/2 lb green beans, 1/2 teaspoon soy sauce, PEANUT DRESSING, 3 tablespoons sugar-free chunky peanut butter, 1/2 tablespoon sugar, 1/2 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon dashi (I use instant granules for this-about 1/4 teaspoon mixed in a tablespoon water). Here's the instruction: String the beans and cook uncovered in plenty of boiling water until they turn bright green. Do not overcook. Drain, spread out to cool. Cut diagonally into 1 inch (2cm) lengths. Sprinkle half a teaspoon soy sauce over the beans and stand for 10 minutes. Mix the beans into the dressing and serve. DRESSING: Mix the peanut butter, sugar, soy sauce and dashi well.

input_text: I have butter, sugar, pecans, egg whites. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sugared Pecans with 2 egg whites, 1 c. sugar, 1 lb. pecans (4 c.), coarsely chopped, 1/2 c. butter, melted. Here's the instruction: Beat egg whites until foamy. Gradually add sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time, beating until stiff peaks. Fold in pecans. Pour butter in 15 x 10-inch pan. Spread pecan mixture over. Bake at 325° for 30 minutes. Stir every 10 minutes; cool. Store in airtight container.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, egg yolk, salt, heavy cream, vanilla bean, light brown sugar, powdered sugar, chocolate chip cookies, chocolate, water, topping, flour, powdered gelatin, milk, chocolate chip cookie crust, filling, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Milk & Cookies Tart with Chocolate chip cookie crust, 6 tablespoons (85 g) unsalted butter, at room temperature, 1/2 cup (106 g) light brown sugar, 3/4 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 large egg yolk, 1 2/3 (201 g) all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon fine sea salt, 1/2 cup (90 g) fine chocolate chunks (or mini chocolate chips), Filling, 1/3 cup (76 g) cool water, 1 tablespoon powdered gelatin, 1 1/4 cups (290 g) heavy cream, divided, 1/3 cup (66 g) granulated sugar, 1 vanilla bean, halved and scraped (or 1 tablespoon vanilla extract), 3/4 cup (170 g) whole milk, Topping (optional), 1 cup (235 g) heavy cream, 1/3 cup (38 g) powdered sugar, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 12 to 15 mini chocolate chip cookies (such as Tate's). Here's the instruction: Lightly grease a 9-inch tart pan with nonstick spray and place on a baking sheet. Make sure you have room in your freezer and fridge to place the tart pan later. In the bowl of an electric mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, cream the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy, 3 to 4 minutes. Add the vanilla and egg yolk and mix to combine. Add the flour and salt and mix until the dough comes together and is uniform. The mixture should look like a stiff chocolate chip cookie dough - if it seems dry or crumbly, add a little milk (1 tablespoon at a time) until it comes together. Add the chocolate chunks and mix to combine. Press the dough into the prepared tart pan into an even layer - take special care to make sure the sides of the tart dough and the corner (where the sides meet the base) aren't too thick. Using a small measuring cup can help you get into those corners and ensure it's even. Place the tart pan into the freezer while you preheat the oven to 350°F. Press the tines of a fork all over the chilled dough to dock it. Bake until the crust is lightly golden brown and fully baked, 20 to 24 minutes. Cool completely. When the crust is cool, make the filling. Place the cool water in a small bowl, and sprinkle the gelatin over it. Let it sit for 5 minutes. Heat 1 cup of the heavy cream, sugar, and the vanilla bean and scrapings in a medium pot, stirring until the sugar is dissolved, 1 to 2 minutes. Add the bloomed gelatin and heat until the mixture melts completely, about 1 minute. Place the hot liquid into a large vessel with a pour spout (such as a 4 cup liquid measuring cup), and stir in the remaining 1/4 cup cream and the milk, stirring well to combine. Remove the vanilla bean (if using vanilla extract instead of the bean, stir it in now). Pour the filling into the cooled crust, and gently transfer to the refrigerator. Chill until the filling is totally set, at least 1 hour, and up to 8 hours. The tart is now ready to serve, or you can add the optional topping. In an electric mixer fitted with the whip attachment, whip the cream, powdered sugar, and vanilla to medium peaks. Spread the cream on top of the tart, and decorate with mini chocolate chip cookies.

input_text: I have brownie mix, cold milk. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make White Chocolate Pudding Poke Brownies with 1 pkg. (19.8 oz.) brownie mix, 1-1/2 cups cold milk, 1 pkg. (4-serving size) JELL-O White Chocolate Flavor Instant Pudding. Here's the instruction: Prepare and bake brownie mix in 8- or 9-inch square baking pan as directed on package. Remove from oven. Immediately poke holes through brownies to bottom of pan using round handle of wooden spoon. (Holes should be at 1-inch intervals.) Pour cold milk into large bowl. Add pudding mix. Beat with wire whisk 30 seconds. Immediately pour thin pudding mixture over warm brownies into holes to make stripes and over top of brownies to cover surface. Refrigerate at least 1 hour or until ready to serve. Store brownies, covered, in refrigerator.

input_text: I have strawberry, pecans, buttermilk, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Buttermilk Salad with 6 oz. strawberry Jell-O, 1 large can pineapple, crushed, 2 c. buttermilk, 12 oz. Cool Whip, 1/2 c. pecans, chopped. Here's the instruction: Combine in saucepan the Jell-O and pineapple. Heat until dissolved. Let cool, then add the buttermilk, Cool Whip and pecans. Put in refrigerator until set.

input_text: I have tomatoes, onion salt, garlic salt, thyme, beans, marjoram, beef. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chili Bean Soup with 1 pound pink beans uncooked, 1 teaspoon garlic salt, 1 teaspoon onion salt, 1/4 teaspoon thyme, 1/4 teaspoon marjoram, 10 ounces beef stock or chicken broth, 16 ounces tomatoes, stewed, canned, 58 ounce chili seasoning mix. Here's the instruction: Soak beans by the preferred method. (For each pound of California dry beans add 10 cups hot water. You may add up to 2 teaspoons of salt per pound of beans to help the beans absorb water more evenly. Heat to boiling, let boil 2 to 3 minutes. Remove from heat, cover and set aside for at least 1 hour, but preferably 4 hours or more. The longer soaking time is recommended to allow a greater amount of sugars to dissolve, thus helping the beans to be more easily digested. Always discard the soak water.) Drain and empty them into a large pot. Add 6 to 8 cups boiling water, garlic and onion salt, thyme, marjoram. Cover and simmer until beans are tender (2 1/2 to 3 hours.) Don't let beans boil dry. Add hot water as needed. Spoon out 3 cups of the cooked beans to use another day in another way. Mash rest of beans with their liquid. Add remaining ingredients, plus 1 cup hot water. Heat at least 10 minutes to blend flavors.

input_text: I have oil, peach jelly, salsa, pork, taco seasoning mix, rice. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Peachy Pork Picante Over Rice with 1 lb. pork, cut into cubes, 2 tsp. oil, 1/3 c. peach jelly, 1 Tbsp. taco seasoning mix, 1 (8 oz.) salsa, rice, cooked. Here's the instruction: Coat pork with taco seasoning mix; brown in oil. Add salsa and peach jelly. Simmer 15 to 20 minutes. Serve over rice.

input_text: I have oleo, warm water, sugar, marshmallows, nutmeg, eggs, cinnamon, raisins, milk, sweet potatoes, allspice, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sweet Potato Pudding with 1/2 c. raisins, 1/2 c. warm water, 4 c. grated raw sweet potatoes, 1 1/2 c. sugar, 1 c. milk, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. nutmeg, 1 tsp. allspice, 2 eggs, beaten, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/2 stick melted oleo, marshmallows (if desired). Here's the instruction: Soak raisins in warm water. Place sweet potatoes in large bowl and add sugar, milk, spices, eggs, salt and butter. Mix well. Drain raisins and add to mixture. Place in greased casserole and bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours or until set. During last part of cooking, marshmallows may be added on top to brown.

input_text: I have chicken, pepper, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Grilled Chicken With Orange-Jalapeño Glaze with 10 skinned chicken thighs (about 3 lb.), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper. Here's the instruction: Remove and reserve 1 cup Orange-Jalapeno Glaze. Rinse chicken, and pat dry. Sprinkle evenly with salt and pepper. Brush chicken lightly with remaining 2/3 cup Orange-Jalapeno Glaze. Grill, covered with grill lid, over medium-high heat (350° to 400°) 8 to 10 minutes on each side or until a meat thermometer inserted into thickest portion registers 180°, basting each side with reserved 1 cup glaze during last few minutes.

input_text: I have sugar, milk, eggs, cinnamon, pumpkin, pie crust, pumpkin pie spice, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pumpkin Pie with 1 Nutty Pie Crust, 1 1/4 c. pumpkin, 1/3 c. Sugar Twin, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. pumpkin pie spice, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 2 eggs, slightly beaten, 1 1/2 c. canned evaporated skim milk. Here's the instruction: Combine pumpkin, Sugar Twin and spices until well blended. Stir in eggs until mixed thoroughly. Add in milk a little at a time and blend well. Pour into pie shell and bake at 400° for about 40 minutes or until knife inserted into center comes out clean.

input_text: I have potatoes, sugar, shortening, eggs, water, flour, yeast, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Easy Potato Rolls with 2/3 c. shortening, 2/3 c. sugar, 2 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 c. mashed potatoes, 2 eggs, 2 pkg. yeast, 1 1/3 c. warm water, 6 to 6 1/2 c. flour. Here's the instruction: Cream shortening, gradually add sugar and beat until fluffy. Add salt, potatoes and eggs and beat until smooth. Dissolve yeast in 2/3 cup warm water. Stir; add to potato mixture along with other 2/3 cup warm potato water. Stir to make a soft dough, knead and place in well-oiled bowl. Cover and let rise until double in bulk, about 1 1/2 hours. Shape into rolls or loaves; let rise again until doubled. Bake in 375° oven for 20 to 25 minutes. Remove from oven and brush with butter. Yields about 45 rolls.

input_text: I have red wine vinegar, bread, sugar, tomatoes, philadelphia, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Tomato and Herb Bruschetta with 2 large tomatoes, sliced Safeway 1 lb For $1.29 thru 02/09, 2 teaspoons red wine vinegar, 1/2 teaspoon sugar, salt and pepper, to taste, 6 thick slices bread, 125g PHILADELPHIA Light Spreadable Garlic & Herb. Here's the instruction: Combine tomatoes with vinegar, sugar, salt and pepper. Toast bread slices until golden. Spread bread with some Philly*, top with tomato mixture and serve.

input_text: I have sugar, warm milk, shortening, eggs, water, flour, yeast, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Rolls with 7 c. flour, 2 c. warm milk, 1 c. water (warm), 2 eggs, 1 1/4 tsp. salt, 3/4 c. sugar, 4 Tbsp. shortening, 3 pkg. dry yeast or 1 cake yeast. Here's the instruction: Cream shortening, sugar, salt and eggs. Then add your yeast to warm water (stir; let set). Then add milk and yeast mixture to first ingredients. Add flour and knead. Put in greased bowl and let it rise double in size, then mix into roll. Let rise and bake at 400° for 15 minutes or make pizza shells and bake at 350° for 10 minutes.

input_text: I have spaghetti, oregano, tomato paste, onion soup, parsley flakes, sweet basil, ground meat, boiling water, tomato sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Spaghetti Bravissimo with 1 envelope Lipton onion soup mix, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. spaghetti, 1 1/2 qt. boiling water, 1 lb. ground meat, 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce, 1 (7 oz.) can tomato paste, 1 Tbsp. parsley flakes, 1 tsp. oregano, 1/2 tsp. sweet basil. Here's the instruction: In a large saucepan, combine soup mix and spaghetti with water. Cook 20 minutes or until spaghetti is tender. Do not drain! In a large skillet, brown meat. Stir in tomato sauce and paste, parsley, oregano and basil. Add to spaghetti and heat through. Great for fixing after work!

input_text: I have sour cream, noodles, cream of mushroom soup, onion, turkey, milk, paprika. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Turkey Stroganoff Casserole with 2 Tbsp. chopped onion, 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup, 1/2 c. sour cream, 1/4 c. milk, 2 c. cooked noodles, 1 1/2 c. diced, cooked turkey, 1/2 tsp. paprika. Here's the instruction: In a 1-quart casserole, blend onion, soup, sour cream and milk. Stir in remaining ingredients. Bake in a 350° oven for 35 minutes. Serves 4.

input_text: I have vinegar, sugar, ginger, green peppers, soy sauce, onion, flour, carrot, mackerel. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Easy Horse Mackerel Escabeche In Nanban Sauce with 15 Horse mackerel, 1 thumb Ginger, 1/2 Carrot, 1 Onion, 2 Green peppers, 200 ml Vinegar, 160 ml Sugar, 100 ml Soy sauce, 1 as required Plain flour (for deep-frying the fish). Here's the instruction: Prepare the fish (gut and remove the scales). Clean the cavity well with running water. Slice the onion. Julienne the carrot, green pepper and ginger. Place the seasoning ingredients and Step 2 vegetables except the green peppers in a pot. Place the pot over a low heat. Do not boil at this point! Once Step 2 vegetables are tender, add the green peppers. Continue to cook for a little while and turn off the heat. Pat dry the horse mackerel with kitchen paper. Coat with flour evenly. Deep-fry the horse mackerel in the oil (about medium temperature) slowly. Do not overcook, otherwise the fish flesh will be tough. By deep-frying the fish slowly, you can even eat the bones easily. Drain off the oil and marinate in Step 4 while it is hot. Arrange the fish without any gaps as shown in this photo. Pour the sauce and vegetables on top (in that order). Chill in the fridge for at least half a day. The bones will soften and you can eat the whole fish.

input_text: I have egg, chili powder, regular endive, mustard powder, stalks celery, cherry tomatoes, extra-virgin olive oil, scallions, fresh chervil, celery, celery seeds, kosher salt, lump crabmeat, dill pickles, lemon juice, boston lettuce, crackers, lemon, hot sauce, mayonnaise, parsley, worcestershire sauce, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Crab Cakes With Herb Salad with 24 saltine crackers, crushed into coarse crumbs (about 1 cup), 1 large egg, beaten, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, 1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley, 1 tablespoon minced celery leaves, 1/4 teaspoon celery seeds, 1 teaspoon mustard powder, 1/4 teaspoon chili powder, Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper, 1 pound jumbo lump crabmeat, picked over, 6 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted, 1 cup mayonnaise, Juice of 1/2 lemon, 3 tablespoons minced dill pickles, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 teaspoon hot sauce, 2 scallions, minced, Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper, 1 large head Boston lettuce, cut into chunks, 4 heads red or regular endive, quartered lengthwise, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 4 inner stalks celery, leaves coarsely chopped, stems diced, 4 scallions, halved lengthwise and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces, 1/2 cup fresh chervil, tarragon and/or dill (leaves and tender stems), 1/2 cup fresh parsley leaves, 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper. Here's the instruction: Make the crab cakes: Place half of the cracker crumbs in a large bowl. Drizzle in the egg, then stir in the mayonnaise, Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, parsley, celery leaves, celery seeds, mustard powder, chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and pepper to taste. Gently fold in the crabmeat. Form into six 3-inch-wide patties (about 1/2 cup crab mixture each). Spread the remaining cracker crumbs on a plate; press the crab cakes in the crumbs on both sides and around the edges. Transfer to a baking sheet. Cover and refrigerate until firm, 2 to 6 hours. Make the sauce: Mix the mayonnaise, lemon juice, pickles, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce and scallions in a small bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. Position a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat to 450 degrees F. Brush the crab cakes with the 6 tablespoons melted butter and bake until golden, 15 to 20 minutes. Meanwhile, make the salad: Gently toss the lettuce, endive, tomatoes, celery, scallions, chervil and parsley in a large bowl; drizzle with the olive oil, season with salt and pepper and toss again. Serve with the crab cakes and sauce. Photograph by Anna Williams

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, eggs, chocolate, rum, milk, cream, egg yolks. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chocolate Ice Cream with 2 whole eggs, 2 egg yolks, 1/2 cup sugar (or to taste), 1 cup milk, 1 cup cream, 2 ounces (two squares) unsweetened chocolate, 1 tablespoon rum, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract. Here's the instruction: Beat together the eggs, egg yolks and sugar until thoroughly blended. This may be done in a food processor. Meanwhile, heat the milk and the cream with the chocolate, rum and vanilla extract, stirring frequently, until just below boiling. Remove from heat and add a little at a time to the egg mixture, blending until smooth. Correct the sweetness of the mixture. Pour the mixture into the saucepan of a double-boiler and place over very hot water on a medium flame. (You can also use a thick saucepan placed on an iron trivet over a low flame.) Cook over low heat until thick and creamy. Cool. Place the mixture in an ice-cream maker and follow the manufacturer's directions. (If you do not have an ice-cream maker, place the mixture in a freezer tray, cover with foil and freeze at the refrigerator's coldest setting, stirring every so often to prevent ice crystals from forming.)

input_text: I have sugar, hot chili oil, chinese five spice powder, rotini, margarine, walnuts, pods. Give me some cooking ideas.
