Fill the liners 2/3rd's of the way full (I just use an regular sized ice cream scoop). Bake for 18-22 minutes or until a toothpick is inserted and comes out clean. Then remove them from the oven and allow them to cool. For the frosting: Put the 15 Oreos in a large plastic bag and hammer them with a mallet (you could also use a food processor) until crumb-like, set aside. In a large bowl, use a mixer to beat the butter until smooth. Add the sugar in a little at a time, mixing until incorporated. Add the vanilla and a teaspoon of milk. Fold in the Oreo crumbs, adding additional teaspoons of milk until it forms a smooth consistency. Frost the cupcakes, garnish with an Oreo, and enjoy!

input_text: I have egg, sugar, baking powder, pepper, green onions, cornmeal, cheddar cheese, sweet-tart apples, onion, celery, flour, chicken broth, turkey, parsley, milk, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Turkey Pot Pie With Cheese-Cornbread Topping with 3 tablespoons butter, 1 onion, chopped, 2 celery ribs, chopped, 2 sweet-tart apples, cored and chopped, 14 cup all-purpose flour, 3 cups sodium-reduced chicken broth or 3 cups turkey broth, 12 cup milk, 3 cups chopped turkey, 3 turkey, sausages cooked and sliced, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 14 teaspoon pepper, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup cornmeal, 1 cup shredded old cheddar cheese, 2 green onions, thinly sliced, 1 tablespoon granulated sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 cup milk, 1 egg, 3 tablespoons butter, melted and cooled, 14 teaspoon salt, 1 pinch pepper. Here's the instruction: In Dutch oven, melt butter over medium heat; cook onion and celery, stirring occasionally, until celery begins to soften, 6 to 8 minutes. Add apples; cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Add flour; cook, stirring, for 1 minute. Stir in broth and milk; cook, stirring, for 5 minutes. Stir in turkey, sausages, parsley and pepper; cook, stirring often, until sauce is thick enough to coat back of spoon, 10 to 12 minutes. Pour into 12-cup (3 L) casserole dish. Cheese-Cornbread Topping: In bowl, whisk together flour, cornmeal, cheese, green onions, sugar and baking powder. Whisk together milk, egg, butter, salt and pepper; stir into cornmeal mixture. Spoon over casserole and spread evenly. Bake in 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) oven until lightly golden, 32 to 35 minutes.

input_text: I have sour cream, chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, fresh mushrooms, stuffing, chicken broth. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken Dressing Casserole with 2 cans cream of mushroom soup, 1 c. clear chicken broth, 3/4 pkg. (large) Pepperidge Farm stuffing, 1 lb. fresh mushrooms, 1 pt. sour cream, 3 large chicken breasts. Here's the instruction: *Stew chicken. Strain and save broth. Remove skin and bones and break meat into pieces. Place on bottom of a 9 x 12-inch greased glass pan. Saute mushrooms in a little of the broth. Mix mushrooms, soup and sour cream together. Place on top of chicken. Mix stuffing with 1/2 pound melted butter or margarine and 1 cup broth. Place on top of casserole. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes or until dressing is browned.

input_text: I have sugar, light corn syrup, vanilla, eggs, chocolate, water, flour, butter, egg yolks. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Molten Chocolate Dessert with 5 ounces semisweet chocolate, 10 tablespoons unsalted butter, 3 eggs, 3 egg yolks, 1 12 cups confectioners' sugar, 12 cup flour, 4 12 ounces semisweet chocolate, chopped, 2 ounces unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 13 cup hot water, 14 cup light corn syrup, 34 teaspoon vanilla. Here's the instruction: For the Sauce: Melt the chocolate in a double boiler. Add remaining ingredients and whisk until smooth. You can make the sauce up to two days ahead of time and just cover it and chill until ready to use. Otherwise, just set aside. For the cakes: Preheat oven to 450. Butter 6 small souffle cups (3/4 c/ size). Stir the two chocolates and the butter over low heat until melted. Cool slightly. Whisk eggs and extra yolks in a bowl. Whisk in confect. sugar (I usually sift first),the melted chocolate and flour. Pour batter into souffle dishes. Bake until sides are set but center is still soft and gooey- about 11 minutes. Do not overbake! Run a small knife around edges to loosen and immediately turn out onto individual dessert plates. Spoon some of the warm sauce around the cake and add a dollop of vanilla ice cream.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, baking powder, almond flavoring, eggs, flour, margarine, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Coffee Cake with 1 c. margarine, 1 3/4 c. sugar, 4 eggs, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. almond flavoring, 3 c. flour, 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1 tsp. salt, 1 can pie filling. Here's the instruction: Cream margarine and sugar. Beat eggs and flavorings, add to mixture. Mix well. Add dry ingredients. Spread half of mixture into greased pan. Pour in pie filling, then remaining batter. Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes.

input_text: I have cayenne, brown sugar, ketchup, cider vinegar, vegetable oil, worcestershire sauce, black coffee. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Blue Mountain Barbecue Sauce with 1 12 cups ketchup, 1 cup strong black coffee, 14 cup brown sugar, 14 cup cider vinegar, 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 12 teaspoon cayenne. Here's the instruction: In saucepan, combine all ingredients. Bring to a boil, stirring to dissolve sugar. Reduce heat and simmer until thickened, 5-10 minutes. Let cool before using as a marinade.

input_text: I have brown sugar, onion, madeira, water, ham, recipe secrets onion soup mix, parsley finely, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Onion-Glaze Baked Ham with 1 envelope lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix, 1 cup water, 1/3 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 1/4 cup Madeira or sherry, 2 tablespoons i can't believe it's not butter! spread, 1 tablespoon chopped parsley finely, 5 1/2 ham, 1 pound onion. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 375°. Blend Lipton(R) Recipe Secrets(R) Onion Soup Mix, water, sugar, wine, Spread and parsley in small bowl; set aside. Arrange ham in roasting pan. Score (lightly cut) fat with knife in diamond pattern; top with soup mixture. Arrange shallots around ham. Bake, stirring shallots and basting ham occasionally, 60 minutes or until golden brown.

input_text: I have pouring cream, water, caster sugar, almonds, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Toffee Nuts with 1 cup caster sugar, 1/2 cup water, 20 g butter, 1/2 cup pouring cream, 1 cup mixed nuts like almonds, walnuts and pecans. Here's the instruction: Place sugar and water In small pot over medium heat. Stir to dissolve sugar, bring to the boil. Cook 8 - 10 minutes or till dark golden. Remove from heat, carefully add butter and cream. Stir to combine. Add nuts and stir. Spoon immediately over a pound cake and serve.

input_text: I have dates, strawberries, butter, chocolate. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Medjool Date Truffles With Cashew Butter And Dark Chocolate with 12 Natural Delights Medjool Dates, pitted, 1/2 cup Cashew Butter, 4 ounces Dark Chocolate (at least 73% cacao), melted, 2-3 Strawberries, for garnish (optional). Here's the instruction: Pit the Medjool dates carefully by slicing lengthwise and removing the pit. Pinch the date a little to create a small cavity. Using a teaspoon, spoon a little cashew butter into each date. Press gently closed. Roll each date in the melted dark chocolate until thinly coated. Use caution with the heated chocolate. Place each date on wax paper to cool. Optional: After the chocolate has set, add a slice of strawberry to each truffle. Refrigerate for at least an hour before serving.

input_text: I have baking powder, sugar, milk, unsalted butter, baking soda, cinnamon, light brown sugar, eggs, flour, pumpkin puree, polenta, pumpkin pie spice, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pumpkin Polenta Cake with 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 cup unsalted butter, 1 cup light brown sugar, 1 cup granulated sugar, 3 large eggs, 1 cup canned pumpkin puree, 1 cup medium polenta (cornmeal), 1/3 cup milk. Here's the instruction: Adjust rack to lower third of oven; preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour a 10-inch angel food tube pan. For best results, have all ingredients at room temperature. Sift together the flour, spices, baking powder, baking soda and salt; set aside. Using an electric mixer, preferably with a paddle attachment, beat the butter at medium speed until creamy and smooth. Add the brown and granulated sugars; beat until light. Add the eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition. Reduce mixer speed to low; add the pumpkin puree and polenta. Add the flour mixture to the pumpkin mixture alternately with the milk, ending with the dry ingredients, and stir just until well blended. Pour the batter into the prepared pan, spreading it evenly. Bake for 55 to 65 minutes, or until a cake tester comes out free of raw batter. Remove the pan from the oven and place on a wire rack. Let the cake cool in the pan for about 10 minutes. Invert the cake onto the wire rack; remove the cake pan. Let the cake cool completely before slicing.

input_text: I have kidney beans, sugar, bell pepper, black pepper, onion, white vinegar, green beans, beans, garlic, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bean Salad with 1 can cut green beans, drained, 1 can cut yellow wax beans, drained, 1 can kidney beans, drained, 1 bell pepper, sliced thin, 1 medium onion, sliced thin, 3/4 c. sugar, 1 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. black pepper, 1/3 c. olive oil, 2/3 c. white vinegar, garlic salt. Here's the instruction: Drain beans thoroughly. In large bowl, combine all beans and toss lightly with onion and bell pepper. Dissolve sugar in vinegar. Add salts, pepper and oil; mix well. Pour dressing over beans; mix to coat well. Refrigerate 2 to 3 hours or overnight.

input_text: I have oil, sugar, cake mix, eggs, chocolate chips. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cake Mix Cookies with 1 box cake mix (any flavor), 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. oil, 2 beaten eggs, 1 c. chocolate chips or nuts (your choice). Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients and drop by spoonfuls on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes at 350 degrees. Serve warm.

input_text: I have black pepper, beef stock condensed, tomato paste, noodles, mushrooms, flour, shallots, red wine, beef, worcestershire sauce, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Slow Cooker Beef Tips with 1/2 cup flour, all-purpose, 1 teaspoon salt, 18 teaspoon black pepper, 4 pounds beef or sirloin tips, 1/2 cup shallots or green onions, chopped, 2 each mushrooms, canned sliced, 4 oz cans, drained OR 1/2 lb fresh, sliced, 1 each beef stock condensed, 10 1/2 oz can, 1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce, 2 teaspoons tomato paste or ketchup, 1/4 cup red wine dry, 3 tablespoons flour, all-purpose, 1 x noodles cooked, hot, buttered. Here's the instruction: Combine 1/2 cup flour with the salt and pepper and toss with beef cubes to coat throughly. Place in crockpot. Add shallots and mushrooms. Combine beef broth, worcestershire sauce and tomato paste. Pour over beef and vegetables; stir well. Cover and cook on Low for 8 to 12 hours or on High for 4 to 6 hours. One hour before serving, turn to High setting. Make a smooth paste of red wine and 3 tablespoons flour; stir into crockpot, mixing well. Cover and cook until thickened. Serve over hot buttered noodles.

input_text: I have cinnamon, sugar. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cinnamon Sugar with 1/4 cup granulated sugar, 4 teaspoons cinnamon. Here's the instruction: Stir sugar with cinnamon. Place funnel over spice bottle with shaker lid; carefully pour in cinnamon sugar.

input_text: I have green chilies, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, onion, water, taco seasoning, turkey, pinto beans, tomato sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mexican Lasagna(Low Calorie)   with 12 oz. cooked turkey, 1 pkg. taco seasoning, 1/2 c. chopped onion, 1/2 c. green chilies, 1/2 c. water, 1 c. tomato sauce, 8 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese, 8 oz. cooked pinto beans, 8 oz. flour tortillas, torn in pieces. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°. Mix together cooked meat and onion. Saute in skillet sprayed with nonstick cooking spray. Stir in beans, tomato sauce, chilies, taco seasoning and water. Layer half of the tortillas in a sprayed casserole dish. Pour half of the meat mixture over the tortillas. Sprinkle half of the cheese. Repeat layer. Bake for 30 minutes. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. Serves 8.

input_text: I have sugar, unsweetened cocoa, vanilla, eggs, baking soda, applesauce, water, flour, walnuts, semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chocolate Tea Bread with 1 3/4 c. flour, 1 c. sugar, 1/2 c. applesauce, 1/3 c. unsweetened cocoa, 1/3 c. soft butter, 1/3 c. water, 2 eggs, 1 tsp. baking soda, 3/4 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. vanilla, 1/2 c. chopped walnuts, 1/3 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°. Grease a 9 x 5-inch loaf pan. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, applesauce, cocoa, butter, water, eggs, baking soda, salt and vanilla. Beat on low speed scraping bowl occasionally for 3 minutes. Stir in walnuts and chocolate chips. Pour into pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until done. Remove from pan and cool.

input_text: I have red wine vinegar, ground cumin, pepper, water, carrots, parsley, paprika, garlic, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cooked Carrot Salad with 8 carrots, 1 cup water, 1 garlic clove, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, 1 tablespoon parsley, minced (flat leafed variety), salt, pepper, freshly ground. Here's the instruction: Wash, scrape and slice carrots into 1/4 inch thick rounds. Bring water to a boil in a heavy saucepan. Add carrots and garlic, cover, and cook about 15 minutes, or until tender (but still firm). Drain carrots and place in serving bowl. Mix remaining ingredients and pour over the carrots. Toss, then cover with plastic wrap and set aside for about 30 minutes before serving at room temperature.

input_text: I have baking pwdr, baking soda, cinnamon, eggs, flour, milk, almonds, whole wheat flour, canola oil oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Almond Pancakes (Callan) Recipe with 1 c. Whole wheat flour, cake or possibly pastry, 1 c. Unbleached flour, all-purpose, 2 tsp Baking pwdr, 1/2 tsp Baking soda, 1/2 tsp Salt, 1 tsp Grnd cinnamon, 3/4 c. Grnd almonds, see directions, 2 lrg Large eggs, 2 1/2 c. 1% low-fat lowfat milk, 2 tsp Almond extract, 2 Tbsp. Canola oil Oil, for cooking Maple syrup, for serving. Here's the instruction: Optional: toast the almonds in a 325F oven for 7 to 10 min stirring several times. Let cold awhile. Then grind the nuts into a fine pwdr (to yield 3/4 c.). Stir together the flours, baking pwdr, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and grnd almonds in a medium-size mixing bowl. In another bowl, beat the Large eggs with lowfat milk, almond extract and oil. Pour the wet into the dry ingredients, stirring just till blended. Prepare a griddle or possibly skillet with butter, margarine, oil, or possibly spray over medium heat. Cook the pancakes about 3 to 4 min on the first side, and 1 or possibly 2 min on the other. Transfer to a hot plate for holding. Makes 9

input_text: I have beef gravy, brown sugar, ground beef burgers, onions, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Salisbury Burger Patties With Caramelized Onions with 3 tablespoons butter or 3 tablespoons margarine, 1 tablespoon packed brown sugar, 2 cups sliced onions (2 medium), 4 (4 -5 ounce) ground beef burgers (4 to 5 oz. each), 1 (12 ounce) jar beef gravy. Here's the instruction: In 12-inch skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Stir in brown sugar. Add onions; cook 12 to 16 minutes, stirring occasionally, until onions begin to turn golden brown. Place onions in medium bowl; cover to keep warm. In same skillet, cook beef patties over medium heat 6 to 8 minutes, turning once, until meat thermometer inserted in center of patties reads 160 degrees. Return onions to skillet; pour grav over onions and patties. Cook 2 to 3 minutes longer, stirring once or twice, until gravy is throughly heated. If desired, sprinkle with chopped fresh parsley.

input_text: I have black beans, oregano, ground cumin, egg, black pepper, red onion, bread crumbs. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Black Bean Burgers with 1 can black beans, rinsed and drained, 1/2 c. dry bread crumbs, 1/4 c. minced red onion, 1/2 tsp. dried oregano, 1/4 tsp. ground cumin, 1/3 tsp. black pepper, 1 large egg. Here's the instruction: Place beans in large bowl. Partially mash with a fork. Stir in bread crumbs and next 6 ingredients. Divide mixture into 4 equal portions and shape into patty.

input_text: I have fresh parsley, crackers, parmesan cheese, heavy whipping cream, garlic. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Parmesan Truffles with 3/4 cup heavy whipping cream, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 2 cups grated Parmesan cheese, Additional grated Parmesan cheese, minced fresh parsley, Assorted crackers. Here's the instruction: In a large saucepan, bring cream and garlic just to a boil, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat to low; stir in cheese, 1/2 cup at a time, until smooth. Transfer to a bowl; cool to room temperature, stirring occasionally. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until firm. Shape into 3/4-in. balls; roll in additional cheese and/or parsley. Serve with crackers.

input_text: I have sugar, blocks baker, water, cornstarch, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Dobash Frosting with 1 1/2 blocks Baker's unsweetened chocolate, 1 c. sugar, 1 Tbsp. butter, 3 Tbsp. cornstarch, 1 c. water. Here's the instruction: Soften cornstarch with a little of the 1 cup water. In a saucepan, melt the chocolate in the remaining water. Add sugar and butter, stirring until dissolved. Add the cornstarch mixture; boil until it thickens. Makes enough frosting for a 9 x 13-inch cake.

input_text: I have cream of chicken soup, velveeta cheese, cauliflower, rice, chicken. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken Vegetable Casserole with 1 large chicken, cooked and boned, 1 c. rice, 1 pkg. cauliflower, carrot and broccoli medley, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1 c. Velveeta cheese, cubed. Here's the instruction: Cut chicken into small pieces. Cook rice (this will make 3 cups of rice) and vegetable medley separately according to package directions. Combine all ingredients in large casserole dish. Place in 350° oven and heat until cheese is melted and is bubbly.

input_text: I have egg white, sour cream, sugar, vanilla, egg yolk, cold butter, flour, coconut, almonds, almond extract, seedless raspberry jam. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Raspberry-Almond Crescent Cookies with 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup cold butter, cubed, 1 large egg yolk, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup seedless raspberry jam, 3/4 cup sweetened shredded coconut, 1/3 cup finely chopped almonds, 1/4 teaspoon almond extract, 1 large egg white, lightly beaten, Coarse sugar. Here's the instruction: Place flour in a large bowl; cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. In another bowl, whisk egg yolk, sour cream and vanilla until smooth; stir into flour mixture. Divide dough into four portions. Shape each into a disk; wrap in plastic. Refrigerate 30 minutes or until firm. Preheat oven to 350°. In a small bowl, mix raspberry jam, coconut, almonds and extract until blended. On a well-sugared surface, roll each portion of dough into a 10-in. circle. Spread about 1/3 cup filling over circles. Cut each into 12 wedges. Roll up wedges from the wide ends. Place 1 in. apart on parchment paper-lined , point side down; curve to form crescents. Brush with egg white; sprinkle with coarse sugar. Bake 15-18 minutes or until set (do not brown). Remove from pans to wire racks to cool.

input_text: I have pepper, parmesan cheese, cracker crumbs, parsley, chicken, garlic, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Ritzy Chicken with 2 c. Ritz cracker crumbs, 3/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese, 1/4 c. chopped parsley (fresh or dried), 2 tsp. salt, 1/8 tsp. pepper, 1/8 tsp. minced garlic or garlic powder, 1 c. butter, melted, 8 to 10 boneless chicken breast halves. Here's the instruction: Blend crumbs, cheese, parsley, salt, pepper and garlic. Place in shallow dish. Dip each chicken piece in butter and then roll in crumb mixture. Arrange in shallow foil-lined pan. Drizzle remaining butter over chicken. Bake uncovered at 350° for 1 hour. (Do not turn.)

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, eggs, cornstarch, milk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Grandma Drake'S Ice Cream with 2 qt. milk (use cream for richer ice cream), 3 eggs, 1/4 c. cornstarch, 1/4 tsp. salt, 2 1/2 c. sugar, 2 1/2 Tbsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Combine sugar, salt and cornstarch. Mix well. Scald milk (heat just to boiling point), remove from heat. Slowly add scalded milk to sugar mixture stirring constantly. Beat eggs. Add about 1 cup of hot milk mixture to beaten eggs. Add egg mixture to remaining milk mixture, stirring constantly. Cook over low heat stirring constantly until smooth and begins to thicken. Remove from heat. Add vanilla and cool in refrigerator. When cool, pour into 1 gallon freezer. Pack with 4 parts ice and 1 part coarse salt around container. Turn freezer, add salt and ice as needed. Takes about 30 minutes; 15 minutes in electric freezer.

input_text: I have beef tenderloin, soy sauce, lemon juice, dipping sauce, marinade, fish sauce, sesame oil, cabernet sauvignon, ground black pepper, oyster sauce, garlic, olive oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Asian Garlic Beef Cubes (Vietnamese Bo Luc Lac Or Shaking Beef) with 1 1/2 pounds beef tenderloin, cut into cubes, Marinade:, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons oyster sauce (such as Maekrua(R)), 4 large cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste, 1 tablespoon Cabernet Sauvignon wine, 1 teaspoon fish sauce, 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or more to taste, 1 teaspoon soy sauce (optional), 1 teaspoon dark soy sauce (optional), 2 drops sesame oil, or more to taste, Dipping Sauce:, 1 tablespoon fish sauce (optional), 1 tablespoon lemon juice (optional), 1 tablespoon ground black pepper (optional), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons oyster sauce (such as Maekrua(R)), 4 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste. Here's the instruction: Put beef cubes in a container with a lid. Whisk 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons oyster sauce, 4 minced garlic cloves, wine, 1 teaspoon fish sauce, 1 teaspoon black pepper, soy sauce, dark soy sauce, and sesame oil together in a bowl until marinade is well mixed; pour over beef. Allow beef to marinate, 10 to 30 minutes. Whisk 1 tablespoon fish sauce, lemon juice, and 1 tablespoon black pepper together in a bowl until dipping sauce is well mixed. Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat; add beef and marinade. Cook and stir beef mixture, 2 tablespoons oyster sauce, and 4 cloves minced garlic together in hot oil until beef is cooked through and sauce begins to thicken, 5 to 10 minutes. Adding garlic over several times during cooking will produce a better mix of flavors. Serve beef alongside dipping sauce.

input_text: I have eggs, lava cake, water. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Dr Oetker Lava Cake Mix Chocolate Raspberry (Nuwave/Flavorwave) with 12 ounces lava cake mix, 2 eggs, 3 tablespoons hot water. Here's the instruction: In mixing bowl combine, lava cake mix, 2 eggs & water. Mix together well. In 4 cup cake tin (included) - pour 3/4 full. Place in Nuwave/Flavorwave on rack (4 tins). Cook on Hi heat for 20 minutes. Cool for 5 minutes and serve. (Note: remove from Nuwave/Flavorwave oven ASAP and cool).

input_text: I have red pepper, flour, sharp cheese, margarine, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cheese Rings with 1 lb. sharp cheese, grated, 1 lb. margarine, grated, 4 c. plain flour, 1 tsp. salt, 3/4 tsp. red pepper. Here's the instruction: Sift flour, salt and red pepper. Mix with cheese and margarine. Put into cookie press and make rings. Bake at 400° for 8 to 9 minutes.

input_text: I have oil, sugar, baking powder, eggs, cinnamon, baking soda, flour, zucchini. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Zucchini Bread with 1 c. oil, 2 c. sugar, 3 eggs, 2 c. grated zucchini, 3 c. flour, 3 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. baking soda, 1/2 tsp. baking powder. Here's the instruction: Combine all. Pour into 2 greased and floured loaf tins. Bake at 350° for 1 hour. Nuts may be added.

input_text: I have cherry, lemon juice, nuts, milk, almond extract, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Frozen Salad with 1 can cherry or peach pie filling, 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained, 1/4 tsp. almond extract, 1/2 c. chopped nuts, 1 can Eagle Brand milk, 1/4 c. lemon juice, 9 oz. Cool Whip. Here's the instruction: Mix filling, pineapple and milk together. Add remaining ingredients and freeze.

input_text: I have oil, bread crumbs, chicken, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Oven Fried Chicken with chicken, cut in serving pieces, salt, pepper and garlic salt, oil, seasoned bread crumbs. Here's the instruction: Sprinkle each piece of chicken with salt, pepper and garlic salt. Dip chicken in oil. Roll in seasoned bread crumbs. Bake uncovered at 350° for 1 hour.

input_text: I have cumin, tomatoes, chili powder, onion, green pepper, water, rice, garlic, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Spanish Rice with 2 Tbsp. olive oil, 1 c. chopped onion, 1 minced garlic clove, 1 c. converted rice, 1 Tbsp. chili powder, 1/2 tsp. cumin, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 (16 oz.) can diced tomatoes, 1 c. water, 1/2 c. chopped green pepper. Here's the instruction: Saute garlic and onion. Add rice; stir until translucent. Add rest of ingredients. Cover and cook for 20 minutes. Serves 4.

input_text: I have yellow mustard, cheddar cheese, curry pwdr, mayonnaise, cauliflower. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Curry And Cheddar Cauliflower Recipe with 1 head cauliflower, 8 ounce. grated cheddar cheese, 1 c. mayonnaise, 2 tbsp. prepared yellow mustard, 1 1/2 to 2 tbsp. curry pwdr. Here's the instruction: Steam large cauliflower florets till soft (15 to 20 min). Meanwhile mix mayonnaise, mustard, and curry pwdr together. Arrange the cooked florets in a baking dish in one layer (about a 9 x 11 dish). Paint on thickly the mayonnaise, curry mix and cover with grated cheddar. Bake uncovered in 425 degrees oven for about 10 min or possibly browned on top. NOTE: This is even better the next day sauteed! !

input_text: I have sour cream, onion, cream of potato soup, frozen hash browns, cream of celery soup, cheddar cheese soup. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Scalloped Potatoes with 1 (32 oz.) pkg. frozen hash browns, 1 can cream of potato soup, 1 can cream of celery soup, 1 can Cheddar cheese soup, 1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream, onion, green pepper, salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Combine ingredients. Sprinkle with paprika and parsley. Bake covered for 1 hour at 300° and uncovered for 1/2 hour.

input_text: I have egg, onion soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of celery soup, hamburger, bread crumbs. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Salisbury Steak with 1 1/2 lb. hamburger meat, 1 egg, well beaten, 1/2 c. bread crumbs, 1 pkg. dry onion soup mix, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 can cream of celery soup. Here's the instruction: Mix first 4 ingredients. Shape into patties and place in 9 x 13-inch pan. Cover pan with foil. Brown patties in 350° oven for 20 minutes. Drain grease from pan; mix soups together. Pour over patties; cover with foil. Return to oven for 35 or 40 minutes.

input_text: I have saltines, grated carrot, pepper, eggs, grated cheese, onion, water, oysters, milk. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Oyster Casserole with 1/2 box saltines, crumbled, 1 1/2 to 2 pt. oysters, drained, 3 eggs, 1 large can evaporated milk, 1/2 can water, 1 tsp. pepper, 1/2 small onion, chopped, 1/4 c. grated carrot, 1/2 c. grated cheese. Here's the instruction: Place crumbled saltine crackers in bottom of buttered casserole dish. Now put a layer of oysters. Add more crumbled saltine crackers, layer of oysters again. Sprinkle onion and carrots over oysters. Next, put crumbled saltines. Beat eggs. Add milk, water and pepper. Pour over oysters and saltines in dish. Sprinkle with grated cheese. Bake at 450° for 25 minutes.

input_text: I have sour cream, egg, vanilla extract, fresh blackberries, brown sugar, baking soda, powdered sugar, flour, ground cinnamon, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fresh Blackberry Bars with 1 cup all-purpose flour, 3/4 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 1/4 cup butter, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 large egg, beaten, 3/4 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup fresh blackberries, powdered sugar. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine flour and brown sugar, cut in butter with a pastry blender until mixture resembles coarse meal. Press 1 1/3 cups of mixture in bottom of an ungreased 8x8 inch square pan. Combine remaining crumb mixture, sour cream, and next five ingredients. Blend well. Stir in blackberries. Spoon over crust, spreading evenly. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes. Let cool; cut into bars. Sprinkle with powdered sugar.

input_text: I have low-salt chicken broth, crème fraîche, lemon juice, mushrooms, shallots, fresh sweet peas, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Frisée And Morel Ragoût With Prosciutto  with 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, 7 ounces small fresh morel mushrooms, 1/4 cup minced shallots (about 2), 3/4 cup low-salt chicken broth, 2 small heads of frisee (about 6 ounces), torn into 2-inch pieces, 1 cup fresh sweet peas or frozen petite peas, thawed, 1/2 cup creme fraiche or whipping cream, 4 thin prosciutto slices (about 1 ounce), cut into thin strips, 2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice. Here's the instruction: Melt butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add mushrooms and saute, stirring frequently, until juices are released, about 3 minutes. Add shallots; saute 1 minute. Add broth; bring to simmer. Cover skillet and simmer until mushrooms are tender, about 5 minutes. Add frisee and stir until just wilted. Add peas and creme fraiche; bring to simmer. Stir in prosciutto and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.

input_text: I have nonfat yogurt, fresh dill. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Nonfat Creamy Sauce with 1 c. nonfat yogurt, 1 tsp. to 1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard (according to taste), 1/4 tsp. fresh dill or basil. Here's the instruction: Combine ingredients and heat gently. Overheating causes curdling. This sauce can be used over pasta, vegetables, meats or seafood.

input_text: I have dates, bacon, cheese. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bacon Wrapped, Fontina Stuffed Dates with 15 whole Medjool Dates, Pitted, 8 ounces, weight Fontina Cheese, Cut Into Chunks, 8 pieces Bacon, Cut Each Piece In Half. Here's the instruction: Start by horizontally slicing through the dates, being careful to only cut one side. Stuff dates with a thick chunk of Fontina cheese. Wrap dates in the half slices of bacon. Place dates onto a baking sheet and place the tray under the broiler until the top side of the bacon is crispy. Flip dates over to the other side and broil that side until the bacon is crispy, being careful not to let them burn. Prepare for your guests to ask for more!

input_text: I have vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, rice, pineapple juice, chicken, chinese peas, vegetable oil, pineapple, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken Livers With Pineapple with 1 lb chicken liver, soy sauce, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 1 (8 ounce) can pineapple chunks, drained, 1 1/4 cups pineapple juice, 1/4 cup vinegar, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 cup chinese peas, 2 cups rice, cooked. Here's the instruction: Cut the livers in half and dip in the soy sauce. Heat the oil in a frying pan and brown the livers in it quickly. Add the pineapple and almonds and remove from the heat. Combine the pineapple juice, vinegar, salt, sugar and cornstarch and stir over low heat until clear, thickened and smooth. Pour over the chicken livers, if desired, add the Chinese peas cooked in a little boiling salted water until barely tender. Serve over rice.

input_text: I have low-fat buttermilk, sugar, baking powder, cookies, brown sugar, baking soda, eggs, bananas, flour, margarine, maple, milk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Banana Pancakes With Gingersnap Spread with 10 gingersnap cookies, finely crushed, 12 cup margarine, softened, 3 tablespoons firmly packed dark brown sugar, 2 cups unbleached all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon granulated sugar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 18 teaspoon salt, 5 tablespoons margarine, divided, 2 eggs, 2 cups low-fat buttermilk, 12 cup whole milk, 3 large ripe bananas, sliced, maple-flavored syrup (optional). Here's the instruction: Mix cookie crumbs, 1/2 cup Parkay and brown sugar in medium bowl until well blended; set aside. Combine flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt in large bowl; set aside. Melt 4 tablespoons of the Parkay; place in medium bowl. Add eggs, buttermilk and whole milk; beat with wire whisk just until blended. (Do not overbeat. ). Add to dry ingredients; stir just until moistened. Let stand 5 minutes. Melt the remaining 1 tablespoon margarine in large nonstick skillet. Ladle batter into skillet, using 1/4 cup batter for each pancake. Immediately top batter for each pancake with 4 or 5 banana slices; press bananas into batter with back of spatula to allow batter to partially cover banana slices. Cook until bubbles form on tops of pancakes, then turn over to brown other sides. Serve topped with the gingersnap spread. Drizzle with syrup, if desired.

input_text: I have backfin crabmeat, eggs, mayonnaise, cream, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Crabmeat Casserole with 1 lb. backfin crabmeat, 1 c. mayonnaise, 3 eggs, beaten lightly, 1/2 c. cream, 1/2 tsp. salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients lightly. Bake in a 1 1/2-quart casserole for 40 minutes at 350°.

input_text: I have quinoa, vanilla, cinnamon, ¼, water, milk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Crock Pot Breakfast Quinoa with 1 cup Raw Quinoa, 1 teaspoon Salt, 2 cups Water, 2 cups Milk, 1 teaspoon Cinnamon, 1/4 cups Liquid Sweetener, 1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract. Here's the instruction: Rinse the quinoa with running water using a fine mesh strainer. Drain. Combine the quinoa, salt, water and milk in a crockpot. Cook on low for 3 1/2 hours. The texture should be like hot cooked oatmeal. After 3 1/2 hours, remove lid, stir, and add cinnamon, sweetener, and vanilla. Stir to combine. Replace lid and cook for an additional 30 minutes. Makes about six 1/2-cup servings.

input_text: I have cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mushroom pieces, bay leaf, lemon pepper, onion, egg noodles, water, green onion, chicken breast, garlic, chicken, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Slow Cooker Chicken Stroganoff with 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast, 1/2 cup onion, chopped, 1 (10 1/2 ounce) can cream of chicken soup, 1 chicken bouillon cube, 1 (4 ounce) can mushroom pieces, 1/2 cup water, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 3 garlic cloves, sliced, 1/4 teaspoon lemon pepper seasoning, 1 bay leaf, 6 ounces egg noodles, 4 ounces sour cream, green onion, chopped. Here's the instruction: Cut chicken into 1-inch pieces. In a 3-1/2- or 4-quart slow cooker, combine the chicken pieces, lemon pepper seasoning, mushrooms, bullion cube, bay leaf, garlic cloves, and onion. In a medium bowl, stir together the soup, Worcestershire, and water. Pour over chicken and onions. Cover and cook on low-heat setting for 6 to 7 hours or on high-heat setting for 3 to 3-1/2 hours. Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain. Just before serving, stir sour cream into mixture in cooker. To serve, spoon stroganoff mixture over hot cooked noodles. If desired, sprinkle with chopped green onions.

input_text: I have bacon, oregano, chicken breasts, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, flour, basil, vegetable oil, garlic, spinach. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Stuffed Chicken Breasts with 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 4 slices bacon, cooked, 4 slices sun-dried tomatoes, in oil, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 1 cup spinach, cooked and drained, 1/4 cup mozzarella cheese, 1 cup flour, dried basil, dried oregano, vegetable oil. Here's the instruction: Mix flour, basil and oregano in a medium bowl and set aside. Slice each chicken breast length wise about half way through - making a pocket. Stuff each chicken breast evenly with minced garlic, bacon, sun dried tomato, spinach, and mozzarella. Close each chicken breast with tooth picks. Coat both sides of chicken breasts with the seasoned flour. Heat the vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat, add chicken breasts. Cook each side until done(about 15 minutes total).

input_text: I have eggs, poppy seed, lemon cake mix, lemon pudding, water, vegetable oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Donna'S Poppy Seed Cake with 1 pkg. lemon cake mix, 1 (3 3/4 oz.) pkg. lemon pudding, 1/2 c. vegetable oil, 1/4 c. poppy seed, 4 eggs, 1 c. warm water. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 325°. Mix all ingredients together. Beat 4 minutes. Pour into 2 floured and greased loaf pans. Bake 45 minutes. Needs no frosting.

input_text: I have vanilla, oats, brown sugar, eggs, baking soda, flour, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Best Ever Oatmeal Cookies with 3 cups uncooked quick-cooking oats, 2 cups firmly packed brown sugar, 1 cup Land O Lakes Butter, softened, 2 Land O Lakes Eggs, 2 teaspoons vanilla, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 375F. Combine all ingredients except flour in bowl. Beat at low speed, scraping bowl often, until well mixed. Stir in flour until well mixed. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls, 2 inches apart, onto lightly greased cookie sheets. Bake 8-12 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Let stand 1 minute; remove from cookie sheet. Variation: Chocolate Drizzled Oatmeal Cookies: Prepare and bake cookies as directed above. Melt 1/2 cup real semi-sweet or milk chocolate chips and 1 tablespoon shortening. Drizzle mixture over cooled cookies.

input_text: I have raspberry yogurt, lemon. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make John'S Raspberry Asparagus with 1 pound fresh asparagus spears, trimmed, 1 (8 ounce) container low-fat raspberry yogurt, 1/2 lemon, juiced. Here's the instruction: Place the asparagus in a steamer basket, and set over about 1 inch of boiling water. Cover, and steam for 5 to 8 minutes, or until tender and bright green. In a small saucepan, stir together the yogurt and lemon juice. Cook over medium heat until warmed. Place steamed asparagus onto serving plates, and spoon the sauce over, or serve sauce separately.

input_text: I have buttermilk, egg, sugar, nutmeg, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, white raisins, raisins, flour, dates, nuts, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Curt's Christmas Cake Recipe with 3 c. flour, 1 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg, 2 teaspoon baking soda, 2 c. sugar, 1/2 teaspoon cloves, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 c. butter, 1/2 c. white raisins, 1/2 c. dates, 1/2 c. raisins, 1 egg, 2 c. buttermilk, 1/2 c. minced nuts. Here's the instruction: Cut butter into first eight ingredients. Save 1 c. of mix to top cake later before baking. Into flour mix pour the next six ingredients. Mix with a spoon. Pour batter into 9 1/2 c 13 inch pan. Top with left over crumbs. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 to 60 min.

input_text: I have potatoes, salt, pepper, sesame seeds, mushrooms, onion, ground beef, butter, frozen peas. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Baked Meal-In-One Casserole with 1 pound lean ground beef (90% lean), 3 medium unpeeled potatoes, thinly sliced, 1 medium onion, sliced and separated into rings, 1 cup frozen peas, 1-1/2 cups sliced mushrooms, 1-1/2 teaspoons salt, optional, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon sesame seeds, 3 tablespoons butter, melted. Here's the instruction: In a skillet over medium heat, cook beef until no longer pink; drain. Place potatoes in a greased 2-qt. baking dish. Top with beef and onion. Place peas in the center; arrange mushrooms around the peas. Sprinkle with the salt, pepper and sesame seeds; drizzle with butter. Cover and bake at 375° for 50-60 minutes or until potatoes are tender.

input_text: I have onion, celery, carcasses, white wine, only, lemon, bay leaf. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fish Stock with 3 lb/1-5 kg fish carcasses or fish bones, with bits of meat and skin attached, 1 large onion, coarsely chopped, 1 stalk celery, coarsely chopped, 1 leek, white part only, coarsely chopped, 1 bay leaf, Juice of 1 lemon, 1/2 bottle/375 ml dry white wine, 10 white peppercorns. Here's the instruction: Put all the ingredients into a large pot and add enough cold water to cover completely. Cover the pot and bring to a boil over high heat. Uncover the pot, reduce the heat to low, and simmer for 30 minutes, skimming any foam that forms on the surface as needed. Strain the stock, discarding the solids. Rinse out the pot, then return the stock to it and simmer for about 15 minutes longer. Cool to room temperature: then refrigerate or freeze in several containers.

input_text: I have honey, cold milk, lemon juice. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Triple-Layer Lemon Pie with 2 packages (3.4 oz. each) JELL-O Lemon Flavor Instant Pudding, 2 cups cold milk, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 HONEY MAID Graham Pie Crust (6 oz.), 1 tub (8 oz.) COOL WHIP Whipped Topping, thawed, divided. Here's the instruction: pudding mixes, milk and juice with whisk 2 min. (Mixture will be thick.) Spread 1 1/2 cups onto bottom of crust. 1/2 the COOL WHIP into remaining pudding mixture; spread over pudding layer in crust. Top with remaining COOL WHIP. 3 hours or until set. Calories: 310 Total fat: 12 g Saturated fat: 7 g Cholesterol: 5 mg Sodium: 440 mg Carbohydrate: 47 g Dietary fiber: 0 g Sugars: 32 g Protein: 3 g Vitamin A: 4% DV Vitamin C: 0% DV Calcium: 6% DV Iron: 2% DV

input_text: I have vegetable beef soup, corn, onion, mushroom soup, milk, hamburger, baking potatoes. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Potato Casserole with 1 lb. hamburger, 4 or 5 baking potatoes, 1 sliced onion, 1 can vegetable beef soup, 1 can mushroom soup, frozen or canned corn, 1/2 c. milk. Here's the instruction: Slice potatoes in a greased casserole dish. Cover with onions. Break up raw hamburger on top of potatoes and onions. Mix soups, corn and milk. Pour over mixture in pan. Bake, covered, at 325° for 1 1/2 hours.

input_text: I have lemon juice, salad oil, onion, cornflakes, worcestershire sauce, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Quick Baked Fillet with 1 lb. fresh or frozen fillet (orange roughy), 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/4 c. grated onion, 1/4 c. salad oil, 1/3 c. lemon juice, 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 3 c. crushed cornflakes (more if needed). Here's the instruction: Dip fish in combined ingredients, except corn flakes. Roll in corn flakes. Arrange on greased cookie sheet. Bake in hot oven for 500° for 15 minutes. Thaw frozen fish before dipping. Needs no watching. Do not cook over 15 minutes.

input_text: I have jalapeno pepper, garlic salt, sweet red chili sauce, salsa, sriracha sauce, lime juice, ground ginger, mango, garlic, pork tenderloin, honey, fresh cilantro. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sweet And Fiery Pork Tenderloin with 1 teaspoon garlic salt, 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger, 1 lb pork tenderloin, 1/4 cup sweet red chili sauce, 1 tablespoon honey, 1/2 teaspoon sriracha sauce (or more to taste), Salsa, 1 large ripe mango, peeled, seeded and coarsely chopped, 1 -2 tablespoon fresh cilantro, chopped, 1 small garlic clove, minced, 1 tablespoon jalapeno pepper, minced with seeds removed and diced, 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice. Here's the instruction: For the salsa: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl, season to taste with salt and pepper. Refrigerate salsa until ready to serve. Makes 1 cup. Preheat oven to 375°. Mix garlic salt and ginger in small bowl. Rub evenly over pork. Place pork on rack in foil-lined roasting pan. Roast pork in preheated oven 40 to 45 minutes or until desired pork is cooked to your liking. (New pork guidelines allow pork to cook to 145°, if you prefer it cooked well, cook it until the internal temp reads is 160° with a meat thermometer). Mix chili sauce, honey and sriracha in small bowl. Brush over pork during the last 10 minutes of cooking. Slice pork and serve with pan juices and mango salsa on the side.

input_text: I have potatoes, tomatoes, frozen sweet peas, beef cuts, freshly ground black pepper, water, celery, thyme, ground allspice, bay leaves, onions, carrots, marjoram, tapioca, worcestershire sauce, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Country Stew with 2 pounds beef cuts, 5 carrots sliced, 3 onions cut up, 6 potatoes cut up, 3 celery ribs sliced, 1 can tomatoes whole, 28 oz cut up, juice with, also, 1 cup water, 6 tablespoons minute tapioca, 3 tablespoons worcestershire sauce, freshly ground black pepper to taste, salt to taste, ground allspice to taste, marjoram to taste, thyme to taste, 2 bay leaves, 1 frozen sweet peas 10 oz. Here's the instruction: Put all ingredients except peas into a slow cooker. Mix all the above together in the crockpot and cover; put on LOW and cook all day or overnight.

input_text: I have blueberries, vanilla, bananas. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Banana Ice Cream with 5 bananas, 100 g blueberries, 1 teaspoon vanilla. Here's the instruction: peel and cut banannas into small chunks. freeze the banannas. freeze the blueberries. put frozen banannas and blueberries into foodprocessor. Use the foodprocessor until mixture is smooth. add vanilla and use foodprocessor until mixed inches. eat straight away.

input_text: I have ground cumin, pepper, chili powder, onion, water, cooking spray, lime juice, light butter, tilapia, ingredients, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Southwestern Tilapia  with Ingredients:, 4 tilapia fillets (6-ounce size), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, Cooking spray, 3 tablespoons light butter, divided, 1 cup finely chopped onion, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin, 2 tablespoons water, 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice. Here's the instruction: Directions:  Preheat broiler.  Sprinkle both sides of fish with salt and pepper. Place on a broiler pan coated with cooking spray. Spray fish with cooking spray. Broil 6 to 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.  Meanwhile, melt 1 tablespoon butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add onion; cook 4 minutes or until tender, stirring constantly.  Stir in chili powder and cumin; cook 30 seconds, stirring constantly. Remove from heat; stir in 2 tablespoons butter, water, and lime juice until well blended. Spoon onion mixture evenly over fish.

input_text: I have blue cheese, dressing, dijion, yellow mustard, lemon juice, eggs, ¼, tabasco sauce, head romaine lettuce, black pepper, clove garlic, salad, shrimp, honey, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make The Fishmarket Salad with FOR THE SALAD:, 1-1/2 head Romaine Lettuce, 1-1/2 cup Mini Shrimp, Cooked And Chilled, 1 cup Blue Cheese, 4 whole Hard Boiled Eggs, Diced, FOR THE DRESSING:, 1/4 cups White Wine Vinegar, 1 clove Garlic, 1/4 bulbs Onion, Diced, 4 Tablespoons Honey, 1 Tablespoon Dijion Mustard, 1-1/2 teaspoon Yellow Mustard, 2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice, 3 dashes Tabasco Sauce, 1/2 teaspoons Salt, 1/2 teaspoons Black Pepper, 1/2 cups Extra Virgin Olive Oil. Here's the instruction: Divide salad ingredients between 2 bowls. Place the dressing ingredients, sans the olive oil, in a food processor and whirl them up until combined. Then slowly pulse your food processor, adding in your olive oil until all is combined. If you have time, chill the dressing for a little while. If not, proceed to pour it over your prepared salad and enjoy!

input_text: I have leeks, eggs, freshly cracked black pepper, flour, parmesan, parsley, cream, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Parmesan tart recipe with 20 g (0.7oz) butter, 3 leeks, finely chopped, or equivalent of any other green veg, 5 eggs, 250 ml (8.8fl oz) thickened cream (double cream), 3 handfuls flat-leaf parsley, chopped, 1 pinch sea salt, 1 pinch freshly cracked black pepper, 150 g (5.3oz) parmesan, grated, 180 g (6.3oz) unsalted butter, 240 g (8.5oz) plain flour, 1 pinch sea salt. Here's the instruction: To make the pastry, mix the butter, flour and sea salt in a food processor until it resembles breadcrumbs. Add 3 tablespoons of cold water and blend until the dough comes together into a ball. Roll out the dough on a lightly floured surface to line a 30 cm flan tin. Refrigerate the pastry for 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 160C (Gas 2-3). Line the pastry with a sheet of baking paper and fill with a layer of baking beads or rice. Bake for 15 minutes, then remove the paper and beads and bake for another 10 minutes, or until the pastry is golden. To make the filling, melt the butter in a frying pan over high heat and cook the leek or chosen vegetable/s until it caramelises, about 10 minutes. Combine the eggs, cream and parsley in a bowl and season with sea salt and black pepper. Spread the leek or chosen vegetable/s over the pastry base, sprinkle with the parmesan and then pour the egg mixture over the top. Bake for about 30 minutes, or until just firm. Serve hot with a garden salad.

input_text: I have sweet onion, tomatoes, black pepper, jalapeno chile, lemon juice, cilantro, onion, avocado, salsa, marinade, skirt, lime juice, corn tortillas, garlic, red onion, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Grilled Skirt Steak With Avocado-Tomato Salsa with Marinade, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/2 cup fresh lime juice (about 8 limes), 1 garlic clove, minced, 1/2 onion, thinly sliced (for marinade), 1 large sweet onion (for grilling), 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 lbs skirt steaks, 12 medium corn tortillas, warmed, Salsa (finely chop the following), 1 large tomatoes, peeled and seeded, 1 medium ripe avocado, peeled and pitted, 1 tablespoon red onion, 2 tablespoons cilantro, 1 jalapeno chile, seeded, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. Here's the instruction: Place all the marinade ingredients in a bowl and mix. Place skirt steak and marinade in a ziplock bag and put in the fridge for 2 to 4 hours. Meanwhile, mix all the salsa ingredients in a bowl, cover and refrigerate. Place oven on 200°F and wrap your tortillas, sealed in foil for about 20 minutes. Prepare your barbecue for medium heat grilling. Remove steak from the marinade and place on the grill for 4 to 6 minutes on each side (medium rare to medium). Slice the sweet onion and place on the grill as well, brushing with the marinade. Grill until still firm, but just turning tender. Place the steak and onions on a carving platter. Slice the steak thinly on the diagonal and serve on a platter with the onion. To eat, place some steak, onion and Avocado-Tomato salsa in a warm tortilla and enjoy!

input_text: I have bacon, frozen hash brown potatoes, pepper, onion, worcestershire sauce, milk, whole kernel corn, cream-style, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Easy Potato And Corn Chowder - Crock Pot with 1 (16 ounce) bag frozen hash brown potatoes, thawed, 1 (15 1/4 ounce) can whole kernel corn, undrained, 1 (14 3/4 ounce) can cream-style corn, 1 (12 ounce) can evaporated milk, 1 medium onion, chopped, 8 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients together in crock pot and cook for 6-8 hours on low. Serving Suggestion: Top bowls of chowder with a little extra crumbled bacon and a little shredded cheese. Yum!

input_text: I have vinegar, lemon juice, liquid smoke, brown sugar, onion, water, celery, ketchup, nonstick cooking spray, mustard, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Barbecue Sauce with 2 tablespoons nonstick cooking spray, 12 cup chopped onion, 14 cup chopped celery, 12 cup low sodium ketchup, 13 cup water, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 tablespoon low-sodium worcestershire sauce, 1 tablespoon vinegar, 1 tablespoon prepared mustard, 2 -3 dashes liquid smoke (optional). Here's the instruction: Coat a non-stick skillet with cooking spray. Saute onion and celery until tender. Add remaining ingredients and simmer for 15 minutes. Brush over meat before grilling or baking.

input_text: I have green chiles, bacon, pepper, chili powder, cheddar cheese, onion, celery, clove garlic, pepper sauce, chicken broth, tortilla chips. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mexican Bean Soup("A Nice Light Soup")   with 4 slices bacon, diced, 3/4 c. chopped onion, 3/4 c. chopped celery, 1 clove garlic, minced, 1 can (4 oz.) chopped green chiles, 1/4 tsp. pepper, 1/4 tsp. chili powder, Several dashes hot pepper sauce, 1 can (13 oz.) chicken broth, Cheddar cheese, shredded, broken tortilla chips. Here's the instruction: In a 2-qt. saucepan, cook bacon until crisp. Add onion, celery and garlic; cook, covered over low heat, stirring occasionally, about 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender, but not brown. Add green chiles, beans, pepper, chili powder and hot pepper sauce. Stir in chicken broth. Bring to boiling. Serve very hot in bowls; pass cheese and tortilla chips to sprinkle over each serving. To add a more piquant flavor, add a garnish of chopped onion and chopped tomato.

input_text: I have tomatoes, lemon juice, mint, arugula, bases, eggplant, lamb noisettes, olive oil, plain yogurt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mini Lamb And Eggplant Pizzas with 6 None small pizza bases, 2 None tomatoes, sliced, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 None medium eggplant, thinly sliced, 2 None lamb noisettes (boneless lamb chops), flattened, 1/2 cup plain yogurt, 1 tbsp fresh mint leaves, chopped, 1 tsp lemon juice, 1 bunch arugula, washed, stems removed. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400°F. Place pizza bases on a greased baking tray. Arrange tomatoes over top, leaving a narrow border around edges. Drizzle with olive oil. Cook according package instructions. Preheat broiler. Brush eggplant with oil. Broil for 3 mins per side, until golden and tender. Brush lamb with oil. Season. Broil for 3-4 mins per side, or until cooked to your liking. Slice thinly. In a bowl, combine yogurt, mint and lemon juice. Season. Top pizzas with eggplant, arugula and lamb. Drizzle with yogurt mixture. Serve warm.

input_text: I have head lettuce, tomatoes, cured ham, sherry vinegar, italian, water, bunches asparagus, clove garlic, white bread, garlic, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Crown of Green Asparagus with 3 slices white bread, 1 cup water, 1 pound tomatoes, peeled and seeded, 1 tablespoon chopped garlic, Salt and pepper, 1/4 cup olive oil, 1 teaspoon sherry vinegar, 2 bunches asparagus, 1 loaf Italian or French bread, 1 clove garlic, peeled and cut in half, 1 head lettuce, cleaned, 2 tomatoes, sliced, 2 ounces cured ham, diced. Here's the instruction: To make the sauce, combine the bread and water in a bowl and allow to sit for a few minutes. In a food processor, combine the bread mixture, tomatoes, and garlic, season with salt and pepper, and process until smooth. Add the vinegar and oil and process. Set aside until ready to use. In a pot, boil the green asparagus until tender. Cut the points off, set aside, and chop the rest of the tender parts. Cut the loaf of bread into thin slices and toast. While the toast is still warm, rub the surface with some of the garlic. Place a large ring or cookie cutter in the center of 4 plates. Place the crown tips of the asparagus around the plates. Arrange a few leaves of lettuce on the bottom of the rings and top with the chopped asparagus. Top with the sliced tomatoes and then a piece of toast. Finally, sprinkle with the cured ham. To finish and serve, drizzle a little of the Salmorejo sauce around the plate and serve. This recipe was provided by professional chefs and has been scaled down from a bulk recipe provided by a restaurant. The FN chefs have not tested this recipe, in the proportions indicated, and therefore, we cannot make any representation as to the results.

input_text: I have red wine vinegar, fresh ground pepper, fresh thyme, rosemary sprigs, thyme, kosher salt, cherry tomatoes, garlic, olive oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cherry Tomato Confit with 1 1/2 lbs cherry tomatoes, stems removed (3 half pint baskets), 1 cup olive oil, 9 inches fresh rosemary sprigs, cut into 9 pieces, 6 fresh thyme sprigs, 6 garlic cloves, peeled, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper, 2 teaspoons red wine vinegar, 1 teaspoon fresh thyme, chopped. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 225 degrees. Put the tomatoes in a baking pan large enough to hold them in a single layer. Pour the oil over the tomatoes, add the herb sprigs, garlic, and season generously with salt and pepper. Roast uncovered until the tomatoes are swollenand the skins wrinkled, about three hours. Remove the tomatoes from oven and allow to cool, then pour into a small bowl. For best flavor cover and refrigerate overnight, bringing the confit back to room temperature. When you are ready to serve, pour the tomatoes into a strainer set over a bow, reserving both the tomatoes and the oil. Place the drained tomatoes in a small bowl, discarding the herb sprigs and garlic cloves. Add the vinegar, chopped time, and 1 tablespoon of the reserved oil. Mix gently being careful not to break the tomatoes. Season to taste with additional salt and pepper.

input_text: I have wedges, ground red pepper, sour cream, ground cumin, tomatoes, flour tortillas, cilantro, chili powder, chile, lime juice, beef skirt steak, avocados, red onions, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Steak Fajitas with Guacamole with 2 ripe medium avocados, 2 ripe medium tomatoes, 1 jalapeqo chile, 1 c. loosely packed fresh cilantro leaves, 1 tbsp. fresh lime juice, 1/2 tsp. salt, 3 tbsp. chili powder, 1 tsp. ground cumin, 1/4 tsp. ground red pepper (cayenne), 1 3/4 lb. beef skirt steak, 2 large red onions, 1 tbsp. olive oil, 8 low-fat flour tortillas, Lime wedges, Sour cream (optional). Here's the instruction: Prepare Guacamole: In medium bowl, place all Guacamole ingredients; stir gently to combine. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate if not serving right away. Makes about 3 cups. Prepare Steak and Onions: In cup, mix chili powder, cumin, salt, and ground red pepper. Rub steak with 2 tablespoons chili-powder mixture. Place steak on plate; set aside. In large bowl, toss onion slices with oil and remaining chili-powder mixture. Layer two 24-inch by 18-inch sheets heavy-duty foil to make a double thickness. Place onion mixture on center of foil. Bring short ends of foil up and over onions, and fold several times to seal well. Fold remaining sides of foil several times to seal in juices. (Or, place ingredients in 17-inch by 15-inch extra heavy-duty foil cooking bag, folding end to seal as label directs.) Place foil packet on grill over medium heat. Cook onions 20 minutes or until tender, turning packet over once halfway through cooking. Place steak on grill with onions; cook steak 10 to 15 minutes, depending on thickness of steak, for medium or until of desired doneness, turning steak over once. Transfer steak to cutting board; let stand 10 minutes to allow juices to set for easier slicing. Transfer onions to bowl; cover and keep warm. Meanwhile, wrap tortillas in foil; heat near edge of grill over low heat until warm. To serve, thinly slice steak. Place sliced steak and onions on warm tortillas; top with some Guacamole and roll up to eat. Serve with lime wedges, sour cream, and remaining Guacamole.

input_text: I have egg, red peppers, provolone cheese, ground nutmeg, parmesan cheese, crust, water, fresh basil, ricotta cheese, garlic, spinach, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make 3 Cheese Spinach Roasted Red Pepper Calzones with 1 (10 ounce) can prepared pizza crust, 23 cup ricotta cheese, drained in a sieve, 3 ounces provolone cheese, diced, 2 tablespoons freshly grated parmesan cheese, 10 ounces frozen chopped spinach, thawed under hot tap water & squeezed completely dry, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 2 medium red peppers, roasted peeled & cut to thin strips, 3 ounces prosciutto, cut into thin strips, 1 12 tablespoons chopped fresh basil, 14 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg, 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt and pepper, 1 large egg, beaten with, 1 tablespoon water. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400. Roll the dough to 12x12-inch square and then cut into 4 equal squares. In a medium bowl, mix all remaining ingredients except egg and water. Place filling a little off center on each dough square. Wrap dough around filling by bringing one side over to meet other, forming a triangle. Round off corners to form a semi-circle and press edges with fork, sealing. Place on baking sheet and brush top of each calzone with egg wash. Bake until golden brown, about 25 minutes. Remove from oven and let set about 7 minutes. Serve hot!

input_text: I have cheddar cheese, lemon flavored gelatin, pecans, carrots, boiling water, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Congealed Carrot Salad with 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon flavored gelatin, 2 c. boiling water, 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple, drained, 1 c. grated carrots, 1 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded, 3/4 c. chopped pecans. Here's the instruction: Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Drain pineapple. Add enough water to liquid drained from pineapple to make 2 cups and stir into the gelatin. Refrigerate until partially congealed, then stir in pineapple, carrots, cheese and pecans. Chill until firm.

input_text: I have extra virgin olive oil, onions, kosher salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Melted Onions with 4 lbs onions, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup extra virgin olive oil, 1 tablespoon kosher salt. Here's the instruction: Combine ingredients in a large skillet and cook over low heat, stirring occasionally, until onions break down and are completely soft (they will be a lovely medium to dark brown), several hours.

input_text: I have lamb steaks, orange, thyme, garlic, marsala, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mellow Lamb Steaks with 10 cloves garlic, peeled and halved lengthwise, Finely grated zest of 1/2 orange, 4 6-ounce lamb steaks, Salt and freshly ground black pepper, 1 tablespoon olive oil, Juice of 1 orange, 1 tablespoon Marsala, sherry or other wine, 1 tablespoon fresh thyme leaves. Here's the instruction: In small saucepan, combine garlic, zest and 3/4 cup water. Turn heat to high. When mixture boils, lower to simmer, and cook until garlic is tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Season lamb with salt and pepper to taste. Place a large saute pan over medium-high heat, and add olive oil. When oil is hot, add lamb, and sear about 2 minutes a side. Reduce heat to low, and cook 5 minutes longer. Add garlic and its liquid, orange juice, Marsala and thyme. When liquid begins to simmer, transfer steaks to warm serving plate with slotted spatula. Raise heat to medium-high, and reduce sauce until it is syrupy, 1 to 2 minutes. Pour sauce and garlic over lamb, and serve.

input_text: I have egg, sugar, ¼, shortening cold, water, flour, milk, filling, nectarine, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Plum Nectarine Galette with FOR THE PIE CRUST:, 3/4 cups All Purpose Flour, Sifted, 1/2 teaspoons Salt, 1 teaspoon Granulated Sugar, 1/4 cups Unsalted Butter, Cold And Diced Into Cubes, 2 Tablespoons Shortening Cold, 1 whole Large Egg Yolk, 1/4 teaspoons White Vinegar, 1 Tablespoon Cold Milk Or Water, Up To Double This Amount If Needed, 1 whole Egg Plus Below Amount Of Water, Beaten, 1 Tablespoon Water, FOR THE FILLING:, 1 whole Plum, Pitted And Thinly Sliced, 1 whole Nectarine, Pitted And Thinly Sliced, 2 Tablespoons Granulated Sugar, 1/4 teaspoons Ground Cinnamon. Here's the instruction: For the pie crust: Into a large bowl, add sifted all-purpose flour, salt and granulated sugar and whisk together to blend. Next, add diced butter and shortening to the dry mixture. Using a pastry cutter or fork, begin cutting butter and shortening into the flour creating various sizes of crumbs. The crumbs should range from coarse pea shapes to larger chunks. Add the egg yolk and vinegar into the crumb mixture and stir around to combine. Finally, slowly pour the cold milk or water around the entire mixture in two intervals, using your hands to begin bringing the dough together. After the last milk addition, shape the dough with your hands into a flatter ball disk. Wrap the ball in plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour. To assemble: Preheat oven to 375 F. Unwrap the dough and place it on a lightly floured work surface. Roll out the cold dough to the size of your liking (about the size and thickness of a standard pie crust) then carefully move it to a parchment paper lined rimmed baking sheet. Alternate plum and nectarine slices in a circular pattern in the center of the dough leaving at least one inch of pie dough on the outskirts to fold over. Next sprinkle sugar and cinnamon over the fruit slices then fold over the remaining pie dough. Brush egg wash over the dough. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until filling is tender and bubbly and crust is golden brown. Serve with my Big Mama's Vanilla Ice Cream if you really want a treat!

input_text: I have sugar, eggs, onion powder, ground black pepper, sage, cheese, muffins, ketchup. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mc breakfast muffin, available all day :-) with 500 grams minced pork, 1 tsp ground black pepper, 3/4 tsp sugar, 3/4 tsp onion powder, 1 tbsp chopped sage, 1 english muffins, 1 eggs, 1 cheese slices, 1 ketchup. Here's the instruction: Add all ingredients together, (from the pork through to the sage), mix very well and form into patties. Rest the patties in the fridge. Steam eggs, (I'm a stickler for the term steam, most people call it poached, witch is technically incorrect. Eggs are held in cups above simmering water.) Cut muffins in half and lightly toast. Gently shallow fry patties either side. Assemble Pattie, cheese, egg, and ketchup in the muffin. Enjoy.

input_text: I have sour cream, poppy seed, honey, lemon juice. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fresh Lemon Poppy Seed Dip with 2/3 c. sour cream, 4 tsp. honey, 1 Tbsp. lemon juice, 1 Tbsp. poppy seed, 1 tsp. grated lemon peel. Here's the instruction: Mix well and chill several hours before serving.

input_text: I have soy sauce, green onions, water, sesame oil, cornstarch, chicken broth, chicken, mixed broccoli, garlic, vegetable oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken Stir-Fry On Rice with 1 1/3 c. water, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 1/3 c. 5-minute rice, 1 Tbsp. cornstarch, 1 Tbsp. plus 2 tsp. reduced-sodium soy sauce, 1 Tbsp. Oriental sesame oil, 3/4 c. chicken broth (see Note), 1 Tbsp. vegetable oil, 12 oz. thin sliced chicken or turkey breast cutlets, cut crosswise in thin strips (2 c.), 1 tsp. minced garlic, 1 (16 oz.) bag frozen mixed broccoli, red peppers, bamboo shoots and straw mushrooms, 1 c. 1-inch pieces diagonally sliced green onions. Here's the instruction: Bring water and salt to a boil in a covered medium size saucepan. Stir in rice. Cover and remove from heat. Let stand while preparing chicken.

input_text: I have potatoes, bacon, cheddar cheese, onion, flour, chicken broth. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cheese And Bacon Potato Bake with 1 (13 3/4 oz.) can College Inn chicken broth or beef broth, 5 medium potatoes, pared and thinly sliced (about 5 c.), 1 large onion, 6 slices bacon, 3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour, 1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese. Here's the instruction: In medium saucepan, over medium-high heat, heat broth to a boil; reduce heat. Add potatoes and onion; cover and simmer 5 minutes. Drain, reserving 1 1/2 cups broth. In skillet, over medium-high heat, cook bacon until crisp. Remove and crumble bacon; pour off all but 3 tablespoons drippings. Blend flour into reserved drippings. Gradually add reserved broth; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened. Stir in cheese until melted.

input_text: I have spaghetti, sour cream, tomato paste, eggs, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, onion, margarine, italian sausage. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bird'S Nest Pie with 8 oz. spaghetti, 2 eggs, beaten, 1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese, 1/2 c. finely chopped onion, 2 Tbsp. margarine, 8 oz. sour cream, 1 lb. bulk Italian sausage, 1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste plus 1 c. water or 2 c. spaghetti sauce, 4 oz. sliced Mozzarella cheese. Here's the instruction: Break spaghetti in half; cook in boiling water until al dente. Drain. While spaghetti is warm, combine with eggs and Parmesan cheese. Press in bottom and up sides of well-greased, 10-inch pie plate.

input_text: I have cheddar cheese, bisquick mix, sausage. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sausage Balls with 1 lb. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated, 1 pkg. Bisquick mix, 1 lb. hot or mild sausage. Here's the instruction: Mix all 3 ingredients; form into miniature balls. Mixture will be very stiff. Bake at 375° for about 15 minutes, turning once. Serve after slightly cooled.

input_text: I have cream of coconut, raspberry syrup, sherbet, vanilla ice cream, milk. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Raspberry Cooler with 3 scoops raspberry sherbet, 2 scoops vanilla ice cream, 1 Tbsp. raspberry syrup, 1 c. milk, 1 Tbsp. cream of coconut (optional). Here's the instruction: In blender combine sherbet, ice cream, syrup and milk. Blend until smooth. Add cream of coconut if desired. Garnish with whole raspberries. Makes 3 servings.

input_text: I have tabasco, kidney beans, cumin, tomatoes, green peppers, chili powder, cooking oil, water, ground beef, garlic. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chili with 3 lb. ground beef, 2 green peppers, 2 cloves garlic, 1/4 c. cooking oil, 3 (15 oz.) cans kidney beans, 3 cans tomatoes, 3 or 4 Tbsp. chili powder, 2 Tbsp. cumin, 1/4 tsp. Tabasco, 1 c. water. Here's the instruction: Cook ground beef, peppers and garlic in 1/4 cup cooking oil until beef is no longer pink. Add rest of ingredients and simmer.

input_text: I have cane, vanilla, heavy cream, whipped topping, peppermint schnapps, white chocolate chips, peppermint, white chocolate. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make White Hot Chocolate with 1 cup white chocolate chips, 1 cup heavy cream, 4 cups half-and-half, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 14 teaspoon peppermint extract, whipped topping, for garnish, candy cane, for garnish, peppermint schnapps (optional), white chocolate liqueur (optional). Here's the instruction: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine white chocolate chips and heavy cream. Stir continuously until white chocolate chips have completely melted. Stir in the half-and-half, vanilla extract and peppermint extract. Stir occasionally until heated through. Pour into mugs and top with a dollop of vanilla whipped topping and a candy cane. Add desired amounts of peppermint and white chocolate liqueurs.

input_text: I have cream of chicken soup, garlic butter, cream of mushroom soup, water, cream of celery soup, rice, chicken, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken And Rice Casserole with 2 c. dry rice, 1 can cream of celery soup, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 3 cans water, salt and pepper to taste, 1 whole chicken, skinned or 6 chicken breasts, skinned, garlic butter. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients together in a large buttered dish. Place chicken pieces on top, after they have been dipped in garlic butter. Bake for about 1 1/2 to 2 hours, uncovered, in a 350° oven.

input_text: I have pineapple juice, intrigue liqueur, mandarin vodka. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make French Kiss with 1 ounce Intrigue liqueur, 1 ounce Chambord raspberry liquor, 1 ounce mandarin vodka, 1 splash pineapple juice. Here's the instruction: Layer all ingredients over ice. Enjoy!

input_text: I have sugar, homogenized milk, vanilla, eggs, flour, milk, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Crustless Egg Pie with 1 c. sugar, 5 Tbsp. flour (level), 2 Tbsp. butter, 3 large eggs, 3/4 c. evaporated milk, 1 c. homogenized milk, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Blend all ingredients	and pour into a buttered 9-inch pie plate. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until done.

input_text: I have brown sugar, bananas, cake, vanilla ice cream, bourbon, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bourbon Bananas Foster with 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 1/4 cup packed dark brown sugar, 3 slightly under-ripe bananas, halved crosswise, then lengthwise, 1/3 cup bourbon, 4 slices pound cake, 4 scoops vanilla ice cream. Here's the instruction: 1. In a large skillet, cook the butter and brown sugar over medium-high heat, stirring until the butter melts. Add the bananas and gently turn to coat. Once the sauce begins to bubble, add the bourbon. 2. Using a long match or igniter, light the mixture. Cook until the flames subside. Alternatively, simmer the bourbon, stirring frequently, until the sauce thickens to the consistency of honey, about 2 minutes. 3. Divide the cake among the serving dishes and drizzle with some of the bourbon sauce. Top with the ice cream, then the bananas and remaining sauce. Serve immediately.

input_text: I have brown sugar, pecans, milk, sweet potatoes, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sweet Potato Casserole with 3 c. sweet potatoes, 1 c. evaporated milk, 1 stick butter, 2 c. brown sugar, pecans to taste. Here's the instruction: Mash sweet potatoes, stir in 1/2 cup of milk. Spread in butter greased baking dish. In sauce pan add: stick butter, 1/2 c. milk, and 2 c. brown sugar. Heat on stove until sugar is dissolved. pour mixture over potatoes. Cover top with chopped pecans. Bake in 350° oven about 20 minutes.

input_text: I have oleo, vanilla, marshmallows, brown sugar, pecans, dates, cherries, cocoa, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Icebox Fruit Cake with 3/4 lb. oleo, 1 lb. marshmallows, 1 lb. pecans, 4 Tbsp. brown sugar, 1/2 lb. dates, 3 tsp. vanilla, 1/2 can dried cherries, 1/2 can dried pineapple, 2 Tbsp. cocoa. Here's the instruction: Melt oleo and marshmallows. Add other ingredients. Mold in any shape desired.

input_text: I have sugar, ginger, red chili peppers, water, orange, honey, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sweet & Spicy Dipping Sauce with 1 cup water, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 tablespoon honey, 2 ounces fresh ginger, finely chopped, 1 orange, zest of, 2 Thai red chili peppers, finely chopped, 1/8 teaspoon salt. Here's the instruction: Place all ingredients in small pan over medium heat. Bring to boil then reduce to simmer. Simmer until liquid has reduced by half. Strain liquid into serving bowl or shot glasses & return about 1/4 of the strained ingredients back to the bowl for garnish.

input_text: I have chicken breasts, romano cheese, dried basil, breadcrumbs, parsley, milk, garlic. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Healthy Chicken Romano with 3 tablespoons fine breadcrumbs, 2 tablespoons grated romano cheese or 2 tablespoons parmesan cheese, 1 teaspoon dried parsley, 1/2 teaspoon dried basil, 1/8 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 cup skim milk, 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 425. Meanwhile, in a shallow dish combine bread crumbs, cheese, parsley, basil and garlic powder. Pour milk into another shallow dish. Dip chicken pieces into milk, then roll them in the crumb mixture. Place coated pieces in an ungreased 13 x 9 baking dish. Bake in the 425 oven for about 15-20 min or until poultry is tender and no longer pink. To serve, transfer to a serving platter.

input_text: I have sauerkraut, red paprika, black pepper, instant chicken, white rice, onion, water, ground beef, olive oil, tomato sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lilyana'S Lazy Cabbage Rolls with 1 lb ground beef or 1 lb ground turkey, 1 small onion, chopped, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon black pepper, 1 teaspoon red paprika, 1 teaspoon instant chicken bouillon granules or 1 chicken bouillon cube, 1 (14 1/2 ounce) can sauerkraut (or less), 2 cups dry uncle ben's quick-cooking white rice (or 5 min. white rice), 2 cups water, 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce. Here's the instruction: Brown and drain ground beef or ground turkey. Saute chopped onion in olive oil, add to meat. Add pepper, paprika, Instant Chicken Bouillon & Seasoning granules to onion/ground beef mix. Rinse sauerkraut in collander one time, drain. Add sauerkraut to mix, stir and cook for 2 minutes. Add dry rice, tomato sauce, and water to mix. Stir occasionally. Cook 15 minutes or until rice is done.

input_text: I have green onions, broccoli, cream cheese. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Broccoli Cheese Ball with 8 oz. cream cheese, 1 bunch green onions, tops of 1/2 broccoli bunch. Here's the instruction: Mix the cream cheese, chopped green onions and shredded broccoli tops together. Mold into ball; set in refrigerator until time to serve. Serve on a bed of lettuce, with crackers.

input_text: I have ground beef, mozzarella cheese, macaroni. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Macaroni And Beef with 1 lb. ground beef, 1 lb. macaroni or shells, 1 jar of Ragu, 1 pkg. of mozzarella cheese. Here's the instruction: Brown ground beef.
