Cook macaroni until tender. Drain ground beef and macaroni. In the same pot, add Ragu and ground beef. Cook for about 5 minutes. Add macaroni to sauce and ground beef. In baking dish layer macaroni and beef with cheese. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. Serve with garlic bread and salad.

input_text: I have sweet butter, corn, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Corn On The Cob  with 6 corn on the cob, sweet butter, salt. Here's the instruction: Shuck and clean 6 fresh yellow sweet corn butter and season to taste wrap in aluminum foil cook on grill rotating for 20 minutes.

input_text: I have cabbage, tomatoes, bay leaf, onion, parsley flakes, water, speckled beans, veg-all, hamburger, vegetable oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Basic Vegetable Soups with 2 large cans tomatoes, 1 large can Veg-All (chunky), 1 large can water, 1 tsp. vegetable oil, salt and pepper to taste, 1 lb. crumbled hamburger meat, 1/2 c. speckled beans, 1/2 c. shredded cabbage, 1 diced onion, 1 bay leaf, 1/2 tsp. parsley flakes. Here's the instruction: Cook until meat and vegetables are tender.

input_text: I have egg, onion soup, apple jelly, ground chuck, bread crumbs, ketchup, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cocktail Meatballs with 2 lb. ground chuck, 1 envelope onion soup mix, 1 egg, 1/4 c. bread crumbs, 2 Tbsp. butter, 2 (14 oz.) bottles tangy hot ketchup, 1 (10 oz.) apple jelly. Here's the instruction: Saute bite size meatballs in butter (allow for shrinkage). Combine jelly and ketchup and pour over meatballs. Simmer 30 to 40 minutes. Serve with toothpicks.

input_text: I have sugar, dijon mustard, tarragon wine vinegar, pepper, fresh parsley, hearts, shrimp, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Marinated Shrimp and Artichokes with 1 pound Cooked Shrimp, 14 ounces, weight Canned Artichoke Hearts, Drained And Cut In Half, 2 Tablespoons Dijon Mustard, 1/4 cups Tarragon Wine Vinegar, 1 teaspoon Sugar, 1 pinch Salt, 1 teaspoon Pepper, 1/2 cups Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 1 Tablespoon Fresh Parsley, Minced. Here's the instruction: Combine the shrimp and artichokes in a large bowl. In a small bowl, whisk together the Dijon, vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper. Slowly drizzle in the oil, whisking constantly, until thick and creamy. Pour the dressing over the shrimp mixture and toss well. Cover and refrigerate overnight. When ready to serve, bring to room temperature and mix in the parsley. Taste for seasoning and add additional salt if necessary.

input_text: I have lemon juice, onion soup, pumpernickel bread, swiss cheese, garlic powder, margarine, mustard. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Party Pumpernickel Loaf with 1 loaf pumpernickel bread, unsliced, 1/2 lb. Swiss cheese slices, 2 sticks margarine or butter, 1 Tbsp. dry mustard, 2 Tbsp. lemon juice, 2 Tbsp. dry onion soup mix, 2 tsp. garlic powder. Here's the instruction: Slice loaf diagonally almost all the way through, about 1/2 to 1 inch apart. Turn loaf. Slice diagonally again (end up with diamond pattern). Stuff loaf with pieces of Swiss cheese.

input_text: I have extra-virgin olive oil, heavy cream, yellow-fleshed potatoes, eggs, carrots, garlic, haricots verts, anchovy. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Vegetables and Hard-Boiled Eggs with Anchovy Cream with 1 lb small yellow-fleshed potatoes such as Yukon Gold, peeled and quartered lengthwise, 4 large carrots, cut diagonally into 1/2-inch-thick slices, 1/2 lb haricots verts or regular green beans, trimmed, 6 hard-boiled large eggs, peeled, 4 flat anchovy fillets, 2 large garlic cloves, minced, 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 1 1/4 cups heavy cream. Here's the instruction: Cook potatoes and carrots in a 6- to 8-quart pot of boiling salted water until tender, about 10 minutes. Transfer with a slotted spoon to a large platter and keep warm, covered loosely with foil. Add beans to simmering water and cook until just tender, 3 to 6 minutes. Drain beans in a colander and arrange on platter. Halve eggs and arrange on platter. Cook anchovies and garlic in oil in a medium nonstick skillet over moderate heat, mashing anchovies with back of a fork, until anchovies are disintegrated and garlic is fragrant, about 2 minutes. Add cream and boil, stirring occasionally, until slightly thickened, about 3 minutes, then season with salt and pepper. Transfer to a sauceboat and serve with vegetables and eggs.

input_text: I have sugar, cloves, sauce, soy sauce, cucumber, ground beef, cumin, sour cream, lemon juice, grape leaves, chicken broth, dill, allspice, lemon, olive oil, salt, jasmine rice, pepper, garlic. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Stuffed Grape Leaves & Tzatziki Sauce with Grape Leaves, 1 pound Ground beef, 1 cup Uncooked jasmine rice, 3 Garlic cloves, minced, 1 teaspoon Salt, 1/2 teaspoon Pepper, 1 teaspoon Cloves, 1 teaspoon Allspice, 16 ounces Jar of grape leaves, 1/3 cup Olive oil, 1/3 cup Lemon juice, 1/3 cup Chicken broth, Tzatziki Sauce, 3 Garlic cloves, 1/2 Large cucumber, peeled and chopped in large pieces, 1 Bunch fresh dill leaves, 1 Lemon, juiced, 1 teaspoon Salt, 1 tablespoon Sugar, 2 tablespoons Soy sauce, 1/2 teaspoon cumin, 2 cups sour cream. Here's the instruction: Place 1 cup of the rice and 2 cups of water in a small saucepan, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook until all the liquid is absorbed, about 15 minutes. Place cooked rice in a large mixing bowl, add beef and spices, and mix well. Carefully pull the leaves out of the jar and strain off the liquid. To roll the leaves, place one in front of you and put a spoonful of the filling in the center of the leave. Put more filling in the bigger leaves, and less in the smaller leaves. Roll the bottom of the leave over the filling tightly, then roll each side over to the center, and then roll up until sealed. Place the leaves seam side down in a large baking pan. Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, and chicken broth together until thickened; pour over the grape leaves. Cover with foil and bake at 350* for 1 hour. Place garlic, cucumber, and dill in food processor, turn to high until finely chopped. Transfer to a medium sized bowl and add the other ingredients. Mix well and serve with the grape leaves.

input_text: I have sour cream, cheddar cheese, bacon bits. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cheddar Ranch Dip with 1 (16 ounce) container sour cream, 1 (1 ounce) package dry Ranch-style dressing mix, 1 (3 ounce) can bacon bits, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese. Here's the instruction: In a medium bowl, thoroughly blend the sour cream and ranch-style dressing mix. Mix in the bacon bits and Cheddar cheese. Chill in the refrigerator 20 minutes or longer before serving.

input_text: I have sugar, lemons, lemon zest, milk, whipping cream. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lemon Sorbet with 1 cup milk, 1 cup whipping cream (unwhipped), 5 lemons, juice of (1 cup lemon juice), 2/3 cup sugar (berry or superfine sugar), 1/2 teaspoon lemon zest. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients together, stirring well. If you cant get berry sugar or superfine sugar, regular sugar can be used if you put it thru a food processor and pulse a few times. Cool in fridge for at least two hours. Using ice cream machine follow manufactures intructions. (25 minutes) Is how long mine takes. Scoop out pulp from lemons. Trim bottom of lemon cups so they dont rock. When sorbet is ready scoop into lemon cups and garnish with lemon zest. Return to freezer until ready to serve or store lemon sorbet in freezer and scoop just before serving.

input_text: I have salad oil, asparagus, pepper. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chinese Style Asparagus Recipe with 1 1/2 to 2 lbs. asparagus, 1 tbsp. salad oil, Dash pepper. Here's the instruction: Snap off woody base of stalk at "breaking point" where tender part begins. Slice on extreme bias so slices are about 1/4 inch thick and 1 1/2 inches long on bias. Heat oil in large skillet. Add in asparagus slices and dash of pepper. Cover. Shake pan over high heat (like popping corn) just till tender. This takes only 4 to 5 min. Do not overcook!

input_text: I have buttermilk, baking powder, eggs, baking soda, flour, white cornmeal, sausage, vegetable oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Corn Stick Surprise with 2 c. white cornmeal, 2 eggs, 2 c. buttermilk, 1/4 tsp. salt, 2 doz. smoked sausage links, 1/2 c. flour, 1 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. baking soda, 4 Tbsp. vegetable oil. Here's the instruction: You will need small metal or iron corn stick irons, divided into small sections. If using long irons, use 2 sausage.

input_text: I have sugar, thawed whipped topping, cookies, chocolate, cream cheese. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make No-Bake Chocolate Cheesecakes For Two with 2 ounces cream cheese, softened, 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 square semisweet baking chocolate, melted, 1/2 cup thawed whipped topping (Cool Whip), 2 Oreo cookies. Here's the instruction: Beat cream cheese, sugar and chocolate in medium bowl with wire whisk until well blended. Add whipped topping; mix well. Place 1 cookie on bottom of each of 2 paper-lined medium muffin cups; fill evenly with cream cheese mixture. Refrigerate 2 hours or overnight.

input_text: I have fresh ground black pepper, egg, spring roll wrappers, soy sauce, onion, ground lean pork, celery, carrot, garlic, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lumpia (Filipino Spring Rolls) with 25 spring roll wrappers, 1 lb ground lean pork, 3 garlic cloves, minced, 1 onion, minced, 1 medium carrot, peeled and grated, 1/2 cup celery, diced into small pieces, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 egg, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper, 1 egg white, for sealing rolls, 2 -4 cups canola oil (for frying). Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, combine pork, garlic, onion, carrot, celery, soy sauce, egg, salt and pepper. Carefully separate the wrappers. To prevent them from drying out as you work, keep a barely damp paper towel over the unused wrappers. Lay one wrapper on clean surface. Place 1 heaping tablespoon of the filling diagonally near one corner of the wrapper and gently push the filling into about 4-inch log, leaving a 11/2 inch space at both ends. Fold the side nearest to you over the filling, then fold in both sides and roll neatly and tight. Moisten the other side of the wrapper with beaten egg white to seal the edge. Cover the rolls with plastic wrap to retain moisture. Repeat with remaining wrappers. At this point, lumpia can be frozen until ready to use. In a deep pan, add the oil to about 1-inch depth and heat to 350°F Make sure the oil is hot enough before adding the wrappers by testing the edge of one. If it sizzles and bubbles, then the oil is ready. Carefully slide the lumpia, a few at a time, into the oil and fry until crispy and golden brown on all sides, 3 to 5 minutes total. Do not overcrowd pan during frying. Remove from oil and drain on paper towels. Ensure that oil is back to 350 degrees before frying the next batch. Serve hot with sweet and sour sauce or other sauce of your choice. Enjoy!

input_text: I have mango, curry powder, coconut, cream cheese. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Curried Chutney Balls with 4 ounces shredded coconut, 8 ounces cream cheese, softened, 1 tablespoon mango chutney, finely chopped, 1 teaspoon curry powder. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350. Spread coconut on a jelly roll pan and bake, stirring frequently until lightly toasted, about 7 minutes. Let cool. In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, chutney and curry powder. Blend well. Pinch off about 1 teaspoon cheese mixture at a time and form 24 balls. Just before serving, roll in toasted coconut.

input_text: I have green bell pepper, stalks celery, mushroom soup, rice, chicken, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken And Mushroom Soup with 1 whole chicken (3 to 4 lb.), salt and pepper, 1 green bell pepper, 4 stalks celery, 1 c. rice, 1 can mushroom soup. Here's the instruction: Cut up chicken and cook in salt and pepper until meat is almost done. Add celery (cut up) and green pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes; add can of mushroom soup. Cover 5 minutes more. Cook until rice is done. Separately follow instructions on rice box, preferably Uncle Ben's wild rice. Serve chicken over rice.

input_text: I have pepper, tomato paste, eggs, onion, celery, breadcrumbs, garlic, ground chicken, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Baked Buffalo Chicken Mini Meatballs with 2 lbs ground chicken, 2 large eggs, 1 cup panko breadcrumbs (you can use gluten free), 1/4 teaspoon celery seed, 3/4 cup texas pete original hot sauce (it's gluten free), 1/2 cup finely chopped onion, 1/2 teaspoon minced garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1/3 cup melted salted butter (3/4 stick), 3 -5 tablespoons tomato paste. Here's the instruction: line cookie sheet with foil and spray foil with cooking spray. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. in a large bowl, mix ground chicken, panko, celery seed, 1/4 cup of the hot sauce, chopped onion, minced garlic, 2 eggs, salt and pepper. The mixture will be very sticky unlike my other meatball mix (but this is correct). With damp hands shape into 1.5-2 inch balls the best you can (they do not need to be perfect) and place evenly on prepped cookie sheet. spray the top of the meatballs with a little cooking spray. important. why? it gives you a crispier / more brown meatball. bake meatballs at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove from oven, flip them and bake for an additional 10 minutes (if all the mix does not fit on your cookie sheet, refrigerate mix as you will need to bake a second batch. Do not forget to put new foil and spray on the cookie sheet for second round). sauce: in small bowl melt 3/4 cup softened butter (about 30 sec in microwave) and add the remaining 1/2 cup of hot sauce. Taste sauce. A little too hot for you or the kids? That's ok, whisk in 3-5 tbsp of tomato paste until the desired 'heat' is reached (I usually add 3 tbsp tomato paste when I make the sauce). drizzle the sauce over the meatballs; gently toss to coat. transfer to serving dish with some celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.

input_text: I have fresh fruit, lemon curd, sugar cookie. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fresh Fruit Pizza Cookies with sugar cookie, lemon curd, fresh fruit. Here's the instruction: Top the sugar cookies with lemon curd and arrange fresh fruit on top. Could be done with puff pastry, small cooked pie crusts or anything else your imagination can conjure. Found the Cooking Light recipe and it was a big 12" sugar cookie. It had raspberry jam under the lemon curd with raspberries, blackberries, strawberries and plum. It was then broiled for 3 minutes.

input_text: I have frozen corn, bulgur, black beans, ground cumin, pepper, shredded monterey jack cheese, lime juice, orange juice, olive oil, carrots, jalapeno pepper, vegetable broth, fresh cilantro. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Black Bean Bulgur Salad with 1 cup bulgur, 2 cups vegetable broth, 1/4 cup orange juice, 1/4 cup lime juice, 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 cup shredded carrots, 3 tablespoons minced fresh cilantro, 1 can (15 ounces) black beans, rinsed and drained, 1 cup frozen corn, thawed, 3/4 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese, Sliced jalapeno pepper, optional. Here's the instruction: Place bulgur and broth in a small saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, covered, until tender, 12-15 minutes. Transfer to a large bowl; cool slightly. For dressing, whisk together citrus juices, minced jalapeno, oil and cumin. Add 1/3 cup dressing to bulgur; stir in carrots and cilantro. To serve, divide bulgur mixture among four bowls. Top with beans, corn, cheese and, if desired, sliced jalapeno. Drizzle with remaining dressing.

input_text: I have coffee, chocolate, cacao, cream, drambuie. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Buie Coffee with 12 ounce dark Creme de Cacao, 1 ounce drambuie, 4 ounces hot coffee, 2 ounces cream, 1 dash chocolate or 1 dash cocoa powder. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients except cream in an Irish coffee mug. Stir well. Layer the cream on top and add a sprinkle of cocoa powder.

input_text: I have almond, vanilla, lemon juice, cream cheese, handfuls raspberries, ricotta, honey. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sweet Whipped Ricotta with 1 cup ricotta, 4 ounces cream cheese, 4 tablespoons honey (plus more as desired), 1 splash vanilla extract, 1 splash almond extract (optional), 2 handfuls raspberries, Lemon juice (to serve). Here's the instruction: In the bowl of a standing mixer, blend the ricotta, cream cheese, honey, vanilla, and almond extract (if using) together. Taste and add more honey, as desired. Serve topped with fresh raspberries and a squeeze of lemon.

input_text: I have egg yolks, pepper, sweet sherry, onion, fresh mushrooms, milk, garlic, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mushroom Soup with 1 lb fresh mushrooms, sliced thin, salt, pepper, 2 tablespoons butter, 2 cloves minced garlic, 2 cups milk, 1 small onion, minced, 1 cup half-and-half, 4 egg yolks, 34 cup sweet sherry. Here's the instruction: Soak mushrooms in milk while sauteing onion in butter. In saucepan, add half and half, milk, mushrooms, sauteed onions, salt and pepper and simmer for 25 minutes. Place egg yolks in a bowl and mix with sherry. Pour egg yolk mixture slowly into ingredients in saucepan stirring constantly. Serve immediately.

input_text: I have vanilla, sweet, corn syrup, brown sugar, pastry, molasses, ground nutmeg, cornstarch, rum-flavored, caramel syrup, ground cinnamon. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Tamara'S Jamaican Apple Pie with 1 pastry for a 9-inch double crust pie, divided, 8 cups peeled, cored, and sliced sweet, firm apples, 1/2 cup firmly packed light brown sugar, 1/4 cup molasses, 1/4 cup dark corn syrup, 3 tablespoons cornstarch, 1 teaspoon rum-flavored extract, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 tablespoon caramel syrup, or to taste. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Line the bottom of a deep-dish pie plate with 1 pie crust. Combine apples, brown sugar, molasses, corn syrup, cornstarch, rum extract, vanilla extract, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a bowl. Mix well and pour over the crust. Cover with top crust. Cut slits into the dough and crimp the edges. Wrap bottom and sides of the pie plate in aluminum foil. Bake in the preheated oven until crust is golden brown, 50 minutes to 1 hour. Cool for 15 to 20 minutes and serve with caramel syrup drizzled on top.

input_text: I have syrup, lemon, brick of soft tofu. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make GriggsO Recipe LindaGriggs with 1/2 brick of soft tofu, 1/2 carton of yogurt aka 16 oz, 2 boxes of jello. Lemon and orange are my fave., Marco Polo Sour Cherry syrup is a nice optional topping.. Here's the instruction: Put the two jello powders in a bowl and add the least amount of boiling water you can to dissolve them. Then add an ice cube or two to cool them back to room temp. Put the tofu and yogurt in a blender. Blend till smooth. Add the melted, cooled jello. Pour into your fave mold. Dont be afraid to use Pam and wipe it out if you have a fancy mold. Chill, decant, slice and eat. Marco Polo Sour Cherry syrup is a nice optional topping.

input_text: I have egg, sugar, pecans, cracker crumbs, cheese, mayonnaise, margarine, yellow squash. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pecan Squash Casserole with 1 lb. yellow squash, 1/2 c. mayonnaise, 1 1/2 tsp. sugar, 1 egg, beaten, 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese, 1/2 stick margarine, 1/2 c. chopped pecans, 1/2 c. Ritz cracker crumbs. Here's the instruction: Blanch corn-on-the-cob, then cool in ice water. Wrap each ear separately in foil; store in freezer. To cook, drop wrapped corn into pot of boiling water and return to boil. Cook for 8 to 10 minutes. Serve in foil. Keeps very moist.

input_text: I have egg yolks, bread, almond, sugar, vanilla, lemon juice, eggs, ground nutmeg, raisins, cold water, cornstarch, milk, white bread, cream, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Grandmother’S Bread Pudding With Lemon Sauce with 5 large eggs, 3 cups 2% milk, 1-1/4 cups sugar, 1 cup half-and-half cream, 1/4 cup butter, melted and cooled, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1 teaspoon almond extract, 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 4 cups cubed day-old white bread, 4 cups cubed day-old wheat bread, 1/3 cup raisins, 1-1/2 cups sugar, 1/3 cup cornstarch, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2-1/4 cups cold water, 3 egg yolks, beaten, 1/3 cup lemon juice, 2 tablespoons butter. Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, combine the first eight ingredients. Stir in bread cubes and raisins. Transfer to a greased 13x9-in. baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45-55 minutes or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. For sauce, combine the sugar, cornstarch, salt and water in a large saucepan until smooth. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly. Remove from the heat. Stir a small amount of hot filling into egg yolks; return all to the pan, stirring constantly. Bring to a gentle boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat; gently stir in lemon juice and butter. Serve with bread pudding. Refrigerate leftovers.

input_text: I have sugar, brown sugar, cinnamon, crackers, water, cream of tartar, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mock Apple Pie with 1 1/2 c. sugar, 2 c. water, 1/4 c. brown sugar, a few dots butter, 2 tsp. cream of tartar, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 20 Ritz crackers. Here's the instruction: Put white sugar, cream of tartar and water in a saucepan; bring to full boil. Drop in Ritz crackers. Let boil for 2 minutes, with no stirring. Pour mixture into unbaked pie shell. Top with brown sugar and cinnamon; put dots of butter on top. Add top crust. Bake at 375° for about 15 minutes, or until crust is done.

input_text: I have hot dog, brown sugar, onion powder, pork, mustard, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Beanie Weenies with 2 (15 ounce) cans pork and beans, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce, 1 -2 teaspoon prepared mustard, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1 lb hot dog, halved lengthwise and then cut into thirds. Here's the instruction: Mix first five ingredients in a saucepan. Stir in hot dogs. Simmer 3-4 minutes.

input_text: I have cheddar cheese, onion, shredded green cabbage, red potatoes, milk, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Colcannon with 1 lb red potatoes or 1 lb yukon gold potato, unpeeled, 4 cups shredded green cabbage, 1 cup chopped onion, 1/4 cup milk, 1 tablespoon butter, 3 ounces cheddar cheese or 3 ounces other hard cheese, grated, salt and pepper, to taste. Here's the instruction: Boil potatoes in lightly salted water until tender. Drain,reserving the liquid,and set them aside to cool Using the reserved potato water,boil the cabbage and onion for about 5 minutes- Drain and set aside. When potatoes are cool enough to handle,peel and mash with milk,butter,and salt and pepper,to taste. Add the reserved onion and cabbage mixture. Mix 2/3 of the cheese with the potatoes and transfer to a greased casserole or shallow baking dish. Sprinkle with remaining cheese on top. Heat in a moderately hot oven and let cheese on top brown slightly.

input_text: I have vanilla extract, fudge sauce, shortening, brown sugar, eggs, pecans, flour, unsweetened chocolate, reddi, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fudge Brownies with 1 c. shortening, 4 (1 oz.) sq. unsweetened chocolate, 1 box brown sugar, 4 eggs, beaten, 1 tsp. vanilla extract, 1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 c. chopped pecans, commercial fudge sauce, 1 (7 oz.) can Reddi-Whip whipped topping. Here's the instruction: Combine shortening and chocolate in top of a double boiler; bring water to a boil. Reduce heat to low; cook until chocolate melts. Add sugar, stirring well. Add eggs and vanilla; stir well. Stir in flour and salt and mix thoroughly. Remove chocolate mixture from heat and stir in pecans. Spread batter into a well-greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan. Bake at 400° for 20 minutes. Cool; cut into squares. Serve with fudge sauce and whipped topping. Makes about 3 dozen.

input_text: I have pepper, onion, barbecue sauce, sweet red pepper, sausage, chicken. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bbq Chicken & Smoked Sausage with 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 large sweet red pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces, 4 bone-in chicken thighs, skin removed, 4 chicken drumsticks, skin removed, 1 package (12 ounces) smoked sausage links, cut into 1-inch pieces, 1 cup barbecue sauce, Sliced seeded jalapeno pepper, optional. Here's the instruction: Place first 5 ingredients in a 4- or 5-qt. slow cooker; top with barbecue sauce. Cook, covered, on low until chicken is tender and a thermometer inserted in chicken reads at least 170°-175°, 4-5 hours. Remove chicken, sausage and vegetables from slow cooker; keep warm. Transfer cooking juices to a saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, until thickened, 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve chicken, sausage and vegetables with sauce. If desired, top with jalapeno.

input_text: I have salt, avocado. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Avocado Tuna Salad with 1 Ripe avocado, 2 can Tuna, drained and squeezed, 1 Jalapeno, 1 as needed Salt. Here's the instruction: Drain the cans of tuna, squeeze out as much moisture as possible. Place in a mixing bowl. Half and pit the avocado scoop it out of the skin and add it to the bowl. Using a cheese grater shred the jalapeno into the bowl. For a less spicy version take out the inner membrane and seeds. Salt to taste Combine in the bowl, I used a fork to mash it all together until well combined Use it anywhere you would normally use tuna salad

input_text: I have sweet onion, tomatoes, tomato paste, sweet paprika, extra virgin olive oil, rounds, garlic, chicken, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken And Zucchini In Paprika And Tomato Sauce with 6 chicken thighs on the bone, 1 big sweet onion, 5 cloves of garlic, 2 tablespoons tomato paste, 1 can of tomatoes crushed in the food processor, 2 tablespoons sweet paprika, 4 zucchinis cut to 1.5 cm rounds, Extra virgin olive oil, salt & pepper. Here's the instruction: Put 2 tablespoon of olive oil in wide pan and hit until almost smoking. Salt and pepper the chicken thighs. Add the chicken to the pan, skin side down. Saute in high hit for 7 min on each side until golden brown. Take the chicken out the and lower the hit to medium. Slice the onion to thin slices and add to the pan. Saute for 7-10 min, mixing from time to time, while deglazing the pan. Slice the garlic cloves to thin rounds and add to the pan. Saute for 60 sec. Add the tomato paste, mix well and saute for 1 min. Add the paprika and saute for few more seconds and than add the tomato sauce. Add 1/4-1/2 cup of water to thin the sauce a bit. Bring to a boil. Add back the chicken, bring back to boil and then lower the hit to low and cook for 30 min. Add the zucchini rounds and cook for another 30 min. If the sauce is too thin, cook on high hit for the last 5 min. Serve with rice.

input_text: I have blackberry jell-o, sour cream, sugar, vanilla, pecans, fresh blueberries, cream cheese, boiling water, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Blueberry Salad with 2 (3 oz.) pkg. blackberry Jell-O, 2 c. boiling water, 1 (15 oz.) can or 1 pt. fresh blueberries, baked in small amount water until tender, 1 (8 1/4 oz.) can crushed pineapple, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 pt. sour cream, 1/2 tsp. vanilla, 1/2 c. pecans. Here's the instruction: Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water. Drain blueberries and pineapple. Measure liquid; add enough water to make 1 cup. Add Jell-O to mix. Stir in blueberries and pineapple. Pour into flat pan or Corning Ware dish. Cover; put in refrigerator until firm. Combine cream cheese, sugar, sour cream and vanilla; spread over congealed salad. Sprinkle with chopped nuts.

input_text: I have black beans, fluid fat, ground cumin, pepper, cayenne pepper, green onions, chili powder, shredded lettuce, canola oil, chipotles, water, whole tortillas, cheese, pinto beans, brown rice, fresh salsa, garlic. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Spicy Bean and Rice Burritos with 1 Tablespoon Canola Oil, 2 cloves Garlic, Minced, 1 teaspoon Chili Powder, 1 whole Pepper From A Can Of Chipotles In Adobo, Minced, 1 Tablespoon Sauce From A Can Of Chipotles In Adobo, 1 teaspoon Ground Cumin, 4 dashes Cayenne Pepper, 1 can (15 Oz. Size) Pinto Beans, Drained And Rinsed, 1 can (15 Oz. Size) Black Beans, Drained And Rinsed, 13 cups Water, 2 cups Brown Rice, Cooked According To Package Instructions, 1/4 cups Fresh Salsa, 6 whole Tortillas, Burrito Sized, Warmed, 8 ounces, weight Shredded Cheese, 3 cups Shredded Lettuce, More As Desired, 4 whole Green Onions, Chopped, 8 ounces, fluid Fat Free Greek Yogurt. Here's the instruction: Heat canola oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic, chili powder, chipotle, adobo sauce, cumin, and cayenne. Cook briefly until fragrant, about 30-60 seconds. Add in drained and rinsed beans, and water. Bring to a simmer, then lower heat to medium-low and cook for 8 minutes, mashing the bean mixture slightly. Remove from heat, and stir in rice and salsa. Divide mixture evenly down the center of each tortilla. Top with cheese, lettuce, green onions, and Greek yogurt. Roll up, and serve!

input_text: I have sugar, light corn syrup, vanilla, egg whites, water, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fluffy 7 Minute Frosting with 1 1/2 cups sugar, 1/4 cup water, 2 egg whites, 2 tablespoons light corn syrup, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon vanilla. Here's the instruction: Combine sugar, water, egg whites, corn syrup, and salt in the top of a double boiler; blend. Place over simmering water. Using an electric mixer, beat the mixture constantly at high speed for 7 minutes or until the mixture triples in volume and holds firm peaks. Remove from heat; beat in vanilla. Spread on cooled 2 layer cake.

input_text: I have sugar, brown sugar, cinnamon, syrup, margarine, sweet potatoes. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Candied Yams with 1/2 c. brown sugar, 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 stick margarine or butter, 1/2 c. Karo syrup, 1/2 tsp. cinnamon, 1 c. sweet potatoes. Here's the instruction: Boil syrup, sugars and butter. Pour over potatoes and sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 300° for 20 to 30 minutes.

input_text: I have vanilla, powdered sugar, peanut butter, semi sweet chocolate chips, rice chex, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Muddy Buddies  with 9 c. Corn or rice chex, 1 c. semi sweet chocolate chips, 1/2 cup peanut butter, 1/4 c. butter or margarine, 1 tsp vanilla, 1 1/2 c. powdered sugar. Here's the instruction: In large bowl measure cereal, set aside  in 1 qt. microwave safe bowl microwave chocolate chips, peanut butter, and butter uncovered for 1 min. Stir. Microwave 30 more seconds or until mixture can be stirred smooth.  Stir in vanilla. Pour over cereal, stirring until evenly coated.  Pour into large plastic ziploc bag  Add powdered sugar, shake bag.  Spread out on wax paper to cool. Store in air tight container

input_text: I have velveeta cheese, dish pie shells, pepper, nutmeg, eggs, milk, sausage, whipping cream, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Quiche Lorraine with 2 deep dish pie shells, unbaked, cooked ham, sausage or fried bacon, Velveeta cheese, cubed, 8 eggs, beaten, 2 c. whipping cream, 1 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. pepper, 1/3 c. milk, 1/8 tsp. nutmeg. Here's the instruction: Sprinkle diced ham, sausage or crumbled bacon and cubed Velveeta in pie shell. Beat eggs in bowl; beat in remaining ingredients. Pour egg mixture into pie shell. Bake at 425° for 15 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 300°. Bake about 30 minutes longer or until quiche tests done. Let stand 10 minutes before cutting.

input_text: I have sugar, cake yeast, eggs, flour, milk, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sally Lunn with 1 pt. milk, 3 eggs, 1 tsp. sugar, 1/4 cake yeast, 1 1/2 pt. flour, 1 tsp. salt, 1 oz. butter. Here's the instruction: Scald the milk, add to the butter and let stand to lukewarm. Add yeast, salt, sugar and flour. Beat for 5 minutes. Cover and let stand in a warm place for 2 hours or until very light. Beat egg whites then yolks. Add yolks and then whites. Stir in carefully. Let stand in warm place for 15 minutes, then turn into a greased Turk's head. Bake in moderate oven for 40 minutes.

input_text: I have eggs, chocolate, water, flour, milk, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fool-Proof Chocolate Profiteroles with 1/2 cup water, 1/2 cup 2% milk, 1/2 cup butter, 3/4 cup flour, 4 large eggs, 2 cups thawed Cool Whip Light Whipped Topping, 1 pkg. (225 g) Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400F. Bring water, milk and butter to boil in saucepan on high heat. Cook 1 min., stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Add flour; stir vigorously 1 min. until smooth and well blended. Cook and stir on low heat 1 min. to dry out mixture slightly. Place in medium bowl. Add 2 of the eggs, using spatula to incorporate well. Add remaining eggs, 1 at a time. Stir 2 min. until smooth and glossy. Spoon mixture in 2 tsp. portions, 2 inches apart, on parchment-covered baking sheet. Bake 5 min. Open oven door slightly (1 cm) to allow crisping. Bake an additional 10 min. until golden brown. Transfer buns to wire rack. Cool completely, about 10 min. Slice part way on side of each bun; pipe in 2 tsp. whipped topping. Meanwhile, melt chocolate on low heat in saucepan. Dip bun tops into melted chocolate. Dust with icing sugar, if desired.

input_text: I have bread, egg, chili powder, ground black pepper, worchestershire sauce, cream, glaze-, dr. pepper, fresh thyme, molasses, kosher salt, ground beef, ground pork, bell pepper, cracked black, couple dashes, carrot, paprika, ketchup, sweet onion, bacon, clove garlic, sirloin. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Grill-Roasted Meatloaf with Roast-, 1 pound ground Beef Chuck, 1 pound ground Beef Sirloin, 6 ounces ground Pork, 3 slices sandwich bread, 1 Egg, 1/4 cup Cream, or milk, 1 clove Garlic, chopped, 1/2 sweet onion, diced, 1 large Carrot, diced, 1 small Bell Pepper, 1/2 tablespoon fresh Thyme, chopped, 1/2 tablespoon Chili Powder, 1 teaspoon smoked paprika, couple dashes Tabasco, 1 1/2 teaspoons ground Black Pepper, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 6-8 slices good-quality Bacon, 1/2 tablespoon Worchestershire Sauce, Glaze-, 1/2 cup Ketchup, 2 tablespoons Molasses, 1/4 cup Dr. Pepper, 1 tablespoon cracked black peppercorns. Here's the instruction: Beat egg and cream together. Tear bread into small pieces and soak in milk mixture. Meanwhile, pulse garlic, onion, bell pepper, and time in a food processor until finely minced, but not pureed. Add milk/bread mixture, spices and hot sauce, pulse twice. In a large bowl, combine meats with the mixture and gently mix in. Form into a "loaf". Wrap in plastic and put it in the fridge while making the glaze. For the glaze, combine all ingredients in a small sauce pan and simmer for 5-8 min, until slightly thickened. Preheat grill to high, or oven to 325. If using a grill, heat only one side. Render bacon about halfway, so it is still pliable. Sear meatloaf on all sides, about 3 min per side, then move to cold side of the grill and shingle with bacon. spoon glaze over loaf and close lid. Cook for about 15 minutes, spoon glaze over loaf. Close lid. Cook for about 30 minutes longer, until the meat has reached 155 degrees.

input_text: I have oil, vinegar, sugar, ramen noodles, green onions, soy sauce, sesame seeds, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Oriental Coleslaw with 1 (16 ounce) package coleslaw mix, 5 green onions, 12 cup butter, 14 cup sesame seeds, 2 (3 ounce) packages ramen noodles, broken up (don't use seasoning or cook these, only need dry noodles), 1 cup sugar, 12 cup vinegar, 12 cup oil, 1 tablespoon soy sauce. Here's the instruction: Dice onions, mix with slaw, and set aside. melt butter in skillet, add seeds and noodles and while constantly stirring, saute until lightly browned. set aside. put sugar, vinegar, oil and soy sauce in jar and shake up until well mixed. just before serving, mix everything together and serve.

input_text: I have meat, sour cream, tomatoes, batch, cheese, onions, beans, olives. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Layered Mexican Dip with 1 can beans, 1 small pkg. meat, 1 batch Guacamole Dip, 1 pkg. cheese (Cheddar), grated, 1 pkg. sour cream, 3 chopped tomatoes, 3 chopped onions, 10 chopped olives (black). Here's the instruction: In a casserole dish, layer beans, meat, guacamole dip, sour cream, cheese, onions and olives; put in the refrigerator for 20 minutes. Serve with chips.

input_text: I have stalks celery, fresh turkey, cold water, carrots, enough, yellow onions, honey, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Roasty Thanksgiving Turkey Recipe with An insulated picnic cooler large enough to submerge the turkey, 1 fresh turkey, 12 to 15 lbs, 2 pounds salt, 1 cup honey, cold water, 6 large carrots, 4 stalks celery, 4 large yellow onions. Here's the instruction: Place the turkey in the cooler upside down. Dissolve the salt and honey in one gallon of cold water. Pour over the turkey and add three more gallons of cold water. Turn the turkey a few times to thoroughly mix the salt and honey. Place the cooler in a cold place for four hours for a smaller turkey and as much as six hours for a larger one, no more no less. Remove the turkey from the brine and rinse well under cold running water. Thoroughly dry it with paper towels or clean kitchen towels. Cut the onions in half and along with the carrots and celery fashion a bed in the roasting pan for the turkey to rest on. Place the turkey in a preheated 400 degree oven. Roast one hour then, without opening the oven, turn the heat down to 300 degrees and continue roasting for two to three hours longer, depending on the size of the turkey. After 2 A 1/2 hours, open the oven and check the temperature every 15 minutes or so. Continue roasting until the breast and thigh meat both reach 165 degrees. Let the turkey rest, covered with foil, for 20 to 30 minutes before carving then serve immediately.

input_text: I have potatoes, peas, cream of mushroom soup, water, clove garlic, chicken, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken With Mushroom Sauce with 4 whole chicken legs, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 clove garlic, 3/4 c. canned peas, 1/2 c. water, salt and pepper to taste, 1 Tbsp. olive oil, 2 large potatoes, cut into slices. Here's the instruction: Brown chicken in olive oil and garlic. Add soup, water and potatoes and cook for 45 minutes in covered Dutch oven. Check for doneness by piercing leg with fork. Add peas and salt and pepper. Serve when chicken in cooked and peas are hot. May be served with rice or noodles.

input_text: I have bread, cheddar cheese, peanut butter, mayonnaise. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Southern Peanut Butter Mayo Sandwich with 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon creamy peanut butter, 1 slice crusty white bread, 2 tablespoons shredded cheddar cheese. Here's the instruction: Combine mayonnaise and peanut butter; spread over bread. Top with cheese.

input_text: I have sugar, carnation milk, vanilla wafers, water, cream cheese, margarine, lemon, lemon jell-o. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cheesecake with 2 cans Carnation milk, chilled, 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, 2 pkg. lemon Jell-O, 1 c. hot water, 1 1/2 c. sugar, 1 lemon, juiced, vanilla wafers, use most of box, 1/2 c. margarine, melted. Here's the instruction: Chill milk until cold. Cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Mix Jell-O and water, let cool a little and then mix with cheese mixture; add lemon juice. Beat milk until stiff; fold in cheese mixture. Crush wafers and add melted margarine. Line a 9 x 13 x 2-inch pan with half the crumbs. Pour in cheese mixture and sprinkle remaining crumbs on top. Chill.

input_text: I have egg, sugar, warm water, salt, warm milk, all-purpose, butter, active dry yeast. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Butterhorns(Rolls)   with 4 c. all-purpose flour, 1/2 c. sugar, 1 tsp. salt, 1 c. butter or oleo, 1 (1/4 oz.) pkg. active dry yeast, 1/4 c. warm water (110~ to 115~), 3/4 c. warm milk, 1 egg, lightly beaten, 1/4 c. butter or oleo, melted and divided. Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar and salt. Cut in butter as for pie crust; set aside. Dissolve yeast in water. Add egg with milk to the flour mixture; mix well. Cover and refrigerate overnight.

input_text: I have black pepper, sweet corn, tuna, short grain rice, mayo. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Tuna Mayo Raisu with 1 cup short grain rice cooked Japanese, 1/2 cup tuna drained, choice, 1/2 cup sweet corn canned, 1 tablespoon Kewpie Mayo do not use American mayo or miracle whip, for the love of god! it will taste horrible!, black pepper sprinkling of. Here's the instruction: On top of your hot rice, add your tuna, and corn. Drizzle the mayo over the top in a posh zig zag fashion. Sprinkle with pepper. Enjoy!

input_text: I have penne, tomatoes, heavy cream, italian parsley, hot red pepper, vodka, garlic, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Attack Of The Killer Tomato Sauce With Penne with 2 cloves garlic, peeled, 5 tablespoons olive oil, 1 1/2 lbs ripe fresh tomatoes or 1 1/2 lbs canned tomatoes, drained, salt & freshly ground black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon hot red pepper flakes, 1 lb dried penne, 15 sprigs Italian parsley, leaves only, 2 tablespoons vodka, 1 cup heavy cream, coarse salt. Here's the instruction: Coarsely chop the garlic. Find a sauce pan or skillet that will be large enough for all the cooked pasta and sauce at the end. Heat the oil the saucepan over medium heat and when the oil is warm add the chopped garlic and saute for 3 minutes. If using fresh tomatoes, cut them into 1-inch pieces. Add the fresh or canned tomatoes to the pan and cook for 20 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper, then add the red pepper flakes. Bring a large pot of cold water to a boil. Meanwhile, place the pan with the sauce over low heat and let it simmer while you cook the pasta. Add coarse salt to the boiling water, then add the pasta and cook for 8 to 11 minutes. How long it cooks really depends on the brand of pasta. You should let it go for 1 minute less than for normal al dente. Meanwhile, coarsely chop the parsley. Drain the pasta and add it to the pan with the tomato sauce. Add the vodka, mix very well, and raise the heat to medium. Saute for 1 minute, stirring the pasta vigorously with a wooden spoon. Add the cream, and taste for salt and pepper. Mix for 30 seconds to allow the cream to get well absorbed into the pasta, then sprinkle on the parsley. Transfer pasta to a serving dish, and serve immediately.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, nutmeg, eggs, cinnamon, baking soda, pecans, flour, butter, firm apples, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fresh Apple Cake with 1 1/3 c. sugar, 2 eggs, 1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour, dash of salt, 1/2 tsp. cinnamon, 1 c. chopped pecans, 1/2 c. butter or oleo, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. baking soda, 1/2 tsp. nutmeg, 3 c. diced firm apples. Here's the instruction: Cream sugar and shortening. Add eggs and vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together and add, reserving 1/2 cup of flour to dust nuts and apples. Bake in an 8 x 11-inch greased and floured pan at 350° for about 40 minutes or until done. (A tube pan can be used for this recipe.)

input_text: I have pepper, lemon juice, chicken, garlic, gin, butter, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Easy Olive Martini Chicken with 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 boneless skinless chicken breast halves, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1 tablespoon butter or 1 tablespoon margarine, 2 small garlic cloves, chopped, 2 tablespoons gin, 1 1/2 teaspoons dry vermouth, 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice. Here's the instruction: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Place chicken in the skillet and cook until browned on each side, about 5 minutes per side. Reduce heat to medium low and add the butter and garlic. Saute for about 3 minute Pour in the gin, vermouth, lemon juice, and olives; simmer for 5 to 10 minutes, until the sauce thickens and chicken juices run clear.

input_text: I have crab, lemon pepper, parmesan cheese, hearts, mayonnaise, butter, bread crumbs. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Hot Artichoke Crab Spread Recipe with 1 (14 ounce.) can artichoke hearts, 1 (6 ounce.) can crab, 1 c. grated Parmesan cheese, 1 c. mayonnaise, 1/4 teaspoon lemon pepper seasoning, 1/4 - 1/2 c. seasoned bread crumbs, 1 tbsp. butter. Here's the instruction: Drain artichoke hearts. Chop with crab meat. Add in remaining ingredients (except buttered crumbs). Spoon into lightly greased 10"x6"x2" baking dish. Sprinkle with crumbs that have been mixed with 1 Tbsp. melted butter. Bake at 350 degrees for 20 min or possibly till warm. Serve with crackers as a spread.

input_text: I have sugar, black pepper, white wine vinegar, paprika, garlic, mustard, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make 1969 Oil and Vinegar Dressing with 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoons black pepper, 1/2 teaspoons paprika, 1 pn dry mustard, 1 teaspoon sugar, 1/2 cups olive oil, 1/4 cups white wine vinegar, 1 clove garlic minced. Here's the instruction: Dissolve salt, pepper, paprika, dry mustard and sugar in olive oil. Add vinegar. Peel clove of garlic and let stand in dressing until ready to use. Source: Recipes Out of This World Women of St. Agnes Catholic Church Charleston, WV 1969

input_text: I have bread, egg, sugar, vanilla ice cream, milk, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make 5 Minute French Toast with 1 slice Sliced bread, 1 tsp Butter, 1 *Egg, 1/2 tbsp *Sugar, 50 ml *Milk, 1 *Vanilla essence (optional), 1 Vanilla ice cream. Here's the instruction: Cut the bread into 9 equal pieces. Combine the * ingredients. Completely soak the bread in the mixture. Heat butter in a frying pan and cook the bread until both sides are crisp and browned. It's done! Top with vanilla ice cream, if you like, and enjoy!

input_text: I have egg, pepper, lemon juice, tuna, parsley, tomato juice, bread crumbs, worcestershire sauce, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Tuna Bacon Rolls with 1/4 c. tomato juice, 1 well beaten egg, 1 (7 oz.) can flaked tuna, drained, 1/2 c. fine dry bread crumbs (canned), 1 Tbsp. parsley, 1 Tbsp. lemon juice, 1/4 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce, dash of pepper. Here's the instruction: Mix ingredients well. Cut pieces of bacon in thirds. Place small amount of mixture on bacon piece. Roll up and close with a toothpick. Broil 10 minutes on each side.

input_text: I have eggs, powdered sugar, cream cheese, nuts, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Neiman-Marcus Cake with 1 Duncan Hines butter cake mix, 4 eggs, 1 stick butter, melted, 8 oz. cream cheese, softened, 1 box powdered sugar, 1 c. nuts (optional). Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 350°. Grease and flour a 13 x 9-inch pan. Mix together the cake mix, 2 eggs and melted butter. Spread in prepared pan. Mix the cream cheese, 2 eggs and powdered sugar together and spread on top of first layer. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes.

input_text: I have eggs, cold water, maraschino cherries, walnuts, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Special Cake with 1 box yellow or white cake mix, 1 box instant pudding, 1/2 c. melted butter, 1 c. cold water, 4 eggs, 1/4 c. walnuts or pecans, finely crushed, 15 maraschino cherries, cut fine. Here's the instruction: Mix together. Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

input_text: I have bowl, sugar, pecans, bananas, cream cheese, cherries, graham cracker pie crust, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Banana Split Pie with 1 (9-inch) graham cracker pie crust, 1 (4 oz.) cream cheese, 1 small can crushed pineapple, 3 bananas, sliced, 1 small bowl Cool Whip, 1/2 c. sugar, 1 small jar cherries, chopped, 1/4 c. pecans, chopped. Here's the instruction: Blend together cream cheese and sugar. Spread in bottom of pie crust. Drain pineapple and then spread pineapple on cream cheese mixture, then bananas and Cool Whip. Decorate with cherries and nuts.

input_text: I have vanilla, brown sugar, eggs, peanut butter, baking soda, flour, toffee chips, sugar confectioners, milk, vegetable shortening crisco, vegetable shortening butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Brickle Peanut Butter Cookies with 1 1/4 cups brown sugar, light firmly packed, 3/4 cup peanut butter creamy, 1/2 cup vegetable shortening crisco, 3 tablespoons milk, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, 1 each eggs large, 1 1/2 cups flour, all-purpose, 3/4 teaspoon salt, 3/4 teaspoon baking soda, 1 cup toffee chips, 2 cups sugar confectioners', 1/4 cup vegetable shortening butter flavored, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 x milk, 1 1/2 cups toffee chips. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 375F (190C). Combine brown sugar, peanut butter, shortening, milk and vanilla extract in a large bowl. Beat at medium speed with an electric mixer until well blended. Add egg, beating until just blended. Combine flour, salt and baking soda. Add to creamed mixture at low speed. Stir in toffee bits. mixing until just blended. Drop dough by heaping teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto an ungreased baking sheet. Flatten slightly with hand or a floured bottom of a glass. Bake on baking sheet at a time at 375F (190C) F for 7 to 8 minutes, or until set and just beginning to brown. DO NOT OVERBAKE. Cool on baking sheet 2 minutes. Remove cookies to foil or racks to cool completely. ICING: Combine confectioners' sugar, shortening and vanilla extract in a medium bowl. Beat at low speed. Add milk as needed to make good spreading consistency. Spread icing in center tops of cooled cookies. TOPPING: Dip cookie in toffee bits and gently press them into the icing. Allow icing to set before serving.

input_text: I have celery salt, miracle, pepper, green onions, tabasco sauce, cheddar cheese, pimentos, cheese. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pimento Cheese Spread with 1 lb. sharp Cheddar cheese, 1 lb. Monterey Jack cheese, 4 green onions, diced, 1 (4 oz.) jar sliced, diced pimentos, drained, 1/4 tsp. celery salt, 1/4 tsp. Lawry's seasoned pepper, 4 or 5 dashes of Tabasco sauce, Miracle Whip. Here's the instruction: Grate cheese; add all other ingredients. Mix well. Add Miracle Whip to taste.

input_text: I have apple, pack pineapple, light raisins, celery, mayonnaise, apples, shredded crisp cabbage. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cabbage Pineapple Slaw with 3 c. shredded crisp cabbage, 1 (8 oz.) can (1 c.) dietetic pack pineapple tidbits, drained, 1 c. diced apples, 1/2 c. chopped celery, 1/4 c. light raisins, 1/2 c. low calorie mayonnaise, lettuce, apple. Here's the instruction: Combine cabbage, pineapple tidbits, apple, celery and raisins. Toss with low calorie mayonnaise until well coated. Serve on lettuce lined bowl. Garnish with apple.

input_text: I have wooden skewers, almond, vanilla, apple chunks, applesauce, fresh strawberries, grapes, ground cinnamon, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fruit Skewers With Apple Cinnamon Dipping Sauce with 1/2 cup vanilla Greek-style yogurt, 2 tablespoons applesauce (such as Mott's(R) Natural Applesauce), 1/8 teaspoon almond extract, 1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 cup seedless grapes, 1 cup fresh strawberries, 1 cup apple chunks, 1 cup pineapple chunks, 8 (6 inch) wooden skewers. Here's the instruction: Stir yogurt, applesauce, almond extract, and cinnamon together in a bowl until dipping sauce is well-combined. Thread grapes, strawberries, apple chunks, and pineapple chunks alternatively onto skewers. Arrange finished skewers on a plate and serve with dipping sauce.

input_text: I have egg, chicken gravy, green onion, progresso plain bread crumbs, mushroom, cheese, paprika, chicken. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Italian Kitchen Chicken Crescent Calzones with 1 (8 ounce) can Pillsbury Refrigerated Crescent Dinner Rolls, 6 ounces sliced oven-roasted chicken (4 2 oz slices from deli), 4 ounces sliced monterey jack cheese, 1 (8 ounce) can Green Giant mushroom pieces and stems, drained, 1 egg, beaten, 12 cup Progresso Plain Bread Crumbs, 1 (12 ounce) jar chicken gravy, 14 cup sliced green onion, 14 teaspoon paprika. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 375F. Spray cookie sheet with nonstick cooking spray. Separate dough into 4 rectangles. Firmly press perforations to seal. Press each to form 6x5-inch rectangle. Top each rectangle to within 1/2 inch of edge with slice of chicken, slice of cheese and 1 tablespoon of the mushrooms. Reserve remaining mushrooms for gravy. Fold dough in half, forming a square; pinch edges to seal. Dip each calzone in egg; coat with bread crumbs. Place on sprayed cookie sheet. Bake at 375F. for 20 to 25 minutes or until deep golden brown. Meanwhile, in medium saucepan, combine gravy and reserved mushrooms; cook over medium heat until hot, stirring occasionally. Serve gravy over calzones; sprinkle with onions and paprika.

input_text: I have egg, ground coffee, vanilla, salt, coffee, baking soda, brown sugar, white chocolate chips, flour, white sugar, semi-sweet chocolate chips, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Black and White Coffee Chip Cookies with 1 12 cups all-purpose flour, 12 teaspoon baking soda, 14 teaspoon salt, 23 cup unsalted butter, softened, 12 cup white sugar, 12 cup firmly packed light brown sugar, 1 large egg, 1 teaspoon instant coffee powder (dissolved in the vanilla extract), 1 12 teaspoons pure vanilla extract, 4 teaspoons fine ground coffee, 12 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips, 12 cup white chocolate chips. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Lightly grease 2 baking sheets or line them with parchment paper. Sift together the flour, baking soda, and salt into a small bowl; set aside. In a large bowl, with an electric mixer on medium speed, cream together the butter and sugars until light and fluffy, scraping the bowl to make sure the batter is evenly blended. Add the egg, instant coffee-vanilla mixture and ground coffee and blend on medium speed about 1 minute. Add the flour mixture and mix on medium speed until blended, about 1 minute. Stir in both kinds of chocolate chips with a wooden spoon. Drop the dough by tablespoonfuls onto the baking sheets, about 2 inches apart. Bake 1 sheet at a time for 10 to 12 minutes, or until the cookies are golden around the edges (check early). Cool cookies on wire racks.

input_text: I have egg, oregano, parmesan cheese, onion, parsley flakes, garlic powder, milk, ground beef, bread crumbs. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Italian Meatballs Recipe with 1 lb. ground beef, 1 egg, 1 c. bread crumbs (Italian seasoned), 1/2 c. milk, 2 tsp. grated Parmesan cheese (optional), 1/2 tsp. oregano, 1 tsp. parsley flakes, 1 tsp. onion flakes, powder or salt, 1/2 tsp. garlic powder. Here's the instruction: Combine ingredients. Shape into 1 1/2 inch meatballs. Place in covered skillet (fry pan) in oven 15 minutes (325-350 degrees). Do not overcook. Turn meatballs over. Cook for another 15 minutes. Drain liquid. Place meatballs in desired spaghetti sauce. Heat until sauce is hot and serve.

input_text: I have whipping cream, parmesan cheese, tots, pepper. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Gnocchi-Style TATER TOTS al Pesto with 2 cups ORE-IDA TATER TOTS, 3/4 cup whipping cream, 3/4 cup CLASSICO Traditional Basil Pesto Sauce and Spread, 1/4 tsp. pepper, 2 Tbsp. KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 425 degrees F. Bake TATER TOTS as directed on package. Meanwhile, bring cream just to simmer on low heat. Add pesto and pepper; stir until blended. Keep warm. Place TATER TOTS in large bowl. Add cream sauce; mix lightly. Sprinkle with cheese.

input_text: I have apple brandy, applejack, hard cider, your choice. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Stone Fence Recipe with one ounce applejack, one ounce apple brandy, one ounce dark rum or whiskey of your choice, one bottle hard cider, ice cubes (optional). Here's the instruction: In a 12 to 16-ounce glass, pour one ounce of applejack, apple brandy, dark rum or whiskey of your choice. Fill with hard cider; add a couple of ice cubes, if desired.

input_text: I have cheese, mustard, vienna. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pigs In A Blanket with canned biscuits, 1 can Vienna, sliced cheese, mustard. Here's the instruction: Roll out each biscuit flat. Spread a small amount of mustard on each biscuit. Put a piece of cheese on each one, then roll a Vienna up in biscuit. Put on ungreased cookie sheet and bake according to biscuit directions.

input_text: I have condensed milk, graham cracker crumbs, pecans, margarine, coconut, semi-sweet chocolate chips. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Magic Cookie Bars with 1/2 c. margarine, 1 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs, 1 1/3 c. coconut, 1 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips, 1 c. chopped pecans, 1 can sweetened condensed milk. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°. Melt margarine in oven in 13 x 9-inch pan. Remove from oven; sprinkle crumbs over margarine, pressing down with a fork. Sprinkle coconut over crumbs; add a layer of chips and one of pecans. Drizzle condensed milk evenly over the top. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes, or until golden brown. Cool and cut into bars. Makes 3 dozen cookies.

input_text: I have oil, oregano, vinegar, pepper, mushrooms, pimento, clove garlic, parsley, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pickled Mushrooms with 1 lb. mushrooms, 4 Tbsp. vinegar, 3 Tbsp. oil, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. oregano, 2 Tbsp. pimento, 1 Tbsp. parsley, 1 clove garlic, dash of pepper. Here's the instruction: Cook mushrooms in salted water 5 to 8 minutes. Drain. Mix other ingredients and add.

input_text: I have sugar, baking powder, nutmeg, eggs, molasses, cinnamon, all-purpose, milk, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Molasses Doughnuts with 3/4 cup sugar, 3 tablespoons soft butter, 3/4 cup milk, 2 eggs, 1/4 cup molasses, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 3 teaspoons baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon nutmeg, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon. Here's the instruction: Cream sugar and butter together. Add milk, eggs and molasses. Mix well. Mix ands sift remaining ingredients. Add to liquid mixture and mix thoroughly. Refrigerate for 1 1/2 hours. Turn out on a lightly floured board and roll to 1/2 inch thickness - cut with doughnut cutter. Fry in deep hot fat, 375F, until golden brown. Sprinkle with sugar.

input_text: I have vanilla, salt, cream cheese filling, granulated sugar, powdered sugar, cream cheese, shortbread, flour, fresh berries, whipping cream, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text:
You can make Fresh Berry Shortbread Tart With Cream Cheese Filling with Shortbread Crut, 2 cups all purpose flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 cup unsalted butter, softened, 1/2 cup powdered sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, Cream Cheese Filling, 1 cup whipping cream, 8 ounces cream cheese, softened, 2/3 cup granulated sugar, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 3 cups fresh berries, 1 tablespoon powdered sugar. Here's the instruction: To prepare crust, sift the flour and salt in a large bowl. Set aside. Cream butter and powdered sugar in a bowl of a standing mixer until light and fluffy. Beat in vanilla.
Reduce the speed to low and beat in the flour mixture until just incorporated. Gather dough and form a dish. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for about 30 minutes to chill. Preheat oven to 350F. Grease a tart pan with a removable bottom. On a lightly floured surface, roll out the dough to 1/4 inch thickness. Line the prepared pan with the rolled dough. Leave a tiny overhand of dough. Use a small kitchen knife to trim the excess and to score the tops of the tart. Bake the crust for 15 to 20 minutes, or until the edge is lightly browned. Remove from oven and let the crust cool completely before removing from the pan. To prepare filling, in the bowl of a standing mixer fitted with the whisk attachment, beat the cream until it holds firm peaks. Remove cream from bowl and keep cold in fridge. In the same bowl, use a paddle attachment, beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla until it's soft and creamy.
Gently fold 1/3 of the whipped cream into the cream cheese mixture to lighten the mixture, then add the remaining cream and continue folding until incorporated. Pour the cream mixture in the cooled crust. Smooth the top with a spatula. Arrange berries on top of the pie. Refrigerate the tart until set, about 3 hours Garnish with a sprinkle of powdered sugar before serving.

input_text: I have weight cream cheese, frosting, peanut butter, canola oil, chocolate, milk, chocolate chips, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chocolate Peanut Butter Cake Balls with 1 box Dark Chocolate Cake Mix, 1 cup Peanut Butter, 8 ounces, fluid Sweetened, Condensed Milk, 1 can Fudge Frosting, 4 ounces, weight Cream Cheese, 1 package Chocolate Chips, 1 package Peanut Butter Chips, 2 Tablespoons Canola Oil. Here's the instruction: Prepare cake according to package directions for a 9x13 inch pan. Cool. Meanwhile, combine peanut butter and sweetened condensed milk. Add cream cheese and stir until uniform in color. Set aside. Crumble cooled cake into a large bowl, making a pile of fine crumbs. Mix in frosting. Set aside in refrigerator. Form peanut butter mixture into small (1/2 inch) balls, place on a cookie sheet and freeze until firm, about 30 minutes. Remove from freezer and form 1 1/2 to 2 tablespoons of cake mixture around each peanut butter ball. Place cake balls in freezer and freeze until firm, about 30 minutes. Meanwhile, melt chocolate chips in one bowl and peanut butter chips in another. Stir 1 tablespoon canola oil into each. Coat cake balls in either chocolate or peanut butter chips, let set on waxed paper. Any remaining melted chocolate or peanut butter chips can be drizzled over the cake balls. Store tightly covered in the refrigerator or freezer.

input_text: I have jello, graham cracker crust, boiling water, water. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cool N Easy Pie Recipe with 2/3 c. boiling water, 1 pkg. Jello (4 serving size), 1/2 c. water cool (ice cubes), 1-8 ounce. Cold Whip, 1 graham cracker crust (6 ounce). Here's the instruction: Stir boiling water with Jello till dissolved. Add in 1/2 c. cool water or possibly ice cubes, then stir in Cold Whip till smooth. Chill 10 min. Spoon on crust and wait 4 hrs, or possibly overnight till till hard.

input_text: I have sour cream, tomatoes, tabasco sauce, cream of mushroom soup, processed cheese. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Anthony'S Special Secret Cheese Sauce with 3/4 lb. processed cheese block (cubed), 1 fresh jalapeno seeded and chopped fine, dash of Tabasco sauce, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1/2 c. sour cream, optional: 1 can diced tomatoes (drained). Here's the instruction: Combine mushroom soup and cheese in a double boiler and melt over medium heat, stirring constantly. Add pepper and Tabasco sauce. Remove from heat and pour into bowl. This dish may be used as a cheese sauce with enchiladas, tacos or as a nacho dip. The tomatoes may be added as an option for a different, more colorful flavor.

input_text: I have eggs, for dressing, poultry seasoning, onions, hen, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Hen And Dressing with 1 large hen, cleaned, salt and pepper, Marie's Cornbread For Dressing *, 8 eggs, boiled and diced, 2 large onions, diced, 1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning. Here's the instruction: Clean hen and put in large pot. Add water until almost covered. Salt and pepper. Cook until tender. Prepare Marie's Cornbread for Dressing. In large bowl, crumble cornbread and cover with broth. Mix well. Take meat off bony pieces of chicken, cut up fine and put in mixture. Add eggs, onions and poultry seasoning. Add more broth until dressing is not quite soupy. Mix dressing well. Grease roasting pan. Pour dressing in pan. Place hen on top of dressing. Bake at 300° for 2 hours.

input_text: I have egg, baking powder, sugar, vanilla, shortening, soda, flour, milk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies with 1 1/2 c. unsifted flour, 1/2 tsp. soda, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. shortening, 1 egg, 2 Tbsp. milk, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Mix flour, soda, baking powder, salt and sugar. Cut in shortening until mixture resembles coarse meal. Blend in egg, milk and vanilla. Roll out on floured board. Cut out cookie shapes. Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 400° for 6 to 8 minutes. Makes 3 dozen.

input_text: I have frozen corn, tabasco sauce, celery, cans, pimentos, fish. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Corn Chowderwaterford, Michigan   with Potato soup - 6 small cans, Celery, thin sliced, Pimentos - small jar, drained, 1 lb. frozen corn, 3 lbs. any type baked fish, Tabasco sauce - small jar. Here's the instruction: Prepare soup as directed on can. Chop celery and add to soup.

input_text: I have tomato, scallions, cheddar cheese, cream cheese, frozen spinach, garlic, jalapenos, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Hot Spinach Dip with 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach, 4-5 scallions, finely chopped, 12 oz. cream cheese, softened, 3-4 jalapenos, chopped, 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese, Pinch garlic powder, 1 medium tomato, chopped, Salt & Pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Cook spinach and drain well. Mix all ingredients in microwave safe bowl. Microwave on high until heated through (5-7 minutes). Serve with tortilla chips.

input_text: I have chicken breasts, lightly packed baby spinach leaves, red pepper, cherry tomatoes, milk, italian bread, red onions, fresh basil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Grilled Mediterranean Chicken Salad with 2 slices Italian bread, 1/4 cup KRAFT Italian Roasted Red Pepper Dressing, divided, 2 small boneless skinless chicken breasts (1/2 lb.), 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 1/2 cup KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Mozzarella Cheese, 2 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil, 4 cups lightly packed baby spinach leaves, 1/4 cup thinly sliced red onions. Here's the instruction: Heat grill to medium heat. Brush bread slices with 1 Tbsp. dressing. Brush chicken with 1 Tbsp. of the remaining dressing. Grill chicken 6 to 8 min. on each side or until done (165F). Meanwhile, grill bread slices 1 min. or until lightly toasted on both sides, turning over after 30 sec. Combine tomatoes, cheese and basil. Toss spinach with onions and remaining dressing; spoon onto serving plate. Top with chicken and tomato mixture. Serve with bread.

input_text: I have brown sugar, orange marmalade, cold water, cornstarch, orange juice, cider vinegar, vegetable oil, chops, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Orange Sauced Pork Chops with 4 bone-in pork loin chops (1 inch thick), 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1/2 cup orange juice, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 2 tablespoons orange marmalade, 1 tablespoon cider vinegar, 3 to 4 teaspoons cornstarch, 2 tablespoons cold water, Salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: In a skillet over medium-high heat, brown pork chops on both sides in oil; drain. Combine the orange juice, brown sugar, marmalade and vinegar; pour over chops. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 14-18 minutes or until meat juices run clear. Remove chops and keep warm. Combine cornstarch and water until smooth; stir into pan juices. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with chops.

input_text: I have bacon, clams, shallots, ground black pepper, pimento peppers, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Clams Casino II with 4 tablespoons butter, 1 tablespoon chopped pimento peppers, 2 tablespoons finely chopped shallots, 1 pinch ground black pepper, seasoning salt to taste, 3 slices bacon, 24 small clams. Here's the instruction: In a small bowl, mix together butter, pimento peppers, shallots, ground black pepper and seasoning salt. Form the mixture into a ball shape, and securely wrap with plastic wrap. Place in the freezer approximately 30 minutes, until firm but not solid. Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until browned but still tender. Drain and cut each slice into 8 pieces. Bring a medium pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add clams and cook for 15 to 20 seconds or until open; drain and rinse. Preheat the broiler. Arrange clams on a medium baking sheet. Top each with 1 piece of bacon. Distribute equal portions of the butter mixture onto each clam atop the bacon. Checking often to avoid burning, broil the clams 2 to 3 minutes, until the butter mixture has melted and bacon is crisp.

input_text: I have biscuit, eggs, microwave-safe, kosher salt, pesto, ground black pepper, vegetable oil spray, cheddar, avocado. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Microwave Egg Sandwich With Cheddar And Avocado  with Nonstick vegetable oil spray, vegetable oil, or unsalted butter, 2 large eggs, 1/8 teaspoon kosher salt, Pinch of fresh ground black pepper, 2 tablespoons grated cheddar, 2 slices toast or 1 English muffin, biscuit, or roll, split, toasted, 1/4 avocado, sliced, Hot sauce or pesto (for serving), A microwave-safe, flat-bottomed bowl or cup roughly the size of your sandwich.. Here's the instruction: Spray inside of bowl with nonstick spray or lightly coat with oil or butter. Add eggs, salt, pepper, and 1 Tbsp. water; mix with a fork until combined. Microwave on high 30 seconds; you should see bits of solid egg floating in uncooked part. Stir gently (this will help egg cook evenly) and microwave again 30 seconds or until egg puffs up dramatically. Add cheese and continue to microwave until egg is just set and cheese is melted, 15-30 seconds. Using a small spatula, transfer egg mixture to bottom toast slice. Top with avocado, drizzle with hot sauce or pesto, then top with remaining toast slice. Serve immediately.

input_text: I have red wine, onion, canola oil, celery, kosher salt, turkey legs, thyme, rosemary, bay leaves, flour, carrot, chives, butter, garlic, chicken. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Red Wine–Braised Turkey Legs Recipe with 2 whole turkey legs, Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, 2 tablespoons (30ml) canola oil, 1 large onion, roughly chopped, 1 large carrot, roughly chopped, 2 ribs celery, roughly chopped, 2 medium cloves garlic, smashed, 4 thyme sprigs (about 3 inches each), 2 rosemary sprigs (about 5 inches each), 2 cups (480ml) dry red wine, 1 quart (900ml), or store-bought low-sodium chicken stock, 2 bay leaves, 2 tablespoons (30g) butter, 2 tablespoons flour, 1 tablespoon sliced chives. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 275°F (135°C). Season turkey legs generously with salt and pepper on all sides. Heat oil in a large straight-sided saute pan over high heat until shimmering. Add turkey legs, skin side down. Cook, without moving, until turkey is deep golden brown, about 8 minutes. Flip legs and cook until second side is browned, about 5 minutes longer, reducing heat as necessary if oil smokes excessively. Transfer turkey to a large plate. Return saute pan to heat and add onion, carrot, celery, garlic, thyme, and rosemary. Cook, stirring frequently, until vegetables are well browned, about 8 minutes total. Add wine, bring to a boil, and cook until reduced by half, about 5 minutes. Add stock and bay leaves and bring to a boil. Nestle turkey legs into pan, letting them rest on the vegetables so that only their skin is exposed. Transfer to oven and cook, uncovered, until legs are fall-apart tender, sauce is reduced, and skin is deep mahogany, about 2 hours. Carefully remove from oven and transfer turkey legs to a plate using a slotted spatula. Strain liquid through a fine-mesh strainer into a large bowl or medium saucepan. Discard solids. Skim excess fat from surface and discard. Set liquid aside. In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add flour and cook, whisking constantly, until golden brown, about 2 minutes. Slowly whisk in hot turkey-cooking liquid until fully incorporated. Bring to a boil to thicken and season to taste with salt and pepper. (You may not need any salt, depending on how salty your broth was to begin with.) Carve each turkey leg between the thigh and the drumstick, removing thigh bone if desired. Transfer to a serving platter. Sprinkle with chives and serve with hot gravy.

input_text: I have baking powder, sugar, vanilla, eggs, anise oil, flour, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Italian Pizzelles with 3 eggs, 1 3/4 cups flour, 2 tsp anise oil, 1/2 cup butter or margarine, 2 tsp baking powder, 3/4 cup sugar, 1 tsp vanilla. Here's the instruction: Beat eggs and sugar, add cooled melted butter or margarine, add anise oil. Sift flour and baking powder, add to egg mixture. Batter will be stiff enough to be dropped by spoon onto hot pizzelle maker. These pizzelles are light and crisp and very thin. To keep them crisp, store in an airtight container.

input_text: I have potatoes, oil, horseradish, onion, bass, vegetable stock, beetroot, flour, stalks parsley, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sea Bass With Beet Purée with 3 tbsp butter, 1 medium onion, finely diced, 300 g potatoes, peeled and chopped, 800 g beetroot, half finely chopped and half cubed, 250 ml vegetable stock, 2 tbsp oil, 800 g sea bass, cut into 4 pieces, 2 tbsp plain flour, 1-2 tbsp horseradish, 5 stalks parsley, chopped. Here's the instruction: Heat 2 tbsp butter in a saucepan and saute the onion, potato and finely chopped beets for 2-3 mins. Season, pour in the stock, cover and simmer for about 20 mins. Drain. Meanwhile, heat 1 tbsp butter in a separate pan and lightly saute the beet cubes in it. Add 5 tbsp water, cover and simmer for 10 mins. Heat the oil in a large frying pan, dust the fish with flour and sear, skin side down for 4-5 mins. Turn and cook for an additional 1 min, season and set aside. Add the horseradish to the potato and beet mixture and mash. Fold in the beet cubes. Serve with the fish and garnished with chopped parsley.

input_text: I have blue cheese, cream cheese, pimentos, onions, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Weber Duck with 4 ounces blue cheese, 3 ounces cream cheese, 2 tablespoons onions (grated or chopped), 5 ounces pimentos, spread or 5 ounces pimentos, dip, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce. Here's the instruction: Mash blue cheese and cream cheese with fork. Add onion and mix thoroughly. Form a small cake. Put in freezer or refrigerator until firm. Mix pimento spread together with Worcestershire sauce and spread over blue cheese mixture.

input_text: I have cottage cheese, hot water, vidalia onion, mayonnaise, cucumber, lime jello. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Spring Salad with 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime jello, 3/4 c. hot water, 1 medium cucumber, peeled, chopped and drained, 1 medium Vidalia onion, chopped, 1/2 c. mayonnaise, 1 small carton cottage cheese. Here's the instruction: Dissolve jello in hot water. Cool slightly. Add cottage cheese, mayonnaise, cucumber and onion. Add a drop or two of green food coloring for more color. Place in covered dish. Refrigerate.

input_text: I have vinegar, tomatoes, brown sugar, onion, worcestershire, flour, clove garlic, deer roast, mustard. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Venison Roast with 4 lb. deer roast, 2 Tbsp. flour, 1 clove garlic, minced, 1 onion, sliced, 2 Tbsp. brown sugar, 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire, 1 tsp. mustard, 1/4 c. vinegar or lemon juice, 1 lb. can tomatoes. Here's the instruction: Season roast with salt. Roll in flour and brown in skillet. Add other ingredients. Place in crock-pot for 8 to 10 hours on low or in 350° oven for 3 hours.

input_text: I have red pepper, avocado, honey crisp apple, arugula, salad, almonds, lemon, honey, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Roasted Delicata, Apple And Arugula Salad With Avocado And Lemon Vinaigrette with For the squash, 2 Delicata squash, halved, seeds removed and cut into 1 inch slices (No need to peel! The skin is the best part :)), 1 tablespoon Honey, 1 pinch Red pepper flakes, A goog slug of olive oil, Salt and pepper, to taste, For the salad, 5 ounces Arugula, 1 Honey crisp apple, thinly sliced, 1 Avocado, thinly sliced, 1/2 cup Toasted almonds, chopped, 1/2 cup Pecorino, shaved (optional), 1 Lemon, zest and juice, 1/4 cup Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Place delicata on a parchment lined sheet tray and drizzle with olive oil, honey, salt, pepper and red pepper flakes. Gently toss and spread the squash in one layer for even cooking. Roast for 35-40 minutes, being sure to flip halfway through. You want the squash to be well caramalized on the outside, yet soft in the middle. Set aside to cool. While the squash is cooling, prepare the vinaigrette by whisking together lemon juice and olive oil in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper to taste and set aside. When you are ready to eat, layer cooled squash with arugula, avocado, apple slices, toasted almonds, shaved Pecorino (optional) and lemon zest. Dress the whole salad with vinaigrette to taste and gently toss. Enjoy!

input_text: I have brown sugar, molasses, eggs, baking soda, water, flour, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Old-Fashioned Shoo-Fly Pie(Makes 2 Pies; Serves 16)   with 2 c. all-purpose flour, 4 Tbsp. unsalted butter, softened, 1 1/2 c. brown sugar, firmly packed, 2 c. molasses, 2 beaten eggs, 1 1/2 c. hot water, 2 tsp. baking soda. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 325°. Mix together flour, butter and sugar. Reserve 1 1/2 cups for crumbs. In another bowl, mix together molasses, eggs, water and baking soda.
