target_text: You can make Peach-Streusel Kuchen with 1 1/3 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup granulated sugar, 3/4 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger, 1/4 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup plain fat-free yogurt, 1/4 cup water, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1/4 teaspoon almond extract, 1 large egg, lightly beaten, Cooking spray, 3/4 cup all-purpose flour, 2/3 cup packed brown sugar, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 cup chilled stick margarine or butter, cut into small pieces, 1 tablespoon light-colored corn syrup, 3 cups sliced peeled ripe peaches (about 2 pounds). Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 375°. Lightly spoon 1 1/3 cups flour into dry measuring cups; level with a knife. Combine with granulated sugar, baking powder, ginger, baking soda, and 1/4 teaspoon salt in a bowl. Combine yogurt and next 5 ingredients (yogurt through egg); add to flour mixture, stirring just until moist. Spoon batter into a 13 x 9-inch baking pan coated with cooking spray, spreading evenly. Lightly spoon 3/4 cup flour into a dry measuring cup; level with a knife. Combine with brown sugar, cinnamon, and 1/4 teaspoon salt; cut in margarine and corn syrup with a pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles coarse meal. Combine 1/2 cup streusel mixture and peaches in a bowl; arrange peach mixture evenly over batter. Sprinkle with remaining streusel mixture. Bake kuchen at 375° for 50 minutes or until a wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack.

input_text: I have apricots, vanilla, powdered sugar, pecans, margarine, orange juice. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Apricot Nuggets with 1 c. powdered sugar, 6 Tbsp. melted margarine, 2 Tbsp. orange juice, 1/2 tsp. vanilla, 1 (11 oz.) pkg. dried apricots, 1 c. chopped pecans. Here's the instruction: Chop apricots and pecans in food processor or chopper. Add remaining ingredients and mix with fork or knead. Roll into 1-inch balls. Store in refrigerator or freezer. Makes 6 dozen nuggets.

input_text: I have oil, sugar, vanilla, baking powder, eggs, cinnamon, soda, flour, nuts, zucchini, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Zucchini Bread with 3 eggs, 1 c. oil, 2 c. sugar, 2 c. raw, grated zucchini squash, 1 tsp. vanilla, 3 c. flour, 1 tsp. soda, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1/2 c. nuts. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 355°. Grease and flour loaf pans. Beat eggs; add oil, sugar, zucchini and vanilla. Cream together. Add sifted dry ingredients and then stir in nuts. Mix well. Bake 1 hour or until done.

input_text: I have salt, lemon juice, broccoli, cauliflower, mustard, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Broccoli And Cauliflower In Mustard Sauce with 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened, 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 bunch broccoli, stems removed and separated into florets, 1 small cauliflower, separated into florets, salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: Blend butter, mustard and lemon juice together. Steam broccoli and cauliflower, covered, until tender (about 5 to 6 minutes) Drain vegetables, return to hot saucepan and toss to evaporate any excess moisture Season with salt and pepper. Add mustard butter. Toss to coat well and serve immediately.

input_text: I have potatoes, heavy cream, onion, ginger root, carrots, dill, butter, vegetable broth, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Creamy Carrot Soup with 1 tablespoon butter, 1 cup diced carrots, 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1/2 teaspoon grated fresh ginger root, 1/4 cup cubed potatoes, 2 cups vegetable broth, 2 1/2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill, 1/4 cup heavy cream, salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Melt butter in a small saucepan. Sweat the carrots, onion and ginger with the butter. Add potatoes and broth, then bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer until potatoes are tender. Strain liquid into a separate container. Put vegetables into a blender along with the dill, and pour in just enough of the liquid to cover the vegetables. Puree in stages if necessary. Discard excess broth. Return vegetable puree to pan. Stir heavy cream into the pan with the vegetables. Season with salt and pepper. Heat, but do not boil, and serve immediately.

input_text: I have flour, trout, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Brook Trout(4 Servings)   with 4 (8-inch) brook trout, seasoned flour, 1/4 c. butter, 3 Tbsp. butter. Here's the instruction: Clean and wash trout. Cut off the fins. Leave the head and tail on. Dip the trout in seasoned flour. Melt 1/4 cup butter. Saute the trout in this until they are tender and nicely browned. Remove the trout to a hot platter. Add to the drippings in the pan the butter. Permit it to brown. Pour it over the fish. Serve them with lemon wedges and chopped parsley.

input_text: I have light corn syrup, sugar, vanilla, eggs, pastry, pecans, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Georgia Pecan Pie with 1 1/4 c. sugar, 1/2 c. light corn syrup, 1/4 c. butter or margarine, 3 eggs, slightly beaten, 1 c. coarsely chopped pecans, 1 tsp. vanilla, pastry for 9-inch pie. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°. Combine sugar, syrup and butter in 2-quart saucepan. Bring to boil on high, stirring constantly until butter is melted. Remove from stove and gradually add hot syrup to eggs; stir all the while. Add pecans to mixture and cool to lukewarm. Add vanilla. Pour into pie shell and bake for 40 to 45 minutes. Serves 6 to 8.

input_text: I have sweet paprika, pitas with pockets, kosher salt, very hot water, bulgur wheat, ground coriander, carrot, parsley, lemon, chickpeas, olive oil, tahini. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Make-Ahead Bulgur Pita Pockets With Spiced Chickpeas, Carrots, And Tahini Recipe with Kosher salt, 1/2 cup bulgur wheat, 1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 large carrot, grated on the large holes of a box grater (about 1 cup), 1 (15-ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed, 2 teaspoons ground coriander, 2 teaspoons smoked or sweet paprika, 1 1/2 tablespoons tahini, 2 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon very hot water, 2 tablespoons juice from 1 lemon, 1/2 cup fresh parsley leaves, roughly chopped, 2 pitas with pockets, halved. Here's the instruction: Bring 1 cup water and 1/2 teaspoon salt to boil in saucepan. Add bulgur, return to boil, and simmer until liquid is absorbed, about 5 minutes. Let sit off heat for 5 minutes; fluff with fork. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in large skillet pan over medium heat until shimmering. Add carrots and chickpeas to pan; stir in coriander and paprika. Mix to coat and cook over medium-low heat until fragrant and carrots are softened, about 3 minutes. Transfer to bowl and stir in bulgur. Season to taste with salt. Whisk together tahini, hot water, and 1 1/2 teaspoons lemon juice until very smooth. Stir into chickpeas and bulgur to coat. Pour in remaining lemon juice and fold in parsley. Season to taste with salt. Serve immediately, or let cool slightly then refrigerate. Reheat the next day in microwave, covered with damp paper towel, before stuffing into pita halves, or stuff into pitas once cooled and refrigerate until ready to eat at room temperature or cold.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, baking powder, eggs, anise oil, flour, milk, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Twisted Little Gems with 1 cup butter, room temperature or 1 cup margarine, 1 cup sugar, 6 eggs, 1 tablespoon vanilla extract, 5 cups flour, 6 teaspoons baking powder, 12 lb confectioners' sugar, 2 -3 tablespoons milk, 14 teaspoon anise oil. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Cream butter and sugar with an electric mixer. Add eggs and continue to cream for five minutes. Add vanilla, flour, and baking powder mixing together. Remove from bowl and knead for 5 minutes. If dough is sticky and soft, add a tiny amout of flour. Break off pieces of dough and roll between palms of hands, into 2-inch length ropes and twist into a knot shape. (love knots mom). Place little knots 1 inch apart on an ungreased baking sheet and bake for 8 to 10 minutes. Cookies should only be slightly brown on bottoms. Watch carefully. Let cool. To make icing:. Combine sugar and milk, blend in anise extract. Dip cookie tops into the anise icing which should be thick. Place cookies on a sheet of wax paper to dry.

input_text: I have spaghetti, tomatoes, pepper, chili beans, chili powder, onion, chili peppers, tomato puree, ground beef, garlic. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Riddle Chili with 1 lb. ground beef, 1 large onion, 4 cans chili beans, 1 pkg. spaghetti, 1 small can tomato puree, 1 can whole tomatoes, chili peppers, pepper, garlic salt, chili powder. Here's the instruction: Cook hamburger to well done. Drain grease until all is gone. Next, add chopped onion; after onion is done in ground beef, cook spaghetti in large pan of boiling water until done. Add beans, tomato puree and whole tomatoes to meat. Add chili powder, garlic salt and pepper as ingredients cook. Add spaghetti. If you like hot chili, add three chopped jalapeno peppers. Cook ingredients together for 10 minutes. Serves 8.

input_text: I have hominy, chicken/mushroom soup. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Hominy Casserole with 2 cans hominy (yellow preferred), drained, 1 can creamy chicken/mushroom soup, 1 small jar Cheez Whiz (can use 1/2 plain and 1/2 jalapeno). Here's the instruction: Sprinkle top with crushed Fritos. Bake 30 minutes at 350°.

input_text: I have oil, bouillon cubes, water, flour, oatmeal. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Dog Biscuits Recipe with 4 c. flour, 1 c. oatmeal, 1/3 c. oil, 4 bouillon cubes, 1 1/2 c. water. Here's the instruction: Dissolve cubes in water. Mix all ingredients. Roll out 1/4 to 1/2 inch thick. Cut to size suitable for your dog. Bake at 300 degrees for 25 min or possibly till brown and crisp.

input_text: I have sour cream, egg yolk, lemon juice, granulated sugar, wild blueberries, eggs, cold butter, water, flour, sweet pastry, orange rind, filling, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Canadian Northwest Territories Berry Tarts with SWEET PASTRY, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 3/4 cup granulated sugar, 1 teaspoon grated orange rind or 1 teaspoon lemon rind, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2/3 cup cold butter, 2 eggs, 1 tablespoon ice water, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, FILLING, 3/4 cup granulated sugar, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon grated orange rind or 1 teaspoon lemon rind, 1 1/2 cups sour cream, 1 egg yolk, 2 cups wild blueberries. Here's the instruction: SWEET PASTRY: In large bowl, stir together flour, sugar, orange rind and salt. With pastry blender or 2 knives, cut in butter until crumbly. Whisk together eggs, water and lemon juice; drizzle over flour mixture, tossing with fork until moist enough to shape into ball (dough will be slightly sticky). Flatten into disc; wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes or up to 3 days. Let soften to room temperature before rolling. On generously floured pastry cloth and using stockinette-covered rolling pin, roll out half of the pastry at a time to 1/8 inch thickness. Cut into 3 1/2 inch rounds; ease into shallow 2 3/4 inch tart shells. Refrigerate for 30 minutes. Line each tart shell with foil; fill with pie weights or dry beans. Bake in 400°F oven for about 10 minutes or until light golden and firm. Remove foil and weights; let cool. FILLING: In bowl, combine sugar, flour and orange rind; blend in sour cream and egg yolk. Spoon about 1 tablespoons berries (mossberries or wild blueberries) into each tart shell; cover with about 1 tablespoons filling and top with 3 or 4 berries. Bake in 350°F oven for about 20 minutes or until pastry is golden and filling is set. Let stand for 1 minute. Remove from pan and let cool on racks. Makes about 24 tarts. The Canadian Living Entertaining Cookbook.

input_text: I have sour cream, unflavored gelatin, sugar, fresh cranberries, coconut, mandarin oranges, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cranbrosia with 2 c. fresh cranberries, coarsely chopped, 1 c. sugar, 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges, drained, 1 (8 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained, 1 c. coconut, 2 envelopes unflavored gelatin, 1 c. sour cream, 1 c. Cool Whip. Here's the instruction: Combine cranberries and sugar. Mix thoroughly to dissolve sugar. Drain well and reserve liquid from oranges and pineapple. Add oranges, pineapple and coconut to cranberries; sprinkle gelatin over 3/4 cup of combined juices to soften. Place over medium heat, stirring constantly to dissolve gelatin. Add to fruits. Fold in sour cream and Cool Whip. Refrigerate overnight.

input_text: I have macaroni, pepper, milk, eggs, onion, margarine, grated cheese, paprika, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Macaroni And Cheese with 1 1/2 c. macaroni, 1 1/2 c. chopped onion, 2 eggs, slightly beaten, 1 1/2 c. grated cheese, 1/4 c. margarine, 1 tsp. salt, 1/8 tsp. pepper, 1/2 tsp. paprika, 2 c. milk. Here's the instruction: Cook macaroni until about 1/2 done. Drain. Add the other ingredients and mix well (except paprika). Bake 50 minutes at 350°. Remove from oven; sprinkle paprika on top and return to oven for 10 more minutes to brown.

input_text: I have beef stock, sugar, tomato paste, brown sugar, onion, white vinegar, worchestershire sauce, mustard, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bbq Bob's Southern (Indiana) Bbq Sauce Recipe with 12 ounce Tomato paste, 3 c. Beef stock, 1/3 c. Sugar, 1/3 c. Brown sugar, 1/4 c. Prepared mustard, 1/4 c. White vinegar, 1/4 c. Worchestershire sauce, 1 x Medium onion, chopped, 1 tsp Butter. Here's the instruction: Heat butter until brown. Add in chopped onion, saute/fry. Add in remaining ingredients then bring to a boil. Simmer 1 hour.

input_text: I have baby spinach, aleppo pepper, mozzarella cheese, mayo, parmesan, garlic, baguette, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Quick Spinach Bread with 10 ounces baby spinach leaves(leave the stems on), 1 1/2 cups shredded part skim mozzarella cheese (shred your own), 1/4 cup mayo, 1/4 cup finely grated Parmesan, 2 large garlic cloves put through a garlic press, 2 tablespoons softened butter, 1/4 to 1/2 teaspoons aleppo pepper ( or a dash of cayenne if you don't have aleppo), one 12 inch baguette. Here's the instruction: Wilt the spinach leaves in a pan with a couple of tablespoons of water. Cool and then squeeze as dry as possible. Chop the leaves and then place them in a medium mixing bowl. Stir in the cheeses, mayo, garlic, butter and aleppo pepper until everything is thoroughly combined. Preheat the oven to 400F. Slice the baguette lengthwise and then cut each half in half again. Divide the spinach mixture over the cut sides of the bread. Bake in the preheated oven for about 15 minutes or until the spinach/cheese mixture looks melted and the edges of the bread are just starting to brown a bit. NOTE: If making this as an appetizer, just slice the baguette in half, spread the spinach mixture over and then cut in small slices after baking.

input_text: I have american cheese, tomatoes, bell pepper, chili powder, egg noodles, tomato soup, garlic powder, onions, ground beef, whole kernel corn. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Tallerine with 1 lg. pkg. egg noodles, 2 lbs. ground beef, 2 lg. onions, chopped, 1/2 bell pepper, chopped, 2 tsp. garlic powder, 2 tsp. chili powder, 1 can whole kernel corn, 1 can tomato soup, 1 can Rotel tomatoes, 1/2 lb. American cheese, grated. Here's the instruction: Brown meat with onions and bell pepper. Add garlic, chili powder, salt and pepper. Put 1/2 cooked noodles in large casserole dish. Spread meat, corn and cheese over noodles. Pour soup, 1/2 can water and tomatoes over noodles. Bake 1 to 1 1/2 hours at 300°. Just before you remove from oven, sprinkle with cheese. Serves 8 to 10.

input_text: I have ginger, soy sauce, peanut oil, water, green beans, garlic. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Stir-Fry Green Beans with 3 c. trimmed green beans, 2 cloves minced garlic, 2 Tbsp. grated ginger, 2 Tbsp. soy sauce, 2 Tbsp. peanut oil, 2 Tbsp. water. Here's the instruction: Heat oil in a wok or skillet. Add green beans, ginger and garlic. Stir-fry for 2 minutes at high heat. Add soy sauce and water and cook, covered, for 3 to 5 minutes, until beans are done.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, eggs, flour, nuts, cocoa, margarine. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Never Fail Brownies(Easy And So Good!)   with 2 sticks margarine, 2 c. sugar, 4 unbeaten eggs, 2 c. flour, 1/2 c. cocoa, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 c. chopped nuts. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400°. Grease a 13 x 15-inch pan. Melt margarine in medium saucepan. In the same pan, add sugar and eggs. Mix well. Stir in flour and cocoa. Add vanilla and nuts. Pour into prepared pan. Bake at 400° for 15 minutes.

input_text: I have gold potatoes, rosemary, thyme, ground black pepper, onions, chicken broth, garlic, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Potato And Onion Gratin with 3 tablespoons olive oil divided, plus more for brushing, 4 cups onions thinly sliced, 3 large garlic cloves chopped, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme, 1 teaspoon fresh rosemary chopped, 2 pounds yukon gold potatoes peeled and sliced into 1/8- inch-thick rounds, 3/4 teaspoon salt, 3/4 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper, 1 1/4 cups low salt chicken broth or sub with vegetable broth to make this vegetarian!. Here's the instruction: Heat 2 Tablespoons of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onions and garlic; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute until onions are golden, about 8 minutes. Add herbs; saute 2 minutes. (Can be made 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature.) Brush glass baking dish with oil. Arrange 1/3 of potatoes in dish. Sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon each salt and pepper. Top potatoes with half of onion mixture. Repeat; top with potatoes. Pour broth over. Drizzle with 1 Tablespoon oil. Cover dish with foil. Bake potatoes 30 minutes. Uncover and continue to bake until potatoes are tender and top is golden, about 25 minutes longer. Let stand 10 minutes and serve.

input_text: I have vinegar, pepper, water, chicken, butter, worcestershire sauce, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Port-A-Pitt Bbq Chicken (Copycat Recipe) with 1 lb butter, 1 cup water, 1 cup vinegar, 2 tablespoons salt, 1 tablespoon pepper, 4 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 6 -8 lbs chicken pieces. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients. Pour over chicken in large roasting pan. Cover with aluminum foil. Bake in 325 degree oven 30 to 45 minutes. Grill chicken until browned (about 15 minutes) dipping in marinade several times.

input_text: I have cumin, roast, oregano, chili powder, green chili peppers, onion, water, pinto beans, garlic, flour tortilla. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Beef Roast With Pinto Beans with 2 1/2 lbs roast, 2 cups dried pinto beans, 1 (10 ounce) can rotel, 1 (7 ounce) can green chili peppers, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 medium onion, minced, 1 teaspoon Mexican oregano, water or beef broth, to cover, flour tortilla, for serving. Here's the instruction: Place pinto beans in bottom of crock pot. Add rotel, green chile, spices and onion and mix. Place roast on top. Add water or beef broth to cover beans completely and about half of the roast. You may need to add more liquid during cooking so check periodically. Cook on high for 6 hours or until roast starts to fall apart and beans are done. Add salt and pepper to taste, then gently pull apart roast to desired size and serve like soup with warm flour tortillas. Do NOT add the salt before the beans are fully cooked or your beans will not get tender!

input_text: I have rice, margarine, water, onion soup. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Brown Rice with 2 c. rice (uncooked), 1 pkg. Mrs. Grass dried onion soup, 1 stick margarine, 2 c. water. Here's the instruction: Put rice in a casserole dish, uncooked. Heat soup, water and margarine. When heated, pour over rice and stir. Bake in a 350° oven for 1 1/2 to 2 hours.

input_text: I have sugar, tomatoes, lemon juice, scallions, mushrooms, flour, apple juice, parsley, chicken, chives, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken Chasseurs with 1 (2 1/2 lb.) ready-to-cook broiler, cut up or filets of chicken, seasoned flour, 3 Tbsp. butter or margarine, 4 chopped scallions or small onions, 1/4 lb. chopped mushrooms, 1 tsp. sugar, 1 tsp. salt, 2 Tbsp. fresh, frozen or canned lemon juice, 1 c. apple juice or 1 c. chicken broth, 2 diced tomatoes, 2 Tbsp. snipped parsley, 2 Tbsp. snipped chives. Here's the instruction: Coat chicken with seasoned flour. In hot butter or margarine in a large skillet, saute chicken until golden on all sides. Add scallions, mushrooms, sugar, salt, lemon juice, apple juice or chicken broth (according to taste preference) and tomatoes. Cook slowly, covered, for 45 minutes or until chicken is fork-tender. Sprinkle with parsley and chives. Makes 3 to 4 servings.

input_text: I have old-fashioned oatmeal, wild rice, cherries, milk, maple sugar, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Minnesota Breakfast Cereal Of Wild Rice And Oatmeal with 3/4 cup uncooked wild rice, 1 1/2 cups old-fashioned oatmeal, 1/2 cup dried cherries or 1/2 cup raisins, 3/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 cup milk, maple sugar or maple syrup. Here's the instruction: Steam the wild rice or boil it covered by 2 inches of water; it is ready when tender but pleasantly chewy, with many burst kernels, after about 45 minutes; drain rice. Combine the oats with the dried cherries, salt, and 3 cups water in a saucepan; cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes, until soft and thick. Stir in the wild rice and milk. Serve steaming hot in large bowls, topped lightly with sugar or syrup.

input_text: I have lemon juice, soy sauce, brown sugar, water, bourbon, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Marinade For Beef To Barbecue with 2 1/2 lb. English cut roast (2-inches thick), Adolph's tenderizer, 15 oz. soy sauce, 1/4 c. brown sugar, 1 Tbsp. lemon juice, 1/4 c. bourbon, 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 1 1/2 c. water. Here's the instruction: Sprinkle roast with tenderizer on both sides. Combine all other ingredients. Pour over roast. Let stand in refrigerator for 6 hours, turning once after 3 hours.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, water, flour, cocoa, margarine, milk, egg yolks, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chocolate Pudding with 1 1/2 c. sugar, pinch of salt, 2 egg yolks, 1/2 stick margarine, 1 Tbsp. vanilla, 1 heaping Tbsp. flour, 3 Tbsp. cocoa, 1 c. milk, 1 c. hot water. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients and cook in iron skillet until thick.

input_text: I have red wine vinegar, sugar, tomato soup, worcestershire sauce, carrots, red onion, vegetable oil, green pepper, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Marinated Carrot Salad with 1 1/2 lb. carrots, pared and sliced, 1 medium red onion, thinly sliced, 1/2 c. chopped green pepper, 1 can tomato soup, 3/4 c. sugar, 1/2 c. vegetable oil, 1/2 c. red wine vinegar, 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 tsp. salt. Here's the instruction: Cook carrots in boiling salt water until crisp-tender, about 5 minutes.

input_text: I have tomato, provolone cheese, ham, i, sage, garlic, chicken. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken Saltimbocca with 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves thinly sliced about 1-1/4 lbs., 4 slices prosciutto or boiled ham, 4 slices provolone cheese thin slices, 3/4 teaspoon dried sage crushed, optional, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, 2 tablespoons I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!(R) Spread, 1 jar Bertolli Tomato & Basil Sauce. Here's the instruction: Season chicken, if desired, with salt and ground black pepper. Evenly top each chicken breast half with prosciutto, provolone, sage and garlic powder; roll up and secure with wooden toothpicks. Melt Spread in 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium-high heat and brown chicken. Stir in Sauce. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer covered 12 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked. Remove toothpicks. Serve, if desired, with hot cooked pasta.

input_text: I have sugar, red hots, water. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cinnamon Candy Jelly with 2 1/2 c. sugar, 1 1/4 c. water, 1/2 c. little red hots, 1/2 bottle Certo. Here's the instruction: Mix. Bring to boil over hottest fire, stirring constantly. When it comes to boil, add Certo. Stir constantly and boil at full rolling boil for 1/2 minute. Remove from fire, skim. Pour into jelly glasses. Seal with wax.

input_text: I have potatoes, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, bacon, black pepper, goat cheese, cilantro, corn flakes, fresh green onion, monterey jack pepper cheese, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Malvada Potatoes with 1 (20 ounce) package Simply Potatoes Diced Potatoes with Onion, 1 cup cream of chicken soup, 1 cup goat cheese (crumbled), 1 cup monterey jack pepper cheese (grated), 1 cup sour cream, 12 cup fresh green onion (sliced), 12 cup fresh cilantro leaves, 12 cup cooked bacon (crumbled), 12 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon black pepper, 2 tablespoons butter (melted), 1 cup corn flakes (crushed). Here's the instruction: In a large bowl combine cream of chicken soup, goat cheese, pepper jack cheese, sour cream, scallions, cilantro, bacon, salt and pepper. Mix well. Add potatoes with onions to ingredients and mix well coating potatoes completely. Pour potatoe mixture into a casserole dish coated with non-stick spray. Combine melted butter and crushed corn flakes to make a crumbly topping. Top potatoes with topping and bake. 1 hour at 350.

input_text: I have tomato, sugar, green bell pepper, salt, picante sauce, green onions, white onion, black pepper, ground cumin, white hominy, black-eyed peas, fresh cilantro. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Texas Caviar with 1 large jar picante sauce, 2 (16 oz.) cans black-eyed peas, drained, 1 (16 oz.) can white hominy, drained, 1 c. diced green bell pepper, 1 c. chopped white onion, 1 c. chopped fresh tomato, 1/2 c. finely chopped fresh cilantro, 1/4 c. chopped jalapeno (optional), 1 c. chopped green onions, 1 Tbsp. sugar, 1 Tbsp. salt, 2 Tbsp. black pepper, 2 Tbsp. ground cumin. Here's the instruction: Mix all together and marinate in refrigerator for at least 24 hours before serving. Keeps well in fridge.

input_text: I have baking powder, brown sugar, baking soda, cheddar cheese, eggs, flour, peaches, butter, fresh basil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Summer Peach, Basil & Cheddar Muffins with 4 fresh peaches, cut into 1/2-inch pieces, 4 teaspoons finely minced fresh basil, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup shredded extra-sharp Cheddar cheese (such as Sargento(R) Off the Block), 1/2 cup butter, room temperature, 7 tablespoons brown sugar, 2 eggs, room temperature, 1/4 cup shredded extra-sharp Cheddar cheese (such as Sargento(R) Off the Block). Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper liners. Mix peaches, basil, and 1 tablespoon brown sugar in a bowl; let sit until sugar dissolves, about 15 minutes. Sift flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl. Mix 1 cup Cheddar cheese into flour mixture. Beat butter and 7 tablespoons brown sugar in a bowl with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Add eggs, one at a time, until just combined; gently fold in peaches. Mix flour mixture, a little at time, into peach mixture until batter is just combined. Spoon batter into the prepared muffin cups. Sprinkle 1/4 cup Cheddar cheese over batter. Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the middle of a muffin comes out clean, about 25 minutes.

input_text: I have greek yogurt natural, caramel, powdered milk, white chocolate, milk. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make White Chocolate And Caramel Yogurts with milk Fresh, 1 1/8 cups white chocolate, 2 tablespoons powdered milk, 10 candies caramel, 1 greek yogurt natural. Here's the instruction: In a saucepan over medium heat, add milk, chocolate squares, sugar, and powdered milk, stirring constantly until almost boiling. Remove from heat, add the caramel, and stir until completely dissolved, let cool. When warm, add the yogurt, and whisk until well mixed. Fill the cups, and put them in the yogurt maker for 10 to 12 hours. Refrigerate, and serve cold.

input_text: I have cream of chicken soup, noodles, chop suey meat, cream of mushroom soup, onion, mushrooms, celery, bean sprouts, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chop-Suey Casserole with 1 1/2 lb. chop suey meat, 1 onion, cut up, 1 c. celery, 1 can bean sprouts, drained, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 can mushrooms, 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1/4 pkg. fine noodles, cooked (4 oz. dry), 1 can chow mein noodles. Here's the instruction: Brown meat, onion and celery. Mix with remaining ingredients in a large casserole. Bake 1 hour at 325°.

input_text: I have vinegar, sugar, vanilla, shortening, soda, water, flour, cocoa, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Crazy Fudge Cake with 10 Tbsp. melted shortening, 3 c. flour, 5 Tbsp. cocoa, 2 c. sugar, 1 tsp. salt, 2 tsp. soda, 2 tsp. vinegar, 2 c. water, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Blend dry ingredients. Add remaining ingredients. Mix until smooth. Bake for 35 minutes at 350°.

input_text: I have miracle whip, tabasco sauce, onion, cream cheese, shrimp. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Zippy Shrimp Dip with 2 (6 ounce) cans small shrimp (drained and rinsed), 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese (softened), 1/2 cup Miracle Whip, 1 medium onion (finely chopped), 1 -2 dash Tabasco sauce. Here's the instruction: Mix well with electric mixer and store in refrigerator several hours before serving. Sprinkle paprika or Morton's Hot Salt over top for color. Garnish with fresh parsley sprig. Cooking time is actually chilling time.

input_text: I have mushroom stems, bread, green chiles, hot pepper, pepper, green onions, eggs, cheddar cheese, pork sausage, paprika, cream, ground mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Green Chile Brunch Bake with 1 pound bulk pork sausage, 10 cups cubed day-old French bread, 2 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese, 1 can (4 ounces) mushroom stems and pieces, drained, 5 green onions, chopped, 6 large eggs, 2-3/4 cups half-and-half cream, 1 can (4 ounces) chopped green chiles, drained, 1-1/2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground mustard, 1/4 teaspoon paprika, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1/8 to 1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce. Here's the instruction: In a large skillet, cook sausage over medium heat until no longer pink, breaking into crumbles, 5-7 minutes; drain and set aside. Place bread cubes in a greased 13x9-in. baking dish. Top with cheese, mushrooms, green onions and cooked sausage. In a large bowl, whisk remaining ingredients. Pour over layers. Refrigerate, covered, overnight. Preheat oven to 350°. Remove strata from refrigerator while oven heats. Bake, uncovered, until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean, 45-50 minutes. Let stand 5-10 minutes before cutting.

input_text: I have condensed milk, egg, sugar, almond, shortening, cold butter, flour, almonds, semi-sweet chocolate chips. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chocolate Almond Bars with 1 12 cups flour, 23 cup sugar, 34 cup cold butter, 1 12 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips, 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, 1 large egg, 2 cups almonds, toasted and chopped, 12 teaspoon almond extract, 1 teaspoon shortening. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350. Combine flour and sugar; cut in butter until crumbly. Press on bottom of 13 x 9 pan. Bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned. Melt 1 cup chocolate chips with condensed milk; remove from heat. Cool slightly; beat in egg. Stir in almonds and extract. Spread over prepared crust. Bake 25 minutes or until set. Cool. Melt remaining chocolate chips with shortening. Drizzle over bars. Chill 10 minutes or until set. Cut into bars. Store covered at room temperature.

input_text: I have onion soup, water, margarine, rice, chicken, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken Baked In Rice with 1 frying chicken, cut up, salt and pepper to taste, 1 c. rice, 1 pkg. dry onion soup mix, 2 1/2 c. water, 1/2 c. margarine. Here's the instruction: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Combine rice, soup mix, salt and water in baking dish. Arrange chicken over rice. Dot with margarine; cover. Bake at 350° for about 1 hour and 15 minutes.

input_text: I have oregano, extra-virgin olive oil, tomatoes, fettuccine, red bell peppers, water, cold water, clove garlic, kalamata olives, chicken, flat-leaf parsley, garlic, bay leaf, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Stuffed Chicken Thighs with Red Pepper-Tomato Sauce with 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, 1 clove garlic, peeled, whole, 1 dried bay leaf, 1 cup diced red bell peppers, about 1 large pepper, 3/4-inch dice, 1 cup vine ripened tomatoes, about 2 medium, 3/4-inch dice, 1 cup cold water, 1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh oregano leaves, Salt and freshly ground black pepper, 3 garlic cloves, 1 1/2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh oregano leaves, 1 cup kalamata olives, pitted, 4 to 5 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, Salt and freshly ground black pepper, 4 chicken thighs, boned, 4 chicken legs, 1/4 cup water, 3/4 pounds fettuccine, 1 tablespoon finely chopped flat-leaf parsley, 2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan. Here's the instruction: To make the sauce: Heat olive oil in a large non-reactive saucepan over high heat. Add the garlic clove, bay leaf, peppers, tomatoes, and water and bring to a boil. Lower the heat to medium and simmer until the peppers are tender, about 25 minutes. Add the oregano halfway through cooking. Transfer the mixture to a blender or food processor and puree until smooth. Season the puree with salt and pepper and return it to the pan to keep warm. You should have about 11/2 cups. The sauce can be covered and refrigerated for 1 to 2 days. To make the stuffing: Drop the garlic, oregano, olives, and 1 tablespoon of the olive oil into a food processor and process until very finely chopped. Season with salt and pepper, pulse again, and scrape into a small bowl. The stuffing mixture can be made ahead to this point and refrigerated for several days. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Season the inside of the thighs with salt and pepper. Put about 1 1/2 teaspoons of the olive paste inside each thigh. Tie closed with kitchen string and season with salt and pepper. Season the chicken legs with salt and pepper. Heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil in a large ovenproof skillet over medium-high heat until hot. Lower the heat to medium, add the chicken thighs and legs skin side down and saute until lightly brown all over. Put the skillet in the oven until the chicken is opaque throughout, about 20 minutes. Transfer to a plate and keep warm. Pour off the fat from the pan, add the water, place over medium heat, and stir and scrape up all the browned bits from the bottom and sides of the pan. Simmer until slightly reduced. Add 1 cup of the sauce and reheat gently. Add any juices from around the chicken. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of water to a boil and add salt. Add the pasta and cook until al dente, about 12 minutes. Drain and return to the pasta pot. Add the remaining sauce and toss well to coat. Divide the fettuccine among 4 plates. Slice the thighs and arrange slices and 1 leg next to the fettuccine. Sprinkle with parsley and grated Parmesan. Serve immediately.

input_text: I have orange zest, ginger, salt, cream cheese, confectioners sugar, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Orange Cream-Cheese Frosting with 1 1/2 sticks (3/4 cup) unsalted butter, room temperature, 3 packages (8 ounces each) cream cheese, room temperature, 2 cups confectioners sugar, sifted, 3/4 teaspoon finely grated orange zest, 1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon grated, peeled fresh ginger, Pinch of salt. Here's the instruction: In the bowl of an electric mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, beat butter on medium-high speed until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes. Add cream cheese, and beat until combined and fluffy, about 2 minutes, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed. Add the remaining ingredients, and beat 5 minutes. Frosting can be kept at room temperature, covered with plastic wrap, for up to 2 hours.

input_text: I have buttermilk, almond, sugar, vanilla, baking powder, eggs, ground nutmeg, baking soda, all-purpose, colored sugar, milk, cherry pie filling, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Surprise Sugar Stars with 1 cup butter, softened, 1-1/4 cups sugar, 2 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 2 teaspoons ground nutmeg, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2/3 cup buttermilk, 1 can (21 ounces) cherry pie filling, 2 cups confectioners' sugar, 1/2 teaspoon almond extract, 2 to 3 tablespoons whole milk, Colored sugar, optional. Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in vanilla. Combine the dry ingredients; add to the creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk, beating well after each addition. Refrigerate for 2-3 hours or until easy to handle. On a floured surface, roll out dough to 1/4-in. thickness. Cut with 2-in star cookie cutter or the cutter of your choice. Place half of the stars on ungreased . Spoon 1-1/2 teaspoonfuls of pie filling into the centers of each. Top with remaining stars. Pinch edges to seal; cut a small slit in top of each cookie. Bake at 350° for 12-15 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on wire racks. For icing, in a small bowl, combine the confectioners' sugar, extract and enough milk to achieve desired consistence. Spread over cookies. Sprinkle with colored sugar if desired.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, eggs, white rice, cinnamon, milk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Rice Pudding with 2 qt. milk, 1 c. white rice, 1/2 pt. half and half, 3 eggs, 1 c. sugar, pinch of salt, 3 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. cinnamon. Here's the instruction: In a double boiler, put milk, rice and salt. Cover and simmer 1 1/2 hours. Separate eggs; put whites aside. Mix egg yolks, sugar, vanilla and half and half. Stir into rice mixture after 1 hour cooking time. Cook whole mixture another 1/2 hour and simmer.

input_text: I have brown sugar, english walnuts, cinnamon, raisins, fuji apples, dates, red wine, honey. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sweet Charoset with 5 large fuji apples, peeled and chopped, 12 cup raisins, any type, 12 cup pitted dates, coarsely chopped, 2 cups english walnuts, chopped, 12 cup red wine, such as Shiraz Cabernet, 13 cup honey, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 1 tablespoon cinnamon. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Toast walnuts for 5-7 minutes until fragrant; be careful not to burn. Allow walnuts cool for about 10 minutes on paper towels. Combine all ingredients in a large mixing bowl and mix well, adding a little more wine if necessary. Pour off any excess liquid. Store in refrigerator. Serve cold or at room temperature.

input_text: I have smooth peanut butter, sugar, corn syrup, crispy rice cereal, butterscotch chips, chocolate chips. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chocolate Covered Peanut Butter Krispies with 1 cup sugar, 1 cup corn syrup, 1 cup smooth peanut butter, 6 cups crispy rice cereal (Rice Krispies), 1 (12 ounce) package chocolate chips, 1 cup butterscotch chips. Here's the instruction: Bring sugar and corn syrup to a boil. Remove from heat. Add peanut butter and stir well. Pour mixture over Krispie cereal and mix well. Press into 9x13-inch buttered pan. Melt chocolate and butterscotch chips on defrost in microwave. Mix well and spread over Krispie mix. Cool and cut into bars.

input_text: I have egg substitute, oil, mashed banana, sugar, soda, flour, nonfat buttermilk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Banana Pancakes with 1 c. flour, 1 Tbsp. sugar, 1/8 tsp. salt, 1 c. nonfat buttermilk, 1 tsp. soda, 1/2 c. mashed banana, 1/2 c. egg substitute, 1 Tbsp. oil. Here's the instruction: Combine flour, sugar and salt in a bowl, mixing well. Combine 1 cup nonfat buttermilk with soda. Add to banana, eggs and oil. Pour all liquid ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until moistened. Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto griddle sprayed with Pam. Makes 12 pancakes (4-inch size).

input_text: I have celery salt, tomato, green onions, solid white tuna, rotini, green beans, black olives, mayonnaise, balsamic vinegar. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Tuna Pasta Salad with 1/2 pound green beans, trimmed, cut into 1-inch-long pieces, 3/4 pound rotini or other corkscrew pasta, 2 6-1/8 ounce cans solid white tuna, packed in water, drained, 5 green onions, chopped, 1 large tomato, seeded, chopped, 1/2 cup chopped pitted black olives (preferably brine-cured), 3/4 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 1/2 teaspoon celery salt. Here's the instruction: Cook green beans in large pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 4 minutes. Using slotted spoon, transfer beans to colander. Add pasta to same pot of water and cook until tender but still firm to bite. Pour pasta into same colander and rinse under cold water to cool. Drain well. Place tuna in large bowl; break into small pieces. Add green onions, tomato, black olives, pasta and green beans. Mix mayonnaise, balsamic vinegar and celery salt in small bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Mix dressing into pasta salad and serve.

input_text: I have black pepper, red delicious apple, onion, sweet relish, mayonnaise, garlic, chicken, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken Salad Sandwiches with 2 lg. cans canned chicken (flaked with a fork), 1 sm. onion, chopped, 1 jalapeno, chopped, 2 T. sweet relish, 1 sm. red delicious apple, chopped, 1 T. garlic powder, 1 t. black pepper, 1 t. salt, 3/4 c. mayonnaise. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients together and spread over favorite bread.

input_text: I have potatoes, pepper, beef hillshire, onion, garlic powder, sauerkraut, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make German Supper with 5 to 6 potatoes, scrubbed (not peeled), 1/4 c. chopped onion, 1/4 tsp. garlic powder, 1/2 tsp. salt, 3 c. cubed beef Hillshire Farm sausage or Eckrich smoked sausage, 1 (7 oz.) can sauerkraut, 1/3 tsp. pepper. Here's the instruction: Cut potatoes into thumb size pieces. Add onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Brown in a small amount of oil for 25 minutes until tender. Add sausage; heat and stir occasionally. Drain kraut and spread on top. DO NOT STIR. Cover and heat.

input_text: I have parsley, beef drippings, wine, garlic, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Wine Sauce with 2 tablespoons beef drippings, 1 tablespoon minced garlic, 1 1/2 cups wine, 3 tablespoons butter, 3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley. Here's the instruction: Add garlic to drippings in pan; cook and stir for 2 minutes. Add wine; stir, scraping the bottom of the pan to deglaze. Boil, stirring constantly, until syrupy. Remove from heat. Add 1 tablespoon butter, and stir until the it melts. Repeat with remaining butter. Stir in parsley, and serve.

input_text: I have egg, sugar, swiss cheese, water, flour, margarine, yeast, beef, sauerkraut, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Reuben Loaf with 3 1/4 c. flour, 1 pkg. dry yeast, 1/4 c. Thousand Island dressing, 6 oz. thinly sliced corned beef, 1 (8 oz.) can sauerkraut, drained, 1 Tbsp. sugar, 1 c. hot water, 1/4 lb. sliced Swiss cheese, 1 egg white, beaten, 1 tsp. salt, 1 Tbsp. margarine. Here's the instruction: Set aside 1 cup flour. In large bowl mix remaining flour, sugar, salt and yeast. Stir in water and margarine. Mix in only enough reserved flour to make a soft dough. On floured surface knead 4 minutes. On greased baking sheet, roll dough to 10 x 14-inches. Spread dressing down center third of dough length. Top with layers of beef, cheese and sauerkraut. Make cuts from filling to dough edges at 1-inch intervals along sides of filling. Alternate sides, folding strips at an angle across filling. Let raise 15 minutes.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, corn syrup, egg whites, water, nuts, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Divinity with 2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. corn syrup, 1/2 c. water, dash of salt, 2 egg whites, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 c. nuts. Here's the instruction: Combine syrup, water and salt and stir in sugar until dissolved. Boil to hard boil stage. Beat egg whites until stiff. Pour syrup on egg whites (slowly) while beating. Beat until smooth. Add nuts and vanilla and drop by teaspoon on wax paper.

input_text: I have macaroni, ham, green beans, cream of celery soup, onions. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Easy Ham, Green Beans & Elbows Recipe with 2 c. cooked macaroni, 1 can cream of celery soup, 1 can cut green beans, liquid removed, 1 pound ham, cubed, 1 can (2.8 ounce.) French fried onions. Here's the instruction: Mix macaroni, soup, green beans and ham together in a 2 qt casserole dish. Add in 3/4 can onions, sprinkle rest on top. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 min.

input_text: I have banana, bread, vanilla, brown sugar, cinnamon, eggs, rum, milk, cream, oatmeal, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Banana Rum Creme French Toast with 2 cups brown sugar, 1/2 cup butter, 2 cups oatmeal, 1 tablespoon cinnamon, 14 slices of thick French bread, 8 eggs, 1 cup cream, 2 cups whole milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 ounce rum, 1 mashed banana. Here's the instruction: Brown Sugar Crumble Topping: Combine brown sugar, butter, oatmeal and cinnamon until crumbly French Toast: Spray 10 x 15 inch glass baking dish with pan spray, arrange bread in dish. Beat together eggs, cream, milk, vanilla, rum, and banana, pour over bread. Cover with plastic wrap, refrigerate over night. In morning: Take french toast out of refrigerator, preheat oven 350' degrees F. Top with Brown Sugar Crumble mixture. Bake 45 minutes until puffy and golden covering with foil last 10 minutes.

input_text: I have stack, flour, cheese, white sugar, butter, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pineapple Casserole with 1 large can pineapple chunks, drained, 1/2 c. white sugar, 3 Tbsp. plain flour, 1/2 c. grated sharp New York cheese, 1 stack or roll Ritz crackers, 1 stick butter or margarine. Here's the instruction: Place pineapple in bottom of casserole. Mix sugar, flour and grated cheese. Pour over pineapple. Crumble stack of Ritz crackers over mixture. Melt butter and dribble over mixture. Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.

input_text: I have bisquick baking, egg, milk. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Alien Pancakes with 2 cups Bisquick baking mix, 1 egg, 1 cup milk. Here's the instruction: Pour 1 teaspoon of batter on the grill in kind of an elongated oval shape. Right next to it pour another teaspoonful. These are the eyes. Allow "eyes" to cook until they are bubble and looking dry around the edges. Pour 1/4 c batter over the "eyes" pulling the batter down at the bottom to make a chin. Optionally to make a more uniform chin you can choose to arrange the eyes so the chin falls into the corner of the pan and use that for shaping the chin. Cook until bubbly and edges are dry. Turn and cook until golden brown.

input_text: I have oregano, baking powder, sugar, ground hot air, eggs, provolone cheese, flour, milk, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Ripe Olive Popcorn Muffins with 3 cups flour, 1 12 cups ground hot air popped corn, 6 teaspoons baking powder, 2 teaspoons salt, 2 tablespoons sugar, 4 tablespoons melted butter, 2 cups milk, 2 eggs, well beaten, 1 12 cups grated provolone cheese, 3 -4 ounces finely chopped pitted ripe olives, 2 teaspoons oregano. Here's the instruction: Sift flour, measure and sift with baking powder, salt, and sugar. Add milk, popped corn, eggs and melted butter. Stir in cheese,ripe olives, and oregano. Fill well-oiled muffin tins 2/3 full. Bake in pre-heated oven (435 F) for 20 minutes, serve warm. Makes 12 regular sized muffins.

input_text: I have bread, peppers, butter, tomato. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Grilled Tomato & Jalapeno Cheese Sandwich with 8 slices bread, 1/2 lb. (8 oz.) Mild Mexican VELVEETA with Jalapeno Peppers, sliced, 4 slices tomato Safeway 1 lb For $1.29 thru 02/09, butter or margarine. Here's the instruction: Top 4 bread slices each with 1 VELVEETA slice, 1 tomato slice, second VELVEETA slice and second bread slice. Spread each sandwich with butter. Cook in skillet on medium heat until lightly browned on both sides. Makes 4 sandwiches.

input_text: I have oregano, sugar, tomatoes, salt, chili beans, chili powder, onion, ground beef, sausage, tomato sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Slow Cooker Chili with 1 lb. sausage, 1 lb. ground beef, 3 c. tomatoes (canned or fresh), 15 oz. can tomato sauce, 1/2 c. chopped onion, 1 tsp. sugar, 1/2 tsp. salt, 2 Tbsp. chili powder, 15 oz. can chili beans, 1 tsp. oregano leaves. Here's the instruction: Brown sausage and ground beef. Then combine with all other ingredients and cook in slow cooker for 3 hours on low setting.

input_text: I have sugar, onion, canola oil, white vinegar, fresh strawberries, pecan halves, leaf lettuce, shredded monterey jack cheese, sunflower kernels, ground mustard, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Strawberry & Pecan Salad with 1/3 cup canola oil, 1/4 cup plus 3 tablespoons sugar, divided, 2 tablespoons white vinegar, 2 tablespoons grated onion, 1/2 teaspoon ground mustard, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup pecan halves, 2 heads leaf lettuce, torn, 1 cup sliced fresh strawberries, 1/2 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese, 1/3 cup sunflower kernels. Here's the instruction: In a small bowl, whisk the oil, 1/4 cup sugar, vinegar, onion, mustard and salt until sugar is completely dissolved; set aside. Place pecans in a small heavy skillet. Cook over medium heat for 1-2 minutes until nuts are toasted. Sprinkle with remaining sugar. Cook and stir for 2-4 minutes or until sugar is melted. Spread on foil to cool. Break apart. In a large serving bowl, combine the lettuce, strawberries, cheese, sunflower kernels and sugared pecans. Drizzle with vinaigrette; toss to coat.

input_text: I have powdered sugar, peanut butter, cream cheese, milk, graham cracker pie crust. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Peanut Butter Pie with 3 oz. cream cheese, 1/2 c. milk, 1/2 heaping c. creamy peanut butter, 3/4 c. powdered sugar, 9 oz. Cool Whip, 1 graham cracker pie crust. Here's the instruction: Cream together cream cheese and milk. Add rest of ingredients to cream cheese mixture and blend well. Put into graham cracker crust (6 ounce pie crust) and freeze. Remove from freezer 10 minutes before serving time.

input_text: I have cream of chicken soup, bell pepper, lemon juice, eggs, celery, pimento, onions, mayonnaise, grated cheese, almonds, chicken, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Hot Chicken Salad Casserole with 4 c. cooked chicken, 1 1/2 c. celery, chopped fine, 1 c. almonds, diced, 1 c. bell pepper, chopped fine, 1 tsp. salt, 4 Tbsp. grated cheese, 1/4 c. chopped onions, 1 c. mayonnaise, 4 Tbsp. pimento, cut fine, 4 Tbsp. lemon juice, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 2 boiled eggs, 2 c. grated cheese. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients (except cheese). Mix well. Put in lightly greased 3-quart baking dish. Sprinkle grated cheese on top. Bake 20 minutes at 350°. Remove from oven. Cover top with chips or corn chips (crushed up). Put back into oven and bake another 10 minutes.

input_text: I have baking powder, sugar, eggs, soda, ground cloves, raisins, flour, nuts, margarine, peaches, reserved syrup, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Spicy Peach Nut Bread with 2 c. flour, 2/3 c. sugar, 2 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. soda, 1/4 tsp. ground cloves, 2 tsp. softened margarine or butter, 1 (16 oz.) can (2 c.) sliced peaches or apricot halves, drained (reserve syrup), 1/2 c. reserved syrup, 2 eggs, 1 c. chopped nuts, 1 c. raisins. Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, blend all, except nuts and raisins, until moistened. Beat 2 minutes at medium speed, scraping bowl occasionally. Stir in nuts and raisins. Pour into generously greased loaf pan (9 x 5 x 3-inch). Bake at 350° for 60 to 70 minutes or until tests clean. Immediately remove from pan. Cool completely. If desired, drizzle with powdered sugar glaze. Store tightly wrapped in refrigerator.

input_text: I have lemon zest, icing sugar, ricotta cheese, cream, lemon. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lemon Ricotta Whipped Cream with 2/3 cups Ricotta Cheese, 1/3 cups Icing Sugar, 1 Lemon, Juiced, 1 Tablespoon Lemon Zest, 1 cup 35% Whipping Cream. Here's the instruction: You're going to need 2 medium-sized bowls for this. Let's call them bowl 1 and bowl 2. 1. Dump everything except the whipping cream into bowl 1. Mush it all together with a spatula. 2. Pour the whipping cream into bowl 2. Now use those egg beaters to whip it until it's, well, you know, whipped cream. 3. Add the contents of bowl 1 to bowl 2. 4. Beat it again. 5. Mix it up a bit with the spatula, then stick it in the fridge for 5 or 10 minutes. 6. Store it in the fridge, or gobble it up with your fave desserts!

input_text: I have sesame seed, nori, tomatoes, pepper, green onions, romaine lettuce, tuna, red chili peppers, sweet onions, green chili peppers, sesame dressing, wrappers, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Tuna Poke Mini Tacos with 12 pieces tuna (sushi grade), cut into 1-1/2-oz. pieces, 1-1/2 tsp. salt, 1-1/2 tsp. pepper, 36 each won ton wrappers, deep fried in concave shape, drained, 3 qt. romaine lettuce, shredded, 1-1/2 cups sweet onions, chopped Safeway 1 lb For $1.49 thru 02/09, 1-1/2 cups tomatoes, chopped, 6 Tbsp. red chili peppers, chopped, 6 Tbsp. green chili peppers, chopped, 1-1/2 cups KRAFT Oriental Sesame Dressing, 1-1/2 cups green onions, chopped, 3 Tbsp. sesame seed, toasted, 1 qt. nori, finely shredded. Here's the instruction: For each serving: Season 1 piece of tuna with 1/8 tsp. each salt and pepper. Sear in saute pan on high heat 30 sec. on each side or until blackened on both sides. Remove from pan; cool completely. Cut into 3 slices. Refrigerate until ready to use. Fill each of 3 won ton shells with 1/3 cup lettuce, 2 tsp. each sweet onions and tomatoes, 1 tuna slice and 1/2 tsp. each red and green chilis. Drizzle each with 2 tsp. dressing; sprinkle with 2 tsp. green onions and 1/4 tsp. sesame seed. Serve on a bed of 1/3 cup nori.

input_text: I have italian bread crumbs, chicken breasts, milk, honey, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Honey-Dipped Chicken with 6 to 8 skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper to taste, Italian bread crumbs, milk and egg wash, honey. Here's the instruction: Dip chicken in egg wash and bread in Italian bread crumbs. (For best results, bread twice.) Fry in cast-iron skillet to light brown. Be careful not to break the coating. Place on baking sheet. Squeeze honey over chicken. Bake in 350° oven 10 minutes.

input_text: I have crackers, brown sugar, chocolate, walnuts, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Toffee Cookie Bars with low sodium keebler Club crackers, 1 cup butter, not margarine, 1 cup brown sugar, tightly packed, 6 ounces semisweet chocolate morsels, 6 ounces finely chopped walnuts. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°. Line a cookie sheet or jellyroll pan with aluminum foil. Line pan tightly with crackers broken into fourths. In a large saucepan bring butter and brown sugar to a boil. Let boil for 3 minutes, stirring occasionaly. Spread butter/sugar mixture evenly over crackers. Bake for 350° for 5 minutes. They are done when crackers appear to be floating. Sprinkle with semi sweet morsels. Spread evenly as they melt, if not melting well, return pan to oven briefly. Sprinkle walnuts over chocolate and press firmly. Refrigerate until hard. Peel foil from cookies and break apart into separate pieces.

input_text: I have bell pepper, soy sauce, onion, water, celery, cornstarch, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pepper Steak with round steak, enough for your family, 1/4 c. soy sauce, 1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce, 1/4 c. water, 1 tsp. cornstarch, 1/2 c. celery, 1/2 c. onion, 1/2 c. bell pepper. Here's the instruction: Cut round steak into cubes. Brown steak in oil. Add soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce and 1/4 cup water. Simmer 30 minutes. Add 1 cup water with 1 teaspoon cornstarch. Add celery, onion and bell pepper. Cook 20 to 25 minutes. Serve over rice.

input_text: I have potatoes, fresh carrots, cream of mushroom soup, stalks celery, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, cream of celery soup, onions, chuck roast, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Easy Pot Roast with 1 (3 to 4 lb.) arm or chuck roast, 1 lb. fresh carrots (whole), 3 to 6 stalks celery, 2 onions, sliced, 6 to 8 small potatoes, 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 tsp. garlic powder, salt and pepper to taste, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 can cream of celery soup. Here's the instruction: Place roast and vegetables in a large, covered roasting pan (no need to brown roast). Mix seasoning and soups in a bowl. Pour over roast and vegetables. Cover and bake at 300° for about 3 1/2 to 4 1/2 hours. Makes great gravy.

input_text: I have bacon, tater tots, pepper, eggs, cheddar cheese, green onion, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Frittata Or Fri-Tot-Ta with 4 cups tater tots, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 9 eggs beaten, 1 1/2 cups cheddar cheese grated, divided, 1/2 cup green onion sliced, 4 slices bacon sliced and cooked, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper. Here's the instruction: 20Turn on the broiler in your oven In an oven safe skillet, add the olive oil and rub it around till all sides are coated. Add the Tater Tots and cook according to the directions on the package. When the tots are finished cooking, top with 1 cup of the grated cheese, the green onions (reserve 1 tablespoon for topping) and the bacon (reserve 1 tablespoon for topping) Pour the beaten eggs on top of the tater tots and cook on medium heat for about 10 minutes or until the eggs are almost set. (Timing on this will depend on the size of the pan and the deepness of the mixture) When the eggs are almost set, top with the rest of the cheese and bacon and place under the broiler for another 3-5 minutes. Sprinkle with the reserved green onion when serving.

input_text: I have marshmallows, coffee, baking soda, molasses, ground nutmeg, ground cloves, ground ginger, water, white vinegar, flour, egg whites, white sugar, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Soft Ginger Cut-Outs with 1 1/2 cups white sugar, 1 cup molasses, 1/2 cup strong brewed coffee, room temperature, 5 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 3/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1/4 teaspoon ground cloves, 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger, 1 1/2 cups white sugar, 1/2 cup water, 1 teaspoon distilled white vinegar, 1 cup miniature marshmallows, 2 egg whites. Here's the instruction: In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 1/2 cups of the white sugar, molasses and coffee. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt, ground nutmeg, ground cloves and ground ginger. Add the flour mixture to the molasses mixture and mix well. Cover and refrigerate dough for 2 hours. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray baking sheets with non-stick cooking spray. Roll chilled dough on a floured surface to 1/4 inch thick. Cut with 3 or 4 inch sized cookie cutters. Place cookies on the prepared baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 8 to 10 minutes or until set. Let cookies cool on wire racks. To Make Frosting: Combine the remaining 1 1/2 cups white sugar, the water and vinegar in a heavy saucepan. Cover and bring to a boil. Uncover and cook over medium-high heat until a candy thermometer reads 234-240 degrees F (112-115 degrees C), softball stage. This should take about 5 to 10 minutes. Remove form the heat and stir in the marshmallows until smooth. In a clean bowl beat the egg whites until frothy. Gradually beat in the sugar/marshmallow mixture and continue beating, on high, for 7 to 8 minutes or until stiff peaks form. Frost the cooled cookies. Let the frosting harden before storing the cookies in an airtight container.

input_text: I have oleo, sugar, baking powder, vanilla, eggs, chocolate, flour, walnuts, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Arrie'S Brownies with 4 sq. unsweetened baking chocolate, 4 eggs, 2 c. sugar, 2 sticks oleo, 1 c. sifted flour, 1 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 Tbsp. vanilla, 1 c. chopped walnuts. Here's the instruction: Melt chocolate and oleo over low heat; set aside to cool. Mix sugar and eggs until slightly fluffy. Add chocolate, oleo, flour, baking powder, salt and vanilla. Mix well. Last, add walnuts. Bake in a 9 x 9 x 2-inch pan in a preheated 300° oven. Bake 30 minutes. Cool in pan; cut into squares. This recipe may be doubled, if so desired.

input_text: I have oregano, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, onion, basil, fresh garlic, margarine, zucchini, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Zucchini & Onions With Mozzarella with 3 tablespoons margarine, 3 cups sliced zucchini (sliced 1/8-inch thick), 1 cup sliced onion (sliced 1/8-inch thick), 1/2 teaspoon basil, 1/4 teaspoon oregano, 1 pinch salt, 1/2 teaspoon minced fresh garlic, 1 medium tomatoes, cut into wedges, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese. Here's the instruction: In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add all ingredients, except cheese and tomato wedges. Continue cooking, stirring occasionally, until zucchini is crisp-tender. (approx. 7-10 minutes.). Add tomato wedges; sprinkle with cheese. Cover and let stand 2 minutes, or until cheese is melted. Serve.

input_text: I have cumin, pepper, salmon, chili powder, onion powder, avocado, cilantro, whole limes, garlic, red onion, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Blackened Salmon with Avocado Salsa with 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil, 1 teaspoon Chili Powder, 1 teaspoon Garlic Powder, 1 teaspoon Onion Powder, 1 teaspoon Pepper, 1/2 teaspoons Cumin, 1/2 teaspoons Salt, 2 whole (8 Oz. Size) Coho Salmon Fillets, 1 whole Avocado, Peeled, Pitted, And Diced, 1- 1/2 whole Limes, Juiced, 1/4 whole Red Onion, Minced, 1/4 cups Cilantro, Chopped. Here's the instruction: 1. Add oil into a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Combine the spices in a small bowl. Rub spices into the salmon fillets. Once oil is hot, add salmon into the pan skin side up. Cook for 4 minutes then flip onto the skin side and cook for another 4 minutes. Put salmon onto plates. 2. While salmon is cooking, make salsa. Mix together the salsa ingredients in a small bowl. Serve on top of each fillet. Enjoy!

input_text: I have banane, liqueur, orange juice, brandy. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Happy World with 1 ounce brandy, 12 ounce Cointreau liqueur, 1 ounce fresh orange juice, 12 ounce creme de banane. Here's the instruction: Pour the brandy and Cointreau into a shaker filled with ice. Then add the orange juice and creme de banane. Shake vigorously; strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and maraschino cherry.

input_text: I have wasabi paste, ginger paste, salt, horseradish, water, white vinegar, clove garlic, rice wine vinegar, turmeric, frozen edamame, olive oil, tahini. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Wasabi edamame humus with 1 lb frozen edamame, 6 tbsp water, 3 tbsp tahini, 3 tbsp olive oil, 2 tbsp rice wine vinegar, 1 tbsp white vinegar, 45 grams wasabi paste (about 1/4 cup). add less if you like it milder., 3 tsp horseradish, 3 tsp ginger paste, 2 clove garlic, crushed, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp turmeric. Here's the instruction: Cook edamame according to package directions. Rinse under cold water and drain. Place cooked and cooled edamame in blender or food processor. Add remaining and blend until smooth. Chill.

input_text: I have cherry pie filling, marshmallows, yellow cake. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Marshmallow-Cherry Cake with 1 pkg. small marshmallows, 1 yellow cake mix, 1 can cherry pie filling. Here's the instruction: Use 9 x 13-inch pan, grease and flour.

input_text: I have butter, baking potatoes, onion soup. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Quick And Easy Potatoes(Great For A Crowd)   with 8 large baking potatoes, washed, 2 pkg. dry onion soup mix, 1/4 lb. butter. Here's the instruction: Slice and layer potatoes in a greased (1/4 inch) 9 x 13-inch pan. Sprinkle with onion soup mix and top with pats of butter. Cover tightly with foil and bake at 400° until all potatoes are tender, about 45 minutes.

input_text: I have pepper, milk, oatmeal, hamburger, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mom'S Meatballs with 1 1/2 lb. hamburger, 1 c. evaporated milk, 1/4 tsp. pepper, 3/4 c. uncooked oatmeal, 1 1/2 tsp. salt. Here's the instruction: Combine above ingredients and form into meatballs. Fry on both sides until brown. Place meatballs into a baking dish.

input_text: I have tomatoes, chili powder, onion, long grain rice, green onion, celery, basil, vegetable oil, bay leaves, thyme, parsley, chicken, shrimp, garlic, sausage, butter, green pepper. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Shrimp Jambalaya with 3 lb. shrimp, shelled and deveined, 1 lb. smoked sausage, sliced, 1 Tbsp. vegetable oil, 1 Tbsp. butter or margarine, 1 c. chopped onion, 1 c. chopped green pepper, 1/2 c. finely chopped celery, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 1/2 c. long grain rice, 1 (16 oz.) can whole tomatoes, undrained, 2 c. chicken stock or water, 2 bay leaves, 1 tsp. dried thyme, 1 tsp. dried basil, 1/2 tsp. chili powder, 1/2 c. chopped green onion, 1/4 c. minced parsley. Here's the instruction: Cook shrimp and sausage in oil and butter in a large saucepan over low flame for 5 minutes. Add onion, green pepper, celery and garlic. Cook until tender. Stir in remaining ingredients, except green onions and parsley; heat to boiling. Reduce flame and simmer, covered, for 30 minutes or until rice is tender. Five minutes before the Jambalaya is done, add green onions and parsley. Makes 6 servings.

input_text: I have egg, baking powder, vanilla, baking soda, light brown sugar, flour, walnuts, chocolate chips, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Blondies  with 1 cup all purpose flour, 1/2 tsp baking powder, 1/8 tsp baking soda, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 stick unsalted butter melted, Scant 1 cup light brown sugar, 1 egg beaten, 1 tsp vanilla, 2/3 cup chocolate chips, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts. Here's the instruction: 1. Preheat oven to 350 deg F. 2. Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. 3. In a separate bowl, mix butter and sugar.. 4. Stir in the egg and vanilla. 5. Add the flour mixture and stir until just combined. 6. Fold in the chocolate chips and nuts. 7. Spread into a 7 x 11 inch (brownie) pan. 8. Bake at 350 deg F for 25 to 28 mins, a little longer for glass pan.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, shell, corn syrup, eggs, margarine, oatmeal. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Oatmeal Pie with 1 stick margarine, softened, 2/3 c. sugar, 2 eggs, beaten slightly, 1 tsp. vanilla, 2/3 c. dark corn syrup, 2/3 c. oatmeal, 1 unbaked pie shell. Here's the instruction: Cream together margarine and sugar. Add remaining ingredients; pour into pie shell. Bake at 325° for 50 minutes.

input_text: I have egg, baking powder, sugar, baking soda, cooking oil, all-purpose, nuts, cherries, milk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cherry Nut Bread with 3 c. all-purpose flour, 1 c. sugar, 1 Tbsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. baking soda, 1 beaten egg, 1 2/3 c. milk, 3/4 c. chopped nuts, 1 c. chopped cherries, 1/4 c. cooking oil. Here's the instruction: In mixing bowl, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda. In another mixing bowl, combine beaten egg, milk and cooking oil. Add to flour mixture, stirring just until combined. Stir nuts and cherries into batter. Pour batter into a greased loaf pan. Bake in a 350° oven for 1 to 1 1/4 hours or until inserted toothpick comes out clean.

input_text: I have buttermilk, classic olive oil, sugar, black pepper, lemon juice, italian seasoning, fresh garlic, dill, white wine vinegar, mayonaise, mustard, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text:
You can make Greek Salad with 1 cup classic olive oil, 1.5 teaspoons lemon juice, 3 tablespoons white wine vinegar, 1.5 tablespoons fresh dill, 2 teaspoons minced fresh garlic in jar, 1/2 teaspoon Italian seasoning, 2 tablespoons buttermilk, 2 tablespoons real mayonaise, 1/2 teaspoon Lavender's all-purpose Greek seasoning, 1.5 teaspoons sugar, 1.5 teaspoons Grey Poupon Dijon mustard, Sea salt to taste, Black pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients in a food processor until smooth. Store in refrigerator and keep cool if you are not using right away. You may need to shake / stir the dressing before serving. The oil and other ingredients get separated as it settles. This recipe makes about 1.5 cups of dressing. Disclaimers: 1)Our garden dill was in the fridge for about a week making it not as strong. You may want to cut down on this ingredient, start with a couple of pinches. Keep adding until you get the dill flavor you like! 2)For the salt and pepper we used a 1/2 teaspoon of each but salt and pepper to your tastebuds! We know everyone likes salt and spice different! The Toppings for the Greek Salad:
We used fresh garden lettuce. Any type will do! Even fresh spinach leaves would be great! Top salad with English cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, red/yellow bell peppers, red onions, kalamata olives, and feta cheese. We also like to salt and pepper our salads after the toppings are on! We didn't toss this salad, because well, look at those pretty salad toppings! Place dressing in a separate serving dish and let your guests dress their own!

input_text: I have freshly ground black pepper, water, carrots, philadelphia, zucchini. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Saucy Ribbon Vegetables with 1 cup water, 4 carrots (3/4 lb./340 g), cut lengthwise into very thin slices, 2 zucchini, cut lengthwise into very thin slices, 1/2 cup Philadelphia Herb & Garlic Cream Cheese Product, 1/8 tsp. freshly ground black pepper. Here's the instruction: Bring water to boil in medium saucepan on medium-high heat. Add carrots; cover. Cook 1 min. Add zucchini; cook, covered, 3 min. Use slotted spoon to transfer vegetables to bowl; reserve water in pan. Whisk cream cheese product into reserved water; cook on medium heat 2 to 3 min. or until cream cheese is melted and sauce is well blended, stirring constantly. Spoon vegetables onto platter; top with sauce.

input_text: I have oscar mayer, butter, milk. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bacon Sauce with VELVEETA with 1 loaf VELVEETA Pasteurized Process Cheese Spread, Loaf, cubed, 2 cups milk, 1/2 cup butter, 2 qt. OSCAR MAYER 18-22 Slice Count Raw Bacon Flat Pak, crisply cooked, crumbled. Here's the instruction: Place VELVEETA, milk and butter in saucepan; cook on low heat until VELVEETA is completely melted, stirring frequently. Stir in bacon just before serving.

input_text: I have heavy cream, leeks, chicken broth, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Creamed Leeks with 12 firm fresh leeks, 1 to 1 1/2 inches in diameter, 4 tablespoons butter, 1/2 cup chicken broth, Heavy cream to taste, Salt and freshly ground black pepper. Here's the instruction: Cut off roots of the leeks and peel off any withered leaves. Cut off 2 inches from green tops. With a sharp knife slit the green parts in half lengthwise stopping an inch from root end. Make another slit, lengthwise and perpendicular. Spread leaves apart an rinse them under running water, carefully looking out for hidden grit. Cut leeks crosswise into 1 1/2-inch lengths. Heat butter in a saucepan and add the leeks. Toss to combine them with the butter. Add the broth, cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until completely tender. You may do the recipe 2 to 3 days in advance up to this point. Over medium heat, evaporate the liquid from the leeks and when they are totally dry add heavy cream, starting with 1/4 cup or so and simmer, stirring continuously until the cream has been absorbed by the leeks. Add 1/4 cup more and repeat if you wish. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

input_text: I have zucchini, olive oil, fresh sage, garlic, yellow squash, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sage Roasted Squash with 2 medium zucchini, 2 yellow squash, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh sage, 1 tablespoon minced garlic, salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 350. Cut squash and zucchini into 1 inch dice. Toss with other ingredients and roast until tender, 15-20 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

input_text: I have bisquick, sour cream, cheddar cheese, garlic, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make "Fasties, But Goodies"(Cheezy Muffins)   with 2 c. Bisquick, 1 stick butter, melted, 1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream, 1/2 c. (2 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese, dash of garlic (optional). Here's the instruction: Mix well all ingredients. Spoon into 3 miniature muffin pans. Bake at 450° for 10 to 12 minutes.

input_text: I have vanilla, ground almonds, eggs, milk chocolate, caster sugar, walnuts, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Nigella Flourless Chocolate Brownies with 8 ounces milk chocolate, 1 cup unsalted butter, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1 cup caster sugar, 3 eggs, beaten, 1 3/4 cups ground almonds, 3/4 cup walnuts, coarsely chopped. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 340 degrees farenheit. Melt butter and chocolate together in a heavy-based saucepan over low heat. Take the pan off the heat and add vanilla and sugar, let cool a little. Beat eggs into mix along with both nuts. Pour mix into a 24xm square baking tin. (a spatula is very helpful for this step). Bake in oven 25-30 min or until tops are set and the middle is still gooey. Cut into 16 squares and serve.

input_text: I have buttermilk, sugar, vanilla extract, pecan meats, milk, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Buttermilk Candy with 2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. buttermilk, 1/2 c. evaporated milk, 1 stick butter or margarine, 1 tsp. vanilla extract, 1 c. pecan meats, chopped fine (optional). Here's the instruction: Blend first four ingredients in cooking vessel, bring to a boil. Add vanilla when mixture comes to soft ball stage. Cool. Add nuts; beat.

input_text: I have rotelle pasta, ground pepper, oregano, tomatoes, parmesan cheese, basil, mushroom, broccoli, light cream, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pasta,Mushrooms and Broccoli W/ Creamy Tomato Sauce with 8 ounces rotelle pasta or 8 ounces pasta, of choice, 1 lb mushroom, quartered, 1 12 cups broccoli, coarsely chopped and blanched, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1 cup light cream, 1 cup canned plum tomatoes, drained and coarsely chopped, 1 teaspoon crushed dried oregano, 1 teaspoon dried basil, 12 teaspoon salt, more to taste, 12 teaspoon fresh ground pepper, freshly grated parmesan cheese. Here's the instruction: Cook pasta until al dente,drain and toss with 1 tbl. olive oil. Heat 3 tbls. olive oil in a large skillet,add the mushrooms and saute quickly over high heat until golden Rmove from heat and add cream,tomatoes and seasonings. Mix well and cool to room temperature. Toss the mushroom,tomato and cream mix with the pasta. Add the broccoli just before serving and toss gently again. Taste for seasonings and adjust to your liking. Serve at room temperature and pass the grated Parmesan separately.

input_text: I have snow peas, sugar, black pepper, water, sesame oil, cherry tomatoes, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Snow Peas and Cherry Tomatoes with 1 12 cups snow peas, trimmed, 3 tablespoons water, 12 teaspoon butter or 12 teaspoon vegan margarine, 14 teaspoon sugar, 12 cherry tomatoes, halved, 12 teaspoon dark sesame oil, 18 teaspoon salt, 18 teaspoon black pepper. Here's the instruction: Cook first four ingredients over med high heat for 2 minutes in a skillet or until liquid evaporates. Then add tomatoes and cook until tomatoes are heated thoroughly. Remove from heat stir in remaining ingredients.

input_text: I have sugar, water, vanilla ice cream, ginger ale, fruit juice. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Gala Punch with 2 c. sugar, 4 qt. water, 2 pkg. Kool-Aid, 2 cans frozen fruit juice, 2 qt. ginger ale, 1/2 gal. vanilla ice cream. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients well just before serving. May use any color Kool-Aid.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, eggs, frosting, cream cheese, cake, lemon pie filling, lemon cake, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Luscious Lemon Cake with Cake, 1 (18 1/4 ounce) package lemon cake mix (Duncan Hines Lemon Supreme), 4 eggs, 1 (15 ounce) can lemon pie filling, Frosting, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 1/2 cup butter, softened (1 stick), 2 cups confectioners' sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla (I use 2 tsp, as I really like vanilla). Here's the instruction: For the cake, beat the cake mix and eggs until blended using a mixer on low. Fold in lemon pie filling (do not beat in). Spread in a greased 13 x 9 inch pan and bake at 350 for 20-25 minutes. (You might also want to put parchment paper on the bottom, greased on both sides, for easy removal.). For the frosting, mix the butter and cream cheese until smooth using the mixer on low. Add the sugar and vanilla, again blending until smooth.
