target_text: You can make Baked Papaya with 3 papayas, firm but ripe (the sweeter Hawaiian variety is probably best here), 1 vanilla bean, cut into 6 pieces, 6 teaspoons butter, 12 teaspoons brown sugar. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 deg F. Peel the papayas, split them in half lengthwise and remove the seeds. Arrange the prepared papayas, cut side up, in a large baking dish filled with approximately 1/2 inch of water. Place one piece of vanilla bean, 1 tsp butter and 2 teaspoons brown sugar in the center of each papaya half. Bake for 45 minutes, or until tender.

input_text: I have sugar, nutmeg, eggs, apple juice, vanilla ice cream. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Apple Eggnog with 4 eggs, separated, 2 Tbsp. sugar, 2 c. vanilla ice cream, 2 c. apple juice, nutmeg. Here's the instruction: In large bowl beat egg yolks until thick; add sugar, ice cream and apple juice. Mix until blended. Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form. Fold into apple juice mixture. Sprinkle each serving with nutmeg. Makes 7 (1 cup) servings.

input_text: I have tomatoes, mozzarella, freshly ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar, kosher salt, fresh basil, olive oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Caprese Salad with 2 cups balsamic vinegar, 3 ripe tomatoes, 12 ounces fresh mozzarella, thickly sliced, Large bunch fresh basil leaves, Olive oil, for drizzling, Large pinch kosher salt, Large pinch freshly ground black pepper. Here's the instruction: Measure the balsamic vinegar and pour into a saucepan. Bring it to a gentle boil over a low heat. Cook it until the balsamic vinegar has reduced to a nice thick glaze (but still pourable), about 15 minutes. Oh and one other thing, your house will stink. But it's a good kind of stink, it's a vinegary stink. Allow the reduction to cool to room temperature before you serve it. When you are ready to assemble the salad, cut the tomatoes into thick slices. Arrange them on a platter, alternating them with the mozzarella slices. Tuck the whole basil leaves in between the tomato and cheese slices. Drizzle on the gorgeous, almost black balsamic reduction. Then drizzle olive oil in a thin stream over the top. Finally, sprinkle on salt and pepper. You need this in your life. Make it today my friends.

input_text: I have choice, pepper, garlic salt, basil, olive oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bills Grilled Steaks with 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 tablespoon garlic salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon basil, 4 steaks, of your choice. Here's the instruction: Rub your chosen steak with olive oil. Add garlic salt.I use Lowerys but any good brand will do.put a good black pepper on steaks. Sprinkle lightly with dried basil. Let stand at room tempature for an hour or so. cook and eat that baby.spice measurements are app. Something I have done lately is buy a whole filet . cut it in half and cook half with the seasonings. Then slice it thin about 1/4 inch. Serve it quickly so it does not get cold.

input_text: I have whipping cream, parmesan cheese, dried fettuccine, egg whites, pancetta, egg yolks, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fettuccine Carbonara  with 1 tbs. olive oil, 6 1/4-inch-thick slices pancetta or bacon, chopped, 4 egg yolks, 2 small egg whites, Salt and freshly ground pepper, 1/ c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese, 6 tablespoons whipping cream, 1 lb. dried fettuccine, additional freshly grated Parmesan. Here's the instruction: Heat olive oil in heavy large skillet over medium heat. Add pancetta and saute until fat is rendered and meat is crisp. Pour off fat from skillet.  Put egg yolks in one bowl and egg whites in another. Season both with salt and a generous amount of pepper. Mix 1/2 c cheese and cream into yolks and whisk until thick. Using electric mixer, beat whites to soft peaks.  Meanwhile, cook pasta in large pot of boiling salted water until just tender but still firm to bite. Return pasta to pot.  Immediately add pancetta to pasta and toss well. Add whites and yolk mixture and toss well. Serve immediately, passing additional cheese separately.

input_text: I have sugar, basmati rice, mustard seeds, fresh ginger, curry, vegetable oil, onions, lime juice, cashews, turmeric, asafetida, jalapenos, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Quick Onion Pullao with 1/4 cup raw cashews, 3 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/4 teaspoon asafetida (optional), 1 teaspoon mustard seeds, 1 teaspoon turmeric, 1 pound onions (3 to 4), thinly sliced into rings or half circles, 4 jalapenos, minced, 2 tablespoons minced fresh ginger, 5 fresh or dried curry leaves, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon sugar, 4 cups cooked Govindobhog Rice or Basmati Rice, 1/4 cup fresh lime juice. Here's the instruction: In a large heavy skillet, toast the cashews over high heat, stirring constantly, until golden. Remove from the heat and stir for 15 seconds, then transfer to a plate. In a large saucepan, heat the oil until it shimmers. Add the asafetida and stir briefly to dissolve, then stir in the mustard seeds. When they stop popping, stir in the turmeric. Toss in the onions, jalapenos, ginger and curry leaves and stir to coat with the oil. Lower heat to moderate and cook, stirring frequently, until the onions start to brown, about 8 minutes. Stir in the salt and sugar. Add the rice; gently turn and stir until well mixed and heated through. Drizzle in the lime juice and cook, stirring, for 30 seconds. Discard the curry leaves. Mound the pullao on a deep platter, top with the cashews and serve.

input_text: I have condensed milk, sour cream, sugar, lemon juice, graham cracker crumbs, eggs, cream cheese, margarine, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mack'S New York Cheesecake(Creamy Baked Cheesecake)   with 1/4 c. margarine or butter, 1 c. graham cracker crumbs, 1/4 c. sugar, 2 (8 oz. each) pkg. cream cheese, softened, 1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk, 3 eggs, 1/4 tsp. salt, 1/4 c. reconstituted lemon juice, 1 (8 oz.) container sour cream. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 375°. In small saucepan, melt margarine; stir in crumbs and sugar. Pat crumbs firmly on bottom of buttered 9-inch spring-form pan. Bake for 6 to 8 minutes. Cool while preparing filling. Reduce oven temperature to 300°.

input_text: I have sugar, salad oil, eggs, cinnamon, soda, flour, carrots, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Carrot Cake with 2 1/4 c. flour, 2 c. sugar, 2 tsp. soda, 2 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. salt, 1 1/4 c. salad oil, 4 eggs, 3 c. grated carrots. Here's the instruction: Mix the first 5 ingredients. Add oil, eggs and carrots. Grease and flour a 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 350° for 45 to 50 minutes.

input_text: I have oil, ground cumin, onion, okra fresh, green chili pepper, turmeric, garlic, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bhindi Masala with 1 cup oil, 1 onion, 10 garlic, 2 green chili pepper, 1 teaspoon turmeric, 1 tablespoon ground cumin, 3 pounds okra fresh, salt. Here's the instruction: Heat oil in large pot. Add onion, garlic & chilies. Fry over medium heat till browned. Stir in turmeric & cumin & fry for 2 minutes. Mix in okra & salt. Cover, reduce heat & simmer for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent burning. Serve hot with plain rice or chapatis.

input_text: I have cans great northern beans, tomatoes, macaroni, water, celery, garlic. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lynn'S Great Northern Soup with 2 reg. cans Great Northern beans, 2 soup cans water, 1 can diced tomatoes, 1/2 c. chopped celery sauteed in 3 T. olive oil, 1/2 t. garlic powder, 1/2 c. uncooked elbow macaroni cooked according to pkg. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients, except macaroni, and simmer about one and a half hours. Shortly before serving add cooked macaroni and season to taste with salt and pepper.

input_text: I have oil, vinegar, sugar, frozen brussel sprouts, onion, pepper sauce, garlic, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Marinated Brussel Sprouts  with 2 pkg. frozen brussel sprouts, cooked and drained, 1/2 cup vinegar, 1/2 cup oil, 1/4 tsp. minced garlic, 1 Tbsp. sugar, 1 tsp salt, dash hot pepper sauce, 1 small onion, sliced. Here's the instruction: Cook and drain sprouts combine remaining ingredients, mix well and pour over sprouts Rfgrigerate overnight, stir occasionally

input_text: I have italian dressing, rotini pasta, parmesan cheese, salad seasoning. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Basic Pasta Salad with 1 (16 oz.) box rotini pasta (regular or garden variety), 1 (8 oz.) bottle Italian dressing, 1 bottle salad seasoning (about 2.5 oz.) *, Parmesan cheese, broccoli florets and cut grape or cherry tomatoes (optional). Here's the instruction: Boil pasta until just tender. If overcooked, the pasta may become mushy as you stir in other ingredients. Begin by adding half bottle of dressing and half bottle of salad seasoning. Mix well and taste. Add more dressing and/or seasoning if desired. You may also add one or more of the optional ingredients. Salad is best after it sets in the refrigerator about 12 hours.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, caramel chips, baking soda, ¼, brown sugar, eggs, flour, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bakery Style Salted Caramel Cookies with 3 cups Flour, 1 teaspoon Baking Soda, 1/4 teaspoons Baking Powder, 1 teaspoon Salt, 2 sticks Unsalted Butter, Room Temperature, 1/2 cups Sugar, 1 cup Brown Sugar, Packed, 2 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract, 2 whole Large Eggs, Room Temperature, 10 ounces, weight Hershey's Sea Salt Caramel Chips, 11 ounces, weight Kraft Caramel Bits, Sea Salt For Garnish. Here's the instruction: In a medium bowl, mix dry ingredients: flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt. Set aside. In a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment or with a hand held mixer, cream butter and sugars. Add vanilla, then add eggs one at a time. Mix, scraping down sides of bowl as necessary. With the mixer on low-speed, slowly add dry ingredients and mix just until dough comes together. Mix in sea salt caramel chips. Place dough in refrigerator for at least 30 minutes or up to 1 hour. Preheat oven to 375°F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Using a small ice cream scoop portion scoops of batter onto the baking sheet. Bake for 9-12 minutes or until edges are golden brown. Baking time will depend on oven and how large or small you scoop your cookies. Let cool on baking sheet for a few minutes than transfer to cooling rack. Melt caramel bits using about half of the water on the package directions. You want to be able to drizzle the caramel, but not have it run all over. Drizzle cookies with caramel and garnish with salt.

input_text: I have sugar, lemon juice, ¼, cinnamon, cardamom, all-purpose, cinnamon/sugar, pie crusts. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pear Pie with 1/2 cups Sugar, 3 Tablespoons All-purpose Flour, 1/4 teaspoons Salt, 1 teaspoon Cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoons Cardamom, 6 cups Peeled, Cored, Sliced Pears (Select Firm Fruit), 1/2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice, 1/4 cups Milk OR 1 Beaten Egg (optional), 2 Tablespoons Cinnamon/sugar Mixture (optional), 2 whole Pie Crusts (Recipe Of Your Choice). Here's the instruction: 1. Prepare the recipe for a double pie crust using the recipe of your choice. Then roll out the bottom crust and place into a 9" pie pan. 2. Combine sugar, flour, salt, cinnamon, and cardamom in a large mixing bowl. 3. Add the pears to the sugar mixture and toss. 4. Arrange the coated pears in the pie pan and sprinkle with the lemon juice. 5. Roll out the remaining pie crust and top the pie. Don't forget to puncture the crust to allow steam to release! Seal and crimp edges. If you like, brush the top of the pie with milk or egg and cinnamon/sugar mixture. 6. Cover edges of pie with aluminum foil. 7. Bake in a preheated 450-degree oven for 10 minutes; reduce heat and bake for an additional 25 minutes. Remove foil and bake for 10 minutes more. Let the pie set for half an hour before serving.

input_text: I have graham cracker crust, sugar, ground nutmeg, pumpkin, milk, ground cinnamon. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Turtle Pumpkin Pie Lower Cal with 1 fat-free graham cracker crust, 2 (3 1/2 ounce) packages sugar free fat free French vanilla pudding and pie filling mix, 1 cup skim milk, 1 cup canned pumpkin, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 12 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 (8 ounce) container Cool Whip Free, thawed, divided. Here's the instruction: POUR 1/4 cup caramel topping into crust; sprinkle with 1/2 cup nuts. BEAT dry pudding mixes, milk, pumpkin and spices with whisk until well blended. Stir in 1-1/2 cups COOL WHIP; spoon into crust. REFRIGERATE 1 hour. Top with remaining COOL WHIP, caramel topping and nuts just before serving.

input_text: I have cream of chicken soup, sour cream, drops, cheddar cheese, parsley flakes, mostaccioli, cheese, milk, sausage, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sausage And Mostaccioli Bake with 1/2 (1 lb.) pkg. mostaccioli, uncooked, 1 lb. fully cooked smoked sausage (Eckrich), cut into serving pieces, 1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of chicken soup, 1/2 c. sour cream, 1/4 c. milk, 1 tsp. parsley flakes, 1/2 tsp. salt, 8 to 10 drops bottled hot pepper sauce, 1/2 c. diced Monterey Jack cheese, 1/2 c. diced Cheddar cheese. Here's the instruction: Prepare mostaccioli according to package directions. Drain. In medium skillet, brown sausage and drain. In medium bowl, blend soup, sour cream, milk, parsley flakes, salt and hot pepper sauce. Add mostaccioli and cheeses. Mix well. Pour into a greased 9 x 9-inch baking dish. Top with smoked sausage. Bake in a 350° oven until hot, about 30 minutes.

input_text: I have brown sugar, chili powder, white vinegar, celery seeds, ketchup, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Prize Winning Barbecue Sauce with 1 cup ketchup, 4 tablespoons brown sugar, 1/2 cup white vinegar, 4 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 2 teaspoons celery seeds, 1 teaspoon chili powder. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients with wire wisk or mixer. Use a baste when cooking meats. Especially good on spare ribs. Preparation time: 15 minutes.

input_text: I have sugar, baking powder, eggs, lemon rind, cold water, flour, lemon, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Airways Sponge Cake with 6 eggs, separated, 1 1/2 c. sugar, 1 1/2 c. flour, sifted, 1/4 tsp. salt, 6 Tbsp. cold water, 1 tsp. grated lemon rind, 1 tsp. lemon extract (optional), 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder. Here's the instruction: Beat egg yolks till thick and fluffy. Beat in sugar gradually. Sift flour and salt together and add alternately with water. Add lemon rind. Beat egg whites till foamy, add baking powder and beat till they hold a peak. Fold into yolk mixture. Pour into ungreased angel food pan. Bake at 325° for 50 - 60 minutes.

input_text: I have pizza sauce, regular, ground hamburger, cheddar cheese, cheddar cheese soup. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pizza Casserole with 1 regular box lasagne noodles, 2 jars pizza sauce, 1 lb. ground hamburger meat, cooked, 1 to 2 c. grated Cheddar cheese, 1 can Cheddar cheese soup (make as sauce). Here's the instruction: Cook noodles until tender and not sticking together. In a casserole dish, place the first layer of noodles on bottom. Then spread pizza sauce on noodles (you can put pizza sauce on bottom of dish to keep them from sticking and drying out), then cheese sauce, then sprinkle meat and cheese. Do the same for approximately 3 layers. You may want extra cheese on top. Cook at 375° for 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly.

input_text: I have heavy cream, russet potatoes, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Potato Gratin with 3 pounds russet potatoes, peeled and sliced crosswise 1/4 inch thick, 5 cups heavy cream, Salt and freshly ground white pepper. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 250 and butter a 13-by-9-inch baking dish. In a large pot, combine the potatoes and cream and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, then press a round of parchment or wax paper on the potatoes. Simmer over moderately low heat until the potatoes are tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer the potatoes to the baking dish in layers. Season the potatoes with salt and pepper as you go. Return the pot with the cream to high heat and boil, stirring constantly, until the cream is reduced to 2 1/2 cups, 6 to 7 minutes. Pour the cream over the potatoes while shaking the baking dish. Bake the gratin for 1 1/2 hours, or until golden on top. Blot any excess fat and let stand 15 minutes before cutting.

input_text: I have tortilla shells, chorizo, black olives, onions, enchilada sauce, grated cheese, hamburger, tomato sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Adabelle'S Enchiladas with 1 doz. tortilla shells (corn), flat, 1 1/2 lb. hamburger, 1 small chorizo or Mexican sausage, chopped onions, grated cheese, tomato sauce, sliced black olives, enchilada sauce. Here's the instruction: In skillet, fry hamburg, onions and chorizo. Set aside and drain.

input_text: I have potatoes, pepper, heavy cream, gruyere cheese, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Gratin of Potatoes with 3 -4 large potatoes, cut in thin slices, 1 cup heavy cream, to taste, 23 cup grated gruyere cheese, salt, to taste, pepper. Here's the instruction: Wash the potato slices well and dry them on a towel. Pour a thin layer of heavy cream on the bottom of a 9" by 12" baking dish and alternate layers of potatoes and cheese. Top with cream. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover with foil and place in a pan of hot water. Bake at 350F until the potatoes are just tender. If all the cream has been absorbed, add more. Remove from pan of water, take off foil and replace in the oven to brown lightly. Just before serving, sprinkle with cheese and brown again. This is delicious served with baby lamb.

input_text: I have peas, bacon, tomatoes, onion, mushrooms, celery, cheese, hamburger. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Wigglers with 1 lb hamburger, 3 slices bacon, 1 small onion, chopped, 1 cup cooked peas, 2 cups tomatoes, 13 cup chopped celery, 1 (4 ounce) can mushrooms, 12 lb spaghetti, cooked, 10 ounces grated cheese (mild or sharp). Here's the instruction: Fry baco;, when brown remove from pan. Add onion and hamburger to bacon drippings and heat through. Arrange meat, vegetables and spaghetti in alternate layers in casserole. Pour tomatoes over mixture, cover with grated cheese and bacon. bake at 350F for 1 hour.

input_text: I have cream of chicken soup, sour cream, tomatoes, hot chili beans, onion, hamburger meat, grated cheese, doritos. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mexican Layered Casserole with Doritos, 1 lb. hamburger meat, browned, 1 diced onion, 1 (15 oz.) can hot chili beans, 1 lb. grated cheese, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1 (10 oz.) can chopped tomatoes and green chilies, 1 c. sour cream. Here's the instruction: In a large greased casserole dish, place the following in layers: Doritos, hamburger meat, onion, chili beans, grated cheese, cream of chicken soup, chopped tomatoes and green chilies and sour cream. Sprinkle Doritos over top. Place in oven at 350°. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden brown.

input_text: I have buttermilk, brown sugar, molasses, soda, eggs, flour. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Gingerbread with 1 c. molasses, 1 c. brown sugar, 1 c. buttermilk, 2 eggs, 1 tsp. soda, 3 1/2 c. flour. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients well and pour into large cake pan and bake 35 to 40 minutes (350°). Let cool and cut into squares.

input_text: I have oleo, sugar, flour, milk, peaches. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Surprise Peach Pie with 1/4 lb. oleo, 1 c. sugar, 1 c. self-rising flour, 3/4 c. milk, 1 large can peaches. Here's the instruction: In big pudding pan, melt oleo. In another pan or bowl, mix sugar, flour and milk. Mix well and pour over melted oleo and then pour over all the peaches. Bake at 350° until done. The crust will come to top and brown.

input_text: I have egg, baking powder, sugar, vanilla extract, bananas, flour, corn oil, margarine, milk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Banana Fritters with 1 c. all-purpose flour, 2 tsp. sugar, pinch of salt, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1/4 c. milk, 1 egg, 1 Tbsp. melted margarine, 1 tsp. vanilla extract, 3 large bananas, cut in big chunks, corn oil (for deep frying). Here's the instruction: Beat together first eight ingredients. Batter should be smooth and the consistency of pancake batter. Heat two inches of oil to 375°. Dip banana chunks into the batter and drop them into the hot oil. Fry for 5 to 6 minutes or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels. Serve warm, sprinkled with confectioners sugar.

input_text: I have butter, head cabbage, bread crumbs, milk. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Serbian Cabbage with 1 medium head cabbage, 1 (13 oz.) can evaporated milk, 1 c. dry bread crumbs, 1/2 c. butter or margarine. Here's the instruction: Shred cabbage and put in shallow 4-quart casserole. Pour milk over. Sprinkle with bread crumbs. Dot with butter. Cover and bake at 350° for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake for 30 minutes longer. Goes great with corned beef and boiled red potatoes. Makes 6 to 8 servings.

input_text: I have brown sugar, molasses, baking soda, ground cloves, water, flour, ground allspice, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Soft Gingerbread Cookies with 3/4 cup molasses, 1/3 cup packed brown sugar, 1/3 cup water, 1/8 cup butter, softened, 3 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon ground allspice, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, 1/2 teaspoon ground cloves, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon. Here's the instruction: In a medium bowl, mix together the molasses, brown sugar, water and butter until smooth. Combine the flour, baking soda, allspice, ginger, cloves and cinnamon, stir them into the wet mixture until all of the dry is absorbed. Cover the dough and chill for at least 3 hours. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness. Cut out into desired shapes. Place cookies 1 inch apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Remove from the cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.

input_text: I have vanilla, brown sugar, cinnamon, powdered sugar, pecans, purple sugar, milk, crescent rolls, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make King Cake With Praline Filling  with 1 can crescent rolls, 2 Tbps of unsalted butter, melted, 1/2 cup of chopped pecans, 1/4 cup of light brown sugar, packed, 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla extract, 1/2 teaspoon of cinnamon, powdered sugar, milk, yellow, green, purple sugar. Here's the instruction: Unroll crescent rolls and press to seal all perforations. Mix vanilla in with the melted butter. Spread butter and vanilla over crescent rolls. Top butter with pecans, brown sugar and vanilla. Starting with the long end, roll up jelly roll style and form into a circle. Pinch edges together. Bake at 375 for 15-20 minutes (until golden brown). After the cake has cooled, mix together powdered sugar and milk to make an icing. Top cake with icing and sprinkle with colored sugar.

input_text: I have pecan, orange juice concentrate, powdered sugar, vanilla wafers, butter, flaked coconut. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Orange Balls with 1 (12 oz.) pkg. vanilla wafers, 1 c. pecan pieces, 1 (16 oz.) pkg. powdered sugar, sifted, 1 (6 oz.) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed (undiluted), 1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted, 2 c. flaked coconut or toasted ground pecans. Here's the instruction: Position knife blade in food processor bowl; add half of vanilla wafers. Process until fine crumbs. Remove crumbs; set aside. Repeat procedure with remaining vanilla wafers; remove crumbs and set aside. Add pecan pieces to food processor bowl; process until ground. Combine crumbs, ground pecan pieces, powdered sugar, orange juice concentrate and butter in a large bowl; stir until blended. Divide mixture in half. Cover 1 portion with plastic wrap and set aside. Shape remaining portion into 1-inch balls and roll in coconut or 2 cups toasted ground pecans. (Orange balls will dry out quickly; roll immediately after shaping.) Repeat procedure with remaining portion.

input_text: I have crescent rolls, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Easy Bread with 1 stick butter, 3 cans Pillsbury crescent rolls. Here's the instruction: Melt butter in a Bundt cake pan at 350°. Open rolls but do not unwrap dough. Place "tubes" of dough end to end on buttered bottom of Bundt pan. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Turn out on platter and slice or pull apart.

input_text: I have porcini mushrooms, veal stock, trimmed beef tenderloin roast, unsalted butter, heavy cream, water, shallots, tarragon, tarragon vinegar, vegetable oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Roast Beef Tenderloin with 1/3 cup dried porcini mushrooms, 1 cup warm water, 2 1/2 pounds trimmed beef tenderloin roast, tied, salt and ground black pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, 1/2 cup sliced shallots, 1 pinch salt, 1/4 cup tarragon vinegar, 1 cup veal stock, 1/4 cup heavy cream, 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh tarragon, salt and ground black pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Combine porcini mushrooms and water in a bowl; soak until soft, 1 hour. Drain and reserve liquid. Dice and set mushrooms and reserved liquid aside. Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Season beef generously with salt and pepper. Heat vegetable oil in a large ovenproof skillet over high heat. Place beef in the skillet; cook until brown on all sides, 5 to 8 minutes per side. Reduce heat to medium and stir in 1 tablespoon butter, shallots, and a pinch of salt; cook until shallots are soft and translucent, 5 to 7 minutes. Pour tarragon vinegar into the skillet and bring to a boil while scraping any browned bits off of the bottom. Stir until liquid is reduced by half, 2 to 4 minutes. Pour in veal stock, cream, 1/2 cup reserved mushroom liquid, mushrooms, salt, and pepper; stir to combine. Return beef to the skillet. Roast in the preheated oven until meat is medium rare, about 45 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 130 degrees F (54 degrees C). Transfer meat to a plate and loosely tent with foil. Set skillet over high heat and bring pan juices to a boil. Stir in 1 tablespoon butter and tarragon; season with salt and pepper to taste. Return tenderloin and any accumulated juices to skillet and serve.

input_text: I have egg, freshly ground black pepper, couple, cream, butter, extra-virgin olive oil, stuffing, celery, crimini mushrooms, ground turkey, turkey, lemon juice, onion, flour, poultry seasoning, thyme, salt, golden delicious apple, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Thanksgiving Tonight with 1 pound whole-wheat, whole-grain or semolina spaghetti, Salt, 1 cup dry stuffing (recommended: Pepperidge Farm), 3 cups turkey or chicken stock, 1 pound ground turkey, Freshly ground black pepper, 1 medium Golden Delicious apple, peeled, cored and finely chopped, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 2 celery ribs from the heart, finely chopped, 1 small onion or 1/2 medium onion, finely chopped, 1 tablespoon poultry seasoning, 1 egg, Extra-virgin olive oil, for liberal drizzling, 1/2 pound crimini mushrooms, thinly sliced, A few sprigs fresh thyme, leaves stripped and chopped, 2 tablespoons butter, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 cup cream or half-and-half, 1/2 cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano, a couple of handfuls, A couple handfuls flat-leaf parsley, chopped. Here's the instruction: Heat the oven to 425 degrees F. Bring water to a boil in large pot for pasta. When the water boils wait until meatballs go into oven. When meatballs have been in oven 4 to 5 minutes, season water with salt, add spaghetti and cook to al dente. Drain pasta and keep warm. Soak stuffing with about 1 cup stock in small bowl until softened, a couple of minutes. Place turkey in mixing bowl and season with salt and pepper. Add apple, lemon juice, celery, onion, poultry seasoning, egg and stuffing and mix until just combined. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Form meat mixture into 16 (2-inch) balls, drizzle with some olive oil and roast until cooked through, firm and golden, about 12 minutes. While meatballs roast, heat a couple of tablespoons olive oil in large skillet, add mushrooms and thyme and cook over medium-high heat until tender and season with salt and pepper. Make a well in the center of the pan, add the butter, and when melted, whisk in the flour. Cook for 1 minute then whisk in about 2 cups stock and Worcestershire sauce. Reduce heat to low and cook for a few minutes to thicken the sauce, then stir in cream. Toss pasta in a large serving bowl with the meatballs, sauce and cheese. Garnish with parsley and serve.

input_text: I have salt, chili seasoning, onion, ro-tel tomatoes, lean ground beef, salsa, water, garlic, tomato sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lori'S Hot Chili with 2 lb. lean ground beef, 1 onion, chopped, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 c. salsa (hot), 8 oz. tomato sauce, 10 oz. Ro-Tel tomatoes, 1 1/4 c. water, pinch of salt, 1 pkg. chili seasoning. Here's the instruction: Brown beef with onion and garlic; drain and add salsa, tomato sauce, Ro-Tel, water, salt and seasoning pouch. Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer 30 to 45 minutes. Serves 8 to 18.

input_text: I have fish stock, mussels, tomatoes, clams, aioli, leeks, saffron, red bell pepper, onions, prawns, garlic, fillet, olive oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bouillabaisse Soup with 1 teaspoon garlic finely chopped, olive oil, 3/4 cup onions finely sliced, 3/4 cup fresh tomatoes finely chopped, 3/4 cup leeks sliced, 2 red bell pepper slc of, 8 cups fish stock, 8 inches cod fillet, mussels 1 kl., 1/2 clams, 1 saffron pch of, 6 tiger prawns, 1/4 cup aioli, 12 garlic bread. Here's the instruction: Saute garlic in olive oil. Add the onions, tomatoes, leeks and bell pepper. Allow all vegetables to cook into a mash. Pour in very good fish stock and add the boneless fish fillet. Add the cleaned mussels and hallaan. Add the saffron and the tiger prawns. Cook just until all seafood are done. Flavor fish soup with aioli. Add garlic bread to the soup, a few pieces at a time depending on desired soup texture. Or, serve the aioli and the bread separately. Serve bouillabaisse while warm.

input_text: I have _____, vanilla, graham cracker crumbs, eggs whites, ¼, powdered sugar, bailey's irish cream, ghirardelli white chocolate, cream, filling, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bailey’S Irish Cream Mousse Pie with FOR THE CRUST:, 1-1/4 cup Graham Cracker Crumbs, 1/4 cups Sugar, 5 Tablespoons Butter, Melted, _____, FOR THE FILLING:, 1-1/3 cup Ghirardelli White Chocolate, Chopped, 1/3 cups Bailey's Irish Cream, 1/2 cups Eggs Whites (about 4 Eggs), 1/4 cups Sugar, 1 cup Heavy Whipping Cream, _____, FOR THE TOPPING:, 1 cup Heavy Whipping Cream, 1/3 cups Powdered Sugar, Sifted, 1/2 teaspoons Vanilla, 1/4 cups White Chocolate Curls, For Garnish (optional). Here's the instruction: Graham cracker pie crust: Mix ingredients together and press mixture firmly on the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch pie plate. Bake for 8 minutes at 350°F. Cool completely. Filling: 1. Melt chocolate and Irish Cream in a metal bowl over hot water. Make sure no water touches the chocolate or it will seize up. Use a spatula to blend well and keep from burning. Remove from heat. 2. Using a mixer, whip egg whites until soft peaks form. Add sugar 1 tablespoon at a time and beat until stiff peaks hold their shape. Set aside. 3. Whip the heavy cream until stiff. 4. Gently fold egg and whipped cream together. 5. With a large spatula, fold white chocolate mixture into egg white mixture. Do not over mix. 6. Spoon into cooled pie crust and chill while preparing the whipped cream topping. Sweetened whipped cream topping: Whip the heavy whipping cream until soft peaks form. Add powdered sugar and vanilla and whip until stiff. Spoon into a pasty bag fitted with a large star tip and pipe onto the pie using a swirling motion. Decorate with white chocolate curls. Refrigerate at least 4 hours before serving. If you don't want to prepare a pie crust, you can put the mousse into parfait glasses, top with whipped cream and decorate with a drizzle of Irish Cream and white chocolate curls. (Adapted from a recipe by Donna Diegel, Providence Food Examiner.)

input_text: I have tomato, onion, curry, slim japanese type, clove garlic, garam masala, carrot, ground meat, bay leaf, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Keema Curry with 300 grams Ground meat, 1 clove Garlic, 1/2 Onion, 1/2 Carrot, 1 Eggplant (slim Japanese type), 1 can Canned tomato, 3 tbsp Curry powder, 1 dash Garam masala, 1 Bay leaf, 1 dash Salt, pepper, 1 Olive oil. Here's the instruction: Cook rice with slightly less water than normal. Please refer tofor the saffron rice! ! Mince the vegetables. Pour olive oil in a pot, turn on the heat, and fry the bay leaf. Add garlic and vegetables, and stir-fry. Push to the side of the pot, and stir-fry the ground meat in the empty space. Sprinkle with salt. Add curry powder and garam masala, then mix evenly. Add the canned tomatoes and simmer for about 10 minutes. When cooked, sprinkle on salt and pepper to adjust the flavour. Serve it on rice and you're all done!

input_text: I have macaroni, scallions, brown sugar, celery, carrot, mayonnaise, milk, cider vinegar, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Hawaiian Macaroni Salad  with 2 cups whole milk, 2 cups mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, Salt and pepper, 1 pound elbow macaroni, 1/2 cup cider vinegar, 4 scallions , sliced thin, 1 large carrot , peeled and grated, 1 celery rib , chopped fine. Here's the instruction: MAKE DRESSING: Whisk 11/2 cups milk, 1 cup mayonnaise, sugar, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 2 teaspoons pepper in bowl.  COOK PASTA: Bring 4 quarts water to boil in large pot. Add 1 tablespoon salt and pasta and cook until very soft, about 15 minutes. Drain pasta and return to pot. Add vinegar and toss until absorbed. Transfer to bowl. Cool pasta 10 minutes, then stir in dressing until pasta is well coated. Cool completely.  MAKE SALAD: Add scallions, carrot, celery, remaining milk, and remaining mayonnaise to pot with pasta mixture and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to serving bowl and refrigerate, covered, for at least 1 hour or up to 2 days. Serve.

input_text: I have bacon, tomatoes, pierogi, onion, mushrooms. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pierogies With Tomato Bacon Sauce with 1 (1 lb) package frozen potato pierogi, 4 slices bacon, 10 ounces portabella mushrooms, 1 medium onion, 1 (15 ounce) can diced tomatoes with onion and garlic. Here's the instruction: Boil Pierogies as instructed on package. Meanwhile in a large skillet cook bacon until crispy, crumble and set aside discard all but two tablespoons drippings. Add onion and cook in drippings, add mushrooms and 1 tablespoon water cook until mushrooms are softened, add diced tomatoes and bring to a boil. Add Perogies and bacon to skillet and heat through,.

input_text: I have syrup, green tea, mint. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lychee Iced Tea with 3 cups brewed green tea, chilled, 1/4 cup lychee syrup, fresh mint leaves (to taste). Here's the instruction: Blend the lychee "juice" with the tea. Throw in some fresh mint leaves and lightly grind into the tea mixture. Serve over ice! If the tea isn't sweet enough for you, add more lychee syrup.

input_text: I have popcorn, white karo syrup, sugar. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Popcorn Balls with 2/3 c. white Karo syrup, 2/3 c. sugar, 2 or 3 qt. popped popcorn. Here's the instruction: Boil the Karo syrup and sugar for 3 minutes. Add to the popcorn. Butter hands to shape into balls. If desired, may be colored by adding food coloring to mixture.

input_text: I have sweet milk, sugar, vanilla, marshmallows, eggs, flour, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Boiled Custard with 3 qt. sweet milk, 8 eggs, 2 c. sugar, 2 Tbsp. flour, pinch of salt, 1 Tbsp. vanilla, 1 1/2 c. marshmallows. Here's the instruction: Beat the sugar, flour and eggs well; add to hot milk in double boiler. Mix well. When it starts to coat the spoon, remove from water and beat well. Add marshmallows and beat well. Add vanilla flavoring and chill.

input_text: I have corn, eggs, cheddar cheese, onion, corn muffin, whole kernel corn, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Two-Corn Casserole with 1 can whole kernel corn with liquid, 1 can creamed corn, 1 (8 1/2 oz.) pkg. corn muffin mix, 3 eggs, lightly beaten, 1 small onion, chopped fine, 1 stick butter, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese. Here's the instruction: Melt stick of butter. Saute onion; set aside to cool. In large bowl, combine both corns, corn muffin mix and 3 eggs. Add cooled onion mixture; mix well. Place in a casserole that has been sprayed with nonstick spray. Top with shredded Cheddar cheese. Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

input_text: I have acini de pepe, sugar, marshmallows, lemon juice, pineapple chunks, eggs, cooking oil, water, nondairy whipped topping, flour, pineapple juice, coconut, oranges, pineapple, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Frog-Eye Salad with 1 c. sugar, 2 Tbsp. flour, 2 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 3/4 c. pineapple juice, 2 eggs, beaten, 1 Tbsp. lemon juice, 3 qt. water, 1 Tbsp. cooking oil, 1 (16 oz.) pkg. acini de pepe, 3 (11 oz.) cans Mandarin oranges, 2 (20 oz.) cans pineapple chunks, 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, 1 carton nondairy whipped topping, 1 c. mini marshmallows (optional), 1 c. coconut (optional). Here's the instruction: Combine sugar, flour and 1/2 teaspoon of salt. Gradually stir in the pineapple juice and eggs. Cook over moderate heat, stirring until thickened. Add lemon juice; cool mixture to room temperature. Bring water, remaining salt and oil to a boil. Add acini de pepe; cook at a rolling boil until done. Drain and rinse with water; drain again and cool to room temperature. Combine egg mixture and acini de pepe. Mix lightly, but thoroughly. Refrigerate overnight in airtight container. Be sure to drain canned fruit. Add remaining ingredients; mix lightly, but thoroughly. Refrigerate until chilled in airtight container. Will keep for up to a week.

input_text: I have flavored yogurt, granola without raisins. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Yogurt Parfait with 3/4 cup flavored yogurt, 1/4 cup granola without raisins, 1/2 cup assorted fresh fruit. Here's the instruction: In a parfait glass or large glass mug, layer one-third of the yogurt, half of the granola and then half of the fruit. Repeat layers. Top with the remaining yogurt.

input_text: I have tomatoes, green lentils, onion, rosemary, flat leaf parsley, carrot, garlic, sausage, bay leaf, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make One Pot Spicy Sausage And Lentils with 1 tablespoon olive oil, 600 g spicy sausage, 1 onion, chopped, 1 carrot, chopped, 1 garlic clove, crushed, 1 bay leaf, 2 sprigs fresh rosemary, 250 g green lentils or 250 g brown lentils, 600 ml hot vegetable stock, 400 g canned tomatoes, chopped, 3 tablespoons flat leaf parsley, chopped, salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat and fry sausages for 8-10 minutes or until golden. Remove sausages from the pan and set aside on a paper towel. Add onion, carrot and garlic ato the pan and fry for 3-4 minutes until onions are softened and lightly browned. Return sausages to the pan, then add the bay leaf, rosemary, lentils, stock and tomatoes. Bring it all to the boil, then reduce the heat to low and leave to simmer gently, covered, for about 40 minutes or until lentils are tender. If you feel it needs more liquid, just add a little water. Remove the bay leaf and rosemary if you wish. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with a sprinkling of freshly chopped parsley.

input_text: I have sugar, bittersweet chocolate, ground cloves, beets, beet greens, powdered gelatin, ground black pepper, agar, fresh raspberries, vanilla bean, yogurt powder, flour, cocoa, beet juice, milk, cacao nibs, egg yolks, salt, heavy cream, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Beet Parfait with 1 1/2 cups plus 2 tablespoons (200g) all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup (25g) unsweetened cocoa powder (preferably Valrhona), 1 teaspoon (2g) ground cloves, 2 1/2 teaspoons (5g) freshly ground black pepper, 1/2 teaspoon (2g) coarse salt, 8 tablespoons (115g) unsalted butter, cut into pieces, 1/2 cup plus 1 tablespoon (115g) sugar, 2 large beets, 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons (150g) heavy cream, 1/2 teaspoon powdered gelatin (or 2.25g sheet gelatin; see page 276), 1/3 cup (80g) beet juice, 2 tablespoons plus 2 teaspoons (35g) sugar, 3 large egg yolks, 1/2 vanilla bean, split and scraped, 12 ounces (340g) fresh raspberries, 1/2 cup (125g) beet juice, 2/3 teaspoons (2.5g) agar, 1/4 cup (50g) sugar, 1/4 teaspoon (1g) agar, 1 cup plus 2 teaspoons (250g) whole milk, 2 ounces (57g) bittersweet chocolate (preferably Valrhona Manjari 64% cacao), chopped, Cacao nibs, Micro beet greens (optional), Yogurt powder (optional; see Note), Beet powder (optional). Here's the instruction: Heat the oven to 375F or 350F on convection. Line a baking sheet with a Silpat or parchment and set fourteen to fifteen 1 1/2-inch square molds on it. Whisk the flour, cocoa powder, cloves, pepper, and salt together in the bowl of a standing mixer fitted with the paddle. Add the butter and sugar and mix on medium speed until crumbly. Divide the streusel among the molds and press down so the streusel will hold a shape. Bake until crisp, about 6 minutes. Remove from the oven and unmold the streusel. Let cool. Trim, peel, and chop the beets. Put through a juicer. Youll need the beet juice for the parfait and the beet-raspberry fluid gel. Line a baking sheet with a Silpat or parchment and set the 1 1/2-inch square molds on it. Freeze while you make the parfait. Put the 2 tablespoons heavy cream in a small bowl. Sprinkle the gelatin over the surface. Combine the beet juice, sugar, egg yolks, and vanilla seeds and pod in a heatproof bowl set over simmering water. Cook, whisking pretty constantly, until the mixture reaches 175F. Microwave the gelatin for 30 seconds or heat gently in a saucepan until melted. Strain the beet juice mixture into the bowl of a standing mixer fitted with the whisk. Add the gelatin and beat at medium-high speed until the sides of the bowl are cool. In a separate bowl, beat the 1/2 cup heavy cream to medium peaks. Fold the cream into the beet mixture. Fill a pastry bag with the parfait and pipe into the molds. Even off the tops. Cover with plastic wrap and freeze overnight. Puree the raspberries in a food processor. Strain and measure out 1/2 cup (125 g). Put the puree, beet juice, and agar in a saucepan and mix with an immersion blender. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, then reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Pour into a baking dish and refrigerate until set. Scrape the gel into a blender and blend on high until perfectly smooth and fluid. Store in the refrigerator until youre ready to serve or for up to 3 days. Run a 9 x 12-inch rimmed baking sheet under cold water and shake off the excess. Line the damp pan neatly with plastic wrap. Whisk the sugar and agar together in a small saucepan. Whisk in the milk. Stirring constantly, bring the milk to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes, still stirring. Stir in the chocolate and emulsify with an immersion blender, keeping the blender under the surface so you avoid making bubbles. Pour into the baking sheet and refrigerate until set, about 2 hours. Use a spatula to smear some of the beet-raspberry fluid gel onto dessert plates. Set a streusel on each plate, on the gel. Unmold a parfait, pushing it out, and set it on top of the streusel. Cover the top of the parfait with cacao nibs. Cut the chocolate gel into 1/2 x 2-inch strips. Set one beside each parfait. Garnish with a few greens, the yogurt powder, and beet powder if you want. You could replace the chocolate brittle gel with chocolate ice cream. Scoop it, roll in Chocolate Crumble (page 213) or chocolate cookie crumbs, and refreeze. That way, youre bringing another layer of crunch to the plate. For larger portions, you could use a 3 1/4-inch tart ring and for tasting portions you could use 2-inch ring molds in place of the 1 1/2-inch square molds I use.

input_text: I have sweet onion, swiss cheese, white pepper, fresh mushrooms, flour, clove garlic, skinless, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Cheese Topped Chicken with 1 clove garlic, minced, 1/4 c. butter, 4 large skinless, boneless chicken breasts, 1/2 c. flour, 1/4 tsp. salt, 1/8 tsp. white pepper, 1 large sweet onion, thinly sliced, 4 slices Swiss cheese, 2 c. fresh mushrooms. Here's the instruction: Rinse and pat dry chicken. Cook garlic in butter for 30 seconds. Mix flour, salt and pepper; coat chicken in mixture. Cook chicken in butter mixture for 20 minutes, turning once. Remove chicken, cook onions and sliced mushrooms in butter. Place chicken in casserole 13 x 9 x 2-inch. Spoon onions and mushroom butter mixture over chicken. Top with cheese slice. Bake at 400° until cheese melts and dish is warmed.

input_text: I have potatoes, cream of chicken soup, salad herbs, onion, carrots, chicken, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Dinner-In-A-Bundle with 6 chicken pieces, 6 chopped carrots, 6 potatoes, peeled and quartered, 2 cans cream of chicken soup, chopped onion, if desired, 6 Tbsp. salad herbs or paprika, salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Place each piece of chicken in a large square of aluminum foil. Sprinkle generously with spices. Divide vegetables equally and place on top of chicken portions. Spoon on soup and sprinkle with spices. Twist foil on top to seal bundle. Bake at 400° for 60 minutes. Can also cook on grill.

input_text: I have oats, chocolate chips, pecans, coffee powder, boiling water, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mocha Pecan Balls with 3/4 cups Butter, 4-1/8 cups Confectioners Sugar, 1-1/2 Tablespoon Instant Coffee Powder, 3/8 cups Boiling Water, 3/8 teaspoons Salt, 3 cups Old Fashioned Or Quick Cooking Oats, 9 ounces, weight Semi-sweet Mini Chocolate Chips, 1-1/2 cup Finely Chopped Pecans. Here's the instruction: 1. Beat together butter and sugar until light and fluffy. 2. Dissolve coffee powder in water. Blend coffee and salt into butter mixture. 3. Stir in oats, chocolate pieces and 1/2 cup chopped pecans. 4. Chill about 30 minutes; shape to form 1-inch balls. Roll in remaining pecans. 5. Chill several hours or overnight. Store in refrigerator. (Makes about 6 dozen balls)

input_text: I have egg, sugar, vanilla, soda, lard, water, raisins, flour, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Boston Brown Bread with 2 c. raisins, 2 c. water, 1 Tbsp. soda, 3/4 c. sugar, 2 3/4 c. flour, 2 1/4 Tbsp. lard, 1 Tbsp. salt, 1 egg, 1 Tbsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Combine first two ingredients, cook 15 minutes and let cool. Add soda, sugar, flour, lard and salt to raisin mixture. Mix together well, then add egg and vanilla to mixture. Bake 1 hour at 350°.

input_text: I have dark rum, cinnamon, apple juice, whole cloves, whole allspice, oranges, cranberry juice cocktail. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Autumn Glow Punch with 1 teaspoon whole allspice, 1/2 teaspoon whole cloves, cinnamon stick, broken, 2 quarts apple juice or 2 quarts cider, 1 (32 ounce) bottle cranberry juice cocktail, 2 large seedless oranges, sliced into rounds, dark rum (optional). Here's the instruction: Tie allspice, cloves and cinnamon in a cheesecloth bag. . Combine spice bag, apple juice, cranberry juice and oranges in a large saucepan. . Cook over medium-low heat until simmering. . Serve warm, alongside a bottle of dark rum for those who want to spike their punch.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, lemon juice, eggs, lemon zest, cream cheese, water, flour, cornstarch, ricotta, whipping cream, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Classic Lemon Cheesecake  with 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup superfine sugar, 7 tablespoons unsalted butter, chopped, 3/4 pound cream cheese, softened, 1 pound ricotta, 4 eggs, 1 1/3 cups superfine sugar, 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice, 2 tablespoons finely grated lemon zest, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 1/2 tablespoons cornstarch, 1 1/2 tablespoons water, 1 cup whipping cream, whipped. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 300°F. Place the flour, sugar and butter in a bowl and rub with your fingertips to form a rough dough. Using the back of a spoon, press the mixture into the base of a lightly greased 8" round springform pan lined with non-stick parchment paper. Bake the crust for 30 minutes or until golden and just cooked. Set aside. To make the filling, place the cream cheese, ricotta, eggs, sugar, lemon juice and zest, and vanilla in a food processor and process until smooth. Place the cornstarch and water in bowl and mix until smooth. Add the cornstarch mixture to the cheese mixture and mix to combine. Pour over the crust and bake for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until light golden and just set. Turn the oven off and allow to cool in the oven with the door closed. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until cold. Top with the whipped cream to serve.

input_text: I have honey, sesame oil, mayonnaise. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make California Sushi Sauce with 1 c. mayonnaise, 4 tsp. toasted sesame seed, 4 tsp. honey (to taste), 1 1/2 tsp. sesame oil. Here's the instruction: Stir well. May be used as a vegetable dip also.

input_text: I have clam, mussels, tomatoes, bouillon cube, saffron, red pepper, onion, water, thyme, lemon, olive oil, rice, shrimp, garlic, bay leaf, green pepper, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Paella with 2 1/2 cups rice (Uncle Ben's works best), 5 cups water, 1 lb shrimp, peeled, deveined, 1/2 lb mussels, in their shells, 1/2 lb clam, in their shells, 1/2 lb squid, cleaned, and cut into rings, 1 medium onion, 2 -3 very ripe tomatoes, peeled and seeded, 1/2 green pepper, 1/2 red pepper, 2 -3 garlic cloves, minced, 2 -3 sprigs thyme, 1 bay leaf, saffron (I use 1 packet of ground), 1 double bouillon cube (Knorr is nice), salt, 2 tablespoons olive oil, lemon wedge (for serving). Here's the instruction: Clean all seafood under cold running water. Chop vegetables. Heat olive oil in a large soup pot. Saute vegetables. When they begin to soften, add seafood, thyme and bay leaf, and cook thoroughly. Add saffron, water, bouillon cube and salt. Stir well and add rice. Bring to a boil, and boil uncovered 5 minutes on high heat. Reduce heat to low, cover and cook 10 more minutes. Do not lift cover during this time! Remove from heat and let stand covered for 5 more minutes, still without removing cover. Now, you can finally lift the lid, and fluff the rice, remove bay leaf and thyme sprigs. Serve with crusty french bread, and lemon wedges.

input_text: I have oil, vinegar, black pepper, liquid smoke, brown sugar, chili powder, catsup, celery, mustard, worcestershire sauce, hot sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Ester'S Barbecue Sauce with 1 tsp. black pepper, 4 tsp. oil, 1 c. catsup, 4 tsp. vinegar, 4 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 1 Tbsp. chili powder, 1 tsp. celery seed, 2 Tbsp. hot sauce, 2 Tbsp. mustard, 1/3 c. liquid smoke, 1/2 c. brown sugar (and then taste). Here's the instruction: Mix all together and beat until sugar dissolves. Pour into container.

input_text: I have egg, salt, coaches, honey, ¼, molasses, all-purpose, water, milk, whole wheat flour, butter, active dry yeast. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Whole Wheat Dinner Rolls with 1 cup Water, 1/3 cups Coaches Oats Or Cracked Wheat, 2-1/4 teaspoons Active Dry Yeast, 1/3 cups Warm Water, 1/4 teaspoons Granulated Sugar, 2 Tablespoons Butter, 1 Tablespoon Salt, 2 Tablespoons Molasses, 2 Tablespoons Honey, 2 Tablespoons Wheat Germ, 1 cup Milk, Warm, 3 cups Whole Wheat Flour Plus Extra If Needed, 2 cups All-purpose Flour, 1 whole Egg White For Egg Wash. Here's the instruction: In a small saucepan, bring the 1 cup water and the coaches oats to a boil. Then turn the heat down to medium low and simmer for about 6 minutes. Remove from heat and cool to lukewarm. Dissolve the yeast in the medium sized bowl of your stand mixer. Add 1/3 cup warm water and the sugar. Stir together then let it sit for 10 minutes. Add the oats mixture into the yeast mixture along with the butter, salt, molasses, honey, wheat germ and milk. Use your electric mixer with the paddle attachment and mix everything together to combine. Add one cup of whole wheat flour and two cups of all purpose flour. Mix until well combined. Clean off the paddle attachment, scrape the sides of the bowl and add the dough attachment to the mixer. With the mixer going on low speed, add the remaining whole wheat flour a little at a time until the dough starts coming together. After the remaining two cups of whole wheat flour are added, let the mixer knead the dough for a minute or so. If it is still sticking to the sides of the bowl, add about 1/4 cup of additional flour and let it mix in. Keep adding a little flour at a time until the ball of dough no longer sticks to the sides of the bowl. Let it knead for 8-10 minutes on medium-low speed. Remove the bowl from the mixer. Take the dough out of the bowl and spray it with cooking spray. Return the ball of dough to the bowl, cover it with a towel or plastic wrap and let sit in a warm, dry place for an hour until doubled in size. Punch down the dough and make 2.50 ounce sized balls of dough--you'll get about 19 rolls. Set them on a baking sheet and cover with a tea towel. Let them rise for about 45 minutes. During the last 20 minutes of rise time, preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Fill a Dutch oven or oven safe pot with water and place it on the lowest shelf of the oven. This will add steam in the oven. Brush the top of each roll with egg wash. Bake the rolls in the preheated oven for 17-23 minutes. (You may have to do this in two batches unless you have a huge oven). When done, remove the rolls from the oven. Let the rolls sit on the baking sheet for a few minutes. Then remove rolls from pan and place on a wire rack to cool completely.

input_text: I have tomato, cheddar cheese, green onion, philadelphia cream cheese, chili. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make PHILADELPHIA Chili Cheese Dip Recipe Idea with 1 pkg. (8 oz.) PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened, 1 can (15 oz.) chili, 1 cup ( 4 oz.) KRAFT Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese, Chopped green onion (optional), Chopped tomato (optional). Here's the instruction: Spread 1 pkg. (8 oz.) PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened, on bottom of 9-inch pie plate. Top with 1 can (15 oz.) chili; sprinkle with 1 cup (4 oz.) KRAFT Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese. Bake at 350F for 20 to 25 minutes or until cheese is melted. Garnish with chopped green onion and tomato, if desired.

input_text: I have baking powder, sugar, vanilla, soda, water, chocolate buttercream, flour, cocoa, mayonnaise. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chocolate Mayonnaise Cake with 2 c. flour, 1 c. sugar, 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1 1/2 tsp. soda, 4 Tbsp. cocoa, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 c. mayonnaise, 1 c. water, 1 recipe chocolate buttercream frosting. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients in one	bowl and beat with an electric mixer until well blended.	Pour batter into a greased and floured 9	x 13-inch cake pan.	Bake at 350° until a toothpick pressed into the cake's center comes out clean. Top the cake with chocolate buttercream frosting while it is still hot.

input_text: I have sugar, heavy cream, milk, egg yolks, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Olive Oil Ice Cream  with 1 1/3 cups (330 ml) whole milk, 1/2 cup (100 g) sugar, Pinch of salt, 1 cup (250 ml) heavy cream, 6 large egg yolks, 1/2 cup (125 ml) fruity olive oil. Here's the instruction: 1. Warm the milk, sugar, and salt in a medium saucepan. Pour the cream into a large bowl and set a mesh strainer on top.  2. In a separate medium bowl, whisk together the egg yolks. Slowly pour the warm mixture into the egg yolks, whisking constantly, then scrape the warmed egg yolks back into the saucepan.  3. Stir the mixture constantly over medium heat with a heatproof spatula, scraping the bottom as you stir, until the mixture thickens and coats the spatula. Pour the custard through the strainer and stir it into the cream. Whisk the olive oil into the custard vigorously until it's well blended, then stir until cool over an ice bath. Chill the mixture thoroughly in the refrigerator, then freeze it in your ice cream maker according to the manufacturer's instructions.

input_text: I have tomato, eggs, ham, cooking spray, carrots, parsley, cucumber, rice, garlic, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Jora'S Rice Omelet with 1 tablespoon butter, divided, 1/2 cup diced cucumber, 1/2 cup diced carrots, 1 tomato, diced, 1 tablespoon chopped garlic, 1 cup cooked rice, 2 slices cooked ham, diced, 2 eggs, 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper, cooking spray, 1/2 teaspoon dried parsley (optional). Here's the instruction: Melt 1/2 the butter in a skillet over medium heat. Add cucumber, carrots, tomato, and garlic. Cook and stir until vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes. Add rice and ham; cook and stir until heated through and well combined, about 10 minutes. Transfer rice mixture to a bowl. Beat eggs, salt, and pepper together in a medium bowl. Heat remaining butter in the same skillet over medium heat. Pour in the egg mixture; swirl to coat the bottom of the skillet. Cook until edges are mostly set, about 2 minutes. Lift the omelet with a spatula as the center rises; tilt the skillet so that uncooked eggs run to the center of the pan. Cook until set, 2 to 4 minutes. Place the rice mixture on top of the omelet. Fold omelet over the rice using a spatula and wrap into a cocoon shape. Place on a plate; sprinkle parsley on top.

input_text: I have chicken breasts, nutmeg, parmesan cheese, onion, white pepper, water, flour, chicken broth, broccoli, cream, garlic, butter, pasta, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken Broccoli Alfredo Soup with 1/4 cup chopped onion, 3 large garlic cloves, minced (or 1/2 Tbsp Minced Garlic), 3/4 cup butter, 3/4 cup flour, 4 cups low sodium chicken broth, 1 quart half-and-half cream, 1 1/2 cups freshly-grated parmesan cheese, 2 cups water, 1 bunch broccoli (tops only, cut into bite-sized pieces), 3 cups boneless chicken breasts, cooked and diced, 1 1/4 teaspoons white pepper, 1 1/4 teaspoons salt, 1 dash nutmeg, 6 ounces farfelle bow tie pasta, cooked according to package directions. Here's the instruction: In a heavy stockpot over medium heat, saute onion and garlic in butter for 2-3 minutes; add flour and cook, stirring, for another 2-3 minutes until bubbly; gradually whisk in chicken broth and half & half; cook, stirring frequently, until thickened. Meanwhile, in a separate pan, add water to broccoli and bring just to boiling (the broccoli should be only partially cooked and not soft) then remove from heat; do not drain cooking water from broccoli. Add parmesan cheese to soup-base in stockpot; cook over low heat, stirring, just until cheese is melted; add cooked broccoli along with its cooking water, chicken, seasonings, and bow tie pasta to the stockpot; heat through. NOTES: 6 ounces bow tie pasta equals 2 1/4 cups before cooking and 3 cups diced chicken breast equals 1 1/2 pounds before cooking. Also, decrease the salt by half if you happen to substitute full-sodium chicken broth in this recipe.

input_text: I have baking powder, shortening, brown sugar, ground nutmeg, raisins, flour, milk, boiling water, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Half Hour Pudding with 12 cup brown sugar, 1 cup flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon shortening, 12 cup raisins, 12 cup milk, 2 cups boiling water, 1 cup brown sugar, 1 tablespoon butter, 14 teaspoon ground nutmeg. Here's the instruction: Mix dry ingredients of batter, and add shortening, raisins and milk. Put sauce in 8 inch baking dish. Drop batter onto sauce by tablespoon fulls. Bake 350F 1/2 hour.

input_text: I have powdered sugar, coconut, vanilla, cream cheese. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Snowball Cookies Recipe with 3 ounce. cream cheese, soft, 2 tbsp. vanilla, 2 c. powdered sugar, 2 1/2 c. coconut. Here's the instruction: To softened cream cheese, add in vanilla; fold in powdered sugar, stir in half the coconut. Butter hands, roll into balls. Roll balls in the other half of the coconut. Chill. Let set about 1 hour in refrigerator, till ready to eat.

input_text: I have oil, sugar, vanilla, baking powder, eggs, cinnamon, soda, raisins, pork, flour. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pork And Bean Bread with 2 c. sugar, 1 c. oil, 3 eggs, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 (16 oz.) can pork and beans, 2 c. flour, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1/2 tsp. soda, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1 c. raisins. Here's the instruction: Mix first 4 ingredients until smooth. Stir in beans. Combine dry ingredients and blend with first mixture. Fold in raisins. Pour into 2 large or 3 to 4 small greased loaf pans. Bake at 325° for 45 minutes or until done.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, shortening, brown sugar, baking soda, flour, nuts, margarine, chocolate chips, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chocolate Chip Cookies with 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. brown sugar, 1/3 c. margarine, 1/3 c. shortening, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 1/2 c. flour, 1/2 tsp. baking soda, 1/2 tsp. salt, 6 oz. chocolate chips, 1/2 c. chopped nuts (optional). Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 375°. Cream first 6 ingredients. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cook 8 to 10 minutes. Makes 3 1/2 dozen cookies.

input_text: I have sour cream, dill weed, onion, mayonnaise, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Dill Dip with 8 oz. sour cream, 3 Tbsp. mayonnaise, 2 Tbsp. chopped onion, 2 Tbsp. dill weed, dash of salt. Here's the instruction: Mix and refrigerate several hours before serving.

input_text: I have condensed milk, graham cracker crust, sugar, vanilla, eggs, lime juice. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Key Lime Pie with 1 can condensed milk, 1/2 c. lime juice, 3 eggs, separated, 1 (8 or 9-inch) graham cracker crust, 3 Tbsp. sugar, dash of vanilla. Here's the instruction: Mix milk, lime juice and egg yolks. Beat egg whites until stiff. Add 3 tablespoons sugar and dash of vanilla. Cover top of pie and bake at 350° for 20 minutes or until golden brown. May be served with whipped cream.

input_text: I have salt, water, flour, pork, thyme, basil, onions, sausage, bay leaf, tomato sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Rancher'S Bean Pot with 2 lb. link sausage, 2 to 3 onions, chopped, 3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour, 3 (16 oz.) cans pork and beans, 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce, 1 1/4 c. water, 1/2 tsp. salt, 3/4 tsp. thyme, 1 small bay leaf, crushed, 1/2 tsp. basil. Here's the instruction: Brown sausage in large skillet. Remove from pan. Pour off drippings, reserving 1/4 cup. Brown onion and flour in reserved drippings. Add sausage and remaining ingredients. Heat to boiling. Pour into a 3-quart casserole dish or bean pot. Bake uncovered at 325° for 2 hours, stirring occasionally.

input_text: I have ground pepper, tomatoes, garlic salt, light sour cream, mushrooms, wild rice, celery, yellow onion, ground turkey, butter, green pepper, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Hamburger Stroganoff with 3 tablespoons butter, 2 lbs ground turkey, 1 teaspoon Lawry's Seasoned Salt, 1 teaspoon garlic salt, 12 teaspoon salt (or to taste), 14 teaspoon ground pepper (or to taste), 1 medium yellow onion, peeled and chopped, 12 medium green pepper, cored seeded and chopped, 10 medium mushrooms, sliced, 2 celery ribs, trimmed and chopped, 1 12 cups crushed tomatoes, 1 cup light sour cream, 12 lb wild rice, cooked by package directions. Here's the instruction: 1. Melt butter in a large skillet over moderate heat. Add ground turkey and all the seasonings. Cook until browned breaking up large clumps. - about 10 minute. 2. Add all the produce until onion is limp and golden about 3-5 minute. 3. Mix in tomatoes, adjust heat so mixture bubbles gently, cover and simmer about 20 minute. 4. Smooth in sour cream and bring just to serving temperature Do not boil or cream may curdle. Taste for salt and pepper and adjust as needed. 5. Serve over rice and ENJOY!

input_text: I have tomatoes, salt, tomato paste, brown sugar, peppers, onion, peaches, garlic, fresh cilantro. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Slow-Cooked Peach Salsa with 4 pounds tomatoes (about 12 medium), chopped, 1 medium onion, chopped, 4 jalapeno peppers, seeded and finely chopped, 1/2 to 2/3 cup packed brown sugar, 1/4 cup minced fresh cilantro, 4 garlic cloves, minced, 1 teaspoon salt, 4 cups chopped peeled fresh peaches (about 4 medium), divided, 1 can (6 ounces) tomato paste. Here's the instruction: In a 5-qt. slow cooker, combine the first seven ingredients; stir in 2 cups peaches. Cook, covered, on low 3-4 hours or until onion is tender. Stir tomato paste and remaining peaches into slow cooker. Cool. Transfer to covered containers. (If freezing, use freezer-safe containers and fill to within 1/2 in. of tops.) Refrigerate up to 1 week or freeze up to 12 months. Thaw frozen salsa in refrigerator before serving.

input_text: I have light corn syrup, heavy cream, simple syrup, cake, lime juice, graham crackers. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Key Lime Martini with 11/2 ounces cake-flavored vodka, 1 ounce key lime juice, 1/2 ounce Cointreau, 1/2 ounce simple syrup, 1/2 ounce heavy cream, light corn syrup, graham crackers, to rim glass. Here's the instruction: To rim the martini glass, spread a thin layer of corn syrup around the rim and dip into graham cracker crumbs. Mix cake vodka, key lime juice, Cointreau, simple syrup and heavy cream in a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice. Shake and strain into prepared glass.

input_text: I have sugar, whipping cream, flour, orange juice, unbeaten egg, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Butter Crust Parfait Pie with 1/2 c. butter, 2 Tbsp. sugar, 1 c. flour, 1/3 c. (1/2 of 6 oz. can) frozen orange juice (orange, lemonade, etc.), 1/2 c. sugar, 1 unbeaten egg white, 1 c. whipping cream. Here's the instruction: Combine butter with 2 tablespoons sugar. Do not cream. Add flour. Mix just until a dough will form. Place 1/4 to 1/3 of this mixture in a small pan. Press remaining mixture evenly over bottom and side of a 9-inch pie pan with well floured fingers. Bake at 375° until light golden brown (crust: 12 to 15 minutes or crumbs: 10 to 12 minutes).

input_text: I have shortening, powdered sugar, butter, whipping cream, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Whipping Cream Frosting with 2 tablespoons butter or margarine, softened, 2 tablespoons shortening, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 3 cups sifted powdered sugar, 5 to 6 tablespoons whipping cream. Here's the instruction: Combine butter, shortening, and salt in a medium mixing bowl; beat well. Add sugar to creamed mixture alternately with cream, beginning and ending with sugar. Beat until smooth.

input_text: I have tomatoes, bell pepper, onion, stew meat, water, flour, thyme, margarine, frozen okra, tarragon, bay leaf, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Gumbo with 2 lb. stew meat, 1/2 c. flour, 4 tsp. margarine, 1 tsp. salt, 2 qt. water, 1 onion, chopped, 16 oz. can tomatoes, 1 bell pepper, chopped, 10 oz. pkg. frozen okra, 1 tsp. thyme, 1 tsp. tarragon, 1 bay leaf. Here's the instruction: Cut meat into	small cubes, roll in flour and brown in margarine in uncovered 14-inch Dutch oven. Add salt, water and onion. Cover and	cook for 1 hour. Add tomatoes, bell pepper, okra, thyme, tarragon and bay leaf. Cook slowly for 1 1/2 hours. Replenish coals as needed.

input_text: I have vinegar, brown sugar, onion, catsup, ground beef, mustard, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Hamburger Barbeque  with 1 1/2 lb. ground beef, Onion, diced, 1 tbsp. mustard, 1 tbsp. brown sugar, 1 tbsp. vinegar, 1 c. catsup, 1 tbsp. Worcestershire sauce. Here's the instruction: 1. Brown thoroughly the ground beef, plus onion (add raw, after browning meat). 2. Add remaining ingredients. 3. Serve on hamburger buns

input_text: I have zucchini, swiss cheese, tofu, water, rosemary, cooking spray, fresh basil leaf, red bell pepper, raspberry balsamic vinegar, crusty bread, shallot, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Grilled Rosemary, Tofu, and Veggie Panini with 3 tablespoons raspberry balsamic vinegar, 2 tablespoons water, 1 small minced shallot, 2 tablespoons minced rosemary, 1 teaspoon sea salt, 16 ounces firm tofu, 1 medium zucchini, 1 large red bell pepper, 3 slices fat-free swiss cheese, 12 cup fresh basil leaf, 6 slices crusty bread or 3 good rolls, cooking spray. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients for marinade in a large plastic ziploc bag. Press tofu and cut into six slices. Add tofu slices to marinade and refrigerate overnight. About 1 hour prior to dinner time, add sliced zucchini and sliced red pepper to marinade. Add a bit of water if necessary to coat. Preheat grill (indoor or outdoor). Grill tofu, zucchini, and bell pepper until softened and well marked on both sides- about 5 minutes per side. If using an outdoor grill- wrap a brick in aluminum foil and allow it to preheat. Spray aluminum foil with cooking spray and assemble sandwiches- dividing fillings evenly and adding cheese and basil leaves. Close foil tightly and place brick on top of sandwiches. Grill 2 minutes per side. If using indoor grill- assemble sandwiches and grill for about 2 minutes.

input_text: I have ground pork, potato, pepper, onion, thyme, ground beef, allspice, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Potato Sausage with 1/2 lb ground beef, 1/2 lb ground pork, 1/2 cup potato, shredded, 1/2 cup onion, diced, 3/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1/8 teaspoon allspice, 1/8 teaspoon dried thyme. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients together by hand. Shape into 8 patties. Fry in a lightly oiled skillet on medium-low heat until well browned. About 10 minutes per side. Cook on medium low to ensure slow and thorough cooking all the way to the inside. Check the inside of one patty to ensure they are no longer pink inside. Serve hot.

input_text: I have vinegar, sesame seeds, cabbage cabbage, cucumber, carrot. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Ultra-Simple Oil-free Cabbage-Vinegar Salad with 1/2 of a medium cabbage Cabbage, 3 cm Carrot, 1 Cucumber, 1 tbsp Sushi vinegar, 1 tbsp Toasted sesame seeds, ground sesame seeds. Here's the instruction: Shred the cabbage and put in a bowl of water, then drain. Slice the carrot then cut into fine julienne. Slice the cucumber diagonally then cut into finely julienne matchsticks. Put the cabbage, carrot and cucumber in a bowl, add the sushi vinegar and the sesame seeds and mix well Transfer to serving plates.

input_text: I have tomato juice, tomato paste, red kidney, onions, paprika, ground beef, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lyndal'S Chili with 2 lb. ground beef, 3 onions, 2 c. tomato juice, 2 small cans tomato paste, paprika, salt, pepper and chili powder, 2 cans red kidney beans. Here's the instruction: Cook ground beef, onions and drain off grease. Add tomato juice, tomato paste, kidney beans, salt, pepper, paprika and chili powder. Simmer in pot for several hours.

input_text: I have sugar, peanut butter, white karo syrup, cereal, peanuts. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make (No Name Candy) with 1 c. sugar, 1 c. white Karo syrup, 1 c. peanut butter (smooth), 1 c. roasted peanuts (husks off is better), 5 c. Product 19 cereal. Here's the instruction: Mix sugar and Karo over low heat to dissolve sugar. Do not boil. Mix in peanut butter, then peanuts and cereal. Spoon out on waxed paper to cool.

input_text: I have freshly ground black pepper, lemon rind, parsley, shrimp, garlic, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sautéed Asparagus And Shrimp With Gremolata with Gremolata:, 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, 2 teaspoons grated lemon rind, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 3 garlic cloves, minced, Shrimp:, 4 teaspoons olive oil, divided, 3 cups (1 1/2-inch) slices asparagus (about 1/2 pound), 1 1/2 pounds peeled and deveined medium shrimp, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper. Here's the instruction: To prepare gremolata, combine first 5 ingredients; set aside. To prepare shrimp, heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add 2 teaspoons oil to pan, swirling to coat; heat 20 seconds. Add asparagus to pan; saute 3 minutes, stirring frequently. Remove asparagus from pan; keep warm. Add remaining 2 teaspoons oil to pan, swirling to coat; heat 20 seconds. Add shrimp to pan; saute 3 minutes or until done, stirring occasionally. Add asparagus, 1/8 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon pepper to pan; saute 1 minute or until thoroughly heated. Sprinkle evenly with gremolata.

input_text: I have buttermilk, decorate, baking soda, flour, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Soda Bread With Spelt And Rye with 2 7/16 cups rye flour whole, 7 ounces spelt flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 11/16 cups buttermilk, seeds to decorate. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 460°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Prepare the buttermilk by adding a few drops of lemon juice to the milk and set aside for 10-15 minutes before using. (* 1 teaspoon of lemon juice for every cup of milk). Place all the dry ingredients in a bowl and add the buttermilk, stirring quickly and working the dough a bit. With floured hands, shape the dough into desired shape. Make some cuts into the loaf, brush with a little water or milk and sprinkle with a mixture of seeds (for example: sunflower, black sesame seeds and linseed). Bake for about 30 minutes until golden brown.

input_text: I have egg, sugar, warm water, baking soda, onion, flour, yeast, dill, cottage cheese, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Dilly Bread with 1 pkg. yeast, 1/4 c. warm water, 1 c. cottage cheese, 2 Tbsp. sugar, 1 Tbsp. minced onion, 2 tsp. dill seed, 1 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. baking soda, 1 egg, 2 1/4 to 2 1/2 c. flour. Here's the instruction: Dissolve yeast in warm water. Heat cottage cheese to lukewarm. Add next 6 ingredients, then add yeast mixture. Add flour to form stiff dough. Cover to rise to double. Stir down. Turn into well-greased 1 1/2-quart casserole or 8-inch round pan. Let rise 30 to 40 minutes until light. Bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes. Brush top with melted butter and sprinkle with salt.

input_text: I have potatoes, toppings, cayenne pepper, celery flakes, onion, water, head cauliflower, nonfat dry milk powder, garlic, ground mustard, bay leaf, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pressure-Cooker Creamy Cauliflower Soup with 6 cups water, 1-3/4 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes (about 4 medium), peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes, 1 medium head cauliflower (about 1-1/2 pounds), cut into 1-inch pieces, 1 small onion, chopped, 3 garlic cloves, minced, 1 large bay leaf, 3 teaspoons dried celery flakes, 1-1/2 teaspoons salt, 1-1/2 teaspoons adobo seasoning, 3/4 teaspoon ground mustard, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 3/4 cup nonfat dry milk powder, Optional toppings: Shredded cheddar cheese, sliced green onions and croutons. Here's the instruction: Place the first 11 ingredients in a 6-qt. electric pressure cooker. Lock lid; close pressure-release valve. Adjust to pressure-cook on high for 5 minutes. Let pressure release naturally for 10 minutes; quick-release any remaining pressure. Discard bay leaf. Stir in milk powder until dissolved. Puree soup using an immersion blender. Or, cool slightly and puree soup in batches in a blender; return to pressure cooker and heat through. If desired, serve with toppings.

input_text: I have cooking spray, white bread, seasoning salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Texas Toast with cooking spray, 8 slices white bread, about 1 inch thick, 1/2 teaspoon seasoning salt. Here's the instruction: Spray grill rack with cooking spray. Heat coals or gas grill. Spray both sides of bread slices with cooking spray. Sprinkle with seasoned salt. Grill bread uncovered 4 inches from medium heat 4 to 6 minutes, turning once, until golden brown.

input_text: I have pepper, parmesan cheese, cream cheese, nuts, basil, parsley, garlic, boiling water, butter, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Herbed Cream Cheese with 2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened, 1 cup chopped fresh parsley, 3/4 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup chopped pine nuts, 2 garlic cloves, crushed, 1 tablespoon dried basil, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 1/3 cup olive oil, 2 tablespoons butter, melted, 2 tablespoons boiling water. Here's the instruction: Shape cream cheese into a circle on the serving dish, make a well in the center; set aside. Mix parsley with the rest of the ingredients, mix well. Spoon mixture over the cream cheese; cover and chill at least 2 hours. Serve with crackers.

input_text: I have egg, pepper, pastry, mushrooms, water, thyme, clove garlic, shallots, beef fillet, thin, mustard, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Beef Wellington with 8 oz mushrooms, 2 shallots, peeled, 2 clove garlic, 1 sprig of thyme, leaves, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp pepper, 2 lb beef fillet, trimmed, 2 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp pepper, 2 tbsp dijon mustard, 10 slice prosciutto, thin, 1 lb puff pastry, thawed, 1 egg, beaten, 1/4 cup water. Here's the instruction: Mix mushrooms, shallots, garlic and thyme in a food processor. Next, heat oil and butter in pan then add mushroom mixture to sautee until all the liquid has evaporated.
