Then season with salt and pepper. Brush beef with oil and season then sear all sides in hot pan over high heat. Then remove from pan and coat beef with mustard on all sides. Lay ou a double layer of cling wrap larhe enough to roll beef with. Lay slices of prosciutto on cling so that it can be rolled and encompass all of the beef. Spread the duxelle mixture on top of the prosciutto. Then place beef on top of the duxelle. Next roll the beef so that the prosciutto wraps all around the beef. Roll it tight and then twist tie the ends. Chill in fridge for 30 minutes. Preheat oven to 425F. Beat egg and mix with water to make egg wash. Roll out pastry. Remove beef from fridge and cling wrap. Place beef in center of pastry. Fold over one side length wise. Brush edge with egg wash and the fold over other side length wise. Trim pastry as needed. Then brush edges on the ends with egg wash and seal the beef inside the pastry completely. Brush top of pastry with egg wash. Score the top of the pastry slightly. Sprinkle top with coarse salt if you desire. Bake for 35-40 mins then let cool for 5-10 outside of oven. Slice then serve with your favorite vegetable.

input_text: I have chicken breasts, oats, sage, mustard, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Oat-Encrusted Chicken Escalope with 12 sage leaves, chopped or 12 tablespoon dried sage, crumbled, 4 large chicken breasts (8 if small), 6 tablespoons porridge oats, 3 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard or 2 tablespoons french-style mustard, salt & freshly ground black pepper. Here's the instruction: Preheat the grill till sizzling hot. (You can also use a buttered heavy-bottomed frying pan). Combine the chopped sage leaves with oats, olive oil, mustard, salt and pepper, mix well. Flatten chicken pieces to uniform thickness with a meat mallet or the bottom of a heavy frying pan. Coat the pieces with the herbed oat mixture. Grill each escalope for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Serve with steamed green beans and mashed potatoes.

input_text: I have tomato, tomatoes, light brown sugar, chili powder, green chilies, cumin, kidney beans, onion, chicken broth, chiles, beef, green pepper, salt, oregano, pepper, parsley, garlic, vegetable oil, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fourth Of July Chili with 2 lbs venison or 2 lbs beef, ground, 2 lbs venison or 2 lbs beef, cubed, 1 hot Italian sausage link, 2 tablespoons garlic, minced, 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 4 tablespoons chili powder, 1/4 cup light brown sugar, 1 teaspoon parsley, 1 teaspoon oregano, 1 tablespoon cumin, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 large onion, diced, 1 large green pepper, diced, 1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes, 8 ounces tomato paste, 4 chipotle chiles in adobo, 1 (4 1/2 ounce) can diced green chilies, 28 ounces kidney beans, 2 cups chicken broth, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 10 ounces dark beer. Here's the instruction: Brown ground meat until done. Brown cubed meat until medium rare. Add meats, all other ingredients to pot. Bring temperature up to slow simmer ( about 160 degrees). DO NOT LET BURN AT BOTTOM. Cook for AT LEAST 2 hours to let all flavors marry.

input_text: I have tomato, egg, green onions, crackers, mayonnaise. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Georgia Cracker Salad with 1 sleeve saltine crackers, 1 large tomato, finely chopped, 3 green onions, finely chopped, 1 1/2 cups mayonnaise, 1 hard-boiled egg, finely chopped. Here's the instruction: Crush crackers. Mix all ingredients together and serve immediately.

input_text: I have buttermilk, sugar, vanilla, eggs, baking soda, powdered sugar, pecans, water, flour, margarine, milk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make White Texas Sheet Cake with 1 cup margarine (Land O'Lakes works best), 2 cups flour, 2 tablespoons flour, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 teaspoon salt, 12 cup buttermilk, 2 cups sugar, 3 eggs, 1 cup water, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 12 cup margarine, 1 lb powdered sugar, 1 cup pecans, chopped, 4 tablespoons milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla. Here's the instruction: Bring margarine and water to a boil. Remove from heat and add sugar, salt, flour, and soda. In small bowl, beat eggs, buttermilk, and vanilla. Combine both mixtures and beat well. Spread into greased and floured 11/15/1-inch pan. Bake at 350F for 20 minutes. Cool and frost. For frosting: bring margarine and milk to a boil. Add powdered sugar, vanilla and pecans. Spread on cooled cake. Yield: 3 dozen squares.

input_text: I have veggie crumbles, romano cheese, pasta sauce, white onion, cannellini beans, garlic, reserving liquid, olive oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Easy and Delicious Vegetarian Soup (Pasta E Fagioli) with 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 small white onion, chopped, 3 garlic cloves, minced, 2 (19 ounce) cans cannellini beans, undrained, 1 (26 ounce) jar cheese pasta sauce, 1 12 lbs veggie crumbles, i use boca brand (equivalent to 1-1/2 lbs ground beef), 12-34 cup grated pecorino romano cheese, 12 ounces ditalini, reserving liquid, cooked according to package directions or 12 ounces shell pasta, reserving liquid, cooked accoding to package directions. Here's the instruction: Saute onion in oil in large pot until soft. Add garlic and saute few more minutes. Add beans with their liquid. Add jarred pasta sauce and simmer while cooking pasta. When pasta is done, add Boca Crumbles to sauce & bean mixture then add drained pasta and cheese, reserving pasta cooking liquid. Let sit for a half an hour and add reserved pasta cooking liquid to thin to desired consitstency. Will get better and thicker as it sits. Serve with more cheese for garnish.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, baking powder, white karo, cream cheese, margarine, peanuts, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Joanne'S Microwave Peanut Brittle with 1 c. sugar, cream cheese, 1/2 c. white Karo, 1 c. raw peanuts, 1 tsp. margarine, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. baking powder, 1/8 tsp. salt. Here's the instruction: Mix sugar and syrup and add peanuts and salt. Microwave on High for 8 minutes, stirring at the end of 4 minutes. After cooking 8 minutes, add margarine and vanilla and microwave on High, 1 to 2 minutes. Then add soda and stir well and place on buttered cookie sheet.

input_text: I have soy sauce, chili-garlic, brown sugar, cornstarch, chicken broth, dark sesame oil, vegetables, ground ginger. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Simple Stir-Fry with 1 (14.5-oz.) can low-sodium fat-free chicken broth, 1/4 cup lite soy sauce, 1 to 2 Tbsp. chili-garlic paste, 2 tablespoons cornstarch, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, 2 tablespoons dark sesame oil, 1 (16-oz.) package frozen stir-fry vegetables. Here's the instruction: Whisk together first 6 ingredients. Heat sesame oil in a large skillet or wok at medium-high heat 2 minutes. Add vegetables, and stir-fry 5 to 7 minutes. Add broth mixture, and stir-fry 1 to 2 minutes or until sauce thickens and vegetables are tender.

input_text: I have sugar, shortening, eggs, soda, flour, cream of tartar, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Andy's Mom's Snickerdoodles Recipe with 1 c. Shortening, 1 1/2 c. Sugar, 2 x Large eggs, 2 3/4 c. Flour, 2 tsp Cream of tartar, 1 tsp Soda, 1/4 tsp Salt Cinnamon sugar. Here's the instruction: Mix shortening, sugar and Large eggs together thoroughly. Sift together flour, cream of tartar, soda and salt. Stir the two mixtures together. roll into ball the size of walnuts. dip in mix of equal parts cinnamon and sugar. place two inches apart on lightly greased baking sheet. bake till lightly browned but still soft (8 - 10 min) at 400 degrees farenheit. makes 3 dozen. /COOKIES

input_text: I have brussels, dijon mustard, in, lemons, rosemary, sweet potato, garlic, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make One-Pan Lemon Rosemary Chicken Thighs with 1/4 cups Olive Oil, 2 Lemons, Divided (one Zested And Juiced, Another Thinly Sliced), 1 Tablespoon Dijon Mustard, 2 teaspoons Minced Garlic, Salt And Pepper, to taste, 4 Bone-In, Skin-On Chicken Thighs, 1 pound Brussels Sprouts, Halved, 1 Sweet Potato, Cut Into 1-inch Cubes, 4 sprigs Fresh Rosemary. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 425 degrees F. In a small bowl, whisk olive oil, lemon zest and juice, Dijon mustard, minced garlic and salt and pepper to taste. In large bowl, pour dressing over sliced lemon, chicken thighs, Brussels sprouts, sweet potato and rosemary. Gently toss to combine. Arrange mixture in even layer on rimmed baking sheet, chicken skin-side up. Season chicken with more salt and pepper, if desired. Roast 4045 minutes until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender. If desired, heat under broiler 5 minutes until chicken skin is deep golden brown. Recipe adapted from Rachael Ray Every Day.

input_text: I have stuffing mix, nutmeg, eggs, swiss cheese, onion, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Spinach Balls with 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry, 1 c. cornbread stuffing mix, 1/2 c. finely grated Swiss cheese, 6 Tbsp. butter, 1 small onion, finely chopped, 2 eggs, 1/4 tsp. nutmeg. Here's the instruction: Saute onion in butter. Combine onion and butter mixture with remaining ingredients. Blend well. Shape into 1-inch balls. Place on cookie sheet and freeze, uncovered, for 1 to 2 hours. When frozen place in a plastic bag and seal with a twistie tie. Keep frozen until ready to thaw for baking. Bake on ungreased cookie sheet at 350° for 15 minutes. Serve with 1/2 cup mayonnaise and 1 tablespoon of horseradish.

input_text: I have cumin, egg, ground cumin, ground turmeric, lemon juice, cayenne pepper, cilantro, chickpea flour, onion, water, garam masala, green chili pepper, vegetable oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Indian Onion Fritters with 1 large egg, 4 tablespoons water, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, fresh, 1 cup chickpea flour, 34 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 12 teaspoon garam masala, 12 teaspoon cumin seed, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 14 teaspoon ground turmeric, 1 green chili pepper, finely chopped, 2 tablespoons cilantro, chopped or 2 tablespoons coriander, vegetable oil, for deep-frying, 1 large onion, peeled and diced. Here's the instruction: Break egg into bowl and beat well. Add water and lemon juice. Mix. Add all chickpea flour and mix well with whisk. Put in salt, cayenne, garam masala, cumin seeds, cumin, turmeric, green chile, and cilantro or coriander. Mix well, set aside for 10+ minutes. Mix again with whisk. The batter should be of a droppable consistency. Put oil in wok or deep fryer and set over medium-high heat. You should have 3+ inches of oil at center of wok. When oil is hot, put onion into batter and mix. (This should always be done just before frying.) Remove heaping teaspoons of batter and drop it into frying oil. Use up all the batter this way. Stir and fry the fritters for 7-8 minutes or until they are a golden red. Remove fritters with slotted spoon, drain on plate lined with paper towels. Serve hot.

input_text: I have pecans, crackers, brown sugar, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Graham Cracker Pralines with 24 graham crackers, 1 c. butter, 1 c. brown sugar, 1 c. chopped pecans. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 400°. In a saucepan, blend butter and sugar; heat to boiling point. Reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes. Add pecans. Put crackers on ungreased cookie sheet. Spread sugar mixture over crackers. Bake 5 minutes and cut in strips while warm. Store in airtight container.

input_text: I have potatoes, bacon, pepper, cheddar cheese, ranch salad dressing, fresh chives, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Picnic Potatoes with 10 potatoes mediums, 1 1/2 cups ranch salad dressing Prepared, 2 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 1/2 pound bacon Sliced, Cooked and Crumbled, Divided, chopped fresh chives. Here's the instruction: Peel and quarter potatoes; place in a large saucepan or kettle and cover with water. Bring to a boil; cook until tender. Drain and transfer to a large bowl; mash (do not add milk, butter or seasoning). Add salad dressing and mix well. Add cheese, salt, pepper and half of the bacon. Spread evenly into a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish. Sprinkle with chives and remaining bacon. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.

input_text: I have sour cream, lemon juice, brown mustard, light brown sugar, onion, sweet hungarian paprika, flour, brown lentils, bay leaves, milk, garlic, vegetable oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Hungarian Lentil Stew with 1 lb brown lentils, 1 1/2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 medium onion, finely chopped, 6 garlic cloves, minced, 2 tablespoons sweet Hungarian paprika, 3 bay leaves, 2 cups sour cream, 3 1/2 tablespoons flour, 2 tablespoons milk, 1/2 teaspoon salt (to taste), 1 tablespoon light brown sugar, 2 tablespoons brown mustard (to taste), 2 tablespoons lemon juice (to taste). Here's the instruction: If desired, soak lentils overnight. This step may be skipped but it makes the lentils more digestible. Place a large (5-6 quart) saucepan over medium-low heat, add oil and onions and saute onions until tender, about 2 minutes. Add garlic and paprika, and saute about another minute. Add lentils, 7 cups of water and bay leaves. Increase heat to a boil, then reduce heat to low. cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, until lentils are tender, about 50 minutes. Add water as needed if mixture seems too thick. In a small bowl combine sour cream (not low fat), flour and milk. When lentils are tender add this mixture to the pot. Simmer 2-3 minutes. Add salt, brown sugar, mustard and lemon juice.

input_text: I have sugar, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, red bell peppers, nuts, garlic, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Red Pepper Cream Sauce with 6 large red bell peppers, roasted and peeled, 1 cup (225 ml) pine nuts, toasted, 1 cup (225 ml) parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup (125 ml) olive oil, 2 tbsp (30 ml). chopped garlic, pinch of sugar, salt and pepper to taste, 2 cups (475 ml) heavy cream. Here's the instruction: Chop the roasted peppers and add to a processor. Add everything but the heavy cream; process or blend until smooth and pureed. Transfer to pot and gently heat on low. Stir in the heavy cream and season to taste.

input_text: I have egg, warm water, sugar, cake yeast, lard, water, flour, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Icebox Rolls with 1 cake yeast, 1/4 c. warm water, 1/3 c. sugar, 1/2 c. lard, 1 egg, 1 c. warm water, 4 c. flour, 1 tsp. salt. Here's the instruction: Dissolve yeast in warm water; add 1 teaspoon sugar. In a bowl, cream sugar, lard and egg. Add warm water; beat. Add dissolved yeast; beat in flour and salt. Let rise, then press down when doubled and roll out or put in refrigerator and make rolls as needed.

input_text: I have velveeta cheese, bread, bulk sausage, oregano, garlic salt, worcestershire, ketchup. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pizza Appetizers with 1 lb. bulk sausage, 1 lb. Velveeta cheese, cubed, 1 tsp. oregano, 1 tsp. garlic salt, 1 tsp. Worcestershire, 4 to 5 good shakes ketchup, 1 loaf sandwich bread. Here's the instruction: Lightly brown sausage and drain well. Add remaining ingredients, mixing until cheese is melted and all is blended. Trim crusts from bread and cut into 4 pieces. Put a spoonful of mixture in middle of each piece of bread. Place on cookie sheet and freeze. Then place in plastic bag and leave in freezer. Use as needed, heating in 350° oven for 8 to 10 minutes.

input_text: I have pepper, rosemary, sweet potatoes, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Homemade Sweet Potato Herb French Fries with 6 sweet potatoes, 1 tablespoon rosemary, 1/8 cup olive oil, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon salt Himalayan Crystal. Here's the instruction: Clean potatoes with a vegetable/fruit cleaner and then peal the sweet potatoes. If you have a vegetable/french fry cutter you can use it to cut the fries, if not cut the potato up into strips. In a bowl add the cut up fries and the olive oil and give a good mix with your hands. (yes your hands will get dirty but it's OK that is what soap and water are for when your done). Next add the seasonings (Rosemary, salt and pepper) and then mix thoroughly so that all the fries are nicely coated. Bake on 425 degrees for 35 minutes and then on broil for a bit of a crunch for 3 minutes.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, salad oil, eggs, cinnamon, flour, nuts, fresh apples. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fresh Apple Cake with 1 c. salad oil, 2 c. sugar, 3 eggs, 2 c. self-rising flour, 3 c. diced fresh apples (not cooked), 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1 c. nuts. Here's the instruction: Cream oil, eggs and sugar together. Add vanilla, apples and nuts. Bake in loaf pan at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes. Stays fresh for days.

input_text: I have o, buttermilk, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Buttermilk Salad with 1 (10 oz.) can crushed pineapple, 1 (6 oz.) box peach Jell-O, 2 c. buttermilk, 1 (8 oz.) bowl Cool Whip. Here's the instruction: Heat pineapple and juice in boiler. Add gelatin; stir until dissolved. Cool. Add remaining ingredients; mix and chill until firm.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, eggs, baking soda, ground cloves, applesauce, all-purpose, raisins, dates, nuts, ground cinnamon, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Applesauce Cake  with 1 cup butter, softened, 2 cups granulated sugar, 4 eggs, 2 cups applesauce, 2 tsps. baking soda, 4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tsps. ground cinnamon, 1 tsp. ground cloves, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 cup seedless dates, 1.5 cups chopped nuts, 1 cup raisins. Here's the instruction: 1. Beat butter and sugar together. Then add eggs. 2. Beat in applesauce, baking soda and then rest of ingredients. 3. Grease and flour a Bundt pan or 2 loaf pans. Pour the batter into the pan(s). 4. Bake at 350 degrees for about an hour or until cake tests done.

input_text: I have garlic, beef brisket, onion, head green cabbage. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Corned Beef And Cabbage with 5 lb. well trimmed corned beef brisket, 2 cloves garlic, crushed, 1 medium onion, quartered, 1 medium head green cabbage, cut into 8 wedges. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients in a large pan. Cover with water (enough water to cover all ingredients). Cook on stove top for approximately 2 hours. For crisp cabbage, put in cabbage about 1 1/2 hours after other ingredients have cooked. Cook on medium heat.

input_text: I have garlic salt, cream of mushroom soup, cheddar cheese, onion, italian tomatoes, mushrooms, margarine, ro-tel, hair spaghetti, hamburger. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Baked Spaghetti with 2 lb. hamburger, 1 onion, chopped, 2 cans Italian tomatoes, diced (with basil, garlic and oregano), 1 can Ro-Tel, 1 can mushrooms, drained, 16 oz. angel hair spaghetti, 1 stick margarine, garlic salt to taste, 1 pkg. mild Cheddar cheese, 2 cans cream of mushroom soup. Here's the instruction: Brown hamburger meat with chopped onion and drain grease. Add tomatoes, Ro-Tel and mushrooms. Simmer for 30 minutes on low heat. Cook and drain spaghetti noodles (do not rinse). Add margarine and garlic salt. Stir gently until margarine melts.

input_text: I have kidney beans, cumin, bacon, chop meat, oregano, tomatoes, chilis, chili powder, red pepper, green onion, onion, water, n, cayanne pepper, salt pepper, garlic, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Crockpot Chili with 4 stick bacon cooked slightly n chopped, 1 lb chop meat, 1 small onion chopped, 1 red pepper chopped, 1 green onion chopped, 4 clove garlic chopped, 2 can kidney beans ( large) drained n rinsed, 1 can pink pinto beans drained n rinsed, 1 1/2 tsp cumin, 2 tsp oregano, 1 tbsp chili powder, 1 tsp cayanne pepper, 2 tbsp worcestershire sauce, 1 can diced chilis, 1 can diced tomatoes small, 1 can crushed tomatoes large, 2 cup water, 1 few dashes hot sauce to desired heat, 1 salt pepper red pepper flakes to your taste. Here's the instruction: Cook bacon untill just cooked remove from skillet and chop roughly reserve bacon grease Sautee onions pepper and garlic in bacon grease until tender them put in crock pot Brown the ground beef in the used skillet....drain meat and add to the crock pot Add remaining ingredients except only use half the cayenne pepper, chili powder, red pepper flakes, and hot sauce Heat on low 8 hrs or high 4 hrs stirring often Taste occasionally adding the remaining spices to your taste Serve over rice if desired with toppings such as cheddar cheese, sour cream, chopped scallions Makes alot so share with family and friends or freeze in a gallon size ziplock. When ready for use remove from freezer rehat in pot on stove make up some grilled cheese sandwiches and you have a quick hassle free week night meal;)

input_text: I have cane juice, lemon juice, water, strawberries, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mixed Berry Coulis with 12 ounces frozen mixed berries (or some combination of strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, blackberries), 1/4 cup water, 4 tablespoons evaporated cane juice (sugar), 1/8 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons lemon juice. Here's the instruction: In a medium saucepan, combine all but the lemon juice. Bring just to simmer and cook until berries are warm and sugar is dissolved. Transfer to a blender and puree until smooth. Strain through a fine sieve (or line coarse sieve with an old flour sack towel). Press as much through as possible, leaving only the seeds behind. Stir in the lemon juice and adjust sweetness if desired with additional sugar. Can be refrigerated for up to 4 days in an airtight container.

input_text: I have sour cream, bacon, egg, gold potatoes, pepper, green onions, cheddar cheese, salsa, flour, garlic, vegetable oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fully Loaded Potato Skin Cakes with 12 slices bacon, 2 lbs yukon gold potatoes (peeled and cubed), 4 garlic cloves, 1 1/2 cups old cheddar cheese, shredded, 3 green onions, thinly sliced, pepper, 1 egg, slightly beaten, 1/3 cup flour, 1/3 cup vegetable oil (approximate), sour cream (optional), salsa (optional). Here's the instruction: Cook bacon until crispy, drain and set aside. place potatoes and garlic into a pot of water, bring to a boil. Boil about 20 minutes until tender. Drain, return to the pot and mash together. Let cool slightly. Add cheese to potatoes, mash more to combine. Crumble bacon and stir into potatoes. Add green onions and pepper, egg and flour. stir until smooth and thick. Dust hands lightly with flour and using 1/2 c each form into patties 1/2 inch thick and 2 inches wide. Heat some oil in a non stick pan (i use just a tad of cooking spray) and fry patties in bunches, about 3 mins per side until golden and crispy. Serve with sour cream and salsa if desired.

input_text: I have margarine, sugar. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pretzel Salad with 2 c. crushed pretzel sticks, 3 Tbsp. sugar, 3/4 c. melted margarine. Here's the instruction: Combine and put in greased 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 400° for 7 to 8 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.

input_text: I have baking soda, eggs, candied fruit, flour, nuts, milk, mincemeat. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Easy Fruit Cake with 2 1/2 c. flour, 1 tsp. baking soda, 2 eggs, slightly beaten, 1 (28 oz.) jar None Such mincemeat, 1 (14 oz.) Eagle Brand sweetened milk, 2 c. candied fruit, 1 c. chopped nuts. Here's the instruction: Mix flour and baking soda; set aside. In a large bowl add all other ingredients and flour mixture. Pour in well-greased and floured pan. Bake at 350° until done.

input_text: I have italian seasoning, mozzarella cheese, flour, ground white pepper, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Italian Cheese Straws with 2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Mozzarella cheese, softened, 1/2 c. butter, softened, 1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour, 2 tsp. dried Italian seasoning, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. ground white pepper. Here's the instruction: Combine cheese and butter, stirring until blended. Gradually add remaining ingredients, stirring until mixture is no longer crumbly and will shape into a ball.

input_text: I have beef marrow, black peppercorns, tomato paste, onion, cooking spray, cold water, beef shanks, bay leaves, parsley, carrot, celery stalks. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fast, Rich Pressure-Cooker Beef Stock with 2 tablespoons tomato paste, 3 pounds meaty beef marrow bones, 2 1/2 pounds (1-inch-thick) beef shanks, 2 celery stalks, diagonally cut into 2-inch pieces, 1 large carrot, peeled and diagonally cut into 2-inch pieces, 1 large onion, peeled and cut into 8 wedges, Cooking spray, 1 tablespoon black peppercorns, 2 bay leaves, 1/2 bunch fresh flat-leaf parsley, 8 cups cold water. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 500°. Brush tomato paste evenly over bones and shanks; place in a large roasting pan. Add celery, carrot, and onion to pan; lightly coat with cooking spray. Bake at 500° for 30 minutes. Transfer bone mixture to a 6- or 8-quart pressure cooker; add peppercorns, bay leaves, and parsley. Pour 8 cups water over mixture. Close lid securely, and bring to high pressure over high heat. Reduce heat to medium or level needed to maintain high pressure; cook for 35 minutes. Remove from heat; release pressure through steam vent, or place cooker under cold running water to release pressure. Remove lid, and let stand for 20 minutes. Strain stock through a cheesecloth-lined sieve into a large bowl, pressing solids to release excess moisture. Discard solids. Cover and chill overnight. Skim solidified fat from surface; discard. Note: Refrigerate stock for up to 1 week or freeze for up to 3 months.

input_text: I have green chiles, red wine vinegar, tomatoes, white onion, green pepper, celery, coriander, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Marci'S Fresh Salsa with 4 tomatoes, 1 small white onion, 1 stalk celery, 1 small green pepper, 1/4 c. olive oil, 2 to 3 Tbsp. chopped green chiles, 2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar, 1 tsp. mustard seed, 1/2 to 1 tsp. coriander, 1 tsp. salt, pinch of salt. Here's the instruction: Peel tomatoes and finely chop. Finely dice onion, celery and green pepper. Stir all ingredients together. Cover and chill several hours or overnight, stirring occasionally.

input_text: I have sugar, crackers, cheddar cheese, flour, butter, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pineapple Casserole with 1 (20 oz.) pineapple tidbits, 1 c. shredded cheddar cheese, 1/2 c. sugar (Splenda or Sweet and Low can be used, verify package for substitution amounts), 5 Tbsp. flour, 1/2 stick butter, melted, Ritz Crackers, crumbled (enough to cover casserole). Here's the instruction: Drain pineapple and put in bottom of a 10 inch pie plate or 8 x 10 inch baking dish. Mix cheese, sugar and flour. Sprinkle over pineapple. Crumble crackers over cheese topping and drizzle melted butter over crackers. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes. Recipe can be doubled to use a 9 x 13 inch baking dish.

input_text: I have bread, bacon, bell pepper, pork, cheese. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pork 'N' Beans Casserole with 2 cans pork and beans, 6 to 7 slices fried bacon, 3 to 4 slices bread, crumbled, 1 bell pepper, chopped, slices of cheese. Here's the instruction: Fry bacon leaving grease in skillet. Add chopped bell pepper and saute until wilted look. Add bread and let soak up grease. Add crumbled up bacon. Add pork and beans. Top with cheese slices. When cheese is melted, serve. (Good with French fries or just by itself.)

input_text: I have peach slices, cinnamon, maraschino cherries, vanilla ice cream, brandy. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Brandied Peach Dessert with 1 (28 ounce) can peach slices, in juice (undrained), 2 tablespoons coarsely chopped maraschino cherries, 1 small cinnamon stick, 3 tablespoons brandy, divided, 1 pint vanilla ice cream (preferably a premium brand like Haagen-Daaz). Here's the instruction: In a saucepan, combine peaches and their juice, cherries, the cinnamon stick and 2 tbsp of brandy. Turn heat to high; when mixture starts to bubble, turn heat down and simmer for 5 minutes. Meanwhile, divide ice cream among 4 shallow dessert serving dishes. Remove peaches from heat, discard cinnamon, stir in remaining tbsp of brandy, and serve immediately over the ice cream.

input_text: I have low-salt chicken broth, extra-lean ham, milk, pepper, ground nutmeg, onion, all-purpose, celery, red potato, margarine, white wine, carrot, fresh sage, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Spring Chowder with 1 tablespoon margarine, 4 cups thinly sliced Vidalia or other sweet onion, 1 cup chopped carrot, 1 cup sliced celery, 1 cup chopped extra-lean ham, 3 cups chopped red potato (about 1 1/4 pounds), 1 (10 1/2-ounce) can low-salt chicken broth, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 2 cups 2% low-fat milk, 1/4 cup chopped fresh sage, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1/2 cup dry white wine, Sage sprigs (optional). Here's the instruction: Melt margarine in a large Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add onion, carrot, celery, and ham; saute 10 minutes. Add potato and broth; bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 45 minutes or until potato is tender. Place flour in a bowl. Gradually add milk, stirring with a whisk until blended. Add milk mixture, sage, salt, pepper, and nutmeg to soup; cook over medium-low heat 2 minutes. Add wine; cook 10 minutes or until thick. Garnish with sage, if desired.

input_text: I have several drops, sugar, unflavored gelatin, pie shell, eggs, water, green decorating sugar, lime juice, cream of tartar. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Shamrock Pie with 1/2 c. water, 1 c. sugar, 1/4 c. lime juice, several drops green food coloring, 1 pkg. unflavored gelatin, 4 eggs, separated, 1/4 tsp. cream of tartar, 1 (9-inch) pie shell, baked, 2 Tbsp. green decorating sugar. Here's the instruction: Combine water, gelatin, 1/2 cup sugar, egg yolks, lime juice and food coloring in saucepan; bring to a rolling boil, stirring constantly. Remove from heat; place saucepan in pan of ice water. Cool until thickened.

input_text: I have serrano chiles, white onion, green bell peppers, kosher salt, cider vinegar. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Crock Pot Easy Spicy Relish Recipe with 1 large white onion, 20 to 30 serrano chiles, 2 green bell peppers, 1 cup cider vinegar, 1 teaspoon kosher salt. Here's the instruction: Peel the onion, removing the stem end. Cut it in half and drop it in the slow cooker. Stem the serranos but leave them whole; remove the stems from the bell peppers and cut them into hunks. Place in the slow cooker. Add the vinegar and salt, cover, and cook on high for 3 to 4 hours. Transfer everything, including the cooking liquid, to the bowl of a food processor. Pulse several times, until the relish is the consistency you likeit should end up a textured puree, like sweet pickle relish. Store in the fridge for up to 2 weeks, or freeze and keep up to 6 months.

input_text: I have cold water, nuts, cherry gelatin, blueberry pie filling, boiling water, pineapple. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Blueberry Salad with 6 oz. cherry gelatin, 2 c. boiling water, 1 c. cold water, 1 small can crushed pineapple, 1 c. blueberry pie filling, 1 c. finely chopped nuts. Here's the instruction: Combine all salad ingredients.

input_text: I have flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, water, salsa, grnd beef, campbell's tomato soup. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Beef Taco Bake Recipe with 1 lb grnd beef, 1 can Campbell's Tomato Soup - (10 3/4 ounce), 1 c. Pace Chunky Salsa or possibly Picante Sauce, 1/2 c. water, 6 x Mission Flour Tortillas, 8" dia or possibly 8 corn tortillas, 6" dia cut into 1" pcs, 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese. Here's the instruction: Cook beef in skillet till browned. Pour off fat. Add in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and half the cheese. Spoon into 2-qt shallow baking dish. Cover. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 min or possibly till warm. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. This recipe yields 4 servings.

input_text: I have tomatoes, fresh chile, barley, freshly ground black pepper, handful of fresh cilantro, lime, beef stock, celery, kosher salt, bell pepper, salt, chile peppers, fresh cilantro, lime wedges, oregano, skirt, evoo, garlic, red onion, worcestershire sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mexican Sliced Steak and Barley Soup with 1/4 cup fresh cilantro or parsley leaves, finely chopped, 1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce, 2 large cloves garlic, finely chopped, 1 fresh chile, such as Fresno or jalapeno, seeded and finely chopped, 1 lime, juiced, 1 teaspoon dried marjoram or oregano, 1/4 red onion, minced or grated, 1 pound skirt steak, Kosher salt and coarse black pepper, Salt, 1 cup pearled barley, 2 tablespoons EVOO, plus extra for drizzling, 4 cloves garlic, chopped, 2 ribs celery, finely chopped, 2 chile peppers, such as Fresno or jalepeno, seeded and chopped, 1 red onion, chopped, 1 small bell pepper, finely chopped, Freshly ground black pepper, 4 cups beef stock, One 32-ounce can stewed tomatoes, A handful of fresh cilantro or parsley leaves, chopped, Lime wedges, Worcestershire and hot sauce, to pass at table. Here's the instruction: For the marinade and steak: Combine the cilantro, Worcestershire, garlic, chiles, lime juice, marjoram and onions in a bag. Sprinkle the steak with salt and pepper and add to the bag. Release air and seal the bag, then refrigerate. Marinate up to 2 hours. To prepare, bring the steak to room temp, heat a grill pan to medium-high, shake off excess marinade and cook the steak for a few minutes on each side. Thinly slice and set aside. For the soup: Bring a pot of water to a boil, salt the water and cook the barley to tender, but al dente, about 20 minutes. Drain and drizzle with a touch of oil. Store in a plastic container until the night you serve the soup. In a soup pot, heat the 2 tablespoons EVOO, 2 turns of the pan, over medium-high heat. Add the garlic, celery, chile peppers, onions and bell peppers, and season with salt and pepper. Cook to soften the veggies, 8 to 10 minutes. Add the stock, tomatoes and cilantro, and simmer to combine the flavors, about 20 minutes. Cool, cover and store for a make-ahead meal. To serve, heat the soup to a low boil. Add the barley and heat through. Serve the soup in shallow bowls and add the sliced skirt steak. Pass the lime wedges, Worcestershire and hot sauce for topping.

input_text: I have cooking spray, vegetable oil, baking potatoes, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Oven Fried Potatoes with 6 to 8 medium baking potatoes, washed, peeled and sliced into fries, 1/3 c. (no more) vegetable oil, salt, cooking spray. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 425°. Spray cookie sheet or large jelly roll pan with cooking spray. In a large bowl, mix potatoes with oil. Pour out potatoes into single layer on prepared pan. Salt. Bake 20 to 25 minutes, turning 2 to 3 times, until light brown. Resalt, if desired. Delicious!

input_text: I have ground lamb, tomato, extra-virgin olive oil, sausage, hearts, feta cheese, orzo, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Minty Lamb and Sausage Orzo with Grilled Artichokes with 1/2 pound ground lamb, 1/2 pound sweet Italian sausage, casings removed, 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons Mint Pesto, 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for brushing, 1 cup marinated artichoke hearts, drained (6 ounces), 1 cup orzo, 1 large ripe tomato, diced, 1/4 pound feta cheese, crumbled, Salt and freshly ground pepper. Here's the instruction: Light a grill. Bring a medium saucepan of water to a boil. In a medium bowl, mix the lamb and sausage with 3 tablespoons of the pesto. Form the mixture into eight 3-inch patties and brush with oil. Thread the artichoke hearts onto skewers. Grill the patties and artichokes over high heat until the meat is cooked through and the artichokes are lightly charred, about 8 minutes. Meanwhile, salt the boiling water. Add the orzo and cook until al dente. Drain the orzo and transfer it to a bowl. Add the tomato, feta and the remaining 3 tablespoons of pesto. Remove the artichokes from the skewers and add them to the orzo. Crumble the patties into the orzo and add the 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Season with salt and pepper, toss well and serve.

input_text: I have sugar, baking powder, vanilla, eggs, powdered sugar, cold water, flour, boiling water, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make All The Year Round Cake with 1/2 c. butter, 1/4 c. sugar, 1/4 c. powdered sugar, 2 Tbsp. boiling water, 2 eggs, 1 3/4 c. flour, 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder, pinch of salt, 1/2 c. cold water, vanilla. Here's the instruction: Cream the butter, sugar and the powdered sugar. Beat in the boiling water. Add the eggs. Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt. Add to mixture alternately with the cold water; beat well. Add vanilla. May be baked as a layer or loaf cake.

input_text: I have flour, butter, milk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Mum'S Simple Economy Scones with 2 cups self rising flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 30 g butter, 250 ml milk. Here's the instruction: Preheat your oven to 250C Sift flour and salt in a bowl. Rub in the butter with your fingertips, until it resembles breadcrumbs. Make a well, and add almost all of the milk. (Reserve about a tbs) With a butter knife, quickly work in the milk to the flour, making a dough. On a lightly floured surface, knead the dough very lightly. Flatten gently with your hands to 1.5cm thick Use a round cutter to cut out discs. On a buttered tray place scones next to each other. Brush with reserved milk. Bake for 10 minutes, or until scones sound hollow when tapped. Serve with tea, whipped cream and strawberry jam and you have Devonshire tea. Or add herbs/grated cheese for savoury scones to serve with soups and casseroles.

input_text: I have sugar, honey, nutmeg, butter, cooking apples. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Honey and Spice Apples with 12 cup sugar, 12 cup honey, 1 teaspoon nutmeg, 1 teaspoon butter, 3 medium cooking apples, cored and sliced (Use Rome, Jonathan or Braeburn). Here's the instruction: In a skillet combine 1/2 cup water, sugar, honey,nutmeg and butter. Bring to a boil. Add apples and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes. Carefully turn slices and cook just until apples are tender, about 5 to 7 minutes. Drain. Serve apples warm or at room temperature as a side dish.

input_text: I have graham cracker crumb pie crust, peanut butter, cream cheese, confectioners sugar, milk. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Peanut Butter Pie with 4 oz. cream cheese, 1 c. confectioners sugar, 1/2 c. peanut butter, 1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip, 2 Tbsp. milk, 1 graham cracker crumb pie crust. Here's the instruction: Cream together cream cheese, sugar and peanut butter. Add milk, then blend in Cool Whip. Pour mixture into pie crust and refrigerate 4 hours before serving.

input_text: I have freshly grated orange rind, baking powder, sugar, colored sprinkles, eggs, canola oil, flour, honey. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Struffoli/Pignolata (aka Honey Balls) with 6 eggs (regular size), 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 12 teaspoons canola oil, 2 12-3 cups all-purpose flour, 12 teaspoon baking powder, 12 teaspoon freshly grated lemon, rind of (optional), 1 quart canola oil (for fryng), 1 (1 lb) jar honey (clover or orange blossom), 1 teaspoon freshly grated orange rind (optional), flour, for dusting, tiny round colored sprinkles (for decorating). Here's the instruction: In a large bowl beat eggs, sugar, grated lemon peel (if desired), and 1 1/2 teaspoons oil until foamy. Gradually add flour and baking powder. *Using your hands, mix and knead the mixture well, forming a dough. Knead the dough until smooth. (*A Kitchen Aid mixer with a dough hook may be used for mixing/kneading the dough). Form dough into a ball. Place dough on a lightly floured surface, and divide dough into 8 to 10 smaller balls. On a lightly floured surface, roll each ball into a"rope" about a 1/2 inch wide, and 10 inches long. Using a sharp knife, cut each rope into 1/3 inch pieces. (Optional, pieces may be rolled into balls about the size of marbles). Dust cut pieces with a bit of flour. Heat oil in a frying pan or deep fat fryer to a temperature of 375F. Shake off excess flour, and fry the bits of dough (in small batches) until puffy and golden brown. DO NOT crowd the frying pan or fryer. Remove each batch of balls with a slotted spoon and place on heavy brown paper (or paper towels) to drain. Continue frying until all the balls have been fried. Place drained, fried balls into a large mixing bowl (or disposable roasting pan). Pour the honey into a large frying pan, and heat until bubbly, remove from heat. (Honey may be thinned with 2 to 3 Tablespoons of water to make a less sticky/sweet coating). Stir in grated orange peel (if desired) and pour honey mixture over the fried dough balls. With a wooden spoon, gently stir and toss the balls until all are evenly coated with honey. Using hands (or a spoon), place honey coated balls on to a large plate (or pie tin), mounding them into a cone/pyramid shape. Sprinkle with colored sprinkles. NOTE: If struffoli are too sticky to handle while shaping, slightly wet hands with cold water to help keep them from sticking to your hands while shaping.

input_text: I have vegetable of your choice, white onion, grits, chicken broth, shrimp, olive oil. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Shrimp and Grits with 1 medium white onion, 1 lb large shrimp, 1/3 cup olive oil, 8 oz grits, 1 can vegetable of your choice, 1 chicken broth (optional). Here's the instruction: Cook Grits according to package. (You can use chicken stock to give it more flavor.) Once finish cooking add salt and pepper to taste. Cover pot and set aside. While grits are cooking, chop white onion into slivers and set aside. Add olive oil to a saute pan. Once it's hot, add onion and stir. Once onion begins to get tender, add shrimp. Add salt and pepper. Continue to stir shrimp and onion until shrimp are done. Cut heat off. Spoon grits unto plate. From the pan, pour shrimp and onion mixture over the top. Juices from the pan give the grits extra flavor. Serve with a side vegetable and Enjoy!

input_text: I have tortilla shells, sour cream, pack taco, pepper, cheddar cheese, onion, cream cheese, salsa, beans, hamburger. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Taco Lasagne with 1 lb. hamburger, 1/2 c. chopped onion, 1 pack taco seasoning, 1 can refried beans, 1 pkg. cream cheese, 1 pkg. soft tortilla shells, 1 c. sour cream, 1 c. salsa, 2 c. Pepper Jack cheese, 2 c. Cheddar cheese. Here's the instruction: Brown hamburger. Add chopped onion and taco seasoning. Combine refried beans and cream cheese. Cut tortillas into strips. In a 13 x 9-inch pan layer 1/2 hamburger mixture, then tortilla strips, then 1/2 refried bean mixture, then top with 1 cup each of Pepper Jack and Cheddar cheese. Repeat layers then top with remaining cheese. Bake at 350° for 35 minutes. Serve with sour cream, salsa, shredded lettuce and diced tomatoes.

input_text: I have vanilla, containers, apple pie filling, cake, topping sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Apple caramel trifle with 1 box of Cake Mix (spice, yellow, pound cake,), 1 Container of Cool Whip or 2 Small Containers, 1 large box of Vanilla Instant Pudding, 1 jar Caramel Topping Sauce, 2 can of Apple Pie Filling. Here's the instruction: You want to start by preparing the cake. If you choose to use store bought then you can get started right away, otherwise wait until your cake has cooled before starting to layer the trifle. Next, prepare your pudding and chill. I recommend using the instant pudding because it is easier and faster.Now begin your layers. I like to start with the cake at the bottom so that it provides a base. It makes it easier to serve. Here are the layers I did: 1 - Layer of Cake 2 - Drizzled Caramel Sauce on top of the cake 3 - Layer Vanilla Pudding 4 - Layer 1 Can of Apple Pie Filling 5 - Layer of Cool WhipRepeatTop it off with Cool Whip and Caramel and enjoy!

input_text: I have oleo, eggs, cheddar cheese, onion, corn muffin, broccoli, cottage cheese. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Broccoli Cornbread with 2 boxes Jiffy corn muffin mix, 1 1/2 sticks oleo, melted, 5 eggs, beaten, 1 (10 oz.) box chopped broccoli, drained, 2 c. cottage cheese, 1 small onion, chopped, 1 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded. Here's the instruction: Mix altogether in bowl, batter will be kind of lumpy. Bake in a greased and floured pan at 375° for 40 minutes or until brown. A 9 x 13-inch pan makes it thick and a sheet cake pan is thinner.

input_text: I have philadelphia cream cheese, sweet chili sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Sweet Chili-Cream Cheese Dip with 1 pkg. (8 oz.) PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, 1 cup sweet chili sauce. Here's the instruction: Place cream cheese in serving dish. Top with chili sauce.

input_text: I have milk, lasagna noodles, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, onion, shiitake mushrooms, flour, baby spinach leaves, cremini mushroom, garlic, butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Lasagna with Mushrooms and Spinach with 9 lasagna noodles, uncooked, 1/3 cup butter, divided, 1 onion, chopped King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09, 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped, 3 cups sliced fresh cremini mushroom, 1 cup shiitake mushrooms, sliced, 8 cups loosely packed baby spinach leaves, 1/4 cup flour, 3 cups milk, 1/4 cup KRAFT Shredded Parmesan Cheese, 1-3/4 cups KRAFT Shredded Mozzarella Cheese. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 375 degrees F. Cook noodles as directed on package, omitting salt. Meanwhile, melt 2 Tbsp. butter in large skillet on medium-high heat. Add onions and garlic; cook and stir 1 min. Add mushrooms; cook 5 min., stirring frequently. Add spinach; cook and stir 2 to 3 min. or just until wilted. Remove from heat. Melt remaining butter in medium saucepan on medium heat. Stir in flour. Gradually add milk, stirring constantly; cook and stir 3 to 5 min. or until thickened. Remove from heat. Stir in Parmesan. Spread 1/2 cup sauce onto bottom of 13x9-inch baking dish sprayed with cooking spray. Top with 3 noodles, half the spinach mixture and 1 cup sauce; repeat layers. Top with mozzarella; cover. Bake 40 min. or until hot and bubbly, uncovering for the last 10 min. Let stand about 10 min. before cutting to serve.

input_text: I have ovaltine, water, milk, cubes, instant coffee, sugar substitute. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Easy Iced Mocha  (1.5 Ww Points) with 2 teaspoons instant coffee, 1 tablespoon ovaltine, 2 (1 g) packets Splenda sugar substitute, 1/2 cup 1% low-fat milk, 16 -20 ounces water, 6 ice cubes. Here's the instruction: Mix first 3 ingredients in water til dissolved, add milk and serve over ice. Notes: I make a point to buy the instant coffee that dissolves in cold water. If you have regular instant coffee, just dissolve it in a small amount of hot water first then add cool water.

input_text: I have plain yogurt, honey, lemon juice, avocado. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Avocado Mask with 1 avocado, ripe, 2 tablespoons honey, 1 tablespoon plain yogurt, 1 tablespoon lemon juice. Here's the instruction: Mix the above ingredients into a fine paste and apply it to face and dont forget you should apply the mask on your neck too. You can apply it for 25-30 minutes.

input_text: I have pepper, lemon juice, chicken broth, chicken, garlic, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Texas-Style Fryer with 1 tablespoon seasoned salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 1 broiler/fryer chicken (3 to 3-1/2 pounds), 2 garlic cloves, minced, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup chicken broth, 1/4 cup lemon juice. Here's the instruction: Combine seasoned salt and pepper; rub inside and outside of chicken. Place chicken on rotisserie rod on grill with a drip pan according to manufacturer's directions. In a small saucepan, saute garlic in butter for 1 minute. Stir in broth and lemon juice. Pour into drip pan and place under chicken. Baste with sauce every 15 minutes for 1 to 1-1/2 hours or until until a thermometer inserted in thickest part of thigh reads 170°-175°. Additional broth may be added to basting sauce if necessary.

input_text: I have egg, vanilla, flour, cocoa, walnuts, white sugar, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Super Rich Brownies with 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 cups white sugar, 1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 egg, 3/4 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup butter, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts (optional). Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease one 8 inch square baking pan. Melt butter over low heat. In a mixing bowl stir the cocoa and sugar together. Stir in the melted butter. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Stir in the flour and salt and mix until smooth. Stir in the walnuts. Pour mixture into the prepared pan and spread into an even layer. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 40 to 50 minutes or until brownies begin to pull away from the sides of the pan. Let cool before cutting.

input_text: I have frozen lemonade concentrate, salt, tequila, lemon slices, apricot nectar, crushed ice, apricot brandy. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Apricot Margaritas with 1 (46 oz.) can apricot nectar, 1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed, 3/4 to 1 c. tequila, 1/4 to 1/2 c. apricot brandy, 4 c. crushed ice, lemon slices (if desired), coarse salt (if desired). Here's the instruction: In 4-quart, nonmetal container, combine apricot nectar, lemonade concentrate, tequila, brandy and ice. Cover. Freeze until of slush consistency, about 4 hours, stirring occasionally.

input_text: I have extra-virgin olive oil, tomatoes, cilantro, mustard, lemon juiced, capers, dill, cornichons, orzo pasta, puy lentils, flat leaf parsley, anchovy. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Orzo And Lentil Salad With Salsa Verde with 7 ounces orzo pasta, 3 ounces puy lentils, 2 tablespoons flat leaf parsley leaves fresh, 2 tablespoons cilantro leaves fresh, 2 tablespoons fresh dill chopped, 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 1 tablespoon cornichons, 1 tablespoon capers rinsed, 1/2 lemon juiced, 2 anchovy fillets, 2 teaspoons dijon mustard, 2 cups plum tomatoes baby, quartered. Here's the instruction: Cook orzo in a pot of boiling salted water according to pack instructions. Drain well. Place lentils in a medium saucepan. Cover with water and bring to a boil on high. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15-20 mins, until just tender. Drain well. Place herbs, oil, cornichons, capers, lemon juice, anchovies and mustard in a food processor. Process until smooth. Season to taste. In a large serving bowl, combine orzo, lentils and tomatoes. Add dressing, tossing to coat.

input_text: I have tomato, cotija cheese, extra-virgin olive oil, scallions, onion, chicken broth, corn tortillas, chiles, garlic, chicken, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken Tinga Tacos with 14 cup plus 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 2 12 lbs trimmed skinless, bone-in chicken thighs, salt & freshly ground black pepper, 1 large onion, thinly sliced, 3 large garlic cloves, minced, one 28-ounce can diced tomato, 2 canned chipotle chiles in adobo, coarsely chopped, 1 cup chicken broth, 24 corn tortillas, 2 ounces Cotija cheese, crumbled, sliced scallions and chopped cilantro, for garnish. Here's the instruction: Heat 3 tablespoons of the olive oil in a large nonstick skillet. Season the chicken all over with salt and pepper, add it to the skillet and cook over moderately high heat, turning once, until browned, about 12 minutes. Transfer the chicken to a 9-by-13-inch baking dish and pour off the fat in the skillet. Add the remaining 3 tablespoons of olive oil to the skillet along with the onion. Cook over moderately high heat, stirring occasionally, until the onion is lightly browned and softened, 5 minutes. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes. Add the tomatoes and their juices, the chipotles and the broth and bring to a boil. Simmer over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until thickened and slightly reduced, 20 minutes. Preheat the oven to 350. Transfer the sauce to a food processor and let cool for 15 minutes. Puree until smooth and season with salt and pepper. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake the chicken uncovered in the center of the oven for about 45 minutes, until the meat is tender and the sauce is very thick and darkened around the edges. Wrap the tortillas in foil and warm them in the oven for about 10 minutes. Remove the chicken from the sauce and shred the meat; discard the bones. Return the chicken meat to the sauce. Spoon about 3 tablespoons of chicken onto each tortilla and sprinkle with the crumbled cheese. Garnish the chicken tacos with the scallions and chopped cilantro and serve hot.

input_text: I have granulated sugar, baking soda, eggs, milk chocolate, powdered sugar, cream cheese, flour, cocoa, walnuts, carrot, pineapple, ground cinnamon, vegetable oil, flaked coconut. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chocolate Hummingbird Loaf Cake with 1 cup self-rising flour, 2 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 cup flaked coconut, 1/4 cup chopped walnuts, 1/2 cup granulated sugar, 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 2 eggs beaten, 4 ounces milk chocolate melted, 1 cup grated carrot, 1 cup crushed pineapple drained, 8 ounces cream cheese at room temperature, 4 ounces milk chocolate melted and cooled, 1 cup powdered sugar sifted. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Lightly grease and line an 8 x 4-inch loaf pan with parchment paper. Sift flour, cocoa powder, cinnamon and baking soda into a large bowl. Stir in coconut and walnuts. Whisk sugar, oil and eggs in a large bowl. Whisk in chocolate. Stir in carrot and pineapple. Add to dry ingredients and stir gently until combined. Pour into prepared pan, smoothing the top. Bake 40-45 mins, until toothpick inserted into center comes out clean. Cool in pan 15 mins. Remove from pan; cool completely on wire rack. For the icing, beat cream cheese in a medium bowl with an electric mixer until smooth. Beat in chocolate with powdered sugar until well combined. Spread on top and sides of cooled cake.

input_text: I have vanilla, coconut flour, granulated sugar, heavy cream, full-fat, powdered sugar, coconut cream, flour, kosher salt, coconut oil, cardamom powder, lime, egg yolks. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Bebinca: Goan Layered Coconut Cake with 2 13.5-ounce cans of full-fat coconut milk (I like Chaokoh brand), 3 cups granulated sugar, 12 extra-large egg yolks, 1 cup coconut flour, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon cardamom powder, preferably freshly ground, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, 1 lime, finely zested and juiced, 1 cup melted coconut oil, 1 cup coconut cream, chilled in the fridge overnight, 1 cup heavy cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1/4 cup powdered sugar. Here's the instruction: In a large, heatproof bowl, mix the coconut milk and sugar. Microwave for about 3 minutes, until the sugar is completely dissolved. In the bowl of a stand mixer, using the paddle attachment, mix the egg yolks on medium speed for 2 minutes. With the motor running on low speed, slowly add the warm coconut milk and sugar mixture. Add the coconut flour, all-purpose flour, cardamom powder, salt, and lime zest and mix on low speed for a further couple of minutes, until no lumps remain. Check to make sure that the mixture has cooled enough and then add the lime juice and give it a good mix one last time. Pour it into a large bowl and chill in the fridge for 15 to 20 minutes. While the batter is chilling, prep your 9" springform pan. Thoroughly grease the pan with coconut oil, put a circular piece of parchment paper in the bottom, and grease that too. Tear off a long piece of aluminum foil, fold it over so that it is about 4" wide and wrap it around the base of the springform fan to prevent any leakage (just like you would when baking a cheesecake in a water bath). Place the prepared pan on a baking sheet. Place a rack in the middle of the oven. Turn the oven on to broil. Let it get good and hot for a couple of minutes. Take the batter out of the fridge. Put the baking sheet with the empty prepared springform pan in the oven for 30 seconds, to get it pretty hot. We want the bottom layer to start cooking right away; otherwise, it has a tendency to stick and fall apart. Take the baking sheet out of the oven, drizzle a bit of coconut oil on the parchment paper, and add one cup of the batter. Put it back in the middle of the oven and broil for 5 to 8 minutes. We want the top of the layer to get evenly browned, not just a freckle here and there! (see picture) If the top doesn't get evenly browned, you will not get the brown striations when you slice the cake (see picture). Once the top looks evenly browned, take it out of the oven, drizzle another 2 tablespoon of coconut oil evenly over the surface, stir the batter to get rid of any settling at the bottom, and add another cup of it. Then it goes back into the oven until it is browned all over. Repeat with the rest of the batter. Do not worry if the layers start to dome slightly; it'll flatten out when you add the oil and batter on top of it. This recipe will yield a seven layer cake. Do take note that when the broiler is on the "off" cycle, it'll take a while longer to brown on the top, but be patient and you'll be rewarded! Once all the seven layers have been baked off, let the cake cool in the pan on the counter for at least an hour. While the cake is cooling, make the coconut whipped cream. In the bowl of a stand mixer, with the whisk attachment, add the coconut cream, heavy cream, vanilla, and powdered sugar. Whisk on high speed for a couple of minutes until (very) soft peaks form. Put it back in the fridge so that it can firm up a bit. Chill the whipped coconut cream in the fridge until you are ready to serve. Once the cake is cooled (it'll pull slightly away from the sides), run a plastic knife around the edges, release it from the spring form pan, and serve immediately with the chilled coconut whipping cream. Enjoy!

input_text: I have green chilies, mix, cheddar cheese, cream cheese, shredded monterey jack cheese, garlic. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Perfect Cheeseball with 2 packages 8oz Cream Cheese, 1 cup Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese, 1 cup Shredded Monterey Jack Cheese, 1 package Dry Ranch Dip Mix (like Hidden Valley), 1 can Diced Green Chilies, Garlic Salt, to taste, 6 ounces, weight Chopped Pecan Pieces. Here's the instruction: Bring cream cheese to room temperature (soft) Combine cream cheese, cheddar, Monterrey jack, ranch dip, green chilies and garlic salt in a bowl. Place wax paper on counter and spread chopped nuts on it. Roll bowl mixture into a ball and roll in the nuts to cover the outside. Place ball on wax paper in the freezer for 15 minutes until firm. Serve with crackers

input_text: I have celery salt, sugar, lemon juice, cloves, water, paprika, tomato juice, ground cinnamon, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Hot Tomato Drink with 2 cups tomato juice, 1 cup water, 1/4 cup sugar, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon celery salt, 1/8 teaspoon paprika, 6 whole cloves. Here's the instruction: In a large saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients. Place cloves on a double thickness of cheesecloth; bring up corners of cloth and tie with string to form a bag. Add spice bag to saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Discard spice bag. Stir before serving.

input_text: I have potatoes, oil, cheddar cheese, margarine, milk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Put Back Potatoes with 4 potatoes (baking kind), 8 Tbsp. milk, 3/4 c. grated Cheddar cheese, salt and pepper to taste, 1 Tbsp. margarine, oil. Here's the instruction: Wash potatoes well; prick some holes in them with a fork. Rub potatoes with a small amount of oil. Bake at 400° for 45 to 60 minutes. Remove from oven and cool. Cut potatoes lengthwise and scoop out insides. Put into a bowl. Save the skins. Save 1/3 cup of cheese for topping. Mix the rest of the cheese, milk, salt and pepper with potatoes. Add margarine. Using a mixer or masher, mix all together while warm.

input_text: I have apricot - pineapple preserves, pepper, horseradish, apple jelly, mustard. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Jezebel Sauce For Pork Roast with 1 1/2 tbsp horseradish, 1 tbsp pepper, 2 tbsp dry mustard, 1 jar (8 to 10 ounces) apple jelly, 1 jar (8 to 10 ounces) apricot - pineapple preserves. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients and mix well. *This should be enough sauce for a 3 pound pork roast, or enough to serve about 8 to 10 people. *

input_text: I have bell pepper, onion, balsamic vinegar, sweet peppers, roma tomatoes, garlic, fresh basil, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Italian Salsa with 6 roma tomatoes, seeded and cubed, 1/2 cup chopped onion, 1/2 cup chopped roasted sweet peppers, 1/4 cup chopped bell pepper, 1/4 cup chopped fresh basil, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, 1 minced garlic clove, salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: Mix all together and put in fridge for at least 2 hours. Serve on toasted french bread, or on tosated baguett rounds.

input_text: I have red wine vinegar, shallot, california black figs, cream, pork tenderloin, port wine, unsalted butter. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pork Tenderloin with 4 california black figs, cut in 4 pieces, 4 tablespoons port wine, 7 tablespoons unsalted butter, 4 pork tenderloin (about 6 ounces each), 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, 1 -2 shallot, depending on size, 8 ounces cream, 35%. Here's the instruction: Marinate figs in port wine for 45 minutes. In a small saucepan, add the figs and juice with salt to taste and simmer over low heat, uncovered, for 25 minutes. Add 2 tablespoons of butter and mix into a puree. Set aside. Cut the tenderloin into 1- 1/2-inch strips. With the palm of your hand, press down to 1 inch. In 3 tablespoons of butter, cook 2 minutes on each side at medium high heat. Keep warm in oven at 175F. In same frying pan, cook the chopped shallots; deglaze with red vinegar until dry. Add the cream and meat juice. Cool 2-3 minutes and add the fig puree. Mix well, reheat the tenderloin in sauce, and serve.

input_text: I have macaroni, parmesan cheese, gorgonzola, flour, fontina cheese, gruyere, white wine, milk, cream, butter, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Macaroni Cheese Deluxe with 250 g macaroni, 50 g butter, 50 g plain flour, 600 ml milk, 100 ml double cream, 100 ml dry white wine, 50 g gruyere or 50 g emmenthaler cheese, grated, 50 g Fontina cheese, diced, 50 g gorgonzola, crumbled, 75 g parmesan cheese, grated, salt and black pepper. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 180 C (350 F), cook pasta according to instructions. Melt butter in medium saucepan, then add flour and cook for 1 or 2 minutes. Add milk in small quantities, whisk vigorously after each addition. Stir in cream and white wine, and bring to boil. Cook until sauce thickens stirring constantly, remove from heat. Add gruyere, fontina, gorgonzola and 1/3 of the parmesan to sauce, stir to mix in cheeses. Taste sauce for seasoning add salt and pepper in neccessary. Drain pasta, tip into baking dish, pour sauce in and mix well to combine, sprinkle remaining parmesan over the top. Bake for 25- 30 minutes or until golden brown.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla extract, salt, nutmeg, brown sugar, cinnamon, water, butter, yams. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Old Fashioned Candied Yams with 3 medium yams, 1/2 c. granulated sugar, 1 c. brown sugar, 1 tsp. nutmeg, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1/2 stick butter or margarine, 1 tsp. vanilla extract, pinch of salt (optional), 1 1/2 c. water. Here's the instruction: Peel and cut yams in quarters. Sprinkle granulated sugar and brown sugar over yams in a medium saucepan. Add nutmeg, cinnamon, butter, vanilla, salt and water. Cover and simmer over medium heat until yams are cooked and liquid forms a syrup. Remove from heat and serve.

input_text: I have oil, baking powder, sugar, nutmeg, eggs, soda, flour, pumpkin, walnuts, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pumpkin Bread with 1 c. oil, 3 c. sugar, 3 1/4 c. plain flour, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 2 tsp. soda, 1 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. each: cloves, cinnamon and nutmeg, 4 eggs, 2 c. (1 can) pumpkin, 1 c. broken English walnuts. Here's the instruction: Cream the oil and sugar together. Add eggs, then pumpkin. Mix dry ingredients together and add to creamed mixture; beat well. Add nuts. Pour into 3 greased loaf pans and bake at 375° for 1 hour. Cool in pans about 15 minutes. Freezes well.

input_text: I have oregano, pizza sauce, sugar, macaroni, salt, tomato paste, mozzarella cheese, onion, hamburger, tomato sauce. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Pizza Casserole with 1 onion, chopped, 1 1/2 to 2 pounds hamburger, 1 can pizza sauce, 1 can tomato sauce, dash of oregano or Italian spices, 6 to 8 slices mozzarella cheese, 2 cups twisted macaroni, salt and pepper, 1 can tomato paste, 1/2 Tbsp. sugar. Here's the instruction: Cook macaroni. Brown meat and onion. Add salt and pepper. Mix hamburger, macaroni, pizza sauce, tomato sauce, tomato paste, and sugar. Add spices to suit your taste. Place half the mixture in casserole. Add a layer of cheese, then another layer of each. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes

input_text: I have oil, sugar, vanilla, eggs, baking soda, flour, apples, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Apple Coffee Cake with 4 c. apples, peeled and sliced, 1/2 c. oil, 1 1/2 c. sugar, 1 tsp. vanilla, 3 eggs, 2 c. sifted flour, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. baking soda. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients, except apples, together until well blended. Fold in apples. Pour into greased pan. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes. Preheat oven to 350°.

input_text: I have wooden skewers, jasmine rice, ground cumin, ginger, soy sauce, honey, brown sugar, peanut butter, rice vinegar, fish sauce, sesame oil, chile-garlic sauce, ground coriander, milk, turmeric, garlic, chicken, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Thai Chicken Satay with Spicy Peanut Sauce with 1 cup Unsweetened Coconut Milk, 2 Tablespoons Brown Sugar, 2 Tablespoons Fish Sauce, 1 Tablespoon Ground Coriander, 1 teaspoon Ground Cumin, 1/2 teaspoons Turmeric, 1 teaspoon Salt, 1- 1/2 pound Chicken Tenders, Wooden Skewers, Soaked, Jasmine Rice, To Serve, 1/2 cups Peanut Butter, 1 Tablespoon Fresh Minced Ginger, 13 cups Chicken Stock, 1 Tablespoon Honey, 1/4 cups Low Sodium Soy Sauce, 3 Tablespoons Rice Vinegar, 3 Tablespoons Sesame Oil, 2 cloves Garlic, 1 Tablespoon Chile-garlic Sauce (optional). Here's the instruction: Combine the coconut milk, brown sugar, fish sauce and spices in a large zip lock bag. Shake and add the chicken tenders. Marinate for at least 30 minutes. Soak the skewers in water for at least 30 minutes. Preheat the grill to direct medium heat. Weave each tender onto a skewer and lay on a foil-covered cookie sheet. Grill the Thai satay for 3 minutes per side. Meanwhile, puree all the ingredients for the peanut sauce in the blender and set aside. Serve the chicken satay skewers over jasmine rice with spicy peanut sauce for dipping.

input_text: I have red wine vinegar, sugar, pepper, salad oil, onion, white mushrooms, garlic, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Quick Marinated Mushrooms with 1 c. red wine vinegar, 1/2 c. salad oil, 1 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 Tbsp. sugar, pinch of pepper, pinch of garlic, 1 medium onion, cut into rings, 1 lb. small white mushrooms, cleaned. Here's the instruction: Mix red wine, salt, sugar, pepper and garlic together with a whisk. Slowly add oil. Mix so that mixture doesn't separate, then add onions and mushrooms. Let marinate 24 hours before serving. Serve with toothpicks.

input_text: I have pancake mix, butter, lemon-lime soda, chicken breasts. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Fried Chicken Nuggets with 2-1/2 pounds boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes, 2-2/3 cups pancake mix, 1-1/2 cups lemon-lime soda, 1/4 cup butter, melted, Oil for deep-fat frying. Here's the instruction: Place chicken in a 2-qt. microwave-safe bowl. Cover and microwave on high for 6-8 minutes or until juices run clear, stirring every 2 minutes; drain. In a shallow bowl, combine the pancake mix, soda and butter. Heat oil in an electric skillet or deep-fat fryer to 375°. Dip chicken cubes into batter; fry in oil, in batches, for about 2 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels.

input_text: I have dressing, salmon, cranberries, brown sugar, balsamic vinegar, ground black pepper, orange juice, clementines, honey, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Green Leaf Salad With Salmon & Clementines with 4 pieces (6 Oz. Size) Salmon Fillets, 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil, 1 dash Salt And Pepper, 1 head Green Leaf Lettuce, 4 whole Clementines, Peeled Or Use Canned, 2 cups Honey Roasted Almonds, 1 cup Dried Cranberries, FOR THE DRESSING:, 1 teaspoon Brown Sugar, 2 cups Orange Juice, 3 Tablespoons Olive Oil, 2 Tablespoons Balsamic Vinegar, Ground Black Pepper To Taste. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 425°F. Line a thin pan or lipped cookie sheet with tin foil. Place salmon skin side down on foil and drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle fish with a generous amount of kosher salt and fresh ground pepper. Bake for 10-20 minutes until fish is flaky and opaque. Meanwhile, make salad dressing. In a saucepan dissolve brown sugar in orange juice over low heat. Pour into a container with a spout, like a creamer. Add oil and vinegar and add pepper to taste. Remove salmon from skin and arrange salmon on the bed of greens. Add clementines, almonds and dried cranberries. Add dressing and enjoy.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, eggs, dark karo, pecan halves, margarine, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Southern Deep Dish Pecan Pie with 4 eggs, 1/3 c. melted margarine, dash of salt, 1 1/4 c. dark Karo, 3/4 c. sugar, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 1/2 c. pecan halves. Here's the instruction: Beat eggs with sugar and salt. Add Karo, butter and vanilla. Add pecan pieces. Pour into uncooked pie shell. Bake at 350° about 50 minutes or until knife comes out clean.

input_text: I have russet potatoes, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Quick And Easy Grilled Potatoes with 2 large russet potatoes, scrubbed, 2 tablespoons olive oil, salt and ground black pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Poke each potato with the tines of a fork. Place the potatoes in a microwave oven, and cook on high power for about 5 minutes. Check about halfway through, and turn potatoes over for even cooking. Slice each potato in half the long way and cook potatoes another 2 minutes on high power. Preheat a grill for medium heat. Brush the potato tops with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Cook on prepared grill for 15 to 20 minutes, turning once.

input_text: I have sugar, vanilla, eggs, pecans, wesson oil, flour, cocoa, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Favorite Brownies with 1 1/2 c. self-rising flour, 10 Tbsp. cocoa, 2 c. sugar, 1 tsp. salt, 1/2 c. pecans or walnuts, 1 c. Wesson oil, 2 tsp. vanilla, 4 eggs. Here's the instruction: Mix all dry ingredients. Add Wesson oil, vanilla and eggs. Stir until all dry ingredients are moistened. Cook in a 9 x 13-inch pan and bake at 350° for 30 minutes. Do not overcook.

input_text: I have sugar, tart apples, dressing, lemon juice, vanilla, celery, walnuts, fresh currants. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Raw Apple Salad (Vegan) with 2 medium tart apples, diced (if it doesn't bother you, keep the peel on the skin), 1 cup celery, thinly sliced (plus a few leaves!), 1/2 cup fresh currants or 1/2 cup fresh blueberries, 2 -3 tablespoons raw walnuts (almonds will work, too), Dressing, fresh lemon juice (few tablespoons-I also stirred in about one teaspoon lemon zest to the salad), sugar, to taste (or any sugar substitute of your choice), 1/8 teaspoon pure vanilla extract. Here's the instruction: Toss apples, celery and berries with the dressing. Top with the walnuts. Can be served immediately or covered and chilled.

input_text: I have ground pepper, lemon juice, mustard, celery, mayonnaise, cherry tomatoes, lemon-pepper seasoning, red onion, chicken. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Luncheon Chicken Salad with 12 1/2 ounces canned chicken, I used Tyson's Premiere White and Dark Chunk Chicken, 2/3 cup mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, 1/4 cup red onion, chopped finely, 1/4 cup celery, finely chopped, 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon lemon-pepper seasoning, 1/2 teaspoon ground pepper, 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 4 romaine lettuce leaves, crouton, lightly crushed, I used sour dough. Here's the instruction: Drain chicken and place in medium bowl. With a fork break up larger pieces and add mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, red onion, celery, lemon juice, lemon pepper seasoning salt, and ground pepper. Refrigerate until chilled. Wash and pat dry lettuce leaves with a paper towel. Add cherry tomato halves to chicken salad and mix lightly to combine. Lay two lettuce leaves on a plate and spoon on chicken salad, sprinkle lightly crushed croutons on top and serve immediately.

input_text: I have baking powder, sugar, crisco, vanilla, brown sugar, water, flour, nuts, cocoa, milk, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Baked Chocolate Pudding with 1 c. flour, 1/2 tsp. salt, 3/4 c. sugar, 2 tsp. baking powder, 4 1/2 tsp. cocoa, 2 Tbsp. melted Crisco, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1/2 c. milk, 1/2 c. chopped nuts, 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. brown sugar, 4 Tbsp. cocoa, 1 c. water. Here's the instruction: Sift all dry ingredients together. Combine Crisco, vanilla and milk. Add dry ingredients and mix well. Add nuts and mix. Pour into greased baking dish (5 x 9-inch or 8-inch square). Cover with this mixture. Mix together 1/2 cup sugar, brown sugar and 4 tablespoons cocoa. Sprinkle over batter in dish. Pour 1 cup water over all. Bake at 350° for 40 minutes or until done. If you use a glass dish, bake at 325°. Tastes best while warm and you can add ice cream if desired.

input_text: I have egg, sugar, vanilla, bacon, germ, baking soda, cheddar cheese, flour, margarine, oatmeal, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Breakfast Cookies with 2/3 c. softened margarine, 2/3 c. sugar, 1 egg, 1 tsp. vanilla, 3/4 c. flour, 1/2 tsp. baking soda, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 1/2 c. oatmeal, 1/2 c. wheat germ, 6 bacon strips (crisp), crumbled. Here's the instruction: Mix softened margarine, sugar, egg and vanilla. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix in Cheddar cheese, oatmeal and wheat germ. Add bacon strips. Spoon onto ungreased (no-stick) cookie sheet by the tablespoonful. Bake at 350° for 12 to 14 minutes. Cool. Makes 2 dozen cookies.

input_text: I have yogurt, low-fat powdered milk, water. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Homemade Low Fat Yoghurt with 6 cups water, 1 cup low-fat powdered milk, 12 cup yogurt. Here's the instruction: Take you crock pot and all 6 cups of water. Slowly (as in a Tablespoon at a time) add the milk powder, whisking thoroughly after each addition. A froth will happen, but don't worry it will dissapear on its own. Leave in the crockpot for 4 hours on low. Take lid off and allow to cool till the milk feels pleasantly warm on the inside part of the elbow. Gently stir in the yoghurt. Place lid back on pot and wrap in a bath towl and leave for 8 hours. If you want the yoghurt to be thicker, line a colander with paper towls and leave for a hour or two. Whisk and place into a water tight container in the fridge. Remember to leave 1/2 a cup of yogurt to use when you make the recipe again. *The first time you make this recipe, buy yogurt that has live cultures. This usually mean something more costly than Yoplait. but you will only need it once.

input_text: I have cumin, clover, cayenne, ginger, black pepper, lemon juice, tumeric, nutmeg, cinnamon, mace, onions, ground coriander, garlic, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Leg Of Lamb Marinade  with 3 inches fresh ginger, 2 med. onions, 5-7 garlic cloves, 1 T. ground coriander, 1 tsp,. cumin, 1 tps. tumeric, 1/2 t. mace, 1/4 tsp. clover, 1 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp,. cinnamon, 1/4 tsp. nutmeg, black pepper, 1/2 t. cayenne, 1 cup olive oil, 2/3 cup lemon juice. Here's the instruction: Mix well to form thick paste. Coat leg of lamb and marinate overnight. Grill lamb until charcoaled and crusty on outside, rare inside.

input_text: I have vanilla bean, sugar, lemon juice, blueberries, water, peaches. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Blueberry Peach Float with 1 cup sugar, 2 cups water, 1 vanilla bean, split, 2 cups frozen peaches, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 1 pint blueberries, 16 ounces tonic water. Here's the instruction: In a saucepan, bring to a boil the sugar, water, and vanilla bean. Once it boils add the frozen peaches and lemon juice and let them sit in the hot syrup 5 minutes. Remove the vanilla bean and puree the liquid. Strain into a shallow pan and freeze overnight. Scrape the next day and store in a container in the freezer until ready to serve the floats. To serve the floats, place a spoonful of the scraped peach granita in a small juice glass. Top with 6 or so fresh blueberries. Pour tonic water over to cover and serve with a straw, cut the straw shorter, if needed, to fit the glass.

input_text: I have fresh sage, cornbread crumbs, mustard, chicken, olive oil, salt. Give me some cooking ideas.
target_text: You can make Chicken With Sage Cornbread Crust with 4 skinned and boned chicken thighs (4 oz. each), 1/8 t. each salt and black pepper, 1 T. plus 1 t. Dijon mustard, 1 t. olive oil, 2/3 cup fine cornbread crumbs or fresh bread crumbs, 1 T. minced fresh sage, thyme or rosemary, crumbled. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400 degrees.
