input_text: How to make Longchamps Restaurant Coconut Custard Pie Recipe?
target_text: You can make Longchamps Restaurant Coconut Custard Pie Recipe with Pastry for 9" pie, 1 egg white, unbeaten, 5 whole Large eggs, 5/8 c. powdered sugar, 2 teaspoon vanilla, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 c. lowfat milk, 1/2 c. heavy cream, 1 3/4 c. (1/4 lb.) shredded moist coconut. Here's the instruction: Brush bottom of unbaked pie shell with unbeaten egg white; chill. Break Large eggs into mixing bowl and stir lightly. Do not beat. Add in sugar, vanilla and salt. Pour in mix and lastly cream. Stir together lightly. Arrange coconut in pie shell and strain custard over it. Bake 450 degrees for 10 min, reduce heat to 350 degrees and bake 20 min longer, till knife comes out almost clean. Remember it will continue cooking slightly after removing from oven.

input_text: How to make Ground Turkey Soft Tacos?
target_text: You can make Ground Turkey Soft Tacos with 2 Tablespoons Canola Oil (for Frying Ground Turkey), 16 ounces, weight Ground Turkey, 1- 1/4 teaspoon Chili Powder, 1- 1/4 teaspoon Onion Salt, 1/2 teaspoons Ground Cumin, 1/2 teaspoons Black Pepper, 1 cup Diced Bell Pepper (stem Removed And Seeded), 1 cup Diced Onion, 1 can (15-ounce) Can Diced Tomatoes, 1 cup Low Sodium Vegetable Stock, 8 whole 6" Flour Tortillas (warmed), 2 cups Shredded Cheddar Cheese. Here's the instruction: In a large skillet (10) or frying pan add canola oil and ground turkey and heat on medium low heat. Break up turkey meat with a wooden spoon as it cooks. Once it starts to brown add seasonings (chili powder through black pepper) and stir mixture together. Add diced bell pepper and diced onion and stir well. Add diced tomatoes and vegetable stock, turn heat to medium. Put the lid on and cook turkey taco mixture for 18-22 minutes, stirring a few times during cooking time. Warm the tortillas in the microwave just a few seconds each (15-20 seconds) and place on a clean work surface. Spoon a generous amount of turkey taco mixture in the middle of tortilla, add desired amount of shredded cheese, fold taco together and place on a serving platter. Repeat with the remaining tortillas and mixture. Serve on individual plates and enjoy this delicious turkey taco!

input_text: How to make French Onion Soup?
target_text: You can make French Onion Soup with 4 or 5 large onions, 3 Tbsp. butter, 1 Tbsp. flour, 3 cans beef broth, 3 cans water, 1 bay leaf, 6 to 8 pieces bread, toasted, 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese. Here's the instruction: Melt butter. Add onions. Cook until light brown. Sprinkle in flour. Add broth, water and bay leaf. Cook 30 to 40 minutes. Sprinkle with cheese. Put bread cubes on top.

input_text: How to make Skirt Steak Diablo?
target_text: You can make Skirt Steak Diablo with 1 16-ounce jar roasted-garlic or other salsa, 3 tablespoons cider vinegar, 1 tablespoon oregano, 1 tablespoon sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 1 1/2-pound skirt or hanger steak. Here's the instruction: Combine 1 cup of the garlic salsa with the vinegar, oregano, sugar, and salt in a resealable plastic bag. Add the steak and marinate 30 minutes or up to 4 hours. Light a charcoal grill and allow the coals to burn until covered with gray ash or heat a gas grill to high. Remove the beef from the marinade and cook 3 to 4 minutes, turn, then cook 3 to 4 minutes more or until medium rare. Slice thinly against the grain and serve.

input_text: How to make  (Korean Rice-Stuffed Chicken Soup) Recipe?
target_text: You can make  (Korean Rice-Stuffed Chicken Soup) Recipe with 1 cup sticky rice (7 ounces/200g), 1 piece hwanggi (, milk vetch) root (about 1/3 ounce; 10g), see note, 1 piece eomnamu (, prickly castor-oil tree) bark (see note), 2 small young chickens or Cornish hens (about 14 ounces/400g each), 6 small (about 1 inch in length) or 4 large (about 2 inches in length) dried jujubes, pitted, 6 whole skinned gingko nuts (see note), 2 to 4 raw chestnuts, peeled, 2 pieces fresh ginseng (about 10cm long), or 2 large slices dried ginseng, 4 medium cloves garlic, Thinly sliced scallions, for garnish, A mixture of salt, freshly ground black pepper, and ground toasted sesame seeds, for serving. Here's the instruction: In a medium bowl, cover rice with 1 inch of cold water and soak for 2 hours. Drain rice. Wash hwanggi and eomnamu under cold running water, using a clean brush to dislodge any grit. Place hwanggi and eomnamu in a large saucepan, cover with 2 quarts (2 liters) cold water, and soak for 2 hours. Transfer pot to the stovetop and bring to a simmer. Gently simmer hwanggi and eomnamu for 1 hour. Meanwhile, trim off chickens' wing tips, tail, and excess fat. Clean inside of chicken cavity well, trying to remove any blood stuck between the ribs. Stuff each chicken with alternating layers of sticky rice, jujubes, gingko, chestnuts, ginseng, and garlic. Using a paring knife, cut a small slit into the skin on either side of the cavity. Cross the drumsticks, inserting the end of each drumstick through the slit on the opposite side of the cavity (this trusses the bird and seals the cavity without the need for string). Strain the hwanggi and eomnamu from the broth, discarding the solids. Top up the broth with fresh water to equal 2 quarts (2 liters). In a heavy, large pot or Dutch oven, arrange the stuffed birds side-by-side. Pour the broth over them. Cover and bring to a boil, then reduce heat and gently simmer until the birds are fully cooked through and tender, about 2 hours. If the broth doesn't fully cover the birds, rotate them halfway through cooking. Transfer each stuffed bird to a deep serving bowl or small earthenware pot and ladle the broth on top. Garnish with scallions and serve with the salt/pepper/sesame seed mixture alongside, so that each person can season the soup and chicken to their tastes.

input_text: How to make Tim'S Chili Colorado?
target_text: You can make Tim'S Chili Colorado with 1 (4 lb.) rump roast, 2 large jars Pace picante sauce (chunky), 1 tsp. garlic powder, 1 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. black pepper, 1/2 bottle liquid smoke, 1/4 c. oil. Here's the instruction: Cut roast into 1/4-inch chunks. In a large pan, add oil, liquid smoke and meat. Brown until almost done. Drain meat and place in crock-pot or Dutch oven. Add remaining ingredients and cook on low for approximately 2 hours. Serve over cooked rice or with tortillas and make burritos.

input_text: How to make Sauteed Apples ?
target_text: You can make Sauteed Apples  with 3 tablespoons butter, 4 large Granny Smith apples (about 2 1/4 pounds), peeled, cored, cut into 1/2-inch pieces, 2 tablespoons golden brown sugar, 1 tablespoon honey, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon grated orange peel. Here's the instruction: Cook butter in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat until beginning to brown. Add apples and saute until tender, about 9 minutes. Add all remaining ingredients; stir to blend. Cool. (Can be made 2 days ahead. Cover and chill.)

input_text: How to make Cranberry Oatmeal Cookies?
target_text: You can make Cranberry Oatmeal Cookies with 10 tablespoons butter, 2/3 cup packed dark brown sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 eggs, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda, 1 pinch salt, 1 2/3 cups whole wheat flour, 1 cup rolled oats, 2 cups chopped cranberries, 3/4 cup chopped walnuts. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Blend butter and sugar until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla and mix well. In a separate bowl sift flour, baking soda, and salt together. Stir into butter mixture. Stir in the oats. Fold in nuts and cranberries. Drop spoonfuls of cookie dough onto ungreased cookie sheets, spaced at least 2 inches apart. These cookies spread. Bake 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until the edges are crisp and the centers appear dry. Cool on wire racks and enjoy.

input_text: How to make Cinnamon-Raisin Biscuits?
target_text: You can make Cinnamon-Raisin Biscuits with 1 2/3 c. all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 c. sifted all-purpose flour, 1/4 c. sugar, 1 Tbsp. baking powder, 1 tsp. salt, 1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon, 1/2 c. plus 1 Tbsp. butter, 1 c. raisins, 1 c. milk, butter, melted, 1 c. sifted powdered sugar, 1 to 2 Tbsp. milk. Here's the instruction: Combine the first 6 ingredients; cut in butter with pastry blender until it resembles coarse corn meal. Add raisins and milk. Stir in dry ingredients until moist. Knead dough on floured surface 10 times. Roll to 3/4 inch thickness. Cut with biscuit cutter. Brush with melted butter. Bake 15 minutes at 400°.

input_text: How to make Wilted Cucumbers?
target_text: You can make Wilted Cucumbers with 1/4 c. water, 1 c. vinegar (white or cider), 2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. pepper*, 1/2 c. sugar, 4 cucumbers, peeled. Here's the instruction: * If you don't like it too hot, cut in half.

input_text: How to make Orecchiette With Kale, Bacon, And Sun-Dried Tomatoes?
target_text: You can make Orecchiette With Kale, Bacon, And Sun-Dried Tomatoes with 8 ounces uncooked orecchiette pasta, 5 cups bagged prewashed kale, 2 slices center-cut bacon, 1/4 cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and roughly chopped, 1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper, 3 large garlic cloves, chopped, 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 3/8 teaspoon salt, 1 ounce Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, shaved, 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice. Here's the instruction: Cook pasta in boiling water 8 minutes or until almost tender. Add kale, and cook 2 minutes. Drain in a colander over a bowl, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid. While pasta cooks, cook bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat 4 minutes or until crisp. Remove bacon from pan with a slotted spoon; crumble and set aside. Reduce heat to medium-low. Add sun-dried tomatoes, crushed red pepper, and garlic to drippings in pan; cook 1 minute, stirring frequently. Add pasta mixture, reserved 1/2 cup cooking liquid, black pepper, and salt to pan; toss to combine. Top pasta mixture evenly with bacon and cheese; drizzle evenly with lemon juice. input_text: How to make Layered Ice Cream Cake?
target_text: You can make Layered Ice Cream Cake with 1 box (16 Oz. Size) Angel Food Cake Mix, 2 containers (about 56 Oz. Size) Ice Cream Of Your Choice, Pick 2 Flavors That Go Well Together, 16 ounces, weight Extra Creamy Cool Whip, Food Coloring, Sprinkles. Here's the instruction: Bake angel food cake according to package directions. Chose between 2 loaf pans, or one round angel food cake pan. Bake and cool. If you used loaf pans, divide each loaf into 2. If you used a round pan, divide in thirds. Set out ice cream about 5 minutes to start to soften, but not get runny. On a nice platter, set the first cake layer. Place scoops of first ice cream on top, spreading to smooth and keep even. I used over half the first carton. Next, set another layer of angel food cake on top, and start on the second carton of ice cream, packing and smoothing until you have used up the same amount of ice cream. Place the last cake layer on top, pressing down to even out cake. (If you used loaf pans, you will have an extra cake to eat later. It gets too tall with 4 cake layers!) Use food coloring to dye the Cool Whip if you wish, then spread to cover, working quickly to prevent ice cream running. Add sprinkles if you'd like, then place in freezer to set back up for at least 1 hour or until the party starts. Set out just a few minutes before serving time for easier cutting, but then serve quickly. Note: Some favorite ice cream flavor combos are: Butterfinger and Oreo, strawberry and Oreo, chocolate chip cookie dough and chocolate chip, mint and chocolate chip, caramel and chocolate, raspberry and vanilla bean.

input_text: How to make Easy-Bake Risotto?
target_text: You can make Easy-Bake Risotto with 3 tablespoons olive oil or butter, 1 small onion, cut into small dice, 2 ounces prosciutto or 4 ounces ham, cut into small dice, 2 cups arborio rice, 1/2 cup dry white wine, 4 cups chicken broth, 2 cups water, 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 cup frozen regular (not petite) green peas, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 1 pinch Salt and ground black pepper. Here's the instruction: Adjust oven rack to middle position, and heat oven to 450 degrees. Heat oil or butter in a heavy-bottom Dutch oven or large ovenproof saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onion and prosciutto or ham; saute until tender, 4 to 5 minutes. Stir in rice (can be removed from heat and covered for up to 2 hours in advance), then add wine, and simmer until the liquid has almost evaporated. Turn off heat. Add broth and water. Cover the pot with a sheet of heavy-duty foil, pressing the foil down so it's concave and rests on the broth. Place a lid over the pot to ensure an even tighter seal. Set pot in oven; cook for 25 minutes. Remove from oven. Use a potholder to remove lid and foil. Remembering that the handles are hot, set pot on low heat. Stir mixture, adding water if necessary, until rice is cooked and a little chewy at the center, the liquid is creamy, and the flavors of the new ingredients have melded in, about 5 minutes. Stir in 1 cup of Parmesan cheese, peas and/or parsley. Adjust seasonings, including salt and pepper, to taste. Spoon into shallow soup plates, sprinkling each serving with shaved Parmesan.

input_text: How to make Acadian Toutiere ?
target_text: You can make Acadian Toutiere  with 2 lbs of ground pork1 cup of water1 onion chopped finely1 clove of garlic chopped1/4 teaspoon pepper1/4 teaspoon celery saltdash macedash cayenne1 potatoe grated, 2 pie shells. Here's the instruction: Saute onion, garlic until tender.Add ground pork, spices and potatoe.Add one cup of water and simmer until tender about 45 minutes.Let cool completely.Spoon into two 8 inch pie shells and bake at 425 for 40 minutes.Serve warm.*It is very important to let the filling cool before placing it in the pastry, if not cooled you will have soggy pastry.

input_text: How to make Italian Meringue Frosting?
target_text: You can make Italian Meringue Frosting with 1/4 teaspoon cream of tartar, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 3 large egg whites at room temperature, 1 cup sugar, 1/4 cup water. Here's the instruction: Place cream of tartar, salt and egg whites in the bowl of an electric mixer with the whisk attachment in place. Beat -starting on low and slowly raising the speed-- until soft peaks form. Combine sugar and water in a small saucepan. Cook over medium heat until sugar dissolves, stirring mixture frequently, and bring to a boil. Cook, without stirring, for 2 minutes or until a candy thermometer registers 238°. Pour hot sugar syrup in a thin stream over egg whites, while beating at high speed until stiff peaks form. Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla extract and 1/2 teaspoon almond extract if using.

input_text: How to make Kitchen Sink Cookies?
target_text: You can make Kitchen Sink Cookies with 2 cups brown sugar, 2 cups granulated sugar, 3/4 cup butter, softened, 1 cup Crisco shortening, 4 eggs, 2 tsp. vanilla, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tsp. salt, 2 tsp. baking soda, 3 cups uncooked oats, 2 cups coconut, 2 cups raisins, 1 cup chocolate chips, 1 cup chopped nuts. Here's the instruction: Cream the sugars, butter and shortening together. Beat in eggs andvanilla. Combine flour, salt and soda; beat into first mixture. Add remaining ingredients to mixture, combining well. Drop by heaping teaspoons onto greased baking sheet, 2-inches apart. Bake in preheated 350F oven for about 8 minutes, or until cookies are nicely browned. Let cookies cool on baking sheet for a minute before removing to cool on rack or paper towels. Store in an airtight container.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Chip Mini Cupcakes?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Chip Mini Cupcakes with 1/2 cup coconut flour, 1/2 cup blanched almond flour, 1/4 teaspoon sea salt, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 3 large eggs, 1/4 cup grapeseed oil, 1/2 cup agave nectar, 1/2 cup mini chocolate chips (semisweet). Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 350F. Grease a mini-muffin pan generously with grapeseed oil. In a large bowl, combine the coconut flour, almond flour, salt, and baking soda. In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, grapeseed oil, and agave nectar. Blend the wet ingredients into the coconut flour mixture with a handheld mixer until thoroughly combined, then stir in the mini chocolate chips. Scoop 1 tablespoon of batter into each prepared muffin cup. Bake for 6 to 9 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the center of a cupcake comes out with a few moist crumbs attached. Let the cupcakes cool in the pan for 1 hour, then serve.

input_text: How to make Beef Casserole?
target_text: You can make Beef Casserole with 1 lb. ground beef, 1 green pepper, diced, 2 Tbsp. minced onion, 1/2 tsp. celery salt, 1 can mushroom soup, 1 1/2 c. grated cheese, frozen Tater Tots. Here's the instruction: Cook beef, green pepper, onion and celery salt in frying pan until beef turns brown. Put into baking dish. Cover with mushroom soup, then layer with grated cheese, then cover with Tater Tots. Bake at 400° for 40 to 50 minutes. This dish freezes well.

input_text: How to make Japanese Pie?
target_text: You can make Japanese Pie with 1/2 c. raisins, 1/2 c. coconut, 1/2 c. nuts, 1 c. sugar, 2 eggs, 1 stick butter, melted. Here's the instruction: Mix. Bake in unbaked pie shell at 350° until set, 30 or 35 minutes.

input_text: How to make Butternut Squash And Spiced Lamb Chickpea Stew 8 Pts Recipe?
target_text: You can make Butternut Squash And Spiced Lamb Chickpea Stew 8 Pts Recipe with 4 ounce lamb cutlet (boneless chop) cubed, chilled, 1 tsp pureed garlic, 1 tsp pureed ginger root, 1 tsp lemon juice, 1 tsp virgin extra virgin olive oil, 1 Tbsp. no salt added tomato paste, 1/4 tsp chile sauce may double (or possibly red curry paste or possibly Harissa) butter-flavored cooking spray, 1 tsp virgin extra virgin olive oil, 1/2 c. minced onion salt and black pepper, 1 pch sugar (smidgeon), 3 c. butternut squash cubes to 4 c., 1 Tbsp. no salt added tomato paste, 2 c. defatted low-sodium vegetable broth plus water if needed extra virgin olive oil spray pepper, 1 tsp Wondra Quick-mixing flour, 1 c. Tomato and Chickpea Sauce see TIP, 1 Tbsp. chopped fresh cilantro, 1 Tbsp. chopped fresh mint, 1/2 tsp grated lemon zest may double. Here's the instruction: 1. LAMB: Combine garlic ginger, lemon juice, oil, tomato paste and chile paste in a Ziploc bag. Mix well. Add in the lamb. Seal, removing most of the air. Knead the bag to work the marinade into the lamb. Set aside at room temperature while you prepare the vegetables. 2. ONION SQUASH: Heat oil in sprayed 3 to 4 qt nonstick saucepan. Add in onion to pan. Add in salt, pepper and sugar. Saute/fry till lightly browned (5 to 6 min.) Add in bite-sized chunks of squash; stir to mix. Season with salt and pepper. Saute/fry for 2 or possibly 3 min. Add in tomato paste and broth or possibly stock. Bring to a boil. Cover ajar. Reduce heat and simmer till squash is tender: 10 min. Set aside. 3. Heat a large nonstick skillet (room to saute/fry). Spray with extra virgin olive oil. When the pan is very warm, add in the lamb and marinade all at once. Brown the lamb quickly. Add in the flour and stir till the flour is absorbed. Cook flour till for 1 minute. Add in a ladle of broth from the onion squash mix. Stir to combine. Add in more broth. When the flour is incorporated and the sauce bubbling, add in the rest of the onion and squash mix. Mix in the tomato and chickpea sauce. Bring just to a boil; reduce heat and simmer till heated through (5 min minimum). Add in water if needed to thin the sauce to stew consistency. Adjust seasonings. Add in the fresh herbs and lemon zest just before serving. TIP:* Use sauce leftover from "Baked Squash with Tomato and Chickpea Sauce" or possibly simmer 1 part minced stewed tomatoes with 2 parts cooked liquid removed chickpeas; season to taste with onion, garlic, salt and pepper. Description: "Mildly spicy stew with fresh herbs and hint of lemon" Start to Finish Time:"0:30" NOTES : It's a bit of work but the flavor is well worth the clean up in this variation. The parts are made separately, some, days before, and brought together for a quick meal. This is not the squash and chickpea stew of North Africa with sweet spice of cinnamon and cumin. It's not exactly Mediterranean although it has many of the expected ingredients. Ginger broadens it's taste appeal.

input_text: How to make Healthy And Delicious Orange Smoothie?
target_text: You can make Healthy And Delicious Orange Smoothie with 1 orange, 1/4 cup ReaLemon juice, 1/3 cup of crushed ice, 1/4 cup milk, sugar, to taste. Here's the instruction: Peel your orange, including the white part. Cut the orange in half and put it in the blender. Put in the ice, milk, and sugar. Once it is mixed well, it is ready to drink! enjoy! by:Emanne Kneifati.

input_text: How to make Holiday Tossed Salad With Fruit?
target_text: You can make Holiday Tossed Salad With Fruit with 1 (10 ounce) package Italian salad mix, 1 (5 ounce) package mixed baby lettuces and spring greens, 2 (11 ounce) cans mandarin oranges, drained, 1 1/2 cups dried cranberries, 1 medium red apple, cored and chopped, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 1/3 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1 (8 ounce) bottle raspberry vinaigrette dressing. Here's the instruction: In a large salad bowl, toss the greens, oranges, cranberries, apple, walnuts, and cheese. Drizzle with vinaigrette just before serving; toss to coat.

input_text: How to make Perfect New York  Cheesecake?
target_text: You can make Perfect New York  Cheesecake with cake, 1 lb cream cheese, room temp, 1 lb reduced-fat cream cheese, room temp, 1 1/2 cups sugar, 3/4 cup milk (can use half and half or cream wonderfully too!), 4 eggs, room temp, 1 cup sour cream (daisy full fat is best here), 1 tablespoon vanilla, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 3 tablespoons flour, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, crust, 1 3/4 cups graham crackers, crushed, 6 tablespoons butter, melted, 1/3 cup sugar. Here's the instruction: mix crust ingredients and press into a 9 or 10 in springform pan. grease sides of pan with melted butter- this is important! preheat oven to 325 with a baking dish of water on the bottom rack (move to lowest position) and move upper rack to second highest position. beat cream cheese, adding sugar at medium low speed. scrape sides as needed (if you have a mixer with paddle attachment, use it!) until smooth. on low speed add milk until combined. add eggs one at a time until combined. add lemon, vanilla and sour cream. sift in flour and cornstarch, mix just until combined (still on low). pour into crust. bake on higher rack- DON'T open oven before one hour ever! check on it at 1 hour 5 minutes, if it's set outside but jiggles, not liquid, but definitely shakes) inside, it's done. it usually will need 1 hour 15 minutes at least. the edges should be just turning golden. TURN OFF oven leave door closed, no more peeking for at least one hour, preferably 3. refrigerate overnight for best taste.

input_text: How to make Tomato Blossoms?
target_text: You can make Tomato Blossoms with 18 each cherry tomatoes, 1 can smoked oysters, 1 x parsley leaves for garnish. Here's the instruction: Cut an "x" in top of each tomato. Tuck smoked oyster into each. Press closed and/or secure with toothpick. Nine tomatoes equal one serving.

input_text: How to make Deviled Eggs ?
target_text: You can make Deviled Eggs  with 7 eggs, hard boiled, one to test, 1/4 C. mayonnaise, 2 T. onion, finely chopped, 3 tsp. dill pickle relish, 1 tsp. creamy prepared horseradish, 2 tsp. prepared mustard, salt, to taste, pepper, to taste, paprika, for garnish. Here's the instruction: Place eggs in a med. sauce pan and add enough water to cover eggs. Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat. Cover and let eggs stand in how water for 10-12 min. Remove one from water, peel and slice in half. Use one egg to test for yolk to be well done. Remove remainder of eggs if hard boiled. Peel and cut eggs in half. Remove yolks. In a bowl mix mayonnaise, pickle relish, onion, horseradish, mustard. Mix well. Add egg yolks and blend with above mixture. Place in egg yolk mixture into the white halves. Garnish with salt, pepper and sprinkle paprika on top. Place in egg dish and chill until ready to serve.

input_text: How to make Toasty Cheese Bake?
target_text: You can make Toasty Cheese Bake with 8 slices white bread, butter or margarine, 1/2 lb. ground beef, 2 Tbsp. chopped celery, 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/8 tsp. dry mustard, 1 c. shredded process sharp American cheese (about 4 oz.), 1 egg, slightly beaten, 1/2 tsp. salt, dash of pepper. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 350°. Toast bread; butter both sides. Cook and stir meat, onion, celery, prepared mustard and salt until meat is brown and onion is tender. Alternate layers of toast, meat mixture and cheese in greased baking pan (9 x 9 x 2-inch). Mix remaining ingredients; pour over layers in pan. If you wish, sprinkle with paprika. Bake, uncovered, for 30 to 35 minutes. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

input_text: How to make Buffalo Artichoke Mac 'N' Cheese ?
target_text: You can make Buffalo Artichoke Mac 'N' Cheese  with 2 1/2 cups uncooked elbow macaroni, 1/4 cup Earth Balance all natural spread (or other butter substitute), 1/4 cup flour, 1/2 tsp ground mustard, 2 cups unsweetened coconut milk (or other milk substitute), 2 cups shredded cheddar (8 oz), 1 package Monterey Farms buffalo artichoke hearts (6 oz) chopped into bite sized pieces*, 1 stalk celery, cut in half lengthwise, then into 1-inch pieces, 1/4 cup crumbled blue cheese (1 oz), buffalo wing sauce to taste. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 425°F. Cook and drain macaroni as directed on package, using al dente cook time. Meanwhile, in 3-quart saucepan, melt Earth Balance over low heat. Stir in flour and mustard with whisk; cook and stir until smooth. Gradually add coconut milk. Heat to boiling, stirring constantly. Boil 1 minute until mixture is hot and bubbly. Add cheddar cheese; stir until cheese is melted and sauce is smooth. Gently stir cooked macaroni into cheese sauce. Stir in artichoke hearts. Spoon into ungreased 8-inch square (2-quart) glass baking dish. Sprinkle celery and blue cheese over macaroni mixture. Drizzle with buffalo wing sauce. Bake uncovered 8-10 minutes or until bubbly and blue cheese is melted. Serve immediately.

input_text: How to make Artichoke Dip?
target_text: You can make Artichoke Dip with 1 can artichokes, 1 c. mayonnaise, 1 c. Parmesan cheese, 4 garlic cloves (fresh), minced. Here's the instruction: Cut up artichokes into a bowl. Add mayo and Parmesan cheese. Crush and dice garlic; then add. Put ingredients into a pie pan and bake at 350° until top is golden brown. Use with white tortilla chips or Fritos as a dip.

input_text: How to make Prime Rib?
target_text: You can make Prime Rib with 1 whole Prime Rib Roast, 2 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 2 cloves Garlic, Crushed, 1/2 cups Fresh Herbs (I Used Parsley, Basil, Thyme And Sage), Chopped, 1 Tablespoon Dijon Mustard, Salt And Pepper, to taste, Coarse Salt To Taste. Here's the instruction: Let your roast sit out on the counter for about an hour before you roast it. Preheat your oven to 450 F. Combine the oil, garlic, herbs and Dijon mustard in a small bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Put the roast into a roasting pan. Evenly distribute the oil and garlic mixture all over the roast, including the bottom. Season all sides (including the bottom) with coarse salt and pepper. Put the roast into the oven and follow the following instructions for roasting the prime rib: Roast the prime rib for the first 30 minutes at 450 F, regardless of the size of the roast. After the first 30 minutes at 450 F, drop the heat to 350 F and cook according to the following specifications. For rare prime rib, roast 11 minutes per pound. For medium prime rib, roast 16 minutes per pound. For medium-well prime rib, roast for 19 minutes per pound. When done, remove it from the oven and wrap the roast tightly with aluminum foil and let it rest for 20 minutes. Unwrap the roast. Carve the roast and serve immediately. Notes: 1. Feel free to use whatever fresh herbs you have on hand; dried would not work. 2. The roast we had was just shy of 4 pounds.

input_text: How to make Pumpkin Tart With Pecan Topping ?
target_text: You can make Pumpkin Tart With Pecan Topping  with Pumpkin Filling, 10 oz/283 g pumpkin puree, 3.5 oz/100g granulated sugar, 2 oz/56g ground jaggery ( an african cane sugar), 2.6 liq oz/80 ml milk, 6 liq oz/180 ml heavy cream, 3.5 oz/100g large eggs, 1oz/30ml bourbon, 1 tsp/2g cinnamon, 1/2 tsp ground ginger, 1/4 tsp/.5g allspice, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 1/4 tsp ground cloves, Topping, 2 oz/60g chopped toasted pecans, 4 oz/120g jaggery, 1 oz/30g unsalted butter,melted.. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350F Line a 9" tart pan w/ pate sucree. Combine all ingredients and mix until smooth Fill tart shell and bake until the filling is just set, about 45 minutes. Remove from oven and cool.  Preheat broiler. Combine pecans ,jaggery and butter. Sprinkle over tart Cover edge of tart with foil. Broil at 4" below heat until topping is caramelized and bubbling, about 1 minute. Let cool. serve with bourbon whipped cream or ice cream

input_text: How to make Sweet Potato Fries?
target_text: You can make Sweet Potato Fries with 2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled, 1 Half Stick (1/4 cup) Land O Lakes Butter with Olive Oil & Sea Salt, melted, 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 450F. Cut sweet potatoes into 3x1/4x1/4-inch fries; place into bowl. Add melted Butter with Olive Oil & Sea Salt , salt and pepper; toss lightly to coat. Spread potatoes in single layer onto ungreased 15x10x1-inch baking pan. Bake, stirring once or twice, 15-20 minutes or until golden brown and beginning to crisp. Variation: Garlic and Herb-Flavored Sweet Potato Fries. Toss fries with 1/4 cup Land O Lakes Butter with Olive Oil & Sea Salt, melted, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 1 teaspoon finely chopped fresh garlic, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt and 1/8 teaspoon pepper. Bake as directed above.

input_text: How to make Sweet Dills(They Sure Taste Good.)  ?
target_text: You can make Sweet Dills(They Sure Taste Good.)   with 1 qt. (48 oz.) dill pickle chips or sticks, 3 c. white sugar, 2/3 c. white vinegar, 2 Tbsp. mixed pickling spice, 1 stick cinnamon. Here's the instruction: Combine sugar, vinegar and spices in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, not a hard boil, for 1 minute. Let cool to warm. Drain off the brine from the dills and toss away. Cut dills into slices. Replace in jar. You can strain out spices or leave them and pour the warm syrup over dills in jar. Store in refrigerator for 1 week, or use in a few days. You can let sugar and vinegar dissolve before cooking. When cooking syrup, take off burner before it comes to hard boil. The second batch I made with old syrup, just add 2/3 cup vinegar, 1/2 cup sugar and more spices to old syrup. Cook again; put in new jar of dills. I buy dills already sliced.

input_text: How to make Vickys Orange Cream Cupcakes, Gluten, Dairy, Egg & Soy-Free?
target_text: You can make Vickys Orange Cream Cupcakes, Gluten, Dairy, Egg & Soy-Free with 95 grams sorghum flour, 145 grams potato starch (not flour), 150 grams sugar, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 tsp baking powder, 1/2 tsp bicarb / baking soda, 2 tsp grated orange zest, 2 tsp olive oil, 1 tsp agave nectar, 240 ml fresh orange juice, 1 1/2 tsp Vickys Best Egg Replacer for Gluten-Free, from my profile, mixed with 3tbsp water*, 2 tsp vanilla extract, 250 grams icing / powdered sugar, 55 grams spread / butter, 2 tbsp fresh orange juice plus extra if required, 1 tsp vanilla extract. Here's the instruction: * If you use an egg or a brand egg-replacer you'll need to add 1tsp xanthan gum to the dry ingredients as my egg replacer has it included Preheat the oven to gas 4 / 180C / 350F and line a 12 hole cupcake tin Mix the dry ingredients together Add the zest, oil, agave, orange juice, egg replacer and vanilla Beat smooth then let rest a couple of minutes Spoon evenly into the cupcake cases and bake for 20 - 25 minutes. They'll rise quite a lot then settle When nicely golden and done, remove and cool on a wire rack Cream the powdered sugar and butter together and add the vanilla. Add enough orange juice to form a medium consistency frosting Pipe it in a swirl around the cupcake tops when cooled and finish with some extra grated orange zest These can be frozen. Once frozen wrap individually. Remove wrapping before defrosting to keep the frosting shape

input_text: How to make Beef Pies?
target_text: You can make Beef Pies with 250 g pumpkin (roughly chopped), 150 g cauliflower (cut into small florets), 12 brown onion, 1 garlic clove (peeled), 12 teaspoon olive oil, 100 g button mushrooms (thinly sliced), 300 g beef mince (extra lean), 125 ml tomato sauce (salt- reduced 1/2 cup), 80 ml water (1/3 cup), 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 3 sheets puff pastry (25% fat-reduced thawed), 4 eggs (50grams each whisked). Here's the instruction: Put the pumpkin, cauliflower, onion and garlic in a food processor and process until finely chopped. Heat oil in a large non stick frying pan on medium and add vegetables and mushroom and cook stirring for 10 minutes and then increase heat to high and add mince and cook stirring for 5 minutes or until mince is browned. Add tomato sauce, water and worcestershire sauce and bring to a simmer and cook for 5 to 10 minutes or until sauce thickens and then transfer to a large bowl and set aside for 30 minutes to cool. Meanwhile prehat oven to 200C or 180C fan forced. Cut out 6 x 13 cm rounds from the pastry and line 4 x 250 ml (1 cup) pie plates with pastry and prick the bases and put int he fridge for 10 minutes to chill and then bake for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden. Add eggs to mince mixture and mix until combines and then spoon into pastry cases and bake for 30-35 minutes or until set. TIP - cook the pies the day before, they will keep in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 4 days.

input_text: How to make Hamburger Stroganoff?
target_text: You can make Hamburger Stroganoff with 1 lb ground beef, 12 cup onion, chopped, 3 tablespoons butter, 2 tablespoons flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 garlic clove, minced, 14 teaspoon pepper, 1 (4 ounce) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained, 1 (10 1/2 ounce) can cream of chicken and mushroom soup, condensed, 1 cup low-fat sour cream, 1 (12 ounce) package wide egg noodles, cooked. Here's the instruction: In a large skillet, cook and stir meat and onion in butter until meat is brown and onion is tender. Stir in flour, salt, garlic, pepper and mushrooms; cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Stir in soup; heat to boiling, stirring constantly. Reduce heat; simmer uncovered 10 minutes. Stir in sour cream; heat through. Serve over hot noodles. Possible substitutions:. for ground beef - 1/2 lb ground turkey and 1/2 lb ground beef. for butter - margarine. for canned mushrooms - fresh mushrooms. for noodles - rice. When doubling the recipe do not add more sour cream. Instead of 2 cans of Creamy Chicken Mushroom; use 1 can cream of Mushroom and 1 can cream of Chicken (its less expensive).

input_text: How to make 10-Egg Pound Cake?
target_text: You can make 10-Egg Pound Cake with 10 eggs, 3 c. plain flour, 3 c. sugar, 2 c. butter Crisco, 2 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. coconut flavoring, 1/4 c. evaporated milk. Here's the instruction: Cream sugar and Crisco. Add eggs, one at a time. Add flour and milk, then flavoring; mix well. Put in a large greased tube pan. Bake for 2 hours at 300° or until done. Will make 1 Bundt cake and 1 small loaf cake. Cut down on the time; bake for about 1 1/2 hours.

input_text: How to make Wassail?
target_text: You can make Wassail with 1 qt. apple cider, 1 qt. pineapple juice, 1/4 c. sugar, 2 sticks cinnamon, 1/2 tsp. whole allspice, 1/2 tsp. whole cloves, 1/2 c. lemon juice, 1 fifth sauterne, 5 clove studded apples. Here's the instruction: In a large pot, combine cider, pineapple juice, sugar, cinnamon, allspice and cloves. Simmer 15 minutes. Add lemon juice and wine; heat but do not boil. Pour into a large punch bowl and float apples.

input_text: How to make Hot Spinach Salad Dressing?
target_text: You can make Hot Spinach Salad Dressing with 1 cup (225 ml) Sugar, 3/4 cup (175 ml) white vinegar, 1/4 cup (60 ml) water, 1/3 lb (.2 kg). bacon, Corn starch and water. Here's the instruction: Fry bacon in pan and drain. Add vinegar, water, and sugar to bacon. Bring to boil. Thicken with corn starch and water. Serve warm over fresh spinach with chopped onions.

input_text: How to make Vegetable Pie(Makes 6 To 8 Servings)  ?
target_text: You can make Vegetable Pie(Makes 6 To 8 Servings)   with 4 to 6 Tbsp. seasoned dry bread crumbs, 1 (24 oz.) pkg. frozen shredded potatoes, thawed, 1 large onion, peeled and chopped, 2 1/2 c. shredded Swiss cheese, divided, 4 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted, 1 tsp. Italian seasoning, divided, salt and freshly ground pepper to taste, 2 Tbsp. olive oil, 1 medium zucchini or 2 small yellow crookneck squash, thinly sliced, 1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced, 3 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded, cut into chunks, 2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese. Here's the instruction: Generously butter a 10-inch pie plate or quiche dish. Sprinkle bread crumbs on bottom and up the sides of the dish. Shake out excess crumbs; set dish aside.

input_text: How to make Custard?
target_text: You can make Custard with 4 eggs, 1/2 tsp. salt, 2/3 c. sugar, 1/4 tsp. nutmeg, 2 2/3 c. milk. Here's the instruction: Beat slightly with beater. Pour into scalded milk. Pour into pie crust. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until set.

input_text: How to make Rum Cake?
target_text: You can make Rum Cake with 1/2 cup of Crisco, 2 sticks of butter, 3 cups of sugar, 1/4 tsp. of baking powder, 1/4 tsp. salt, 3 tsp. rum flavoring, 1 cup milk-if eggs are large, do not use 1 cup. Here's the instruction: Cook in a tube pan at 325 degrees for 1 hour and 15 minutes.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Delight?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Delight with 1 1/2 sticks margarine, 1 1/2 c. flour, 1 c. chopped walnuts, 3 c. milk, 8 oz. cream cheese, 1 c. powdered sugar, 1 large Cool Whip, 2 small pkg. chocolate instant pudding, grated chocolate. Here's the instruction: Melt margarine; add flour and nuts. Pat into 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 350° for 20 minutes. Mix cream cheese with powdered sugar and 1/2 large Cool Whip. Spread over cool crust. Mix 3 cups milk with 2 packages of instant pudding. Spread on top of cream cheese layer. Spread rest of Cool Whip on top. Sprinkle grated chocolate on top. Refrigerate at least 1 1/2 hours before serving.

input_text: How to make Whole Wheat Pancakes?
target_text: You can make Whole Wheat Pancakes with 2 cups whole wheat flour, 12 cup sugar, 12 cup Splenda sugar substitute, 12 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 tablespoon canola oil, 2 eggs, 2 cups milk. Here's the instruction: Mix / Sift dry ingrediants. Mix liquid ingreadiants. Mix both until no more lumps. Let sit for a miniute or two. Pour out on hot skillit with 1/4 cup measure cup.

input_text: How to make Chicken Veggie Flautas?
target_text: You can make Chicken Veggie Flautas with 1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 c. finely chopped fresh or frozen broccoli, 1/4 c. finely chopped green onions, 1 c. finely chopped cooked chicken, 3/4 c. picante sauce, 12 or more flour tortillas, melted butter. Here's the instruction: Combine cheese, chicken, broccoli, picante sauce and green onions. Brush one side of each tortilla with melted butter. Place 1/4 cup of cheese mixture down center of unbuttered side of tortilla. Roll up; place seam side down on foil lined cookie sheet. Bake at 475° for 14 to 16 minutes, or until brown and crispy. Serve with sour cream and more picante sauce.

input_text: How to make Coats Colony Spicy Chili?
target_text: You can make Coats Colony Spicy Chili with 2 -3 lbs stew meat (or Ground Beef, Deer is especially good too), 3 large green bell peppers (Red or Green Combo looks nice, Taste same), 3 medium onions, 1 lb tomatoes (sliced or whole), 3 (8 ounce) cans tomato sauce, 3 (23 ounce) cans ranch style beans or 3 (23 ounce) cansjalepeno ranch style beans, 34 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup water (more or less as needed, not always necessary), 1 teaspoon minced garlic (2-3 Cloves), 4 tablespoons chili powder, 2 teaspoons cumin, 12 tablespoon salt, 1 tablespoon onion salt, 1 12 tablespoons oregano, 1 tablespoon cajun spices (Both if you want) or 1 tablespoon italian seasoning (Both if you want), 1 teaspoon Tabasco sauce (Other brands are not guaranteed good taste!), 12 tablespoon red pepper (or Black Pepper if no crushed Red Pepper). Here's the instruction: Dice up Bell Peppers and onions into small cubes. Boil Stew meat until is light brown, only about 10 minutes (to start of Boil). If Burger Meat, Just brown in a skillet. Dont fully cook. If deer meat, drain and rinse off access stuff (deer people know what I mean). In a fry pan, Cook Bell Peppers, Onions and Garlic in Cooking Oil until onions are translucent. Combine all solid spices in a bowl. In a large pot, add Spices and all other ingredients together. You may need to add a tad bit of water, so the spices combine correctly. Cook on Low heat, enough to make it bubble a little, for about an hour with pot covered. CONSTANTLY CHECK and STIR. Heavy stuff goes to bottom. Dont want it to burn. Then simmer with pot uncovered until chili thickens. Again, keep and eye on it and stir. Makes some pretty darn good chili. Looks REAL hot, but actually a good winter body warmer if amounts are followed just right. To lessen up on the HEAT, you can leave out the Hot Sauce, Red Peppers, and Jalepenos. Taste great covered with Cheese and sopped up with Jalapeno Cornbread.

input_text: How to make Garlic Roasted Chicken With Maple Glaze?
target_text: You can make Garlic Roasted Chicken With Maple Glaze with 6 tablespoons butter, 1 whole chicken, cut in pieces, 5 medium russet potatoes, peeled and cubed in bite sized pieces, 1 head garlic, cloves peeled, 1/2 cup maple syrup, salt. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. In a large roasting pan or dish, melt the butter in the oven. Peel and cube the potatoes. Place the chicken pieces, potatoes and garlic cloves in the buttery pan, turning to coat. Arrange chicken so skin sides are facing up. Sprinkle lightly with salt. Bake 40 - 45 minutes basting with pan juices every 20 minutes. Remove from oven and pour syrup over chicken. Return to oven for another 20 minutes or until golden.

input_text: How to make Thai Shrimp & Potatoes?
target_text: You can make Thai Shrimp & Potatoes with 48 ounces Simply Potatoes Traditional Mashed Potatoes, 5 tablespoons heavy cream, 1 (1 lb) package bacon, chopped and cooked, 5 cups fresh spinach, roughly chopped, 1 cup goat cheese, softened, 1 lb fresh large shrimp, cleaned, deveined, and tails removed, 2 cups sweet chili sauce, 1 1/2 cups dry white wine, Sauvignon Blanc recommended, 2 tablespoons olive oil, salt, to taste, fresh ground pepper, to taste. Here's the instruction: In a large saute pan, saute bacon until cooked; be careful not to "crisp" the bacon. Set aside and reserve bacon fat for later use. Leave 2 tablespoons of bacon fat in saute pan for spinach. Add spinach to saute pan and quickly saute over med. high heat until wilted. Remove spinach and set aside. In large saucepan, add mashed potatoes, cream, goat cheese, and cooked bacon (reserve 4 tablespoons of cooked bacon for later use). Cook over medium-low heat until potatoes are hot and cheese has melted completely. Stir in sauteed spinach and season with salt and pepper. Remove from heat and keep warm until ready to serve. Meanwhile, in saute pan, heat 2 tablespoons of reserved bacon fat and olive oil. Add shrimp and saute over med. high heat for approximately 2 - 4 minutes or until shrimp start to turn pink. Remove from pan and set aside. Add wine and sweet chili sauce to saute pan and bring to a simmer over medium heat. Place shrimp and any juice from bowl in the sauce mixture. Continue cooking over medium heat until shrimp are completely cooked; approximately another 2 -3 minutes. Stir in reserved 4 tablespoons of cooked bacon. Remove from heat. To plate; place one large spoonful of mashed potatoes in center of plate and spoon on shrimp and sauce over potatoes.

input_text: How to make Rich Scones?
target_text: You can make Rich Scones with 8 oz. self-rising flour, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 1/2 oz. Crisco or margarine, 1 oz. sugar, milk (to make soft dough), 2 Tbsp. sultana raisins, 1 egg, beaten (put aside 1 Tbsp.). Here's the instruction: Mix flour and salt in a bowl. Rub in Crisco or margarine. Mix in fruit and sugar. Stir in beaten egg and milk. Make into soft dough. Roll out to thickness of 1/2-inch and cut in rounds with a 2 1/2-inch scone cutter. Place on greased baking sheet. Brush over tops with tablespoon of beaten egg. Bake in a 425° to 450° oven for about 10 minutes, gas oven 7 to 8 minutes.

input_text: How to make Roasted Carrots With Lemon And Olives?
target_text: You can make Roasted Carrots With Lemon And Olives with 1 (16 ounce) bag baby carrots, rinsed, 4 garlic cloves, minced, 5 slices lemons, halved (paper thin slices), 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, salt and pepper, 4 tablespoons kalamata olives, chopped. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 350°F Combine the carrots, garlic, olive oil, and lemon in a shallow baking dish. Stir to blend. Bake, stirring occasionally, until carrots are tender and lightly browned, about 45 minutes. Add the olives. Bake 10 minutes longer. Make sure carrots are cooked through, and remove from oven. Voila!

input_text: How to make Kielbasa And Kidney Beans?
target_text: You can make Kielbasa And Kidney Beans with 1 lb kielbasa or 1 lb Polish sausage, fully cooked and cut into 1/2 inch pieces, 1 small onion, chopped, 1/2 cup sweet red pepper, chopped, 1/2 cup green bell pepper, chopped, 1/4 cup brown sugar, packed, 2 tablespoons steak sauce, 1 tablespoon cider vinegar, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1 (15 ounce) can white kidney beans or (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, rinsed and drained. Here's the instruction: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, heat sausage for 2-3 minutes. Stir in onion and peppers; Cook and stir until vegetables are tender and sausage is lightly browned. Drain off liquid in pan. Stir in brown sugar, steak sauce, vinegar, and Worcestershire sauce; Add beans. Continue to cook and stir until heated through.

input_text: How to make Peach Cobbler?
target_text: You can make Peach Cobbler with 1 stick butter, 1 c. self-rising flour, 1 c. sugar, 1 c. milk, 2 c. sliced peaches, 1 tsp. vanilla flavor. Here's the instruction: Melt butter in shallow baking dish in oven. Remove from oven and add mixture of flour, sugar, milk and vanilla flavor. Drop peaches evenly in this mixture but do not stir. Bake at 350° for about 30 to 35 minutes until top is golden brown.

input_text: How to make Crockpot Beef Roll-Ups?
target_text: You can make Crockpot Beef Roll-Ups with 2 pounds beef, round steak, 1 1/2 pound bacon, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1 each onion soup mix, 2 cups water, 2 teaspoons cornstarch, 1/2 cup water. Here's the instruction: Cut round 1/2 inch thick. Trim separable fat and remove bone. Pound with meat mallet or saucer; slice into strips 1 inch wide and 4 inches long. Place bacon slices on steak strips and roll up, securing with small wooden picks. Brown roll-ups slowly in hot oil in large frying-pan. Remove roll-ups to crockpot. Add soup-mix and 2 cups of water to frying-pan and simmer 3 minutes, scraping particles from pan. Pour liquid over roll-ups. Cook until done. Remove roll-ups to warm serving dish. Combine cornstarch and 1/2 cup water, mixing until smooth. Add to liquid from crockpot and simmer, stirring constantly, 3 to 4 minutes or until thickened. Pour gravy over roll-ups; garnish with parsley and cherry tomatoes.

input_text: How to make Gluten-Free Bread For Celiacs?
target_text: You can make Gluten-Free Bread For Celiacs with 1 2/3 cups water, 3 large eggs, 3 tablespoons corn oil, 1 teaspoon vinegar, 1 1/2 cups corn flour, 1/2 cup skim milk powder, 1 cup tapioca flour, 1/2 cup flaxseed meal, 1/4 cup white rice flour, 3 tablespoons white sugar, 2 1/2 teaspoons xanthan gum, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast. Here's the instruction: Place water, eggs, corn oil, and vinegar in a bread machine. Pour corn flour, milk powder, tapioca flour, flaxseed meal, rice flour, sugar, xanthan gum, and salt into the bread machine and mix well. Make a well in the center with your fingers and add yeast. Run Whole Wheat cycle. Remove dough from the machine after the cycle is done, about 1 hour 45 minutes.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Angel Delight?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Angel Delight with 12 ounces chocolate chips, 2 tablespoons water, 3 eggs, separated, 1 pinch salt, 3 tablespoons sugar, 1 1/2 cups heavy cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 13 ounces angel food cake, fresh or stale (broken into bite-sized chunks), vanilla ice cream. Here's the instruction: Melt chocolate in water on top of double boiler; cool. Stir in yolks and salt. Beat egg whites until stiff; add sugar and stir into cooled chocolate mixture, blending well. Whip heavy cream; add vanilla; fold into chocolate mixture. Place chunks of angel food cake into 9x13x2" pan. Cover with chocolate mixture. Chill at least 6 hours before serving. Cut into squares and top with ice cream.

input_text: How to make Sugared Grapefruit Salad With Fennel And Mint?
target_text: You can make Sugared Grapefruit Salad With Fennel And Mint with 1/3 cup hazelnuts, 2 medium grapefruits, peeled and segmented (https://food52.com/blog...), 1 tablespoon granulated sugar, 3 cups baby arugula (about 3 1/2 oz), lightly packed, 20 mint leaves, torn, 1 medium fennel bulb, quartered, cored, and thinly sliced, 1 small shallot, finely chopped, 2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice, 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper. Here's the instruction: Add the hazelnuts to a small saute pan set over medium heat. Cook, shaking the pan often, until hazelnuts are lightly browned and fragrant, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool. Roughly chop and set aside. Place the grapefruit segments into a small bowl, sprinkle with sugar, and gently toss to coat. Add the arugula, mint leaves, fennel, shallot, sugared grapefruit segments, and toasted hazelnuts to a large, wide serving bowl. Drizzle salad with the lemon juice and olive oil, and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Gently toss to coat the salad with dressing. Taste and add more salt and pepper, if desired. Serve immediately.

input_text: How to make Upside-Down German Chocolate Cake?
target_text: You can make Upside-Down German Chocolate Cake with 1 pkg. Duncan Hines moist Deluxe Swiss chocolate cake mix, 1 1/2 c. flaked coconut, 1 1/2 c. chopped pecans, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened, 1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted, 1 lb. confectioners sugar (3 1/2 to 4 c.). Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°. Grease and flour 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan. Spread coconut evenly in bottom of pan. Sprinkle with pecans.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Sauce?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Sauce with 1 c. whipping cream, 2 1/2 c. semi-sweet chocolate morsels, 1/4 c. butter or margarine, 2 Tbsp. sugar, 1 tsp. vanilla extract. Here's the instruction: Place whipping cream in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Remove from heat and add chocolate morsels and remaining ingredients. Stir until chocolate melts and mixture is smooth. Cover and refrigerate.

input_text: How to make "Quick And Easy" Chicken Teriyaki(Serves 4)  ?
target_text: You can make "Quick And Easy" Chicken Teriyaki(Serves 4)   with 4 chicken breasts (boneless), beaten flat, McCormick teriyaki sauce blend. Here's the instruction: Rinse chicken; pat dry. Spray a nonstick pan with Pam. Brown chicken on both sides (about 6 minutes on each side). Mix teriyaki sauce blend. Pour over chicken; cook on low until chicken is tender.

input_text: How to make Supreme Cheesecake?
target_text: You can make Supreme Cheesecake with 1 c. flour, 1/4 c. sugar, 1 tsp. grated lemon peel, 1/2 c. margarine, 1 beaten egg yolk, 1/4 tsp. vanilla, 5 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, 3/4 tsp. grated lemon peel, 1/4 tsp. vanilla, 1 3/4 c. sugar, 3 Tbsp. flour, 1/4 tsp. salt, 5 eggs, 2 egg yolks, 1/4 c. whipping cream. Here's the instruction: For crust, combine 1 cup flour, 1/4 cup sugar and 1 teaspoon lemon peel. Cut in butter until crumbly. Add 1 beaten egg yolk and 1/4 teaspoon vanilla; mix well. Pat 1/2 of dough on bottom of 9-inch spring-form pan (sides removed). Bake at 400° for 10 minutes. Cool. Butter sides of pan; attach to bottom. Pat remaining dough around side of pan.

input_text: How to make Green Beans Almondine?
target_text: You can make Green Beans Almondine with 1/3 c. slivered or shaved almonds, 4 Tbsp. butter or margarine, 1 1/2 lb. fresh green beans, halved, 1/3 c. water, 1 tsp. lemon juice, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. pepper. Here's the instruction: Combine almonds and butter in a 2-cup glass measure. Microwave, uncovered, at power level High for 4 to 6 minutes, or until almonds are lightly toasted. Set aside.

input_text: How to make Pasta E Fagioli?
target_text: You can make Pasta E Fagioli with 1 lb dried great northern beans, 12 cup olive oil, 3 cups chopped yellow onions, 14 cup minced garlic, 8 -10 cups chicken stock, 3 (14 1/2 ounce) cans diced tomatoes, undrained, 14 lb spaghetti or 14 lb linguine, cooked al dente and cut into 1 inch pieces, 14 lb penne, cooked al dente and cut in half, 14 lb fusilli or 14 lb rotini pasta, cooked al dente and cut in half, 1 12 teaspoons dried Italian seasoning, 1 12 teaspoons salt, 12 teaspoon black pepper. Here's the instruction: Place the beans in a pot with cold water to cover by at least 2 inches. Soak for a minimum of 14 hours. Drain the beans. Heat the oil in a large heavy pot over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and reduce heat to medium low. Cook until the onion is tender, about 10 minutes. Add 8 cups of the chicken stock, the tomatoes, and beans and raise heat to high. Cover and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, stirring occasionally, about 2 1/2 hours, or until the beans are very tender. Working in batches (about 1 cup at a time) puree 6 cups of the soup in a blender until smooth. Mix the puree back into the soup pot. Stir in the cooked pasta, italian seasoning, salt and pepper. Cook 10 minutes more over medium low heat. Add more chicken stock if neccessary, but keep in mind soup should be thick. Serve garnished with romano cheese if desired.

input_text: How to make Vegetarian Wet Burrito Bake?

Wesson oil, 2 eggs, 1/2 c. buttermilk, 1 tsp. baking soda, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Combine margarine, cocoa, water and oil. Bring to a boil. Add this to the flour and sugar. input_text: How to make Easy Chocolate Pie?

input_text: How to make Chocolate Banana Pavlovas?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Banana Pavlovas with 3 egg whites, 34 cup caster sugar, 1 tablespoon cocoa powder, 220 g extra light cream cheese, 13 cup thickened light cream, 1 tablespoon icing sugar, 2 small bananas, sliced thinly, 13 cup caster sugar, extra, 2 tablespoons water. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to very slow (120C/100F fan forced). Grease an oven tray. Trace four 10cm circles onto baking powder; place the paper, marked side down on a tray. Beat the egg whites in a small bowl with an electric mixer until soft peaks form; gradually add the sugar, beating between each addition; then gently fold in the cocoa. Once you have prepared the meringue mixture, it is essential that you bake it immediately, otherwise it is prone to collapsing. Spread the meringue mixture inside the circles on the prepared tray, and bake in the oven for about 45 minutes or until the meringues are firm; cool the meringues in the oven with the door ajar. Meanwhile whisk the cream cheese, cream and sifted icing sugar in a small bowl, until combined. Top the meringues with the cream cheese mixture and banana slices. Combine the extra sugar and the water in a small, heavy-based pan and stir over a low heat, without boiling, until the sugar dissolves, then bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer, uncovered, without stirring, until the mixture is golden brown. Remove from the heat; and stand until the bubbles subside and the toffee runs evenly from the back of a spoon. Drizzle the meringues with the toffee close to serving.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Dotted Cake(Children Love This Cake.)  ?

input_text: How to make Great Grilled Chicken Breasts?
target_text: You can make Great Grilled Chicken Breasts with 8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves (about 3 1/2 pounds; see Notes), 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 2 teaspoons garlic powder, 2 teaspoons onion powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper. Here's the instruction: Place the chicken breast halves in a 2-gallon zipper-top plastic bag. Combine the remaining ingredients in a small mixing bowl and whisk to mix well. Pour the mixture into the plastic bag, seal it tightly, and shake to coat the chicken well. Refrigerate the bag, positioned so that the breasts are in a single layer, for 15 minutes or up to 8 hours. When you are ready to cook the chicken breasts, turn a gas grill to medium-high. Place the chicken breasts on the hot grill, close the lid, and grill until lightly browned, 6 to 7 minutes. Turn the chicken over, re-cover the grill, and grill until the breasts are cooked through, 5 to 7 minutes more. Serve at once or allow the chicken to cool until you can handle it safely, then cut it into bite-size chunks for future use.

input_text: How to make Chicken Yakatori Skewers ?

input_text: How to make Mediterranean Lentil Salad?

input_text: How to make Chili Con Carne?

input_text: How to make Easy Chicken Cacciatora Recipe?

Here's the instruction: Brown chicken in extra virgin olive oil with clove of garlic. Before turning chicken, sprinkle with oregano, salt and pepper. Remove garlic. Add in mushrooms; brown lightly. Serves 4 to 5.

input_text: How to make Polpettone With Onion-Shallot Jam Over Creamy Root Vegetable Purée?
target_text: You can make Polpettone With Onion-Shallot Jam Over Creamy Root Vegetable Purée with Onion-Shallot Jam and Creamy Root Vegetable Puree, Good olive oil to generously film pan, 2 yellow onions, peeled, fine dice, 4 shallots, peeled, fine dice, 4 ounces white wine, Sea or kosher salt to taste, 2 large parsnips, peeled, diced, 4 carrots, peeled, diced, 3" piece fresh horseradish, peeled, diced, 1 quart Heavy cream, Sea or kosher salt and white pepper to taste, Polpettone and Filling, 1/2 cup sun dried tomatoes, rehydrated and drained, 8 ounces fresh mozzarella, 1/2" dice, 3" piece fresh horseradish, peeled, fine dice, Juice of 1 lemon (not Meyer - too sweet) & zest of 1/2 of it, Sea or kosher salt and pepper to taste, 2 pounds ground turkey, 1/2 cup Panko, preferably fine, unseasoned, 1 large egg, 1 teaspoon sea or kosher salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon dried oregano or 2 teaspoons fresh, chopped, 2 cups Panko, Green garnish of your choice. Here's the instruction: Prepare onion jam. Generously film bottom of a heavy-bottomed pan or skillet with some good olive oil over medium heat. When warm, add onions and shallots along with a couple of good pinches of salt. Cover pan, and when contents begin cooking nicely, reduce heat. Continue cooking, stirring often (if some bits brown, that's fine, just not too much). When it looks as if much of the water has been cooked away, stir in the white wine. Cook until a sweetly rich, silky concentration is reached. Remove from heat. You'll reheat just before serving. Alternatively, make twice as much. Store the extra in a container in your refrigerator. Add it to soups, salad dressings, omelettes, grilled cheese sandwiches, or anything you think could benefit from some sweet silken richness. While jam is reducing, begin cooking the root vegetables. Add cream to a heavy-bottomed stainless steel pot (aluminum will react badly with the lactic acid in the cream causing an off-taste and gray color). Add the vegetables, cover pot and begin heating over medium heat. Bring to a gentle simmer, then reduce heat a bit. Cook, stirring somewhat often, until vegetables can be VERY easily pierced with the tip of a sharp knife. Remove from heat. You will reheat, puree, and season just before serving. It's much easier to reheat in the rough state. Prepare filling to set aside and permit flavors to blend. Place rehydrated sun-dried tomatoes, diced mozzarella, horseradish, lemon juice and zest in bowl of food processor. Pulse just until ingredients are relatively uniform in size - very small, but not a pureed paste. Scoop into a bowl and season to taste with salt and pepper. Mix polpettone. Place ground turkey, Panko, egg, salt & pepper, and oregano in a mixing bowl. If you've got gloves, use 'em. Mix ingredients with your hands until completely blended. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment. Shape and fill polpettone. Again wearing gloves, pick up a sort of small tennis-ball size of turkey mixture. Gently shape it into a ball. Press a large indentation into it with a thumb. With a spoon, scoop a generous amount of filling into it. Pinch it closed, then gently roll the polpettone between your palms to create a small football. Set on parchment. Repeat until all turkey mixture is gone. If you have filling left over, because not all of us visualize the same small-tennis-ball size, and "generous" can have different meanings, do not despair. Put it in a ziplock bag and freeze it. Use it in ravioli filling, in omelettes - you get my drift. Before baking, pour 2 cups Panko into a baking dish. Gently pick up each polpettone. Place in Panko, and with your hands gather it up around sides and end of polpettone. Turn it over and repeat on other side. Repeat until all polpettone have been coated. Bake polpettone until gently browned and and instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads 165 degrees, about 20 minutes. While polpettone are baking, reheat root vegetables. When nicely hot, remove from heat and puree right in the pot with an immersion blender (if you don't have one, this would be an excellent reason to get one - and I don't take on new appliances quickly). Season to taste with salt and pepper. It should take your breath away, by the way. Also reheat the lovely onion-shallot jam. To serve, spread a puddle of the root vegetable puree in the center of each plate. Set two polpettone in it and top with the onion-shallot jam. Garnish with green of your choice - chopped fennel fronds, Italian parsley, basil chiffonade. Have a lovely dinner!

input_text: How to make Light Pineapple Pudding?

Whisk in yogurt. Spoon into serving dishes and chill until serving time (needs only 30 minutes at the most in the fridge before they're ready to eat). These look particularly attractive when garnished with a few fresh berries-- try blueberries or raspberries. If taking to a potluck, don't spoon it into individual dishes but rather leave it in the bowl.

input_text: How to make Crescent Rolls ?
target_text: You can make Crescent Rolls  with 3/4 C. milk, 1/2 C. sugar, 1/2 C. shortening, 1 t. salt, 2 eggs, 1/2 C. warm water, 2 pkg. yeast, pinch of brown sugar, 4 C. flour, butter, room temp.. Here's the instruction: In a medium saucepan, scald milk. Turn heat to low, add sugar, shortening and salt. Mix until shortening is melted. Remove from heat and cool. In small bowl, beat 2 eggs, set aside. In another small bowl, add yeast to warm water with pinch of brown sugar, set aside to rise. Pour milk mixture into mixing bowl. Add 1-1/2 C. flour. Blend with mixer for 30 sec. Add eggs and blend. Add yeast mix and blend. Add 1 C. flour and beat with mixer. Remove bowl from mix stand. Add 1 C. flour and blend manually. Turn onto pastry cloth and knead in 1-2 - 3/4 C. flour until slightly sticky. Knead 5-7 minutes. Set aside in greased bowl in warm area, cover and let rise 1 hour. Punch dough and separate into 2 equal portions. Using a rolling pin, form each into a pie round, quite thick (1/2") Brush thin layer of butter over entire surface. Cut into 8 or 12 wedges with pizza cutter. Roll into crescent shape from outside toward the point. Lay on an ungreased baking sheet with point underneath. Let rise 1 hour or until double in size. Bake at 375 deg. - 10 minutes or until golden.

input_text: How to make Broccoli And Cauliflower Salad?

input_text: How to make Cream Cheese And Shrimp Stuffed Chicken Breast ?
target_text: You can make Cream Cheese And Shrimp Stuffed Chicken Breast  with 4 - OUNCES PEELED AND DEVAINED SHRIMP (ROUGH CHOP) 2 - 4 OUNCE BONELESS SKINLESS CHICKEN BREAST 4 SLICES TURKEY BACON 1 - SMALL RED ONION (MINCED) 2 - TBSP. CHOPPED GARLIC 1 - SMALL RED ONION (MINCED) 1 - RED PEPPER 1/8 INCH DICE 1 - SMALL JALEPENO DE-SEEDED AND (MINCED) 1 - TBSP. CHOPPED PARSLEY 8 - OUNCES SOFTENED LOW FAT CREAM CHEESE 3/4 - tsp. KOSHER SALT 1/4 - tsp. COURSE GROUND BLACK PEPPER, Read More http://www.epicurious.com/community/memberrecipes/submitarecipe#ixzz0p80uZqVs. Here's the instruction: COMBINE THE ONION, GARLIC, RED PEPPER, JALEPENO,PARSLEY, SALT AND PEPPER AND MIX WELL. ADD SHRIMP AND FOLD INTO CREAM CHEESE MIXSTURE.  WASH THE CHICKEN BREASTS UNDER COLD WATER ANDE PAT DRY WITH A PAPPER TOWEL. PLACE A BREAST ON A CLEAN CUTTING BOARD WITH THE SMALL END OF THE CHICKEN BREAST FACING YOU. PLACE YOUR LEFT HAND ON TOP OF THE BREAST AND CUT 3/4 THE WAY THROUGH THE BREASTGOING AT A SLIGHT ANGEL DOWN .(NOTE NOT YOUR HAND) OPEN UP THE BREAST LIKE A BOOK ON THE CUTTING BOARD AND PLACE A PIECE OF PLASTIC WRAP OVER IT. THEN TAKE A MEAT TENDERIZING HAMMER WITTH A FLAT SIDE AND FLATTEN THE CHICKEN BREAST TO EQUAL THICKENESS. REPEAT WITH OTHER BREAST.  PLACE BREAST ON THE CUTTING BOARD AND PLACE HALF THE CREAM CHEESE MIXTURE ON ONE SIDE AND FOLD OVER. TAKE TWO SLICES OF TURKEY BACON AND WRAP EACH ONE. PLACE ON A LIGHTLY OILED COOKIE SHEET AND BAKE AT 350' FOR 35 TO 40 MINUTES OR UNTIL TEMPETURE REACHES 165'.

input_text: How to make Baked Thai Chicken Rice?

input_text: How to make Kara'S Super Eggnog?

input_text: How to make Vegetable Jambalaya?
target_text: You can make Vegetable Jambalaya with 3 Tbsp. canola oil, 1 c. diced onion, 2 large cloves garlic, minced, 3/4 c. diced celery, 1/2 c. diced carrot, 1 tsp. thyme, 2 tsp. paprika, 1/2 tsp. salt, pinch of cayenne pepper, 1 bay leaf, 1 green bell pepper, 1 red bell pepper, cut up, 1 can beans (black, pinto, black-eyed, any kind), 1 can chopped plum tomatoes, 3 1/4 c. defatted vegetable juice, 2 medium sized zucchini (1/2-inch), 2 Tbsp. chopped parsley. Add bell peppers, beans, tomatoes with juice and vegetable broth. (I used dried vegetable broth or water.) Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook, partially covered, for 10 minutes. One-half hour before serving, add zucchini and/or other leftover veggies and bring to a boil. Stir in rice, cover and heat on low heat for 20 minutes only. Add parsley and serve. (I added some salsa to taste for an extra zing.)

input_text: How to make Chipotle Mushrooms?

Here's the instruction: Wipe the mushrooms gently, using paper towels (don't just rinse them, because they'll suck up a lot of water). Heat the oil in a frying pan and add everything but the salt, stirring to make sure everything gets well coated in the oil. Fry for about 7 or 8 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the mushrooms and onions are tender. Season to taste with the salt and you're ready to serve! Note: Fresh cilantro makes a great garnish for this dish, as it could use a little color.

input_text: How to make Saffron Ice Cream?
target_text: You can make Saffron Ice Cream with 1/2 cup (125 ml) whole milk, 1 cup (250 ml) heavy cream, 1/2 cup (100 g) sugar, Scant 1/2 teaspoon saffron threads, 3 large egg yolks. Here's the instruction: Warm the milk, cream, and sugar in a small saucepan. Remove from the heat and add the saffron. Pour into a small bowl and steep in the refrigerator for 4 hours. Strain the saffron-infused mixture into a medium saucepan. Rescue the threads of saffron and put them in a medium bowl. Set the strainer over the top. Rewarm the saffron-infused mixture. In a separate medium bowl, whisk together the egg yolks. Slowly pour the warm saffron mixture into the egg yolks, whisking constantly, then scrape the warmed egg yolks back into the saucepan. Stir the mixture constantly over medium heat with a heatproof spatula, scraping the bottom as you stir, until the mixture thickens and coats the spatula. Pour the custard through the strainer and stir to incorporate the saffron threads. Stir until cool over an ice bath. Chill the mixture thoroughly in the refrigerator, then freeze it in your ice cream maker according to the manufacturers instructions. Be sure to scrape off any saffron threads stuck to the dasher and stir them back into the frozen ice cream. To make SaffronPine Nut Ice Cream, add 1/4 cup toasted pine nuts (see page 13) to the ice cream during the last 5 minutes of churning. Serve Saffron Ice Cream with Vanilla-Poached Quince. To poach the quince, for 6 to 8 servings you need to start out with 3 quinces (2 pounds, 1 kg). Peel and quarter the quinces, then remove the seeds and cores with a melon baller. In a nonreactive saucepan, heat 1 1/2 cups (300 g) sugar, 4 cups (1 liter) water, and 1 vanilla bean, split lengthwise. While the syrup is heating, cut the quinces into 1-inch (3-cm) slices. Add the quince slices to the syrup, cover with a round of parchment paper, and cook at a gentle simmer for about 1 1/2 hours, or until the quince slices are rosy and tender. Let cool to room temperature, then serve the quince slices with a scoop of Saffron Ice Cream and some of the delicious poaching liquid, which can be reduced to a thick syrup before serving.

Here's the instruction: in pan with oil brown chicken both side add all ingredient except leek ,bring it to a boil reduce to simmer and cover with lid for 10 minute add sake and leek and cover and cook for another 5 minute serve hot

input_text: How to make Shrimp Dip?
target_text: You can make Shrimp Dip with 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese, 2 chopped green onions, dash of Worcestershire sauce, 2 Tbsp. lemon juice, 2 small cans shrimp, dash of Tabasco sauce, mayonnaise. Here's the instruction: Mix first 6 ingredients and then add mayonnaise to taste.

input_text: How to make Meat Balls?
target_text: You can make Meat Balls with 2 lb. ground beef, 3 eggs, 1 c. bread crumbs, 1 pkg. Lipton onion soup, 1 bottle chili sauce, 1 bottle water (I use chili sauce bottle), 1/2 c. brown sugar, 1 can cranberry sauce, 1 c. well-drained sauerkraut. Here's the instruction: Mix first 4 ingredients together. Make into balls. (I use No. 24 dipper.) Put into 9 x 13-inch pan. Mix rest of ingredients together, then simmer on top of stove. Then pour over meat balls. Bake at 325° for 1 hour. Do not cover while baking.

input_text: How to make Sandie’S Chocolate Chippers?
target_text: You can make Sandie’S Chocolate Chippers with 2 cups Shortening And/Or Butter (Sometimes I Use Half Of Each), 2 cups Sugar, 1 cup Brown Sugar (lightly Packed), 4 whole Eggs, 4 teaspoons Vanilla, 4-1/2 cups Flour (or More If Texture Isn't Quite Right, Should Be Thick!), 2 teaspoons Salt, 12 ounces, weight Chocolate Chips Or Chunks. Here's the instruction: Note: This makes a lot of cookies! It makes somewhere around 5 dozen. I usually freeze the dough that I don't use or halve the recipe. Cream shortening, sugars, eggs, and vanilla until light and fluffy. Stir dry ingredients into the creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate chips. Bake at 375°F for 8 minutes. Start the first sheet on the bottom shelf, cook for 4 minutes. Move to the top shelf and add the second sheet. Cook for 4 minutes. Keep it up until all the cookies are baked. Let cookies cool on the sheet for 1-2 minutes, then remove to a cooling rack. Makes 5 to 6 dozen cookies, so you better be hungry or have at least have some boys around that are hungry.

input_text: How to make Chicken And Rice Casserole?
target_text: You can make Chicken And Rice Casserole with 1 can uncooked Minute rice, 1 can cream of celery soup, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1 soup can water, 1 qt. cooked chicken, cut up, 2 Tbsp. butter, salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients, put in casserole dish and bake at 300° for 1 hour.

input_text: How to make Milky Way Cake?
target_text: You can make Milky Way Cake with 6 Milky Way bars, 2 c. sugar, 1 c. butter, 2 1/2 c. sifted flour, 1 1/4 c. buttermilk, 4 eggs, 1/2 tsp. baking soda, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Melt candy with 1/2 cup butter. Cream remaining butter with sugar. Add eggs, one at a time, and mix well. Alternately add flour, baking soda mixture and buttermilk. Add vanilla and candy. Bake 1 hour and 20 minutes at 350° in greased and floured tube pan.

input_text: How to make Pepper, Olive & Cheese Spread?
target_text: You can make Pepper, Olive & Cheese Spread with 5 (3/4-ounce) slices Land O Lakes Deli Provolone Cheese, 1/2 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, 1 (8-ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley, rosemary and/or thyme leaves, 1/2 teaspoon coarse ground pepper, 1/3 cup roasted red bell pepper pasta or spaghetti sauce, 1/3 cup chopped pitted kalamata olives, Chopped parsley, if desired, Fresh rosemary sprigs, if desired, Crackers or crusty bread slices. Here's the instruction: Cut cheese slices into strips. Combine cheese strips, Parmesan cheese, cream cheese, herbs and pepper in large bowl until smooth. Spread cheese mixture into 6-inch circle on 9-inch serving plate. Cover; refrigerate until serving time. Just before serving, spread pasta sauce over cheese mixture, leaving 1/2-inch around edge. Top with chopped olives. Garnish with parsley and rosemary, if desired. Serve with crusty bread or crackers.

input_text: How to make Basmati Rice, Microwave Method for Cooking?
target_text: You can make Basmati Rice, Microwave Method for Cooking with 2 cups unrinsed Basmati rice, 3 cups cold water. Here's the instruction: Put basmati and cold water in a 3-quart microwave-safe dish and cook on high, uncovered, 15 minutes, or until steam holes appear in rice. Cover dish and cook on high 5 more minutes. Let rice stand, covered, 5 minutes and fluff with a fork. You'll note that using the microwave shaves only five minutes off the traditional stove-top method, but faster is not the issue here. Better is.

input_text: How to make Peppered Hamburger Meat?
target_text: You can make Peppered Hamburger Meat with 2 lb. hamburger meat, 1/4 c. oatmeal, 2 tsp. garlic salt or powder, 1 tsp. salt, 2 c. chopped onion, 2 cans stewed tomatoes, 3 Tbsp. soy sauce, 5 tsp. sugar, 5 tsp. cornstarch, 1/4 c. water, 2 bell peppers. Here's the instruction: Mix hamburger, oatmeal, garlic and salt; make into meatballs and brown. Add onion, tomatoes, soy sauce, sugar, water and cornstarch; simmer for 15 minutes. Add diced bell pepper; cook 10 minutes. (Bell peppers should be crisp.) Serve over rice or noodles.

input_text: How to make Creamy Chicken Soup?
target_text: You can make Creamy Chicken Soup with 500 ml chicken stock, 2 chopped onions, 2 large cubed potatoes, 375 ml milk, 12-1 cup cooked chicken, 3 tablespoons butter, 4 chopped carrots, 3 tablespoons flour, 2 tablespoons chopped parsley, salt, pepper. Here's the instruction: Melt butter. Saute onions, carrots and potatoes. Add flour and mix. Blend in stock. Bring to the boil and simmer covered for 45 minutes. Liquidise and add milk, chicken and seasoning. Bring to the boil and simmer for 5 minutes. Add parsley before serving.

input_text: How to make Sweet Potato Pie?
target_text: You can make Sweet Potato Pie with 2 large eggs ( beaten ), 1 1/2 stick melted butter, 2 cup evaporated milk, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 1 tsp lemon extract, 2 1/3 cup sugar, 2 1/3 cup brown sugar, 1/3 ground cinnamon, 1/3 ground nutmeg, pinch allspice, 6 Sweet Potato. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 Mix/Blend and Combine all the ingredients until it's smooth. Pour mixture into a 9" Pie Shell. Place them on a cookie sheet pan. Set your timer

input_text: How to make Double Cheese Hamburger Pie?
target_text: You can make Double Cheese Hamburger Pie with 1 lb. ground beef, 6 to 8 potatoes, sliced, 1/2 stick butter, 1 1/2 to 2 c. cheese, 1 can crescent rolls, salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: Cook potatoes and butter in oven at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes until brown. Brown ground beef. Salt and pepper ground beef and potatoes. Sprinkle half the cheese (shredded) over the potatoes. Sprinkle ground beef over cheese. Add remainder of the cheese and stretch crescent rolls over the top. Bake according to crescent roll directions until brown.

input_text: How to make Sunshine Punch?
target_text: You can make Sunshine Punch with 4 c. sugar, 6 c. water, 2 large cans frozen orange juice, 1 small can frozen lemon juice, 1 (46 oz.) can unsweetened pineapple juice, 5 crushed bananas. Serve kind of icy (punch will be yellow).

input_text: How to make Moist And Crispy Chicken?
