target_text: You can make Mexican Rice Meal with 1 2/3 c. water, 1 c. long grain rice, 1 Tbsp. olive oil, 1 medium onion, chopped, 1 c. leftover cooked chicken (in pieces), 1 (16 oz.) can drained kidney beans, 1/4 c. sliced olives (black or green), 1/4 c. frozen peas, 1/4 c. frozen corn, 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce, 1 Tbsp. chili powder, 1/2 tsp. garlic powder, 1 tsp. seasoned salt, 1/2 tsp. black pepper, pinch of oregano. Here's the instruction: Brown rice, onion and chicken with olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat about 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Add 1 2/3 cups water, kidney beans, olives, peas and corn. At the simmering point, add tomato sauce and spices. Stir well and simmer again to almost a boil. Cover pan and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand for 15 to 20 minutes more. Do not open lid until ready to serve or rice will be sticky. Garnish with grated cheese, sour cream and salsa. Serve with hot tortillas. Serves 4.

input_text: How to make All Soul'S Day Cookies?
target_text: You can make All Soul'S Day Cookies with 1/4 cup butter, room temperature, 1 cup sugar, 1 egg, 1 teaspoon grated orange zest, 1/4 cup orange juice, 3 tablespoons honey, 2 1/4 cups flour, 1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg, 1 pinch salt, 1/2 cup raisins, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts, confectioners' sugar (to garnish). Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease 2 baking sheets. In a large bowl, combine the butter and sugar until well blended. Beat in the egg, orange zest, orange juice, and honey. Add the flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt. Stir until well blended. Stir in the raisin and walnuts. Break off a piece of the dough about the size of a walnut. Shape the dough into a 2-1/2 inch sausage. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Press to slightly flatten the dough. Repeat with the remaining dough. Place the cookies about 2 inches apart. Bake for 12 minutes, or until the cookies are puffed and set. Remove from oven and allow to cool on baking sheet for 1 minutes. Transfer the cookies to a wire rack to cook completely. Dust the cookies with confectioners' sugar. Store in airtight containers. The cookies develop more flavor the longer they are stored.

input_text: How to make Caramel-Apple Cheesecake Parfait?
target_text: You can make Caramel-Apple Cheesecake Parfait with 1/3 cup canola oil, 2 qt. Granny Smith apples, small dice, 1 cup caramel ice cream topping, 4 tsp. ground cinnamon, 2 qt. PHILADELPHIA Cheesecake Batter. Here's the instruction: Heat oil in a saute pan on medium heat. Add apples; cook until lightly caramelized. Drain on paper towels; cool. Combine apples, caramel and cinnamon. Spoon Cheesecake Batter into pastry bag fitted with large plain tip. Pipe 4 oz. into each serving glass or small mason jar. Top with 1/2 cup apple mixture.

input_text: How to make Strawberry Angel Food Cake?
target_text: You can make Strawberry Angel Food Cake with 1 sponge or angel food cake, 1 small pkg. strawberry Jell-O, 1 small instant vanilla pudding, 1 (16 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained, 1 large Cool Whip. Here's the instruction: Crumble cake and put in an oblong dish. Pour dry Jell-O over cake. Pour mixed pudding over Jell-O. Add drained pineapple over all. Top with Cool Whip. Add fresh strawberries on top if you wish.

input_text: How to make Spaghetti Salad?
target_text: You can make Spaghetti Salad with 1 c. cooked spaghetti, 1/2 c. shredded cheese, 1/2 c. celery, 1/2 c. green or red pepper, 1/2 c. chopped tomatoes, 1/2 c. sliced ???, 1/2 c. onion. Here's the instruction: Pour 8 ounce bottle of Zesty Italian dressing over all. Let stand for 2 hours, then serve.

input_text: How to make Chicken, Cheese, And Wine?
target_text: You can make Chicken, Cheese, And Wine with 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup, 1 (6 ounce) can mushrooms, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon curry powder, salt and ground black pepper to taste, 1 cup white wine, 2 cups shredded old Cheddar cheese, 1/2 teaspoon paprika. Here's the instruction: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Layer the chicken breast halves into the bottom of a baking dish. Stir the cream of mushroom soup, mushrooms, garlic, curry powder, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl until mixed. Add the white wine to the soup mixture and stir until smooth; pour over the chicken breast halves. Sprinkle the Cheddar cheese and paprika over the mixture. Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 90 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of a chicken breast should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).

input_text: How to make Batter For Chicken Or Shrimp?
target_text: You can make Batter For Chicken Or Shrimp with 1 c. buttermilk, 1 tsp. baking powder, 1 Tbsp. sugar, 1/2 tsp. soda. Here's the instruction: Mix dry ingredients first. Add milk; mix well. Dip in flour, then batter, then flour. Fry in deep fat. Batter is for chicken or shrimp.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Chip Cupcakes?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Chip Cupcakes with 1/2 cup margarine, softened, 6 tablespoons sugar, 6 tablespoons brown sugar, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, 1 egg, 1 cup flour, plus, 2 tablespoons flour, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, Topping, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1 egg, 1/2 cup brown sugar, packed, 1 (6 ounce) package chocolate chips, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts (optional), 1 teaspoon vanilla. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 375°F. Cream margarine, sugars, and vanilla; beat in egg. Sift and stir in flour, baking powder, and salt. Spoon into 12 well-greased or paper-lined muffin cups. Bake for 10-12 minutes; remove from oven. For topping: combine in small bowl salt, egg, and brown sugar. Stir in chocolate chips, nuts, and vanilla. Spoon over hot cupcakes. Return to oven and bake for 12 minutes or until golden brown. Immediately remove from muffin pan and cool on a wire rack.

input_text: How to make Movie Theater Floor?
target_text: You can make Movie Theater Floor with 4 cups popped popcorn, 1/2 (10.5 ounce) bag corn chips (such as Fritos(R)), 1/2 (14 ounce) package candy corn, 1 (10 ounce) can mixed nuts, 1 cup jelly beans or other small candies, or as desired, 1 (12 ounce) package white chocolate chips. Here's the instruction: Mix popcorn, corn chips, candy corn, mixed nuts, and jelly beans together in a large bowl. In a microwave-safe glass bowl, melt the white chocolate chips on Low setting until barely melted, 1 or 2 minutes. Stir until smooth. Pour the white chocolate over the popcorn mixture, and stir to coat. Allow to cool, and break apart into small pieces.

input_text: How to make Sartu di Riso?
target_text: You can make Sartu di Riso with 1 pound Arborio rice (2 1/3 cups), 4 cups low-sodium chicken broth, 1 3/4 teaspoons kosher salt, 1 dried bay leaf, 3 cups freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano, 4 large eggs, at room temperature, 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 8 ounces sweet Italian sausage or sweet Italian turkey sausage, 1 clove garlic, chopped, 1 shallot, sliced, 2 sprigs basil, One 2-inch piece Parmigiano-Reggiano rind, One 28-ounce can crushed tomatoes, 3 tablespoons whole milk, at room temperature, 7 tablespoons fine breadcrumbs, 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, 8 ounces ground sirloin or ground dark turkey meat, Olive oil, for frying, 1 1/2 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature, 1 cup frozen peas, thawed, One 8-ounce ball fresh mozzarella, diced. Here's the instruction: In a large saucepan combine the rice, chicken broth, 1 1/4 teaspoons of the salt and the bay leaf. Stir and bring to a boil over high heat. Cover the pan with a tight-fitting lid, reduce the heat to low and simmer, stirring once, until the rice is still slightly undercooked but the liquid is absorbed, 8 minutes. Pour the rice into a large bowl and cool to room temperature, stirring occasionally. Stir in 2 1/2 cups of the cheese and 3 of the eggs until well combined, and set aside. Meanwhile, heat the extra-virgin olive oil in a medium nonreactive saucepan over medium-high heat. Remove the sausage from the casing and break into small, bite-size pieces. Add the sausage to the hot oil and cook until browned, breaking it up with the back of a wooden spoon as it cooks. Using a slotted spoon, remove the sausage to a medium bowl and set aside. Reduce the heat to medium and add the garlic, shallots and 1/4 teaspoon of the salt. Cook, stirring constantly until fragrant and the shallots are soft, 1 minute. Add the basil, cheese rind and tomatoes, and bring to a simmer. Reduce the heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally with a wooden spoon for 15 to 20 minutes. Remove the basil and cheese rind. Add 2 cups of the sauce to the reserved sausage and set aside. Meanwhile, in a separate medium bowl, mix together 2 tablespoons of the breadcrumbs, the milk and the remaining egg with a fork and let the mixture sit for 5 minutes to thicken. Stir in the oregano, the remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt and the remaining 1/2 cup cheese. Using your hands, mix in the beef, until just combined. Heat 1/2-inch of olive oil in a medium straight-sided pan. Scoop 1-tablespoon mounds of the mixture into damp hands and roll into uniform balls. When the oil is hot, fry the balls in 2 batches, turning them as needed with a slotted spoon to brown the balls evenly, about 4 minutes. When golden brown and crispy all around, remove the balls using a slotted spoon to the bowl with the sausage and sauce. Continue with the remaining balls, and then toss to coat evenly in the sauce. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Using 1 tablespoon of the butter, grease the inside of a Bundt pan or a 3 1/2-quart Dutch oven, making sure to coat it very well. Dust the inside of the pan with 3 tablespoons of the breadcrumbs. Make sure it is evenly coated and there are no bald spots. This is very important to prevent sticking. Add the peas and diced mozzarella to the meat and sauce, and toss gently to incorporate. Spoon two-thirds of the rice mixture into the prepared bundt pan. Using damp hands, press the rice evenly over the bottom of the pan and 2 1/2-inches up the sides and middle of the pan. Spoon the meat filling into the well of rice and press gently to make sure it is evenly packed. Spoon the remaining rice over the filling and, using damp hands, press the rice evenly over the filling, being sure to press the rice on top into the rice along the edges to seal. Sprinkle evenly with the remaining 2 tablespoons breadcrumbs and dot with the remaining 1/2 tablespoon butter. Bake until lightly browned on top, 45 minutes. Cool for 15 minutes. Place a plate large enough to cover the top of the pan over the pan. Using heat-resistant pads or a towel, invert the sartu onto the plate. Carefully lift the pan off of the rice, shaking gently if needed. Warm the remaining sauce and fill the opening in the middle of the molded rice with the sauce to serve.

input_text: How to make Kohlrabi Salad With Lemon Vinaigrette?
target_text: You can make Kohlrabi Salad With Lemon Vinaigrette with 1 whole Kohlrabi, 1 whole Lemon, Juiced, 1/4 cups Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Sea Salt, to taste, Cracked Pepper To Taste. Here's the instruction: Cut off stalks and leaves from kohlrabi. Using a mandoline or sharp knife, very thinly slice the kohlrabi. Arrange on a serving dish. In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice and olive oil. Drizzle dressing over kohlrabi and sprinkle salad with sea salt and cracked pepper, to taste. Serve cold or at room temperature.

input_text: How to make chicken spaghetti?
target_text: You can make chicken spaghetti with 1 large Green Pepper, 1 large yellow pepper, 1 large red pepper, 1 large carrot, 1 small cabbage, 1 can sweet corn, 1 can sliced mushroom, 1 box coloured spaghetti, 3 medium boneless chicken pieces, 1 pinch salt, 1 pinch black pepper, 10 ml soy sauce, 10 ml vegetable cooking oil. Here's the instruction: turn on the stove, put the oil in the pan and wait for it to get hot start frying the onion add the can of mushroom and sweetcorn after that you will add all the green,yellow & red pepper add your sliced boneless chicken, season it with salt, black pepper & soy sauce continue stiring until you see your chicken is cooked then add the cabbage and then leave it for like 8min finally you add your already boiled spaghetti N.B- if you are a fun of spicy food u can add fresh chillies N.B the chicken can be replaced with beef/tuna fish or can cooked with neither if your a vegitarian

input_text: How to make Creamy Crab And Shrimp Wontons?
target_text: You can make Creamy Crab And Shrimp Wontons with 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, 3 green onions, chopped very fine, 1/4 cup seasoned bread crumbs, crushed fine, 1 cup imitation crabmeat, chopped fine, 24 large shrimp, peeled,deveined and cooked., salt (I omit), pepper (I omit), 24 square wonton wrappers, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded, cooking spray. Here's the instruction: Mix cream cheese, green onion, bread crumbs and crab meat together. Add salt and pepper to taste. (I omit this). Spray mini muffin pan with cooking spray, and push in 1 wonton wrapper to form a cup. The edges will stick out. Add a small teaspoonful of cream cheese mixture into each cup. Top with 1 shrimp, and a small pinch of shredded cheese. Bake in 350 degree oven, until wonton wrapper is slightly browned, about ten minutes.

input_text: How to make Texas Sheet Cake?
target_text: You can make Texas Sheet Cake with 2 cups sugar, 2 cups flour, all-purpose, 1/2 pound butter, 1 cup water, 4 tablespoons cocoa powder, 1/2 cup buttermilk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 large eggs beaten, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 cup butter, 3 teaspoons milk, 2 teaspoons cocoa powder, 2 cups sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup nuts chopped. Here's the instruction: Mix together sugar and flour and set aside. Bring to a boil the butter, water and cocoa. Pour over flour mixture and stir. Add buttermilk, vanilla, eggs and baking soda. Mix well and pour onto a cookie sheet. Bake 20 minutes at 375F (190C). Let cool til just warm and frost with Sheet Cake Frosting. Melt butter, milk and cocoa together. Remove from heat. Add powdered sugar, vanilla extract and chopped nuts. Beat well and spread on frosting while both cake and frosting are warm.

input_text: How to make Tasty Thins Or Pecan Squares?
target_text: You can make Tasty Thins Or Pecan Squares with 1 stick margarine, 1 c. sugar, 2 c. flour, pecans, chopped fine, 1 stick butter, 1 egg, separated, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Cream margarine, butter and sugar. Add egg yolk, flour and vanilla. Mix well. Spread thin in 2 greased pans (15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch). Brush egg white over this pastry. Sprinkle nuts on top. Bake at 300° for approximately 30 minutes or until golden. Cut in small squares while hot. Cool on rack. Recipe from Hills and Pines Garden Club, Raleigh, North Carolina.

input_text: How to make Chicken With Curry Sauce?
target_text: You can make Chicken With Curry Sauce with 4 chicken breast fillets (boneless), kosher salt, black pepper, 1 Tbsp. olive oil, 2 tsp. unsalted butter, 2 shallots, 2 cloves garlic, 2 tsp. ginger, 1 Granny Smith apple, 1/2 c. dry white wine, 1/2 c. apple cider, 1/2 c. heavy cream, 1 Tbsp. curry powder. Here's the instruction: Cover chicken breasts with kosher salt and black pepper. Saute in olive oil until browned. Put in a 350° oven until chicken is cooked through. Mix remaining ingredients except curry powder. Chop apples to 1/4-inch pieces. Cook sauce until thickened; add curry powder and continue cooking. When chicken is done, top with sauce. Serve.

input_text: How to make Easy Pumpkin Cookies?
target_text: You can make Easy Pumpkin Cookies with 1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin, 1 (18 1/4 ounce) box spice cake mix, 1/4 cup chocolate chips (optional). Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°F. Mix well can pumpkin and spice cake mix. Then fold in chocolate chips. Lightly spray cookie sheet. Use tablespoon and drop cookies onto cookie sheet. Bake at 350°F for 12 minutes. Let stand for a few minutes then carefully transfer to cooling rack. Pace in airtight container.

input_text: How to make Broccoli Dip?
target_text: You can make Broccoli Dip with 3 stalks celery, chopped, 1/2 large onion, chopped, 1 small can mushrooms, sauteed in butter, 1 pkg. frozen broccoli, chopped, 1 roll garlic cheese, 1 can (8 oz.) cream of mushroom soup. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients and cook on high until real hot. Serve hot with chips.

input_text: How to make Sour Cream (without buttermilk) - Making your own buttermilk?
target_text: You can make Sour Cream (without buttermilk) - Making your own buttermilk with 1 cup (225 ml) of milk (it can be whole or 2% or skim), some sort of acid - I prefer fresh squeezed lime - others prefer white vinegar. Here's the instruction: Take the milk and add the acid of your choice. If using a lime I would squeeze all of it into the milk. If I was using vinegar I might start out with 3 tbsp (45 ml) and go from there. You can taste and adjust.

input_text: How to make Texas Sheet Cake?
target_text: You can make Texas Sheet Cake with 2 sticks margarine, 1 c. water, 4 Tbsp. cocoa, 2 c. flour, 2 c. sugar, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/2 c. sour cream, 2 eggs, 1 tsp. soda. Here's the instruction: In a pot on top of the stove bring first 3 ingredients to a boil. Remove from heat and add flour, sugar and salt. Beat well, then add sour cream, eggs and soda. Mix well and pour into a greased cookie sheet (with sides about 1 inch).

input_text: How to make Homemade Italian Sausage Bean Soup?
target_text: You can make Homemade Italian Sausage Bean Soup with 1-1/2 pounds bulk Italian sausage, 4 medium carrots, thinly sliced, 2 celery rib, chopped, 1 small onion, chopped, 1 garlic clove, minced, 1/8 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 1 can (28 ounces) diced tomatoes, undrained, 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning, 3 cans (14-1/2 ounces each) beef broth, 1 can (16 ounces) kidney beans, rinsed and drained, 1 can (15-1/2 ounces) great northern beans, rinsed and drained, 1/2 cup water, 1/2 cup dry red wine or additional beef broth, 1/3 cup uncooked elbow macaroni, 1 can (8 ounces) tomato sauce, 1/2 teaspoon salt, Grated Parmesan cheese, optional. Here's the instruction: Crumble sausage into a Dutch oven or soup kettle. Cook over medium heat until no longer pink, drain. Add the carrots, celery, onion, garlic and red pepper flakes. Cook and stir for 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Add tomatoes and Italian seasoning; cook 10 minutes longer. Add the broth, beans, water, wine or additional broth, macaroni, tomato sauce and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cook, uncovered until macaroni is tender, about 10 minutes. Serve with Parmesan cheese if desired.

input_text: How to make Noodles And Corn Casserole?
target_text: You can make Noodles And Corn Casserole with 12 ounces egg noodles, 1/2 cup butter, melted, 32 ounces cream-style corn, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 lb shredded American cheese. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350. Cook and drain noodles. Add remaining ingredients. Mix together and place in greased 2 quart baking dish. Cover and bake for 30 minutes or until cheese is melted. Note: Can also be placed in a crockpot on low for 2 hours.

input_text: How to make Philly And Tuna Stuffed Mushrooms?
target_text: You can make Philly And Tuna Stuffed Mushrooms with 1 onion, finely chopped, 1/2 red capsicum, chopped, 2 tablespoons finely chopped coriander, 185g can tuna in spring water, well drained, 1 tablespoon sweet chilli sauce, 125g tub PHILADELPHIA Light Spreadable Cream Cheese, 12 large mushroom caps, stalks removed, 1 3/4 cups fresh breadcrumbs, 2 tablespoons seasoned stuffing mix, Canola cooking spray. Here's the instruction: Combine together the onion, capsicum, coriander, tuna sweet chilli and Philly*. Spoon evenly into the mushrooms. Top each mushroom with the combine breadcrumbs and seasoning mix, spray with the canola cooking spray. Bake in moderate oven 180C for 20- 25 minutes or until golden. Serve immediately with a crisp salad.

input_text: How to make Frozen Chocolate Layered Cheesecake?
target_text: You can make Frozen Chocolate Layered Cheesecake with Jell-O Chocolate Cheesecake Mix, 1 1/2 cups 2% milk, 1 cup Dream Whip Dessert Topping Mix, prepared, 1/2 cup Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate, melted. Here's the instruction: PREPARE cheesecake as directed on package. Fold in dessert topping. PIPE a layer of cheesecake mix lengthwise using a #98 piping tip, in 9x5-inch loaf pan. Drizzle with melted chocolate and pipe another layer width wise in loaf pan. Repeat 5 layers, ending with cheesecake mixture. Dust top with cocoa. FREEZE for 6 hours or overnight. SERVE on dessert plate with chocolate sauce.

input_text: How to make 15 Minute Cheesy Chicken & Vegetable Rice?
target_text: You can make 15 Minute Cheesy Chicken & Vegetable Rice with 1 lb. boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into chunks, 1 can (14-1/2 oz.) chicken broth, 2 cups MINUTE White Rice, uncooked, 1 pkg. (16 oz.) frozen vegetable blend, thawed, 3/4 lb. (12 oz.) VELVEETA, cut up. Here's the instruction: Spray large skillet with no stick cooking spray. Heat skillet on medium-high heat. Add chicken; cook and stir 3 minutes or until outside is no longer pink. Add broth to skillet; stir. Bring to boil. Stir in rice, vegetables and VELVEETA; cover. Cook on low heat 5 minutes. Stir until VELVEETA is melted.

input_text: How to make Wolfgang Puck,S Warm Goat Cheese Arugula And Radicchio Salad ?
target_text: You can make Wolfgang Puck,S Warm Goat Cheese Arugula And Radicchio Salad  with 4 ounce log of chevres, in 4 pieces, 1/4 cup olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon thyme, 1 clove garlic minced, freshly ground black pepper, 1 cup olive oil, 1 tablespoon sherry wine vinegar, 1 tablespoon dijon mustard, 1/2 teaspoon tarragon, salt and pepper, 1/2 pound arugula or mache, chopped parsley for garnish. Here's the instruction: 1 Marinate the cheese in 1/4 cup olive oil, thyme, garlic and pepper overnight. 2 Combine the oilve oil, vinegar, mustard, tarragon, salt and pepper. Clean the greens, toss with vinaigrette and arrange on 4 plates. 3 Heat 2 tablespoons of the cheese marinate in a skillet. Cook the cheese 30 seconds each side or bake in a 450 degree oven for 1 minute. Put the cheese on greens and sprinkle with chopped parsley.

input_text: How to make Turkey Hot Dish?
target_text: You can make Turkey Hot Dish with 1 1/2 c. chopped celery, 2 c. cut up turkey, 1 Tbsp. onion, 1/2 c. milk, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 c. frozen peas, 1/4 c. chopped cashew nuts, American cheese, shredded, 60 Ritz crackers. Here's the instruction: Cook celery in water for 5 minutes and drain. Crush crackers. Put half in bottom of buttered 9 x 13-inch pan. Mix soup and milk and warm. Add turkey, onion, peas, nuts and cheese on top of crackers. Put all the rest of the crackers on top. Dot with butter. Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 40 minutes at 350°. Good way to use left over turkey.

input_text: How to make Char'S Grandma'S Fruit Cocktail Cake?
target_text: You can make Char'S Grandma'S Fruit Cocktail Cake with 2 eggs, 1 1/2 c. sugar, 2 tsp. baking soda, 2 c. flour, 2 c. fruit cocktail, 1/2 c. chopped nuts, 1/2 c. brown sugar. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients, except brown sugar, in a large bowl until blended. Pour into prepared 9 x 13-inch pan. Sprinkle top with brown sugar. Bake in a 325° oven for 40 to 50 minutes.

input_text: How to make Slow Cooker Quinoa, Kale, And Sweet Potato Chilli Chicken?
target_text: You can make Slow Cooker Quinoa, Kale, And Sweet Potato Chilli Chicken with 1 1/2 pounds skinless boneless chicken breast washed and cut into bite size pieces, skip if vegetarian, 1 sweet potato large, cubed, 2 cups cubed, 1 cup quinoa uncooked and rinsed, 1 can black beans organic, 1 can fire-roasted diced tomatoes organic, 32 ounces unsalted chicken stock use vegetable stock if vegetarian, 1 tablespoon raw cacao powder 100%, 2 tablespoons chilli powder, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 2 teaspoons kosher salt, 1 tablespoon dark brown sugar, 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1/2 cup fresh cilantro chopped, 5 cloves garlic minced, 1 onion chopped, 2 cups kale chopped and tightly packed, shredded cheddar cheese for topping when finished, sour cream topping, optional. Here's the instruction: Put the first 17 ingredients into a large crock-pot, and set crock-pot to high. Cook for 4 to 5 hours. Add kale to crock-pot 15 minutes before serving. When finished, serve in a bowl topped with a good amount of cheddar cheese. Let bowl stand for 5 minutes before serving to let cheese melt. Add a dollop of sour cream (optional).

input_text: How to make Spicy Meat and Beans?
target_text: You can make Spicy Meat and Beans with 500 g lean ground beef, 2 tablespoons chili powder, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 2 (398 ml) cans red kidney beans, drained and rinced, 1 (500 ml) jar chunky salsa, I use mild, 125 -150 ml water. Here's the instruction: Brown and drain the ground beef. Add chili powder, garlic, beans, salsa and enough water to thin it out a bit. Mix well and simmer until mixture has reduced to your desired thickness. Serve with rice, or salad and chips or on a wrap with your favorite toppings like Cheese, lettuce, tomatoes and sour cream.

input_text: How to make Quiche Lorraine?
target_text: You can make Quiche Lorraine with 1 packaged pie crust pastry, Nonstick spray, for greasing muffin pans, 10 slices bacon, 3/4 cup shredded Gruyere cheese, 5 eggs, lightly whisked, 1/2 cup finely chopped onion, 1 1/2 cups whipping cream, Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, Cayenne pepper, for garnish. Here's the instruction: Special equipment: round cutter, mini muffin pans Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Lay the pastry out on a work surface and using a round cutter, make pastry rounds about 1/2-inch larger than the mini muffin pan holes. Lightly spray the muffin pans and put a pastry round into each hole, pressing down to form a shell. Bake for 12 minutes, then let cool. Cook the bacon in a large, preheated skillet over medium heat until crispy. Transfer to a paper towel lined plate, and allow to drain. Roughly chop the bacon, then set aside and let cool. In a large bowl, mix the bacon, cheese, eggs, onions and cream. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Pour the mixture evenly into the pastry shells. Reduce the oven temperature to 325 degrees F and bake for 15 minutes. Using a small knife, lift the pastries out of the muffin tins to a serving platter. Garnish each quiche with a light sprinkle of cayenne pepper and serve. This recipe was provided by professional chefs and has been scaled down from a bulk recipe provided by a restaurant. The Food Network Kitchens chefs have not tested this recipe, in the proportions indicated, and therefore, we cannot make any representation as to the results.

input_text: How to make Pineapple Icing?
target_text: You can make Pineapple Icing with 3 large cans crushed pineapple, drain 2 cans, 3 c. sugar, 1 tsp. vanilla flavoring, 2 Tbsp. flour or cornstarch. Here's the instruction: Mix sugar and pineapple. Add flour or starch. Place on stove and cook 5 to 8 minutes (pineapple cooks quickly). Add flavoring. Cool icing before spreading on cake layers.

input_text: How to make Bourbon Slush ?
target_text: You can make Bourbon Slush  with 12 oz can of frozen orange juice, 12 oz can of frozen lemonade, 2 c of water in which 4 tea bags have been steeped, 7 c water, boiled with 1 c sugar, 2 cups bourbon, 2 liters diet 7Up. Here's the instruction: MIx all ingredients and freeze. Stir occasionally while freezing.  Scoop into chilled glasses and serve.   77 calories per serving

input_text: How to make Lemon Poke Cake ?
target_text: You can make Lemon Poke Cake  with 1 pkg. lemon cake mix, 1 pkg. lemon Jell-O, 1 cup hot water, 1 pkg. instant lemon pudding, 2 cups milk, 8-12 oz. Cool Whip. Here's the instruction: Make cake according to package directions. When cake is cooled poke holes in the top with a fork. Dissolve lemon jell-o in hot water. Pour over top of cake. Mix pudding with 2 cups milk. Fold in Cool Whip. Spread over top of cake. Refrigerate.

input_text: How to make Sauerkraut Salad?
target_text: You can make Sauerkraut Salad with 1 big can sauerkraut, drained well, 2 c. diced celery, 1 c. chopped green pepper, 1 c. diced onion, 1 small can pimientos, diced, 1/2 c. vinegar, 2 c. sugar, 1 tsp. salt. Here's the instruction: Mix first 5 ingredients together. Mix last 3 ingredients together and pour over first mixture. Let stand overnight.

input_text: How to make Sticky Buns?
target_text: You can make Sticky Buns with 1 c. brown sugar, 1/2 c. butter, 3 Tbsp. milk, 1 Tbsp. cinnamon, 1 pkg. vanilla pudding. Here's the instruction: Heat together the ingredients (don't boil). Pour batter into greased cake pan. Roll out 2 loaves of frozen bread dough (thawed). Sprinkle bread with cinnamon. Roll up and slice into rolls, about 1-inch thick. Lay in syrup and bake until brown. Bake at 350°. Turn onto foil while warm.

input_text: How to make Macaroni And Cheese?
target_text: You can make Macaroni And Cheese with 1/2 lb. American cheese, 1 c. milk, 1 lb. elbow noodles, cooked. Here's the instruction: Cook elbows according to box directions. In saucepan, put American cheese together with milk and heat until blended and creamy. Stir constantly. Pour over noodles and stir with a large spoon.

input_text: How to make Ultimate Barbecued Chicken?
target_text: You can make Ultimate Barbecued Chicken with 2 quarts water, 2 tablespoons kosher salt, 14 cup brown sugar, 2 garlic cloves, smashed with the side of a large knife, 4 sprigs fresh thyme, 1 whole frying chicken, cut up. Here's the instruction: Brine: In a mixing bowl combine the water, salt, sugar, garlic, and thyme. Transfer the brine to a 2 gallon re-sealable plastic bag. Add the chicken, close the bag and refrigerate a minimum of 2 hours, up to 12 hours, to allow the salt and seasonings to penetrate the chicken. Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Preheat a grill or an outdoor gas or charcoal barbecue to a medium heat. Take a few paper towels and fold them several times to make a thick square. Blot a small amount of oil on the paper towels and carefully and quickly wipe the hot grates of the grill to make a nonstick surface. Take the chicken out of the brine, pat it dry on paper towels. Arrange the chicken pieces on the preheated grill and cook, turning once mid-way, for a total of 10 minutes. Transfer the grill marked chicken to a cookie sheet and place in preheated oven. Cook chicken for 15 minutes, remove it from the oven and brush liberally, coating every inch with barbecue sauce. Return to oven for 30 more minutes, basting chicken for a second time half way through the cooking time. Serve with extra sauce.

input_text: How to make 7-Up Cake?
target_text: You can make 7-Up Cake with 3 c. Swans Down cake flour, 3 sticks butter or margarine, 3 c. sugar, 5 eggs, 3/4 c. 7-Up, 2 Tbsp. lemon extract. Here's the instruction: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs, then add flour, 7-Up and lemon extract. Bake in a 350° oven for 50 minutes.

input_text: How to make Pine Nut-And-Rice Pilaf?
target_text: You can make Pine Nut-And-Rice Pilaf with 2 teaspoons olive oil, 1 1/2 cups chopped onion, 4 garlic cloves, minced, 5 cups hot cooked rice, 1/3 cup chopped fresh basil, 1/3 cup pine nuts, toasted, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, Basil sprig (optional). Here's the instruction: Heat olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, and saute 3 minutes or until tender. Combine onion mixture, rice, and remaining ingredients in a bowl; toss well. Garnish with a basil sprig, if desired.

input_text: How to make Oh-So-Italian Rotini Skillet?
target_text: You can make Oh-So-Italian Rotini Skillet with 1/4 lb. (115 g) salami, cut into 1/4-inch-wide strips, 1 lb. (450 g) lean ground beef Safeway 1 lb For $3.99 thru 02/09, 1 each celery stalk, onion and large carrot, chopped Target 2 lb For $3.00 thru 02/06, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 4 cups 25%-less-sodium chicken broth, 1 can (28 fl oz/796 mL) no-salt-added diced tomatoes, undrained, 1 can (19 fl oz/540 mL) chickpeas (garbanzo beans), rinsed, 1 tsp. Italian seasoning, 3 cups rotini pasta, uncooked, 1 cup Cracker Barrel Shredded Mozza-Cheddar Cheese, 1/4 cup loosely packed fresh basil leaves, coarsely chopped. Here's the instruction: Cook salami in large deep skillet on medium-high heat 4 to 5 min. or until crisp; drain. Set aside. Brown ground beef with celery, onions, carrots and garlic in same skillet. Stir in broth, tomatoes, chickpeas and seasoning; cover. Bring to boil. Add pasta; simmer, covered, 15 min. or just until pasta is tender, stirring occasionally. Sprinkle with cheese. Remove from heat. Let stand, covered, 5 min. or until cheese is melted. Top with salami and basil.

input_text: How to make Beer Bratwursts?
target_text: You can make Beer Bratwursts with 2 12 -ounce bottles lager beer, 1 large onion, cut into wedges, 4 cloves garlic, smashed, 1 2 -inch piece ginger, thinly sliced, 1 teaspoon caraway seeds, 2 bay leaves, 2 whole cloves, 6 to 8 links fresh bratwurst (about 2 1/2 pounds), 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, 6 to 8 sub rolls or Italian-bread segments, Whole-grain mustard, for serving, Assorted toppings, for serving (below). Here's the instruction: Combine 6 cups water, the beer, onion, garlic, ginger, caraway seeds, bay leaves and cloves in a large pot over medium-high heat; bring to a gentle simmer and cook 10 minutes. Add the bratwursts, return to a simmer and cook until almost done (the meat should still be slightly pink in the center), about 15 minutes. Remove from the heat and let the bratwursts cool completely in the cooking liquid, about 1 hour. Preheat a grill to medium high. Transfer 2 cups of the cooking liquid to a small saucepan over medium heat. Add the butter and bring to a boil; cook until the butter melts, about 1 minute. Grill the bratwursts, occasionally turning and basting with the butter mixture, until marked and cooked through, 10 to 12 minutes. Serve on rolls with mustard and other toppings. Sweet-and-Sour Onions Cook 2 chopped red onions in a skillet with 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium-high heat, stirring, until golden, about 8 minutes. Add 1/2 teaspoon caraway seeds; cook, stirring, 30 seconds. Add 1/4 cup red wine vinegar, 1 tablespoon brown sugar and 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt; cook, stirring until the onions are glazed, 1 minute. Let cool completely. Bell Pepper Relish Pulse 1 each chopped yellow bell pepper and orange bell pepper, 4 each chopped radishes and scallions, 1 chopped celery stalk and 1 garlic clove in a food processor until finely chopped. Whisk 2 tablespoons each cider vinegar and chopped parsley, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 teaspoons brown sugar, 1/2 teaspoon each celery salt and kosher salt, and pepper to taste in a large bowl. Add the vegetable mixture; toss to coat. Smoky Beer Cheese Combine 1/4 pound each shredded sharp cheddar and smoked gouda, 1 minced garlic clove, 1/2 cup lager beer, 2 teaspoons hot sauce, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, and pepper to taste in a food processor; pulse until smooth. These toppings also taste great on burgers or hot dogs. Photograph by Con Poulos

input_text: How to make M&M Chocolate-Chocolate Cookies?
target_text: You can make M&M Chocolate-Chocolate Cookies with 3/4 cup margarine, 13 cup sugar granulated, 13 cup brown sugar, light, 1 large eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 3 teaspoons cocoa powder, 1 1/2 cups flour, all-purpose, 3/4 teaspoon baking soda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 12 ounces m and m's. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350F (180C). In a large mixing bowl, cream margarine and sugars. Add egg and vanilla and beat until light and fluffy. Combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt; gradually blend into creamed mixture. Stir in M and M's Semi-Sweet Chocolate Candies until evenly blended. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Make about 2 dozens. Bake 9 to 13 minutes. Cool 1 minute on cookie sheets; remove to wire cooling racks. Store in tightly covered container.

input_text: How to make Creamed Spinach And Chicken Pizza?
target_text: You can make Creamed Spinach And Chicken Pizza with 1 (13 7/8 ounce) package pillsbury refrigerated pizza crusts, 1 (10 ounce) box frozen creamed spinach, 1 garlic clove, minced, 1 1/2 cups cooked chicken breasts, diced, 2 dashes hot sauce, 1 tablespoon dried onion flakes, black pepper, 2 tablespoons grated parmesan cheese, 2 cups mozzarella cheese. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spread pizza crust to desired thickness on a large greased baking sheet. Bake crust for 6-8 minutes until lightly brown. Cook frozen creamed spinach according to package while the crust is baking. Combine garlic, hot sauce, minced onion, parmesan cheese and pepper with the prepared creamed spinach. Mix well. Remove crust from oven. Spread the creamed spinach mixture evenly over the crust. Sprinkle 1 cup of mozzarella cheese over the spinach mixture and then add chicken. Top with remaining cheese. Bake at 400 degrees for 8-10 minutes or until cheese in hot and bubbly.

input_text: How to make Gladys' Angelic Strawberry Dessert?
target_text: You can make Gladys' Angelic Strawberry Dessert with 1 (3 1/2 ounce) instant vanilla pudding, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup skim milk, 1 pint whipping cream, whipped, 1 angel food cake, loaf cut into 1 inch chunks, 2 1/2 pints strawberries, washed and stems removed. Here's the instruction: In a large mixing bowl, place pudding, sour cream, and milk. Mix on low speed for 1 to 2 minutes, or until thick and well mixed. Fold in whipped cream. We think it tastes better to slice the berries before putting into the bottom two layers. In your serving bowl make layers--1/2 of the cake, 1/3 of the strawberries, and 1/2 of the pudding mixture. Repeat layers. Arrange last 1/3 strawberries on top. Cover with plastic wrap. Chill for 2 hours.

input_text: How to make Chicken Casserole?
target_text: You can make Chicken Casserole with 1/2 can chicken soup, 2 c. cooked, diced chicken, 1 (8 oz.) can garden peas, drained, 2 Tbsp. butter, 1 tsp. minced onion, 1 1/2 c. cooked rice. Here's the instruction: Combine cooked rice with chicken. Mix in soup, peas, butter and onion in a 1-quart baking dish. Top with buttered crumbs or grated cheese. Bake at 350° for 15 minutes. Serves 6.

input_text: How to make Quick Fresh Strawberry Pie?
target_text: You can make Quick Fresh Strawberry Pie with 1 qt. fresh strawberries, 1 c. sugar, 3 Tbsp. cornstarch, 1 Tbsp. lemon juice, 1 small Cool Whip, 1 (9-inch) pie shell, cooked. Here's the instruction: Wash and stem strawberries. Crush 1/2 of them and combine with 1 cup sugar in which 3 tablespoons cornstarch has been mixed. Stir constantly over low heat until thickened (about 5 minutes). Add 1 tablespoon lemon juice and allow to cool. Put the other half of the strawberries into a cooked 9-inch pie shell and top with the strawberry mixture. Chill and serve with Cool Whip.

input_text: How to make Mexican Coffee Caramel Sauce Over Ice Cream?
target_text: You can make Mexican Coffee Caramel Sauce Over Ice Cream with 1/2 teaspoon instant coffee, 1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 2 teaspoons water, 6 tablespoons firmly packed brown sugar, 3 tablespoons i can't believe it's not butter! spread, 3 tablespoons heavy or whipping cream, 1/4 teaspoon lemon juice, 1 cup breyers natural vanilla ice cream. Here's the instruction: Dissolve instant coffee powder and cinnamon in 1-quart saucepan in warm water. Stir in sugar, I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!(R) Spread and cream. Bring just to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring frequently. Reduce heat to medium and cook, stirring frequently, 3 minutes. Stir in lemon juice. Cool slightly, about 15 minutes. Scoop Ice Cream into 2 dessert dishes. Drizzle with warm sauce and garnish, if desired, with chopped pecans.

input_text: How to make My Famous Chocolate Covered Cherries?
target_text: You can make My Famous Chocolate Covered Cherries with 2 cups powdered sugar (you may want to use more to thicken it up, some people have used another cup full), 1/4 cup margarine, 1/4 cup sweetened condensed milk, 1 teaspoon vanilla, 1 pinch salt, maraschino cherry, drained, milk dipping chocolate (I use giridelli's). Here's the instruction: Combine the first 5 ingredients until well blended and smooth and place in fridge until firm. Meanwhile spread out the drained cherries on a cookie sheet and freeze for at least 1 hours. Scoop out about 1-2 teaspoon of filling and form into a ball around a cherry. Place on a wax paper lined cookie sheet and freeze for 1 hr after you have formed them all. Melt dipping chocolate and using your hands dip each cherry placing it on a wax paper lined cookie sheet and chill in fridge until chocolate is solid. Remove cherries carefully as not to break them open and loose the center. Place in an airtight plastic container and keep in a cool dry place for up to 1 month.

input_text: How to make Orange Scorpion?
target_text: You can make Orange Scorpion with 12 ounce triple sec, 1 ounce Grand Marnier, 1 ounce light rum, 6 ounces orange juice, 12 ounce creme de almond. Here's the instruction: Pour above ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, and serve.

input_text: How to make Plum Sauce?
target_text: You can make Plum Sauce with 4 lbs plums, 1 1/2 lbs sugar, 1 teaspoon clove, ground, 1 teaspoon ginger, ground, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper (or to taste), 2 pints vinegar, 2 ounces garlic. Here's the instruction: Boil all for 2 hours, Skim off stones. Put through a sieve and pour into air tight bottles or jars.

input_text: How to make Crock Pot Lamb Stew?
target_text: You can make Crock Pot Lamb Stew with 2 -3 lbs boneless lamb, cut in cubes, 1/4 cup flour, 2 teaspoons seasoning salt, 1/4 teaspoon seasoned flour, 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 cups water, 2 (7/8 ounce) brown gravy mix, 1 green pepper, coarsely chopped, 1/2 teaspoon marjoram, 3 garlic cloves, crushed, 2 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed, 2 medium onions, chopped, 1 cup celery, sliced, 5 carrots, sliced. Here's the instruction: In a resealable bag, mix together the flour, seasoned salt and seasoned pepper. Add lamb and shake to coat. In a large skillet add olive oil and brown the lamb cubes. Remove and place in crock pot. In a medium bowl, whisk together the water, gravy mix, marjoram and garlic. Add the vegetables and gravy liquid to crock pot and mix well. Cover and cook on low 8-10 hours.

input_text: How to make Liver with Onions and Vinegar (Fegato Alla Veneziana)?
target_text: You can make Liver with Onions and Vinegar (Fegato Alla Veneziana) with 1 pound fresh calf's liver, 2 to 4 tablespoons butter, as desired, 2 large Spanish onions, sliced lengthwise into thin strips, Salt and pepper, as desired, 1 tablespoon vinegar, or as desired, Flour for dredging, seasoned with salt and pepper, 2 to 4 tablespoons clarified butter for frying, 2 tablespoons chopped parsley. Here's the instruction: Trim liver of veins and membranes. Cut on the diagonal into wide, 1/4-inch slices. Melt the butter in a large skillet. Fry the onions in the butter over medium heat, stirring often, until nicely browned, 10 to 15 minutes. Season to taste with salt, pepper and vinegar. Set aside. Dredge liver pieces with seasoned flour, and shake off excess. In a second large skillet, melt the clarified butter over high heat, and when very hot, drop in the liver pieces, a few at a time. Fry 30 seconds or so on each side. Remove to a serving dish. Liver should still be raw in the center. When all liver pieces have been fried, place the onions in the skillet containing the liver juices and reheat the onions thoroughly, stirring often. Add the liver to the onions, toss briefly to heat through, and turn out onto the serving dish. Sprinkle with chopped parsley.

input_text: How to make Sugar Cookies?
target_text: You can make Sugar Cookies with 3 3/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup unsalted butter, room temp, 2 cups sugar, 2 large eggs, 1 tablespoon vanilla (or half vanilla and half almond extract). Here's the instruction: Mix dry ingredients in separate bowl. Using stand mixer or hand mixer, beat butter and sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs one at a time, scraping down bowl each time, then vanilla and/or almond extract. Add flour mixture gradually and mix at low speed until comes together. Turn out onto flat surface. Knead a couple of times just until smooth. Pat into a flat disk, wrap in plastic and chill until firm enough to roll, about one hour. Roll and cut as desired. Bake at 350 about 8-10 minutes on parchment-lined sheets.

input_text: How to make Festive Chicken?
target_text: You can make Festive Chicken with 4 slices bacon, 2 each chicken breast halves, boneless, skinless, 1/2 cup soy sauce, tamari, 1/4 cup sugar, 2 each garlic cloves minced, 1 1/2 teaspoons ginger ground, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 2 red hot pepper sauce. Here's the instruction: Wrap two bacon strips around each chicken breast; place in a shallow glass baking dish and set aside. In a small mixing bowl, combine soy sauce and sugar; add remaining ingredients. Pour over chicken, turning to coat evenly. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for several hours or overnight. Drain and reserve marinade. Bake at 325F (160C) for 50 to 60 minutes or until chicken tests done, basting occasionally with marinade.

input_text: How to make Mormon Muffins?
target_text: You can make Mormon Muffins with 2 cups boiling water, 5 teaspoons baking soda, 5 cups all-purpose flour, 1 quart buttermilk, 4 cups bran cereal (such as Kellogg's(R) All-Bran(R)), 2 cups bran flakes cereal, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 1 cup white sugar, 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 1/2 cup butter, melted, 4 eggs, beaten, 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger, 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg. Here's the instruction: Combine boiling water and baking soda together in a large bowl. Let cool slightly. Stir flour, buttermilk, bran cereal, bran flakes, walnuts, sugar, oil, butter, eggs, cinnamon, salt, ginger, and nutmeg into water-baking soda mixture until just combined. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate muffin batter for at least 8 hours or overnight. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease 60 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners. Pour batter into prepared muffin cups 1/2 full. Bake muffins in the preheated oven until the tops spring back when lightly pressed, about 20 minutes.

input_text: How to make Artichoke Dip?
target_text: You can make Artichoke Dip with 1 c. mayonnaise, 1 c. Parmesan cheese, 1 c. chopped artichoke hearts. Here's the instruction: Mix well and put in baking dish. Put in oven at 350° until mixture is hot and bubbling (about 20 to 30 minutes). Eat with your favorite crackers or chips. Delicious!

input_text: How to make Carrot-Pineapple-Bran Muffins?
target_text: You can make Carrot-Pineapple-Bran Muffins with 1 3/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 3/4 cup fat-free milk, 1 large egg, lightly beaten, 1 (8-ounce) can crushed pineapple in juice, undrained, 2 tablespoons margarine or butter, melted, 1 cup wheat bran flakes cereal, 1 cup shredded carrot, 2 tablespoons water, Cooking spray. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°. Combine first 5 ingredients in a large bowl. Make a well in center of mixture, and set aside. Combine milk and next 3 ingredients, stirring well. Stir in cereal; let stand 5 minutes. Place carrot and water in a small saucepan. Cover and bring to a boil; reduce heat, and cook 1 to 2 minutes or until carrot is tender. Drain and set aside. Add cereal mixture to flour mixture; add carrot, and stir just until dry ingredients are moistened. Spoon batter evenly into 18 muffin cups coated with cooking spray, filling two-thirds full. Bake at 350° for 20 to 22 minutes or until golden. Remove muffins from pans immediately, and cool on wire racks.

input_text: How to make Dutch Oven White Bean And Sausage Soup(Serves 4)  ?
target_text: You can make Dutch Oven White Bean And Sausage Soup(Serves 4)   with 1 c. dried Northern beans, 2 1/2 qt. water, 1/2 lb. lean ham, cubed, 1 (2 oz.) piece salt pork, 1 medium onion, finely chopped, 1/3 lb. chorizo, 1/2 lb. turnip greens, shredded, 2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced. Here's the instruction: In Dutch oven, bring water to a boil.	Add beans; boil briskly for 2 minutes. Remove from heat; let beans soak for 1 hour. Add ham, salt pork and	onion.	Simmer, partially covered, for 1 1/2 hours. Add chorizo, greens and potatoes; simmer for 30 minutes. Remove sausage and salt pork. Discard pork. Slice chorizo into 1/4-inch thick rounds. Return to soup and serve.

input_text: How to make Semisweet Chocolate Icing ?
target_text: You can make Semisweet Chocolate Icing  with 1/2 cup semisweet chocolate pieces, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 tablespoon lightly colored corn syrup, 1/4 vanilla. Here's the instruction: In a small saucepan combine all ingredients over low heat, stirring until chocolate melts and mixture is smooth. USE IMMEDIATELY.

input_text: How to make French Fried Egg Sandwich?
target_text: You can make French Fried Egg Sandwich with egg, fried as usual, bread, cheese, mayonnaise. Here's the instruction: Fry egg; toast bread slices. Add mayonnaise. Put egg and cheese on bread. Put in microwave 10 seconds. Great sandwich.

input_text: How to make Chicken Old Ladies On A Bus?
target_text: You can make Chicken Old Ladies On A Bus with 1/3 c. orange marmalade, 1/3 c. hot barbecue sauce, 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 2 Tbsp. lemon juice, 2 lb. chicken breasts, salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Spray 13 x 9-inch pan with Pam. Combine marmalade, barbecue sauce, Worcestershire sauce and lemon juice. Place chicken in pan. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Pour sauce over chicken. Bake at 350° for 1 hour, basting occasionally. Increase heat to 400° and bake 15 minutes longer.

input_text: How to make Black-Bean & Zucchini Pancakes?
target_text: You can make Black-Bean & Zucchini Pancakes with 15 ounces canned black beans, rinsed and drained, 2 egg whites, 1 teaspoon roasted garlic, chopped (jarred), 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 zucchini, shredded (1 1/3 cups), 1/3 cup whole wheat breadcrumbs, plain, dried whole-grain, 2 teaspoons olive oil, divided, 1/2 cup salsa, 2 1/2 tablespoons reduced-fat sour cream. Here's the instruction: In a medium bowl, mash beans, egg whites, garlic, and cumin to a coarse texture (it should be a mixture of mashed and nearly whole beans). Stir in the zucchini and bread crumbs. Heat large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add 1 teaspoon of oil. Using 1/2 of the bean mixture, drop 4 mounds into the pan and flatten them to about 3 1/2-inch rounds. Cook for 4 minutes, turning halfway during cooking; repeat with remaining mixture. Serve with salsa and sour cream.

input_text: How to make Asparagus Maltaise?
target_text: You can make Asparagus Maltaise with 2 pounds asparagus, 3 each egg yolks, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup butter or margarine, 1 teaspoon orange zest grated, 3 tablespoons orange juice. Here's the instruction: Snap tough ends from asparagus and discard. Place asparagus in 1 inch water in large skillet, bring to boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer until tender, 5 to 8 minutes. Blend egg yolks, lemon juice and salt in saucepan or top of double boiler. Add half of butter and stir constantly over low heat or boiling water until butter melts. Add remaining butter and continue stirring until it melts and sauce thickens. Stir in orange peel and juice. Drain asparagus and serve topped with sauce.

input_text: How to make Cucumber And Melon Salad With Chile And Honey ?
target_text: You can make Cucumber And Melon Salad With Chile And Honey  with 1/4 cup raw pistachios, 1/2 jalapeno or Fresno chile, thinly sliced, 2 Tbsp. white wine vinegar, 1 tsp. honey, 3 Tbsp. extra-virgin olive oil, Kosher salt, freshly ground pepper, 1 English hothouse cucumber, halved crosswise, then halved lengthwise, seeds scooped out with a spoon, 1/4 medium ripe honeydew melon or cantaloupe, rind removed, 5 oz. ricotta salata (salted dry ricotta) or feta, 1/2 cup basil leaves. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°F. Toast pistachios on a rimmed baking sheet, tossing once, until golden brown, 7-9 minutes. Let cool, then finely chop 2 Tbsp. pistachios. Leave remaining nuts whole; set aside. Whisk chopped pistachios, chile, vinegar, and honey in a small bowl. Gradually stream in oil, whisking constantly until emulsified; generously season dressing with salt and pepper. Using a mandoline, shave cucumber and honeydew lengthwise (or thinly slice with a knife). Place in a large bowl. Set blade to a slightly wider setting; shave cheese into planks. Add to bowl along with basil and reserved pistachios; drizzle dressing over and toss gently. Season with salt and pepper.

input_text: How to make Pasta With Shrimp And Garlic Sauce?
target_text: You can make Pasta With Shrimp And Garlic Sauce with 1/4 cup butter, 4 garlic cloves, finely chopped, 1 onion, finely chopped, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped (or basil), 1 lb medium shrimp, cleaned, uncooked, 3 tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped, 1/2 cup dry white wine, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1 lb cooked pasta (spaghetti, fettucini or linguini), 1/4 cup butter, cut in small pieces. Here's the instruction: In large skillet, melt 1/4 cup butter; cook onion and garlic until tender. Add half of the parsley (or basil) and shrimp, cook for 1 minutes. Add tomatoes, wine, salt and pepper; bring to boil. Cook just until shrimp turn opaque and begin to curl. Remove from heat and reheat just before pasta is ready. Place cooked pasta over butter in warm serving dish; pour sauce over and toss until pasta is well coated and most of liquid has been absorbed. Garnish with fresh parsley.

input_text: How to make Broccoli Casserole?
target_text: You can make Broccoli Casserole with 1 pkg. chopped frozen broccoli, 1/2 can cream of mushroom soup, undiluted, 1 egg, well beaten, 1/2 c. mayonnaise, 1 Tbsp. grated onion, 1/2 c. cheese crackers. Here's the instruction: Cook the broccoli for 5 minutes and drain. Mix the soup, egg, mayonnaise and onion. Place broccoli in greased casserole. Pour mixture over it and sprinkle the crumbled cheese crackers over the top. Bake 30 minutes.

input_text: How to make BAKER'S White Chocolate-Peppermint Bark?
target_text: You can make BAKER'S White Chocolate-Peppermint Bark with 3 pkg. (4 oz. each) BAKER'S White Chocolate, 1 cup crushed hard peppermint candy, 1 drop peppermint extract, 1/4 cup BAKER'S ANGEL FLAKE Coconut, toasted. Here's the instruction: Microwave chocolate in microwavable bowl on HIGH 2 min., stirring after 1 min. Stir until chocolate is completely melted. Stir in crushed candy and extract. Spread into thin layer on waxed paper-covered baking sheet; sprinkle with coconut. Refrigerate 30 min. or until firm. Break into small pieces.

input_text: How to make Cornflake Cookies?
target_text: You can make Cornflake Cookies with 4 egg whites (medium) or 3 egg whites (large), 1 c. sugar, 1 c. chopped nuts, 1 c. coconut, 3 c. corn flakes, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Beat egg whites. Slowly add sugar. Stir in remaining ingredients in order given. Drop onto greased cookie sheets. Bake at 350° about 10 to 12 minutes.

input_text: How to make Flounder With Champagne Sauce?
target_text: You can make Flounder With Champagne Sauce with 2 tablespoons minced shallots, 1 teaspoon minced garlic, 2 tablespoons butter, melted, 1 pound fresh mushrooms, sliced, 1 teaspoon salt, divided, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1 1/2 pounds flounder fillets, 1/2 teaspoon ground white pepper, divided, 1 1/2 cups champagne, 2 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/4 cup butter, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup whipping cream, 2 egg yolks, lightly beaten, 1 cup (4 ounces) shredded Gruye@Sre cheese. Here's the instruction: Saute shallots and garlic in butter in a skillet over medium-high heat until tender. Add mushrooms; saute until liquid evaporates. Stir in 1/4 teaspoon salt and black pepper. Arrange fillets in a greased 11- x 7- x 1 1/2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon white pepper. Pour champagne and lemon juice over fillets. Cover and bake at 400° for 10 minutes. Drain, reserving liquid. Strain liquid through cheesecloth. Cook strained liquid in a saucepan over high heat until liquid is reduced to 1 cup. Melt 1/4 cup butter in a heavy saucepan over low heat; add flour, stirring until smooth. Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add whipping cream; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thickened and bubbly. Stir in remaining 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon white pepper. Stir about one-fourth hot mixture into egg yolks; add to remaining hot mixture, stirring constantly. Spoon mushroom mixture over fillets; top with sauce, and sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered, at 375° for 15 minutes or until thoroughly heated. Broil 5 1/2 inches from heat (with electric oven door partially opened) 2 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve immediately.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Slush?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Slush with 1 cup water, 1 cup skim milk, 1/4 cup granulated sugar, 3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa (I use Hershey's), 2 teaspoons vanilla extract. Here's the instruction: Put milk through cocoa in a medium saucepan, cook on medium heat, stirring constantly until the mixture comes to a slow boil and sugar is dissolved Lower heat and simmer about 2 minutes, stirring mixture a few times (watching for burn/ boil over), stir in vanilla- set aside to cool Pour cooled mixture into a freezer safe covered container and freeze. Place frozen mixture in a blender, blend to a slush. Freeze any leftover portion. Note: I use my coffee grinder to get a finer grind of the sugar, not powdered, just a fine grind.

input_text: How to make Fresh Apple Cake?
target_text: You can make Fresh Apple Cake with 2 c. sugar, 1 1/2 c. oil, 3 eggs, beaten, 3 c. all-purpose flour, 1 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. soda, 2 tsp. vanilla, 3 c. eating apples, chopped, 1 c. pecans, chopped. Here's the instruction: Mix together sugar, oil and eggs. Sift together dry ingredients. Blend together in order given. Bake at 350° in a greased tube pan for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Batter will be stiff.

input_text: How to make Lemon Pie?
target_text: You can make Lemon Pie with 1 1/2 c. sugar, 1 1/2 c. water, 1/2 c. lemon juice, yolk of 3 eggs, whites for meringue, pinch of cornstarch. Here's the instruction: Boil water, sugar and lemon juice. Then add cornstarch and egg yolks. Bake in pie shell. Top with meringue with egg whites whipped.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Lollipops?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Lollipops with 16 ounces bittersweet chocolate, tempered, 16 ounces white chocolate, tempered, 16 ounces milk chocolate, tempered. Here's the instruction: The mold shapes used were bats, witches, gravestones, ghosts and skulls. You can use any molds to make chocolate lollipops. To make the lollipop: Pour any of the tempered chocolates directly into the molds, filling them to the top. Tap the molds against the work surface to release the air bubbles. Set the sticks in place by inserting them just far enough to be secure within the mold you are using. Set the molds aside to allow the chocolate to set. When set, simply pop out the lollipops. If you do not have any lollipop molds, you can use Play-Doh modeling clay to make your own molds. Roll fresh Play-Doh into a 1/2-inch-thick rectangle on top of a sheet of parchment paper. Use a sharp paring knife to cut shapes from the Play-Doh. Remove the cutout leaving the homemade mold. Spray the inside edge of the Play-Doh with vegetable cooking spray. Pour the chocolate into the cutout space. Insert the lollipop sticks and let cool completely before removing the Play-Doh. When finished, the Play-Doh can be saved and reused for another day.

input_text: How to make Coconut Surprise Sheet Cake?
target_text: You can make Coconut Surprise Sheet Cake with 1 pkg. yellow cake mix, 1 c. flaked coconut, 1 tsp. coconut flavoring, 2/3 c. canned milk, 1/2 c. powdered sugar, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. coconut flavoring. Here's the instruction: Mix yellow cake mix as directed on package. Add coconut and coconut flavoring (this makes the cake light). Bake at 350° for about 35 minutes in 9 x 13-inch pan. Mix the canned milk, powdered sugar, vanilla and coconut flavoring while the cake is baking. Use a 2-cup measure and add enough water at the end to make a total of 1 3/4 cups liquid. As soon as cake is removed, punch holes all over the top with a fork. Pour the liquid over the warm cake. Use all the liquid. When the cake is cool, top with Cool Whip and sprinkle with coconut. Refrigerate. If desired, when serving, top each piece with a cherry.

input_text: How to make Goal-Line Chicken Salad?
target_text: You can make Goal-Line Chicken Salad with 4-1/2 cups diced cooked chicken, 1-1/2 cups diced apples, 3/4 cup halved green grapes, 6 tablespoons sweet pickle relish, 6 tablespoons mayonnaise, 6 tablespoons prepared ranch salad dressing, 3/4 teaspoon onion salt, 3/4 teaspoon garlic salt, Lettuce leaves. Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, combine the chicken, apples and grapes. In a small bowl, combine the pickle relish, mayonnaise, ranch dressing, onion salt and garlic salt. Pour over chicken mixture and toss to coat. Serve in a lettuce-lined bowl.

input_text: How to make Chili Sauce?
target_text: You can make Chili Sauce with 28 large tomatoes, 3 large red peppers, 5 Tbsp. salt, 6 c. vinegar, 3 tsp. brown cinnamon, 3 large green peppers, 6 large onions, 12 Tbsp. white sugar, 2 tsp. celery seed, 1 tsp. cloves. Here's the instruction: Boil 2 1/2 hours. Pour into sterilized jars.

input_text: How to make Easy White Chili Ii?
target_text: You can make Easy White Chili Ii with 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces, 1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, undrained, 1/2 (8 ounce) jar salsa, 2 cubes chicken bouillon, 1 (48 ounce) jar navy beans, rinsed and drained, 2 cups water. Here's the instruction: Combine the chicken, green chilies, salsa, chicken bouillon, navy beans, and water in a slow cooker. Cook on High until the chicken falls apart, about 4 hours. Mash the chili with a potato masher to give a thicker texture, if desired.

input_text: How to make Cauliflower And Pea Salad?
target_text: You can make Cauliflower And Pea Salad with 1 head cauliflower, broken in pieces, 1 pkg. frozen peas, 1 pkg. dry Italian dressing, 1 to 1 1/2 c. mayo. Here's the instruction: Mix together dressing mix and mayo. Drizzle dressing over peas and cauliflower. Let stand overnight and mix together before serving.

input_text: How to make Chicken Veggie Casserole?
target_text: You can make Chicken Veggie Casserole with 3 c. cooked chicken, cubed, 2 cans cream of mushroom soup, 1 can sliced water chestnuts, drained, 1 can mushrooms and pieces, drained, 1 pkg. California vegetables (broccoli, carrots, cauliflower), 1 Tbsp. chopped onion, 2 c. grated Cheddar cheese, 1/3 c. slivered almonds. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients except cheese and almonds. Bake in 9 x 13-inch pan covered for 1 hour at 350°. Top with grated cheese and almonds. Allow cheese to melt before serving.

input_text: How to make Date And Walnut Cake?
target_text: You can make Date And Walnut Cake with 8 ounces self raising flour, sifted, 4 ounces butter, softened, 4 ounces caster sugar, 1 teaspoon ground mixed spice, 2 ounces walnuts, ground, 3 ounces chopped dates, 2 ounces chopped walnuts, 1 egg, 7 tablespoons milk. Here's the instruction: Pre heat oven to 180c/350°F. Grease a 6" cake tin or 1 lb loaf tin, and line with greaseproof paper. Rub the butter into the flour so that it looks like breadcrumbs. Add the sugar, ground nuts, chopped nuts, dates and the spice. Mix well. Add the egg and milk stir with a spoon, do not beat the mixture. Transfer the mixture to the tin and top with a few nuts. Bake for 1.5 hour or until a tooth pick inserted into the centre comes out clean. Allow to cool in the tin for 10 mins and place on a wire rack. When cool peel off the paper.

input_text: How to make Zucchini Lemon Bread?
target_text: You can make Zucchini Lemon Bread with 1 1/2 c. flour, 1/2 c. sugar, 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. baking soda, 1/2 tsp. grated lemon peel, 1/2 tsp. connamon, 1 c. shredded zucchini, 1/2 c. chopped walnuts, 1/3 c. oil, 1/2 c. skim milk, 2 eggs. Here's the instruction: Grease and flour loaf pan. Heat oven to 350°F.

input_text: How to make Grilled Or Broiled Idaho Trout?
target_text: You can make Grilled Or Broiled Idaho Trout with 1 fresh Idaho trout, boned and butterflied, 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, melted, or vegetable oil spray, Salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: Preheat grill or broiler until very hot. Brush both sides of trout with butter, or spray with oil. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Grill or broil fish with the flesh close to the source of heat until it is opaque, flaky and beginning to brown, 2 to 4 minutes. Do not overcook. Top fish with sauce of choice, and serve immediately.

input_text: How to make Hobo Dinner?
target_text: You can make Hobo Dinner with 1 lb. hamburger meat, 3 large potatoes, 2 large onions, 1 green bell pepper, salt, pepper, Lea & Perrins to taste. Here's the instruction: Make 4 large hamburger steak size patties. Place on foil (large sheet of foil, enough to cover and seal each separate patty and vegetables). Peel and slice onions, bell pepper and potatoes into thin slices or rings and place on each hamburger patty. Salt, pepper and Lea & Perrins each packet to your taste. Seal and cook in 350 degree oven for about 45 minutes to an hour until done.

input_text: How to make Sauteed Broccoli And Onions?
target_text: You can make Sauteed Broccoli And Onions with 13 ounces broccoli, florrettes, 4 1/2 ounces shredded swiss cheese, 1 yellow onion, quartered and sliced, 1 head garlic, diced, 1 tablespoon italian seasoning, 1 teaspoon dried cilantro, 1/2 cup dry white wine, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1/2 lb white mushroom, quartered. Here's the instruction: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add broccoli, onion, Italian seasoning and cilantro. Stir occasionally until broccoli and onion are tender, about 10 minutes,. Add garlic and quartered mushrooms. Stir occasionally until mushrooms are tender,about 5 minutes. Add tomatoes and wine, stir occasionally until tomatoes are cooked, about 5 minutes. Top with shredded swiss cheese immediately before serving.

input_text: How to make Grilled Asparagus and Quinoa Salad With Goat Cheese and Black Ol?
target_text: You can make Grilled Asparagus and Quinoa Salad With Goat Cheese and Black Ol with 12 asparagus spears, trimmed, olive oil, salt and pepper, 2 cups quinoa, 8 ounces aged goat cheese, shaved, 14 cup chopped fresh parsley leaves, 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 5 nicoise olives, 1 roma tomato, sliced, parsley sprig (to garnish), 14 cup aged sherry wine vinegar, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, 12 teaspoon arbol chile, 12 cup pitted nicoise olive, 12 cup olive oil. Here's the instruction: Heat grill. Brush asparagus with olive oil and season with salt and pepper, to taste. Grill on both sides until just cooked through, about 2 minutes on each side. Remove from grill and cut in half. Bring 8 cups of salted water to a boil. Add quinoa and cook until soft. Drain and rinse with cold water and drain again. Place the quinoa in a medium bowl and add red wine vinegar, olive oil, parsley and 1/4 cup of olive vinaigrette. Stir to combine. Place on plate and top with goat cheese, asparagus, whole nicoise olives, sliced tomato and parsley sprigs.

input_text: How to make Breakfast Casserole?
target_text: You can make Breakfast Casserole with 1 small loaf Pepperidge Farm bread, 10 oz. Cheddar cheese, 3 c. milk, dash of pepper, 6 eggs, 1 tsp. dry mustard, bacon, sausage or ham, cooked, 1/2 stick butter. Here's the instruction: This must be made the night before and refrigerated.

input_text: How to make Oriental Chicken Salad?
target_text: You can make Oriental Chicken Salad with cooked chicken chunks to taste, 6 green onions, chopped, 3 stalks celery, chopped, 1 head shredded green cabbage, sliced almonds to taste, 1 pkg. Top Ramen soup (chicken), 1/3 c. oil, 1/3 c. vinegar, 1/3 c. soy sauce. Here's the instruction: Dressing: Mix seasoning from soup with oil, vinegar and soy sauce.

input_text: How to make Prego Chicken Parmesan?
target_text: You can make Prego Chicken Parmesan with 1/2 cup dry Italian style breadcrumbs, 1/4 cup parmesan cheese, 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 1 egg, slightly beaten, 1/4 cup salad oil, 1 (15 1/2 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce, Prego, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded. Here's the instruction: Combine bread crumbs and cheese. Flatten chicken breasts with flat side of knife to 1/2-inch thickness. Dip in egg then in bread crumb mixture. In skillet, brown chicken in oil; drain on absorbent towels. Place in 2-quart shallow baking dish, 12x8x2. Top with sauce. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, covered at 400°F for 20 minutes or until done.

input_text: How to make Roast Beef Panini?
target_text: You can make Roast Beef Panini with 8 tablespoons sweet- or hot-pepper jelly, 8 slices whole-grain bread, 2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 2 ounces smoked Gouda cheese, shredded, 1/2 pound thinly sliced deli roast beef, 1 cup watercress sprigs, Olive oil cooking spray. Here's the instruction: Spread 1 tablespoon jelly evenly on each of 8 slices of bread. Spread each of 4 slices with 1/2 teaspoon mustard on top of the jelly; sprinkle Gouda evenly on the same 4 slices. Top the remaining slices evenly with the thinly sliced roast beef and the watercress sprigs. Combine the bread slices to create 4 sandwiches. Heat a panini press or a grill pan coated lightly with olive oil cooking spray. Grill the sandwiches in batches, with the press closed, for 2-3 minutes per side. If using a grill pan, cook the sandwiches over moderately high heat with a heavy skillet on top of the sandwiches, pressing down, 2-3 minutes per side or until golden. Halve the sandwiches, and serve immediately.

input_text: How to make Duck Stew: Compote de Canard?
target_text: You can make Duck Stew: Compote de Canard with 4 pounds duck, cut up, 1 tablespoon lard or shortening, 2 large onions, chopped, 2 carrots, chopped, 1 celery stalk, 2 shallots, chopped, 1 clove garlic, 1 cup dry white wine, 2 cups chicken broth, 2 teaspoons tomato paste, 1 teaspoon allspice, 2 bay leaves, 4 sprigs thyme, Salt and pepper, 5 ounces smoked slab bacon, diced, 16 ounces fresh or frozen pearl onions, 1 pound button mushrooms, 1 loaf stale white bread, Olive or vegetable oil, Chopped parsley. Here's the instruction: Saute the duck pieces in the lard until browned. Remove from pan and set aside. Add the chopped onion, carrots, celery, shallots, and garlic and brown lightly. When the vegetables are golden brown, add the duck along with the wine, chicken broth, tomato paste, allspice, bay leaves, thyme, and seasoning. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes. Meanwhile, blanch the diced slab bacon in boiling water for 10 minutes and drain. Steam the pearl onions for 15 minutes. Cut off the stems and dice the mushrooms into large pieces. Remove the duck from the stew and discard the bones. Put the sauce and vegetables through a food mill and return to the pot, adding the diced bacon, button mushrooms, pearl onions, and the duck. Bring to a boil and cook for 5 more minutes. To make the croutons, cut the crusts from 10 slices of bread, and cut each slice into 4 triangles. Brown them in hot oil and keep warm. Serve the stew on individual plates, and arrange the warm croutons around the edges. Accompany with fresh pasta. This dish may be made one day in advance and reheated. Red wine may be substituted for white.

input_text: How to make Crispy Roasted Cauliflower with Tahini Sauce?
target_text: You can make Crispy Roasted Cauliflower with Tahini Sauce with 2 heads Cauliflower, Cored And Cut Into Florets, 2 Tablespoons Olive Oil, Salt To Taste, 1/4 cups Tahini, 2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice, 2 Tablespoons Water, 1 Tablespoon Honey, 1 clove Garlic, 1- 1/2 Tablespoon Ground Sumac, 1- 1/2 Tablespoon Chopped Dill, 1/2 teaspoons Crushed Red Pepper, 3/4 teaspoons Salt. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 F. Spread the cauliflower florets on a rimmed baking sheet in a single layer. Drizzle with oil. Sprinkle with salt and shake the pan to coat the cauliflower with oil and salt. Roast in the oven for 25-30 minutes. Shake the pan once or twice during the roasting to turn the florets. Flip the stubborn florets with tongs. Meanwhile place all the ingredients for the tahini dressing in a blender. Puree until smooth. If the dressing is too thick, add another tablespoon or two of water. Serve the roasted cauliflower warm. Either drizzle the tahini dressing over the top or place in a bowl for dipping.

input_text: How to make Chicken Keene?
target_text: You can make Chicken Keene with 1 roasted deli chicken, salt and pepper, to taste, 1/3 cup butter, 1/3 cup flour, cooking sherry, to taste, 1 cup chicken stock, 1 1/2 cups milk or 1 1/2 cups cream, 1/2 lb mushroom, sliced, 1 roasted red pepper, sliced in strips (from the jar), 1 green pepper, sliced in strips, 9 inches baked sweet tart crust (NOT SWEET, Zaar is being contrary). Here's the instruction: Pick all the meat off the chicken and discard bones and skin. Melt the butter in a pot. Stir in the flour and whisk constantly. Slowly add the chicken stock and milk, continuing to stir constantly until thickened. Stir in the meat, mushrooms, peppers, sherry, and salt and pepper to taste. Pour into the shell and allow to cool slightly before serving. NOTE: For a fancier way to serve, place sheets of phyllo in muffin tins and bake, making phyllo cups. Fill each cup with the chicken mixture and sprinkle a dash of paprika on top or garnish with mushrooms slices or slivers of peppers.

input_text: How to make Carrot And Apple Casserole?
target_text: You can make Carrot And Apple Casserole with 1 lb. carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces, 1 (12 oz.) can pie apples, 1/2 c. white or brown sugar, 1/4 tsp. cinnamon, 1/8 tsp. nutmeg, 2 Tbsp. butter. Here's the instruction: Peel and cook carrots until tender. Spread carrots and apples in flat casserole dish. Sprinkle sugar and spices on top. Dot with butter. Bake at 350° for about 30 minutes. Tastes good with pork or poultry. Serves 4 to 6.

input_text: How to make Sausage Quiche?
target_text: You can make Sausage Quiche with 1 (9-inch) pie shell, 1/2 lb. sausage, 1 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese, 1 small grated onion, 1 Tbsp. flour, 1 large can Pet milk, 2 eggs, parsley. Here's the instruction: Brown meat; drain. Place in pie shell. Sprinkle grated cheese, flour and onion on top. Beat eggs and milk; pour over mixture in pie shell. Sprinkle parsley on top; bake at 350° for 45 minutes or until set.

input_text: How to make Graham Cracker Meatloaf (Oamc)?
target_text: You can make Graham Cracker Meatloaf (Oamc) with 1 1/2 lbs ground beef, raw, 1 cup graham cracker crumbs, 1/2 cup milk, 1/4 cup ketchup, 1/2 cup onion, chopped, 2 eggs, 1/3 teaspoon salt. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients until thoroughly combined. Place in loaf pan OR 8x8 pan. Drizzle with ketchup or BBQ sauce if desired. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. For freezing, I bake first then let cool. Wrap in foil and place in freezer bags for freezer.

input_text: How to make Crockpot Ham--Simple?
target_text: You can make Crockpot Ham--Simple with 1 spiral cut ham, 1 (12 ounce) can cranberry sauce, 1 (12 ounce) can crushed pineapple. Here's the instruction: Put ham in crock pot (slice off a side to make it fit if you need to--I use a 7qt slow cooker). Dump cranberry sauce on top. HAVE FUN! Rub sauce in between slices. Dump pineapple and juice on top of ham. Cook on low for eight hours. Eat thankfully.

input_text: How to make Campanelle With White Beans, Lemon, And Burrata ?
target_text: You can make Campanelle With White Beans, Lemon, And Burrata  with 2 lemons, zested, juiced, 4 cups baby arugula, chopped, 1 (15-ounce) can white beans, rinsed, drained, 1/4 cup drained capers, 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for serving, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste, 1 pound campanelle (or other short pasta), 8 ounces burrata (or fresh mozzarella). Here's the instruction: Combine lemon zest, lemon juice, arugula, beans, capers, red pepper flakes, 1/4 cup oil, and 1/2 tsp. salt in a large bowl. Cook campanelle in a large pot of boiling salted water, stirring occasionally, until al dente. Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup pasta cooking liquid, and add to bean mixture. Stir vigorously and add pasta cooking liquid as needed to fully coat. Season with salt. Transfer pasta to a serving bowl or platter. Using your hands, tear burrata over pasta and drizzle with more oil. Serve immediately.

input_text: How to make Sausage Casserole?
target_text: You can make Sausage Casserole with 1 lb. mild sausage, 1 c. bell pepper, chopped, 1 c. celery, chopped, 1 c. onions, chopped, 1 c. rice, uncooked, 2 cans chicken broth, soup size, salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Brown sausage in a skillet. Add bell pepper and onions. Cook until tender. Add rice and broth. Stir all ingredients together and put in a casserole dish. Cover and bake at 325 for 1 hour.

input_text: How to make Apple Lime Custard Tart ?
target_text: You can make Apple Lime Custard Tart  with 4 tbsp butter plus more for greasing pan, 2 1/2 cups pecans, 4 tbsp sugar, 1/2 tsp salt, 4 large apples, cored and quartered, 3 eggs, 1 cup sugar, zest and juice from 1/2 lime, Whipped cream. Here's the instruction: Preheat over to 375. Grease a 9 inch pie pan with butter. Process crust ingredients in food processor until consistency is fine. Use fingers to press nut mixture into bottom and sides of pan. Place in oven and bake until lightly browned about 10 minutes. Remove from oven.  Pulse apples, eggs, sugar and lime zest and juice in a food processor until thoroughly mixed and peels have been reduced to flecks. Pour filling into prebaked crust, place in oven and bake until custard is set but still quivers, 25 - 30 minutes. remove from oven, let cool and then refrigerate. Serve cold, garnished with whipped cream and candied citrus peel (if desired).

input_text: How to make No Fire S'Mores?
target_text: You can make No Fire S'Mores with graham crackers, mini marshmallows, chocolate bars. Here's the instruction: Split graham crackers into halves. Place mini marshmallows on top of crackers. Put under broiler for a few seconds, until toasty. Remove from broiler and put 1/2 piece of chocolate on top of marshmallows. Put another half of cracker on top of chocolate and press gently down to flatten marshmallows.

input_text: How to make Greek Chicken Recipe?
