target_text: You can make Greek Chicken Recipe with 6 deboned chicken breasts, 6 spinach leaves, 1 pound fresh mushrooms, sliced, 1 can black olives, minced, 1 sm. onion, chopped, 1 clove garlic, chopped, 8 ounce. Feta cheese, 1 can chicken broth, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 3 tbsp. extra virgin olive oil, Flour. Here's the instruction: In large frying pan, place oil, onion, and garlic. Saute/fry till onions are transparent. Set aside off of heat. Take deboned chicken and lb. out with a mallet till thin (1/4 inch). Dredge chicken in flour; spread the piece of chicken out. Place spinach leaf, 2 sliced mushrooms, 2 tsp. minced black olive, and thin slice of Feta cheese on top of chicken breast. Roll chicken breast up and truss with string. When all are stuffed, reheat frying pan and add in chicken. Brown all sides of chicken. Remove chicken and place in casserole dish. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In frying pan, add in remaining mushrooms, black olives, Feta cheese, chicken broth, and soup. Heat till simmering. Pour over top of chicken and bake in oven at 350 degrees for 40 min. Serves 6.

input_text: How to make Anillos?
target_text: You can make Anillos with 1 (1/4-ounce) envelope active dry yeast, 1 cup warm water (100° to 110°), 1/2 cup sugar, divided, 5 cups bread flour, 2 large eggs, 6 tablespoons shortening, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 3/4 cup strawberry preserves, 1 cup powdered sugar, 1/3 cup water. Here's the instruction: Stir together yeast, 1 cup warm water, and 2 tablespoons sugar in a 2-cup liquid measuring cup; let stand 5 minutes. Stir together remaining 6 tablespoons sugar, flour, and next 3 ingredients in bowl of a heavy-duty electric stand mixer. Add yeast mixture, and beat at medium speed with mixer, using dough hook attachment, 6 minutes. Divide dough into 12 equal portions; shape into balls, and place on 2 lightly greased baking sheets (6 balls per baking sheet). Flatten to 4-inch-wide circles with hand; press thumb in center of each circle to make an indentation (about the size of a quarter). Spoon 1 tablespoon preserves in each indentation. Cover and let stand in a warm place (85°), free from drafts, 20 minutes (dough will not double in bulk). Bake at 375° for 13 to 15 minutes or until golden brown. Cool on baking sheets on wire racks. Stir together powdered sugar and 1/3 cup water; drizzle evenly over breads.

input_text: How to make Avocado And Edamame Dip?
target_text: You can make Avocado And Edamame Dip with 6 ounces shelled edamame (green soybeans), 1/2 onion, chopped, 1/2 cup tightly packed cilantro, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 large avocado, peeled, pitted and cubed, 1 lemon, juiced, 1 tablespoon chile-garlic sauce (such as Sriracha(R)), salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Place the edamame, onion, cilantro, and olive oil into a food processor. Pulse until finely chopped. Add the avocado, lemon juice, and chile-garlic sauce; season to taste with salt and pepper. Puree until smooth. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes before serving.

input_text: How to make Matcha Steak?
target_text: You can make Matcha Steak with For the marinade, 1 teaspoon matcha powder, 6 tablespoons tamari, 1/4 cup seasoned rice wine vinegar, 2 teaspoons toasted sesame oil, 2 teaspoons finely minced fresh ginger, 1 clove garlic, finely minced, 2 1-inch thick rib-eye, New York strip or top sirloin steaks (about 1 pound each), For the matcha salt, 1 tablespoon flake sea salt, such as Maldon, 1/2 teaspoon matcha powder, 1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds, optional. Here's the instruction: Whisk the matcha powder, tamari, vinegar, sesame oil, ginger and garlic in a small bowl until the matcha is completely dispersed. Put the steaks in a 1-gallon resealable plastic bag, add the marinade and seal the bag. Marinate the steak flat at room temperature for 1 hour, turning once or twice, or in the refrigerator for up to 12 hours. Combine the flake salt with the matcha powder in a small serving dish and blend with a spoon. Add the sesame seeds, if desired, and stir to combine. Remove the steak from the marinade and discard the excess. Pat the steak dry with paper towels, rubbing off bits of ginger and garlic, and arrange on a baking sheet. Leave at room temperature while you prepare a hot charcoal or gas grill. When the grill is hot (about 425 degrees F), lay the steaks on the grate and grill without moving for 3 minutes. Flip the steaks and grill for another 3 minutes for medium rare, or 1 to 2 minutes longer for medium. (For medium well or well, move the steak to the coolest part of the grill or turn a gas grill to low, close the grill and cook gently until the steaks reach the doneness you prefer.) Transfer the steaks to a platter and sprinkle with the matcha salt. Allow the steak to rest for 5 to 10 minutes before slicing and serving with a drizzle of the toasted sesame oil, if desired. Pass the additional matcha salt at the table.

input_text: How to make Easy Potato Salad With Dill?
target_text: You can make Easy Potato Salad With Dill with 1 pound red potatoes, cut into 3/4-inch cubes, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons cider vinegar, 2 sprigs chopped fresh dill, or to taste, salt and pepper to taste, 1/2 cucumber - peeled, seeded, and finely chopped, 4 green onions, sliced. Here's the instruction: Place the potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until tender, about 12 minutes. Drain and allow to steam dry while you prepare the dressing. Whisk together the mayonnaise, apple cider vinegar, dill, salt, and pepper. Stir in the cucumber and green onions. Add the warm potatoes to the dressing and toss gently to coat with the dressing. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.

input_text: How to make Clams With Israeli Couscous?
target_text: You can make Clams With Israeli Couscous with 2 teaspoons olive oil, 1 cup finely chopped yellow onion, 1 cup finely chopped fennel bulb, 1 cup uncooked Israeli couscous, 1 garlic clove, thinly sliced, 1/3 cup dry white wine, 1 1/2 cups fat-free, lower-sodium chicken broth, 1 cup unsalted tomato sauce, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper, 24 littleneck clams (about 1 1/2 pounds), 3 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, 4 lemon wedges. Here's the instruction: Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add oil to pan; swirl to coat. Add onion and fennel; saute 3 minutes. Add couscous and garlic to pan; saute 1 minute. Add wine to pan; cook 1 minute or until liquid almost evaporates. Stir in broth, tomato sauce, salt, and pepper; bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 7 minutes. Nestle clams in couscous mixture. Cover and cook 8 minutes or until clams open. Discard any unopened shells. Sprinkle with parsley; serve with lemon wedges.

input_text: How to make Homemade Magic Shell (Ice Cream Topping)?
target_text: You can make Homemade Magic Shell (Ice Cream Topping) with 4 ounces chocolate chips, 3 tablespoons butter. Here's the instruction: Melt chocolate chips and butter together. Cool. When ready to serve pour over ice cream.

input_text: How to make Cappuccino Pie in Chocolate Cookie Crust?
target_text: You can make Cappuccino Pie in Chocolate Cookie Crust with 2 qt. MAXWELL HOUSE Caffeinated Coffee, brewed single strength, chilled, 2 pkg. JELL-O Vanilla Whip N Chill Mousse, 8 each OREO Pie Crust (9 inch). Here's the instruction: Place coffee and mousse mix in bowl of electric mixer fitted with wire whip attachment. Beat on low speed 30 seconds or just until moistened. Scrape bowl. Beat on medium speed an additional 5 to 8 minutes or until light and fluffy. Spoon filling evenly into crusts. Refrigerate until ready to serve.

input_text: How to make Pork Stew with Olives and Green Beans?
target_text: You can make Pork Stew with Olives and Green Beans with 4 tablespoons olive oil, 3 pounds pork ribs boneless, cut into 1 1/2inch pieces, 2 large onions chopped, 8 each garlic cloves, 1 can italian plum (roma) tomatoes, 1 can chicken broth, low salt, 1 cup white wine dry, 1 teaspoon thyme crumbled, 1 teaspoon oregano crumbled, 3/4 cup olives hojiblanca, cacerena or nicoise, 1 pound green beans cut into 2inch lengths. Here's the instruction: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in heavy Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Season pork with salt and pepper. Add pork to pot and cook until brown, stirring occ asionally, about 8 minutes. Using slotted spoon, transfer pork to plate. Add remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil to pot. Add onions and saute until very tender, about 12 minutes. Add garlic and cook 3 minutes. Return pork to pot. Add tomatoes with their juices, low-salt chicken broth, white wine, thyme and oregano. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer uncovered until pork is almost tender, about 1 hour. Add olives and continue cooking until pork is very tender and juices are slightly thickened, about 45 minutes. Add green beans to stew. Cover and cook over low heat until beans are just ten der, about 8 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve.

input_text: How to make Vodka Pasta Sauce?
target_text: You can make Vodka Pasta Sauce with 2 garlic cloves, 1 large shallot, 1/2 cup onion, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 (4 1/2 ounce) whole tomatoes, drained, 3 fresh tomatoes, chopped, 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, salt, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1/4 cup vodka, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour (if necessary for thickening), chopped fresh basil (optional), parmesan cheese (optional). Here's the instruction: In a saucepan saute garlic, shallots and onion in olive oil, about 5 minutes. Add canned tomatoes, fresh tomatoes, crushed red pepper and salt. Stir, breaking up tomatoes and cook on medium to high heat for about 10 minutes. Add heavy cream and vodka; stir. Cook for an additional 5-10 minutes. If the mixture needs thickening, quickly stir in 1 tablespoon flour; cook until thick. Keep heated until serving. Serve over cooked penne, rigatoni or pasta of your choice. Also, great spooned over chicken or pork cutlets. Dust with parmesan cheese.

input_text: How to make Peach Conserve?
target_text: You can make Peach Conserve with 5 c. sugar, 5 c. peeled and mashed peaches, 1 large can crushed pineapple, 1 large pkg. apricot Jell-O. Here's the instruction: In a large enamel or stainless saucepan, combine sugar, peaches and pineapple including juice. Bring to a boil; stir and cook to dissolve sugar. Boil for 20 minutes. Stir in gelatin. While mixture is still hot, pour into hot sterile jars. Seal with hot lids and rings. Makes 6 to 8 small jars. Good on toast or biscuits. Great warmed in microwave and served over vanilla ice cream.

input_text: How to make Broccoli Crescents?
target_text: You can make Broccoli Crescents with 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chipped broccoli, thawed and drained, 1/2 c. Velveeta cheese, cubed, 1/4 c. dry bread crumbs, 3 crispy cooked bacon slices, crumbled, 2 or 3 (8 oz.) cans refrigerated crescent rolls. Here's the instruction: Combine broccoli, Velveeta cubes, bread crumbs and bacon in 1 1/2-quart saucepan. Cook over low heat, stirring occasionally until cheese is melted. Unroll dough. Separate into 16 triangles. Cut each in half lengthwise, forming 32 triangles. Spread each triangle with cheese mixture. Roll up, starting at wide end. Place on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375° for 11 to 13 minutes or until golden brown.

input_text: How to make Fresh Strawberry Pie?
target_text: You can make Fresh Strawberry Pie with 1/2 cup (125 ml) butter, 1 cup (225 ml) flour, 1/4 cup (60 ml) light brown sugar, 1/3 cup (80 ml) chopped pecans, 1 cup (225 ml) whole strawberries, 3/4 cup (175 ml) water, 1 cup (225 ml) sugar, 2-1/2 tbsp (35 ml) cornstarch, 1-1/2 quarts (1425 ml) strawberries, sliced, whipped cream. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 375 degrees (200 C.). Blend butter, flour,and brown sugar to form crumbles. Stir in pecans. Press mixture into 9 inch pie plate. Bake 12 to 15 minutes until browned. Crush 1 cup (225 ml) berries in saucepan. Add water, 1 cup (225 ml) sugar,and cornstarch. Cook, stirring until mixture thickens, do not overcook. Cool. Arrange the 1-1/2 quarts (1425 ml) sliced berries in pie shell. Pour cooled glaze over berries. Chill. Top with whipped cream.

input_text: How to make Bacon and Cheddar Drop Biscuits?
target_text: You can make Bacon and Cheddar Drop Biscuits with 1/4 cup onions finely minced, 4 slices bacon crisply cooked, finely minced, 1 3/4 cups flour, all-purpose, 2 teaspoons baking powder double-acting, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons vegetable shortening cold, 3/4 cup cheddar cheese, very old, sharp coarsely grated, 23 cup milk. Here's the instruction: In a skillet, cook the onion in the reserved fat over moderately low heat, stirring, until it is softened, let mixture cool. In a small bowl combine the onion mixture with the finely minced (do this in a food processor) bacon, season with freshly ground pepper. Into a bowl, sift together the flour, the baking powder, the baking soda, and the salt. Add the shortening and blend the mixture until it resembles coarse meal. Stir in the bacon mixture and the cheddar, add the milk and stir the mixture until it just forms a soft sticky dough. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoons onto a buttered baking sheet. Bake the biscuits in the middle of a preheated 425 degrees F. oven for 15 to 17 or until pale golden brown.

input_text: How to make Russian Beet Salad?
target_text: You can make Russian Beet Salad with 2 medium potatoes, 2 carrots, 1 medium beet, 1 medium white onion, 10 ounces dill pickles, 10 ounces russian sauerkraut, 1 (16 ounce) can kidney beans or (16 ounce) can cannellini beans, 4 tablespoons sunflower oil or 4 tablespoons olive oil. Here's the instruction: Boil the beet, carrots, and potatoes in one pot with the skins on. The beet takes about an hour and a half to cook. Potatoes take about half an hour. Carrots take about 15 minutes. Check if vegetables are done by piercing with a knife or fork. A knife should easily go through the beet. Peel and cube the vegetables. Mix them in a large bowl. Mince the onion and add to the bowl. Cube the pickles one by one and add them to the bowl until the desired amount of pickles is added. 10 oz is an approximate amount. Add sauerkraut to the bowl in small amounts until the desired amount of sauerkraut is achieved. Same deal as pickles. Note: Russian sauerkraut has carrots in it and no fennel seeds. If Russian sauerkraut is not available, use regular sauerkraut. Add the beans and the oil to the bowl. I prefer to used boiled beans instead of canned, but that adds an extra step. Mix and refrigerate for a few hours, overnight preferably. Serve cold.

input_text: How to make Shrimp-And-Quince Curry?
target_text: You can make Shrimp-And-Quince Curry with 1 tablespoon margarine, 2 cups diced cored peeled quince (about 2 quinces), 1 1/2 cups low-salt chicken broth, divided, 1 cup chopped onion, 2 tablespoons minced peeled fresh ginger, 1 tablespoon minced seeded jalapeno pepper, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 2 tablespoons curry powder, 2 cups canned crushed tomatoes with added puree, undrained, 1 cup diced red bell pepper, 1 cup diced yellow bell pepper, 1/4 cup dried currants, 2 pounds medium shrimp, peeled and deveined, 1 tablespoon water, 2 teaspoons cornstarch, 2/3 cup plain fat-free yogurt, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 8 cups hot cooked rice, 2 tablespoons sliced green onions. Here's the instruction: Melt the margarine in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add quince; saute 3 minutes or until lightly browned. Add 1/2 cup broth and onion. Simmer 12 minutes or until liquid evaporates. Add ginger, jalapeno, and garlic; saute 1 minute. Add curry powder; saute 1 minute. Add 1 cup broth and tomatoes. Bring to a boil; reduce heat, and simmer 15 minutes. Add bell peppers and currants; simmer 5 minutes. Add shrimp; simmer 4 minutes. Combine water and cornstarch. Stir yogurt until smooth. Add the cornstarch mixture, yogurt, salt, and pepper to skillet. Bring to a simmer, and cook 1 minute or until mixture is slightly thick, stirring constantly. Serve the curry over rice, and sprinkle with green onions.

input_text: How to make Danish Dumplings?
target_text: You can make Danish Dumplings with 12 cup butter (or margarine or chicken fat or a mix of whatever you have), 1 cup milk, 1 tablespoon granulated sugar, 34 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon nutmeg, 1 12 cups all-purpose flour, 3 eggs. Here's the instruction: Boil butter, milk, and sugar in a saucepan on medium high heat. Sift together flour, salt, and nutmeg. Pour boiling mix into dry mix and stir until smooth. Add well-beaten eggs (one at a time) and mix thoroughly. Drop by spoonful into boiling soup. Cover and cook for 14 minutes.

input_text: How to make Gardener's Bread?
target_text: You can make Gardener's Bread with 2 medium size fresh pears, 13 cup finely grated unpared zucchini, 13 cup finely grated carrot, 3 cups flour, 1 12 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 34 teaspoon cinnamon, 14 teaspoon baking powder, 14 teaspoon ground ginger, 3 large eggs, 1 12 cups sugar, 1 cup vegetable oil, 1 12 teaspoons vanilla, 12 teaspoon grated lemon peel, 12 cup chopped walnuts. Here's the instruction: Grate pears to measure 1 1/2 cup. Combine flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, baking powder and ginger. Beat eggs in separate bowl then gradually beat in sugar and oil. Add vanilla and lemon peel. Blend into flour mixture. Add the pears, carrot, zucchini and nuts and mix well. Divide mixture into 2 greased loaf pans. Let stand 5 minutes then bake at 350 for 55 minutes.

input_text: How to make Summer Squash Soup?
target_text: You can make Summer Squash Soup with 1 tablespoon light stick butter, 1 1/2 pounds fresh yellow squash, sliced and cut in half (about 4 1/2 cups), 1 cup chopped Vidalia or other sweet onion, 1 (14 1/2-ounce) can fat-free, reduced-sodium chicken broth, 1/2 cup 2% reduced-fat milk, 1 1/2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper, 2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese. Here's the instruction: Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat; add squash and onion. Cover and cook 13 minutes or until squash and onion are very tender. Transfer squash mixture to a food processor bowl; puree until smooth. Return squash mixture to saucepan. Stir in broth and next 4 ingredients; cook, uncovered, over low heat until thoroughly heated. To serve, ladle 1 cup soup into each of 4 individual serving bowls, and top evenly with Parmesan cheese.

input_text: How to make Oriental Salad?
target_text: You can make Oriental Salad with 1/2 medium cabbage, chopped, 4 green onions (scallions), cut into small pieces, 5 Tbsp. sesame seed, browned without oil, 1 small pkg. sliced almonds, browned without oil, 1 pkg. Maruchan Ramen soup mix or chicken flavored, 1 pkg. Campbell's 80% fat-free noodles (Ramen type), 1/3 to 1/2 c. oil (canola preferred), 3 tsp. sugar, 3 Tbsp. vinegar. Here's the instruction: In a bowl, place chopped cabbage, chopped scallions, browned sesame seed and browned almonds.	Break noodles from soup package and add these. Take season package from soup and add oil, sugar and vinegar. Mix separately and pour over salad and toss. You can add as many seeds and almonds as you would like. Sunflower seeds are good in it too.

input_text: How to make Jeweled Fruitcake Miniatures?
target_text: You can make Jeweled Fruitcake Miniatures with 1 (8 oz.) pkg. apricots, cut up, 1 c. red maraschino cherry halves, drained, 1/2 lb. green candied pineapple, chopped, 3/4 c. Gold Medal flour, 3/4 c. sugar, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. pitted dates, cut up, 2 1/2 c. Brazil nuts, chopped, 1/2 c. green maraschino cherry halves, drained, 1/4 lb. red candied pineapple, chopped, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 3 eggs. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Place baking cups in a muffin pan. Spoon batter into each cup.	Bake at 325° for 25 minutes or line 6 miniature loaf pans, 4 3/4 x 5/8 x 1 1/2 inches with aluminum foil; grease. Divide batter among pans; spread evenly. Bake at 325° for 35 to 40 minutes.

input_text: How to make Sour Cream Cake?
target_text: You can make Sour Cream Cake with 3 c. sifted flour, 1/8 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. soda, 2 sticks butter, 3 c. sugar, 6 eggs, separated, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. lemon, 1 c. sour cream. Here's the instruction: Sift together flour, salt and soda; set aside. Cream together butter and sugar until fluffy. Add egg yolks one at a time. Add vanilla and dry ingredients alternately with sour cream. Beat whites and fold into mixture. Bake at 300° for 1 1/2 hours.

input_text: How to make Maple Almond Cake?
target_text: You can make Maple Almond Cake with 1 cup butter softened, 2 cups sugar, 4 eggs, 1 1/2 teaspoons maple syrup, 1 2/3 teaspoons vanilla extract, 2 1/2 cups all purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup ground almonds, 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg, 1 cup almond milk. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease and flour a 10-inch Bundt pan. Mix together flour, baking powder, salt, and ground almonds. Set aside. In large mixing bowl cream together sugar and butter until light a fluffy. Beat in eggs one at a time. Stir in maple syrup and vanilla. Beat in flour mixture alternating with almond milk. Pour batter into prepared Bundt pan. Bake 50-60 minutes or until cake tester inserted into center of cake comes out clean. Cool cake for 10 minutes and invert on wire rack. Allow to cool completely and ice with vanilla glaze made with 1/8 tsp. vanilla added to 1/3 cup powdered sugar. Add 1-2 tbsp. water and mix until it forms a thick icing adjusting sugar and water as necessary. Drop in a few tablespoons of toasted and sliced almonds. Place wire rack and cake over cookie sheet lined with wax paper and pour icing over completely cooled cake.

input_text: How to make Baked Crappie?
target_text: You can make Baked Crappie with 4 (1/2-pound) pan-dressed crappie, 2 teaspoons salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1/4 cup butter or margarine, melted, 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1 1/2 cups crushed cheese-flavored crackers, Fresh parsley sprigs (optional). Here's the instruction: Rinse fish thoroughly in cold water; pat dry. Sprinkle fish with salt and pepper. Combine butter and lemon juice. Dip fish in butter mixture; roll in crushed crackers. Place fish on an aluminum foil-lined shallow baking pan. Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 20 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. (Tails of fish may be covered with aluminum foil to avoid overbrowning.) Transfer fish to a serving platter. Garnish with parsley, if desired. Serve immediately.

input_text: How to make Chewy Saucepan Blondies?
target_text: You can make Chewy Saucepan Blondies with 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 2 cups firmly packed brown sugar, 2 large eggs, 1 tablespoon vanilla, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup chopped pecans, 1/8 cup confectioners' sugar, for sprinkling. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Melt butter in 2-quart saucepan over medium heat, 2-3 minutes. Add brown sugar; mix well. Cool 5 minutes. Stir in eggs and vanilla. Add flour and salt; mix well. Stir in pecans. Spread batter into lightly greased 13x9-inch baking pan. Bake for 22-27 minutes or until set. Cool completely. Sprinkle with confectioners' sugar.

input_text: How to make Rump Roast Au Jus?
target_text: You can make Rump Roast Au Jus with 1 tablespoon ground black pepper, 1 tablespoon paprika, 2 teaspoons chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon celery salt, 1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon mustard powder, 1 (4 pound) rump roast, 1/2 cup water. Here's the instruction: In a small bowl, mix together black pepper, paprika, chili powder, celery salt, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, and mustard powder. Rub mixture over the surface of the meat. Place roast in a slow cooker, and add 1/2 cup water. Cover, and cook on Low for 8 to 10 hours. When meat is tender and well done, transfer roast to a serving platter. Skim fat from juices, and strain; serve with meat.

input_text: How to make Greek Feta And Olive Spread?
target_text: You can make Greek Feta And Olive Spread with 6 ounces feta, crumbled, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon garlic, minced, 2 ounces sun-dried tomatoes, 1/2 teaspoon oregano, 1 tablespoon black olives, chopped. Here's the instruction: Put everything except the olives in a food processor and blend until smooth. Add olives by hand. Refrigerate until ready to serve.

input_text: How to make Spicy Grilled Pork Chops?
target_text: You can make Spicy Grilled Pork Chops with 6 (6 ounce) lean pork chops, center cut, 1/2 " thick, 1 1/4 cups water, 2 tablespoons vinegar, 2 tablespoons onions, minced, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 2 teaspoons sugar, 1 1/4 teaspoons pepper, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon dry mustard, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon ground red pepper, 1/4 teaspoon hot sauce, vegetable oil cooking spray. Here's the instruction: Trim pork chops and place them in a shallow dish; set aside. Combine water and next 10 ingredients in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Pour over the chops. Cover and marinate in refrigerator 8 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chops from marinade; reserving marinade. Coat grill rack with cooking spray; place on grill over medium-hot coals. Cook chops 15-20 minutes or until tender, turning and basting frequently with reserved marinade.

input_text: How to make Fruit Dip?
target_text: You can make Fruit Dip with 1 (18 ounce) jar marshmallow creme, 1 (8 ounce) strawberry cream cheese, softened. Here's the instruction: Beat together. Serve with fruit.

input_text: How to make Apple Fritters?
target_text: You can make Apple Fritters with oil for frying, 1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour, 3 Tbsp. sugar, 2 Tbsp. cornstarch, 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. ground allspice, 3/4 c. milk, 2 eggs, slightly beaten, 1 Tbsp. butter, melted, 2 c. chopped apples (about 2 medium). Here's the instruction: In deep-fat fryer or deep saucepan, heat 2 inches butter to 375°. In medium mixing bowl, combine flour, sugar, cornstarch, baking powder, salt, allspice, milk, eggs and melted butter. Stir with fork or wire whisk until just blended. Fold in apples.

input_text: How to make Pumpkin Bread?
target_text: You can make Pumpkin Bread with 3 c. sugar, 4 eggs, 3 1/2 c. flour, 2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. cloves, 1 tsp. nutmeg, 2/3 c. water, 1 c. oil, 2 c. pumpkin, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 2 tsp. soda, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. allspice. Here's the instruction: Add sugar to oil, then eggs, pumpkin, spices, flour and other ingredients. Pour into loaf pans, greased. Fill pans halfway. Bake at 350° for 65 to 70 minutes.

input_text: How to make Caramel Corn?
target_text: You can make Caramel Corn with 2 c. brown sugar, 1/2 c. Karo syrup, 1/2 c. butter, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. baking soda, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Mix sugar, syrup, butter and salt in saucepan. Bring to a boil and boil for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add soda and vanilla. Make 6 quarts of popcorn. Pour over popcorn. Mix real good. Put in oven at 250° for 1 hour. Stir every 15 minutes.

input_text: How to make Duck Burger?
target_text: You can make Duck Burger with 1 pound ground duck meat, 1 ounce duck fat, 4 scallions, finely chopped, 2 teaspoons grated fresh ginger, 1/4 teaspoon Chinese five-spice powder, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 4 slices Swiss cheese, 4 Brioche rolls, big enough for a burger, mayonnaise, for garnish. Here's the instruction: In a bowl, mix the ground duck, scallions, ginger, duck fat, and Chinese five-spice together, season with salt and pepper. Portion into 4 patties Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a 12-inch skillet over medium high heat until it begins to shimmer. Cook burgers, flipping once, about 8 minutes for medium rare. Top with cheese and serve on the buns with a side of mayo.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Cornstarch Pudding?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Cornstarch Pudding with 3 sq. Hershey's baking chocolate, 3 c. rich milk, 1 c. granulated sugar, 1/4 c. cornstarch, 1/4 tsp. salt, 1 Tbsp. butter, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Melt baking chocolate in double boiler over simmering water and add milk. Stir until well blended. Combine together the sugar, cornstarch and salt and add a small amount of hot chocolate mixture, stirring vigorously. Return to double boiler and cook until thickened, stirring constantly. Cook 20 minutes longer. Add butter and vanilla. Spoon into serving dishes and press waxed paper directly onto surface of pudding. Cool and chill. Serve with sweetened cream if desired. Serves 6.

input_text: How to make Egg Caserole ?
target_text: You can make Egg Caserole  with 5 eggs, 2 cups of milk, 3/4 lb of shredded cheese, Salt & Pepper, Tsp of Dry Mustard, Bacon or Sausage or Green Peppers, etc. Here's the instruction: Grease the bottom of a 9x13 pan Remove the crust from the bread Layer the bread to the bottom of the pan Layer the cheese on top of the bread Pour the egg mixture on top of the cheese Bake at 350 for 1 hour

input_text: How to make Wheat Germ And Pine Nut Bread?
target_text: You can make Wheat Germ And Pine Nut Bread with 1 11/16 cups water, 2 tablespoons oil, 2 tablespoons honey, 3 15/16 cups whole wheat flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons wheat gerrm, 2 1/4 teaspoons dry yeast, 1 1/8 cups pine nuts. Here's the instruction: In a bread machine pan, add all the ingredients in the order listed. Program on the dough cycle. Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease a loaf pan with butter and sprinkle with whole wheat flour. Place the dough in the pan, sprinkle the top with whole wheat flour and make a few cuts on the surface. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from oven and unmold.

input_text: How to make Spanish Rice?
target_text: You can make Spanish Rice with 2 c. Minute rice, 1 green pepper, 2 onions, 1 (4 oz.) can tomato paste, 6 slices bacon. Here's the instruction: Chop green pepper and onions. Cook bacon; drain drippings. In skillet, saute pepper, onions and tomato paste. Cook Minute rice; add to other ingredients. Serves 4.

input_text: How to make Apple Cake?
target_text: You can make Apple Cake with 1 3/4 c. sugar, 3 eggs, 1 c. vegetable oil, 2 c. flour, 1 tsp. baking soda, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. vanilla extract, 1 c. chopped walnuts, 2 c. chopped apples. Here's the instruction: Beat eggs thoroughly and combine with sugar. Add vegetable oil and mix well. In separate bowl, mix flour, soda, salt and cinnamon. Sift. Combine all ingredients, mixing well; add vanilla, nuts and apples and mix. Batter will be on the stiff side. Pour into 9 x 13-inch pan, loaf or Bundt pan. Bake at 375° for 45 to 60 minutes or until done. May be topped with powdered sugar or glaze.

input_text: How to make Simply Delicious Italian Beef?
target_text: You can make Simply Delicious Italian Beef with 1 whole Beef Roast (average Size), 2 teaspoons Basil, 2 teaspoons Oregano, 2 teaspoons Onion Powder, 2 teaspoons Garlic Powder, 2 teaspoons Pepper, 1 teaspoon Salt To Taste, 2 cups Water. Here's the instruction: Place roast in crock pot. Add water and spices. You may use a thawed or frozen roast for this recipe. If using frozen, cooking time will be 7-8 hours, on high. If using a fresh or thawed roast, cooking time will be 3-4 hours on high or 4-6 on low. You may have to experiment with cooking times. Beef is ready when it falls apart and you can shred it with a fork. Serve on buns with mayonnaise or horseradish sauce. Enjoy!

input_text: How to make Creamy Vegetable Bake?
target_text: You can make Creamy Vegetable Bake with 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened to room temperature, 1/3 cup milk, 1/4 cup parmesan cheese, grated, 1 teaspoon dried basil leaves, 4 large carrots, diagonally sliced, 1/2 lb sugar snap pea, 1/2 lb fresh asparagus, cut into 1-inch lengths, 1 large red bell pepper, chopped, 1 (6 ounce) package stove-top stuffing mix for chicken. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease a 9- x 13-inch baking dish. Microwave cream cheese and milk in a large microwaveable bowl on HI heat 1 minute or until cream cheese is melted and mixture is blended when stirred. Add Parmesan and basil; stir until blended. Add vegetables; toss to coat. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Prepare stuffing as directed on package; spoon over vegetable mixture. Bake in preheated oven 30 minutes or until golden brown.

input_text: How to make Chilled Asparagus With Sesame Vinaigrette?
target_text: You can make Chilled Asparagus With Sesame Vinaigrette with 2 lbs asparagus, trimmed, 8 teaspoons sesame oil, 4 teaspoons rice vinegar, 4 teaspoons soy sauce, 1 teaspoon sugar, toasted sesame seeds. Here's the instruction: Cook asparagus in a large skillet of boiling, salted water until just crisp-tender, about 4 minutes. Drain; rinse with cold water and drain well. Pat dry with paper towels. Arrange on a platter. Mix sesame oil, rice vinegar, soy sauce, and sugar in a small bowl and season to taste with salt and pepper. (Asparagus and sauce can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover separately and refrigerate.) To serve, spoon dressing over asparagus, sprinkle with toasted sesame seed and serve.

input_text: How to make Hearty Kielbasa Soup #5FIX?
target_text: You can make Hearty Kielbasa Soup #5FIX with 1 (1 lb) package polska kielbasa, cut up, 1 (24 ounce) package Simply Potatoes Traditional Mashed Potatoes, 64 ounces chicken broth, 6 green onions, cut up, 8 ounces cream cheese, cut up. Here's the instruction: Place Kielbasa into dutch oven over medium heat, add chicken broth and mashed potatoes. Cook 5 minutes then add green onions and cream cheese and stir until incorporated. Bring everything to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes. Serve and enjoy.

input_text: How to make Tofu Katsu 두부 까스?
target_text: You can make Tofu Katsu 두부 까스 with 16 ounces firm tofu, 1 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 cup all purpose flour, 2 eggs beaten, 2 cups panko breadcrumbs, 2 tablespoons brown sesame seeds black n, optional, canola oil for frying, sauce katsu. Here's the instruction: 1. First drain the tofu of excess water, and place each piece on a board lined with several paper towels at an angle, set for 15~30 minutes. Or for faster usage, top the tofu with additional towels and slightly press each by hand. 2. Next, prepare the 3 shallow bowls big enough to fit tofu pieces and add panko breadcrumbs, beaten eggs, and flour. Bread the tofu by dredging it first in the flour mixture, then in the beaten egg (let excess drip off), and finally in the breadcrumbs. Pat the breadcrumbs on to help them adhere. 3. Fill a pan or skillet large enough to hold two tofu pieces with at least enough oil to submerge halfway. Heat the oil on medium for several minutes before adding the tofu pieces. To test if the oil is ready, throw in a few breadcrumbs and they should bubble immediately. Fry the tofu pieces until golden brown, turning over when evenly browned on both sides. 4. Carefully transfer the tofu slices to a plate lined with paper towels, and repeat the process for the remaining slices of tofu. Let the tofu set for a few minutes to cool before serving. Serve with katsu sauce for dipping and other side dishes if available.

input_text: How to make Chicken Wing Sauce?
target_text: You can make Chicken Wing Sauce with 1 c. honey, 1/2 c. soy sauce, 1 tsp. ginger, 1/2 tsp. garlic salt. Here's the instruction: Put chicken wings in a 10 x 13 pan. Mix ingredients. Pour over wings. Bake 1 1/2 hours. Every 20 minutes, turn wings. Serve over rice.

input_text: How to make Mexican Pizzas?
target_text: You can make Mexican Pizzas with 1 1/2 c. Bisquick mix, 1/2 c. cornmeal, 1/2 c. water, 1 lb. ground beef, 1 envelope taco seasoning, 3/4 c. water, 1 can refried beans, 1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar, 1 c. shredded lettuce, 2 medium tomatoes, 1/2 c. chopped onion. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 425°. Grease 12-inch pizza pan. Mix Bisquick, cornmeal and 1/2 cup water until soft dough forms. Beat vigorously 20 strokes. Pat in pan with floured hands, forming 1/2-inch rim. Bake 10 minutes. Cook and stir ground beef until brown. Stir in seasoning mix and 3/4 cup water. Heat to boiling, stirring frequently. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered until thickened 5 to 10 minutes. Spread beans over crust. Top with beef and sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes longer. Serve with topping and taco sauce.

input_text: How to make Curried Halibut Skillet?
target_text: You can make Curried Halibut Skillet with 4 halibut fillets (4 ounces each), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 4 teaspoons curry powder, 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, 1 large sweet onion, chopped, 1 can (14-1/2 ounces) diced tomatoes, undrained, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 1-1/2 teaspoons grated lime zest, 1 teaspoon minced fresh gingerroot, 1/4 cup sweetened shredded coconut, toasted, 1/4 cup minced fresh cilantro. Here's the instruction: Sprinkle fillets with salt; coat with curry. In a coated with cooking spray, brown fillets in 1 tablespoon oil; remove and set aside. In the same pan, saute onion in remaining oil for 1 minute. Stir in the tomatoes, lime juice, lime zest and ginger. Bring to a boil. Return fillets to the pan; cover and simmer for 10-12 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve with tomato mixture; sprinkle with coconut and cilantro.

input_text: How to make Itsy Bitsy Spider Cookies?
target_text: You can make Itsy Bitsy Spider Cookies with 1 (16 ounce) packagechocolate candiquik candy coating, 24 round crackers or 24 cookies, 1 (14 ounce) bag red licorice, strings, 1 (12 ounce) jar peanut butter, 1 (1 2/3 ounce) bag M&M's. Here's the instruction: Melt CANDIQUIK Coating according to directions on package. Dip tops of cracker or cookie in CANDIQUIK Coating; place on wax paper to set. Place 2 M&M' s on top as eyes. Let dry. Spread peanut butter on dipped cracker or cookie. Arrange 4 red licorice pieces (cut into 4 inch strips) on the peanut butter to form the legs. Put a dab of peanut butter on another dipped cracker or cookie and place on top of cracker or cookie with legs.

input_text: How to make Marinated Carrots?
target_text: You can make Marinated Carrots with 2 lb. carrots, 1 green pepper, thinly sliced, 1 medium onion, thinly sliced, 1 (10 1/2 oz.) tomato soup, 1/2 c. oil, 1 tsp. prepared mustard, 2 stalks celery, thinly sliced, 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce, 3 Tbsp. vinegar, 1/4 tsp. pepper, 1 c. sugar. Here's the instruction: Boil until tender the amount of carrot that you want. Drain and while hot mix in 1 to 2 tablespoons of orange or kumquat marmalade. A small amount of butter may also be used.

input_text: How to make Delicious Ham Sandwiches?
target_text: You can make Delicious Ham Sandwiches with 1/4 lb. butter, softened, 1/4 c. chopped onion, 1 tsp. mustard, 1 tsp. poppy seed, 1 tsp. Accent, sliced or slivered ham, sliced Swiss cheese, hamburger buns. Here's the instruction: Mix together the first 5 ingredients. Place ham on bottom of bun. Spread with sauce; put on slice of cheese, then top with bun. Wrap sandwiches individually in aluminum foil. Bake 30 minutes at 350°. May be made ahead and refrigerated until ready to heat.

input_text: How to make Aji Aamarillo Chile Pepper Sauce ( Vegan )?
target_text: You can make Aji Aamarillo Chile Pepper Sauce ( Vegan ) with 2 tablespoons aji yellow paste or 2 tablespoons one aji amarillo pepper, chopped and sauteed in oil, 1/2 cup vegan mayonnaise, 1/4 cup vegan sour cream, 1 tablespoon ketchup, 2 green onions, white and green parts, chopped, 1 -2 lime, juiced, to taste, salt, to taste, pepper, to taste. Here's the instruction: Coarsely chop the white parts of the green onions. Add the chopped onions with all the rest of the ingredients (except the salt and pepper) to the bowl of a food processor or blender. Process until mixture is smooth and creamy. Season sauce with salt and pepper to taste, and chill until ready to serve. *Note: This sauce seems to taste even better after 24 hours in the refrigerator. Store in the refrigerator for up to one week.

input_text: How to make Baked Chicken?
target_text: You can make Baked Chicken with 1 chicken, cut in serving pieces, 8 oz. apricot preserves, 1 envelope onion soup mix, 1 bottle Russian dressing, 1/4 c. water. Here's the instruction: Mix preserves, soup mix, water and dressing. Pour over chicken and bake at 350° about 1 hour.

input_text: How to make Sunday Roast Chicken With Vegetables?
target_text: You can make Sunday Roast Chicken With Vegetables with 1 3-4 pound young preferably organic or kosher chicken, 2-3 small to medium onions, 1/2 lemon, 6 medium red potatos, 1 fennel bulb (or 2 teaspoons of fennel seeds), 2 large carrots, 6-8 garlic cloves, bunch of fresh thyme, freshly ground black pepper, kosher salt, olive oil, 1-2 tablespoons of butter, about a quarter cup of dry vermouth, water, white wine or no salt chicken stock, 1 tablespoon flour. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and rub outside and inside cavity with the salt and pepper. Cut lemon in half and onion in half and put these in the cavity. Put a small handful of fresh thyme and 2 smashed garlic cloves in cavity. Tie legs with kitchen string. Cut the potatoes in half, the onion and fennel in quarters, the carrots in 2 inch pieces and toss in olive oil salt and pepper, and some thyme. If using fennel seeds toss with vegetables instead of bulb. Put the tossed vegetables in the roasting pan and place the chicken on top. Place pan in the 425 degree oven and roast for 1 1/2 hours or until legs are loose and the bird is golden brown. Check the roast every 20 minutes or so to baste the chicken and toss the vegetables around so they don't burn. Remove chicken from the pan to rest. Remove vegetables from pan and put in a separate serving bowl and cover to keep warm. place roasting pan on stove top over a medium heat. Add vermouth, butter, flour, some water or no salt chicken broth or white wine, a few twigs of fresh thyme and make a roux. Strain gravy. Plate chicken, with vegetable and the gravy.

input_text: How to make Boston Cream Pie Made Over?
target_text: You can make Boston Cream Pie Made Over with 1 pkg. (4-serving size) Jell-O Vanilla Fat Free Instant Pudding, 1-1/2 cups cold skim milk, 1 cup thawed Cool Whip Light Whipped Topping, divided, 1 prepared angel food cake (284 g), cut horizontally into 3 layers, 1 oz. Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate, chopped. Here's the instruction: Beat pudding mix and milk in medium bowl with whisk 2 min. Stir in 1/2 cup Cool Whip. Stack cake layers on plate, spreading pudding mixture between layers. Microwave chocolate and remaining Cool Whip in microwaveable bowl on HIGH 30 sec. ; stir until chocolate is completely melted and mixture is well blended. Spoon over cake. Refrigerate 1 hour.

input_text: How to make Aziza's Lambrusco Sangria Recipe?
target_text: You can make Aziza's Lambrusco Sangria Recipe with 5 large or 10 small ice cubes, plus more for shaking, 1/2 medium lemon, peeled and sliced into small cubes, 1/2 medium lime, peeled and sliced into small cubes, 1/2 medium orange, peeled and sliced into small cubes, 1 ounce brandy, 1 ounce Cointreau, 1 ounce gin, 1 ounce Simple Syrup, 5 ounces dry, or secco, Lambrusco. Here's the instruction: Add the measured ice cubes, lemon, lime, and orange to a cocktail shaker and until the fruits exude their juices. Add more ice until the shaker is three-quarters full. Add the brandy, Cointreau, gin, and simple syrup. Shake well until chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain the mixture into a large wineglass and top with the Lambrusco. Mix thoroughly with a bar spoon and serve.

input_text: How to make Balsamic Roasted Sausages?
target_text: You can make Balsamic Roasted Sausages with 12 thin sausages, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 6 sprigs thyme, 9 ounces mushrooms, sliced, 5 ounces cherry tomatoes, 3 large tomatoes, quartered, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar. Here's the instruction: Heat the oven to 425F. Place the sausages in a roasting tin with half the oil and the thyme sprigs. Cook for 10 mins then add the mushrooms and tomatoes and drizzle over the remaining oil and the balsamic vinegar. Cook for a further 10 mins until the sausages are golden brown and cooked through. Serve the sausage mixture piled onto crusty bread rolls and some ketchup or relish if you like.

input_text: How to make Broccoli Bread?
target_text: You can make Broccoli Bread with 10 oz. box frozen broccoli, 1 onion, chopped, 4 eggs, 8 oz. cottage cheese, 1/2 c. self-rising meal, 1/2 c. flour, 1 1/2 sticks butter, melted, 1 1/2 c. yellow cornmeal, 1 c. plain flour, 1/2 c. grated coconut, 6 Tbsp. dark brown sugar, 6 tsp. baking ???, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 c. milk, 1/2 c. canned coconut milk, 2 eggs, 6 Tbsp. oil, 1 tsp. ground cinnamon, 1 tsp. grated nutmeg, 1/2 c. dark raisins. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 425°. Grease well a 9 x 13-inch pan. Place dry ingredients in large bowl. Add remaining ingredients and stir for 2 minutes or until mixture is a smooth, thick batter. Pour into prepared pan and bake until light brown on top, about 30 minutes.

input_text: How to make Cabbage Rolls?
target_text: You can make Cabbage Rolls with 1 lb. ground chuck, 1 lb. ground beef, 1 egg, 1 1/2 c. cooked brown rice, 4 cloves chopped garlic, 1/4 c. chopped onion, 1/2 tsp. thyme, 3/4 tsp. ground rosemary, 1/2 tsp. red pepper, 1/4 tsp. celery seed, 1/2 to 1 tsp. basil, ground pepper, 2 medium heads cabbage, 1 1/2 to 2-quarts home canned tomatoes. Here's the instruction: Mix the first 12 ingredients together. Steam lightly 2 medium heads of cabbage until leaves can be folded without breaking. Pack the mixture in the leaves. Cook at a moderate simmer for about 1 1/4 hours or until done. The juice will come from 1 1/2 to 2-quarts home canned tomatoes.

input_text: How to make Christmas Morning Casserole?
target_text: You can make Christmas Morning Casserole with 1 lb ground beef, 4 cups broccoli florets, 6 slices white bread, 12 eggs, 2 cups milk, low fat, 2 cups cheddar cheese, low fat, shredded, salt, pepper. Here's the instruction: Spray a 13x9 baking pan with cooking spray. Brown the ground beef and steam the broccoli. Line the baking pan with the slices of bread. Whisk together the eggs and milk. Crumble the cooked beef over the bread. Add the broccoli and the shredded cheese. Pour the egg/milk mixture over all. Place in the refrigerator for 12 hours. Preheat the oven to 325F Bake for 1 hour, or until eggs are set and the top of the casserole is light brown.

input_text: How to make Spanish Omelette with Vegetables and Cheese?
target_text: You can make Spanish Omelette with Vegetables and Cheese with 1/2 lb. (225 g) fresh asparagus spears, trimmed, cut into 2-inch lengths, 1 cup grape tomatoes, cut in half, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1/4 cup Kraft Zesty Italian Dressing, 1 cup Cracker Barrel Shredded Light 4 Cheese Italiano Cheese, divided, 6 eggs, 1/2 cup milk, 1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Cook and stir asparagus, tomatoes and garlic in dressing in ovenproof skillet on medium heat 5 min. Remove from heat; spread to evenly cover bottom of skillet. Sprinkle with half the cheese. Beat eggs, milk and crushed pepper with whisk until blended; pour over ingredients in skillet. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 20 min. or until knife inserted in centre comes out clean.

input_text: How to make Chicken Chilaquiles?
target_text: You can make Chicken Chilaquiles with 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast, cooked,shredded, 12 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 dash cayenne pepper, 1 (14 1/2 ounce) can diced tomatoes with mild green chilies, undrained, 1 (15 ounce) can mexican style beans (ranch style beans will work fine), 1 (14 1/2 ounce) can Mexican-style corn, drained, 12 cup water, 2 cups nacho cheese flavored tortilla chips, slightly broken, 2 cups shredded Mexican blend cheese, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro. Here's the instruction: Spray large non-stick skillet with non-stick cooking spray. Heat over medium-high heat until hot. Add chicken; sprinkle with garlic powder and cayenne pepper. Cook and stir 2 minutes. Add tomatoes, beans, corn and water; mix well. Reduce heat to medium-low. Cover skillet, and cook 5 minutes. Add chips and 1 Tbsp of cilatro; stir gently to mix. Cook 5 to 7 minutes, until mixture has reduced, and chips are softened. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover, cook an additional 2 to 3 minutes, or until cheese is melted. Sprinkle remaining tablespoon of cilantro over top.

input_text: How to make Healthy Raspberry "ice Cream"?
target_text: You can make Healthy Raspberry "ice Cream" with 1 cup raspberries, 12 cup strawberry, 12 cup blueberries, 12 cup pomegranate juice (or other fruit juice if desired), 3 (1 teaspoon) packets stevia powder (Sweetleaf is a good brand), 1 cup almond milk, 1 cup skim milk, 14 cup raspberry protein powder (1 scoop, I used Spiru-tein but you can probably substitute another brand if desired), 12 teaspoon flax seed (optional). Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend well. Pour into freezer container and freeze.

input_text: How to make Jalapeno Cheese Spread?
target_text: You can make Jalapeno Cheese Spread with 16 oz sharp cheddar cheese, shredded, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 2 tbsp worcestershire sauce, 1/2 tsp garlic powder, 12 slice jalapenos, or more, to taste (see recipe Note), 2 tbsp jalapeno juice (see recipe Note). Here's the instruction: NOTE: This recipe uses sliced jalapenos from a jar, as shown in the photo, along with some of the liquid (juice) they're packed in. With the chopping/blending blade in your food processor, blend all ingredients until smooth, about 2 minutes. I start off with half the amount of cheese plus all the other ingredients, blend that together for about 20 seconds, then there's enough room in the food processor to add the rest of the cheese. I like mine made with about 24 jalapeno slices blended in. I suggest you start with 12 slices, blend, taste and adjust to your own taste.

input_text: How to make Summertime Salad With Balsamic Dressing?
target_text: You can make Summertime Salad With Balsamic Dressing with 3 cups julienned cooked lean beef, 1 cup sliced fresh green beans, steamed, 12 cup cucumber, sliced, 1 12 cups celery, diced, 12 cup green pepper, diced, 1 lb baby new potato, boiled and diced, 14 cup green onion, finely chopped, 3 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped, 13 cup olive oil, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 34 teaspoon salt, 1 garlic clove, minced, 1 12 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 14 teaspoon dried tarragon. Here's the instruction: Combine salad ingredients in large bowl. In a seperate bowl, combine dressing ingredients. Toss with vegetable mixture. Chill for at least an hour to blend flavors. Serve on a bed of salad greens.

input_text: How to make Pink And Pretty Pineapple Salad?
target_text: You can make Pink And Pretty Pineapple Salad with 1 (6 oz.) pkg. strawberry gelatin, 1 c. boiling water, approximately 1 lb. can crushed pineapple (can be more or less), 1 pt. sour cream of substitute sour cream *, 1/2 c. chopped nuts, 1/2 c. sliced maraschino cherries. Here's the instruction: Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Add pineapple. Chill to unbeaten egg white consistency. Stir in sour cream, nuts and cherries. Pour into 9-inch square pan. Chill to firm. Cut in squares. Serves 8.

input_text: How to make Streusel Coffee Cake Muffins?
target_text: You can make Streusel Coffee Cake Muffins with FOR THE MUFFINS:, 1 cup All-purpose Flour, 1 cup Whole Wheat Flour, 1-1/2 teaspoon Baking Powder, 1/2 teaspoons Cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoons Baking Soda, 1/4 teaspoons Salt, 3 whole Eggs, 1/2 cups Granulated Sugar, 1 cup Plain Greek Yogurt, 5 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter, Melted And Cooled, FOR THE STREUSEL TOPPING/FILLING:, 1/2 cups Brown Sugar (unpacked), 1/2 cups Rolled Oats, 1/4 teaspoons Cinnamon, 1 pinch Salt, 3 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter, Cut Into Pieces. Here's the instruction: For the muffins: Preheat oven to 350 F and line a 12-count muffin tin with liners or cooking spray. In a medium bowl, mix together flours, baking powder, cinnamon, baking soda and salt. In a larger bowl, whisk together eggs and sugar until smooth. Add in yogurt, stirring until consistency is smooth and thick. Stir in cooled melted butter. Fold in the dry ingredients and mix until combined. For the streusel filling and topping: In a small bowl, mix together brown sugar, oats, cinnamon and salt. Cut in cold butter pieces using a fork or your fingers, mixing together until small crumbs form. Set aside. Fill the muffin tins almost halfway full with batter, then sprinkle with some of the streusel topping, making sure to slightly press down so the filling bakes together. Add another few spoonfuls of batter on top, then sprinkle tops with another handful of the streusel mixture. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until golden on top. Serve hot with butter! Recipe adapted from How Sweet It Is.

input_text: How to make Homemade Crab Soup-No Heavy Cream Or "Cream Of" Soups!?
target_text: You can make Homemade Crab Soup-No Heavy Cream Or "Cream Of" Soups! with 1/4 cup light butter (such as Promise brand), 1 large yellow onion, diced, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 3 tablespoons flour, 2 cups clam juice, 2 cups reduced-sodium chicken broth, 10 ounces white corn, frozen, 1 tablespoon reduced-sodium Old Bay Seasoning, 1 bay leaf, 3 cups crabmeat (picked through to remove any shells), 1 cup skim milk, 1 (8 ounce) package neufchatel cheese, cubed (1/3 less fat cream cheese), salt and pepper, to taste. Here's the instruction: Melt the butter in a pot over medium heat. Add the onions and cook until tender and translucent. Add the garlic and cook 1 minute more. Add the flour to the pot, stirring to mix well and cooking for 3 to 4 more minutes. Whisk in the clam juice and chicken broth. Bring them to a boil. Once boiling, add in the corn, old bay, and bay leaf. Reduce the heat and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, uncovered. Gently stir in the milk, cubed cream cheese, crab meat, and any necessary salt/pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the cream cheese is melted and the soup is heated through. Remove the bay leaf, grab some saltines or oyster crackers, and enjoy! **Some helpful hints: The clam juice is found in a bottle in my grocery store, not in a can. Also, the frozen corn doesn't need to be thawed before adding to the soup, and canned corn can be substituted. Finally, 1/3 less fat cream cheese is sometimes called "Neufchatel" cheese.

input_text: How to make Tuscan Panzanella Salad?
target_text: You can make Tuscan Panzanella Salad with 1 (10 ounce) bag mixed salad greens (romaine and leaf lettuce mix), 1 (19 ounce) can cannellini beans, rinsed and drained (white kidney beans), 2 cups large croutons, 1 cup grape tomatoes, 1/2 cup thinly sliced red onion, 1/3 cup pitted kalamata olive, cut in half, 1/3 cup balsamic vinaigrette, freshly grated parmesan cheese (optional) or romano cheese (optional). Here's the instruction: In large bowl, mix all ingredients except vinaigrette. Add vinaigrette; toss until coated. Sprinkle with freshly grated Parmesan or Romano Cheese.

input_text: How to make Fenugreek Prawns?
target_text: You can make Fenugreek Prawns with 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 2 bunches spring onions, chopped, 3 green chilies, deseeded and finely sliced, 2/3 teaspoon ginger powder, 2/3 teaspoon garlic powder, 2/3 teaspoon red chili powder, 2/3 teaspoon turmeric, 450 g peeled prawns, 1/2 bunch of fresh fenugreek leaves, 2 tomatoes (to garnish), salt. Here's the instruction: Heat oil in a saucepan. Add the spring onion and green chillies and then cook for a few mins. Add the Standard Four and cook stirring for about 2 mins Stir in the prawns and the fenugreek leaves chopped and cook gently for 20 mins. After this reduce the heat to very low and simmer for 3 mins more. Arrange the tomato slices on a platter and serve the prawns hot immediately.

input_text: How to make Easy, Light, Best Butter Pecan Cake?
target_text: You can make Easy, Light, Best Butter Pecan Cake with 1 (18 ounce) box butter pecan cake mix, 3 eggs (or as called for by your cake mix), 1/3 cup oil (or as called for by your cake mix), 1 1/3 cups water (or as called for by your cake mix), 1 (6 ounce) box vanilla instant pudding mix, 1 cup milk (I use skim, but you can use what you like), 12 ounces Cool Whip (I use fat-free, but you choose), 1 1/2 - 2 cups of chopped pecans (I toast them for a few minutes-which is optional), 1 teaspoon vanilla. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°F. Mix the cake mix as directed on box (do not overbeat). Bake in three layers (approximately 20 minutes) in greased and floured pans. Cool in pans for 10 minutes then remove to rack and cool completely before frosting. Mix the pudding and milk together until it starts to thicken. Fold in the Cool Whip. Add the nuts and vanilla. Frost the cake This makes a lot of icing so be generous between the layers and icing the cake. Store in the refrigerator.

input_text: How to make Pumpkin Cheese Pie?
target_text: You can make Pumpkin Cheese Pie with 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, 2 cups pumpkin puree, 14 ounces sweetened condensed milk, 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, 1 (9 inch) unbaked pie crust. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Mix cream cheese and condensed milk together until smooth. Stir in the pureed pumpkin, pumpkin pie spice and eggs. Mix until well combined. Pour batter into the pie shell. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes or until a knife inserted 1 inch from the edge comes out clean. Serve warm.

input_text: How to make J. D.'S Hush Puppies?
target_text: You can make J. D.'S Hush Puppies with 1 c. self-rising cornmeal, 2 c. self-rising flour, 1 large onion, 1/4 c. sugar, 2 eggs, slightly beaten, 1 tsp. salt, 1 1/2 c. milk, oil for deep frying. Here's the instruction: Combine eggs, milk and onion and mix well. Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in milk mixture until the dry ingredients are moist. Drop by tablespoons into 375° oil. Fry 2 minutes or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels.

input_text: How to make Butterscotch Cake?
target_text: You can make Butterscotch Cake with 1 pkg. SuperMoist white cake mix, 1 (4 serving size) pkg. butterscotch instant pudding and pie filling, 1 c. milk, 1/2 c. vegetable oil, 4 egg whites, powdered sugar. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 350°. Grease and flour 12-cup Bundt cake pan. Beat cake mix (dry), pudding and pie filling (dry), milk, oil and egg whites in large bowl on low speed 30 seconds. Beat on medium speed for 2 minutes. Pour into pan and spread evenly. Bake 50 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes in pan; turn upside down onto heatproof serving plate. Remove pan; cool cake completely. Sprinkle with powdered sugar before serving. Yields 12 servings.

input_text: How to make My Favorite Fresh Spinach Salad?
target_text: You can make My Favorite Fresh Spinach Salad with 1 bag Ruskin brand spinach, 1 small can bean sprouts, 1 small can water chestnuts, 2 hard-boiled eggs, 8 slices bacon, cooked, 1 small onion. Here's the instruction: Wash spinach and tear into pieces. Add drained bean sprouts and water chestnuts (drained and sliced thin). Add boiled eggs, cut up; add bacon, fried crisp and crumbled. Add onion, sliced thin and separated into rings. Toss in large bowl and add dressing. Serves 6 to 8.

input_text: How to make Wild Grape Jelly?
target_text: You can make Wild Grape Jelly with 3 lbs wild grapes, stemmed, 3 cups water, 4 1/2 cups sugar, 1 (85 ml) package liquid pectin. Here's the instruction: In large saucepan, crush grapes with potato masher; pour in water and bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes or until fruit is very soft. Transfer to jelly bag or colander lined with a double thickness of fine cheesecloth and let drip overnight. Measure juice (you should have 3 cups/750 ml) into a large heavy saucepan; stir in sugar. Bring to boil over high heat, stirring constantly. Stir in pectin. Return to full boil and boil hard for one minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and skim off foam with a metal spoon. Pour into sterilized jars, leaving 1/8 inch headspace.

input_text: How to make David's Cowboy Cookies?
target_text: You can make David's Cowboy Cookies with 1-1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened, 1 cup granulated sugar, 1 cup dark brown sugar, firmly packed, 3 eggs, 2 tsp. vanilla, 2-3/4 cup all-purpose flour, 3/4 tsp. baking powder, 1-1/2 tsp. baking soda, 1/2 tsp. salt, 3 cups old-fashioned rolled oats, 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 375F. In a large bowl with an electric mixer, cream butter and sugars until light and fluffy. Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating well after each addition. Beat in vanilla. Into the bowl sift together flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt. Beat (by hand) until the batter is combined well. Stir in rolled oats and chocolate chips. Drop batter by rounded tablespoons onto lightly buttered baking sheets. Bake in middle of oven until golden, about 10 minutes. Remove from cookie sheet and cool.

input_text: How to make Candy Corn Fudge?
target_text: You can make Candy Corn Fudge with 1 1/2 cups sugar Dixie Crystal, 7 ounces marshmallow cream, 2/3 cup evaporated milk, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 2 cups candy corn, 1 cup white chocolate chips. Here's the instruction: Line 8-inch square pan with aluminum foil, extending foil over edges. Butter the foil. Set aside. In a large heavy bottom pot, combine marshmallow cream, sugar, evaoprated milk and butter. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring constantly, until the mixture reaches a soft ball stage (235 ° on a candy thermometer). This will take 10 to 15 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in white chocolate chip pieces. When they have completely melted, stir in candy corn. The mixture will get hard to stir. Immediately transfer to the foil-lined pan and smooth the top until even. Press candy corn pieces on top, if desired. Let cool for about 2 hours before cutting.

input_text: How to make Warm Tuna Pita Pockets?
target_text: You can make Warm Tuna Pita Pockets with 1 can (6 ounces) light water-packed tuna, drained and flaked, 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese, 1/3 cup chopped celery, 2 tablespoons chopped onion, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 2 pita pocket halves. Here's the instruction: In a small bowl, combine the tuna, cheese, celery, onion and mayonnaise. Spoon into pita halves. Place on an ungreased . Bake at 400° for 8-10 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted.

input_text: How to make Cherry Pretzel Torte?
target_text: You can make Cherry Pretzel Torte with 1 c. margarine, 3/4 c. granulated sugar, 2 c. crushed pretzels, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, 1/2 c. confectioners sugar, 4 c. whipped topping, 1 (21 oz.) can cherry pie filling. Here's the instruction: In medium saucepan, melt butter. Add sugar and blend. Remove from heat and stir in pretzel crumbs.	Pat in 9 x 13-inch baking pan. In large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and powdered sugar. Fold in whipped cream. Spread mixture on crust. Cover with pie filling. Chill 3 or 4 hours.

input_text: How to make Delmonico Potatoes?
target_text: You can make Delmonico Potatoes with 12 medium potatoes, salt, 1/2 c. butter, 1/3 c. flour, 2 1/4 c. light cream or milk (half and half), 1/8 tsp. pepper, 1 (4 oz.) pkg. (1 c.) shredded Cheddar cheese. Here's the instruction: Cook, peel and dice potatoes. Place in buttered casserole. Melt butter in saucepan, add flour, milk and pepper, making a white sauce. Pour sauce over potatoes after putting some of the cheese throughout the potatoes. Place remainder of cheese on top. May sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.

input_text: How to make Peanut Butter Fudge?
target_text: You can make Peanut Butter Fudge with 2 1/4 c. white sugar, 2/3 c. Pet milk, 1/4 c. butter, 7 oz. jar marshmallow cream, 1 c. peanut butter, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Mix first 3 ingredients and boil for 6 minutes. Mix marshmallow cream and peanut butter and vanilla. Whip with spoon. Pour in buttered pan.

input_text: How to make Grilled Herbed Potatoes?
target_text: You can make Grilled Herbed Potatoes with potatoes (leave skins on), melted margarine, garlic powder to taste, chopped chives, fresh or dried, Italian seasoning. Here's the instruction: Clean potatoes, leave skins on. Cut into quarters lengthwise. Place potatoes on a large doubled piece of foil. Size of foil depends on the amount of potatoes you have. Drizzle melted margarine over potatoes. Sprinkle on garlic powder to taste, add chopped chives (fresh or dried), sprinkle Italian seasoning over. Seal foil. Place over hot grill for about 45 minutes. Or until done (again depends on amount of potatoes).

input_text: How to make Tom'S Favorite Chili?
target_text: You can make Tom'S Favorite Chili with 2 onions, chopped, 1 lb. ground round, 1 lb. ground turkey, 1 large can Brooks mild chili beans, 1 large can Brooks hot chili beans, 1 can tomatoes, 2 cans tomato sauce, chili powder, rice, 1 pkg. Cheddar cheese. Here's the instruction: Brown ground beef, turkey and onions. Drain. Add beans, tomatoes, sauce and chili powder (to taste). Make rice. Mix rice and chili in each bowl; top with Cheddar cheese.

input_text: How to make Light(Er) Clam Chowder?
target_text: You can make Light(Er) Clam Chowder with 6 slices Bacon, 2 Tablespoons Reserved Bacon Drippings, 1 cup Onion, Chopped, 1 cup Celery, Diced, 24 ounces, weight Minced Clams (reserve Liquid), 2 cups Peeled And Diced Potatoes, 1/2 teaspoons Fresh Thyme Leaves (or 1/4 Teaspoon Dried), 1 whole Bay Leaf, Salt And Pepper, to taste, 1/2 cups Flour, 6 cups Milk (skim To 2%). Here's the instruction: Cook bacon until crisp; chop into small pieces and set aside. Reserve 2 tablespoons of the bacon drippings in a large stock pot. Add onion, celery and saute until translucent, about 5 minutes. Add clam juice, potatoes, thyme, bay leaf and 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper. Bring to a boil and reduce to simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until potatoes are soft. In a bowl, whisk together flour and about 1/2 cup milk until there are no lumps. Add flour mixture and remaining milk, bacon, and clams and heat gently until thickened. Do not boil. Taste for seasoning and salt and pepper to taste.

input_text: How to make Potato Soup?
target_text: You can make Potato Soup with 6 medium potatoes, peeled and sliced, 2 carrots, diced, 6 celery stalks, diced, 2 qt. water, 1 onion, chopped, 6 Tbsp. butter, 6 Tbsp. flour, 1 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. white pepper, 1 1/2 c. milk, 1 (8 oz.) ball Mozzarella cheese. Here's the instruction: In a large kettle, cook potatoes, carrots and celery in water until tender. Drain, reserving liquid. Set vegetables aside. In same kettle, saute onions and butter until soft. Stir in flour, salt and pepper. Gradually add milk; stir until thickened. Stir in vegetables. Add 1 cup or more of reserved liquid until soup is desired consistency. Add shredded cheese. Simmer. Serve hot. Makes 2 1/2 quarts.

input_text: How to make Saucy Chocolate Pudding?
target_text: You can make Saucy Chocolate Pudding with 2 5/8 ounces Flora Buttery, 1/2 cup soft brown sugar or caster, 5/8 cup self raising flour, 3 tablespoons cocoa powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 3 eggs, 2 tablespoons cocoa powder, 5 1/2 tablespoons soft brown sugar, 7/8 cup hot water. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to gas mark 4/180°C/160°C fan/350°F. Mix all of the pudding ingredients together. You can cream sugar and the Flora Buttery, then eggs, then flour and cocoa etc, but it's not essential. Set aside. For the sauce mix the cocoa and sugar (use a small bowl) and then add some water and mix to a paste. Gradually add the remaining water to make a runny mix. Grease a 1 litre (2 pint) ovenproof dish with Flora Buttery or Flora Cuisine. Put the pudding mix into the dish first and then carefully pour the runny sauce mix over the top. Bake in the oven for 20 mins and the sauce will miraculously sink through the pudding mix and form a lovely rich chocolatey sauce at the bottom.

input_text: How to make Sakura and Plum Flowers with Just 3 Strawberries?
target_text: You can make Sakura and Plum Flowers with Just 3 Strawberries with 3 Strawberries. Here's the instruction: Rinse the strawberries and cut off the stem. Cut off both sides of the strawberry leaving a slice roughly 1/4 of the original thickness in the middle. Cut a small triangle out of the bottom of the centre strawberry slice. Slice into two halves as shown in the photo. Slice the other 2 strawberries in the same way, and when you have 6 petals, arrange them into flowers with 5 petals.

input_text: How to make Sicilian Penne Salad?
target_text: You can make Sicilian Penne Salad with 12 lb tomato basil penne (or any other pasta), 12 medium green pepper, julienned, 12 medium onion, julienned, 12 head fresh broccoli, cut into florets, 3 ounces about 1/2 cup diced pepperoni, 12 cup sliced black olives, 14 cup pepperoncini pepper, 6 large garlic cloves, minced, 12 cup balsamic vinegar, 12 cup olive oil (EVOO), 2 -3 tablespoons Tabasco garlic pepper sauce, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh oregano, 12 cup freshly grated parmesan cheese. Here's the instruction: 1. Cook pasta in pot of rapidly boiling salted water until al dente (about 8-10 minutes.) Drain. 2. Combine all salad ingredients in a large bowl. In a separate bowl, combine all dressing ingredients and mix well. 3. Pour 1/2 of dressing into salad bowl, toss and refrigerate overnight. 4. Serve the next day on a bed of radicchio and garnish with fresh basil, ground pepper and remaining dressing to taste.

input_text: How to make Garlic Cherry Tomatoes?
target_text: You can make Garlic Cherry Tomatoes with 1 pt. cherry tomatoes, 1 garlic clove, crushed, 1 stick butter, salt and coarse black pepper. Here's the instruction: Place skillet over low heat. Add butter and melt. Add garlic and heat, but do not brown. Add tomatoes. Heat for 4 minutes over very low flame. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately. (Garnish.) Place tomatoes on a bed of watercress. Tuck sprigs of watercress among tomatoes. Serve hot.

input_text: How to make No Bake Cookies?
target_text: You can make No Bake Cookies with 2 c. sugar, 1/4 c. cocoa, 1/2 c. sweet milk, 1/4 lb. butter, 1 c. peanut butter, 3 c. oatmeal, 1 c. coconut, 2 tsp. vanilla.
