Trim core from the edge of fruit and set each wedge back on pineapple peel. Cut fruit crosswise at 1-inch intervals down to, but not through, peel. Set each pineapple section on a plate. If making ahead, cover and let stand up to 2 hours. Pour about 1 inch salad oil into a deep 5- to 6-quart pan and set over high heat. Heat oil until a thermometer registers 350°, then adjust heat as needed to maintain temperature. Place 4 wrapped shrimp at a time in oil. Cook, turning once, until wrapped shrimp are golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. With tongs or a slotted spoon, transfer shrimp to a towel-lined pan; keep warm in a 200° oven. Repeat to cook remaining shrimp. (If frying ahead, let shrimp cool as cooked, then cover and chill up to 4 hours. Reheat, uncovered, in a single layer on a baking sheet in a 350° oven just until hot and crisp, 5 to 6 minutes.) Combine 1/4 cup of the cooked vinegar-chili sauce with the remaining 1/4 cup vinegar, and mix with salad greens. Spoon salad mixture onto plates and sprinkle with daikon, carrot, nuts, and sesame seed. Stick 4 hot skewered shrimp into each pineapple wedge, pushing the skewers through fruit and securely into pineapple peel. Drizzle shrimp with a little of the vinegar-chili sauce. Serve remaining sauce to add to taste.

input_text: How to make Chow-Chow?
target_text: You can make Chow-Chow with 4 lb. onions, 4 lb. cabbage, 24 green tomatoes, 6 c. sugar, 5 c. vinegar, 12 sweet peppers, 4 hot peppers, 4 Tbsp. salt, 1/2 box pickle spices, tied in cloth. Here's the instruction: Grind peppers, onions, cabbage and tomatoes. Add salt and let stand 2 or 3 hours. Pour off juice.

input_text: How to make Homemade Tofu from Soy Milk?
target_text: You can make Homemade Tofu from Soy Milk with 400 grams Soy milk (additive-free), 2 tsp Nigari. Here's the instruction: Put the soy milk in a pot and heat until it's about 80C. Once warmed, turn off the heat and and slowly mix in the nigari a little at a time, being careful not to let it foam. If you slowly mix in the nigari, there will be a lot of lumps. Once it gets to this state, let it sit for about 20 minutes. Place some gauze on top of a strainer and strain the lumpy soy milk. Squeeze the lumps over the gauze, put a light weight on top, and let sit for 20 minutes (to drain). Let sit in cold water for 30 minutes (to remove the excess nigari). This time, I used this brand of nigari.

input_text: How to make Yummy Creamed Cucumbers?
target_text: You can make Yummy Creamed Cucumbers with 4 cucumbers, sliced, 1 white onion, med. (or yellow Spanish), 8 ounces sour cream, 1 cup half-and-half cream, 23 cup salad dressing, NOT mayo, 1 tablespoon dill, 1 tablespoon kosher salt, plus 1 T, 12 cup sugar (or to taste), 1 12 teaspoons black pepper, coarse ground (optional), 2 tablespoons cider vinegar. Here's the instruction: The night before: Peel cukes and slice to desired thickness. Slice or chop onion to desired thickness. Mix together in a bowl with 1 T. kosher salt. Cover with a heavy plate and refrigerate overnight. The next morning: Drain cukes, but do NOT rinse. Mix the remaining ingredients in a separate bowl, until smooth. Pour over cukes/onions and mix thoroughly. Cover and refrigerate for AT LEAST 2-3 hours -- longer for best flavor. ENJOY!

input_text: How to make Margarita Cheesecake?
target_text: You can make Margarita Cheesecake with 1 1/2 cups pretzel crumbs, 1/2 cup butter, melted, 1 cup fresh strawberries, hulled, 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened, 1 cup sugar, 4 large eggs, 1/4 cup fresh lime juice, 1/4 cup tequila, 1/4 cup triple sec or 1/4 cup other orange-flavored liqueur, lime slice, fresh strawberries. Here's the instruction: Combine pretzel crumbs and butter; firmly press on bottom and 1 1/2 inches up sides of a 9-inch springform pan. Bake at 325 degrees for 8-10 minutes; set aside. Place strawberries in container of electric blender; process until smooth, stopping once to scrape down sides. Reserve 1/2 c puree. Beat cream cheese at medium speed with an electric mixer until fluffy. Gradually add sugar, beating well. Add eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition. Stir in lime juice, tequila and liqueur. Pour into prepared pan. Pour reserved strawberry puree on top in a circle and gently swirl batter with a knife. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour and 10 minutes (center will be soft). Remove from oven and run knife around edge of pan to release sides. Return to oven; turn oven off and leave cheesecake in oven 30 minutes. Remove from oven and let cool completely on a wire rack. Remove from pan; cover with plastic wrap and chill 8 hours. DO NOT cover with foil! Garnish, if desired.

input_text: How to make Diabetic Cheesecake Recipe?
target_text: You can make Diabetic Cheesecake Recipe with 6 graham cracker squares, 1 1/2 tbsp. melted butter, 1 tbsp. unflavored gelatin, 1/2 c. cool water, 1/3 c. boiling water, 1/4 teaspoon lemon peel, 1/2 c. lemon juice, 1/4 c. sugar or possibly sugar substitute equivalent, suitable for baking, 2 tbsp. water, 2 c. cream style cottage cheese, 1/2 teaspoon lemon extract, Fresh strawberries. Here's the instruction: Prepare an 8 x 8 x 2 inch cake pan with vegetable spray; set aside. Make crumbs out of the graham crackers 1/2 c. and mix with melted butter; set aside. Soak gelatin in cool water. Combine boiling water and lemon peel; add in to gelatin; add in lemon juice and sugar substitute, stirring till dissolved. Refrigeratetill the consistency of unbeaten egg whites. Put 2 Tbsp. of water, cottage cheese and lemon extract into a blender; blend 10-15 seconds. Add in partially set gelatin mix; turn to high speed blend 15 seconds or possibly till well blended. Pour into the prepared pan. Sprinkle graham cracker crumbs on top. Cut strawberries lengthwise in 1/2. Arrange on top. Refrigerateseveral hrs, till set.

input_text: How to make Slow-Cooked Salmon?
target_text: You can make Slow-Cooked Salmon with 1 1/2 lbs salmon fillets (4 pieces), salt & freshly ground black pepper, Sauce, 1 cup pilsner beer or 1 cup lager beer, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh tarragon, 3 tablespoons lemon juice, 1/2 cup sliced onion, 1/2 teaspoon cracked peppercorn, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1/2 cup whipping cream, Garnish, 2 tablespoons finely chopped parsley. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 225°F (100°C). Season salmon with salt and pepper and place in an ovenproof baking dish. Combine beer, tarragon, lemon juice, onion, peppercorns and olive oil in a pot. Bring to boil and reduce by half. Pour over salmon. Bake for 20 minutes, basting once, or until salmon is cooked but still slightly pink in centre. Place salmon on serving plate. Pour basting liquid into pot on high heat. Reduce until about 1/4 cup (50 mL) remains. Pour in cream, bring to boil and boil until thickened, about 2 minutes. Drizzle over salmon before serving. Garnish with parsley.

input_text: How to make Mother In Law Cake?
target_text: You can make Mother In Law Cake with 2 c. flour, 1 1/2 tsp. baking soda, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 c. sugar, 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, 1/4 c. light molasses, 2 eggs, 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, very soft, 1 c. chopped walnuts, 2 Tbsp. brown sugar. Here's the instruction: In large mixing bowl stir together dry ingredients. Make well in center; drain pineapple, pressing out liquid. Reserve 1/3 cup syrup. Add remaining ingredients.	Beat with wooden spoon. Pour into 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan, greased. Sprinkle with walnuts and brown sugar. Bake in 350° oven for 35 to 40 minutes.

input_text: How to make Menonite Pastry?
target_text: You can make Menonite Pastry with 1 lb lard, 2 teaspoons sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 2 teaspoons salt, 1 cup hot water, 6 cups flour. Here's the instruction: 1/ Place lard in bowl and pour hot water over it an stir till melted. 2/ Add dry ingreadients and blend by hand. Refrigerate till ready to use.

input_text: How to make Hamburger Soup Iv?
target_text: You can make Hamburger Soup Iv with 3 cups water, 4 stalks celery, chopped, 1 pound ground beef, 2 (14.5 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes, 2 cups cubed potatoes, 3/4 cup uncooked white rice, 2 cups elbow macaroni, 1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce. Here's the instruction: In a large pot on medium high heat, combine the water and celery and bring to a low boil. Add the ground beef a little at a time. Reduce heat to medium low and let simmer fo about 10 to 15 minutes. Pour in the stewed tomatoes with liquid. Add the potatoes and any other desired vegetables. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer. While the soup is simmering, bring some water to a boil in another pot. Add the rice and macaroni and cook until they are almost done, leaving them slightly firm. Drain and add them to the soup. Continue to simmer the soup about 25 minutes or until the potatoes and other vegetables are tender. Serve steaming hot with hot sauce for individual tastes.

input_text: How to make Bean Casserole?
target_text: You can make Bean Casserole with 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen green peas, 1 (10 oz.) pkg. baby limas, 1 can cut green beans, 1 can cream of celery soup, 1 (4 oz.) can mushrooms (fresh may be used), 2 Tbsp. butter, 1 can fried onion rings. Here's the instruction: Cook frozen vegetables until thawed; drain. Add drained green beans. Saute mushrooms in butter; add with cream of celery soup. If soup is thick, use small amount milk. Mix all the preceding with 1/2 can onion rings. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Top with other half onion rings. Serve. Have never made this recipe without doubling. A must at Vogler Family dinners for 44 years.

input_text: How to make Bea’S Grand Champion Chicken And Dumplings?
target_text: You can make Bea’S Grand Champion Chicken And Dumplings with 1 (4 -5 lb) roasting hen or (4 -5 lb) broiler-fryer chickens, water, to cover the chicken (too much makes a weak broth), 4 cups plain flour. Here's the instruction: Tips & Notes. If using a frying chicken instead of a roasting hen, you will also need to add 3/4 of a stick of butter to give broth a richer flavor. Bea recommends using only the white breast of the chicken and very little of the dark. Instructions. To prepare the chicken: 1.Cover the chicken with water. Bring to a boil. Add salt to taste. 2.Reduce heat to simmer and cook until falling-apart tender (usually about 1 1/2 to 2 hours). 3.Carefully remove chicken and allow to cool. Debone chicken into strips or small chunks. To prepare the dumplings: 1.Into large bowl, add 4 cups plain flour and salt to taste. Stir well. Cut in the 3/4 cup of Crisco with pastry blender until like coarse cornmeal. Add enough warm (not boiling) chicken broth (usually about 1 1/2 cups) to make a stiff dough. Be careful not to mix too long because it will make dough tough. 2.Heat remaining chicken broth to a rolling boil. 3.Using one-third of the dough ball, roll out to about 1/8-inch thick. Cut into thumb-length strips. Drop into hot broth. Prepare remaining dough the same using one-third of dough ball at a time. 4.After all dumplings have been added to broth, reduce heat to simmer. Add black pepper and simmer 15 to 20 minutes. Add chicken and stir very slowly until heated through and ready to serve.

input_text: How to make Salmon cooked over Smoldering Wood Chips served with a Coconut Milk Rice and Olive Oil?
target_text: You can make Salmon cooked over Smoldering Wood Chips served with a Coconut Milk Rice and Olive Oil with 4 (6-ounce) salmon steaks, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, Lemon pepper, Salt, 3 cups basmati rice, 6 cups water, 2 tablespoons fresh shredded coconut (unsweetened), 1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds, Pinch cumin seeds, 1 tablespoon prepared pesto, 1 teaspoon fresh grated Parmesan, 1 green onion (scallion), chopped, 6 plum tomatoes, 2/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil, Sugar, Salt and freshly ground black pepper, 3 green onions (scallions), chopped, 1/3 cup white wine, 1 teaspoon prepared pesto. Here's the instruction: Preheat a grill with woodchips. Roll the salmon steaks and place on the grill. Sprinkle with brown sugar, lemon pepper, and salt and cook for 7 to 10 minutes. Soak the rice in cold water for 10 minutes. Drain, and cook in 6 cups hot, salted, boiling water until cooked through but still firm. Drain and put rice in a bowl. Add coconut, sesame seeds, cumin, pesto, Parmesan, and green onions and mix well. For the Sauce: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F. Cut the tomatoes lengthwise, place on aluminum foil, cover with olive oil, sugar, salt, and pepper and cook in the oven for 2 hours. Chop into small cubes. Fry the onions, then add the white wine, and let reduce by half. Add the tomatoes and pesto and let simmer for a few minutes. Place the rice in the center of a plate, using a cylinder to give the rice a nice round shape. Place the rolled salmon steaks on top of the rice. Add the sauce over the salmon. Finish the decorations using the herbs of your choice in the center of the salmon.

input_text: How to make Strawberry Buttermilk Gelato?
target_text: You can make Strawberry Buttermilk Gelato with 4 cups strawberries, hulled and quartered, 3/4 cup sugar, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 1/2 cups cold buttermilk, 1/3 cup sour cream. Here's the instruction: Puree the strawberries with the sugar in a food processor or blender until smooth. Add the salt, buttermilk, and sour cream and blend well. Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and process according to the instructions. Once fully churned, chill in the freezer until your desired consistency.

input_text: How to make Baker'S Original German Sweet Chocolate Cake?
target_text: You can make Baker'S Original German Sweet Chocolate Cake with 1 (4 oz.) pkg. Baker's German's sweet chocolate, 1/2 c. boiling water, 2 c. sugar, 2 1/4 c. sifted all-purpose flour*, 1 tsp. baking soda, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 c. buttermilk, 1 c. butter, 4 egg yolks, 1 tsp. vanilla, 4 egg whites, stiffly beaten. Here's the instruction: *Or 2 1/2 cups sifted cake flour.

input_text: How to make Oven Fried Fish?
target_text: You can make Oven Fried Fish with 1/4 c. margarine, 1 Tbsp. lemon juice, 1/4 tsp. each: pepper, paprika and basil, 1/8 tsp. garlic powder (optional), 1 lb. fish fillets, 1/4 c. bread crumbs, 2 Tbsp. safflower oil. Here's the instruction: Combine melted margarine, lemon juice and seasonings. Dip fish fillets in this mixture and cover with bread crumbs. Spread oil in baking dish and arrange fillets in 1 layer. Spoon any remaining margarine mixture over fish and bake in 475° oven for 15 minutes or until fish flakes easily with fork.

input_text: How to make Walnut Chicken Salad With Green Apple Vinaigrette ?
target_text: You can make Walnut Chicken Salad With Green Apple Vinaigrette  with 2 skinless boneless chicken breast halves (about 1 pound), 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, 1 1/2 teaspoons mild honey, 2 tablespoons finely chopped shallot, 5 tablespoons olive oil, 1/3 cup finely diced Granny Smith apple, 1 small head Boston or Bibb lettuce (1/4 pound), leaves separated and left whole, 1 cup seedless red grapes, halved if desired, 1/2 cup walnuts (4 ounces),, 1 celery rib, thinly sliced. Here's the instruction: Bring 2 inches of water with 2 teaspoons salt to a boil in a 2-quart heavy saucepan. Add chicken and poach at a bare simmer, partially covered, until just cooked through, 12 to 14 minutes. While chicken poaches, whisk together lemon juice, honey, and 1/2 teaspoon salt in a bowl until honey and salt have dissolved. Whisk in shallot and oil, then whisk in apple. Divide lettuce, grapes, walnuts, and celery between 2 plates and drizzle with half of vinaigrette. Slice chicken and put on top of salads, then drizzle with remaining vinaigrette.

input_text: How to make Sausage Balls?
target_text: You can make Sausage Balls with 1 lb. ground sausage, 3 1/2 c. Bisquick, 10 oz. shredded cheese. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients together. Bake 20 to 30 minutes at 350°.

input_text: How to make Roasted Shrimp with Green Lentil, Sun-Dried Tomato and Mint Salad?
target_text: You can make Roasted Shrimp with Green Lentil, Sun-Dried Tomato and Mint Salad with 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 1 small onion, minced, 1 small carrot, finely diced, 1 small celery rib, finely diced, 1 quart water, 1 cup French green lentils, rinsed, 1 bay leaf, 6 sun-dried tomato halves (not oil-packed), 1/4 cup chopped mint, 1 1/2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar, 1 teaspoon honey, Salt and freshly ground pepper, 1 pound large shrimp, shelled and deveined. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 425. In a medium saucepan, heat 1 tablespoon of the olive oil. Add the garlic, onion, carrot and celery and cook over moderately high heat, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are starting to brown, about 5 minutes. Add the water, lentils and bay leaf and bring to a boil. Simmer over low heat, stirring a few times, until the lentils are tender, about 25 minutes. Set a colander over a large bowl and drain the lentils; transfer the cooking liquid to a cup. Discard the bay leaf. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, cover the sun-dried tomatoes with water and bring to a boil. Simmer over low heat until softened, about 5 minutes. Drain and cool, then cut into 1/4-inch dice. In the large bowl, mix the mint with the vinegar, honey and 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Stir in the lentils and tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper and stir in 2 tablespoons of the reserved lentil cooking liquid; add more of the liquid if the lentils seem dry. In a 9-inch square baking dish, toss the shrimp with the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Spread the shrimp in the baking dish and roast for about 6 minutes, or until just cooked. Mound the lentil salad on plates, top with the shrimp and drizzle the roasting juices over them.

input_text: How to make North Carolina Dry Rub ?
target_text: You can make North Carolina Dry Rub  with 2 tablespoons chili powder, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 1 tablespoon ground cumin, 1 tablespoon onion powder, 2 teaspoons smoked paprika, 2 tablespoons salt, 1 tablespoon pepper. Here's the instruction: In a medium bowl, mix all ingredients together.  Can be used as a rub for pulled pork.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Cherry Blossoms?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Cherry Blossoms with 3 (1-ounce) squares unsweetened baking chocolate, 3 tablespoons Land O Lakes Butter, softened, 1 1/2 cups sugar, 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 Land O Lakes Eggs, 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/3 cup dried cherries, chopped, 1/3 cup sugar, 1 (11-ounce) bag (60) cherry cordial creme chocolate kisses, unwrapped*. Here's the instruction: Heat oven to 300F. Place unsweetened chocolate in bowl. Microwave, stirring every 30 seconds, 1-1 1/2 minutes or until melted. Add butter; stir until butter is melted. Cool 10 minutes. Combine melted chocolate mixture, 1 1/2 cups sugar, 3/4 cup flour, eggs and baking powder in bowl. Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until well mixed. Add remaining 3/4 cup flour and dried cherries; beat at low speed just until well mixed. Place 1/3 cup sugar in another bowl. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Roll in sugar. Place 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes or until top is cracked and set. Press 1 cherry chocolate kiss immediately into each cookie. Remove to cooling rack. Cool completely or about 1 hour until chocolate is set. Store between sheets of waxed paper in container with tight-fitting lid for up to 5 days.

input_text: How to make Chicken Potato Casserole?
target_text: You can make Chicken Potato Casserole with 32 ounces shredded potatoes, 6 chicken breasts, cooked and diced, 1/2 cup butter, melted, 1 (10 1/2 ounce) can cream of chicken soup, 12 ounces cheddar cheese, shredded, 1 onion, small diced, 1 teaspoon salt, 8 ounces sour cream, 2 cups corn flakes, crushed, 1/2 cup butter, melted. Here's the instruction: Spread shredded potatoes in the bottom of a greased 9 x 13 baking dish. Arrange chicken over potatoes. Combine the remaining ingredients, except topping. Pour over chicken. Mix together the cornflakes and butter. Spread on top. Bake, uncovered, at 350° F for 45 minutes.

input_text: How to make ' End of Summer' Rice Salad With Tuna?
target_text: You can make ' End of Summer' Rice Salad With Tuna with 2 12 cups cold basmati rice or 2 12 cups white rice, 1 (16 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed, 3 roasted red peppers or 3 yellow bell peppers, chopped, 12 cup chopped fresh basil, 12 cup chopped red onion, 2 garlic cloves, crushed, 14 cup extra virgin olive oil, 14 cup fresh lemon juice, 12 teaspoon salt, 12 cup crumbled feta cheese, 8 ounces cooked fresh tuna, chunked, 2 cups fresh baby spinach leaves. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients in a bowl; toss well. Let stand at least 1 hour. Serve at room temperature.

input_text: How to make Apple Betty Pie?
target_text: You can make Apple Betty Pie with 4 c. sliced tart apples, 1/2 c. orange juice, 1 c. sugar, 3/4 c. flour, 1/2 tsp. cinnamon, 1/4 tsp. nutmeg, dash of salt, 1/2 c. butter or margarine. Here's the instruction: Mound apples in buttered 9-inch pie plate. Sprinkle with orange juice. For topping, combine sugar, flour, spices and salt. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly, then scatter over apples. Bake in moderate oven at 375° for 45 minutes or until apples are done and topping is crisp and lightly browned. Serve warm with pitcher of light cream or scoops of vanilla ice cream. Makes 6 servings.

input_text: How to make Fruited Mixed Green Salad With Raspberry Vinaigrette?
target_text: You can make Fruited Mixed Green Salad With Raspberry Vinaigrette with 2 -3 cups mixed salad greens, 12 cup fresh raspberry, 12 cup fresh blueberries, 1 (8 ounce) can pineapple chunks, drained, 2 large bananas, sliced, 3 spring green onions, sliced, 1 tablespoon sunflower seeds, 23 cup raspberry vinaigrette dressing, low-fat. Here's the instruction: In a small bowl, lightly toss together the raspberries, blueberries, drained pineapple chunks, sliced bananas, sliced onions, and sunflower seeds. Place the raspberry low-fat vinaigrette in a small serving bowl with a spoon. On individual salad plates, divide the salad greens equally. Top with spoonfuls of the fruit, onion, and sunflower mixture. Allow each person to drizzle their desired amount of raspberry vinaigrette on the salad.

input_text: How to make Hamburger Rice Chow Mein?
target_text: You can make Hamburger Rice Chow Mein with 1 lb. hamburger, 1 small onion, minced, 1/2 c. uncooked rice, 2 c. diced celery, 1 can chicken rice soup plus 2 cans water, 1 tsp. salt, 3 Tbsp. soy sauce, 1 can chow mein noodles. Here's the instruction: Brown meat and onion; drain. Add remaining ingredients. Put in casserole dish and bake for 1 hour at 350°. Remove from oven, add can of chow mein noodles and bake for another 30 minutes at 350°. (This will seem like a lot of water, but as the rice cooks, it will thicken.) Makes 8 servings.

input_text: How to make One Pan Rice Pudding?
target_text: You can make One Pan Rice Pudding with 1/2 c. rice (long grain-regular), 1 c. water, slightly salted, 1 qt. milk, 1/4 c. butter, 3 eggs, 1/2 c. sugar, 1 c. raisins (optional), 1/2 tsp. vanilla, 3 Tbsp. sugar, 1 Tbsp. cinnamon. Here's the instruction: Pour rice slowly into boiling water. Cover and cook 7 minutes. Add the milk and butter. Stir a little and bring to a boil. Cover and turn to low. Cook 1 hour.

input_text: How to make Apple, Macadamia Nut And Custard Crumble?
target_text: You can make Apple, Macadamia Nut And Custard Crumble with 3/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup butter, chopped, 1/2 cup shredded coconut, 1/3 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 1/3 cup chopped macadamia nuts, 1 cup custard, plus extra to serve, 13.5 oz apple pie filling, 10.5 oz frozen mixed berries, None None powdered sugar, for dusting. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°F. Distribute custard between 6 - 8 oz ramekins. Top with apple pie filling and berries. Set aside. To make the crumble, sift flour into a bowl. Cut in butter until mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs. Mix in coconut, sugar and macadamia nuts. Distribute between ramekins and bake for 25-30 mins, until top is golden and crunchy. Dust with powdered sugar. Serve warm with extra custard.

input_text: How to make Golden Cheese and Cocktail Sausage Rolls?
target_text: You can make Golden Cheese and Cocktail Sausage Rolls with 10 slices white bread (cut off the brown sides), cheddar cheese, slices (Kraft), 20 cocktail franks (mini, grilled earlier), fine breadcrumbs, egg, lightly beaten, cream cheese, garlic powder. Here's the instruction: Cut the bread slices in half. Cut the cheese into pieces that will fit the bread nicely. Place the piece of cheese on the halved bread slice and put the sausage on top. Roll it up,sticking it together with the egg or pinch the sides if it doesnt work. Brush or dip the lil rolls into the egg n dip in breadcrumb. Deep fry until golden brown or if u prefer it to be less oily, just grill 'em. Mix the cream cheese with garlic powder and serve as dip or you can put it in a piping bag and ice the top of the rolls instead. Serve hot.

input_text: How to make Allyson's Chicken Wings?
target_text: You can make Allyson's Chicken Wings with 15 ounces soy sauce, 16 ounces light Italian dressing ("Kens" dressing, if available), 23 cup sugar, 23 cup brown sugar, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon ground ginger, 5 lbs chicken wings (separated). Here's the instruction: Mix first six ingredients together. Put chicken wings in large bowl then pour over the sauce and marinate in refrigerator overnight (or longer). Drain marinade and bake chicken wings in a 400 degree oven (uncovered) for one hour. Stir half way through the cookings.

input_text: How to make Four-Bean Bake?
target_text: You can make Four-Bean Bake with 1 can green lima beans, 1 can dark red beans, 1 can cut green beans, 1 can pork and beans, 1 lb. bacon, 1 medium onion, chopped, 1/2 c. vinegar, 1 c. brown sugar. Here's the instruction: Drain first three kinds of beans. Add pork and beans, blending well. Fry bacon until crisp. Drain on paper towel. Lightly brown the onion in a small amount of the bacon fat. Mix vinegar and brown sugar. Add the onion and simmer for 15 minutes. Add this sauce and the crisp bacon to the beans. Bake, uncovered, at 350° for one hour, stirring twice as it bakes.

input_text: How to make Whole Wheat Casserole Bread?
target_text: You can make Whole Wheat Casserole Bread with 1 package active dry yeast, 3/4 cup warm water (105° to 115°), 1 cup all-purpose flour, divided, 1 cup whole wheat flour, 2 tablespoons sugar, 2 tablespoons frozen egg substitute, thawed, 1 1/2 tablespoons reduced-calorie margarine, melted, 1/2 teaspoon salt, Vegetable cooking spray. Here's the instruction: Combine yeast and warm water in a 1-cup liquid measuring cup; let stand 5 minutes. Combine yeast mixture, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, and next 5 ingredients in a medium bowl, stirring well. Gradually stir in enough of the remaining 1/2 cup all-purpose flour to make a soft dough. (Dough will be sticky.) Let dough rest 15 minutes; shape into a ball. Place dough in a round 1-quart casserole heavily coated with cooking spray. Cover and let rise in a warm place (85°), free from drafts, 30 minutes or until doubled in bulk. Bake at 375° for 25 minutes or until loaf sounds hollow when tapped. (Cover with aluminum foil the last 10 minutes of baking to prevent over-browning, if necessary.) Remove from casserole immediately, and let cool on wire rack.

input_text: How to make Priest Salad?
target_text: You can make Priest Salad with 2 eggplant smalls, 1 small tomato, 1 bell pepper small, 2 scallions or any kind of onions, 1 clove garlic minced, chopped parsley Some, 1 juice small, a lemon and some olive oil, salt, pepper. Here's the instruction: Put the whole eggplant as is, (only cut and remove the stem from the top), on a baking sheet and bake it. You'll notice when it's done that the juice came out on the baking sheet and the skin is almost toasted and it becomes soft when you punch it with a knife. Let it cool for a bit then cut it in half and remove the skin; just cut it roughly into pieces and put it in the salad bowl, it's ok if it has some juice still. Chop or dice the rest of the ingredients and add them as well. Finally, add the salt, pepper, lemon juice and olive oil.

input_text: How to make Green Apple, Jalapeno And Cheddar Omelet?
target_text: You can make Green Apple, Jalapeno And Cheddar Omelet with 3 whole Egg Whites, 1 whole Egg (yolk Included), 1/2 whole Green Apple, Sliced Thinly, Leave Skin On, 1/4 cups Cheddar Cheese, Shredded, 1 whole Fresh Jalapeno, Chopped, Seeded And Membraned. Here's the instruction: Heat a nonstick frying pan on medium heat. Whisk together egg whites and whole egg. Pour into the pan. Once omelet starts to set (is done around the edges and bubbling slightly in the center), place apple slices in a line in the center of the omelet. Sprinkle apples with cheese and jalapeno. Fold over sides of the omelet so it kind of looks like a burrito. After 1 minute, carefully flip and continue to cook for 1 more minute. Remove from the pan, garnish with any remaining cheese, apple slices, and jalapenos (if you have any left)! You do not have to use the egg combo that I do. You can use 2-3 whole eggs, 4-5 egg whites, or egg substitute. I just happen to love the 3:1 texture and color!

input_text: How to make Scalloped Potatoes And Ham?

input_text: How to make Broccoli Cornbread?
target_text: You can make Broccoli Cornbread with 1 (10 oz.) box frozen chopped broccoli, 2 pkg. (dry) Gold Medal corn muffin mix, 1 (12 oz.) carton cottage cheese, 1 stick margarine, melted, 4 eggs, 1 tsp. salt, 1 (small) onion, chopped, or 2 Tbsp. dried onion. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients together. Pour into greased baking dish or pan. Cover and bake 15 to 20 minutes in 400° oven. (For glass dish, bake for 35 minutes in 350° oven.)

input_text: How to make Artichoke Veloute?
target_text: You can make Artichoke Veloute with Juice of 1/2 lemon, 6 large artichokes, 1/4 cup olive oil, 1/4 pound shallots, thinly sliced, 2 tablespoons dry white wine, 5 cups chicken stock, Bouquet garni (2 outer leek leaves; 1/2 rib celery, sliced; 4 sprigs parsley; 1 sprig fresh thyme; 1 bay leaf; 1/2 teaspoon each black and white peppercorns; and 6 coriander seeds tied in a square of cheesecloth), 2 fresh porcini mushrooms, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 ounce foie gras, fresh or canned, finely diced, 3/4 cup heavy cream, Fine sea salt and freshly ground white pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Fill a bowl with cold water; add the lemon juice. Trim the artichoke stems. Bend back the tough outer petals until they snap off. Cut off the tops. Using a sharp-edged spoon, remove and discard the hairy chokes. Slice the artichokes and put in the water. Drain the artichoke slices. In a soup pot, heat the oil over medium-high heat. Add the artichoke slices and the shallots, cover and saute, stirring occasionally, until they begin to caramelize, about 15 minutes. Deglaze the pan with the white wine. Add the stock and the bouquet garni and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer until artichokes are tender, about 20 minutes. Discard the bouquet garni. In a food processor, puree the mixture in batches; strain each batch through a fine sieve, pressing solids with the back of a spoon. Slice each mushroom into thirds. Melt the butter in a small skillet. Add the mushrooms and saute until golden. Set aside. Reheat the soup over medium-low heat. Stir in the foie gras and the cream. Season with salt and pepper. Ladle into 6 bowls and garnish each with a mushroom slice.

input_text: How to make New England Doughnuts?
target_text: You can make New England Doughnuts with 1 Tbsp. shortening, 1 c. sugar, 1 egg, well beaten, 3 tsp. baking powder, 1 c. milk, 1/2 tsp. salt, 2 c. flour, 1/2 tsp. nutmeg. Here's the instruction: Cream shortening and sugar. Add egg, milk, salt and nutmeg. Sift flour; measure and sift with baking powder. Mix well. Add sufficient flour to make a soft roll dough. Chill dough. Turn onto floured board; roll 1/3-inch thick. Cut with floured cutter. Fry in deep fat at 365° until brown. Drain on crumbled absorbent paper.

input_text: How to make Mango Shrimp Salad?
target_text: You can make Mango Shrimp Salad with 4 medium shrimp, 34 kg sweet mango, 439 g fruit cocktail, drained, 3 tablespoons mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon condensed milk. Here's the instruction: Cook shrimps in 1/4 cup fruit cocktail syrup for 5 minutes. Remove shells and cut into small pieces. Cut mango into cubes and soak in remaining fruit cocktail syrup for 5 minutes. Drain. Combine with Fruit Cocktail and shrimps, mayonnaise, and condensed milk. Blend well. Chill until ready to serve.

input_text: How to make Frothy Orange Drink?
target_text: You can make Frothy Orange Drink with 1 small can orange juice, 1 c. milk, 1/3 c. sugar, 1 c. water, 1 tsp. vanilla, 24 ice cubes. Here's the instruction: Blend all ingredients in a blender.

input_text: How to make 1986 Winner: Coconut Joys Recipe?
target_text: You can make 1986 Winner: Coconut Joys Recipe with 1/2 c. Butter, 2 c. Confectioners' sugar, 3 c. Flaked coconut, 1 Tbsp. Lowfat milk, 2 ounce Semi-sweet chocolate, melted. Here's the instruction: Preparation Time: 30 min Chilling Time: 1 hour 1. Heat butter in saucepan. Remove from heat. Add in sugar, coconut and lowfat milk. Mix well. Shape rounded tsp. of mix into balls. Make a dent in the center. Place on a cookie sheet lined with wax paper. 2. Fill center with melted chocolate. Refrigeratetill hard. Store in refrigerator. These freeze wonderfully and look beautiful on a tray. Winner Shere Case of Hickory Hills describes her cookie entry: "Holiday preparation usually starts in September and continues till the night before Christmas. I have been doing this for almost 18 years, and each year I add in more recipes. This particular cookie, passed on to me by my sister- in-law, Diana Forkash of Wisconsin, ranks among the favorites of the family and friends. It looks absolutely gorgeous on a plate, tastes wonderful and is absolutely the easiest thing to make. There is no baking time involved, and you can sit down on the job and enjoy doing them."

input_text: How to make Pork With Beans & Bacon Recipe?
target_text: You can make Pork With Beans & Bacon Recipe with 1 1/2 lbs. lean pork, cubed, 3 tbsp. seasoned flour, 2 fl. ounce. oil, 1 lg. onion, sliced, 4 slices bacon, minced, 14 ounce. can baked beans, 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1 pt. chicken stock. Here's the instruction: Coat pork cubes with flour and heat oil in frying pan. Add in onion and bacon and fry for 5 min. Add in pork and fry for 5 to 8 min or possibly till proportionately browned. Add in beans and cayenne pepper. Gradually add in the stock and bring to the boil, stirring occasionally. Transfer to a casserole dish and cover tightly. Put into a preheated oven to gas mark 4 180 degrees C., 350 degrees F. and cook for 1 to 1 1/2 hrs or possibly till pork is cooked thoroughly.

input_text: How to make Shrimp Ceviche?
target_text: You can make Shrimp Ceviche with 1/2 cup chopped onion, 6 cups water, 3/4 cup fresh lime juice, divided, 1 pound medium shrimp, 1 cup chopped peeled cucumber, 1/2 cup ketchup, 1/3 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 2 Tbsp Mexican hot sauce (such as Tamazula), 1 Tbsp olive oil, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 Avocado. Here's the instruction: Place chopped onion in a colander, and rinse with cold water. Drain Bring 6 cups water and 1/4 cup juice to a boil in a Dutch oven. Add shrimp; cook 3 minutes or until done. Drain and rinse with cold water; peel shrimp. Combine shrimp and 1/2 cup juice in a large bowl; cover and chill 1 hour. Stir in onion, cucumber, and remaining ingredients. Dice avocado into squares using the skin as a cup to dice Add diced Avocado and Serve immediately or chilled.

input_text: How to make Kahlua Cake?

Crisco oil, 1 tsp. vanilla, 3/4 c. brown sugar, 3/4 c. Kahlua, 3/4 c. pecans. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°. Mix all ingredients at medium speed for 2 minutes. Pour into a 10-inch Bundt pan. Bake 45 minutes at 325°, then cover with foil. Bake 25 minutes longer.

input_text: How to make Sausage Roll?
target_text: You can make Sausage Roll with 8 oz. fully cooked Italian turkey sausage, 8 oz. pkg. refrigerated biscuits, 6 oz. grated Mozzarella cheese. Here's the instruction: Peel away casing of sausage and chop meat into small pieces. Brown in skillet sprayed with Pam. On a cookie sheet sprayed with Pam, pressing with fingers, spread the biscuit dough. Make sure seams are tightly sealed and there are no holes or thin spots. Top with sausage and cheese. Roll up dough to enclose filling. Bake on middle shelf for 30 minutes or until golden brown in preheated 350° oven. Check after 15 or 20 minutes.

input_text: How to make Upside-Down Pizza?
target_text: You can make Upside-Down Pizza with 1 1/2 lb. ground beef, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. grated Cheddar, 1 (4 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella, 1 (12 oz.) jar pizza sauce, 1 can biscuits, 1 onion, chopped, 1 bell pepper, chopped. Here's the instruction: Brown ground beef and onion. Add sauce and bell pepper. Pour 1/2 mixture into a casserole dish. Top with Cheddar. Add remainder of mixture and top with Mozzarella. Place biscuits over the top. Bake 20 to 30 minutes at 350° or until browned.

input_text: How to make Peanut Butter And Chocolate Oatmeal?
target_text: You can make Peanut Butter And Chocolate Oatmeal with 1 cup quick cooking oats, 1 teaspoon unsweetened cocoa, 1 teaspoon agave, 1 tablespoon crunchy peanut butter organic, 1/2 cup non fat milk. Here's the instruction: Microwave all ingredients in a small bowl or mug for 1 minute, stir and enjoy! Serve with crushed peanuts or almonds for some extra crunch!

input_text: How to make Black Bean Salad Santa Fe?
target_text: You can make Black Bean Salad Santa Fe with 1 (14 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed, 1 cup corn, 1/2 onion, finely diced, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 ripe avocado, cut into 1/2 inch dice, 1/2 cup tomatoes, diced. Here's the instruction: In a serving bowl, place the beans and corn. Add onion, garlic, spices, lemon juice, cilantro and salt. Toss to combine. Shortly before serving, add the avocado and diced tomato.

input_text: How to make Vegetable Rice Medley?
target_text: You can make Vegetable Rice Medley with 12 cup cooked rice, 14 cup chopped onion, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 1 medium chopped fresh tomato, 14 cup water, 14 teaspoon salt, 12 cup frozen English peas, 14 cup chopped yellow peppers (optional) or 14 cup sweet red pepper (optional). Here's the instruction: In a skillet over medium heat, saute the rice and onion in oil until rice is lightly browned. Add tomato, pepper, water and salt; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir in peas and heat through.

input_text: How to make W1N3 Honey Garlic Chicken Thighs?
target_text: You can make W1N3 Honey Garlic Chicken Thighs with 16 boneless skinless chicken thighs, 1/2 cup flour, 1/2 cup honey, 4 tablespoons soy sauce, 8 garlic cloves, minced, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon pepper. Here's the instruction: Preheat over to 375. In a bowl with tight fitting lid, put the flour. Add chicken, in batches, and shake to coat. Shake off excess flour and place pieces in 2 greased 8x8 pans, be sure NOT to lay them flat. Mix honey, soy sauce, galrc and sasonings, and pour evenly over the cikcen. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes, basting occasionally with the sauce.

input_text: How to make Kissable Coconut Shrimp?
target_text: You can make Kissable Coconut Shrimp with 1 cup rice flour, 1 quart soda water, 1/2 cup fresh coconut flakes (unsweetened), 1 pound shrimp (U-15). Here's the instruction: Make a batter out of the flour and soda water. Dip the shrimp into the batter, then coat in coconut flakes. Deep fry until golden brown in 350 degree oil. Lenswood Sauvignon Blanc.

input_text: How to make Broccoli & Cheddar Soup?
target_text: You can make Broccoli & Cheddar Soup with 1/4 cup butter, 1/4 cup All purpose flour, 3 cup Chicken broth, 3 cup Milk, 1/2 tsp White pepper, 2 cup Broccoli florets, blanched, 3 cup Sharp cheddar, grated. Here's the instruction: In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat butter, at the flour and reduce the heat cook for 2 minutes add the broth, milk,and pepper Bring to a boil Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes Stir in the broccoli and cheese Continue to simmer for an additional 5 minutes Serve soup at once ENJOY

input_text: How to make Venison Chili?
target_text: You can make Venison Chili with 1 lb. venison, 1 diced onion, 1 can kidney beans, 1 can tomato sauce, 2 tsp. chili powder, salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Brown meat in skillet; drain and add rest of ingredients. Simmer 30 minutes in the skillet or cook in crock-pot for 1 hour.

input_text: How to make Flaky Pie Crust?
target_text: You can make Flaky Pie Crust with 4 c. flour, 1 Tbsp. sugar, 2 tsp. salt, 1 3/4 c. shortening, 1 Tbsp. vinegar, 1/2 c. water, 1 egg. Here's the instruction: Mix dry ingredients, then blend in shortening. Beat egg, vinegar and water together. Add to dry ingredients. Form into 4 balls and wrap with wax paper. Chill for 15 minutes. Makes two double pie crust. (If you do not use all the balls, it can be placed in the freezer for use at another time.)

input_text: How to make Cream Cheese Chicken Soup?
target_text: You can make Cream Cheese Chicken Soup with 1 whole Onion, Chopped, 2 Tablespoons Butter, 3 cups Chicken Broth, 4 whole Carrots, Peeled And Chopped, 3 whole Potatoes, Peeled And Cubed, 2 cups Chicken, Cooked And Cubed, 2 Tablespoons Parsley, 1/4 cups Flour, 1 cup Milk, 8 ounces, weight Cream Cheese, Salt And Pepper, to taste. Here's the instruction: Saute onion and butter. Add broth, carrots, and potatoes. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, until veggies are tender. Add chicken, salt and pepper (to taste), and parsley and heat through. Combine flour and milk until smooth; add to the soup and bring to a boil. Cook and stir until thick. Add the cream cheese and stir until smooth.

input_text: How to make Healthy Tiramisu?
target_text: You can make Healthy Tiramisu with FOR THE BASE LAYER:, 1-2/3 cup Almond Flour (Ground Almonds Will Work Too), 1-3/4 ounce, weight Pitted Dates, Finely Minced, 4 Tablespoons Brewed Coffee, 3 Tablespoons Coconut Oil, Melted, FOR THE CHOCOLATE LAYER:, 3-1/2 ounces, weight Sugar Free Chocolate, Broken Into Pieces For Melting, 2 whole Eggs, Separated, 1-1/3 cup Mascarpone, FOR THE TOP LAYER:, 3 drops Vanilla Extract, 2 whole Eggs, Separated, Agave Or Sweetener Of Choice, To Taste (optional), 7/8 cups Mascarpone, 1 Tablespoon Unsweetened Cacao Powder, For Dusting On Top. Here's the instruction: Line a cake tin with parchment paper. Combine ingredients for the base layer in a medium size mixing bowl and mix well. Transfer base layer mixture into the cake tin and spread evenly. For the chocolate later, melt chocolate pieces in a small pan on top of a slightly bigger pan of simmering water. Beat egg yolks until light yellow. Fold in mascarpone and continue beating. The cream needs to have a smooth consistency. Take melted chocolate off heat and leave to cool a little bit. Whilst chocolate is cooling, beat egg whites until it reaches stiff peaks. At this time, chocolate should be cool enough to fold into the mascarpone mixture. Fold it in carefully. Then fold egg whites int. (This is a difficult step. I always have to try my best not to break the egg whites whilst mixing.) Pour chocolate cream onto the cake tin and spread evenly. For the top layer, repeat the method used to create the chocolate later, this time using the vanilla extract and optional sweetener in place of the chocolate. Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form. In another bowl, whisk egg yolks yolk with vanilla extract and optional sweetener until light yellow in color. Mix mascarpone with yolk mixture until smooth. Carefully fold in egg whites. Spread top layer onto the chocolate layer. Sprinkle unsweetened cocoa powder on top. Refrigerate for a couple of hours. Serve straight out of the fridge.

input_text: How to make Mooers Chili?
target_text: You can make Mooers Chili with 3 lb. hamburger, 1 1/2 lb. ground pork, 2 to 3 onions, 2 to 3 green peppers, 1/4 to 1/2 c. chili powder, 2 lb. pinto beans, 2 Tbsp. salt, 1 Tbsp. pepper, 1 c. parsley, 1/2 c. butter, 1 large can whole tomatoes, 1 Tbsp. m.s.g., 1 1/2 Tbsp. salad oil, 2 cloves garlic, 1 Tbsp. cumin. Here's the instruction: Soak beans overnight in water 2-inches over the top of the beans. Simmer the beans, covered, until tender. Add tomatoes, juice and all. Saute in a separate pan: green peppers, onions and garlic in salad oil. Add parsley. In separate pan, melt butter and brown meat. Cook for 15 minutes. Add meat mixture to beans, add remaining spices and simmer, covered, for 1 hour, then uncovered for 30 minutes. Skim fat. If too thick, you can add tomato juice or V-8. This makes a big batch. Freezes very well.

input_text: How to make Spelt Spaghetti, Vine Tomatoes & Baked Ricotta ?
target_text: You can make Spelt Spaghetti, Vine Tomatoes & Baked Ricotta  with Olive oil, 1/2 bunch of fresh thyme (1/2 ounces), 4 cloves of garlic, 1/2-1 fresh red chile, 1 lemon, 1 pound mixed-color cherry tomatoes, on the vine, 8 ounces best-quality ricotta salata cheese, 11 ounces dried spelt spaghetti, 4 handfuls of arugula, Optional: balsamic vinegar. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°F. Pour 3 tablespoons of oil into a small bowl. Run the bunch of thyme under a hot tap for 3 seconds to reawaken it, then shake dry and strip the leaves into the oil. Peel the garlic, then finely slice it with the chile and add to the bowl. Finely grate in the lemon zest, add a pinch of sea salt and black pepper, and mix together. Lay the cherry tomatoes in a 12-x 16-inch baking dish. Rub the flavored oil all over the ricotta and place in the center of the dish, then gently rub the remaining oil over the tomatoes. Add a splash of water to the dish, place in the oven, and roast for 45 minutes, then remove. With 10 minutes to go, cook the spaghetti in a pan of boiling salted water according to the package instructions. Lift the ricotta out of the baking dish, then shake the tomatoes off the vines, discarding the stalks. Add half a cup of pasta water to the dish and gently shake to loosen all the sticky goodness from the base. Drain the spaghetti and toss straight into the dish with a squeeze of lemon juice, season to perfection, then break that beautiful ricotta over the top. Sprinkle over the arugula, toss together well, then serve. My missus likes this with a little drizzle of balsamic too.

input_text: How to make Pancakes With Caramelized Bananas And Honey Syrup?
target_text: You can make Pancakes With Caramelized Bananas And Honey Syrup with 1 3/4 cups plain flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 pinch salt, 1 teaspoon sugar, 2 large eggs at room temperature and beaten lightly, 1 1/4 cups milk, 2 1/8 tablespoons butter melted and cooled, plus extra for frying, 2 1/8 tablespoons butter, 2 bananas large, halved lengthwise, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1/2 cup honey, 1/2 cup water, 1 cinnamon sticks. Here's the instruction: 1. Combine flour, salt, baking powder and sugar in a bowl. Whisk milk in slowly, followed by butter and eggs, mixing well. Let batter stand at room temperature for 20 minutes. Meanwhile, start on the bananas and syrup 2. To make cinnamon honey syrup Combine honey and water in a medium saucepan. Crumble cinnamon stick into the pan and bring mixture to a boil, stirring well. Let syrup simmer for a couple of minute before turning heat off and set aside to cool.- syrup will thicken significantly as it cools. Strain into a small pitcher and set aside. 3. To make caramelized bananas Melt butter in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add brown sugar and stir so that it mixes with melted butter. Gently add the bananas in, cut side down and turn heat down to low. Let bananas sit in the pan for 3 minutes before flipping over and then cooking for another 3 minutes. Bananas should be a gorgeous shade of golden brown and smell like heaven. Turn heat off and set aside. 4. Melt butter in a large frying pan over medium heat. Turning heat down to low, pour into enough batter to get a medium sized pancake. Flip pancake over when bubbles start to form on the pancake and the batter looks set. Fry for another minute before removing to serving plate. Repeat with the rest of the batter. Serve pancakes with caramelized bananas and generous lashings of syrup. Serves 2 very greedy persons

input_text: How to make Glorifying  Icing For Brownies?
target_text: You can make Glorifying  Icing For Brownies with 1/4 c. butter, 2 1/2 c. 10x sugar, 4 Tbsp. cocoa, 4 Tbsp. milk, Marshmallow Creme. Here's the instruction: Mix first four ingredients until smooth. When brownies are done and while they are still hot, cover them with Marshmallow Creme. Then spread with icing mixture of the first four ingredients. (This will take some effort, but the icing will cover the brownies.) This stuff really "glorifies" brownies.

input_text: How to make Crisp and Creamy Baked Chicken?
target_text: You can make Crisp and Creamy Baked Chicken with 4 small boneless skinless chicken breasts, approximately 1 pound, 6 tablespoons Shake-n-Bake, Extra Crispy, 2 cups instant rice, uncooked, 23 cup condensed cream of celery soup, 14 cup milk, 1 cup shredded monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat chicken with Shake-and-Bake. Place in greased 13x9 inch baking dish. Bake for 20 minutes. Meanwhile, cook rice according to package directions. Beat soup and milk with whisk until well blended. Pour over chicken. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 5 more minutes, until cheese is melted and sauce is bubbly. Serve over rice.

input_text: How to make Apple Cake?
target_text: You can make Apple Cake with 4 eggs, 3 c. flour, 2 c. sugar, 1 c. oil, 1/2 c. orange juice, 3 tsp. baking powder, 2 1/2 tsp. vanilla, 1/4 c. sugar, 3 tsp. cinnamon, 1 can apples. Here's the instruction: Put over batter; then put rest of batter on top of apple mixture. Bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours.

input_text: How to make Caramel Apple Cereal Squares?
target_text: You can make Caramel Apple Cereal Squares with 6 c. bite-size crisp rice cereal squares, 2 c. chopped dried apples, 1/2 c. peanuts, 1 pkg. (14 oz.) caramels, unwrapped, 1/4 c. milk. Here's the instruction: Grease 13 x 9-inch pan. In a large bowl, combine cereal, apples and peanuts. Mix well. In a small saucepan, over low heat, combine caramels and milk, stirring frequently, until caramels are melted and mixture is smooth. Pour caramel mixture over cereal mixture, toss to coat. Press into greased pan. Let stand 1 hour or until firm. Cut into bars. Makes 36 bars.

input_text: How to make Mushroom Tart?
target_text: You can make Mushroom Tart with 1 prepared tart shell for filled pastry dough or 1 custard-filled pastry dough, 1 ounce dried porcini mushrooms, 4 tablespoons unsalted butter, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 4 ounces fresh shiitake mushrooms, stems removed, caps sliced, 6 ounces fresh button mushrooms, sliced, 12 teaspoon salt, fresh ground black pepper, 12 teaspoon dried rosemary, crumbled, 2 large eggs, 1 large egg yolk, 34 cup light cream, 14 cup freshly grated parmesan cheese. Here's the instruction: Make tart shell. Meanwhile, soak porcini mushrooms in warm water to cover for 20 minutes. Squeeze liquid from mushrooms and reserve. Chop mushrooms. Heat butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook 2 minutes. Add all mushrooms, half the salt, the pepper, and rosemary; cook, stirring frequently, until liquid evaporates, about 5-10 minutes. Add mushroom soaking liquid, and cook until liquid is absorbed, about 7 minutes. Heat oven to 375 degrees. Whisk eggs, egg yolk, cream, Parmesan, remaining salt, and pepper to taste in mixing bowl until blended. Spread mushroom mixture evenly in tart shell and pour egg mixture over top. Bake tart until custard is set and pastry is lightly browned, about 25 minutes. Transfer to wire rack and let cool at least 10 minutes before serving.

input_text: How to make Hamburger Stroganoff?
target_text: You can make Hamburger Stroganoff with 1/2 c. minced onion, garlic salt, 1 lb. hamburger, 2 tsp. salt, 2 Tbsp. flour, 1 can mushrooms, 10 1/2 oz. can cream of chicken soup, 2 tsp. minced parsley, 1 pt. sour cream, black pepper, 1 pkg. noodles. Here's the instruction: Saute onion and garlic in butter over medium heat. Add meat and brown; add flour, salt, pepper and mushrooms. Cook 5 minutes, then add soup. Simmer, uncovered, 10 minutes. Stir in sour cream; heat through. Sprinkle with parsley. Serve with noodles.

input_text: How to make Sauerkraut N' Weenies?
target_text: You can make Sauerkraut N' Weenies with 1 (500 g) can sauerkraut, 1 lb hot dog, cut bit sized, 1 teaspoon caraway seed (optional). Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients and put into a lightly greased casserole. Bake at 350 degrees until warmed through nicely. (Approximately 45 minutes).

input_text: How to make Calzone With Sausage, Greens And Ricotta?
target_text: You can make Calzone With Sausage, Greens And Ricotta with 1 cup ricotta cheese, 3/4 pound Italian sausage (bulk or removed from casing), 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 1 garlic clove, minced, 6 cups young, tender greens, such as beet greens, Swiss chard, escarole or radicchio, cut into 1-inch-wide strips, large pinch of red chile flakes, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, 1/2 cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, kosher salt, 2 teaspoons active dry yeast, 1 cup warm (110 degrees F) water, 3 cups unbleached bread flour, 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for the bowl. Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, combine the yeast, 1/2 cup of the warm water, and 1/2 cup of the flour and stir to mix. Let the mixture sit at room temperature until bubbles are visible, about 30 minutes. Add the remaining 21/2 cups flour, the remaining 1/2 cup warm water, the salt, and the oil and, using a wooden spoon, stir until the dough comes together in a rough mass. Lightly flour a work surface and turn the dough out onto it. Knead the dough until smooth, elastic, and a bit tacky to the touch, 7 to 8 minutes. Shape the dough into a ball. Oil a large bowl, place the dough in the bowl, and turn the dough to coat it on all sides with oil. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let the dough rise in a warm place (75F) until doubled in volume, 1 to 1 1/2 hours. (Alternatively, let the dough rise in the refrigerator overnight. The next day, bring the dough to room temperature before continuing.)

input_text: How to make My First Christmas Cookies?
target_text: You can make My First Christmas Cookies with 2/3 cup butter soft, 5/8 cup powdered sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 5/8 cups flour, 1/2 cup almond flour, 1 egg white, 1 2/3 cups powdered sugar. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 170°C (approximately 350°F. With an electric mixer, beat butter until creamy and gradually add sifted powdered sugar, while scraping down sides of bowl. Add vanilla. Stir in sifted wheat flour and salt. Shape dough into a ball, wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 1 hour. Place dough between two sheets of parchment paper and roll out to desired thickness. Cut out cookies in desired shapes and place on baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake at 170°C (approximately 350°F) for about 12 minutes. Leave cookies on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before cooling on a wire rack. Cool completely before decorating. For the icing, with an electric mixer, beat white egg until it starts to foam and then add sifted powdered sugar for a toothpaste-like texture that will outline the cookies. To fill in outline, add a few drops of water to icing and brush over cookie to fill. Tint icing with food dye in any color, as desired.

input_text: How to make Seafood-Stuffed Shells?
target_text: You can make Seafood-Stuffed Shells with 1 12 lbs jumbo pasta shells, salt, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 small onion, chopped, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 1 (8 ounce) bottle clam juice, 1 (28 ounce) canwhole tomatoes in puree, 2 tablespoons tomato paste, 1 teaspoon sugar, 14 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 13 cup heavy cream or 13 cup whipping cream, 1 lb medium shrimp, shelled, deveined, and coarsely chopped, 1 lb scrod fish, fillet coarsely chopped, 1 (10 ounce) package frozen peas, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 garlic clove, crushed with side of chef's knife, 2 slices firm white bread, torn into 1/4-inch pieces. Here's the instruction: Prepare pasta shells in boiling salted water as label directs. Drain shells and rinse with cold running water to stop cooking; drain again. Arrange shells in single layer on waxed paper and set aside. Meanwhile, in 4-quart saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat until hot. Add onion and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook 1 minute longer, stirring frequently. Add clam juice and cook 7 minutes over high heat until reduced to 1/2 cup. Stir in tomatoes with their puree, breaking up tomatoes with side of spoon. Add tomato paste, sugar, and crushed red pepper; heat to boiling. Reduce heat to low; partially cover and simmer about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in cream and cook 2 minutes longer; remove saucepan from heat. Transfer 1 cup tomato sauce to 3-quart saucepan. Add shrimp and scrod, and cook over medium-high heat until seafood just turns opaque throughout, about 5 minutes, gently stirring occasionally. Remove saucepan from heat; stir equal amounts of frozen peas into both saucepans. Preheat oven to 400F Fill each pasta shell with 2 heaping tablespoons seafood mixture and place in 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Pour tomato sauce over stuffed shells. Prepare Bread-Crumb Topping: In nonstick 10-inch skillet, heat olive oil and garlic over medium heat. Add bread and cook until golden, about 5 minutes, stirring often. Discard garlic. Spoon bread crumbs over stuffed shells. Bake 20 minutes or until hot and bubbly.

input_text: How to make Pecan Pie?
target_text: You can make Pecan Pie with 1/2 stick margarine, 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 tsp. salt, 3 eggs, 1 c. white Karo, 1/2 c. or more pecans (your preference), 1 unbaked pastry shell. Here's the instruction: Cream margarine, sugar and salt. Add eggs, Karo and pecans. Pour into unbaked pie shell. Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until done.

input_text: How to make Coffee Cake?
target_text: You can make Coffee Cake with 1 c. flour, 1 c. sugar, 1/4 c. margarine, melted, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 Tbsp. cinnamon, 1/2 c. milk, 1 egg. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients together. Pour into a greased and floured 8 or 9-inch pan. Sprinkle heavily with sugar. This gives a crusty top. Bake at 350° for 25 minutes. Best served when served warm.

input_text: How to make Souper Sausage Cornbread?
target_text: You can make Souper Sausage Cornbread with 1 can golden corn soup, 2 eggs, 1/4 c. milk, 2 (6 oz.) pkg. corn muffin mix, 1/4 lb. pork sausage, cooked, drained and crumbled. Here's the instruction: In bowl, combine soup, eggs and milk. Stir in muffin mix just until blended. Fold in sausage. Spoon mixture into a greased 9 x 13-inch baking pan. Bake at 400° for about 20 minutes or until lightly brown.

input_text: How to make Smoked Salmon and Creamy Scrambled Eggs?
target_text: You can make Smoked Salmon and Creamy Scrambled Eggs with 4 eggs, 4 tablespoons water, 1 ounce smoked salmon, cut into slivers, pepper, to taste. Here's the instruction: Lightly beat the eggs with the water. Put the bowl over a saucepan with boiling water, lower the heat and stir the eggs while they cook. Stir in the smoked salmon and add freshly ground pepper to taste. Wonderful served with toast!

input_text: How to make No Bake Chocolate Cookies?
target_text: You can make No Bake Chocolate Cookies with 2 c. sugar, 3 Tbsp. cocoa, 1 stick butter, 1/2 c. milk (evaporated milk), 1 tsp. vanilla, 1/2 c. peanut butter (optional), 3 c. quick oats. Here's the instruction: Boil first 4 ingredients for 1 minute; then add rest of ingredients. Stir together; drop on wax paper with a tablespoon.

input_text: How to make Chicken and Roasted Pepper Sandwiches with Cilantro Almond Relish?
target_text: You can make Chicken and Roasted Pepper Sandwiches with Cilantro Almond Relish with 10 cups water, 6 skinless boneless chicken breast halves (2 1/2 lb), 4 large yellow bell peppers, 2/3 cup blanched slivered almonds, toasted, 1 garlic clove, 1 1/2 tablespoons chopped fresh jalapeno including seeds, 1 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 3 tablespoons fresh lime juice, 3 tablespoons sour cream, 1 teaspoon salt, 12 slices good-quality whole-wheat sandwich bread. Here's the instruction: Bring water to a simmer in a 4- to 5-quart pot, then add chicken and simmer, uncovered, 6 minutes. Remove pan from heat and let stand, covered, until chicken is cooked through, about 15 minutes. Transfer chicken to a plate and cool completely, then cut diagonally into thin slices. Roast bell peppers on racks of gas burners over high heat, turning with tongs, until skins are blackened, 10 to 12 minutes. (Or broil peppers on rack of a broiler pan about 5 inches from heat, turning occasionally, about 15 minutes.) Transfer to a large bowl and cover tightly with plastic wrap, then let stand 20 minutes. When cool enough to handle, peel peppers, discarding stems and seeds, and cut lengthwise into 1 1/2-inch-wide strips. While peppers are standing, pulse almonds, garlic, and jalapeno in a food processor until finely chopped. Add cilantro, mayonnaise, lime juice, sour cream, and salt and blend to a paste. Spread cilantro relish on each slice of bread, then make sandwiches with chicken and roasted peppers, seasoning with salt and pepper.

input_text: How to make Hot And Cheesy Meatloaf Recipe?
target_text: You can make Hot And Cheesy Meatloaf Recipe with 1 1/2 pound grnd beef, 1/3 c. catsup, 1/3 c. dry bread crumbs, 1/2 c. oatmeal, 1 sm. onion, minced, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1 egg, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese, 1 tbsp. grnd warm peppers. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients; mix well. Place in 8 x 10 inch loaf pan. Shape into loaf. Bake 1 hour or possibly till no longer pink in center. Let stand a few min to set. Invert onto serving platter.

input_text: How to make Potato Salad?
target_text: You can make Potato Salad with 10 whole Small/medium Potatoes, 1 whole Carrot, Unpeeled, 1 whole White Radish, Unpeeled, 1 whole Small French Turnip, Unpeeled, 4 Tablespoons Mustard, 3 Tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 pinch Ground Coriander, 1/4 teaspoons Ground Pepper, Sea Salt, to taste, Raw Sesame Seeds, Garnish. Here's the instruction: Boil the unpeeled potatoes in a pot of water until they're fork tender (about half an hour). Then remove the pot from the heat and drain the potatoes to allow them to cool. Rinse the other veggies. Grate the unpeeled carrot, white radish and French turnip (I don't peel them because their peel is filled with vitamins. If the veggies are not organic you should peel them because the peel may contain unhealthy chemicals). Peel the boiled potatoes after you let them to cool down for a few minutes. You can place them in a bowl filled with cold water. After you peel them, cut them into bite size cubes. Mix all vegetables in a large bowl. In a small bowl mix the mustard with the olive oil, sea salt, pepper and coriander. This will be the dressing. Pour the dressing over the ingredients in the large bowl and mix them all together. Garnish each serving with some sprinkled sesame seeds. Serve! Tip: The salad is even tastier after it stays overnight in the fridge. The flavors are more intense.

input_text: How to make Porcupine Meat Balls?
target_text: You can make Porcupine Meat Balls with 1 1/2 lb. hamburger, 1/2 c. diced onion, 1/2 tsp. salt and pepper, 1/2 c. rice, 1/2 lb. sausage, 1 can tomato soup. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients, except soup, together in a bowl. Make into balls and place in dish or pan. Pour soup over meat balls. Bake in a 350° oven for 1 hour.

input_text: How to make Healthy Pumpkin Cake?
target_text: You can make Healthy Pumpkin Cake with Cake, 8 ounces pumpkin, 1 cup Splenda granular, 1/2 cup unsweetened applesauce, 2 eggs, 1 cup whole wheat flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1 tablespoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon pumpkin spice, 1/4 teaspoon salt, Frosting, 4 ounces fat free cream cheese, 3 tablespoons butter, softened, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 cup confectioners' sugar. Here's the instruction: Cake: In a mixing bowl, beat pumpkin, sugar, and applesauce. Add eggs, and mix well. In another bowl, combine flour, baking soda, powder, spices and salt. Add these dry ingredients to the pumpkin mixture, and beat until well blended. Pour batter into a greased 8x5 inch baking pan. Bake at 350 degrees F for 25 to 30 minutes, or until cake tests done. Cool & frost. Frosting: Mix well until smooth.

input_text: How to make Spinach Salad Ring?
target_text: You can make Spinach Salad Ring with 1 pkg. lemon gelatin, 3/4 c. hot water, 1 Tbsp. vinegar, 1 c. mayonnaise, 1 c. cottage cheese, 1 pkg. chopped frozen spinach, 1/3 c. celery, finely chopped, 1/3 c. onion, finely chopped. Here's the instruction: Dissolve gelatin in water; add vinegar and mayonnaise. When cool, beat. Cook and cool spinach, drain well. Add celery, onions, cheese and spinach to gelatin. Put into a 6-cup mold (or 9 x 12-inch doubled recipe). Chill until firm.

input_text: How to make Cranberry Orange Muffins?
target_text: You can make Cranberry Orange Muffins with 1 3/4 c. sifted all-purpose flour, 2 Tbsp. sugar, 2 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 3/4 tsp. salt, 1 well beaten egg, 3/4 c. milk, 1/3 c. cooking oil, 1/3 c. cranberry orange relish, 4 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted, 1/4 c. sugar. Here's the instruction: Into bowl, sift together flour, the 2 tablespoons sugar, baking powder and salt. Make well in center. Combine egg, milk and oil. Add all at once to dry ingredients. Stir just until moistened. Spoon half the batter into 12 (2 1/2-inch) greased muffin cups. Top each with 1 teaspoon cranberry-orange relish, then fill with remaining batter.

input_text: How to make Cheesy Broccoli Casserole?
target_text: You can make Cheesy Broccoli Casserole with 2 pkg. frozen, chopped broccoli, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 soup can milk, 1 pkg. (24 slices) Velveeta cheese, 1/2 stick margarine or butter, 1 1/2 pkg. Ritz crackers. Here's the instruction: Follow directions to cook broccoli. Place cooked broccoli in casserole dish. Combine soup and milk and pour mixture over broccoli. Place cheese slices over broccoli to completely cover it. Crush crackers and combine with butter or margarine; fold this together until mixed thoroughly. Sprinkle cracker mixture over cheese to cover complete dish. Bake, uncovered, in 350° oven for 35 to 45 minutes.

input_text: How to make Mexican-Spiced Spaghetti Squash?
target_text: You can make Mexican-Spiced Spaghetti Squash with 1 spaghetti squash medium, 4 pounds, give or take, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon mustard seeds, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 1 red onion medium, finely diced, 2 cloves garlic minced, 1 jalapeno fresh, size depends on your taste for heat, seeded and minced, 1 teaspoon cumin seeds, 14 ounces diced tomatoes juices drained off, salt, pepper, cilantro chopped, optional. Here's the instruction: 1. Preheat oven to 350. Halve the squash lengthwise and scrape out seeds. Place halves cut-side down on a sturdy rimmed baking pan and bake for 45-50 minutes or until flesh easily rakes into "spaghetti" with a fork. Set aside. 2. In a saute pan with a cover, warm the olive oil over medium-high heat until shimmering. Toss the mustard seeds in and cover the pan. Listen to the seeds pop and cook until popping stops, about a minute. 3. Set the lid aside and reduce heat to medium-low. Melt the butter in the pan and stir in the onion, garlic, jalapeno and cumin seeds. Season with salt (I like about a teaspoon of Kosher) and pepper to taste. Cook until onion is soft, 3-5 minutes. Pour in the tomatoes and stir until heated through, about 2 minutes. 4. Use a fork to scrape the flesh of the squash from its skin, raking apart the strands. Add the spaghetti squash to the saute pan and increase the heat to medium-high. Use tongs to evenly mix everything together and heat through, about 2 minutes. 5. Garnish with cilantro, if desired, and taste for more salt or pepper.

input_text: How to make Pain Perdu?
target_text: You can make Pain Perdu with 1/3 c. vegetable oil, 6 eggs, 3 Tbsp. Grand Marnier, 2 Tbsp. milk, 1/3 c. sugar, grated zest of 1 lemon, 8 to 12 slices French bread, powdered sugar, butter, syrup. Here's the instruction: Heat the oil in a large heavy skillet. In a medium bowl, combine eggs, liqueur, milk, sugar and lemon zest and whisk together until eggs are frothy and sugar is dissolved. When oil is hot, dip bread to coat well on both sides. Fry until golden brown on both sides. Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with powdered sugar. Serve hot with butter and syrup.

input_text: How to make Cheesy Potatoes?
target_text: You can make Cheesy Potatoes with 1 (2 lb.) bag frozen hash browns, thawed, 1 can Cheddar cheese soup, 1 can cream of celery soup, 1/2 c. melted margarine or butter, 1 c. sour cream, 1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese, 1/2 c. chopped onion (optional), salt and pepper, 2 c. crushed cornflakes, 1/2 c. margarine, melted. Here's the instruction: Mix first 8 ingredients together in a 9 x 13-inch glass pan. Then mix cornflakes and margarine and spread over the top of the potato mixture. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Let stand for 5 minutes after removing from oven.

input_text: How to make Turkey Gravy?
target_text: You can make Turkey Gravy with 1/4 c. turkey drippings, 1/4 c. all-purpose flour, 1 c. (14 1/2 oz.) Swanson clear chicken broth. Here's the instruction: In roasting pan, mix turkey drippings and all-purpose flour. Gradually add Swanson clear chicken broth. Cook over medium heat until mixture boils and thickens, stirring constantly. Makes 2 cups.

input_text: How to make Tex-Mex Lasagne?
target_text: You can make Tex-Mex Lasagne with 10 flour tortillas or 10 corn tortillas, 1 lb lean ground beef or 1 lb ground turkey, 1 14 ounces taco seasoning, 14 12 ounces Ro-Tel tomatoes, 15 ounces ranch style beans, 8 ounces shredded colby-monterey jack cheese, 10 34 ounces cream of chicken soup, 8 ounces sour cream, 2 ounces diced green chilies (optional). Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef/turkey in skillet until no longer pink. Add taco seasoning and cook according to directions. In separate bowl, combine cream of chicken soup, green chilis and sour cream. Cover the bottom of a 9"x13" baking dish with enough tortillas to completely cover. Cut in strips to get full coverage. Layer taco meat mixture, then Ranch Style Beans, then half of the shredded cheese. Follow with another layer of tortillas, again making sure to completely cover lower layer. Cover second layer of tortillas with soup and sour cream mixture, then Ro-Tel tomatoes, then the rest of the shredded cheese. Bake at 350 for 30-45 minutes until cheese is melted and starting to brown. (This can also be frozen before baking, it just requires a little more time in the oven out of the freezer. ).

input_text: How to make Butternut Squash + Kale Shakshuka Harvest Bowl (As Pita Filling + Yogurt) ?
target_text: You can make Butternut Squash + Kale Shakshuka Harvest Bowl (As Pita Filling + Yogurt)  with Organic Cauliflower, Organic Tomato, Organic Butternut Squash, Organic Kale, Organic Flax Seeds, Za'atar. Here's the instruction: Empty cup into a nonstick pan or microwave-safe bowl. For stovetop, stir over medium heat and add 1-2 tbsp of water or broth, if needed. For microwave, heat for 4-6 minutes. Return to cup or transfer to your favorite bowl!

input_text: How to make Crab Gumbo?
target_text: You can make Crab Gumbo with 1/2 c. cooking oil, 1/2 c. flour, 1 small onion, 1/2 c. celery, chopped, 1/2 bell pepper, chopped, 3 cloves garlic, crushed, 1/2 c. parsley, chopped, 6 c. water, 1 large can tomatoes, 1 pkg. frozen okra (optional), salt, black pepper, crushed red pepper, bay leaves and thyme, 2 cans crab meat, 1 small jar oysters (optional), gumbo file. Here's the instruction: In heavy 8 quart pot make a caramel colored brown roux using 1/2 cup cooking oil and 1/2 cup flour. Add to the roux, cooking until limp the onion, celery, bell pepper, garlic and parsley. Add 6 cups water, can of tomatoes, okra (optional), salt, black pepper, crushed red pepper, bay leaves and thyme. Simmer for about 1 hour. If it becomes too thick, add more water. After 1 hour add 1 pound shrimp, crab meat and oysters (optional). Simmer 30 minutes longer. Add gumbo file (to taste). Simmer 10 minutes more. Serve over rice.

input_text: How to make Instant Pudding Eggnog?
target_text: You can make Instant Pudding Eggnog with 1 (3 oz.) box instant pudding, 1/3 c. sugar, 1 tsp. vanilla, 6 c. milk, 2 egg yolks, 2 egg whites. Here's the instruction: Mix all together but egg whites. Beat them and fold into mixture. Chill; sprinkle with nutmeg.

input_text: How to make Contest-Winning Pepperoni Pizza Chili?
target_text: You can make Contest-Winning Pepperoni Pizza Chili with 2 pounds ground beef, 1 pound bulk hot Italian sausage, 1 large onion, chopped, 1 large green pepper, chopped, 4 garlic cloves, minced, 1 jar (16 ounces) salsa, 1 can (16 ounces) hot chili beans, undrained, 1 can (16 ounces) kidney beans, rinsed and drained, 1 can (12 ounces) pizza sauce, 1 package (8 ounces) sliced pepperoni, halved, 1 cup water, 2 teaspoons chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 3 cups shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese. Here's the instruction: In a Dutch oven, cook the beef, sausage, onion, green pepper and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Stir in the salsa, beans, pizza sauce, pepperoni, water, chili powder, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer until heated through, about 20 minutes. Sprinkle servings with cheese. Before adding cheese, cool chili. Freeze chili in freezer containers. To use, partially thaw in refrigerator overnight. Heat through in a saucepan, stirring occasionally and adding a little water if necessary. Sprinkle each serving with cheese.

input_text: How to make Frosty?
target_text: You can make Frosty with 2 qt. chocolate milk, 1 can Eagle Brand milk, 1 (16 oz.) Cool Whip, 1 tsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Mix the two milks together with mixer. Add the Cool Whip and vanilla. Continue mixing until well blended. Freeze in ice cream freezer.

input_text: How to make Pumpkin Pancakes?
target_text: You can make Pumpkin Pancakes with 2 cups biscuit mix, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 2 eggs, 1 (12 ounce) can evaporated milk, 1/2 cup cooked pumpkin or 1/2 cup canned pumpkin, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. Here's the instruction: In a bowl, combine the baking mix, brown sugar and cinnamon. In another bowl, combine the eggs, milk, pumpkin, oil and vanilla. Stir moist ingredients into the dry ingredients, mix well. Pour batter by 1/3 cupfuls onto a lightly greased hot giddle. Turn when bubbles form on top of pancakes. Cook until second side is golden brown. Serve with your favorite syrup.

input_text: How to make Jiffy Dessert #1?
target_text: You can make Jiffy Dessert #1 with 1 stick melted margarine, 1 c. sugar, 1 c. flour, 1 tsp. vanilla, pinch of salt, 1 Tbsp. baking powder, 3/4 c. milk, 1 c. fruit (cherries, peaches, blueberries, etc.). Here's the instruction: Melt margarine in baking dish. Pour in undrained fruit. Make batter of remaining ingredients and pour over fruit. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

input_text: How to make Delicious Icebox Cookies Recipe?
target_text: You can make Delicious Icebox Cookies Recipe with 2 sticks butter, 1 c. sugar, 2 Large eggs, 1/2 c. lowfat milk, 1 c. nuts, 1 c. coconut, 1 sm. can crushed pineapple, well liquid removed, 1 c. graham cracker crumbs, Whole graham crackers. Here's the instruction: Line a 9x13 inch pan with whole graham crackers. Heat butter. Beat Large eggs, add in lowfat milk and sugar. Mix with butter in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Boil for 3 min. Remove from heat and add in nuts, coconut, pineapple and cracker crumbs. Pour over layer of whole graham crackers and then top with more whole graham crackers. Now make icing.

input_text: How to make Spicy Zabaglione With Strawberries And Chocolate ?
target_text: You can make Spicy Zabaglione With Strawberries And Chocolate  with Zabaglione, 4 egg yolks, 3/4 cup sweet Marsala wine, 1/4 cup sugar, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, Chocolate Sauce, 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips, 1/3 cup heavy cream1, 6 medium strawberries, hulled and sliced, 1/2 cup whole salted pistachio nuts, shelled, optional. Here's the instruction: Zabaglione In a medium bowl, whisk together the egg yolks, wine, sugar, and cayenne pepper. Place the bowl over a pan of gently boiling water and whisk vigorously until thick and foamy, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside.  Chocolate Sauce Reduce the pan of water to a simmer. Place the chocolate chips and cream in a small bowl. Place the bowl over the pan of simmering water and stir until the chocolate has melted and the mixture is smooth, about 5 minutes.  Spoon the chocolate sauce into 4 small dessert bowls. Arrange the sliced strawberries on top. Spoon the zabaglione on top of the strawberries and sprinkle with the pistachio nuts, if using.

input_text: How to make White Mountain Frosting?
target_text: You can make White Mountain Frosting with 1/2 cup sugar, 1/4 cup light corn syrup, 2 tablespoons water, 2 egg whites, 1 teaspoon vanilla. Here's the instruction: Combine sugar, corn syrup, and water in small saucepan. Cover; heat to rolling boil over medium heat. Remove cover and boil rapidly, without stirring, to 242 F on candy thermometer. As mixture boils, beat egg whites until stiff peaks form. Pour hot syrup very slowly in a thin stream into the beaten egg whites, beating constantly on medium speed. Beat on high speed until stiff peaks form. Add vanilla during last minute of beating. VARIATIONS: Add 1/4 cup sifted cocoa for Cocoa Frosting, folding in till blended; for Lemon Frosting substitute 1 TBSP lemon juice for the vanilla and add 1/4 tsp. grated lemon peel and 10 drops of yellow food coloring; for Pink Mountain Frosting, sustitute maraschino cherry juice for the water; for Satiny Beige Frosting substitute brown sugar (packed) for the granulated sugar and decrease vanilla to 1/2 tsp.

input_text: How to make Chicken Breast With Orange Sauce?
target_text: You can make Chicken Breast With Orange Sauce with 2 whole chicken breasts, cut in half (2 1/2 lb.), 2 Tbsp. margarine, 1 tsp. salt, 1/8 tsp. paprika, 1/8 tsp. ginger, 1 Tbsp. flour, 1 c. chicken broth, 1/4 c. orange juice, 2 thin slices orange with rind, cut crosswise, 1 1/2 tsp. grated fresh orange rind. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 325°. Melt margarine in a large skillet. Brown chicken breasts in skillet over medium heat, turning 2 or 3 times.
