Transfer chicken to a shallow casserole, skin side up; set aside. Add seasonings and flour to hot fat in the skillet and stir to blend until smooth and lightly browned. Gradually add chicken broth and orange juice, stirring constantly. Cook and stir over low heat until smooth and thickened. Pour on top of chicken. Bake 30 minutes. Cut each orange slice in quarters and place two quarter slices on top of each piece of chicken. Scatter ginger and orange rind on top. Bake another 10 to 15 minutes.

input_text: How to make Barbecue Sauce?
target_text: You can make Barbecue Sauce with 1 c. catsup, 6 Tbsp. brown sugar, 2 tsp. mustard, 6 Tbsp. honey or corn syrup, 2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce, dash of salt. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients in a medium size bowl or pouring pitcher. Pour over meat to be barbecued. Unused sauce may be kept in covered jar for 3 to 6 months in refrigerator. Makes 3 cups.

input_text: How to make Baked Brie With Brown Sugar?
target_text: You can make Baked Brie With Brown Sugar with 1 (5 inch) brie round, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 3 tablespoons of softened butter, 1/4 cup walnuts or 1/4 cup pecans, sliced French bread. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 325. Put brie in baking dish. Brush on approximately 3 T. of softened butter. Sprinkle about 1/4 cup of brown sugar over the brie. Add a few (about 1/4 cup) of walnuts or chopped pecans, really just whatever you have on hand. Bake for 20-25 minutes. Serve with sliced french bread.

input_text: How to make Cheese Stuffed Celery?
target_text: You can make Cheese Stuffed Celery with 1 c. grated American cheese, 1 Tbsp. warm water, 1 Tbsp. finely chopped pimento, 1 Tbsp. finely chopped green pepper, about 15 ribs crisp celery (3 to 4 inches in length). Here's the instruction: Combine cheese, water, green pepper and pimento. Fill crisp celery ribs with a knife. Serve chilled as an appetizer or salad accompaniment.

input_text: How to make Lemon Scones?
target_text: You can make Lemon Scones with 3 cups all-purpose flour, 1/3 cup sugar, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 tablespoon lemon zest, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 3/4 cup unsalted butter, cut into pieces and chilled, 1 cup half-and-half cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 375 °F. Place all dry ingredients in a mixing bowl, or in the bowl of an electric mixer fitted with the paddle attachment. Cut butter into dry ingredients until it resembles coarse meal. Stir together 3/4 cup cream and vanilla and add to dough. Mix just until dough comes together. Turn dough onto a lightly floured surface. Roll dough twice to an inch thick, each time folding in half (this is the secret to a flaky scone). Roll dough to 3/4-1 inch thick and cut desired shapes. Place on a greased or parchment-lined baking sheet and brush with remaining cream. Bake for 15 to 18 minutes, until tops are nicely browned.

input_text: How to make Aio E Oio W/ Fresh Tomatoes And Basil ?
target_text: You can make Aio E Oio W/ Fresh Tomatoes And Basil  with 1 lb thin spaghettini, Salt, 1/3 C. extra virgin olive oil, 2 tsp. garlic chopped very fine, Chopped hot red chili pepper, 2 T. chopped parsley, 1/4 lb. fresh, very ripe, but firm plum tomatoes, and a few fresh basil leaves.. Here's the instruction: 1. Cook spaghetti, adding extra measure of salt 2. Put olive oil, garflic, and chopped hot red pepper in small saucepan, turn to medium low. Cook and stir the garlic until it becomes colored a pale gold. Do not let it become brown. 3. Add tomatoes, cooking for just one minute. 4. Toss the cooked drained pasta with the entire contents of the saucepan, turning the strands over and over to coat evenly. Correct for salt. 5. Add chopped parsley and basil, toss again and serve immediately.

input_text: How to make Spiced Pecans?
target_text: You can make Spiced Pecans with 1 c. sugar, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1/4 tsp. salt, 6 Tbsp. milk, 1 qt. shelled pecans. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients except pecans and cook slowly over low heat until thickened (approximately 4 minutes). After thick, stir in shelled pecans. Pour over pecans on waxed paper or a buttered cookie sheet. Cool and separate.

input_text: How to make Grilled Vegetable Pizza?
target_text: You can make Grilled Vegetable Pizza with 1 prepared pizza crust large, 1/4 cup tomato puree, 2 ounces grilled eggplant sliced, 2 ounces grilled peppers sliced, 2 ounces marinated artichoke hearts quartered, 2 tablespoons basil shredded, 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese freshly grated, 1/4 pound mozzarella coarsely chopped, 1 ounce black olives, salad to serve. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place pizza crust on baking sheet and spread evenly with tomato puree. Arrange eggplant, peppers and artichoke hearts on top and sprinkle with basil and Parmesan. Top with mozzarella and olives and bake 5-10 mins, until cheese is melted and golden. Slice and serve with salad.

input_text: How to make Raphael Chicken?
target_text: You can make Raphael Chicken with 8 chicken breasts (skinless/boneless), 1 can creamy chicken mushroom soup, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1/2 lb. Swiss cheese, 1/2 lb. Mozzarella cheese, 1/4 c. white wine, 1/4 c. milk, coarse ground pepper, seasoned salt, tarragon, oregano, basil. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°. Cover bottom of roasting pan with chicken. Combine soup, milk and wine; cover chicken evenly. Bake, covered, for 1/2 hour. Remove cover and bake for another 15 minutes. Remove from oven and place cheeses evenly over mixture. Bake until cheese is melted and golden brown (approximately 15 minutes).

input_text: How to make Fluffy Bunny Pancakes?
target_text: You can make Fluffy Bunny Pancakes with 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 large egg, 3/4 cup milk, 1/4 cup butter, melted, Banana slices, miniature semisweet chocolate chips, whipped cream and sweetened shredded coconut. Here's the instruction: Preheat griddle over medium-high heat. Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Combine egg, milk and melted butter; stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. For each bunny, make a pancake 4 in. wide for the body, a pancake 2-1/2 in. wide for the head, two small oval-shaped pancakes for the feet and two small triangular pancakes for the ears. Spoon batter onto griddle; cook until bubbles form on top of pancakes. Turn; cook until second side is golden brown. To form bunny, place ears at the top of a plate. Place head slightly overlapping the bottom of the ears; top with body slightly overlapping head and feet slightly overlapping body. Place a banana slice on each foot; arrange mini chocolate chips at the end of each foot for toes. Dollop whipped cream on body just above the feet; sprinkle with coconut for the tail. Serve immediately.

input_text: How to make Spicy Shrimp Katafi ?
target_text: You can make Spicy Shrimp Katafi  with 1 teaspoon butter, greasing muffin cups, Juice from 2 limes, divided, 1 teaspoon of ancho chile pepper powder, 1 pinch cayenne pepper, 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, 12 cooked shelled medium shrimp, 1/4 lb katafi (shredded phyllo dough from a 1-lb. box, thawed and kept covered), 2 tablespoons fresh avocado, chopped finely, 2 tablespoons fresh red tomato, chopped finely, 1/2 teaspoon salt, Freshly ground black pepper, 1/4 cup sour cream, 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro, garnish. Here's the instruction: Grease a nonstick 12- cup muffin tin with butter. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees. Combine the juice from one lime, ancho chile powder, cayenne, olive oil and shrimp in a medium mixing bowl; stir with hands until the shrimp are well coated; set aside to marinate while working with dough. Pull apart the strands of katafi dividing it among the 12 muffin cups; it will fill them half way up; push them down making a nest. Drain and discard the marinade; put a single shrimp into each nest of katafi. Cook for 12 to 18 minutes in the preheated oven until the katafi is golden. While the Shrimp Katafi are cooking, combine the avocado, tomato and remaining juice of one lime into another small mixing bowl; add salt and pepper; combine until all is well coated. After taking the shrimp out of the oven, let rest for 5 minutes; remove to serving dish; spoon the tomato mixture on top of each shrimp; add a spoon of sour cream and the chopped cilantro. Serve immediately.

input_text: How to make Michelle's Bean Dip?
target_text: You can make Michelle's Bean Dip with 2 (9 ounce) cans bean dip (Like Fritos), 6 tablespoons mayonnaise, 6 tablespoons sour cream, 1 (1 1/4 ounce) package taco seasoning mix, 3 cups mexican cheese, shredded, 1 tomatoes, chopped, 1 onion, chopped, 1 green pepper, chopped, 1 cup lettuce, shredded, 14 cup black olives, chopped, 14 cup green olives, chopped, 1 (10 ounce) bag tortilla chips (Like Scoops). Here's the instruction: First layer:. Spread bean dip into a 11 x 7 pan. ( you can use a 9 x 13 but it is thinner or you can use a 8x8x2 pan and make it thicker. Whatever you like). Mix mayonaise, sour cream, and taco seasoning mix together and spread over the bead dip. Sprinkle cheese over the mayo layer. Then layer as wish:. Tomato. lettuce. onion. green peppers. green olives. black olives. Refrigerate overnight. Serve with chips the next day and enjoy. Note: You can add salsa and/or jalapenos (chopped). My family does not like it but it is good! Adds a little more spice.

input_text: How to make Gavatini?
target_text: You can make Gavatini with 1 lb. sausage (pork or Italian), 2 c. macaroni, cooked and drained, 16 oz. spaghetti sauce, 12 oz. Mozzarella. Here's the instruction: Brown sausage and drain. Place in casserole; add spaghetti sauce. Add Mozzarella cheese (save some for top). Mix well. Add remaining cheese to the top. Bake at 350° just until heated through and cheese is melted, approximately 30 minutes.

input_text: How to make Freezer Persimmon Jam?
target_text: You can make Freezer Persimmon Jam with 5 cups pureed persimmons, 3 cups white sugar, 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon grated orange zest, 1 pinch ground nutmeg. Here's the instruction: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, combine persimmon puree, sugar, lemon juice, orange zest and nutmeg. Boil for 30 minutes, or until slightly thickened. Pour into sterilized jars and seal. Store in the freezer.

input_text: How to make Bishop Sheen'S Meat Loaf?
target_text: You can make Bishop Sheen'S Meat Loaf with 2 lb. ground beef, 6 slices bread, crumbled, 1 c. applesauce, 1 egg, 1 c. chopped onions, 1 c. chopped green peppers, 1 clove garlic, chopped, flour, salt, pepper, parsley, catsup. Here's the instruction: Put meat in bowl. Add onions, peppers, bread, garlic, parsley, egg, salt, pepper and applesauce; mix well. Form into loaf shape; flour well. Oil pan and place floured loaf in pan. Add catsup on top of loaf. Cover with foil. Bake at 350°° for 2 hours. Uncover for last 15 minutes.

input_text: How to make Thai Vermicelli Soup with Pork & Shrimp Meatballs?
target_text: You can make Thai Vermicelli Soup with Pork & Shrimp Meatballs with 100 g pork, 100 g shrimp (raw - peeled), 1/2 tsp garlic, minced, 1/2 tsp pepper, 1/2 tsp coriander powder, 2 Tbsp light or regular soy sauce, 1 liter water, 100 g Chinese cabbage / napa cabbage, 100 g carrot, 60 g vermicelli rice noodles, 4 shiitake mushrooms, sliced (optional), 1 1/2 tsp salt. Here's the instruction: Make the meatballs by mixing all ingredients together in a bowl. Form into 3 cm balls. Bring water to a boil in a pot. Add the carrot, cabbage and meatballs. When cabbage is soft, add the salt and vermicelli. When all vegetables are cooked, turn off the heat. Serve and garnish with coriander leaves.

input_text: How to make Easy Cheesy Spam®-Wiches?
target_text: You can make Easy Cheesy Spam®-Wiches with 1 (12 ounce) can fully cooked luncheon meat (such as SPAM(R)), cubed, 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle WhipTM), 4 hamburger buns, split. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven's broiler and set the oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source. Stir together the luncheon meat, Cheddar cheese, and salad dressing in a bowl. Spread the filling onto the cut side of each hamburger bun, and place onto a baking sheet, filling-side up. Broil the open-faced sandwiches in the preheated oven until the tops are browned and bubbly, about 5 minutes.

input_text: How to make Blueberry Banana Chia Streusel Muffins?
target_text: You can make Blueberry Banana Chia Streusel Muffins with FOR THE MUFFINS:, 1/4 cups Butter, 1/4 cups Unsweetened Applesauce, 1/2 cups Firmly Packed Brown Sugar, 1-1/2 cup Mashed Ripe Bananas, 1/4 cups Milk, 1 teaspoon Vanilla, 2 whole Eggs, 2 cups All-purpose Flour, 1 teaspoon Baking Powder, 1 teaspoon Baking Soda, 1/4 teaspoons Salt, 1 cup Fresh Blueberries, FOR THE TOPPINGS:, 3 Tablespoons All-purpose Flour, 2 Tablespoons Firmly Packed Brown Sugar, 1-1/2 teaspoon Cinnamon, 2 Tablespoons Chia Seeds, 2 Tablespoons Butter. Here's the instruction: Preheat your oven to 375 F. Line standard sized muffin tins with 18 baking cups. In a large bowl beat butter, applesauce and brown sugar until fluffy. Add bananas, milk, vanilla and eggs; mix well. Add the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt; stir just until dry ingredients are moistened. Gently stir in blueberries. Divide batter between 18 muffin cups. In a small bowl combine flour, brown sugar, cinnamon and chia seeds. Using a fork, cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Sprinkle the streusel over the batter. Bake at 375 F for 20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Recipe adapted from Cooks.com.

input_text: How to make Apricot Salad?
target_text: You can make Apricot Salad with 1 lb. can apricot halves, 1/2 c. orange juice, 1/2 c. mayonnaise, 1 small carton creamed cottage cheese, 2 Tbsp. lemon juice, 1 pkg. orange gelatin, 1 (9 oz.) can pineapple tidbits, drained. Here's the instruction: Drain juice from apricots and add water to make 1 cup liquid and heat to a boil. Add gelatin and stir until dissolved. Stir in lemon and orange juice and dash of salt. Blend in cottage cheese until smooth. Chill until partially congealed. Cut drained apricots into slices. Beat gelatin mixture until fluffy and fold in fruit and mayonnaise. Pour into 8-inch square dish and chill.

input_text: How to make Pizza With Caramelized Leeks, Pear And Blue Cheese?
target_text: You can make Pizza With Caramelized Leeks, Pear And Blue Cheese with 2 large leeks, 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 1 tablespoon minced fresh rosemary leaves or 1 teaspoon dried rosemary, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons dried sherry wine, 1 medium bosc pear, 1 pre-cooked 12-inch pizza crust (yours or something like Boboli), 1 tablespoon fresh-squeezed lemon juice, 2 ounces blue cheese, crumbled, 1 teaspoon sweet paprika. Here's the instruction: Trim off and discard the root ends and the dark green portion of the leeks. Cut them in half lengthwise and discard the toughest outer layers. Rinse thoroughly between the layers to remove any grit. Pat the leeks dry and slice them crosswise into thin shreds. Preheat the broiler. Melt the butter in a heavy saute pan and add the leeks, rosemary, and salt. Saute, stirring occasionally, until tender and nicely browned, about 6 to 8 minutes. Add the sherry and stir until the liquid dissolves. Slice the pear in half lengthwise and cut out the core section. Slice each half thinly and gently toss the slices with the lemon juice. Transfer the leeks to the pizza crust and spread them out evenly, leaving about a 1-inch border all around the outside free of topping. Arrange the sliced pears in a single layer on top of the leeks. Evenly distribute the blue cheese over the pears. Sprinkle on the paprika. Bake the pizza 4 inches from the broiler until the cheese is bubbly and lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Cut into wedges and serve.

input_text: How to make Peanut Coconut Dessert Bars?
target_text: You can make Peanut Coconut Dessert Bars with 200 grams Peanuts, 2/3 cups Grated Dry Coconut, 100 milliliters Condensed Milk, Butter (as Needed). Here's the instruction: Roast peanuts on pan for just 5 minutes. Let cool, then remove skins and grind peeled peanuts roughly in a food processor. In a pan, roast grated coconut, stirring constantly until fragrant, about 2-3 minutes. Add peanuts, mix well, and cook for another 2 minutes. Add condensed milk and mix well untl mixture comes together. Cook for 2-3 minutes. Grease a plate or tray with butter. Place mixture onto the greased surface and platten with a rollin pin or spatula. Immediately cut with a knife into desired shape. Let cool before serving.

input_text: How to make Saucy Beef Taco Pizza?
target_text: You can make Saucy Beef Taco Pizza with 2 pounds ground beef, extra lean ground, 1 each onions, 16 ounces taco sauce, 4 ounces green chili peppers, 1/2 cup olives ripe, sliced, 8 ounces bread, dinner rolls, 1 1/2 cups corn chips, 1 cup sour cream dairy, 1 cup monterey jack cheese, 1/2 cup cheddar cheese shredded, 1 each tomatoes diced. Here's the instruction: Brown ground beef and onion in large frying-pan or Dutch oven. Pour off drippings. Add 1 cup taco sauce, green chilies and olives. Separate crecent rolls into 8 triagnles and press into greased 9 to 10-inch pie pan to form crust. Sprinkle 1 cup crushed corn chips evenly over dough. Spread beef mixture evenly over chips, spread with sour cream. Cover with shredded Monterey Jack cheese, then shredded Cheddar Cheese. Sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup crushed chips. Garnish with sliced olives and mushrooms, if desired. Bake in a moderate oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until crust is golden. Cut into wedges and serve with lettuce, avocado, tomato and remaining taco sauce.

input_text: How to make Pad Ka Prao Kung || Stired Fried Shrimp With Holy Basil?
target_text: You can make Pad Ka Prao Kung || Stired Fried Shrimp With Holy Basil with 3 -5 leaves garlic, 5 Thai red chili peppers, 200 g shrimp, 100 g holy basil, 2 tablespoons oyster sauce, 2 teaspoons sugar, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon fish sauce, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. Here's the instruction: Pound or chop the garlic and chilli. Stired fry the pounded garlic and chilli in the hot oil. Put shrimps into the pan. When the shrimps are half cook, put all seasoning and sugar. Once the shrimps is well done, put the holy basil leaves into the pan with well mix and turn-off the heat.

input_text: How to make Almond Wild Rice?
target_text: You can make Almond Wild Rice with cooking spray, 2 1/2 cups chicken broth, 1 1/2 cups brown and wild rice mix, 3 tablespoons butter, 1 cup slivered almonds, 2 tablespoons dried parsley, 1 cup sweetened dried cranberries (such as Craisins), 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Spray an 8-inch square baking dish with cooking spray. Bring chicken broth to a boil in a saucepan. Pour rice mix into the prepared baking dish. Carefully pour boiling chicken broth over the rice. Cover the dish with aluminum foil. Bake in preheated oven until rice is tender, about 1 hour. Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir almonds in hot butter until they start to color, 3 to 5 minutes. Sprinkle parsley over the almonds; continue to cook and stir until the almonds are lightly browned, another 3 to 5 minutes. Mix the baked rice, the almond mixture, cranberries, salt, and pepper in a large bowl; toss to serve.

input_text: How to make Cinnamon Angel Food Cake?
target_text: You can make Cinnamon Angel Food Cake with 1 pkg. angel food cake mix, cinnamon, 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip. Here's the instruction: Prepare angel food cake according to package directions. Pour 1/2 of the mix in tube pan. Add powdered cinnamon and swirl into batter. Pour remainder of batter on top. Bake according to package directions. Cool and serve with Cool Whip with cinnamon mixed in.

input_text: How to make Herb-Marinated Tenderloin?
target_text: You can make Herb-Marinated Tenderloin with 1 (8 ounce) fillet beef tenderloin (filet mignon), 6 fresh sage leaves, 1 clove garlic, cut into sixths, 4 fresh thyme sprigs, salt and ground black pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Cut a few 2-inch slits in the side of the fillet; stuff the sage leaves and garlic pieces into the slits. Wrap the thyme sprigs around the fillet. Store in refrigerator to allow the meat to absorb the flavors for 4 to 12 hours. Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat; lightly oil the grate. Cut the tenderloin in half and season with salt and pepper. Cook the fillets 4 to 6 minutes per side, until no longer pink, or to desired doneness.

input_text: How to make As Good As Fudge(Diabetic Recipe)  ?
target_text: You can make As Good As Fudge(Diabetic Recipe)   with 1/2 c. honey, 1/2 c. cocoa powder, 1/4 c. unsweetened shredded coconut, 1/2 c. chopped unsweetened dates, 1/3 c. chopped walnuts, 1/4 c. sesame seed, 1/2 c. peanut butter, 3/4 c. sunflower seeds. Here's the instruction: In small pan over low heat, stir together honey and peanut butter until smooth. Remove from heat; add cocoa powder and blend well. Add remaining ingredients. Press into oiled 9 x 9 x 2-inch pan. Cut into 36 squares. Chill until firm. Yields 36. Serving size: 1.

input_text: How to make Coleslaw?
target_text: You can make Coleslaw with 1 medium head of cabbage, 1 cup sour cream, 4 tablespoons vinegar, 4 tablespoons sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, pepper, 2 tablespoons mayonnaise. Here's the instruction: Shred the cabbage. Mix together the rest of the ingredients and toss with the cabbage. Keeps inthe refigerator and may be mixed a day or so ahead.

input_text: How to make Mamaw'S Cooked Chocolate Icing?
target_text: You can make Mamaw'S Cooked Chocolate Icing with 1 egg, 1 c. sugar, 3 Tbsp. cocoa, 3 Tbsp. milk, pinch of salt. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients together in skillet. When it begins to boil, cook one minute, stirring over fire constantly. Let cool and spread.

input_text: How to make Summer Beer Ii?
target_text: You can make Summer Beer Ii with 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen pink lemonade concentrate, thawed, 12 fluid ounces water, 12 fluid ounces vodka, 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer. Here's the instruction: Place lemonade concentrate in a gallon pitcher. Measure water and vodka in the 12 ounce lemonade can and add to the pitcher. Pour in the beer, mix well and serve over ice.

input_text: How to make Spaghetti with Red and Yellow Peppers?
target_text: You can make Spaghetti with Red and Yellow Peppers with 3 large red bell peppers, 3 large yellow bell peppers, 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 4 large shallots, thinly sliced (about 3/4 to 1 cup), 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1 cup dry white wine, 2 cups reduced-sodium chicken broth, 1 pound spaghetti, 1/2 cup chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese. Here's the instruction: Preheat the broiler. Cover a heavy baking sheet with foil. Arrange the bell peppers on the baking sheet and broil until the skins brown and blister, turning the peppers occasionally, about 20 minutes. Enclose the peppers in a resealable plastic bag and set aside until cooled to room temperature. Peel and seed the cooled peppers and cut them into strips. Heat the olive oil in a large, heavy saucepan over medium-low heat. Add the shallots and cook until translucent, about 3 minutes. Add the pepper strips, salt, and pepper and saute for 5 minutes. Add the wine and chicken broth and continue cooking over low heat for 20 minutes, or until the peppers are very soft. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat. Add the pasta and cook until tender but still firm to the bite, stirring occasionally, 8 to 10 minutes. Drain. Add the pasta, parsley, and Parmesan cheese to the pepper sauce; stir to combine and coat the pasta. Serve.

input_text: How to make Coconut Macaroons?
target_text: You can make Coconut Macaroons with 2/3 c. (1/2 of 15 oz. can) Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk, 2 (4 oz.) pkg. (3 c.) shredded coconut, 1 tsp. vanilla extract, 3/4 tsp. almond extract. Here's the instruction: Mix together sweetened condensed milk, coconut and flavorings. Drop by tablespoonfuls, about 1-inch apart onto a well-greased baking sheet. Bake at 350° about 8 to 10 minutes or until delicately browned around the edges. Remove from baking sheet immediately.

input_text: How to make Rusty Nail?
target_text: You can make Rusty Nail with 1 1/2 ounces scotch, 1/2 ounce drambuie, 1 lemon twist. Here's the instruction: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

input_text: How to make Onigiri Rice Balls with Salted Cod Roe and Parsley?
target_text: You can make Onigiri Rice Balls with Salted Cod Roe and Parsley with 2 rice bowlfuls Plain cooked rice, 1 to 2 Tarako - salt cured pollack or cod roe, 1 Parsley (dried). Here's the instruction: Put the warm rice in a bowl and add flaked cod roe. Mix well. Add parsley and mix well. Shape to your liking.

input_text: How to make Spaghetti Hot Dish?
target_text: You can make Spaghetti Hot Dish with 1 egg, 1/2 c. milk, 32 oz. spaghetti sauce, 1 lb. hamburger (uncooked), spaghetti noodles, Mozzarella cheese. Here's the instruction: Break up spaghetti into 2-inch long pieces. Cook spaghetti and drain well. Mix egg and milk and put noodles in egg mixture.

input_text: How to make Raspberry Meringue Pie ?
target_text: You can make Raspberry Meringue Pie  with 1 pie crust, pre-baked and cooled. Go ahead and make one from scratch if you are a crust whiz -- otherwise, this pie turns out just fine with a freshly-baked bottom crust made from storebought pre-rolled crust dough, For the custard:, For the meringue:. Here's the instruction: Do not attempt to make meringue pies on a humid day.  Make sure the bottom crust is baked and cool before adding custard and meringue.  For custard: Heat raw raspberries slowly over medium heat, crushing and smashing to release the juice. Simmer, but do not allow to boil. When most of the juice is released, use a mesh strainer to separate hot juice from the seeds and pulp. Add freshly squeezed juice from 1 lemon; set aside. [Note: you can save the pulp for making preserves]  Sift together sugar, cornstarch, and a pinch of salt. Place in a medium saucepan and slowly add milk, water, and the grape juice. Whisk constantly while bringing to a gentle simmer.  Transfer about half of this hot liquid, 1/4 cup at a time, to the container holding the beaten egg yolks. Whisk quickly to avoid "making an omelet". Once the yolks are well-mixed into about half of the hot liquid, re-combine back into the saucepan on the stovetop. Simmer gently for about 5 minutes, whisking thoroughly.  Remove from heat and immediately add the raspberry/lemon juice mixture and the lemon zest. Whisk well and set aside, covered.  For meringue: (If you decide to reduce the sugar in this recipe, it is recommended to reduce it from the custard portion, not the meringue portion.)  Beat egg whites and cream of tartar with an electric mixer until soft peaks form. Add sugar gradually while still beating until meringue thickens. Continue beating until it will hold stiff peaks.  Pour warm raspberry custard into the crust, and after it's cooled a bit more, gently spoon the meringue over the top. Handle the meringue as little as possible, spreading it to the edges of the crust and sealing it to the crust or the pie dish. Texture the top of the meringue gently with the tip of a butter knife.  Bake at 350 degrees until the meringue begins to brown along the top (about 15 minutes). Remove the pie from the oven, cover, cool for 1 hour, then chill for at least 4 hours.

input_text: How to make Supreme Salad?
target_text: You can make Supreme Salad with 9 oz. Cool Whip, 4 oz. cottage cheese, 1 can mandarin oranges, drained, 1 can pineapple tidbits, drained, 1/2 c. chopped pecans, 1 c. sour cream, 1 small box strawberry jello (any flavor can be used). Here's the instruction: Place all ingredients, except the jello, in a bowl and mix or toss. Sprinkle dry jello over this mixture and stir until well blended in. Cover and chill until ready to serve.

input_text: How to make Yogurt Egg Salad?
target_text: You can make Yogurt Egg Salad with 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped, 2 Tbsp. plain nonfat yogurt, 2 to 3 drops lemon juice, 1/2 tsp. prepared mustard, 1/2 tsp. vinegar, 2 tsp. chopped onion, 2 tsp. chopped celery, salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients and use fork to blend lightly. Serve on lettuce or in sandwiches. Serves 2.

input_text: How to make Chili * ?
target_text: You can make Chili *  with 2 lbs lean stew beef, 1 lb lean ground beef, 1 lb meat of your choice (suggest venison, armadillo, prairie rabbit, squirrel or beaver), Sauces: soy, Worcestershire, teriaki, 12 oz can tomato sauce, 7 oz BBQ sauce (your favorite), 1 tomato, 8-12 sliced mushrooms, 1/2 green bell pepper, chopped, 1/2 red bell pepper, chopped, 2 large jalapeno peppers, 1 1/2 tsp salt, 1 tsp cayenne pepper, ground, 1 oz chili powder, 1/4 bulb garlic, minced, 1/2 onion, chopped, 3/4 tsp paprika, 1/4 tsp oregano, 3/4 tsp comino (cumin), 3 tbsp flour. Here's the instruction: MEAT PREP: Cut meats into bite sized chunks. Marinate for a minimum of 6 hours in the soy, Worcestershire and teriyaki sauces. Add a little salt, pepper and meat tenderizer (not from ingredients list)if you like. Cover and refrigerate for the aforementioned 6 plus hours.  COOKING: In a large pot heat tomato sauce and 10 oz water at a temperature just under medium.  In a very hot frying pan sear the meat chunks in oil. This is a quick sear, just enough to darken all the sides. Turn frequently and add the darkened chunks to the tomato sauce as you go. As the searing process goes on add the BBQ sauce, bell peppers, jalapenos, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, chili powder, garlic, onion, paprika, oregano and comino. Cover and let cook slowly.  Saute mushrooms in butter. Fry and drain ground beef. Add mushrooms, ground beef and tomato to pot. Cover and cook at low temperature for 1 1/2 hours.  Mix flour with a few tablespoons of beer to make a paste. Add paste to mixture to thicken it. Let cook another 20 minutes.  Grab some cornbread, cold beer and dig in.

input_text: How to make Huevos Rancheros?
target_text: You can make Huevos Rancheros with 1 Tablespoon Olive Oil, 1 whole Onion, Diced, 2 whole Green Onions, diced, 1 whole Yellow Pepper, Cubed, 1 whole Zucchini, Cubed, 1/2 teaspoons Cumin, 1/2 teaspoons Oregano, 1/2 teaspoons Black Pepper, 1/2 teaspoons Kosher Salt, 1 can (15 Oz. Size) Black Beans, 1 can Green Chiles, Diced, 4 Ounce Can, 4 whole Eggs, 4 whole Tortillas, 1 cup Sour Cream, For Garnish (optional), 1 can (10 Oz. Size) Enchilada Sauce, Green Or Red, 1 cup Grated Cheese, Your Choice, 2 Tablespoons Cilantro, Chopped. Here's the instruction: In a skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add the onions, peppers and zucchini. Season with half of the spices. Saute about five minutes or until tender. Remove and set aside. Add the beans and chiles to the same pan. Season with the remaining spices. Cook until warm, about three minutes. Cook the eggs however you like - I am a fan of over-easy - but do whatever suits you. Place a tortilla on the plate followed by some of the beans, then some of the vegetable mixture and a big dollop of sour cream and several tablespoons of enchilada sauce. Then place an egg on top with some grated cheese. You can stick the plate under the broiler for a few minutes to melt the cheese, but be careful because the heat will cook your egg! Serve immediately and enjoy. Garnishes: sour cream, cheese, hot sauce, chopped cilantro

input_text: How to make Creole Spaghetti?
target_text: You can make Creole Spaghetti with 2 lb. ground chuck, 1 c. diced onion, 3 tsp. Creole seasoning, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. pepper, 1 tsp. garlic salt, 1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes, 1 can Hunt's Italian spaghetti sauce with garlic and herbs, 1 can Italian tomatoes, 1 tall can mushrooms, 1 large pkg. spaghetti, broken, cooked according to directions and drained. Here's the instruction: Brown the ground chuck with the onion; drain. Add all other ingredients together in a big pot and cook slowly about 30 minutes. Add some tomato juice to make right consistency.

input_text: How to make Chicken Chanko a La Konishiki?
target_text: You can make Chicken Chanko a La Konishiki with 1 (4 lb) whole chickens (boned) or 4 -5 lbs chicken parts, as desired, 1 Chinese cabbage, chopped into bite size pieces, 12 daikon radish, chopped into bite size pieces, 1 eggplant, sliced, 3 leeks, 4 onions, quartered, 5 carrots (4 sliced, 1 cut into bite-size pieces), 12 shiitake mushrooms, quartered, 16 ounces fresh tofu, chopped into bite size pieces, 12 cup soy sauce, 1 cup sake, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 (16 ounce) packages udon noodles. Here's the instruction: Debone the chicken and save the bones to make the stock. If you don't want to make chicken stock, use a commercial low sodium chicken broth (32-34 oz). Cut the chicken meat into 2-inch chunks. Fill a large stock pot (10-12 quarts) with water (see amount below) and soy sauce (use"regular" soy sauce-- what the Chinese would call"thin" sauce-- don't use the"thick" or"double" sauce). If you're making the stock from the chicken bones, add the chicken bones to 6-8 quarts of water and simmer for three hours, skimming the top constantly. If you're using chicken broth, add the broth to the soy sauce and bring to a simmer. Trim the leeks (cut off the green part and the roots), then either slice lengthwise about 3/4 of the way down and rinse (to get rid of any sandy soid inside the leek or soak top down in cold water to let the sand out). In a separate pot, with rapidly boiling water, blanch the daikon, eggplant and four sliced carrots[should take about 1-2 minutes], then drain. Add chicken meat and giblets to the stock base, skimming the top thouroughly. Add all the vegetables (cabbage, daikon, eggplant, leeks, onions, the remaining carrot, mushrooms) and tofu to the stock pot. Simmer until cooked (about 30-40 min). Season with salt and sake, to taste. Stir and simmer for 2-3 minutes to let seasonings mix. Re-taste and adjust seasoning if necessary. Serve hot with steamed rice-- then add the udon noodles, continue to let the broth simmer and serve hot. Use the stock as a base-- continue to add chicken, vegetables, noodles indefinitely.

input_text: How to make Danish Prune Bar Cookies?
target_text: You can make Danish Prune Bar Cookies with 1 c. pitted prunes, chopped, 1 c. chopped walnuts, 1 c. firmly packed brown sugar, 3/4 c. flour, 1 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1/4 tsp. salt, 3 eggs, well beaten. Here's the instruction: Mix well the prunes, nuts, brown sugar, flour, baking powder and salt. Fold into eggs. Spread into greased 7 x 10 1/2-inch pan. Bake at 325° for 25 to 30 minutes. Cool in pan 10 minutes. Cut into small bars and roll in powdered sugar. Makes 24 bars.

input_text: How to make Deli Brisket Bake?
target_text: You can make Deli Brisket Bake with 2 12 lbs beef brisket, 12 cup prepared mustard, 14 cup whole mixed pickling spice, 1 (27 ounce) can sauerkraut, 14 lb swiss cheese, Grated. Here's the instruction: Place brisket on aluminum foil. Spread each side of the brisket with prepared mustard and whole mixed pickling spices. Wrap foil tightly around brisket and place in 8 x 10 baking dish. Bake in slow oven (225 degrees F.) 3 1/2 hours or until done. Remove brisket from foil. Scrape off and discard pickling spices from brisket and trim any excess fat. Cut brisket into 4 to 6 equal portions and place in 8 x 10 baking dish. Rinse and drain sauerkraut and place on top of brisket. Sprinkle with grated swiss cheese. Place under the broiler until the cheese has browned, about 8 to 10 minutes. Garnish with prepared mustard.

input_text: How to make Double Delicious Chicken?
target_text: You can make Double Delicious Chicken with 2 1/4 c. water, 1 pkg. noodles, 3 cubes chicken flavor, 2 c. cooked chicken, 3/4 c. green beans. Here's the instruction: Bring water to boil. Stir in noodles and chicken cubes. Boil for 7 minutes. Add remaining ingredients. Serves 6.

input_text: How to make Cream of Artichoke Soup?
target_text: You can make Cream of Artichoke Soup with 1 (10.5-ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup, 1 (12-ounce) can low-sodium chicken broth, 1 (12-ounce) jar water-packed artichoke hearts, 1 pinch cayenne pepper, 1/2 cup cream, Salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, combine cream of celery soup and chicken broth; stir until smooth. Add the artichoke hearts and cayenne. Bring to a boil. Pour soup into a blender and mix until consistency is smooth. Return to pot and slowly stir in cream. Season with salt and pepper, to taste, and serve hot.

input_text: How to make Apple-Nutmeg Conserve?
target_text: You can make Apple-Nutmeg Conserve with 5 cups chopped peeled apples, 1 cup water, 13 cup lemon juice, 1 (1 3/4 ounce) package powdered fruit pectin, 4 cups sugar, 1 cup light raisins, 12 teaspoon ground nutmeg. Here's the instruction: In a 6 or 8-quart kettle combine apples, water and lemon juice. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer 10 minutes. Stir in pectin; return to a full boil, stirring constantly. Stir in sugar and raisins; return to full boil. Boil hard for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and stir in ground nutmeg. Ladle into hot, sterile jars; clean rim and adjust lids. Process in boiling water bath 5 minutes. Cool on wire rack.

input_text: How to make Quick and Creamy Applesauce Dessert (Lacto)?
target_text: You can make Quick and Creamy Applesauce Dessert (Lacto) with 1/2 cup applesauce unsweetened, 1/2 cup yogurt, plain nonfat, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/2 teaspoon apple pie spice, 2 teaspoons sugar. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Mix thoroughly. Serve right away or chill for later serving. To reduce the calories you can use a sugar substitute to equal the sugar. Nutrition (per serving): 203 calories Total Fat 0g (2% of calories)

input_text: How to make Grasshopper Parfaits?
target_text: You can make Grasshopper Parfaits with 1 quart vanilla ice cream, 3 tablespoons white Creme de Cacao, 3 tablespoons green creme de menthe, 1/2 cup chocolate wafer crumbs (which I prefer) or 1/2 cup chocolate syrup, whipped cream, maraschino cherry. Here's the instruction: In each of 4 parfait glasses, alternate layers of ice cream, about 2 tsps each creme de cacao, creme de menthe, and the wafer crumbs. (or you can stir the liqueurs into the softened ice cream). Top each with whipped cream and a cherry. Place in freezer until serving time.

input_text: How to make Watergate Salad?
target_text: You can make Watergate Salad with 8 1/4 oz. crushed pineapple, 3 1/2 oz. pistachio instant Jell-O pudding, 12 oz. Cool Whip, 1 c. miniature marshmallows, 1/2 to 1 c. chopped pecans. Here's the instruction: In large mixing bowl mix pineapple and pistachio pudding well. Add Cool Whip and mix well. Then add marshmallows and pecans. Place mixture in salad bowl. Place in refrigerator until ready to use.

input_text: How to make Haystacks?
target_text: You can make Haystacks with 12 oz. milk chocolate, 12 oz. coconut. Here's the instruction: Melt chocolate in double boiler. Add coconut, stirring until coconut is completely covered. Spoon onto wax paper or greased cookie sheet. Cool completely.

input_text: How to make Grilled Chick N Wrappers?
target_text: You can make Grilled Chick N Wrappers with 2 tablespoons olive oil, 8 boneless skinless chicken thighs, 1 sweet onion, 1 cucumber, 8 ounces monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend, 6 slices hickory smoked bacon, 16 ounces shredded lettuce, ranch salad dressing, 6 (10 inch) flour tortillas, 1 lime. Here's the instruction: In a skillet heat olive oil on medium. Cut the chicken thighs into strips and add to skillet. In a separate skillet, fry the bacon. While they are cooking, prep work- slice the onion, cucumber and set aside. When chicken is done and the bacon is done, remove from skillet and set aside. Assembly time. Heat the tortilla in microwave for 15 seconds. To the tortillas, add the ranch, lettuce, cucumbers, onion, bacon, cheese, and then chicken and squeeze a little lime juice over and wrap like a burrito. Repeat 5 more times.

input_text: How to make Baked Chicken Parisian?
target_text: You can make Baked Chicken Parisian with 4 large or 6 medium Boneless Chicken Breasts, 1 can Cream of Chicken Soup, 1 C. Sour Cream, 1 small can Sliced Mushrooms, drained, 1\2 C. Dry White Wine, Salt, Pepper, Paprika. Here's the instruction: Place chicken in 11x7 baking dish. Season with salt and pepper. Combine soup, sour cream, mushrooms and wine. Pour over chicken. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 350° for 1 1\2 hours. Serves 4 to 6 people.

input_text: How to make Cheesy Papillons Recipe?
target_text: You can make Cheesy Papillons Recipe with Flour, 2 puff pastry sheets (17 ounces total), Coarse sea salt (such as Maldon or fleur de sel), 2 cups grated Gruyere (about 6 ounces), 1/4 teaspoon piment d'Espelette. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 400°F. Dust the countertop with some flour. Unfold the puff pastry, dock lightly with a fork, and season with a generous pinch of sea salt. Scatter 1 cup of cheese evenly over the top, and use a rolling pin to gently press it into the pastry. Top with half of the piment d'Espelette. Repeat with the second sheet of pastry and the remaining ingredients. Use a ravioli cutter to slice the pastry in strips about 1-inch by 3 inches. Twist each strip in the middle to form a bowtie. Place strips, spaced out, on a Silpat or parchment-lined baking sheet (you may need to do this in two batches). Bake until puffed and golden, 15 to 20 minutes.

input_text: How to make Jackpots?
target_text: You can make Jackpots with 3/4 lb. ground beef, 1/2 c. Kraft barbecue sauce, 1 Tbsp. minced onion, 10 oz. can Hungry Jack biscuits, 3/4 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 Tbsp. brown sugar. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400°. Brown ground beef and drain; add barbecue sauce, onions and brown sugar. Set aside.

input_text: How to make Salmon Patties?
target_text: You can make Salmon Patties with 1 large can salmon, 1 egg, 1 c. corn bread crumbs. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients, adding black pepper to taste. Make into medium size patties and fry in deep fat until brown.

input_text: How to make Tuna Casserole ?
target_text: You can make Tuna Casserole  with 1 (12 ounce) package egg noodles, 1/4 cup chopped onion (or Onion flakes), 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 cup Chopped Celery, 2 (6 ounce) cans tuna, drained, 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of celery soup, 1 cup crushed potato chips. Here's the instruction: 1. Cook pasta in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes, drain. 2. Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). 3. In a large bowl, thoroughly mix noodles, onion, 1 cup cheese, peas, tuna, and soup. Transfer to a 9x13 inch baking dish, and top with potato chip crumbs and remaining 1 cup cheese. 4. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until cheese is bubbly.

input_text: How to make Minxquites?
target_text: You can make Minxquites with 4 ears corn, cooked and still warm, kernels removed, 4 tablespoons mayonnaise, 2 teaspoons chile powder, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 1/4 cup shredded Parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, 2 tablespoons chopped scallions. Here's the instruction: Mix everything together in a bowl. Serve warm or at room temperature.

input_text: How to make Sausage Rolls?
target_text: You can make Sausage Rolls with 1 can crescent rolls, 1 lb. sausage, hot or sweet (Jimmy Dean, Jones, etc.). Here's the instruction: Preheat oven per directions on crescent roll can. Take one piece of triangular roll, lay flat on cookie sheet. Stuff approximately one teaspoonful of sausage and roll up. Bake until all sides are browned. Keep flipping.

input_text: How to make Marinated Chicken Breasts?
target_text: You can make Marinated Chicken Breasts with 10 to 12 chicken breasts, 1 c. soy sauce, 1 3/4 c. pineapple juice, 1 c. wine vinegar, 1/2 c. sugar, 1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder. Here's the instruction: Place chicken in a container with a cover. Mix rest of ingredients and pour over chicken. Marinate 24 to 48 hours. Grill or bake chicken at 400° for 45 minutes basting often with marinade.

input_text: How to make Chicken Tandoori Focaccia Sandwiches?
target_text: You can make Chicken Tandoori Focaccia Sandwiches with 1 loaf focaccia bread, 2 cups cooked chicken, sliced, 1/4 cup green grape, 1/8 cup sliced almonds, 1/4 teaspoon tandoori spice mix, 1/8 teaspoon curry powder, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, swiss cheese. Here's the instruction: Cut prepared Foccacia bread horizontally in half. Place sliced pieces of swiss cheese on one half. Mix together cooked chicken, sliced green grapes, almonds, tandoori seasoning* curry powder, and mayonnaise. Stir ingredients together and spread mixture over the swiss cheese on the foccacia bread. Put bread together and slice to serve. *You can purchase tandoori seasoning in the grocery store, however if you have left over tandoori chicken you can use that instead and omit the powder. You can also adjust the flavor of this sandwich by increasing the tandoori spice or curry powder to taste.

input_text: How to make Buttermilk Substitute?
target_text: You can make Buttermilk Substitute with 1 tablespoon white vinegar or 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar, 1 cup milk. Here's the instruction: Add vinegar to a liquid measuring cup. Then, add milk until the amount reaches one cup. Let the mixture stand at room temperature for 5-10 minutes. It should look curdled. Stir and you have homemade buttermilk!

input_text: How to make Potluck Favorite Grits And Cheese(1977 Cookbook)  ?
target_text: You can make Potluck Favorite Grits And Cheese(1977 Cookbook)   with 6 c. boiling water, 1 1/2 c. Albers grits, 1 tsp. salt, 1 lb. Velveeta cheese, 1 1/2 cubes margarine, 3 eggs, well beaten. Here's the instruction: Stir boiling water, grits and salt together and cook until smooth and thick. Stir cut up cheese and margarine into cooked grits until melted. Add beaten eggs; mix well. Pour into buttered 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

input_text: How to make Red Coffee?
target_text: You can make Red Coffee with 9 c. cranberry juice, 9 c. pineapple juice, 4 1/2 c. water, 1 c. brown sugar, 2 sticks cinnamon, 1 tsp. cloves, 1 tsp. allspice, 3 c. cranberry juice, 3 c. pineapple juice, 1 1/2 c. water, 1/3 c. brown sugar, 1 to 2 sticks cinnamon, 1/3 tsp. cloves, 1/3 tsp. allspice. Here's the instruction: Put sugar, cinnamon sticks, cloves and allspice in coffee filter basket of coffeemaker. Fill pot with juices and water, let perk and serve. Makes 20 cups! (Large coffee maker.)

input_text: How to make Pea Salad?
target_text: You can make Pea Salad with 3/4 c. vinegar, 1 Tbsp. water, 1/4 to 1/2 tsp. pepper, 3/4 c. sugar, 1 tsp. salt, some oil (can be added), 17 oz. can sweet peas, 2 oz. pimento, 1 c. onion, 12 oz. can Shoepeg corn, 1 c. celery. Here's the instruction: Combine first 5 ingredients, including oil if wanted. Boil for 1 minute. Cool and combine with remaining ingredients. Chill overnight.

input_text: How to make Curried Quinoa And Chickpeas?

input_text: How to make Turkey Bolognese Sauce?

input_text: How to make Chinese Barbeque Pork (Char Siu)?
target_text: You can make Chinese Barbeque Pork (Char Siu) with 2/3 cup soy sauce, 1/2 cup honey, 1/2 cup Chinese rice wine (or sake or dry sherry), 1/3 cup hoisin sauce, 1/3 cup ketchup, 1/3 cup brown sugar, 4 cloves garlic, crushed, 1 teaspoon Chinese five-spice powder, 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1/8 teaspoon pink curing salt (optional), 1 (3 pound) boneless pork butt (shoulder), 1 teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste. Here's the instruction: Place soy sauce, honey, rice wine, hoisin sauce, ketchup, brown sugar, garlic, five-spice powder, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and curing salt in a saucepan. Bring to a boil on high heat; reduce heat to medium-high. Cook for 1 minute. Remove from heat. Cool to room temperature. Cut pork roast in half lengthwise. Cut each half again lengthwise forming 4 long, thick pieces of pork. Transfer cooled sauce to a large mixing bowl. Stir in red food coloring. Place pork sections into sauce and coat each piece. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate 4 to 12 hours. Preheat grill for medium heat, 275 to 300 degrees F (135 to 150 degrees C) and lightly oil the grate. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Remove sections of pork from marinade and let excess drip off. Place on prepared baking sheet. Sprinkle with kosher salt to taste. Transfer pork sections to grate over indirect heat on prepared grill. Cover and cook about 45 minutes. Brush with marinade; turn. Continue cooking until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the center reads 185 and 190 degrees F, about 1 hour and 15 minutes more. Do not use any more marinade on cooked meat until after you boil it. Place leftover marinade in saucepan; bring to a boil; let simmer 1 minutes. Remove from heat. Now you can use it to brush over the cooked pork.

input_text: How to make Praline Cheesecake ?
target_text: You can make Praline Cheesecake  with 3/4 c graham crackers, 2 T melted butter, 1 1/2 lbs cream cheese, 8 eggs, 1 T lemon juice, 1 t vanilla, 1 c cream, pinch cream of tartar, 3/4 c sugar, 1/4 c water, 1/8 t cream of tartar. Here's the instruction: mix together crushed graham crackers and melted butter. Press into 9 inch springform pan.  Beat cream cheese until fluffy and add 6 egg yolks, one at a time, until well incorporated. Stir in lemon juice and add vanilla.  In a separate chilled bowl, beat cream untill it holds stiff peaks. In another bowl beat egg whites until they hold stiff peaks. Fold the cream and egg white mixture together and pour into the springform pan.  Bake the cake in the middle of a slow oven (300 deg) for 1 hour. Reduce the temperature to 250 degrees and bake for an additional hour. Open the door and let the cake stand until cooled  In a saucepan bring to a boil the water and sugar and add the cream of tartar continue cooking until it is light caramel color. Add 1/2 c chopped pecans. Pour mixture onto Silpat or other non-stick surface. Once cooled chop praline and sprinkle over the top of th echeesecake.

input_text: How to make Satsuma-Cello?
target_text: You can make Satsuma-Cello with 20 satsuma oranges*, 2 (750-milliliter) bottles vodka, 4 cups sugar. Here's the instruction: Peel satsuma oranges using vegetable peeler, reserving flesh for another use. Scrape bitter white pith from orange rind strips, and discard pith. Place orange rind strips in a large glass pitcher or 3-qt. jar; pour vodka over strips. Cover and let stand at room temperature 7 to 10 days. Bring sugar and 5 cups water to a boil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Reduce heat to low, and simmer, stirring occasionally, 1 minute or until sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat; let stand 30 minutes. Pour syrup into vodka mixture. Cover and let stand at room temperature 24 hours. Pour mixture through a fine wire-mesh strainer into another pitcher, discarding orange rind strips. Pour into sealable bottles or Mason jars. Seal and chill 4 hours before serving. Store in refrigerator up to 1 month. *15 minneola tangelos may be substituted. 3 Satsuma-Cello Cocktails. The Southern citrus burst of this homemade liqueur delivers a festive twist to cocktail favorites. (Each recipe yields 4 to 6 servings.) Satsuma Old-Fashioned: Mix 1 cup Satsuma-cello, 1/2 cup whiskey, 4 dashes Angostura bitters, and 4 dashes Peychaud's bitters in a pitcher. Stir in 2 cups each ice and club soda. Rosemary-Satsuma Julep: Muddle 1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary leaves with 1 cup Satsuma-cello. Let stand 5 minutes. Strain into a pitcher. Stir in 2 cups each ice and club soda. Basil-Satsuma Julep: Muddle 1/4 cup basil leaves with 1 Tbsp. sugar. Add 1 cup Satsuma-cello. Let stand 5 minutes. Strain into a pitcher. Stir in 2 cups each ice and club soda.

input_text: How to make Jean-Georgess Warm Chocolate Cake?
target_text: You can make Jean-Georgess Warm Chocolate Cake with 18 tablespoons (255g) unsalted butter, cut into pieces, 8 1/2 ounces (250g) bittersweet chocolate (preferably Guittard Quetzalcoatl 72% cacao), chopped, 5 large egg yolks, 5 large eggs, 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons (125g) sugar, 1/3 cup plus 1 tablespoon (50g) all-purpose flour, Chocolate Sauce (page 268), Chocolate Crumble (page 213), Vanilla Bean Ice Cream (page 220), Crystallized Vanilla (page 186; optional), Confectioners sugar (optional). Here's the instruction: Butter eight 4-ounce ramekins or sixteen 2-ounce molds and dust them lightly with flour. Set the ramekins on a baking sheet. Put the butter and chocolate in a glass bowl and melt in the microwave, using 30-second bursts. Stir until smooth. Put the egg yolks and eggs in the bowl of a standing mixer fitted with the whisk. Beat at medium speed until frothy. Pour in the sugar and increase the speed to medium-high. Continue to beat until the eggs have tripled in volume. Scrape the butter and chocolate into the eggs. Beat until well mixed, scraping the bowl once or twice. Sift the flour over the batter and fold it in gently. Put the batter in a pastry bag and pipe into the ramekins. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until youre ready to serve the dessert or for up to 8 hours. Take the cakes out of the refrigerator to bring them to room temperature. Heat the oven to 475F or 450F on convection. Slide the baking sheet into the oven and bake the cakes until the sides and tops are set, about 4 minutes for small cakes or 6 to 7 minutes for large ones. The centers will still be very soft. Invert the ramekins onto dessert plates. Leave for about 10 seconds, then lift off the ramekins. Spoon a little chocolate sauce around each cake. Make a small pile of chocolate crumble to the side, and top with a scoop of ice cream. Garnish the ice cream with crystallized vanilla and the cake with confectioners sugar, if you want. Serve immediately.
