input_text: How to make Small Hungarian Pastries?
target_text: You can make Small Hungarian Pastries with 4 c. flour, 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. butter, pinch of salt, 4 egg yolks, well beaten, 1/4 pt. sour cream, 1/2 c. milk. Here's the instruction: Mix flour, sugar, butter and salt like pie crust, then add egg yolks, sour cream and milk; knead well. Roll out about 1/8-inch thick and cut into small squares. Put a small amount of filling in center, then fold 2 corners on top, overlapping. Brush with egg wash. Bake in preheated 400° oven for 15 to 20 minutes.

input_text: How to make Dirty Rice?
target_text: You can make Dirty Rice with 2 c. long grain rice, 2 cans beef consomme, 2 cans water, 2 sticks melted butter, 1 chopped onion, salt and pepper, red cayenne pepper. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients in a casserole dish and bake at 400° for 45 minutes. Great with shish kebob. I would try some grated carrots and add parsley.

input_text: How to make Crab Spread?
target_text: You can make Crab Spread with 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, 8 oz. chopped crab, 3 Tbsp. chopped onion (green onions, tops and all), 2 Tbsp. prepared horseradish, 2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce, 6 drops Tabasco, 1/4 c. finely chopped walnuts, paprika. Here's the instruction: Blend softened cream cheese and all ingredients except nuts and paprika. Spread into a 9-inch pie pan. Top with walnuts and sprinkle with paprika. Bake, uncovered, at 375° for 25 minutes, until lightly browned. Serve with crackers.

input_text: How to make Chicken Soup?
target_text: You can make Chicken Soup with 4 c. broad egg noodles, 2 Tbsp. minced onion, 2 Tbsp. granules (chicken flavor), 2 tsp. celery flakes, 1 tsp. pepper or to taste, 2 (5 oz.) cans chicken, break up. Here's the instruction: In large pan, boil 10 cups of water. Add all ingredients. Bring to a boil again. Simmer for 15 to 20 minutes (noodles cooked).

input_text: How to make Chinese Gingered Rice?
target_text: You can make Chinese Gingered Rice with 1 cup short-grain rice, 12 teaspoon fresh ginger, finely minced, 12 teaspoon toasted sesame oil, 2 cups water, 12 teaspoon salt. Here's the instruction: Rinse the rice in strainer and drain. In a saucepan, heat the oil and saute the ginger over medium heat until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in the rice. Add the water and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to a simmer. Cook covered until water is absorbed, about 12-15 minutes. Stir once and allow to stand until ready to serve.

input_text: How to make Peter'S Magic Crock Pot Meatloaf ?
target_text: You can make Peter'S Magic Crock Pot Meatloaf  with 2 pounds Ground Chuck, 1 cup chopped onion, 1 1/2 tablespoons salt, 1 cup cracker crumbs, 1 egg, 1 package brown gravy mix, 7/8 oz Size, 1 cup milk, 3 slices smoked bacon. Here's the instruction: 1.	Mix all ingredients (except Bacon).  2.	Place in crock pot.  3.	Layer Bacon on top.  4.	Cover and cook on low 8-10 hours.

input_text: How to make Morning Glory Muffins?
target_text: You can make Morning Glory Muffins with FOR THE MUFFINS:, 2 cups Flour, 1/4 cups Sugar, 1/4 cups Brown Sugar, 2 teaspoons Baking Powder, 1 teaspoon Cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoons Salt, 1/2 cups Grated Carrots, 1/2 cups Crushed Pineapple, Drained Well, 1/2 cups Chopped Walnuts, 1/2 cups Shredded Coconut, 1/2 cups Peeled Grated Apple, 1 whole Egg, 1/3 cups Vegetable Oil, 1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract, 1 teaspoon Almond Extract, FOR THE TOPPING:, 2 Tablespoons Flour, 3 Tablespoons White Sugar, 3 Tablespoons Brown Sugar, 1/2 teaspoons Cinnamon, 2 Tablespoons Cold Butter, Diced. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 F. Line 12 muffin cups with paper muffin liners. Set the pan aside. In a large bowl, mix together flour, sugar, baking soda, cinnamon and salt. Stir in the carrot, pineapple, nuts, coconut and apple. Set aside. In a separate bowl, beat together eggs, oil, vanilla and almond extracts. Stir egg mixture into the carrot/flour mixture, just until moistened. Scoop batter into prepared muffin cups. For the topping: Mix together all of the ingredients in a bowl until crumbly. Sprinkle topping on top of batter. Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of a muffin comes out clean.

input_text: How to make Open-Faced Shrimp-And-Avocado Sandwiches?
target_text: You can make Open-Faced Shrimp-And-Avocado Sandwiches with 4 thick bacon slices, 1 pound peeled, medium-size raw shrimp, deveined, 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt, divided, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice, divided, 1 (5-oz.) package arugula, 1 1/2 cups cherry tomatoes, halved, 1 cup fresh corn kernels (about 2 ears), 1/4 cup thinly sliced red onion, 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, 4 (1-inch-thick) country bread slices, toasted, 1 garlic clove, crushed, 2 tablespoons mayonnaise, 2 avocados, peeled and sliced, 2 tablespoons fresh dill, chopped. Here's the instruction: Cook bacon in a medium skillet over medium heat 12 minutes or until crisp; remove bacon, and drain on paper towels, reserving 2 Tbsp. drippings in skillet. Cut bacon into 1-inch pieces. Cook shrimp and 1/2 tsp. salt in hot drippings over medium-high heat 2 minutes on each side or until bright pink. Remove from heat, and stir in pepper and 2 Tbsp. lemon juice. Toss together arugula, tomatoes, corn kernels, onion slices, olive oil, bacon, and remaining lemon juice. Rub 1 side of each bread slice lightly with garlic. Spread about 1/2 Tbsp. mayonnaise on each bread slice; top with avocado slices and shrimp mixture. Sprinkle with chopped dill, and serve with arugula mixture.

input_text: How to make Eggplant Lasagna?
target_text: You can make Eggplant Lasagna with 4 ounces shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese, 2 tablespoons parmesan cheese (grated), 1 cup part-skim ricotta cheese, 2 teaspoons canola oil, 1 medium eggplant, 1 lb fresh mushrooms, 12 cup diced onion, 9 lasagna noodles, 1 (15 1/2 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce, no added salt. Here's the instruction: Directions:. Trim off the ends of eggplant and cut into very thin slices. Spray a nonstick pan with cooking oil and brown eggplant slices over medium heat. Set aside. In the same pan, add chopped onions and cook, stirring frequently for about 3 to 5 minutes. Add sliced mushrooms and continue to cook until mushrooms are tender. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C). Spoon 1/3 cup (80 ml) tomato sauce into 11X 7-inch (80 cm X 18 cm) baking dish. Add first layer of uncooked lasagna noodles and cover with a layer of ricotta, mushroom mixture, mozzarella cheese, eggplant slices. Repeat to make three layers and finish with sauce and Parmesan cheese. Cover and bake for 40 minutes. Let stand at least ten minutes before cutting.

input_text: How to make Lemon Custard Cake?
target_text: You can make Lemon Custard Cake with 1 prepared angel food cake (10 inches), 1 (3.4 oz.) pkg. instant lemon pudding mix, 1 1/2 c. cold milk, 1 c. (8 oz.) sour cream, 1 (21 oz.) can cherry or strawberry pie filling. Here's the instruction: Tear the angel food cake into bite size pieces. Place in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan.

input_text: How to make Margarita Cupcakes With Key Lime Icing?
target_text: You can make Margarita Cupcakes With Key Lime Icing with 1 (18 1/4 ounce) box white cake mix (no pudding in the mix), 1 (10 ounce) can frozen margarita mix, thawed (undiluted), 3 egg whites, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon grated lime zest, FOR ICING, 8 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 2 tablespoons key lime juice, 1 teaspoon key lime zest or 1 teaspoon lemon zest, 4 -5 cups confectioners' sugar. Here's the instruction: In large bowl, combine cake mix, Margarita mix, egg whites and vegetable oil using electric mixer. Stir in lime zest; mix completely. Fill prepared pans 2/3 full. Bake according to box directions (usually 325 degrees - be sure to check box!) 22-24 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center of cupcake comes out clean. Cool in pan on cooling rack 5-8 minutes. Remove cupcakes from pan; cool completely. FOR ICING: In large bowl, cream butter, cream cheese, juice and zest with electric mixer until light and fluffy. Add 4 cups confectioners' sugar, one cup at a time; continue beating until light and fluffy. If icing is too thin add additional confectioners' sugar 1 tablespoon at a time.

input_text: How to make Marinated Tomatoes(Fresh Homegrown Tomatoes And Herbs Make A Delicious Salad.)  ?
target_text: You can make Marinated Tomatoes(Fresh Homegrown Tomatoes And Herbs Make A Delicious Salad.)   with 4 medium tomatoes, peeled, 1/2 c. salad oil, 1/4 c. vinegar, 1/8 c. fresh parsley, 1/8 c. basil, finely chopped, or 1/8 c. cilantro, finely chopped (whichever you prefer), salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: In a deep dish, put the tomatoes, vinegar, oil and herbs. Let set in refrigerator (4 hours to overnight) a long time? Turn every now and then to baste the tomatoes well. Serve with sliced cucumbers on salad plate. Spoon some of the oil over each. Yields 4 servings.

input_text: How to make Dan's Chicken Enchiladas?
target_text: You can make Dan's Chicken Enchiladas with 1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast, diced, 1 small onion, minced, 1 tablespoon minced garlic, 1 tablespoon oregano, 1 tablespoon basil, 1 tablespoon parsley, 1 teaspoon chili powder or 1 teaspoon cayenne, salt and pepper, 16 medium flour tortillas, 1 lb mozzarella cheese or 1 lb monterey jack cheese, shredded. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350F. Brown chicken in pan. Add the onion and garlic and sweat them. Add oregano, basil, parsley, and chili powder. Add salt and pepper if you wish. Stir until well blended. Set aside to cool for about 5 minutes. Spoon a little filling into each tortilla and add half as much cheese to each; roll up and place into a baking pan. Spread the rest of the cheese on the top. Bake until cheese is bubbly and browns on the edges.

input_text: How to make Pistachio Crusted Rack Of Lamb?
target_text: You can make Pistachio Crusted Rack Of Lamb with 2 racks of lamb, trimmed, 1 teaspoon herbes de Provence, salt and ground black pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2/3 cup chopped pistachio nuts, 2 tablespoons dry bread crumbs, 1 tablespoon melted butter, 1 teaspoon olive oil, salt and ground black pepper to taste, 3 tablespoons Dijon mustard. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. Generously season each rack of lamb with herbes de Provence, salt, and black pepper. Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Place lamb in skillet and cook, browning on all sides, 6 to 8 minutes. Transfer lamb to a foil-lined baking sheet; set aside. Stir pistachios, bread crumbs, butter, olive oil, and a pinch of salt and black pepper in a bowl. Spread mustard on the fat-side of each rack of lamb. Pat pistachio mixture on top of mustard. Bake in the preheated oven until the crust is golden and lamb is pink in the center, 20 to 25 minutes. Transfer to a plate and let rest 10 minutes before slicing.

input_text: How to make Mediterranean Albacore Salad ?
target_text: You can make Mediterranean Albacore Salad  with -Romaine lettuce & Radichio, -Cherry tomatoes, -Fresh black & green olives, -Grated Feta cheese, -Albacore in Olive Oil (Lazaro foods), -Chef Esmeralda's Special Mediterranean Dressing. Here's the instruction: Serve the Romaine lettuce on a plate with the Radichio, add the cherry tomatoes, add the black and green olives over the lettuce and tomatoes. Grate Feta cheese over the salad. Add the Albacore pieces to the salad and finally spread dressing to it. Enjoy!

input_text: How to make Pumpkin Pecan Bread?
target_text: You can make Pumpkin Pecan Bread with 1-1/4 cups firmly packed brown sugar, 1 cup canned pumpkin, 1/2 cup MIRACLE WHIP Dressing Family Dollar $3.50 thru 02/07, 1/4 cup milk, 2 eggs, 2 cups flour, 2 tsp. CALUMET Baking Powder, 1-1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. ground ginger, 1/4 tsp. ground cloves, 1/2 cup chopped pecans. Here's the instruction: Mix sugar, pumpkin, salad dressing, milk and eggs until well blended; add to combined dry ingredients, mixing just until moistened. Fold in pecans. Pour into greased and floured 9x5 inch loaf pan. Bake at 350F for 55 to 60 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool 10 minutes; remove from pan. Cool completely.

input_text: How to make Cranberry Relish?
target_text: You can make Cranberry Relish with 1 qt. cranberries, 3 ripe tart apples, 1 large orange, 1 can crushed pineapple. Here's the instruction: Grind cranberries and apples. Mix with orange juice and ground orange rind. Add pineapple (juice and all). To each cup of fruit mixture add 1/2 cup sugar. May add nuts if you prefer.

input_text: How to make Banana Pineapple Cool Whip Salad?
target_text: You can make Banana Pineapple Cool Whip Salad with 8 oz. Cool Whip, 1 box instant banana pudding mix, 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained. Here's the instruction: Make pudding following directions on side of package. Mix ingredients together. Refrigerate for 4 hours.

input_text: How to make Pumpkin Cake?
target_text: You can make Pumpkin Cake with 2 c. flour, 2 c. sugar, 4 eggs, 2 tsp. soda, 1/2 tsp. salt, 2 tsp. cinnamon, 1 c. Mazola oil, 2 c. pumpkin. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients well. Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes. Can use a 9 x 13-inch pan or a tube pan (greased and floured). Raisins and coconut may be added to cake, if desired. Frost with Cream Cheese Frosting.

input_text: How to make Oven-Fried Chicken?
target_text: You can make Oven-Fried Chicken with 8 chicken pieces, drumsticks and bone-in thighs (about 2 1/2 lb.), Salt and pepper, 1 cup buttermilk, 2 cloves garlic, thinly sliced, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh mixed herbs such as parsley, thyme, rosemary and basil, 3 cups panko, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 2 tablespoons canola oil. Here's the instruction: Trim chicken; season with salt and pepper. Place in a shallow dish large enough to hold chicken in a single layer. Whisk buttermilk, garlic and herbs. Pour over chicken and set aside to marinate for 30 minutes. Preheat oven to 425°F. Line a large baking sheet with foil. Coat a wire rack with cooking spray; place on sheet. In a shallow bowl, combine panko, paprika, 1/2 tsp. salt and 1/4 tsp. pepper. Remove chicken from marinade; discard excess. Dredge chicken in panko mixture, shake off excess and arrange on rack. Drizzle with oil. Bake until chicken is golden brown and cooked through, 40 to 50 minutes.

input_text: How to make Creamed Dill Carrots?
target_text: You can make Creamed Dill Carrots with 2 or 3 c. carrots, 1/4 tsp. fresh dill, 3 Tbsp. butter, 3 Tbsp. flour, 1 1/2 c. milk, salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: Slice or dice carrots. Cook in salt water until tender. Drain.

input_text: How to make Venison Chili(Hunter'S Delight)  ?
target_text: You can make Venison Chili(Hunter'S Delight)   with 2 lb. venison (moose, elk or deer), ground, chopped or mixed, 1 medium chopped onion, 2 cans kidney beans, 1 green pepper, chopped, 1 can tomato soup, 1 can tomatoes, chopped, 1 Tbsp. vinegar, 1/2 tsp. cumin, 1/2 tsp. dry mustard, 1 Tbsp. salt, 1 Tbsp. black pepper, 3 Tbsp. chili powder, 2 to 3 c. water, 1 to 2 red peppers (optional). Here's the instruction: Brown venison. Add remaining ingredients and enough water to cover; simmer 2 to 3 hours. Best when reheated. The trick is in the vinegar. Use 1 tablespoon vinegar with all venison roasts, chops, burgers, etc.; it takes all the wild smell away. You can freeze this in Ziploc bags for a later date.

input_text: How to make Spaghetti Crusted Ground Turkey Pie?
target_text: You can make Spaghetti Crusted Ground Turkey Pie with 6 oz. uncooked spaghetti, broken in half, 2 eggs, beaten, 1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese, 2/3 c. sour cream, 1 Tbsp. butter or oleo, 1 lb. ground turkey, 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce, 1 tsp. dried oregano, 3/4 c. chopped green pepper (or celery may be used), 1/3 c. chopped onion, 1 tsp. garlic salt, 1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese (4 oz.), salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Cook spaghetti as directed on package and drain. Mix eggs, Parmesan cheese and warm spaghetti. Pour into generously buttered 9 x 1 1/4-inch pie plate. Pat in bottom and up sides to rim with back of spoon. Spread sour cream over bottom. Heat oven to 350°. Heat margarine over medium-high heat until melted. Crumble turkey into skillet. Add bell pepper and onion. Cook until turkey is no longer pink; drain. Add tomato sauce, garlic salt and oregano. Simmer 10 minutes, uncovered. Salt and pepper to taste. Spoon mixture over sour cream. Cover with aluminum foil. Bake 25 minutes. Sprinkle Mozzarella cheese on top and bake until melted.

input_text: How to make Breakfast Pizza?
target_text: You can make Breakfast Pizza with 1 pkg. Hungry Jack or crescent rolls, 1 lb. sausage, browned, 8 oz. or 1 c. Swiss cheese, 4 eggs, 3/4 c. milk. Here's the instruction: Spread rolls on a 9 x 13-inch pan or pizza pan. Sprinkle browned sausage on rolls. Place cheese over sausage. Mix eggs and milk; pour over top. Bake at 425° for 20 minutes.

input_text: How to make Vanilla Slice And Bake Cookies?
target_text: You can make Vanilla Slice And Bake Cookies with 1/2 c. shortening, butter or margarine, 1 c. sugar, 1 egg, 2 tsp. vanilla, 1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour, 1/2 tsp. baking soda, 1/4 tsp. salt, 1/2 c. chopped pecans. Here's the instruction: Cream butter; gradually add sugar, mix well (use mixer). Add egg and vanilla; beat well. Combine flour, soda and salt; add to creamed mixture, beat well. Stir in pecans. Shape dough into two 12-inch rolls, wrap in wax paper, chill or freeze at least 2 hours. Unwrap rolls, and cut into 1/4-inch slices; place in ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on rack. Yields 7 dozen.

input_text: How to make Garlic Bread with Parsley?
target_text: You can make Garlic Bread with Parsley with 5 garlic cloves, 3/4 stick unsalted butter, 1 cup packed parsley sprigs, 1 (24-inch) baguette. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350F. With motor running, drop garlic cloves into food processor and run until garlic is finely chopped. Cook garlic in butter with 1/4 teaspoon each of salt and pepper in a small heavy saucepan over medium heat, stirring, until pale golden, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat. Pulse parsley in food processor until finely chopped, then stir into butter. Cut baguette crosswise at 1-inch intervals, not slicing all the way through. Put bread on a large sheet of foil, then spoon about 1 tsp butter into each cut. Wrap foil tightly around bread and bake until heated through, about 10 minutes.

input_text: How to make Easy Divinity Candy?
target_text: You can make Easy Divinity Candy with 1 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. water, pinch of salt, 1 jar Marshmallow Creme, 1 Tbsp. vanilla, 1 c. chopped nuts. Here's the instruction: Cook sugar and water to soft crack stage. Turn off heat and stir in Marshmallow Creme; add vanilla and nuts. Stir until well mixed. Turn out in greased pan and let cool and set up.

input_text: How to make Orange Blossoms?
target_text: You can make Orange Blossoms with 1 box golden Duncan Hines butter cake mix, 2 lemons, 2 oranges, 1 1/2 lb. confectioners sugar. Here's the instruction: Prepare cake mix as directed. Spoon 1 tablespoon of batter into miniature muffin tins. Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes.

input_text: How to make Wheat Germ Streusel Banana Muffins?
target_text: You can make Wheat Germ Streusel Banana Muffins with 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup whole wheat flour, 1/3 cup packed brown sugar, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1-1/3 cups mashed ripe bananas (about 3 medium), 1 egg, 2 tablespoons canola oil, 2 tablespoons unsweetened applesauce, 1/4 cup packed brown sugar, 2 tablespoons toasted wheat germ, 1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 tablespoon cold butter, 2 tablespoons finely chopped walnuts. Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, combine the flours, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt. In another bowl, beat the bananas, egg, oil and applesauce until well blended. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Coat muffin cups with cooking spray or use paper liners; fill two-thirds full with batter. For streusel, combine the brown sugar, wheat germ and cinnamon; cut in butter until crumbly. Stir in walnuts. Sprinkle over batter. Bake at 375° for 18-22 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack.

input_text: How to make Waffle Rosettes?
target_text: You can make Waffle Rosettes with 2 eggs, 1 c. milk, 1/2 tsp. salt, confectioners sugar, 2 tsp. sugar, 1 c. flour, 1 Tbsp. vanilla. Here's the instruction: Beat eggs slightly, then add sugar slowly. Now add milk. Mix well. Add flour and salt. Beat until smooth. Add vanilla. Using your deep fryer, heat waffle iron in oil, then dip in batter and then back in oil until brown. Knock off of iron onto paper towel. Sprinkle with confectioners sugar.

input_text: How to make Peachy Green Smoothie?
target_text: You can make Peachy Green Smoothie with 1 cup kefir (I used goat milk kefir), 5-6 frozen peach slices, 3 dried black mission figs, stems removes, sliced in half, 3 kale leaves, 1 teaspoon chia seeds, scant 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1-2 tablespoons filtered water or a couple ice cubes. Here's the instruction: Place the ingredients in the blender in this order (it will aid blending and prevent sullying a spatula unnecessarily): figs, peaches, chia seeds, cinnamon, kefir, water, kale. Blend for 2-3 minutes. I like to put everything away while blending and when I'm done so is the smoothie.

input_text: How to make Beer Braised Rabbit with Leek Rosti?
target_text: You can make Beer Braised Rabbit with Leek Rosti with 3 tablespoons oil, 2 whole rabbits, skin on and cut into individual pieces, 1/2 cup plus 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour, Salt, Freshly ground black pepper, 1/2 pound ground andouille or other pork sausage, 2 cups thinly sliced onions, 1 1/2 pounds white mushrooms, thinly sliced, 2 tablespoons chopped garlic, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme leaves, 2 bay leaves, 2 cups amber beer, 4 cups brown chicken stock, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 tablespoon finely chopped parsley leaves, plus more for garnish, Leek Rosti, recipe follows. Here's the instruction: In a large, oven-proof pan with a lid, heat the oil. Season the rabbit and 1/2 cup of the flour with salt and pepper. Dredge the rabbit pieces in the seasoned flour, coating each side completely. Lay the rabbit, skin side down in the oil and brown for 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Remove the rabbit from the pan and set aside. Add the sausage and brown for 2 to 3 minutes. Add the onions. Season with salt and pepper. Saute for 2 to 3 minutes or until tender. Add the mushrooms and garlic. Saute for 2 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Add thyme and bay leaves. Add the rabbit to the vegetable mixture. Add the beer and chicken stock. Bring the liquid up to a simmer and cover. Cook the rabbit until very tender, about 30 to 35 minutes, skimming off the fat. Remove the rabbit pieces from the pan and set aside. Blend the remaining flour and butter together into a smooth paste. Whisk the paste into the hot liquid. Bring the liquid to a simmer and cook for 3 to 4 minutes. Add the rabbit back to the pan and continue to cook for 5 minutes. Stir in the parsley. Season with salt and pepper, if needed. Serve the rabbit with the leek rosti and garnish with parsley. Leek Rosti: 3 large Idaho potatoes Water, to cover Salt 3 tablespoons butter, plus more as needed 1 1/2 cups chopped leeks, white part only Freshly ground white pepper Place the potatoes in a saucepan, cover with water and season with salt. Over medium heat, bring the water to a boil, reduce the heat to medium low and cook until the potatoes are tender. Remove from the water and cool completely. Peel the potatoes and pass through a coarse grater. In a large nonstick saute pan, over medium heat, melt the butter. Add the leeks. Season with salt and white pepper. Saute for 2 minutes. Add the potatoes and mix thoroughly. Using the back on a wooden spoon press the potato mixture firmly into the pan. Reduce the heat to low and cook until the potatoes are crispy and golden brown. Using a spatula, flip the potato cake over and continue cooking the other side, adding more butter, if needed. Remove from the pan and slice into individual servings. Yield: 6 servings

input_text: How to make Choereg (Bread Machine)?
target_text: You can make Choereg (Bread Machine) with 2 eggs, 1/2 cup salted butter, softened, 1 cup whole milk, 4 1/2 cups bread flour, 3/4 cup sugar, 2 teaspoons yeast, 1 teaspoon mahleb (ground cherry seeds), 1 teaspoon caraway seed, 1 tablespoon sesame seeds. Here's the instruction: 1. Put ingredients in bread machine as per directed by manufacturer. Use the dough setting on your machine. Divede the dough into 24 pieces to shape into a braid. Let rise for 30 - 60 minutes once braided to rise and increase in size. Line pans with parchment paper and coat with egg wash and sprinkle on sesame seeds. Bake for approximately 15 - 20 until golden brown. Enjoy!

input_text: How to make Apple Crisp?
target_text: You can make Apple Crisp with 4 c. sliced cooking apples, 1 Tbsp. lemon juice, 1/3 c. sifted flour, 1 c. oats (raw), 1/2 c. brown sugar, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1/3 c. melted butter. Here's the instruction: Place apples in greased shallow baking dish. Sprinkle with lemon juice. Combine flour, oats, sugar, salt and cinnamon. Add melted butter, mixing until crumbly. Sprinkle crumb mixture over apples. Bake in moderate oven at 375° for 30 minutes or until apples are tender.

input_text: How to make Raspberry Almond Pie?
target_text: You can make Raspberry Almond Pie with 1 (8 inch) chocolate crumb crusts, 1 cup raspberry jam, 1/2 cup butter or 1/2 cup margarine, softened, 3/4 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup ground almonds. Here's the instruction: Spread jam in the pie crust. Cream the butter and sugar together. Add the eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Stir in the almonds. Pour the batter over the jam. Bake in a 350 oven for 45 minutes or until delicately browned.

input_text: How to make Gingersnaps?
target_text: You can make Gingersnaps with 3/4 c. oleo, 1 c. sugar, 1/4 c. molasses, 1 egg, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1/2 tsp. ginger, 1/2 tsp. cloves, 2 tsp. baking soda, 1/4 tsp. salt, 2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. flour. Here's the instruction: Mix oleo, sugar, molasses and egg; mix well. Add cinnamon, ginger, cloves, baking soda, salt and flour. Mix well. Form a small ball. Dip into granulated sugar and place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350° for 10 to 15 minutes.

input_text: How to make No Bake Cookies?
target_text: You can make No Bake Cookies with 2 cup Sugar, 1/2 cup Milk, 1/4 cup Cocoa Powder, 6 tbsp Butter, 1 tbsp Vanilla extract, 1/2 cup Smooth Peanut-Butter, 3 cup Oatmeal. Here's the instruction: Put sugar, milk, cocoa powder, butter & vanilla extract in a large pot then cook over medium heat until the mix is well blended & has become smooth Remove the pot from heat. Add in the oatmeal & the peanut butter then mix thoroughly to a thick consistency. Spoon the cookies out on onto parchment or wax paper (one spoonful or so per cookie) & let them set & harden for 30 mins or so. Then eat & enjoy.

input_text: How to make Goat Cheese Crostini With Flash Tomato Sauce?
target_text: You can make Goat Cheese Crostini With Flash Tomato Sauce with 1 French bread or 1 baguette, 4 ounces goat cheese, 1 bunch fresh tarragon, 4 ounces breadcrumbs, 2 eggs, 2 fresh tomatoes (cored & rough chopped), 1 garlic clove, peeled & chopped, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, 1 Spanish onion, rough chop. Here's the instruction: Remove. all of the crust on the baguette, slice (length wise), 1/4 inch slices. Approximately 4 slices to the loaf. Spread goat cheese along two of the slices, layer with tarragon, sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cover with another slice. Prepare egg wash by lightly whisking 2 eggs. Dip each crostini in egg wash then coat with bread crumbs. Heat 1 tablespoons olive oil in a pan, wait until hot , them add crostini. Cook until golden, then turn over and cook until golden. For sauce, heat pan until seriously hot, then add olive oil, chopped onions and tomatoes. Cook on highest temperature for 2-3 minutes, do not simmer. Finish with garlic & lemon juice. In center of plate, arrange sauce in center of plate. Then cut each crostini in 4 pieces and arrange around sauce. Wine suggestions: Atlas Peak Sangiovese 1993 or Ravenswood Merlot 1993.

input_text: How to make Bo's Chocolate Chip Cheesecake?
target_text: You can make Bo's Chocolate Chip Cheesecake with 24 ounces cream cheese broken into pieces, 4 large eggs separated, 2 tablespoons vanilla extract (do not use artificial), 1 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup brown sugar or to taste, 1 pound chocolate chips, 1 pound graham cracker crumbs, 1/2 cup butter melted. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 325F (160C). PREPARE THE BATTER: Place the egg yolks in a food processor for 5 seconds, then add the cream cheese and beat until smooth. Add the brown sugar and vanilla and process for several minutes, or until the batter is very smooth. Beat the egg whites and fold into the cheese mixture. Set aside. PREPARE THE CRUST: Soften butter and combine with graham cracker crumbs. Mix until fully blended, e. g. they will form a ball when squeezed in your hand or by a spoon. Pat the crust into the sides and bottom of a springform pan about 9 inches in diameter. Spread a generous layer of chips on the bottom of the pan, and then pour the batter into the pan. Add another generous layer of chips to the top of the cake. Place the filled pan into the preheated oven. Baking time will vary from about 30 minutes to 2 hours. Cooking time depends on whether you want a soft, gooey "New York" style cheesecake (shorter) to a fluffy "souffle"-like cheesecake (longer). The longer you cook it, the fluffier it gets. When the cake starts to rise like a souffle, start checking to see if it is done. It will just about double in volume, and should not flow over the sides of the pan. If the cake shimmers like Jello when shaken, it is done. Alternatively, if a knife inserted comes out clean, the cake is overcooked: the knife should be very lightly coated with batter.

input_text: How to make Poppy Seed Salmon Kebabs / Skewers?
target_text: You can make Poppy Seed Salmon Kebabs / Skewers with 250 g salmon (cutlets or steaks), 2 bamboo skewers, 2 teaspoons poppy seeds, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, 1 tablespoon sake, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 3 drops Tabasco sauce, 1 teaspoon ginger, crushed, 1 teaspoon garlic, crushed, 1 teaspoon sugar. Here's the instruction: Cut salmon into cubes around 2-3cm (one inch) in size. Leave the skin on if desired but cur around the bones. Combine all other ingredients (apart from skewers!) in a small bowl, add salmon pieces and gently mix. Leave in refrigerator around an hour to marinate, lightly turning occasionally. Carefully thread onto skewers and cook over BBQ or grill on low-medium temperature for 5-10 minutes turning occasionally until cooked.

input_text: How to make Bay Scallops Ceviche?
target_text: You can make Bay Scallops Ceviche with 1/4 lb fresh bay scallop, cut into quarters, 3 limes, juice of, 1 tablespoon cilantro, minced, 2 tablespoons red onions, chopped, 2 teaspoons fresh basil, chopped, 2 green onions, chopped, 1/2 green bell pepper, diced, 1/2 red bell pepper, diced, 1/2 yellow bell pepper, diced, 1 (8 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, 1 pinch black pepper. Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, marinate scallops in lime juice covered overnight in the refrigerator Drain lime juice, add remaining ingredients. Mix well and marinate for 2 1/2 hours in refrigerator. Serve chilled with crackers.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Chip Pie?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Chip Pie with 1 unbaked deep dish pie shell, 1 c. sugar, 1/2 c. flour, 2 eggs, well beaten, 1 stick butter or margarine, melted, 1 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips, 3/4 c. pecans, 1/2 c. coconut, 1 tsp. vanilla extract. Here's the instruction: Blend sugar, flour, eggs, margarine and vanilla well. Stir in chocolate chips, pecans and coconut. Pour into unbaked pie shell. Bake 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes or until firm. Serves 6 to 8 depending on serving size.

input_text: How to make Turkey Waldorf Pita?
target_text: You can make Turkey Waldorf Pita with 1 cup cubed cooked turkey, 2 celery ribs, chopped, 1/2 cup chopped tart apple, 1/2 cup halved seedless grapes, 1/4 cup chopped walnuts, 1/4 cup mayonnaise, 4 lettuce leaves, 2 pita breads (6 inches), halved. Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, combine the turkey, celery, apple, grapes, walnuts and mayonnaise. Place a lettuce leaf in each pita half; fill with turkey salad.

input_text: How to make Spicy Summer Salsa?
target_text: You can make Spicy Summer Salsa with 9 -10 large ripe tomatoes, peeled, quartered and seeded, 2 onions, peeled and quartered, 4 -5 canned chipotle peppers, in adobo sauce, 1 -3 jalapeno, seeded, vinegar, to taste, kosher salt, to taste. Here's the instruction: Pulse tomatoes, onions and chipotle peppers in a food processor until coarsely ground. Add jalapenos, one half at a time, taste testing after each addition. When the salsa has reached the desired spiciness, add vinegar, one tablespoon at a time, and salt, one teaspoon at a time, until seasoned to your taste. This freezes beautifully -- if it lasts long enough!

input_text: How to make Chocolate Chip Bars?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Chip Bars with 1 cup Butter, 1-1/2 cup Brown Sugar, Packed, 2 whole Eggs, 2 Tablespoons Milk, 2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract, 2-1/2 cups All-purpose Flour, 1 teaspoon Baking Powder, 1/4 teaspoons Salt, 1 package (12 Oz.) Semi-sweet Chocolate Chips, divided. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 9X13 pan and set aside. In small mixer bowl, cream together butter and sugar till fluffy. Add eggs, milk, and vanilla. Mix well. In a separate bowl stir together; flour, baking powder, and salt. Combine flour mixture and butter mixture and mix till incorporated. Stir in half the package of chocolate chips and spread into a 9X13 pan. Sprinkle the rest of the chocolate chips on top and bake for 30 minutes until golden brown like a chocolate chip cookie. Middle may not appear set but cookies will continue to bake when out of the oven. You may bake longer if needed. *You may decide it needs more chocolate chips. I like it this way, but it depends on your preference.

input_text: How to make Brownies?
target_text: You can make Brownies with 4 Tbsp. cocoa, 1/2 c. shortening, Crisco, 1/2 tsp. vanilla, 1 c. sugar, 2 eggs, 1 c. flour, 1 tsp. baking powder, 1/4 tsp. soda, 3/4 c. pecans. Here's the instruction: Mix cocoa, shortening, sugar and all other ingredients except pecans. Mix. Then add nuts. Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.

input_text: How to make Pesto Sauce?
target_text: You can make Pesto Sauce with 1 large bunch basil (fresh, 3 large handfuls), 1 handful parsley (top leafy part), 1 bulb garlic, peeled, 1/4 c. pine nuts (pignalia nuts), 1/2 c. finely shredded Parmesan cheese, 1 c. olive oil, salt and pepper. Here's the instruction: Put basil, parsley, garlic and pine nuts in blender. Turn it on and	gradually add	olive oil. Puree until fine. Add cheese, a touch of salt and grinding of black pepper; then blend briefly into a thick paste. Cover in jar to use later or freeze in ice tray. The individual cubes can then be used later.

input_text: How to make Hash Brown Potatoes Casserole?
target_text: You can make Hash Brown Potatoes Casserole with 2 lb. bag frozen hash brown potatoes, 1 pt. sour cream, 1 c. cream of mushroom soup, 1 c. cream of potato soup, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 small onion, salt and pepper, dab of butter. Here's the instruction: Thaw the frozen hash browns. Cut the onion in small chunks. Mix all the ingredients. Put in a 9 x 11-inch glass Pyrex dish. Top with Parmesan cheese and a dab of butter. Bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours. Serves 10.

input_text: How to make Chicken Pot Pie?
target_text: You can make Chicken Pot Pie with 1 chicken, cooked and deboned, 2 cans cream of chicken soup or 1 can soup and 1 can broth from chicken, 1 medium bag frozen vegetables, cooked and drained (use fresh if available; microwave to soften), 1 medium onion, chopped, salt and pepper to taste. Here's the instruction: Mix together and put in a 13 x 9-inch pan. Cover with topping.

input_text: How to make Hawaiian Wedding Cake?
target_text: You can make Hawaiian Wedding Cake with 1 yellow cake mix, 1 (3 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, 1 (9 oz.) container Cool Whip, 1 large can crushed pineapple, 1 small can flaked coconut, 1 1/2 c. chopped walnuts. Here's the instruction: Bake cake mix according to package directions; place in 14 x 10-inch pan, greased and floured. While cake is baking, mix pudding and refrigerate. Combine cream cheese and Cool Whip at medium speed on mixer. Add instant pudding to cream cheese mixture and set aside. Remove cake from oven and cool.

input_text: How to make Banana Cake?
target_text: You can make Banana Cake with 1/2 c. butter, 2 eggs, 1 1/2 c. flour, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 1/2 c. nuts, 1 c. sugar, 1 c. mashed bananas, 1 tsp. soda, 1 tsp. vanilla, 4 Tbsp. buttermilk. Here's the instruction: Cream butter and sugar thoroughly; add eggs and beat until fluffy. Add mashed bananas and flavoring; fold in dry ingredients alternately with buttermilk. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes at 350°.

input_text: How to make Victorian Shrimp Creole Recipe?
target_text: You can make Victorian Shrimp Creole Recipe with 1 pound frzn shelled shrimp, 1/3 c. butter, 1/4 c. flour, 1 c. warm water, 1/2 c. minced green onions, 4 cloves garlic, chopped, 1/2 c. minced parsley, 1 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 bay leaves, 1/2 teaspoon crushed thyme, Dash of cayenne, 1 can (8 ounce.) tomato sauce, 1 lemon slice, Warm cooked rice. Here's the instruction: Thaw shrimp and cut large ones in half. Heat butter; blend in flour and brown, stirring constantly. Gradually add in the water and cook, stirring till thick. Add in remaining ingredients, except rice; cover and simmer 20 min. Remove bay leaves and serve over rice. Serves 6.

input_text: How to make Bread Pudding?
target_text: You can make Bread Pudding with 6 slices bread, 4 eggs, 1 c. raisins or 2 sliced apples, 1 Tbsp. vanilla, 4 Tbsp. sugar, 1 1/2 c. milk. Here's the instruction: Break bread into pieces. Cook raisins or apples until slightly softened. Mix eggs with fork and add to milk. Add vanilla and sugar. Bake at 325° approximately 40 minutes.

input_text: How to make Littlemafia's Creamy Carrots?
target_text: You can make Littlemafia's Creamy Carrots with 5 carrots, 30 g butter, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 12 cup cream, 2 tablespoons chopped chives or 2 tablespoons parsley. Here's the instruction: Cut carrots into sticks or rings. Cook till just tender. Melt butter, add sugar and cook 1 minute. Pour in cream and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and put the carrots into the pan. Toss and serve sprinkled with herbs.

input_text: How to make Dynamite (Chili Spring Rolls)?
target_text: You can make Dynamite (Chili Spring Rolls) with 1 kg ground beef, 20 piece green chili, 3 tbsp taco seasoning, 1/2 head garlic, chopped, 1 large white onion, diced, 20 piece spring roll wrapper, 1 cheddar cheese (sliced lenghtwise), 1 cup oil, 1/2 cup water. Here's the instruction: Wash chilies and pat dry. Slice one side of the chili and remove seeds (make sure to wear gloves). Set aside. Heat pan and add about 3 tablespoons of oil. Add garlic, cook until golden brown. Add onions until cooked. Set aside. Cook and brown beef. Mix taco seasoning and cooked garlic and onions. Turn heat off and let it cool a little. Prepare and lay 1 wrapper on a flat surface. Stuff 1 green chili with a teaspoon or tablespoon of cooked ground beef mixture and add a slice/cut cheese. Roll stuffed chili in wrapper and secure sides with a bit of water. Fry chili using remaining oil for 3-5 minutes or until wrapper is golden brown. Serve with chili sauce or dip.

input_text: How to make Caraway Cheese Muffins?
target_text: You can make Caraway Cheese Muffins with 1 c. rye flour, 3/4 c. flour, 1/4 c. sugar, 2 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 egg, beaten, 3/4 c. milk, 1/3 c. oil, 3/4 c. shredded Cheddar cheese (3 oz.), 1 1/2 tsp. caraway seed. Here's the instruction: Stif flour, baking powder and salt together. Combine egg, milk and oil. Add egg mix to flour mix. Combine cheese and caraway seed, fold into batter. Grease muffin tins and fill 2/3 full. Bake at 400° for 20 to 25 minutes or until golden. Serve warm. Yields 12 muffins.

input_text: How to make Kung Pao Pork?
target_text: You can make Kung Pao Pork with 3/4 lb. lean pork, cut in 1/2 inch cubes, 4 Tbsp. soy sauce, divided, 2 Tbsp. lemon juice, 2 Tbsp. sugar, 2 tsp. cornstarch, 1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 2 Tbsp. olive oil, 1 small red bell pepper, chunked, 1/4 c. roasted peanuts. Here's the instruction: Combine pork and 2 tablespoons soy sauce. Refrigerate 30 minutes. Combine remaining 2 tablespoons soy sauce, lemon juice, sugar, cornstarch, crushed pepper and 1/4 cup water. In wok or large skillet, stir-fry pork and garlic in hot oil 3 minutes. Add bell pepper. Stir-fry 3 minutes. Add cornstarch mixture. Cook and stir until slightly thickened. Add peanuts enjoy. Great served over rice.

input_text: How to make Italian-Style Pork Chops?
target_text: You can make Italian-Style Pork Chops with 2 medium green peppers, cut into 1/4-inch strips, 1/2 pound sliced fresh mushrooms, 1 tablespoon plus 1-1/2 teaspoons olive oil, divided, 4 boneless pork loin chops (6 ounces each), 3/4 teaspoon salt, divided, 3/4 teaspoon pepper, divided, 2 cups marinara or spaghetti sauce, 1 can (3-1/2 ounces) sliced ripe olives, drained. Here's the instruction: In a large skillet, saute peppers and mushrooms in 1 tablespoon oil until tender. Remove and keep warm. Sprinkle chops with 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. In the same skillet, brown chops in remaining oil. Add the marinara sauce, olives, remaining salt and pepper, and reserved pepper mixture. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer until a thermometer inserted in pork reads 145°, 10-15 minutes. Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.

input_text: How to make Green Tortilla Chips?
target_text: You can make Green Tortilla Chips with 20 white corn tortillas (5 1/2 inches each), 1/4 cup water, 1 tablespoon green food coloring. Here's the instruction: Mix together food color and water. With pastry brush, brush on color on both sides of the 5 1/2" white corn tortilla. Let dry for one hour. Slice into triangles and fry in hot vegetable oil. (or use your favorite method). Drain tortilla shells on paper towels, salt to taste. Serve with your favorite dip.

input_text: How to make Baked Corn Bread?
target_text: You can make Baked Corn Bread with 1 small sour cream, 1 small can cream-style corn, 2 eggs, 1 box Jiffy mix, 1/2 c. oil. Here's the instruction: Mix sour cream, corn, eggs and oil together. Add Jiffy mix. Spray pan and bake at 375° for 50 to 60 minutes.

input_text: How to make Tex-Mex?
target_text: You can make Tex-Mex with 2 medium avocados (soft), 2 Tbsp. lemon juice, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. pepper, 1 c. sour cream, 1/2 c. mayo, 1 pkg. taco mix, 2 cans Frito-Lay bean dip, 3 medium tomatoes, seeded and diced, 1 can pitted black ripe olives, sliced, 8 oz. sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded. Here's the instruction: Mash avocados with lemon juice, salt and pepper. (Note: To peel avocado, slit lengthwise and pop off skim from both halves. Throw out seed, scoop out pulp and throw out rinds.) In separate bowl, combine sour cream, mayo and taco mix.

input_text: How to make Pork Tenderloin With Raspberry Sauce?
target_text: You can make Pork Tenderloin With Raspberry Sauce with 1 lb pork tenderloin, cut into 8 pieces, cayenne pepper, 2 tablespoons butter, 6 tablespoons red raspberry preserves, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, 1 tablespoon ketchup, 1/2 teaspoon horseradish, 1/2 teaspoon soy sauce, 1 clove garlic, minced, 2 kiwi fruits, peeled, thinly sliced, fresh raspberry. Here's the instruction: Press each pork tenderloin slice to 1 inch thickness. Lightly sprinkle both sides of each slice with cayenne pepper. Heat butter in heavy skillet over medium high heat. Add pork slice. Cook 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Meanwhile, combine next six ingredients in small saucepan and simmer over low heat 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Keep warm. Place cooked pork slices on warm serving plate. Spoon sauce over them and top pork slices with kiwi slice. Garnish with remaining kiwi and raspberries. Makes: 4 servings.

input_text: How to make Stuffed Cornish Hens?
target_text: You can make Stuffed Cornish Hens with 1 (6 1/4 ounce) package quick-cooking long grain and wild rice mix, 2 celery ribs, chopped, 1 small onion, chopped, 2 tablespoons butter, divided, 1 (10 3/4 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup, undiluted, 1 (4 ounce) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained, 4 Cornish hens, 24 ounces each, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Here's the instruction: Cook the rice according to package directions. In a small skillet, saute celery and onion in 1 tbsp butter until tender. Stir in the soup, mushrooms and prepared rice. Sprinkle the inside and outside of the game hens with salt and pepper. Stuff with the rice mixture. Place on a rack in a greased shallow roasting pan; cover with foil. Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes. Remove the foil. Melt the remaining butter; brush over the hens. Bake 25-35 minutes longer or until the juices run clear and a meat thermometer reads 180 degrees for the hens and 165 degrees for the stuffing.

input_text: How to make Banana Nut Bread?
target_text: You can make Banana Nut Bread with 4 c. all-purpose flour, 1 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. soda, 2 c. white or brown sugar, 1 c. melted margarine, 4 eggs, 4 small to medium bananas, mashed, 1/2 to 1 c. chopped nuts. Here's the instruction: Sift flour, salt and soda into large mixing bowl. Add sugar, melted margarine, eggs, bananas and nuts. Mix thoroughly on medium speed. Pour into 2 well-greased and waxed paper lined loaf pans. Bake at 350° for approximately 70 minutes or until toothpick inserted into the middle comes out clean. Remove from pan and cool.

input_text: How to make Layered Banana-Pineapple Dessert?
target_text: You can make Layered Banana-Pineapple Dessert with 1 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs, 1/4 c. sugar, 1/3 c. margarine, melted, 3 bananas, sliced, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened, 3 1/2 c. cold milk, 2 pkg. (4 serving size) vanilla flavored instant pudding, 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained, 1 (8 oz.) carton Cool Whip, thawed. Here's the instruction: Mix graham cracker crumbs, sugar and margarine in a 13 x 9-inch pan. Press evenly onto bottom of pan. Arrange banana slices on crust.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Chip Pie(Serve Warm With Ice Cream.)  ?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Chip Pie(Serve Warm With Ice Cream.)   with 1 stick margarine, melted and cooled, 1 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips, 1 c. sugar, 1/2 c. flour, 2 eggs, beaten, 1 unbaked pie shell. Here's the instruction: Mix by hand flour and sugar; add other ingredients, stir in chips; put in unbaked pie shell and cook 300° 45-55 minutes.

input_text: How to make Peanut Butter Cookies?
target_text: You can make Peanut Butter Cookies with 1 c. shortening, 1 c. sugar, 1 c. brown sugar, 2 eggs, 1 tsp. baking soda, 1 tsp. cold water, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 c. peanut butter (crunchy), 3 c. flour, 1 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. baking powder. Here's the instruction: Cream shortening; add sugar and eggs. Beat well, then add peanut butter. Sift together the flour, salt, baking powder and baking soda. Add to first mixture, then fold in water and vanilla. Shape dough into teaspoon-size balls. Place on cookie sheet and press flat with a fork dipped in cold water. Bake 15 minutes at 350°. Makes about 50 cookies.

input_text: How to make Hansen Hash?
target_text: You can make Hansen Hash with 1 (2 lb) bag frozen cubed hash brown potatoes or 1 (2 lb) bag hash browns, 1 lb ground beef, 2 tablespoons canola oil, 1 medium onion, 1 (4 ounce) can mushrooms, 1 cup frozen corn, 2 cups cheddar cheese or 2 cups monterey jack cheese, salt and pepper, ketchup (optional). Here's the instruction: brown ground beef and onion in frying pan. Drain and set aside. In same pan, add oil and brown the potatoes until done. return the ground beef and onion mixture to the pan with potatoes. Add mushrooms and corn to the beef and potatoes. Let heat thoroughly. Add cheese,salt and pepper. Mix until cheese melts. serve to plates and top with ketchup. Yum!

input_text: How to make Apple Cake Pie?
target_text: You can make Apple Cake Pie with 5 large apples, cored and sliced thin, 1 tsp. lemon juice, 3/4 c. sugar, 1/4 c. butter or margarine, 1 egg, beaten, 1/2 c. sifted flour, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1/8 tsp. salt. Here's the instruction: Place apples in well-greased 10-inch pie pan. Sprinkle with lemon juice. Cover with 1/4 cup sugar. Cream together butter or margarine and remaining 1/2 cup sugar. Add egg and mix with creamed mixture. Spread over fruit. Bake in 350° oven for 45 minutes. Serve hot or cold with thin custard sauce or whipped cream.

input_text: How to make Brown Sugar Roasted Salmon With Maple-Mustard-Dill Sauce?
target_text: You can make Brown Sugar Roasted Salmon With Maple-Mustard-Dill Sauce with 4 (5 -6 ounce) norwegian salmon fillets, skin removed, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 1 tablespoon black pepper, cracked, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 cup maple syrup, 1/4 cup mustard (grainy or Dijon), 2 tablespoons dill, chopped, 2 tablespoons olive oil. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 400°F. Combine brown sugar, cracked black pepper and kosher salt in bowl. Mix well. Rub salmon filets with brown sugar mixture, making sure to use all of mixture. Let stand for 15 minutes in refrigerator covered lightly with plastic wrap. Combine maple syrup, mustard and fresh dill in small mixing bowl; set aside. Coat bottom of baking pan with 1 tbsp olive oil. Place salmon fillets in pan and drizzle with remaining oil. Bake for 12 minutes or until cooked to desired temperature. Remove from baking pan and drizzle salmon with maple-mustard-dill sauce.

input_text: How to make Kimchi And Avocado Quesadillas?
target_text: You can make Kimchi And Avocado Quesadillas with 8 flour tortillas, 7 to 8 in. in diameter, 1 jar (14 oz.) kimchi, drained and chopped, 2 cups shredded jack cheese, 2 avocados, thinly sliced, 1 tablespoon toasted sesame oil, 2 tablespoons seasoned rice vinegar, 1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds, Cilantro leaves. Here's the instruction: Top 4 tortillas evenly with kimchi, then with cheese, avocados, and remaining tortillas. Mix oil, vinegar, and sesame seeds in a small bowl; set aside. Heat a 12-in. frying pan over medium-high heat. Toast each quesadilla until lightly browned and cheese has melted, 1 to 2 minutes per side. Slice each quesadilla into wedges, sprinkle with cilantro, and serve with sesame dipping sauce. Note: Nutritional analysis is per serving.

input_text: How to make Eiou Gumbo(You Invite Everyone Over)  ?
target_text: You can make Eiou Gumbo(You Invite Everyone Over)   with 1 (4 to 5 lb.) hen or broiler, 1 gal. water, 1 large pkg. seafood seasoning, 1 c. oil, 2 c. flour, 5 c. chopped green onions, 3 white onions, chopped, 5 c. chopped celery, 3 bell peppers, chopped, 4 Tbsp. Red Hot, 4 Tbsp. Tony Chachere seasoning, 1 bunch parsley, chopped and stems removed, 1 gal. tomatoes, chopped, 2 lb. sliced okra, 1 bottle Kitchen Bouquet, 3 whole garlic, pressed, 5 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 1 lb. shrimp, peeled and deveined, 3 lb. fresh fish, chopped, 2 pt. oysters, scallops and crabs (optional). Here's the instruction: In large gumbo pot, cook chicken in water with seafood seasoning. When tender, remove chicken, cool, debone and chop. In skillet, make a roux. Slowly brown flour in oil to a dark chocolate color, stirring constantly. Add all vegetables, except okra and tomatoes. When vegetables are clear, add to stock water. Add okra and tomatoes. Remove seasoning packet; add remaining seasonings. Simmer for 1 hour. Add cooked chicken, fish and seafood to mixture. Cook for 30 minutes. Serve over rice. You need a big gumbo pot for this.

input_text: How to make Sichuan Mouth-Numbing Cold Noodles?
target_text: You can make Sichuan Mouth-Numbing Cold Noodles with For the triple-garlic Sichuan chili oil:, 6 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 head garlic, or about 4 to 5 whole cloves, 1 1-inch nub of fresh ginger, 4 tablespoons chili flakes, 5 dried red chilies, 1 star anise, 1 cup vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons red Sichuan peppercorns, finely ground, 1 tablespoon soy sauce, For the Sichuan cold noodles:, 2 packets dry ramen noodles, 1 tablespoon sesame oil, 3 tablespoons triple-garlic Sichuan chili oil (above), 2 tablespoons Chinese black vinegar, 1 tablespoon light soy sauce, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 tablespoon water, 1 teaspoon tahini, 1 teaspoon peanut butter, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 2 eggs, beaten with 1 tablespoon water, 1 handful Thinly sliced cucumber, for garnish, 1 handful Chopped scallions, for garnish. Here's the instruction: In a saucepan, heat up 4 cloves of minced garlic, the half head of garlic, ginger, chili flakes, dried red chilies, star anise, and vegetable oil over medium heat, until sizzling. Stir to prevent burning and cook for 1 to 2 minutes, watching the garlic to make sure it doesn't burn. The garlic should be lightly browned. Turn off heat and add the ground red Sichuan peppercorns and 1 more tablespoon of chili flakes. Stir until the oil stops sizzling. Add the soy sauce and the remaining 2 cloves of minced garlic, and transfer a jar. Let it sit for 3 to 4 hours. Then, put the jar in the fridge. Remove star anise, ginger, and whole garlic cloves from the jar. Cook noodles according to directions until al dente. Drain, rinse with cold water, and toss with the sesame oil. Place in the fridge until ready. To make the sauce, in a small bowl, whisk the chili oil, black vinegar, soy sauce, brown sugar, water, tahini, and peanut butter together. Taste-test this sauce beforehand to see if you can handle the amount of heat! Adjust as necessary. Heat up a large skillet with the vegetable oil. Spread a thin layer of eggs across surface, swirling to reach the entire surface. Cook on low heat until cooked through. Cool. Cut into thin strips. Mix noodles with the sauce until well-combined, and garnish with cucumbers, egg strips, and scallions. Serve cold or at room temperature.

input_text: How to make Hearty Meatball Spinach Soup?
target_text: You can make Hearty Meatball Spinach Soup with 1/2 lb. lean ground beef, 1 cup chopped onions, divided King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09, 3 cloves garlic, minced, divided, 2 tsp. dried oregano leaves, divided, 1 Tbsp. chopped cilantro, 20 PREMIUM Saltine Crackers, finely crushed, 1 egg, lightly beaten, 1 Tbsp. oil, 2 cans (14 oz. each) reduced sodium beef broth, 1 can (14-1/2 oz.) stewed tomatoes, undrained, 1 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen chopped spinach, thawed, well drained. Here's the instruction: Mix meat, 1/4 cup of the onions, one-third of the garlic, 1/2 tsp. of the oregano and the cilantro in large bowl. Add cracker crumbs and egg; mix well. Shape into 1-inch balls; set aside. Cook and stir remaining 3/4 cup onions and remaining garlic in hot oil in Dutch oven or large saucepan on medium-high heat 3 to 5 min. or until onions are crisp-tender. Add broth, tomatoes, spinach and remaining 1-1/2 tsp. oregano; mix well. Bring to boil. Add meatballs; stir until evenly coated. Reduce heat to low; cover. Simmer 20 to 25 min. or until meatballs are cooked through, stirring occasionally. Serve with additional PREMIUM Saltine Crackers.

input_text: How to make Beef Stew With Red Wine And Horseradish-Chive Cream Recipe?
target_text: You can make Beef Stew With Red Wine And Horseradish-Chive Cream Recipe with 2 pounds beef chuck, cut into 2-inch cubes, 1 1/2 cups flour, Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, 2 tablespoons vegetable or canola oil, 11/2 cups dry red wine, 1/2 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 4 cloves garlic, thinly sliced, 1 medium onion, quartered, Two 1-inch strips of orange zest, 2 bay leaves, 4 sprigs thyme, 1 14.5-ounce can diced tomatoes (preferably fire-roasted, such as Muir Glen), 2 1/2 cups homemade or store-bought low sodium chicken broth (see note), 3/4 pound small potatoes, halved, 2 carrots, peeled and roughly chopped, 1 cup sour cream, 1 tablespoon prepared horseradish, 1 teaspoon zest from 1 lemon, 1 tablespoon juice from 1 lemon, 1 1/2 teaspoons minced chives, 1 1/2 teaspoons minced parsley. Here's the instruction: Adjust oven rack to lower-middle position and preheat oven to 300°F. Toss beef and flour together in a large bowl until beef is evenly coated. Shake off excess flour and discard. Season beef with salt and pepper. Heat oil in a large dutch oven over high heat until smoking. Add beef and cook without moving untill well-browned on one side, about 6 minutes. Stir to loosen meat. Add wine to the pan, and scrape up browned bits using a wooden spoon. Add the Worcestershire sauce, garlic, onion, orange zest, bay leaves, thyme, tomatoes and broth. Bring to a boil, cover, and transfer to oven. After about an hour, add the potatoes and carrots. Continue cooking until potatoes are cooked and meat is tear-apart-tender when pierced with a fork, about 1 1/2 hours longer. Meanwhile, combine sour cream, horseradish, lemon zest, lemon juice, chives and parsley in a small bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper and refrigerate until ready to serve. When stew is done, remove from oven and discard bay leaves, orange zest, and thyme. If stew is not thick enough, reduce over the stovetop until desired consistency is reached. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve immediately with horseradish sour cream.

input_text: How to make Fruity Tuna Salad?
target_text: You can make Fruity Tuna Salad with 2 (5 ounce) cans tuna, drained, 1 cup chopped dates, 1 1/2 cups chopped celery, 1 large apple - peeled, cored and diced, 1/2 cup lemon yogurt, 1 tablespoon minced onion, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1 teaspoon ground curry powder. Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, mix the tuna, dates, celery and apple. In a separate bowl, whisk together the yogurt, onion, lemon juice, and curry powder. Pour over tuna mixture and gently toss to coat. Refrigerate 1 hour, or until chilled.

input_text: How to make Cajun Rice ?
target_text: You can make Cajun Rice  with 4 Cups cooked rice (not minute), chicken gizzards from whole chicken, cooked diced chicken (1 1/2 cups)from the deli or luncheon area of your store, 15 oz can bamboo shoots drained, 15 oz can bean sprouts drained, small can dice water chestnuts drained, 1/2 lb sausage, 15 oz can kernal corn drained, cayene pepper (to how hot you want it), black pepper. Here's the instruction: Cook sausage and chicken gizzards while the rice is cooking per package directions.  Mix into rice and add all ingredients together.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Chip Cake?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Chip Cake with 1 box Duncan Hines yellow cake mix, 1 small box instant vanilla pudding, 1/4 tsp. salt, 1/2 c. water, 1/2 c. oil, 4 large eggs, 1 grated or shaved German chocolate bar, 1 (8 oz.) container sour cream, 1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips. Here's the instruction: Mix all ingredients together except chocolate chips with electric mixer until well blended. Fold chips in last with large spoon. Pour into greased and floured tube pan and bake at 350° for 1 hour. (Check after 45 minutes with cake tester.) Makes 12 servings.

input_text: How to make Chocolate Gravy?
target_text: You can make Chocolate Gravy with 1 c. white sugar, 2 1/2 Tbsp. cocoa, 3 Tbsp. flour, 1/4 tsp. salt, 3 1/2 c. whole milk, 1/2 stick margarine. Here's the instruction: Mix 4 dry ingredients well and add milk until smooth. Melt margarine in iron skillet. Add mixture and cook until desired consistency. Serve on biscuits.

input_text: How to make Yogurt Coffee Cake?
target_text: You can make Yogurt Coffee Cake with 1 c. butter or margarine, 2 c. sugar, 2 eggs, 1 c. goat milk yogurt, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. soda, 1 c. chopped nuts (pecans), 4 tsp. brown sugar, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 2 c. flour. Here's the instruction: Cream butter and sugar well. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Fold in yogurt and vanilla. Add dry ingredients.

input_text: How to make Peppy Chicken Liver Toasts?
target_text: You can make Peppy Chicken Liver Toasts with 1 baguette, cut into 1/3 inch slices (leftover baguette expected), 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 1/2 tablespoons unsalted butter, 3 large shallots, thinly sliced, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 2 slices bacon, 4 ounces chicken livers, rinsed and patted dry, 1 1/2 tablespoons fresh sage, minced, Dijon mustard, hot red jalapeno jelly. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Arrange bread slices on a cookie sheet and brush with olive oil. Bake until golden, about 15 minutes. In a medium heavy skillet, melt butter over low heat. Add shallots and salt and cook, stirring occasionally, over low heat until evenly caramelized and fairly tacky, about 20 - 25 minutes. In a separate medium skillet, cook bacon over medium-high heat, turning once, until crispy. Adjust heat while cooking to prevent smoking. Remove from heat and reserve bacon for another purpose. Leave rendered fat in the pan. With a very sharp knife, cut chicken livers into thin, 1/8 - 3/16 inch slices. Return skillet with bacon fat to medium-high heat until just shy of smoking. Add minced sage and cook, stirring, until very aromatic and darkened, about 30 seconds. Add liver slices. Cook on each side until just browned, about 2 minutes per side, then remove to drain on a paper towel. Assemble the toasts. Spread about 1/4 teaspoon of Dijon mustard on each toast. Place a slice or two, depending on size, of liver on each toast. Add a dollop of caramelized shallots. Finally, top with about 1/4 teaspoon, or more for extra pep, of hot red jalapeno jelly and serve.

input_text: How to make Italian Creme Cake?
target_text: You can make Italian Creme Cake with 1 stick margarine, 1/2 c. shortening, 2 c. sugar, 5 eggs, separated, 2 c. flour, 1 tsp. soda, 1 c. buttermilk, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 small can coconut, 1 c. chopped nuts. Here's the instruction: Cream margarine, shortening and sugar until light and fluffy. Add egg yolks and mix well. Sift flour and soda together; add to cream mixture alternately with buttermilk, beginning and ending with dry ingredients. Add vanilla, coconut and nuts. Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites.

input_text: How to make Oven Fried Chicken?
target_text: You can make Oven Fried Chicken with 13 cup vegetable oil, 13 cup butter, 1 cup flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons black pepper, 2 teaspoons paprika, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 teaspoon dried marjoram, 8 -9 bone-in skin-on chicken pieces. Here's the instruction: Place oil and butter in a big jellyroll pan. Put in preheated 375 degree oven. Mix flour and seasonings in a big paper bag or mixing bowl. Remove pan with oil and butter in it as soon as the butter is completely melted. Roll chicken pieces in the butter mixture and then dredge in the flour mixture. Once all of the chicken pieces are coated, place them skin-down on the jellyroll pan. Bake at 375 degrees F. for 45-50 minutes. Turn chicken pieces over and bake for another 10 minutes, or until chicken is browned well, crispy and bubbly. Use pan drippings to make gravy for mashed potatoes, fries or biscuits. Serve chicken hot or cold.

input_text: How to make Soft Gingerbread?
target_text: You can make Soft Gingerbread with 1 c. sour milk, 1 c. molasses, 1 c. sugar, 2 Tbsp. butter, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. ginger, 1 tsp. soda, 1 tsp. salt, 3 c. flour. Here's the instruction: Mix all together and bake slowly.

input_text: How to make Spinach Balls?
target_text: You can make Spinach Balls with 2 boxes frozen chopped spinach, 2 c. Pepperidge Farm bread dressing, 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese, 1/2 tsp. thyme, 1 Tbsp. Accent, 2 onions, 6 eggs, beaten, 3/4 c. melted margarine, 1 tsp. garlic salt, 1 tsp. black pepper, ripe tomatoes. Here's the instruction: Cook spinach as directed; drain. Add remaining ingredients and mix thoroughly. Refrigerate for an hour. Using an ice cream scoop, form balls and place on a flat pan. Freeze; store in a plastic bag until ready to bake and serve. Place frozen balls on thick tomato slices and bake, uncovered, for 25 minutes at 350°. Makes 24 balls.

input_text: How to make Cherokee Indian Curry Aaa Steak Sauce?
target_text: You can make Cherokee Indian Curry Aaa Steak Sauce with 1 cup of your favorite barbecue sauce, 1/2 cup red wine vinegar, 1/2 cup orange juice concentrate, 1/4 cup fresh lime juice, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, 2 1/2 tablespoons Madras curry powder, 1 teaspoon red curry powder, 1 teaspoon ground coriander powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon ground allspice, 1 tablespoon chopped garlic. Here's the instruction: Combine all ingredients in a large saucepan and add 1/2 cup water. Cook over medium heat for 15 mins. Let cool. Place your steaks (up to 6) in a large shallow pan in 1 layer. Add 2 cups steak sauce and marinate for 30 mins. at room temp. Turn and marinate for 30 mins. more. Grill, broil, or panfry steaks to desired doneness. Season with salt and pepper and serve.

input_text: How to make Old Time Popcorn Balls?
target_text: You can make Old Time Popcorn Balls with 1 cup sugar, 14 cup corn syrup, 34 cup water, 14 teaspoon salt, 12 teaspoon vinegar, 12 teaspoon vanilla, 8 cups popped popcorn. Here's the instruction: Place popped corn into a large bowl. Butter sides of a sauce pan. In the saucepan, combine the sugar, water, salt, corn syrup and vinegar. Cook until the temperature reaches 250 degrees on a candy thermometer. Stir in vanilla. Slowly pour over popcorn and stir with a wooden spoon. Grease hands lightly with shortening and form into balls. Yield depends on popcorn ball size.

input_text: How to make Broccoli Salmon Quiche?
target_text: You can make Broccoli Salmon Quiche with 1 (9 inch) pie crusts, 2 cups fresh broccoli, cut in flowerets, 1 (16 ounce) can salmon (or leftover cooked salmon), 1 cup swiss cheese, shredded, 1/4 cup fresh chives, chopped, 5 eggs, beaten, 1 cup whipping cream, 1/4 teaspoon red cayenne pepper, 1 teaspoon dried dill weed. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350°F Prepare bottom of 9-inch deep dish by spraying with non-stick cooking spray. Line with pie pastry. Cover bottom of dish with broccoli flowerets, chunks of canned salmon, and sprinkle with cheese and chives; set aside. In medium bowl, beat eggs, whipping cream, cayenne, and dill until thoroughly combined. Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour, or until crust and eggs are lightly browned and quiche is puffy in center.

input_text: How to make Breakfast Rolls?
target_text: You can make Breakfast Rolls with 2 cans crescent rolls, walnuts or pecans, 1/2 c. butter, 1/4 c. honey, 1/4 c. confectioners sugar. Here's the instruction: Roll crescent rolls out flat. Spread slightly with butter. Sprinkle with nuts. Mix butter, honey and confectioners sugar and set aside. Separate each roll and roll up crescent style. Place in sprayed 8 x 12-inch pan. Bake in 350° oven until golden brown. Drizzle honey mixture on warm cooked rolls, not hot rolls.

input_text: How to make Harvest Loaf Cake?
target_text: You can make Harvest Loaf Cake with 1/2 c. butter, 2 eggs, 1 c. sugar, 1 1/2 c. flour, 1 tsp. baking soda, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. ginger, 1/2 tsp. nutmeg, 1/2 tsp. cloves, 3/4 c. canned pumpkin, 1 (6 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate chips, 1 c. chopped walnuts. Here's the instruction: Cream butter and sugar; add eggs, beating well. Stir together flour, salt, soda and spices. Add to butter mixture; alternate with pumpkin, beginning and ending with dry ingredients and beating well after each addition. Stir in chocolate chips and 3/4 cup walnuts. Pour batter into greased 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan. Sprinkle with walnuts. Bake at 350° for 65 minutes.

input_text: How to make Healthy Low Cal Lasagna ?
target_text: You can make Healthy Low Cal Lasagna  with 11/2 lbs of lean ground beef, 6 oz. whole wheat lasanga noodles, 2.5 cups Hunts traditional spaghetti sauce, 2 cups fat free cottage cheese, 9 oz. pkg. frozen spinach (cooked as directed and drain excess water), 8 egg whites, 8 oz. mushrooms, 1 cup fat free mozzarella cheese. Here's the instruction: Great thing about this is that you can add or substitute a lot of the ingredients to make it just a little different each time. I know it's not one of those super pretty lasagnas where the cook carefully layers each ingredient, but it's still wonderful!  Cook ground beef until brown. Boil noodles as directed by package. Spray a 9"x13" pan with cooking spray and spread a few tablespoons of the spaghetti sauce on the bottom of the pan. Mix the rest of the ingredients, except for the fat free mozzarella cheese. Lay down 1/2 of the noodles and top with half of the cottage cheese mixture. Layer with the rest of the noodles and top with the other half of the mixture. Lastly, put the fat free cheese on top.  Bake at 350 for 35-40 minutes.

input_text: How to make Mom'S Green Chile?
target_text: You can make Mom'S Green Chile with 1 to 2 lb. cooked pork roast or pieces, diced, 1 (8 oz.) can stewed tomatoes, cut up, 5 to 7 peeled, diced green chiles, 1/2 small onion, diced, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. pepper, 1 can chicken broth (optional) with 1 c. water, 2 c. water. Here's the instruction: Save the juice the pork was cooked in or use canned chicken broth with water. Skim off fat from pork juice. Add water. In a deep pot, return pork juice and pork to boil. Add tomatoes, onion, chile and spices. Simmer for 1 hour.

input_text: How to make Squash Casserole?
target_text: You can make Squash Casserole with 1 lb. squash, 1 small onion diced, 1 tsp. salt, 1 c. grated cheese, 1/2 c. Ritz crackers (crushed), 2 Tbsp. margarine, 1/4 c. milk, 1/2 can cream of mushroom soup. Here's the instruction: Lightly grease 2 qt. baking dish. Mix together all ingredients. Pour into baking dish. Add more cheese and crackers crumbs on top (as much desired) and spoon remaining soup over top. Bake at 350° until golden brown.

input_text: How to make Mystery Pie?
target_text: You can make Mystery Pie with 3 egg whites, 1 c. sugar, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 24 Ritz crackers, crushed, 1 tsp. vanilla, 3/4 c. chopped pecans, 1/2 pt. whipped cream. Here's the instruction: Beat egg whites until very stiff. Beat in baking powder and sugar and beat until very stiff. Remove from mixer; add vanilla, crushed crackers and nuts. Pour into pie pan that has been generously greased with margarine. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes. Let cool 30 minutes and pour whipped cream on. Set in refrigerator until served.

input_text: How to make Potato and Bleu Cheese Cakes?
target_text: You can make Potato and Bleu Cheese Cakes with 2 tablespoons onions, finely minced, 2 tablespoons butter, divided, 1 cup shredded hash brown, thawed, 1 12 cups leftover mashed potatoes (Yukons are really good for this recipe), 14 cup blue cheese, crumbled, 2 tablespoons fresh chives, minced, salt, to taste, pepper, to taste, 2 eggs, fresh breadcrumb, oil (for frying). Here's the instruction: Saute the onion in 1 tablespoon of butter in a small skillet on medium heat. Set aside to cool slightly. In a mixing bowl, combine the hash browns, leftover mashed potatoes, sauteed onions, remaining butter (melted), bleu cheese, chives, salt and pepper. Separate one egg and lightly beat it. Stir into the potato mixture. Beat the other egg in a small, shallow bowl. Set aside. Form potato mixture into cakes 1/4-inch thick and 4 inches in diameter. Dip cakes in reserved beaten egg then coat with bread crumbs. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat and fry the cakes until golden on each side. An Irish Toast: May the roof above us never fall in, and may we family and friends gathered below never fall out.

input_text: How to make Dirt Pudding?
target_text: You can make Dirt Pudding with 1/2 stick butter, 8 oz. cream cheese, 1 c. powdered sugar, 3 c. milk, 2 small pkg. instant vanilla pudding, 16 oz. Cool Whip, 1 pkg. Oreo cookies. Here's the instruction: Cream the butter, cream cheese and powdered sugar; set aside. Mix milk and pudding. Add creamed mixture to pudding. Stir in a large tub of Cool Whip. Crush 1/2 package of Oreos and sprinkle on bottom of a 9 x 13-inch dish. Pour pudding over Oreos. Crush the other 1/2 package of Oreos and sprinkle on top. Refrigerate.

input_text: How to make Zippity Zingity Coleslaw?
target_text: You can make Zippity Zingity Coleslaw with 6 cups green cabbage, chopped (about 11.5oz), 2 cups red cabbage, chopped (about 4 oz), 1 cup white onion, chopped, 12 cup best foods mayonnaise, 14 cup sour cream, 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, 2 tablespoons hot prepared horseradish, 1 teaspoon sugar (can use Splenda packet), 12 teaspoon dry mustard, 12-1 teaspoon creole seasoning. Here's the instruction: In a large bowl, toss cabbages and white onion together. In a small bowl, whisk remaining ingredients together. Pour dressing into cabbage mix and toss together. Store in a tupperware or large ziploc bag. Tastes good right away but develops more flavor upon sitting.

input_text: How to make Easy Salad?
target_text: You can make Easy Salad with 1 large (16 oz.) carton cottage cheese (small curd), 1 large pkg. orange jello, 1 can mandarin oranges, drained, 1 large carton Cool Whip, 1 can crushed pineapple, drained. Here's the instruction: Mix orange jello with cottage cheese. Add fruit, then Cool Whip.

input_text: How to make Paprika Shrimp?
target_text: You can make Paprika Shrimp with 16 -24 uncooked large shrimp, 6 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 1 clove garlic, crushed, 1 teaspoon sweet paprika or 1 teaspoon hot paprika, salt, lemon wedge, to serve. Here's the instruction: Remove the shell from the centre of the shrimp, leaving the head and tail intact. Devein the shrimp. Mix together the oil, garlic, paprika and salt in a shallow dish large enough to hold the shrimp in a single layer. Stir together, then add the shrimp and turn until they are coated. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. When ready to cook, grill for about 1 minute, or until the shrimp start to curl and the shells turn pink. Turn over and continue to cook for an additional minute, or until cooked through. Serve at once with lemon wedges for squeezing over the shrimp.

input_text: How to make Pumpkin-Chai Muffins?
target_text: You can make Pumpkin-Chai Muffins with 1 stick unsalted butter, 1 tablespoon crushed chai tea (from 4 bags), 2 large eggs, 1 cup sugar, 1 cup pumpkin puree, 1 1/3 cups all-purpose flour, 1 1/4 teaspoons baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 1/2 cups chopped walnuts. Here's the instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 and line a 12-cup muffin pan with paper or foil liners. In a small saucepan, melt the butter with the chai tea. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs with the sugar, pumpkin puree and chai butter until smooth. Whisk in the flour, baking soda and salt until incorporated. Scoop the batter into the muffin cups and top with the walnuts. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center of a muffin comes out clean. Transfer the muffins to a rack to cool completely before serving.

input_text: How to make Cranberry Cake ?
target_text: You can make Cranberry Cake  with 3 cups fresh cranberries, 1 cup chopped pecans, 2 cups sugar, 2 eggs, 1 cup flour, 1/2 cup butter, melted, 2 T milk. Here's the instruction: Preheat oven to 350. Generously grease a 2 qt baking dish. Spread cranberries and pecans over bottom of pan. Sprinkle with 1 cup sugar. In medium mixing bowl - beat eggs on high till foamy. Add remaining ingredients. carefully spread over cranberries ( batter will be thick). bake 40 - 45 min until tooth pick inserted near center comes out clean. Cool for at least 30 min and serve warm with whipped cream.
